original: śrīlakṣmīnṛsiṃhāya namaḥ /
analyzed: śrī lakṣmī nṛsiṃhāya namaḥ

original: śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ /
analyzed: śrī vedavyāsāya namaḥ

original: nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam /
analyzed: nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet // NsP_1.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm ca eva tatas jayam udīrayet

original: taptahāṭakakeśānta jvalatpāvakalocana /
analyzed: tapta hāṭaka keśānta jvalat pāvaka locana

original: vajrādhikanakhasparśa divyasiṃha namo 'stu te // NsP_1.2 //
analyzed: vajra adhika nakha sparśa divya siṃha namaḥ stu te

original: pāntu vo narasiṃhasya nakhalāṅgūlakoṭayaḥ /
analyzed: pāntu vaḥ narasiṃhasya nakha lāṅgūla koṭayaḥ

original: hiraṇyakaśipor vakṣaḥ- kṣetrāsṛkkardamāruṇāḥ // NsP_1.3 //
analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipoḥ vakṣaḥ kṣetra asṛk kardama aruṇāḥ

original: himavadvāsiṇaḥ sarve munayo vedapāragāḥ /
analyzed: himavat vāsiṇaḥ sarve munayaḥ vedapāragāḥ

original: trikālajñā mahātmāno naimiṣāraṇyavāsinaḥ // NsP_1.4 //
analyzed: tri kāla jñāḥ mahātmānaḥ naimiṣa araṇya vāsinaḥ

original: ye 'rbudāraṇyaniratāḥ puṣkarāraṇyavāsinaḥ /
analyzed: ye rbuda araṇya niratāḥ puṣkara araṇya vāsinaḥ

original: mahendrādriratā ye ca ye ca vindhyanivāsinaḥ // NsP_1.5 //
analyzed: mahendra adri ratāḥ ye ca ye ca vindhya nivāsinaḥ

original: dharmāraṇyaratā ye ca daṇḍakāraṇyavāsinaḥ /
analyzed: dharmāraṇya ratāḥ ye ca daṇḍaka araṇya vāsinaḥ

original: śrīśailaniratā ye ca kurukṣetranivāsinaḥ // NsP_1.6 //
analyzed: śrīśaila niratāḥ ye ca kurukṣetra nivāsinaḥ

original: kaumāraparvate ye ca ye ca pampānivāsinaḥ /
analyzed: kaumāraparvate ye ca ye ca pampā nivāsinaḥ

original: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ saśiṣyā munayo 'malāḥ // NsP_1.7 //
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ sa śiṣyāḥ munayaḥ malāḥ

original: māghamāse prayāgaṃ tu snātuṃ tīrthaṃ samāgatāḥ /
analyzed: māgha māse prayāgam tu snātum tīrtham samāgatāḥ

original: tatra snātvā yathānyāyaṃ kṛtvā karma japādikam // NsP_1.8 //
analyzed: tatra snātvā yathānyāyam kṛtvā karma japa ādikam

original: natvā tu mādhavaṃ devaṃ kṛtvā ca pitṛtarpaṇam /
analyzed: natvā tu mādhavam devam kṛtvā ca pitṛ tarpaṇam

original: dṛṣṭvā tatra bharadvājaṃ puṇyatīrthanivāsinam // NsP_1.9 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tatra bharadvājam puṇya tīrtha nivāsinam

original: taṃ pūjayitvā vidhivat tenaiva ca supūjitāḥ /
analyzed: tam pūjayitvā vidhivat tena eva ca su pūjitāḥ

original: āsaneṣu vicitreṣu vṛṣyādiṣu yathākramam // NsP_1.10 //
analyzed: āsaneṣu vicitreṣu vṛṣya ādiṣu yathākramam

original: bharadvājena datteṣu āsīnās te tapodhanāḥ /
analyzed: bharadvājena datteṣu āsīnāḥ te tapodhanāḥ

original: kṛṣṇāśritāḥ kathāḥ sarve parasparam athābruvan // NsP_1.11 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa āśritāḥ kathāḥ sarve parasparam atha abruvan

original: kathānteṣu tatas teṣāṃ munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām /
analyzed: kathā anteṣu tatas teṣām munīnām bhāvitātmanām

original: ājagāma mahātejās tatra sūto mahāmatiḥ // NsP_1.12 //
analyzed: ājagāma mahā tejāḥ tatra sūtaḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: vyāsaśiṣyaḥ purāṇajño lomaharṣaṇasaṃjñakaḥ /
tān praṇamya yathānyāyaṃ sa ca taiś cābhipūjitaḥ // NsP_1.13 //
analyzed: tān praṇamya yathānyāyam sa ca taiḥ ca abhipūjitaḥ

original: upaviṣṭo yathāyogyaṃ bharadvājamatena saḥ /
analyzed: upaviṣṭaḥ yathāyogyam bharadvāja matena saḥ

original: vyāsaśiṣyaṃ sukhāsīnaṃ tatas taṃ lomaharṣaṇam /
analyzed: vyāsa śiṣyam sukha āsīnam tatas tam lomaharṣaṇam

original: sa papraccha bharadvājo munīnām agratas tadā // NsP_1.14 //
analyzed: sa papraccha bharadvājaḥ munīnām agratas tadā

original: bharadvāja uvāca:
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ uvāca

original: śaunakasya mahāsattre vārāhākhyā tu saṃhitā /
analyzed: śaunakasya mahā sattre vārāha ākhyā tu saṃhitā

original: tvattaḥ śrutā purā sūta etair asmābhir eva ca // NsP_1.15 //
analyzed: tvattaḥ śrutā purā sūta etaiḥ asmābhiḥ eva ca

original: sāṃprataṃ nārasiṃhākhyāṃ tvattaḥ paurāṇasaṃhitām /
analyzed: sāṃpratam nārasiṃha ākhyām tvattaḥ paurāṇa saṃhitām

original: śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ sūta śrotukāmā ime sthitāḥ // NsP_1.16 //
analyzed: śrotum icchāmi aham sūta śrotu kāmāḥ ime sthitāḥ

original: atas tvāṃ paripṛcchāmi praśnam etaṃ mahāmune /
analyzed: atas tvām paripṛcchāmi praśnam etam mahā mune

original: ṛṣīṇām agrataḥ sūta prātar hy eṣāṃ mahātmanām // NsP_1.17 //
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām agratas sūta prātar hi eṣām mahātmanām

original: kuta etat samutpannaṃ kena vā paripālyate /
analyzed: kutas etat samutpannam kena vā paripālyate

original: kasmin vā layam abhyeti jagad etac carācaram // NsP_1.18 //
analyzed: kasmin vā layam abhyeti jagat etat carācaram

original: kiṃ pramāṇaṃ ca vai bhūmer nṛsiṃhaḥ kena tuṣyati /
analyzed: kim pramāṇam ca vai bhūmeḥ nṛsiṃhaḥ kena tuṣyati

original: karmaṇā tu mahābhāga tan me brūhi mahāmate // NsP_1.19 //
analyzed: karmaṇā tu mahābhāga tat me brūhi mahāmate

original: kathaṃ ca sṛṣṭer ādiḥ syād avasānaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: katham ca sṛṣṭeḥ ādiḥ syāt avasānam katham bhavet

original: kathaṃ yugasya gaṇanā kiṃ vā syāt tu caturyugam // NsP_1.20 //
analyzed: katham yugasya gaṇanā kim vā syāt tu caturyugam

original: ko vā viśeṣas teṣv atra kā vāvasthā kalau yuge /
analyzed: kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ teṣu atra kā vā avasthā kalau yuge

original: katham ārādhyate devo narasiṃho 'py amānuṣaiḥ // NsP_1.21 //
analyzed: katham ārādhyate devaḥ narasiṃhaḥ pi amānuṣaiḥ

original: kṣetrāṇi kāni puṇyāni ke ca puṇyāḥ śiloccayāḥ /
analyzed: kṣetrāṇi kāni puṇyāni ke ca puṇyāḥ śiloccayāḥ

original: nadyaś ca kāḥ parāḥ puṇyā nṛṇāṃ pāpaharāḥ śubhāḥ // NsP_1.22 //
analyzed: nadyaḥ ca kāḥ parāḥ puṇyāḥ nṛṇām pāpa harāḥ śubhāḥ

original: devādīnāṃ kathaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ manor manvantarasya tu /
analyzed: deva ādīnām katham sṛṣṭiḥ manoḥ manvantarasya tu

original: tathā vidyādharādīnāṃ sṛṣṭir ādau kathaṃ bhavet // NsP_1.23 //
analyzed: tathā vidyādhara ādīnām sṛṣṭiḥ ādau katham bhavet

original: yajvānaḥ ke ca rājānaḥ ke ca siddhiṃ parāṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: yajvānaḥ ke ca rājānaḥ ke ca siddhim parām gatāḥ

original: etat sarvaṃ mahābhāga kathayasva yathākramam // NsP_1.24 //
analyzed: etat sarvam mahābhāga kathayasva yathākramam

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: vyāsaprasādāj jānāmi purāṇāni tapodhanāḥ /
analyzed: vyāsa prasādāt jānāmi purāṇāni tapodhanāḥ

original: taṃ praṇamya pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ nārasiṃhakam // NsP_1.25 //
analyzed: tam praṇamya pravakṣyāmi purāṇam nārasiṃhakam

original: pārāśaryaṃ paramapuruṣaṃ viśvadevaikayoniṃ vidyāvantaṃ vipulamatidaṃ vedavedāṅgavedyam /
analyzed: pārāśaryam parama puruṣam viśva deva eka yonim vidyāvantam vipula mati dam veda vedāṅga vedyam

original: śaśvacchāntaṃ śamitaviṣayaṃ śuddhatejo viśālam vedavyāsaṃ vigataśamalaṃ sarvadāhaṃ namāmi // NsP_1.26 //
analyzed: śaśvat śāntam śamita viṣayam śuddha tejaḥ viśālam vedavyāsam vigata śamalam sarvadā aham namāmi

original: namo bhagavate tasmai vyāsāyāmitatejase /
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate tasmai vyāsāya amita tejase

original: yasya prasādād vakṣyāmi vāsudevakathām imām // NsP_1.27 //
analyzed: yasya prasādāt vakṣyāmi vāsudeva kathām imām

original: sunirṇīto mahān praśnas tvayā yaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: su nirṇītaḥ mahān praśnaḥ tvayā yaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: viṣṇuprasādena vinā vaktuṃ kenāpi śakyate // NsP_1.28 //
analyzed: viṣṇu prasādena vinā vaktum kena api śakyate

original: tathāpi narasiṃhasya prasādād eva te 'dhunā /
analyzed: tathā api narasiṃhasya prasādāt eva te dhunā

original: pravakṣyāmi mahāpunyaṃ bhāradvāja śṛṇuṣva me // NsP_1.29 //
analyzed: pravakṣyāmi mahāpunyam bhāradvāja śṛṇuṣva me

original: śṛṇvantu munayaḥ sarve saśiṣyās tv atra ye sthitāḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇvantu munayaḥ sarve sa śiṣyāḥ tu atra ye sthitāḥ

original: purāṇaṃ narasiṃhasya pravakṣyāmi yathātathā // NsP_1.30 //
analyzed: purāṇam narasiṃhasya pravakṣyāmi yathā tathā

original: nārāyaṇād idaṃ sarvaṃ samutpannaṃ carācaram /
analyzed: nārāyaṇāt idam sarvam samutpannam carācaram

original: tenaiva pālyate sarvaṃ narasiṃhādimūrtibhiḥ // NsP_1.31 //
analyzed: tena eva pālyate sarvam narasiṃha ādi mūrtibhiḥ

original: tathaiva līyate cānte harau jyotiḥsvarūpiṇi /
analyzed: tathā eva līyate ca ante harau jyotiḥ svarūpiṇi

original: yathaiva devaḥ sṛjati tathā vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu // NsP_1.32 //
analyzed: yathā eva devaḥ sṛjati tathā vakṣyāmi tat śṛṇu

original: purāṇānāṃ hi sarveṣām ayaṃ sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: purāṇānām hi sarveṣām ayam sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: śloko yas taṃ mune śrutvā niḥśeṣaṃ tvaṃ tataḥ śṛṇu // NsP_1.33 //
analyzed: ślokaḥ yaḥ tam mune śrutvā niḥśeṣam tvam tatas śṛṇu

original: sargaś ca pratisargaś ca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca /
analyzed: sargaḥ ca pratisargaḥ ca vaṃśaḥ manvantarāṇi ca

original: vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva purāṇaṃ pañcalakṣaṇam // NsP_1.34 //
analyzed: vaṃśānucaritam ca eva purāṇam pañca lakṣaṇam

original: ādisargo 'nusargaś ca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca /
analyzed: ādisargaḥ nusargaḥ ca vaṃśaḥ manvantarāṇi ca

original: vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva vakṣyāmy anusamāsataḥ // NsP_1.35 //
analyzed: vaṃśānucaritam ca eva vakṣyāmi anu samāsatas

original: ādisargo mahāṃs tāvat kathayiṣyāmi vai dvijāḥ /
analyzed: ādisargaḥ mahān tāvat kathayiṣyāmi vai dvijāḥ

original: yasmād ārabhya devānāṃ rājñāṃ caritam eva ca // NsP_1.36 //
analyzed: yasmāt ārabhya devānām rājñām caritam eva ca

original: jñāyate sarahasyaṃ ca paramātmā sanātanaḥ /
analyzed: jñāyate sa rahasyam ca parama ātmā sanātanaḥ

original: prāk sṛṣṭeḥ pralayād ūrdhvaṃ nāsīt kiṃcid dvijottama // NsP_1.37 //
analyzed: prāk sṛṣṭeḥ pralayāt ūrdhvam na āsīt kiṃcid dvijottama

original: brahmasaṃjñam abhūd ekaṃ jyotiṣmat sarvakāraṇam /
analyzed: brahma saṃjñam abhūt ekam jyotiṣmat sarva kāraṇam

original: nityaṃ nirañjanaṃ śāntaṃ nirguṇaṃ nityanirmalam // NsP_1.38 //
ānandasāgaraṃ svacchaṃ yaṃ kāṅkṣanti mumukṣavaḥ /
analyzed: ānanda sāgaram svaccham yam kāṅkṣanti mumukṣavaḥ

original: sarvajñaṃ jñānarūpatvād anantam ajam avyayam // NsP_1.39 //
analyzed: sarvajñam jñāna rūpa tvāt anantam ajam avyayam

original: sargakāle tu saṃprāpte jñātvāsau jñātṛnāyakaḥ /
analyzed: sarga kāle tu saṃprāpte jñātvā asau jñātṛ nāyakaḥ

original: antarlīnaṃ vikāraṃ ca tat sraṣṭum upacakrame // NsP_1.40 //
analyzed: antar līnam vikāram ca tat sraṣṭum upacakrame

original: tasmāt pradhānam udbhūtaṃ tataś cāpi mahān abhūt /
analyzed: tasmāt pradhānam udbhūtam tatas ca api mahān abhūt

original: sāttviko rājasaś caiva tāmasaś ca tridhā mahān // NsP_1.41 //
analyzed: sāttvikaḥ rājasaḥ ca eva tāmasaḥ ca tridhā mahān

original: vaikārikas taijasaś ca bhūtādiś caiva tāmasaḥ /
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ ca bhūtādiḥ ca eva tāmasaḥ

original: trividho 'yam ahaṃkāro mahattattvād ajāyata // NsP_1.42 //
analyzed: trividhaḥ yam ahaṃkāraḥ mahat tattvāt ajāyata

original: yathā pradhānaṃ hi mahān mahatā sa tathāvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yathā pradhānam hi mahān mahatā sa tathā āvṛtaḥ

original: bhūtādis tu vikurvāṇaḥ śabdatanmātrakaṃ tataḥ // NsP_1.43 //
analyzed: bhūtādiḥ tu vikurvāṇaḥ śabda tanmātrakam tatas

original: sasarja śabdatanmātrād ākāśaṃ śabdalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: sasarja śabda tanmātrāt ākāśam śabda lakṣaṇam

original: śabdamātraṃ tathākāśaṃ bhūtādiḥ sa samāvṛṇot // NsP_1.44 //
analyzed: śabda mātram tathā ākāśam bhūtādiḥ sa samāvṛṇot

original: ākāśas tu vikurvāṇaḥ sparśamātraṃ sasarja ha /
analyzed: ākāśaḥ tu vikurvāṇaḥ sparśa mātram sasarja ha

original: balavān abhavad vāyus tasya sparśo guṇo mataḥ // NsP_1.45 //
analyzed: balavān abhavat vāyuḥ tasya sparśaḥ guṇaḥ mataḥ

original: ākāśaṃ śabdatanmātraṃ sparśamātraṃ tathāvṛṇot /
analyzed: ākāśam śabda tanmātram sparśa mātram tathā āvṛṇot

original: tato vāyur vikurvāṇo rūpamātraṃ sasarja ha // NsP_1.46 //
analyzed: tatas vāyuḥ vikurvāṇaḥ rūpa mātram sasarja ha

original: jyotir utpadyate vāyos tad rūpaguṇam ucyate /
analyzed: jyotiḥ utpadyate vāyoḥ tat rūpa guṇam ucyate

original: sparśamātraṃ tu vai vāyū rūpamātraṃ samāvṛṇot // NsP_1.47 //
analyzed: sparśa mātram tu vai vāyuḥ rūpa mātram samāvṛṇot

original: jyotiś cāpi vikurvāṇaṃ rasamātraṃ sasarja ha /
analyzed: jyotiḥ ca api vikurvāṇam rasa mātram sasarja ha

original: saṃbhavanti tato 'mbhāṃsi rasādhārāṇi tāni tu // NsP_1.48 //
analyzed: saṃbhavanti tatas mbhāṃsi rasa ādhārāṇi tāni tu

original: rasamātrāṇi cāmbhāṃsi rūpamātraṃ samāvṛṇot /
analyzed: rasa mātrāṇi ca ambhāṃsi rūpa mātram samāvṛṇot

original: vikurvāṇāni cāmbhāṃsi gandhamātraṃ sasarjire // NsP_1.49 //
analyzed: vikurvāṇāni ca ambhāṃsi gandha mātram sasarjire

original: tasmāj jātā mahī ceyaṃ sarvabhūtaguṇādhikā /
analyzed: tasmāt jātā mahī ca iyam sarva bhūta guṇa adhikā

original: saṃghāto jāyate tasmāt tasya gandhaguṇo mataḥ // NsP_1.50 //
analyzed: saṃghātaḥ jāyate tasmāt tasya gandha guṇaḥ mataḥ

original: tasmiṃs tasmiṃs tu tanmātrā tena tanmātratā smṛtā /
analyzed: tasmin tasmin tu tanmātrā tena tanmātra tā smṛtā

original: tanmātrāṇy aviśeṣāṇi viśeṣāḥ karmaśo 'parāḥ // NsP_1.51 //
analyzed: tanmātrāṇi aviśeṣāṇi viśeṣāḥ parāḥ

original: bhūtatanmātrasargo 'yam ahaṃkārāt tu tāmasāt /
analyzed: bhūta tanmātra sargaḥ yam ahaṃkārāt tu tāmasāt

original: kīrtitas te samāsena bharadvāja mayā tava // NsP_1.52 //
analyzed: kīrtitaḥ te samāsena bharadvāja mayā tava

original: taijasānīndriyāṇy āhur devā vaikārikā daśa /
analyzed: taijasāni indriyāṇi āhuḥ devāḥ vaikārikāḥ daśa

original: ekādaśaṃ manaś cātra kīrtitaṃ tatra cintakaiḥ // NsP_1.53 //
analyzed: ekādaśam manaḥ ca atra kīrtitam tatra cintakaiḥ

original: buddhīndriyāṇi pañcātra pañca karmendriyāṇi ca /
analyzed: buddhīndriyāṇi pañca atra pañca karmendriyāṇi ca

original: tāni vakṣyāmi teṣāṃ ca karmāṇi kulapāvana // NsP_1.54 //
analyzed: tāni vakṣyāmi teṣām ca karmāṇi kula pāvana

original: śravaṇe ca dṛśau jihvā nāsikā tvak ca pañcamī /
analyzed: śravaṇe ca dṛśau jihvā nāsikā tvac ca pañcamī

original: śabdādijñānasiddhyarthaṃ buddhiyuktāni pañca vai // NsP_1.55 //
analyzed: śabda ādi jñāna siddhi artham buddhi yuktāni pañca vai

original: pāyūpasthe hastapādau vāg bharadvāja pañcamī /
analyzed: pāyu upasthe hasta pādau vāc bharadvāja pañcamī

original: visargānandaśilpī ca gatyuktī karma tat smṛtam // NsP_1.56 //
analyzed: visarga ānanda śilpī ca gati uktī karma tat smṛtam

original: ākāśavāyutejāṃsi salilaṃ pṛthivī tathā /
analyzed: ākāśa vāyu tejāṃsi salilam pṛthivī tathā

original: śabdādibhir guṇair vipra saṃyuktāny uttarottaraiḥ // NsP_1.57 //
analyzed: śabda ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ vipra saṃyuktāni uttara uttaraiḥ

original: nānāvīryāḥ pṛthagbhūtās tatas te saṃhatiṃ vinā /
analyzed: nānā vīryāḥ pṛthak bhūtāḥ tatas te saṃhatim vinā

original: nāśaknuvan prajāṃ sraṣṭum asamāgamya kṛtsnaśaḥ // NsP_1.58 //
analyzed: na aśaknuvan prajām sraṣṭum a samāgamya kṛtsnaśas

original: sametyānyonyasaṃyogaṃ parasparasamāśrayāt /
analyzed: sametya anyonya saṃyogam paraspara samāśrayāt

original: ekasaṃghātalakṣyāś ca saṃprāpyaikyam aśeṣataḥ // NsP_1.59 //
analyzed: eka saṃghāta lakṣyāḥ ca saṃprāpya aikyam aśeṣatas

original: puruṣādhiṣṭhitatvāc ca pradhānānugraheṇa ca /
analyzed: puruṣa dhiṣṭhita tvāt ca pradhāna anugraheṇa ca

original: mahadādyā viśeṣāntās tv aṇḍam utpādayanti te // NsP_1.60 //
analyzed: mahat ādyāḥ viśeṣa antāḥ tu aṇḍam utpādayanti te

original: tat krameṇa vivṛddhaṃ tu jalabudbudavat sthitam /
analyzed: tat krameṇa vivṛddham tu jala budbuda vat sthitam

original: bhūtebhyo 'ṇḍaṃ mahābuddhe bṛhat tad udakeśayam // NsP_1.61 //
analyzed: bhūtebhyaḥ ṇḍam mahābuddhe bṛhat tat udakeśayam

original: prākṛtaṃ brahmarūpasya viṣṇoḥ sthānam anuttamam /
analyzed: prākṛtam brahma rūpasya viṣṇoḥ sthānam anuttamam

original: tatrāvyaktasvarūpo 'sau viṣṇur viśveśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // NsP_1.62 //
analyzed: tatra avyakta svarūpaḥ sau viṣṇuḥ viśveśvaraḥ prabhuḥ

original: brahmasvarūpam āsthāya svayam eva vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: brahma svarūpam āsthāya svayam eva vyavasthitaḥ

original: merur ulbam abhūt tasya jarāyuś ca mahīdharāḥ /
analyzed: meruḥ ulbam abhūt tasya jarāyuḥ ca mahīdharāḥ

original: garbhodakaṃ samudrāś ca tasyābhūvan mahātmanaḥ // NsP_1.63 //
analyzed: garbha udakam samudrāḥ ca tasya abhūvan mahātmanaḥ

original: adridvīpasamudrāś ca sajyotir lokasaṃgrahaḥ /
analyzed: adri dvīpa samudrāḥ ca sa jyotiḥ loka saṃgrahaḥ

original: tasminn aṇḍe 'bhavat sarvaṃ sadevāsuramānuṣam // NsP_1.64 //
analyzed: tasmin aṇḍe bhavat sarvam sa deva asura mānuṣam

original: rajoguṇayuto devaḥ svayam eva hariḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: rajaḥ guṇa yutaḥ devaḥ svayam eva hariḥ paraḥ

original: brahmarūpaṃ samāsthāya jagatsṛṣṭau pravartate // NsP_1.65 //
analyzed: brahma rūpam samāsthāya jagat sṛṣṭau pravartate

original: sṛṣṭaṃ ca pāty anuyugaṃ yāvat kalpavikalpanā /
analyzed: sṛṣṭam ca pāti anuyugam yāvat kalpa vikalpanā

original: narasiṃhādirūpeṇa rudrarūpeṇa saṃharet // NsP_1.66 //
analyzed: narasiṃha ādi rūpeṇa rudra rūpeṇa saṃharet

original: brāhmeṇa rūpeṇa sṛjaty ananto jagat samastaṃ paripātum icchan /
analyzed: brāhmeṇa rūpeṇa sṛjati anantaḥ jagat samastam paripātum icchan

original: rāmādirūpaṃ sa tu gṛhya pāti bhūtvātha rudraḥ prakaroti nāśam // NsP_1.67 //
analyzed: rāma ādi rūpam sa tu gṛhya pāti bhūtvā atha rudraḥ prakaroti nāśam

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe sarganirūpaṇaṃ nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 1 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe sarganirūpaṇam nāma prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: brahmā bhūtvā jagatsṛṣṭau narasiṃhaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: brahmā bhūtvā jagat sṛṣṭau narasiṃhaḥ pravartate

original: yathā te kathayiṣyāmi bharadvāja nibodha me // NsP_2.1 //
analyzed: yathā te kathayiṣyāmi bharadvāja nibodha me

original: nārāyaṇākhyo bhagavān brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa ākhyaḥ bhagavān brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ

original: utpannaḥ procyate vidvan nityo 'sāv upacārataḥ // NsP_2.2 //
analyzed: utpannaḥ procyate vidvan sau upacārataḥ

original: nijena tasya mānena āyur varṣaśataṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: nijena tasya mānena āyuḥ varṣa śatam smṛtam

original: tat parākhyaṃ tadardhaṃ ca parārdham abhidhīyate // NsP_2.3 //
analyzed: tat para ākhyam tad ardham ca parārdham abhidhīyate

original: kālasvarūpaṃ viṣṇoś ca yan mayoktaṃ tavānagha /
analyzed: kāla svarūpam viṣṇoḥ ca yat mayā uktam tava anagha

original: tena tasya nibodha tvaṃ parimāṇopapādanam // NsP_2.4 //
analyzed: tena tasya nibodha tvam parimāṇa upapādanam

original: anyeṣāṃ caiva bhūtānaṃ carāṇām acarāś ca ye /
analyzed: anyeṣām ca eva bhūtānam carāṇām acarāḥ ca ye

original: bhūbhūbhṛtsāgarādīnām aśeṣāṇāṃ ca sattama // NsP_2.5 //
analyzed: bhū bhūbhṛt sāgara ādīnām aśeṣāṇām ca sattama

original: saṃkhyājñānaṃ ca te vacmi manuṣyāṇaṃ nibodha me /
analyzed: saṃkhyā jñānam ca te vacmi manuṣyāṇam nibodha me

original: aṣṭādaśa nimeṣās tu kāṣṭhaikā parikīrtitā // NsP_2.6 //
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa nimeṣāḥ tu kāṣṭhā ekā parikīrtitā

original: kāṣṭhās triṃśat kalā jñeyā kalās triṃśan muhūrtakam /
analyzed: kāṣṭhāḥ triṃśat kalāḥ jñeyā kalāḥ triṃśat muhūrtakam

original: triṃśatsaṃkhyair ahorātraṃ muhūrtair mānuṣaṃ smṛtam // NsP_2.7 //
analyzed: triṃśat saṃkhyaiḥ ahorātram muhūrtaiḥ mānuṣam smṛtam

original: ahorātrāṇi tāvanti māsapakṣadvayātmakaḥ /
analyzed: ahorātrāṇi tāvanti māsa pakṣa dvaya ātmakaḥ

original: taiḥ ṣaḍbhir ayanaṃ māsair dve 'yane dakṣiṇottare // NsP_2.8 //
analyzed: taiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ayanam māsaiḥ dve yane dakṣiṇa uttare

original: ayanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ rātrir devānām uttaraṃ dinam /
analyzed: ayanam dakṣiṇam rātriḥ devānām uttaram dinam

original: ayanadvitayaṃ varṣaṃ martyānām iha kīrtitam // NsP_2.9 //
analyzed: ayana dvitayam varṣam martyānām iha kīrtitam

original: nṛṇāṃ māsaḥ pitṛṇāṃ tu ahorātram udāhṛtam /
analyzed: nṛṇām māsaḥ pitṛṇām tu ahorātram udāhṛtam

original: vasvādīnām ahorātram mānuṣo vatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ // NsP_2.10 //
analyzed: vasu ādīnām ahorātram mānuṣaḥ vatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: divyair varṣasahasrais tu yugaṃ tretādisaṃjñitam /
analyzed: divyaiḥ varṣa sahasraiḥ tu yugam tretā ādi saṃjñitam

original: caturyugaṃ dvādaśabhis tadvibhāgaṃ nibodha me // NsP_2.11 //
analyzed: caturyugam dvādaśabhiḥ tad vibhāgam nibodha me

original: catvāri trīṇi dve caikaṃ kṛtādiṣu yathākramam /
analyzed: catvāri trīṇi dve ca ekam kṛta ādiṣu yathākramam

original: divyābdānāṃ sahasrāṇi yugeṣv āhuḥ purāvidaḥ // NsP_2.12 //
analyzed: divya abdānām sahasrāṇi yugeṣu āhuḥ purāvidaḥ

original: tatpramāṇaiḥ śataiḥ saṃdhyā pūrvā tatra vidhīyate /
analyzed: tad pramāṇaiḥ śataiḥ saṃdhyā pūrvā tatra vidhīyate

original: saṃdhyāṃśakaś ca tattulyo yugasyānantaro hi saḥ // NsP_2.13 //
analyzed: saṃdhyāṃśakaḥ ca tad tulyaḥ yugasya anantaraḥ hi saḥ

original: saṃdhyāsaṃdhyāṃśayor madhye yaḥ kālo vartate dvija /
analyzed: saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśayoḥ madhye yaḥ kālaḥ vartate dvija

original: yugākhyaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ kṛtatretādisaṃjñakaḥ // NsP_2.14 //
analyzed: yuga ākhyaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ kṛta tretā ādi saṃjñakaḥ

original: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kaliś ceti caturyugam /
analyzed: kṛtam tretā dvāparaḥ ca kaliḥ ca iti caturyugam

original: procyate tatsahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo divasaṃ dvija // NsP_2.15 //
analyzed: procyate tat sahasram tu brahmaṇaḥ divasam dvija

original: brahmaṇo divase brahman manavas tu caturdaśa /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ divase brahman manavaḥ tu caturdaśa

original: bhavanti parimāṇaṃ ca teṣāṃ kālakṛtaṃ śṛṇu // NsP_2.16 //
analyzed: bhavanti parimāṇam ca teṣām kāla kṛtam śṛṇu

original: saptarṣayas tu śakro 'tha manus tatsūnavo 'pi ye /
analyzed: saptarṣayaḥ tu manuḥ tad sūnavaḥ pi ye

original: ekakālaṃ hi sṛjyante saṃhriyante ca pūrvavat // NsP_2.17 //
analyzed: eka kālam hi sṛjyante saṃhriyante ca pūrvavat

original: caturyugānāṃ saṃkhyā ca sādhikā hy ekasaptatiḥ /
analyzed: caturyugānām saṃkhyā ca sādhikā hi ekasaptatiḥ

original: manvantaraṃ manoḥ kālaḥ śakrādīnām api dvija // NsP_2.18 //
analyzed: manvantaram manoḥ kālaḥ śakra ādīnām api dvija

original: aṣṭau śatasahasrāṇi divyayā saṃkhyayā smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭau śata sahasrāṇi divyayā saṃkhyayā smṛtaḥ

original: dvipañcāśat tathānyāni sahasrāṇy adhikāni tu // NsP_2.19 //
analyzed: dvipañcāśat tathā anyāni sahasrāṇi adhikāni tu

original: triṃśat koṭyas tu saṃpūrṇāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ saṃkhyayā dvija /
analyzed: triṃśat koṭyaḥ tu saṃpūrṇāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ saṃkhyayā dvija

original: saptaṣaṣṭis tathānyāni niyutāni mahāmune // NsP_2.20 //
analyzed: saptaṣaṣṭiḥ tathā anyāni niyutāni mahā mune

original: viṃśatiś ca sahasrāṇi kālo 'yam adhikaṃ vinā /
analyzed: viṃśatiḥ ca sahasrāṇi kālaḥ yam adhikam vinā

original: manvantarasya saṃkhyeyaṃ mānuṣair vatsarair dvija // NsP_2.21 //
analyzed: manvantarasya saṃkhyā iyam mānuṣaiḥ vatsaraiḥ dvija

original: caturdaśaguṇo hy eṣa kālo brāhmam ahaḥ smṛtam /
analyzed: caturdaśa guṇaḥ hi eṣa kālaḥ brāhmam ahar smṛtam

original: viśvasyādau sumanasā sṛṣṭvā devāṃs tathā pitṛn // NsP_2.22 //
analyzed: viśvasya ādau sumanasā sṛṣṭvā devān tathā pitṛn

original: gandharvān rākṣasān yakṣān piśācān guhyakāṃs tathā /
analyzed: gandharvān rākṣasān yakṣān piśācān guhyakān tathā

original: ṛṣīn vidyādharāṃś caiva manuṣyāṃś ca paśūṃs tathā // NsP_2.23 //
analyzed: ṛṣīn vidyādharān ca eva manuṣyān ca paśūn tathā

original: pakṣiṇaḥ sthāvarāṃś caiva pipīlikabhujaṃgamān /
analyzed: pakṣiṇaḥ sthāvarān ca eva pipīlika bhujaṃgamān

original: cāturvarṇyaṃ tathā sṛṣṭvā niyujyādhvarakarmaṇi // NsP_2.24 //
analyzed: cāturvarṇyam tathā sṛṣṭvā niyujya adhvara karmaṇi

original: punar dinānte trailokyam upasaṃhṛtya sa prabhuḥ /
analyzed: punar dina ante trailokyam upasaṃhṛtya sa prabhuḥ

original: śete cānantaśayane tāvantīṃ rātrim avyayaḥ // NsP_2.25 //
analyzed: śete ca ananta śayane tāvantīm rātrim avyayaḥ

original: tasyānte 'bhūn mahān kalpo brāhma ity abhiviśrutaḥ /
analyzed: tasya ante bhūt mahān kalpaḥ brāhmaḥ iti abhiviśrutaḥ

original: yasmin matsyāvatāro 'bhūn mathanaṃ ca mahodadheḥ // NsP_2.26 //
analyzed: yasmin matsya avatāraḥ bhūt mathanam ca mahā udadheḥ

original: tadvad varāhakalpaś ca tṛtīyaḥ parikalpitaḥ /
analyzed: tadvat varāhakalpaḥ ca tṛtīyaḥ parikalpitaḥ

original: yatra viṣṇuḥ svayaṃ prītyā vārāhaṃ vapur āśritaḥ /
analyzed: yatra viṣṇuḥ svayam prītyā vārāham vapuḥ āśritaḥ

original: uddhartuṃ vasudhāṃ devīṃ stūyamāno maharṣibhiḥ // NsP_2.27 //
analyzed: uddhartum vasudhām devīm stūyamānaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: sṛṣṭvā jagad vyomacarāprameyaḥ prajāś ca sṛṣṭvā sakalās tatheśaḥ /
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā jagat vyoma cara aprameyaḥ prajāḥ ca sṛṣṭvā sakalāḥ tathā īśaḥ

original: naimittikākhye pralaye samastaṃ saṃhṛtya śete harir ādidevaḥ // NsP_2.28 //
analyzed: naimittika ākhye pralaye samastam saṃhṛtya śete hariḥ ādidevaḥ

original: // iti śrinarasiṃhapurāṇe sargaracanāyāṃ dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 2 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe sarga racanāyām dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: tatra suptasya devasya nābhau padmam abhūn mahat /
analyzed: tatra suptasya devasya nābhau padmam abhūt mahat

original: tasmin padme mahābhāga vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ // NsP_3.1 //
analyzed: tasmin padme mahābhāga veda vedāṅga pāragaḥ

original: brahmotpannaḥ sa tenoktaḥ prajāṃ sṛja mahāmate /
analyzed: brahmā utpannaḥ sa tena uktaḥ prajām sṛja mahāmate

original: evam uktvā tirobhāvaṃ gato nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // NsP_3.2 //
analyzed: evam uktvā tirobhāvam gataḥ nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ

original: tathety uktvā sa taṃ devaṃ viṣṇuṃ brahmātha cintayan /
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā sa tam devam viṣṇum brahmā atha cintayan

original: āste kiṃcij jagadbījaṃ nādhyagacchata kiṃcana // NsP_3.3 //
analyzed: āste kiṃcid jagat bījam na adhyagacchata kiṃcana

original: tāvat tasya mahān roṣo brahmaṇo 'bhūn mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tāvat tasya mahān roṣaḥ brahmaṇaḥ bhūt mahātmanaḥ

original: tato bālaḥ samutpannas tasyāṅke roṣasaṃbhavaḥ // NsP_3.4 //
analyzed: tatas bālaḥ samutpannaḥ tasya aṅke roṣa saṃbhavaḥ

original: sa rudan vāritas tena brahmaṇā vyaktamūrtinā /
analyzed: sa rudan vāritaḥ tena brahmaṇā vyakta mūrtinā

original: nāma me dehi cetyuktas tasya rudrety asau dadau // NsP_3.5 //
analyzed: nāma me dehi ca iti uktaḥ tasya rudra iti asau dadau

original: tenāsau visṛjasveti prokto lokam imaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: tena asau visṛjasva iti proktaḥ lokam imam punar

original: aśaktas tatra salile mamajja tapasādṛtaḥ // NsP_3.6 //
analyzed: aśaktaḥ tatra salile mamajja tapasā ādṛtaḥ

original: tasmin salilamagne tu punar anyaṃ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: tasmin salila magne tu punar anyam prajāpatiḥ

original: brahmā sasarja bhūteśo dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhato 'param // NsP_3.7 //
analyzed: brahmā sasarja bhūta īśaḥ param

original: dakṣaṃ vāme tato 'ṅguṣṭhe tasya patnī vyajāyata /
analyzed: dakṣam vāme tatas ṅguṣṭhe tasya patnī vyajāyata

original: sa tasyāṃ janayām_asa manuṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhuḥ // NsP_3.8 //
analyzed: sa tasyām janayāmasa manum svāyaṃbhuvam prabhuḥ

original: tasmāt saṃbhāvitā sṛṣṭiḥ prajānāṃ brahmaṇā tadā /
analyzed: tasmāt saṃbhāvitā sṛṣṭiḥ prajānām brahmaṇā tadā

original: ity evaṃ kathitā sṛṣṭir mayā te munisattama /
analyzed: iti evam kathitā sṛṣṭiḥ mayā te muni sattama

original: sṛjato jagatīṃ tasya kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi // NsP_3.9 //
analyzed: sṛjataḥ jagatīm tasya kim bhūyas śrotum icchasi

original: bharadvāja uvāca:
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ uvāca

original: saṃkṣepeṇa tadākhyātaṃ tvayā me lomaharṣaṇa /
analyzed: saṃkṣepeṇa tat ākhyātam tvayā me lomaharṣaṇa

original: vistareṇa punar brūhi ādisargaṃ mahāmate // NsP_3.10 //
analyzed: vistareṇa punar brūhi ādi sargam mahāmate

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: tathaiva kalpāvasāne niśāsuptotthitaḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva kalpa avasāne niśā supta utthitaḥ prabhuḥ

original: sattvodriktas tadā brahmā śūnyaṃ lokam avaikṣata // NsP_3.11 //
analyzed: sattva udriktaḥ tadā brahmā śūnyam lokam avaikṣata

original: nārāyaṇaḥ paro 'cintyaḥ pūrveṣām api pūrvajaḥ /
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ cintyaḥ pūrveṣām api pūrvajaḥ

original: brahmasvarūpī bhagavān anādiḥ sarvasaṃbhavaḥ // NsP_3.12 //
imaṃ codāharanty atra ślokaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prati /
analyzed: imam ca udāharanti atra ślokam nārāyaṇam prati

original: brahmasvarūpiṇaṃ devaṃ jagataḥ prabhavātmakam // NsP_3.13 //
analyzed: brahma svarūpiṇam devam jagataḥ prabhava ātmakam

original: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ nārāḥ iti proktāḥ āpaḥ vai nara sūnavaḥ

original: ayanaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇa smṛtaḥ // NsP_3.14 //
analyzed: ayanam tasya tāḥ pūrvam tena nārāyaṇa smṛtaḥ

original: sṛṣṭiṃ cintayatas tasya kalpādiṣu yathā purā /
analyzed: sṛṣṭim cintayataḥ tasya kalpa ādiṣu yathā purā

original: abuddhipūrvakaṃ tasya prādurbhūtaṃ tamas tadā // NsP_3.15 //
analyzed: a buddhi pūrvakam tasya prādurbhūtam tamaḥ tadā

original: tamo moho mahāmohas tāmisro hy andhasaṃjñitaḥ /
analyzed: tamaḥ mohaḥ mahāmohaḥ tāmisraḥ hi andha saṃjñitaḥ

original: avidyā pañcaparvaiṣā prādurbhūtā mahātmanaḥ // NsP_3.16 //
analyzed: avidyā pañca parvā eṣā prādurbhūtā mahātmanaḥ

original: pañcadhādhiṣṭhitaḥ sargo dhyāyato 'pratibodhavān /
analyzed: pañcadhā adhiṣṭhitaḥ sargaḥ pratibodhavān

original: bahir anto 'prakāśaś ca saṃvṛtātmā nagātmakaḥ /
analyzed: bahis prakāśaḥ ca saṃvṛta ātmā naga ātmakaḥ

original: mukhyasargaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sargasiddhivicakṣaṇaiḥ // NsP_3.17 //
analyzed: mukhya sargaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sarga siddhi vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: yat punar dhyāyatas tasya brahmaṇaḥ samapadyata /
analyzed: yat punar dhyāyataḥ tasya brahmaṇaḥ samapadyata

original: tiryaksrotas tatas tasmāt tiryagyonis tataḥ smṛtaḥ // NsP_3.18 //
analyzed: tiryaksrotaḥ tatas tasmāt tiryagyoniḥ tatas smṛtaḥ

original: paśvādayas te vikhyātā utpathagrāhiṇaś ca ye /
analyzed: paśu ādayaḥ te vikhyātāḥ utpatha grāhiṇaḥ ca ye

original: tam apy asādhakaṃ matvā tiryagyoni caturmukhaḥ // NsP_3.19 //
analyzed: tam api asādhakam matvā tiryagyoni caturmukhaḥ

original: ūrdhvasrotās tṛtīyas tu sāttvikaḥ samavartata /
analyzed: ūrdhvasrotāḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu sāttvikaḥ samavartata

original: tadā tuṣṭo 'nyasargaṃ ca cintayām_asa vai prabhuḥ // NsP_3.20 //
analyzed: tadā tuṣṭaḥ nyasargam ca cintayāmasa vai prabhuḥ

original: tataś cintayatas tasya sargavṛddhiṃ prajāpateḥ /
analyzed: tatas cintayataḥ tasya sarga vṛddhim prajāpateḥ

original: arvāksrotāḥ samutpannā manuṣyāḥ sādhakā matāḥ // NsP_3.21 //
analyzed: arvāksrotāḥ samutpannāḥ manuṣyāḥ sādhakāḥ matāḥ

original: te ca prakāśabahulās tamoyuktā rajodhikāḥ /
analyzed: te ca prakāśa bahulāḥ tamaḥ yuktāḥ rajaḥ adhikāḥ

original: tasmāt te duḥkhabahulā bhūyo bhūyaś ca kāriṇaḥ // NsP_3.22 //
analyzed: tasmāt te duḥkha bahulāḥ bhūyas bhūyas ca kāriṇaḥ

original: ete te kathitāḥ sargā bahavo munisattama /
analyzed: ete te kathitāḥ sargāḥ bahavaḥ muni sattama

original: prathamo mahataḥ sargas tanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyakaḥ // NsP_3.23 //
analyzed: prathamaḥ mahataḥ sargaḥ tanmātrāṇām dvitīyakaḥ

original: vaikārikas tṛtīyas tu sarga aindriyakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu sargaḥ aindriyakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: mukhyasargaś caturthas tu mukhyā vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ // NsP_3.24 //
analyzed: mukhya sargaḥ caturthaḥ tu mukhyāḥ vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tiryaksrotāś ca yaḥ proktas tiryagyoniḥ sa ucyate /
analyzed: tiryaksrotāḥ ca yaḥ proktaḥ tiryagyoniḥ saḥ ucyate

original: tatoūrdhvasrotasāṃ ṣaṣṭho devasargas tu sa smṛtaḥ // NsP_3.25 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhaḥ deva sargaḥ tu sa smṛtaḥ

original: tato 'rvāksrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamo mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tatas rvāksrotasām sargaḥ saptamaḥ mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: aṣṭamo 'nugrahaḥ sargaḥ sāttviko ya udāhṛtaḥ // NsP_3.26 //
analyzed: aṣṭamaḥ nugrahaḥ sargaḥ sāttvikaḥ yaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: navamo rudrasargas tu nava sargāḥ prajāpateḥ /
analyzed: navamaḥ rudra sargaḥ tu nava sargāḥ prajāpateḥ

original: pañcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtās te trayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: pañca ete vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāḥ te trayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: prākṛto vaikṛtaś caiva kaumāro navamaḥ smṛtaḥ // NsP_3.27 //
analyzed: prākṛtaḥ vaikṛtaḥ ca eva kaumāraḥ navamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: prākṛtā vaikṛtāś caiva jagato mūlahetavaḥ /
analyzed: prākṛtāḥ vaikṛtāḥ ca eva jagataḥ mūla hetavaḥ

original: sṛjato brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭim utpannā ye mayeritā // NsP_3.28 //
analyzed: sṛjataḥ brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭim utpannāḥ ye mayā īritā

original: taṃ taṃ vikāraṃ ca paraṃ pareśo māyām adhiṣṭhāya sṛjaty anantaḥ /
analyzed: tam tam vikāram ca param pareśaḥ māyām adhiṣṭhāya sṛjati anantaḥ

original: avyaktarūpī paramātmasaṃjñaḥ saṃpreryamāṇo nikhilātmavedyaḥ // NsP_3.29 //
analyzed: avyakta rūpī paramātma saṃjñaḥ saṃpreryamāṇaḥ nikhila ātma vedyaḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe sṛṣṭiracanāprakāro nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 3 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe sṛṣṭiracanāprakāraḥ nāma tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: bharadvāja uvāca:
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ uvāca

original: navadhā sṛṣṭir utpannā brahmaṇo 'vyaktajanmanaḥ /
analyzed: navadhā sṛṣṭiḥ utpannā brahmaṇaḥ vyakta janmanaḥ

original: kathaṃ sā vavṛdhe sūta etat kathaya me 'dhunā // NsP_4.1 //
analyzed: katham sā vavṛdhe sūta etat kathaya me dhunā

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: prathamaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā marīcyādaya eva ca /
analyzed: prathamam brahmaṇā sṛṣṭāḥ marīci ādayaḥ eva ca

original: marīcir atriś ca tathā aṅgirāḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ // NsP_4.2 //
analyzed: marīciḥ atriḥ ca tathā aṅgirāḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ

original: pulastyaś ca mahātejāḥ pracetā bhṛgur eva ca /
analyzed: pulastyaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ pracetāḥ bhṛguḥ eva ca

original: nārado daśamaś caiva vasiṣṭhaś ca mahāmatiḥ // NsP_4.3 //
analyzed: nāradaḥ daśamaḥ ca eva vasiṣṭhaḥ ca mahāmatiḥ

original: sanakādayo nivṛttākhye te ca dharme niyojitāḥ /
analyzed: sanaka ādayaḥ nivṛtta ākhye te ca dharme niyojitāḥ

original: pravṛttākhye marīcyādyā muktvaikaṃ nāradaṃ munim // NsP_4.4 //
analyzed: pravṛtta ākhye marīci ādyāḥ muktvā ekam nāradam munim

original: yo 'sau prajāpatis tv anyo dakṣanāmāṅgasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: sau prajāpatiḥ tu anyaḥ dakṣa nāma aṅga saṃbhavaḥ

original: tasya dauhitravaṃśena jagad etac carācaram // NsP_4.5 //
analyzed: tasya dauhitra vaṃśena jagat etat carācaram

original: devāś ca dānavāś caiva gandharvoragapakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ ca dānavāḥ ca eva gandharva uraga pakṣiṇaḥ

original: sarve dakṣasya kanyāsu jātāḥ paramadhārmikāḥ // NsP_4.6 //
analyzed: sarve dakṣasya kanyāsu jātāḥ parama dhārmikāḥ

original: caturvidhāni bhūtāni hy acarāni carāṇi ca /
analyzed: caturvidhāni bhūtāni hi acarāni carāṇi ca

original: vṛddhiṃ gatāni tāny evam anusargodbhavāni tu // NsP_4.7 //
analyzed: vṛddhim gatāni tāni evam anusarga udbhavāni tu

original: anusargasya kartāro marīcyādyā maharṣayaḥ /
analyzed: anusargasya kartāraḥ marīci ādyāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: vasiṣṭhāntā mahābhāga brahmaṇo mānasodbhavāḥ // NsP_4.8 //
analyzed: vasiṣṭha antāḥ mahābhāga brahmaṇaḥ mānasa udbhavāḥ

original: sarge tu bhutāni dhiyaś ca khāni khyātāni sarvaṃ sṛjate mahātmā /
analyzed: sarge tu bhutāni dhiyaḥ ca khāni khyātāni sarvam sṛjate mahātmā

original: sa eva paścāc caturāsyarūpī munisvarūpī ca sṛjaty anantaḥ // NsP_4.9 //
analyzed: saḥ eva paścāt catur āsya rūpī muni svarūpī ca sṛjati anantaḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 4 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: bharadvāja uvāca:
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ uvāca

original: rudrasargaṃ tu me brūhi vistareṇa mahāmate /
analyzed: rudra sargam tu me brūhi vistareṇa mahāmate

original: punaḥ sarve marīcyādyāḥ sasṛjus te kathaṃ punaḥ // NsP_5.1 //
analyzed: punar sarve marīci ādyāḥ sasṛjuḥ te katham punar

original: mitrāvaruṇaputratvaṃ vasiṣṭhasya kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: mitrāvaruṇa putra tvam vasiṣṭhasya katham bhavet

original: brahmaṇo manasaḥ pūrvam utpannasya mahāmate // NsP_5.2 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ manasaḥ pūrvam utpannasya mahāmate

original: rudrasṛṣṭiṃ pravakṣyāmi tatsargāś caiva sattama /
analyzed: rudra sṛṣṭim pravakṣyāmi tad sargāḥ ca eva sattama

original: pratisargaṃ munīnāṃ tu vistarād vadataḥ śṛṇu // NsP_5.3 //
analyzed: pratisargam munīnām tu vistarāt vadataḥ śṛṇu

original: kalpādāv ātmanas tulyaṃ sutaṃ pradhyāyatas tataḥ /
analyzed: kalpa ādau ātmanaḥ tulyam sutam pradhyāyataḥ tatas

original: prādurāsīt prabhor aṅke kumāro nīlalohitaḥ // NsP_5.4 //
analyzed: prādurāsīt prabhoḥ aṅke kumāraḥ nīlalohitaḥ

original: ardhanārīnaravapuḥ pracaṇḍo 'tiśarīravān /
analyzed: ardha nārī nara vapuḥ pracaṇḍaḥ ti śarīravān

original: tejasā bhāsayan sarvā diśaś ca pradiśaś ca saḥ // NsP_5.5 //
analyzed: tejasā bhāsayan sarvāḥ diśaḥ ca pradiśaḥ ca saḥ

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tejasā dīptaṃ pratyuvāca prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā tejasā dīptam pratyuvāca prajāpatiḥ

original: vibhajātmānam adya tvaṃ mama vākyān mahāmate // NsP_5.6 //
analyzed: vibhaja ātmānam adya tvam mama vākyāt mahāmate

original: ityukto brahmaṇā vipra rudras tena pratāpavān /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ brahmaṇā vipra rudraḥ tena pratāpavān

original: strībhāvaṃ puruṣatvaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthag athākarot // NsP_5.7 //
analyzed: strī bhāvam puruṣa tvam ca pṛthak pṛthak athā akarot

original: bibheda puruṣatvaṃ ca daśadhā caikadhā ca saḥ /
analyzed: bibheda puruṣa tvam ca daśadhā ca ekadhā ca saḥ

original: teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me dvijasattama // NsP_5.8 //
analyzed: teṣām nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me dvijasattama

original: ajaikapād ahirbudhnyaḥ kapālī rudra eva ca /
analyzed: ajaikapād ahirbudhnyaḥ kapālī rudraḥ eva ca

original: haraś ca bahurūpaś ca tryambakaś cāparājitaḥ // NsP_5.9 //
analyzed: haraḥ ca bahurūpaḥ ca tryambakaḥ ca aparājitaḥ

original: vṛṣākapiś ca śaṃbhuś ca kapardī raivatas tathā /
analyzed: vṛṣākapiḥ ca śaṃbhuḥ ca kapardī raivataḥ tathā

original: ekādaśaite kathitā rudrās tribhuvaneśvarāḥ // NsP_5.10 //
analyzed: ekādaśā ete kathitāḥ rudrāḥ tribhuvana īśvarāḥ

original: strītvaṃ caiva tathā rudro bibheda daśadhaikadhā /
analyzed: strī tvam ca eva tathā rudraḥ bibheda daśadhā ekadhā

original: umaiva bahurūpeṇa patnī saiva vyavasthitā // NsP_5.11 //
analyzed: umā eva bahu rūpeṇa patnī sā eva vyavasthitā

original: tapaḥ kṛtvā jale ghoram uttīrṇaḥ sa yadā purā /
analyzed: tapaḥ kṛtvā jale ghoram uttīrṇaḥ sa yadā purā

original: tadā sa sṛṣṭavān devo rudras tatra pratāpavān // NsP_5.12 //
analyzed: tadā sa sṛṣṭavān devaḥ rudraḥ tatra pratāpavān

original: tapobalena viprendra bhūtāni vividhāni ca /
analyzed: tapaḥ balena vipra indra bhūtāni vividhāni ca

original: piśācān rākṣasāṃś caiva siṃhoṣṭramakarānanān // NsP_5.13 //
analyzed: piśācān rākṣasān ca eva siṃha uṣṭra makara ānanān

original: vetālapramukhān bhūtān anyāṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ /
analyzed: vetāla pramukhān bhūtān anyān ca eva sahasraśas

original: vināyakānām ugrāṇāṃ triṃśatkoṭy ardham eva ca // NsP_5.14 //
analyzed: vināyakānām ugrāṇām triṃśat koṭī ardham eva ca

original: anyakāryaṃ samuddiśya sṛṣṭavān skandam eva ca /
analyzed: anya kāryam samuddiśya sṛṣṭavān skandam eva ca

original: evaṃprakāro rudro 'sau mayā te kīrtitaḥ prabhuḥ // NsP_5.15 //
analyzed: evaṃprakāraḥ sau mayā te kīrtitaḥ prabhuḥ

original: anusargaṃ marīcyādeḥ kathayāmi niboddha me /
analyzed: anusargam marīci ādeḥ kathayāmi niboddha me

original: devādisthāvarāntāś ca prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā // NsP_5.16 //
analyzed: deva ādi sthāvara antāḥ ca prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā

original: yadāsya ca prajāḥ sarvā na vyavardhanta dhīmataḥ /
analyzed: yadā asya ca prajāḥ sarvāḥ na vyavardhanta dhīmataḥ

original: tadā mānasaputrān sa sadṛśān ātmano 'sṛjat // NsP_5.17 //
analyzed: tadā mānasa putrān sa sadṛśān ātmanaḥ sṛjat

original: marīcim atryaṅgirasaṃ pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum /
analyzed: marīcim atri aṅgirasam pulastyam pulaham kratum

original: pracetasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca bhṛguṃ caiva mahāmatim // NsP_5.18 //
analyzed: pracetasam vasiṣṭham ca bhṛgum ca eva mahāmatim

original: nava brahmāṇa ity ete purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: nava brahmāṇaḥ iti ete purāṇe niścayam gatāḥ

original: agniś ca pitaraś caiva brahmaputrau tu mānasau // NsP_5.19 //
analyzed: agniḥ ca pitaraḥ ca eva brahma putrau tu mānasau

original: sṛṣṭikāle mahābhāgau brahman svāyaṃbhuvodgatau /
analyzed: sṛṣṭi kāle mahābhāgau brahman svāyaṃbhuvā udgatau

original: śatarūpāṃ ca sṛṣṭvā tu kanyāṃ sa manave dadau // NsP_5.20 //
analyzed: śatarūpām ca sṛṣṭvā tu kanyām sa manave dadau

original: tasmāc ca puruṣād devī śatarūpā vyajāyata /
analyzed: tasmāt ca puruṣāt devī śatarūpā vyajāyata

original: priyavratottānapādau prasūtiṃ caiva kanyakām // NsP_5.21 //
analyzed: priyavrata uttānapādau prasūtim ca eva kanyakām

original: dadau prasūtiṃ dakṣāya manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvaḥ sutām /
analyzed: dadau prasūtim dakṣāya manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvaḥ sutām

original: prasūtyāṃ ca tadā dakṣaś caturviṃśatikaṃ tathā // NsP_5.22 //
analyzed: prasūtyām ca tadā dakṣaḥ caturviṃśatikam tathā

original: sasarja kanyakās tāsāṃ śṛṇu nāmāni me 'dhunā /
analyzed: sasarja kanyakāḥ tāsām śṛṇu nāmāni me dhunā

original: śraddhā lakṣmīr dhṛtis tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭir medhā tathā kriyā // NsP_5.23 //
analyzed: śraddhā lakṣmīḥ dhṛtiḥ tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ medhā tathā kriyā

original: buddhir lajjā vapuḥ śāntiḥ siddhiḥ kīrtis trayodaśī /
analyzed: buddhiḥ lajjā vapuḥ śāntiḥ siddhiḥ kīrtiḥ trayodaśī

original: apatyārthaṃ prajagrāha dharmo dākṣāyaṇīḥ prabhuḥ // NsP_5.24 //
analyzed: apatya artham prajagrāha dharmaḥ dākṣāyaṇīḥ prabhuḥ

original: śraddhādīnāṃ tu patnīnāṃ jātāḥ kāmādayaḥ sutāḥ /
analyzed: śraddhā ādīnām tu patnīnām jātāḥ kāma ādayaḥ sutāḥ

original: dharmasya putrapautrādyair dharmavaṃśo vivardhitaḥ // NsP_5.25 //
analyzed: dharmasya putra pautra ādyaiḥ dharma vaṃśaḥ vivardhitaḥ

original: tābhyaḥ śiṣṭā yavīyasyas tāsāṃ nāmāni kīrtaye /
analyzed: tābhyaḥ śiṣṭāḥ yavīyasyaḥ tāsām nāmāni kīrtaye

original: saṃbhūtiś cānasūyā ca smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamāḥ tathā // NsP_5.26 //
analyzed: saṃbhūtiḥ ca anasūyā ca smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamāḥ tathā

original: saṃnatiś cātha satyā ca ūrjā khyātir dvijottama /
analyzed: saṃnatiḥ ca atha satyā ca ūrjā khyātiḥ dvijottama

original: tadvat putrau mahābhāgau mātariśvātha satyavān // NsP_5.27 //
analyzed: tadvat putrau mahābhāgau mātariśvā atha satyavān

original: svāhātha daśamī jñeyā svadhā caikādaśī smṛtā /
analyzed: svāhā atha daśamī jñeyā svadhā ca ekādaśī smṛtā

original: etāś ca dattā dakṣeṇa ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām // NsP_5.28 //
analyzed: etāḥ ca dattāḥ dakṣeṇa ṛṣīṇām bhāvitātmanām

original: marīcyādīnāṃ tu ye putrās tān ahaṃ kathayāmi te /
analyzed: marīci ādīnām tu ye putrāḥ tān aham kathayāmi te

original: patnī marīceḥ saṃbhūtir jajñe sā kaśyapaṃ munim // NsP_5.29 //
analyzed: patnī marīceḥ saṃbhūtiḥ jajñe sā kaśyapam munim

original: smṛtiś cāṅgirasaḥ patnī prasūtā kanyakās tathā /
analyzed: smṛtiḥ ca aṅgirasaḥ patnī prasūtā kanyakāḥ tathā

original: sinīvālī kuhūs caiva rākā cānumatis tathā // NsP_5.30 //
analyzed: sinīvālī kuhūḥ ca eva rākā ca anumatiḥ tathā

original: anasūyā tathā cātrer jajñe putrān akalmaṣān /
analyzed: anasūyā tathā ca atreḥ jajñe putrān akalmaṣān

original: somaṃ durvāsasaṃ caiva dattātreyaṃ ca yoginam // NsP_5.31 //
analyzed: somam durvāsasam ca eva dattātreyam ca yoginam

original: yo 'sāv agner abhīmānī brahmaṇas tanayo 'grajaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sau agneḥ abhīmānī brahmaṇaḥ tanayaḥ grajaḥ

original: tasmāt svāhā sutāṃl lebhe trīn udāraujaso dvija // NsP_5.32 //
analyzed: tasmāt svāhā sutān lebhe trīn udāra ojasaḥ dvija

original: pāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciṃ cāpi jalāśinam /
analyzed: pāvakam pavamānam ca śucim ca api jala āśinam

original: teṣāṃ tu saṃtatāv anye catvāriṃśac ca pañca ca // NsP_5.33 //
analyzed: teṣām tu saṃtatau anye catvāriṃśat ca pañca ca

original: kathayante vahnayaś caite pitā putratrayaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: kathayante vahnayaḥ ca ete pitā putra trayam ca yat

original: evam ekonapañcāśad vahnayaḥ parikīrtitāḥ // NsP_5.34 //
analyzed: evam ekonapañcāśat vahnayaḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: pitaro brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā vyākhyātā ye mayā tava /
analyzed: pitaraḥ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭāḥ vyākhyātāḥ ye mayā tava

original: tebhyaḥ svadhā sute jajñe menāṃ vai dhāriṇīṃ tathā // NsP_5.35 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ svadhā sute jajñe menām vai dhāriṇīm tathā

original: prajāḥ sṛjeti vyādiṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ dakṣaḥ svayaṃbhuvā /
analyzed: prajāḥ sṛja iti vyādiṣṭaḥ pūrvam dakṣaḥ svayaṃbhuvā

original: yathā sasarja bhūtāni tathā me śṛṇu sattama // NsP_5.36 //
analyzed: yathā sasarja bhūtāni tathā me śṛṇu sattama

original: manasaiva hi bhūtāni pūrvaṃ dakṣo 'sṛjan muniḥ /
analyzed: manasā eva hi bhūtāni pūrvam dakṣaḥ sṛjat muniḥ

original: devān ṛṣīṃś ca gandharvān asurān pannagāṃs tathā // NsP_5.37 //
analyzed: devān ṛṣīn ca gandharvān asurān pannagān tathā

original: yadāsya manasā jātā nābhyavardhanta te dvija /
analyzed: yadā asya manasā jātāḥ na abhyavardhanta te dvija

original: tadā saṃcintya sa muniḥ sṛṣṭihetoḥ prajāpatiḥ // NsP_5.38 //
analyzed: tadā saṃcintya sa muniḥ sṛṣṭi hetoḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: maithunenaiva dharmeṇa sisṛkṣur vividhāḥ prajāḥ /
analyzed: maithunena eva dharmeṇa sisṛkṣuḥ vividhāḥ prajāḥ

original: asiknīm udvahan kanyāṃ vīraṇasya prajāpateḥ // NsP_5.39 //
analyzed: asiknīm udvahan kanyām vīraṇasya prajāpateḥ

original: ṣaṣṭiṃ dakṣo 'sṛjat kanyā vīraṇyām iti naḥ śrutam /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim dakṣaḥ sṛjat kanyāḥ vīraṇyām iti naḥ śrutam

original: dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa // NsP_5.40 //
analyzed: dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa

original: saptaviṃśati somāya catasro 'riṣṭanemine /
analyzed: saptaviṃśati somāya catasraḥ riṣṭanemine

original: dve caiva bahuputrāya dve caivāṅgirase tathā // NsP_5.41 //
analyzed: dve ca eva bahuputrāya dve ca eva aṅgirase tathā

original: dve kṛśāśvāya viduṣe tadapatyāni me śṛṇu /
analyzed: dve kṛśāśvāya viduṣe tad apatyāni me śṛṇu

original: viśvedevāṃs tu viśvā yā sādhyā sādhyān asūyata // NsP_5.42 //
analyzed: viśvedevān tu viśvāḥ yā sādhyā sādhyān asūyata

original: marutvatyāṃ marutvanto vasos tu vasavaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: marutvatyām marutvantaḥ vasoḥ tu vasavaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: bhānos tu bhānavo devā muhūrtāyāṃ muhūrtajāḥ // NsP_5.43 //
analyzed: bhānoḥ tu bhānavaḥ devāḥ muhūrtāyām muhūrta jāḥ

original: lambāyāś caiva ghoṣākhyo nāgavīthiś ca jāmijā /
analyzed: lambāyāḥ ca eva ghoṣa ākhyaḥ nāgavīthiḥ ca jāmi jā

original: pṛthivīviṣayaṃ sarvam arundhatyām ajāyata // NsP_5.44 //
analyzed: pṛthivī viṣayam sarvam arundhatyām ajāyata

original: saṃkalpāyāś ca saṃkalpaḥ putro jajñe mahāmate /
analyzed: saṃkalpāyāḥ ca saṃkalpaḥ putraḥ jajñe mahāmate

original: ye tv anekavasuprāṇā devā jyotiḥpurogamāḥ // NsP_5.45 //
analyzed: ye tu aneka vasu prāṇāḥ devāḥ jyotiḥ purogamāḥ

original: vasavo 'ṣṭau samākhyātās teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu /
analyzed: vasavaḥ ṣṭau samākhyātāḥ teṣām nāmāni me śṛṇu

original: āpo dhruvaś ca somaś ca dharmaś caivānilo 'nalaḥ // NsP_5.46 //
analyzed: āpaḥ dhruvaḥ ca somaḥ ca dharmaḥ ca eva anilaḥ nalaḥ

original: pratyūṣaś ca prabhāsaś ca vasavo 'ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: pratyūṣaḥ ca prabhāsaḥ ca vasavaḥ ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ

original: teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca śataśo 'tha sahasraśā // NsP_5.47 //
analyzed: teṣām putrāḥ ca pautrāḥ ca sahasraśās

original: sādhyāś ca bahavaḥ proktās tatputrāś ca sahasraśaḥ /
analyzed: sādhyāḥ ca bahavaḥ proktāḥ tad putrāḥ ca sahasraśas

original: kaśyapasya tu bhāryāṃ yās tāsāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu /
analyzed: kaśyapasya tu bhāryām yāḥ tāsām nāmāni me śṛṇu

original: aditir ditir danuś caiva ariṣṭā surasā khasā // NsP_5.48 //
analyzed: aditiḥ ditiḥ danuḥ ca eva ariṣṭā surasā khasā

original: surabhir vinatā caiva tāmrā krodhavaśā irā /
analyzed: surabhiḥ vinatā ca eva tāmrā krodhavaśā irā

original: kadrur muniś ca dharmajña tadapatyāni me śṛṇu // NsP_5.49 //
analyzed: kadruḥ muniḥ ca dharma jña tad apatyāni me śṛṇu

original: adityāṃ kaśyapāj jātāḥ putrā dvādaśa śobhanāḥ /
analyzed: adityām kaśyapāt jātāḥ putrāḥ dvādaśa śobhanāḥ

original: tān ahaṃ nāmato vakṣye śṛṇuṣva gadato mama // NsP_5.50 //
analyzed: tān aham nāmataḥ vakṣye śṛṇuṣva gadataḥ mama

original: bhargo 'ṃśuś cāryamā caiva mitro 'tha varuṇas tathā /
analyzed: bhargaḥ oṃśuḥ ca aryamā ca eva mitraḥ varuṇaḥ tathā

original: savitā caiva dhātā ca vivasvāṃś ca mahāmate // NsP_5.51 //
analyzed: savitā ca eva dhātā ca vivasvān ca mahāmate

original: tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathā cendro dvādaśo viṣṇur ucyate /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathā ca indraḥ dvādaśaḥ viṣṇuḥ ucyate

original: dityāḥ putradvayaṃ jajñe kaśyapād iti naḥ śrutaṃ // NsP_5.52 //
analyzed: dityāḥ putra dvayam jajñe kaśyapāt iti naḥ śrutam

original: hiraṇyākṣo mahākāyo vārāheṇa tu yo hataḥ /
analyzed: hiraṇyākṣaḥ mahā kāyaḥ vārāheṇa tu yaḥ hataḥ

original: hiraṇyakaśipuś caiva narasiṃhena yo hataḥ // NsP_5.53 //
analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ca eva narasiṃhena yaḥ hataḥ

original: anye ca bahavo daityā danuputrāś ca dānavāḥ /
analyzed: anye ca bahavaḥ daityāḥ danu putrāḥ ca dānavāḥ

original: ariṣṭāyāṃ tu gandharvā jajñire kaśyapāt tathā // NsP_5.54 //
analyzed: ariṣṭāyām tu gandharvāḥ jajñire kaśyapāt tathā

original: surasāyām athotpannā vidyādharagaṇā bahu /
analyzed: surasāyām atha utpannāḥ vidyādhara gaṇāḥ bahu

original: gā vai sa janayām_asa surabhyāṃ kaśyapo muniḥ // NsP_5.55 //
analyzed: gāḥ vai sa janayāmasa surabhyām kaśyapaḥ muniḥ

original: vinatāyāṃ tu dvau putrau prakhyātau garuḍāruṇau /
analyzed: vinatāyām tu dvau putrau prakhyātau garuḍa aruṇau

original: garuḍo devadevasya viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ // NsP_5.56 //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ devadevasya viṣṇoḥ amita tejasaḥ

original: vāhanatvam iyāt prītyā aruṇaḥ sūryasārathiḥ /
analyzed: vāhana tvam iyāt prītyā aruṇaḥ sūrya sārathiḥ

original: tāmrāyāṃ kaśyapāj jātāḥ ṣaṭ putrās tān nibodha me // NsP_5.57 //
analyzed: tāmrāyām kaśyapāt jātāḥ ṣaṭ putrāḥ tān nibodha me

original: aśvā uṣṭrā gardabhāś ca hastino gavayā mṛgāḥ /
analyzed: aśvāḥ uṣṭrāḥ gardabhāḥ ca hastinaḥ gavayāḥ mṛgāḥ

original: krodhāyāṃ jajñire tadvad ye bhūmyāṃ duṣṭajātayaḥ // NsP_5.58 //
analyzed: krodhāyām jajñire tadvat ye bhūmyām duṣṭa jātayaḥ

original: irā vṛkṣalatāvallī- śaṇajātīś ca jajñire /
analyzed: irā vṛkṣa latā vallī śaṇa jātīḥ ca jajñire

original: khasā tu yakṣarakṣāṃsi munir apsarasas tathā // NsP_5.59 //
analyzed: khasā tu yakṣa rakṣāṃsi muniḥ apsarasaḥ tathā

original: kadruputrā mahānāgā daṃdaśūkā viṣolbaṇāḥ /
analyzed: kadru putrāḥ mahā nāgāḥ daṃdaśūkāḥ viṣa ulbaṇāḥ

original: saptaviṃśati yāḥ proktāḥ somapatnyo 'tha savratāḥ // NsP_5.60 //
analyzed: saptaviṃśati yāḥ proktāḥ soma patnyaḥ savratāḥ

original: tāsāṃ putrā mahāsattvā budhādyās tv abhavan dvija /
analyzed: tāsām putrāḥ mahā sattvāḥ budha ādyāḥ tu abhavan dvija

original: ariṣṭanemipatnīnām apatyānīha ṣoḍaśa // NsP_5.61 //
analyzed: ariṣṭanemi patnīnām apatyāni iha ṣoḍaśa

original: bahuputrasya viduṣaś catasro vidyutaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: bahuputrasya viduṣaḥ catasraḥ vidyutaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: pratyaṅgirassutāḥ śreṣṭhā ṛṣayaś carṣisatkṛtāḥ // NsP_5.62 //
analyzed: pratyaṅgiraḥ sutāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca ṛṣi satkṛtāḥ

original: kṛśāśvasya tu devarṣer devāś ca ṛṣayaḥ sutāḥ /
analyzed: kṛśāśvasya tu devarṣeḥ devāḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ sutāḥ

original: ete yugasahasrānte jāyante punar eva hi // NsP_5.63 //
analyzed: ete yuga sahasra ante jāyante punar eva hi

original: ete kaśyapadāyādāḥ kīrtitāḥ sthāṇujaṅgamāḥ /
analyzed: ete kaśyapa dāyādāḥ kīrtitāḥ sthāṇu jaṅgamāḥ

original: sthitau sthitasya devasya narasiṃhasya dharmataḥ // NsP_5.64 //
analyzed: sthitau sthitasya devasya narasiṃhasya dharmataḥ

original: etā vibhūtayo vipra mayā te parikīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ vibhūtayaḥ vipra mayā te parikīrtitāḥ

original: kathitā dakṣakanyānāṃ mayā te 'patyasaṃtatiḥ // NsP_5.65 //
analyzed: kathitā dakṣa kanyānām mayā te patya saṃtatiḥ

original: śraddhāvān saṃsmared etāṃ sa susaṃtānavān bhavet // NsP_5.66 //
analyzed: śraddhāvān saṃsmaret etām sa su saṃtānavān bhavet

original: sargānusargau kathitau mayā te samāsataḥ sṛṣṭivivṛddhihetoḥ /
analyzed: sarga anusargau kathitau mayā te samāsatas sṛṣṭi vivṛddhi hetoḥ

original: paṭhanti ye viṣṇuparāḥ sadā narā idaṃ dvijās te vimalā bhavanti // NsP_5.67 //
analyzed: paṭhanti ye viṣṇu parāḥ sadā narāḥ idam dvijāḥ te vimalāḥ bhavanti

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe sṛṣṭikathane pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 5 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe sṛṣṭi kathane pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: sṛṣṭis te kathitā viṣṇor mayāsya jagato dvija /
analyzed: sṛṣṭiḥ te kathitā viṣṇoḥ mayā asya jagataḥ dvija

original: devadānavayakṣādyā yathotpannā mahātmanaḥ // NsP_6.1 //
analyzed: deva dānava yakṣa ādyāḥ yathā utpannāḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: yam uddiśya tvayā pṛṣṭaḥ purāham ṛṣisaṃnidhau /
analyzed: yam uddiśya tvayā pṛṣṭaḥ purā aham ṛṣi saṃnidhau

original: mitrāvaruṇaputratvaṃ vasiṣṭhasya kathaṃ tv iti // NsP_6.2 //
analyzed: mitrāvaruṇa putra tvam vasiṣṭhasya katham tu iti

original: tad idaṃ kathayiṣyāmi puṇyākhyānaṃ purātanam /
analyzed: tat idam kathayiṣyāmi puṇya ākhyānam purātanam

original: śṛṇuṣvaikāgramanasā bharadvāja viśeṣataḥ // NsP_6.3 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva ekāgra manasā bharadvāja viśeṣataḥ

original: sarvadharmārthatattvajñaḥ sarvavedavidāṃ varaḥ /
pāragaḥ sarvavidyānāṃ dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ // NsP_6.4 //
analyzed: pāragaḥ sarva vidyānām dakṣaḥ nāma prajāpatiḥ

original: tena dattāḥ śubhāḥ kanyāḥ sarvāḥ kamalalocanāḥ /
analyzed: tena dattāḥ śubhāḥ kanyāḥ sarvāḥ kamala locanāḥ

original: sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpūrṇāḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa // NsP_6.5 //
analyzed: sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpūrṇāḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa

original: tāsāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi nibodhata mamādhunā /
analyzed: tāsām nāmāni vakṣyāmi nibodhata mama adhunā

original: aditir ditir danuḥ kālā muhūrtā siṃhikā muniḥ // NsP_6.6 //
analyzed: aditiḥ ditiḥ danuḥ kālā muhūrtā siṃhikā muniḥ

original: irā krodhā ca surabhir vinatā surasā khasā /
analyzed: irā krodhā ca surabhiḥ vinatā surasā khasā

original: kadrū saramā caiva yā tu devaśunī smṛtā // NsP_6.7 //
analyzed: kadrū saramā ca eva yā tu devaśunī smṛtā

original: dakṣasyaitā duhitaras tāḥ prādāt kaśyapāya saḥ /
analyzed: dakṣasya etāḥ duhitaraḥ tāḥ prādāt kaśyapāya saḥ

original: tāsāṃ jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhā ca aditir nāmato dvija // NsP_6.8 //
analyzed: tāsām jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhā ca aditiḥ nāmataḥ dvija

original: aditiḥ suṣuve putrān dvādaśāgnisamaprabhān /
analyzed: aditiḥ suṣuve putrān dvādaśa agni sama prabhān

original: teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva gadato mama // NsP_6.9 //
analyzed: teṣām nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva gadataḥ mama

original: yair idaṃ vāsaraṃ naktaṃ vartate kramaśaḥ sadā /
analyzed: yaiḥ idam vāsaram naktam vartate kramaśas sadā

original: bhago 'ṃśus tv aryamā caiva mitro 'tha varuṇas tathā // NsP_6.10 //
analyzed: bhagaḥ u ṃśuḥ tu aryamā ca eva mitraḥ varuṇaḥ tathā

original: savitā caiva dhātā ca vivasvāṃś ca mahāmate /
analyzed: savitā ca eva dhātā ca vivasvān ca mahāmate

original: tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaivendro viṣṇur dvādaśamaḥ smṛtaḥ // NsP_6.11 //
analyzed: tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathā evā indraḥ viṣṇuḥ dvādaśamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ete ca dvādaśādityās tapante varṣayanti ca /
analyzed: ete ca dvādaśa ādityāḥ tapante varṣayanti ca

original: tasyāś ca madhyamaḥ putro varuṇo nāma nāmataḥ // NsP_6.12 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca madhyamaḥ putraḥ varuṇaḥ nāma nāmataḥ

original: lokapāla iti khyāto vāruṇyāṃ diśi śabdyate /
analyzed: lokapālaḥ iti khyātaḥ vāruṇyām diśi śabdyate

original: paścimasya samudrasya pratīcyāṃ diśi rājate // NsP_6.13 //
analyzed: paścimasya samudrasya pratīcyām diśi rājate

original: jātarūpamayaḥ śrīmān āste nāma śiloccayaḥ /
analyzed: jātarūpa mayaḥ śrīmān āste nāma śiloccayaḥ

original: sarvaratnamayaiḥ śṛṅgair dhātuprasravaṇānvitaiḥ // NsP_6.14 //
analyzed: sarva ratna mayaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ dhātu prasravaṇa anvitaiḥ

original: saṃyukto bhāti śaileśo nānāratnamayaḥ śubhaḥ /
analyzed: saṃyuktaḥ bhāti śaila īśaḥ nānā ratna mayaḥ śubhaḥ

original: mahādarīguhābhiś ca siṃhaśārdūlanāditaḥ // NsP_6.15 //
analyzed: mahā darī guhābhiḥ ca siṃha śārdūla nāditaḥ

original: nānāviviktabhūmīṣu siddhagandharvasevitaḥ /
analyzed: nānā vivikta bhūmīṣu siddha gandharva sevitaḥ

original: yasmin gate dinakare tamasāpūryate jagat // NsP_6.16 //
analyzed: yasmin gate dinakare tamasā āpūryate jagat

original: tasya śṛṅge mahādivyā jāmbūnadamayī śubhā /
analyzed: tasya śṛṅge mahā divyā jāmbūnada mayī śubhā

original: ramyā maṇimayaiḥ stambhair vihitā viśvakarmaṇā // NsP_6.17 //
analyzed: ramyāḥ maṇi mayaiḥ stambhaiḥ vihitāḥ viśvakarmaṇā

original: purī viśvāvatī nāma samṛddhā bhogasādhanaiḥ /
analyzed: purī viśvāvatī nāma samṛddhā bhoga sādhanaiḥ

original: tasyāṃ varuṇa ādityo dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā // NsP_6.18 //
analyzed: tasyām varuṇaḥ ādityaḥ dīpyamānaḥ sva tejasā

original: pāti sarvān imāṃl lokān niyukto brahmaṇā svayam /
analyzed: pāti sarvān imān lokān niyuktaḥ brahmaṇā svayam

original: upāsyamāno gandharvais tathaivāpsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // NsP_6.19 //
analyzed: upāsyamānaḥ gandharvaiḥ tathā eva apsarasām gaṇaiḥ

original: divyagandhānuliptāṅgo divyābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ /
analyzed: divya gandha anulipta aṅgaḥ divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ

original: kadācid varuṇo yāto mitreṇa sahito vanam // NsP_6.20 //
analyzed: kadācid varuṇaḥ yātaḥ mitreṇa sahitaḥ vanam

original: kurukṣetre śubhe ramye sadā brahmarṣisevite /
analyzed: kurukṣetre śubhe ramye sadā brahmarṣi sevite

original: nānāpuṣpaphalopete nānātīrthasamākule // NsP_6.21 //
analyzed: nānā puṣpa phala upete nānā tīrtha samākule

original: āśramā yatra dṛśyante munīnām ūrdhvaretasām /
analyzed: āśramāḥ yatra dṛśyante munīnām ūrdhvaretasām

original: tasmiṃs tīrthe samāśritya bahupuṣpaphalodake // NsP_6.22 //
analyzed: tasmin tīrthe samāśritya bahu puṣpa phala udake

original: cīrakṛṣṇājinadharau carantau tapa uttamam /
analyzed: cīra kṛṣṇa ajina dharau carantau tapaḥ uttamam

original: tatraikasmin vanoddeśe vimalodo hradaḥ śubhaḥ // NsP_6.23 //
analyzed: tatra ekasmin vana uddeśe vimala udaḥ hradaḥ śubhaḥ

original: bahugulmalatākīrṇo nānāpakṣiniṣevitaḥ /
analyzed: bahu gulma latā ākīrṇaḥ nānā pakṣi niṣevitaḥ

original: nānātaruvanacchanno nalinyā copaśobhitaḥ // NsP_6.24 //
analyzed: nānā taru vana channaḥ nalinyā ca upaśobhitaḥ

original: pauṇḍarīka iti khyāto mīnakacchapasevitaḥ /
tatas tu mitrāvaruṇau bhrātarau vanacāriṇau /
analyzed: tatas tu mitrāvaruṇau bhrātarau vana cāriṇau

original: taṃ tu deśaṃ gatau devau vicarantau yadṛcchayā // NsP_6.25 //
analyzed: tam tu deśam gatau devau vicarantau yadṛcchayā

original: tābhyāṃ tatra tadā dṛṣṭā urvaśī tu varāpsarāḥ /
analyzed: tābhyām tatra tadā dṛṣṭā urvaśī tu vara apsarāḥ

original: snāyantī sahitānyābhiḥ sakhībhiḥ sā varānanā /
analyzed: snāyantī sahitā anyābhiḥ sakhībhiḥ sā varānanā

original: gāyantī ca hasantī ca viśvastā nirjane vane // NsP_6.26 //
analyzed: gāyantī ca hasantī ca viśvastā nirjane vane

śaṅkhakundendudhavalair dantair aviralaiḥ samaiḥ /
analyzed: śaṅkha kunda indu dhavalaiḥ dantaiḥ aviralaiḥ samaiḥ

original: subhrūḥ sunāsā sumukhī sulalāṭā manasvinī // NsP_6.28 //
analyzed: su bhrūḥ su nāsā su mukhī su lalāṭā manasvinī

original: siṃhavatsūkṣmamadhyāṅgī pīnorujaghanastanī /
analyzed: siṃha vat sūkṣma madhya aṅgī pīna ūru jaghana stanī

original: madhurālāpacaturā sumadhyā cāruhāsinī // NsP_6.29 //
analyzed: madhura ālāpa caturā su madhyā cāru hāsinī

original: raktotpalakarā tanvī supadī vinayānvitā /
pūrṇacandranibhā bālā mattadviradagāminī // NsP_6.30 //

original: dṛṣṭvā tasyās tu tad rūpaṃ tau devau vismayaṃ gatau /

original: tasyā hāsyena lāsyena smitena lalitena ca // NsP_6.31 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ hāsyena lāsyena smitena lalitena ca

analyzed: matta bhramara gītena puṃskokila rutena ca

analyzed: su svareṇa hi gītena urvaśyā madhureṇa ca

analyzed: ca kaṭākṣeṇa skandatuḥ tau ubhau api

analyzed: nimeḥ śāpāt atha utkramya sva dehāt muni sattama

analyzed: vasiṣṭha mitrāvaruṇa ātmajaḥ si iti atha ūcuḥ āgatya hi viśva devāḥ

analyzed: retaḥ tri bhāgam kamale carat tat vasiṣṭhaḥ evam tu pitāmaha ukteḥ

analyzed: tridhā samabhavat retaḥ kamale sthale jale

analyzed: aravinde vasiṣṭhaḥ tu jātaḥ sa muni sattamaḥ

analyzed: sthale tu agastyaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ jale matsyaḥ mahā dyutiḥ

original: sa tatra jāto matimān vasiṣṭhaḥ kumbhe tv agastyaḥ salile 'tha matsyaḥ /
analyzed: sa tatra jātaḥ matimān vasiṣṭhaḥ kumbhe tu agastyaḥ salile matsyaḥ

analyzed: sthāna traye tat patitam samānam mitrasya yasmāt varuṇasya retaḥ

original: etasminn eva kāle tu gatā sā urvasī divam /
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle tu gatā sā urvasī divam

original: upetya tān ṛṣīn devau gatau bhūyaḥ svam āśramam /
analyzed: upetya tān ṛṣīn devau gatau bhūyas svam āśramam

original: yamāv api tu tapyete punar ugraṃ paraṃ tapaḥ // NsP_6.37 //
analyzed: yamau api tu tapyete punar ugram param tapaḥ

analyzed: tapasyantau sura śreṣṭhau brahmā āgatya idam abravīt

analyzed: siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati yathā yuvayoḥ vaiṣṇavī punar

original: svādhikāreṇa sthīyetām adhunā lokasākṣikau /
analyzed: sva adhikāreṇa sthīyetām adhunā loka sākṣikau

original: ity uktvāntardadhe brahmā tau sthitau svādhikārakau // NsP_6.40 //
analyzed: iti uktvā antardadhe brahmā tau sthitau svādhikārakau

original: evaṃ te kathitaṃ vipra vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: evam te kathitam vipra vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ

analyzed: mitrāvaruṇa putra tvam agastyasya ca dhīmataḥ

analyzed: idam puṃsīyam ākhyānam vāruṇam pāpa nāśanam

original: putrakāmās tu ye kecic *chṛṇvantīdaṃ śucivratāḥ /
analyzed: putra kāmāḥ tu ye kecid śṛṇvanti idam śuci vratāḥ

original: acirād eva putrāṃs te labhante nātra saṃśayaḥ // NsP_6.42 //
analyzed: acirāt eva putrān te labhante na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: yaś caitat paṭhate nityaṃ havyakavye dvijottamaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca etat paṭhate nityam havya kavye dvijottamaḥ

analyzed: devāḥ ca pitaraḥ tasya tṛptāḥ yānti param sukham

analyzed: yaḥ ca etat śṛṇuyāt nityam prātar utthāya mānavaḥ

analyzed: nandate sa sukham bhūmau viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

analyzed: iti etat ākhyānam idam mayā īritam purātanam veda vidaiḥ udīritam

analyzed: paṭhiṣyate yaḥ tu śṛṇoti sarvadā sa yāti śuddhaḥ hari lokam añjasā

original: // iti śrinarasiṃhapurāṇe puṃsavanākhyānaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 6 //
analyzed: iti śri narasiṃhapurāṇe puṃsavanākhyānam nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrībharadvāja uvāca:
analyzed: śrī bharadvājaḥ uvāca

analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyena muninā katham mṛtyuḥ parājitaḥ

analyzed: idam tu mahat ākhyānam bharadvāja śṛṇuṣva me

analyzed: śṛṇvantu ṛṣayaḥ ca ime purāvṛttam bravīmi aham

analyzed: narasiṃhasya bhaktena kṛta tīrtha nivāsinā

analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: mārkaṇḍeyena muninā kathaṃ mṛtyuḥ parājitaḥ /
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyena muninā katham mṛtyuḥ parājitaḥ

original: etad ākhyāhi me tāta śrotum icchāmi te 'dhunā // NsP_7.7 //

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyena muninā yathā mṛtyuḥ parājitaḥ

analyzed: tam nirīkṣya mahātmānam sat prajñam ca vicakṣaṇam

analyzed: duḥkhitau tau bhṛśam tatra tad mātā pitarau śucā

analyzed: vaktum arhasi duḥkhasya kāraṇam mama pṛcchataḥ

original: ityuktā tena putreṇa mātā tasya mahātmanaḥ /

analyzed: kathayāmasa tat sarvam āgamī yat uvāca ha

analyzed: tat śrutvā asau muniḥ prāha mātaram pitaram punar

original: apaneṣyāmi bho mṛtyuṃ tapasā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: apaneṣyāmi bho mṛtyum tapasā na atra saṃśayaḥ

analyzed: yathā ca aham cira āyuḥ syām tathā kuryām aham tapaḥ

original: vallīvaṭaṃ nāma vanaṃ nānāṛṣiniṣevitam // NsP_7.24 //

original: mātuś ca bāndhavānāṃ ca kim āgamanakāraṇam // NsP_7.28 //
analyzed: mātuḥ ca bāndhavānām ca kim āgamana kāraṇam

analyzed: uvāca sakalam tasmai ādeśi vacanam tadā

analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: bhūtāpahāriṇaṃ mṛtyuṃ jetum icchāmi sāṃpratam /

original: bhṛgur uvāca:

original: bhaktapriyaṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ bhaktyā tvaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja // NsP_7.33 //

original: tapasā mahatā vatsa nārāyaṇam anāmayam // NsP_7.34 //
analyzed: tapasā mahatā vatsa nārāyaṇam anāmayam

original: tatprasādān mahābhāga nārado brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: tad prasādāt mahābhāga nāradaḥ brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ

analyzed: jarām mṛtyum vijitya āśu dīrgha āyuḥ vardhate sukham

analyzed: kaḥ kuryāt mānavaḥ vatsa mṛtyu sattā nivāraṇam

original: tam anantam ajaṃ viṣṇuṃ kṛṣṇaṃ jiṣṇuṃ śriyaḥ patim /
analyzed: tam anantam ajam viṣṇum kṛṣṇam jiṣṇum śriyaḥ patim

original: govindaṃ gopatiṃ devaṃ satataṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja // NsP_7.37 //
analyzed: govindam gopatim devam satatam śaraṇam vraja

original: narasiṃhaṃ mahādevaṃ yadi pūjayase sadā /
analyzed: narasiṃham mahādevam yadi pūjayase sadā

original: vatsa jetāsi mṛtyuṃ tvaṃ satataṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // NsP_7.38 //
analyzed: vatsa jetāsi mṛtyum tvam satatam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: uktaḥ pitāmahenaivaṃ bhṛguṇā punar abravīt /
analyzed: uktaḥ pitāmahena evam bhṛguṇā punar abravīt

original: mārkaṇḍeyo mahātejā vinayāt svapitāmaham // NsP_7.39 //
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mahā tejāḥ vinayāt sva pitāmaham

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: ārādhyaḥ kathitas tāta viṣṇur viśveśvaraḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: ārādhyaḥ kathitaḥ tāta viṣṇuḥ viśveśvaraḥ prabhuḥ

original: kathaṃ kutra mayā kāryam acyutārādhanaṃ guro /
analyzed: katham kutra mayā kāryam acyuta ārādhanam guro

original: yenāsau mama tuṣṭas tu mṛtyuṃ sadyo 'paneṣyati // NsP_7.40 //
analyzed: yena asau mama tuṣṭaḥ tu mṛtyum sadyo paneṣyati

original: bhṛgur uvāca:
analyzed: bhṛguḥ uvāca

original: tuṅgabhadreti vikhyātā yā nadī sahyaparvate /
analyzed: tuṅgabhadrā iti vikhyātā yā nadī sahya parvate

original: tatra bhadravaṭe vatsa tvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya keśavam // NsP_7.41 //
analyzed: tatra bhadravaṭe vatsa tvam pratiṣṭhāpya keśavam

original: ārādhaya jagannāthaṃ gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ kramāt /
analyzed: ārādhaya jagannātham gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ kramāt

original: hṛdi kṛtvendriyagrāmaṃ manaḥ saṃyamya tattvataḥ // NsP_7.42 //
analyzed: hṛdi kṛtvā indriya grāmam manaḥ saṃyamya tattvataḥ

original: hṛtpuṇḍarīke deveśaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam /
analyzed: hṛd puṇḍarīke deveśam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: dhyāyann ekamanā vatsa dvādaśākṣaram abhyasan // NsP_7.43 //
analyzed: dhyāyan ekamanāḥ vatsa dvādaśa akṣaram abhyasan

original: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya /
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya

original: imaṃ mantraṃ hi japato devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ /
analyzed: imam mantram hi japataḥ devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: prīto bhavati viśvātmā mṛtyuṃ yenāpaneṣyati // NsP_7.44 //
analyzed: prītaḥ bhavati viśvātmā mṛtyum yena apaneṣyati

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: ityuktas taṃ praṇamyātha sa jagāma tapovanam // NsP_7.45 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tam praṇamya atha sa jagāma tapaḥ vanam

original: sahyapādodbhavāyās tu bhadrāyās taṭam uttamam /
analyzed: sahya pāda udbhavāyāḥ tu bhadrāyāḥ taṭam uttamam

original: nānādrumalatākīrṇaṃ nānāpuṣpopaśobhitam // NsP_7.46 //
analyzed: nānā druma latā ākīrṇam nānā puṣpa upaśobhitam

original: gulmaveṇulatākīrṇaṃ nānāmunijanākulam /
analyzed: gulma veṇu latā ākīrṇam nānā muni jana ākulam

original: tatra viṣṇuṃ pratiṣṭhāpya gandhadhūpādibhiḥ kramāt // NsP_7.47 //
analyzed: tatra viṣṇum pratiṣṭhāpya gandha dhūpa ādibhiḥ kramāt

original: pūjayām_asa deveśaṃ mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmuniḥ /
analyzed: pūjayāmasa deveśam mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mahā muniḥ

original: pūjayitvā hariṃ tatra tapas tepe suduṣkaram // NsP_7.48 //
analyzed: pūjayitvā harim tatra tapaḥ tepe su duṣkaram

original: nirāhāro munis tatra varṣam ekam atandritaḥ /
analyzed: nirāhāraḥ muniḥ tatra varṣam ekam atandritaḥ

original: mātroktakāle tv āsanne dine tatra mahāmatiḥ // NsP_7.49 //
analyzed: mātrā ukta kāle tu āsanne dine tatra mahāmatiḥ

original: snātvā yathoktavidhinā kṛtvā viṣṇos tathārcanam /
analyzed: snātvā yathā ukta vidhinā kṛtvā viṣṇoḥ tathā arcanam

original: hṛdi kṛtvendriyagrāmaṃ viśuddhenāntarātmanā // NsP_7.50 //
analyzed: hṛdi kṛtvā indriya grāmam viśuddhena antarātmanā

original: āsanaṃ svastikaṃ baddhvā kṛtvāsau prāṇasaṃyamam /
analyzed: āsanam svastikam baddhvā kṛtvā asau prāṇasaṃyamam

original: oṃkāroccāraṇād dhīmān hṛtpadmaṃ sa vikāsayan // NsP_7.51 //
analyzed: oṃkāra uccāraṇāt dhīmān hṛd padmam sa vikāsayan

original: tanmadhye ravisomāgni- maṇḍalāni yathākramam /
analyzed: tad madhye ravi soma agni maṇḍalāni yathākramam

original: kalpayitvā hareḥ pīṭhaṃ tasmin deśe sanātanam // NsP_7.52 //
analyzed: kalpayitvā hareḥ pīṭham tasmin deśe sanātanam

original: pītāmbaradharaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam /
analyzed: pīta ambara dharam kṛṣṇam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: bhāvapuṣpaiḥ samabhyarcya manas tasmin niveśya ca // NsP_7.53 //
analyzed: bhāva puṣpaiḥ samabhyarcya manaḥ tasmin niveśya ca

original: brahmarūpaṃ hariṃ dhyāyaṃs tato mantram udīrayat /
analyzed: brahma rūpam harim dhyāyan tatas mantram udīrayat

original: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya // NsP_7.54 //
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: ity evaṃ dhyāyatas tasya mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmataḥ /
analyzed: iti evam dhyāyataḥ tasya mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmataḥ

original: manas tatraiva saṃlagnaṃ devadeve jagatpatau // NsP_7.55 //
analyzed: manaḥ tatra eva saṃlagnam devadeve jagatpatau

original: tato yamājñayā tatra āgatā yamakiṃkarāḥ /
analyzed: tatas yama ājñayā tatra āgatāḥ yama kiṃkarāḥ

original: pāśahastās tu taṃ netuṃ viṣṇudūtais tu te hatāḥ // NsP_7.56 //
analyzed: pāśa hastāḥ tu tam netum viṣṇu dūtaiḥ tu te hatāḥ

original: śūlaiḥ prahanyamānās tu dvijaṃ muktvā yayus tadā /
analyzed: śūlaiḥ prahanyamānāḥ tu dvijam muktvā yayuḥ tadā

original: vayaṃ nivartya gacchāmo mṛtyur evāgamiṣyati // NsP_7.57 //
analyzed: vayam nivartya gacchāmaḥ mṛtyuḥ eva āgamiṣyati

original: viṣṇudūtā ūcuḥ:
analyzed: viṣṇu dūtāḥ ūcuḥ

original: yatra naḥ svāmino nāma lokanāthasya śārṅgiṇaḥ /
analyzed: yatra naḥ svāminaḥ nāma lokanāthasya śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: ko yamas tatra mṛtyur vā kālaḥ kalayatāṃ varaḥ // NsP_7.58 //
analyzed: kaḥ yamaḥ tatra mṛtyuḥ vā kālaḥ kalayatām varaḥ

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: āgatya svayam evāha mṛtyuḥ pārśvaṃ mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: āgatya svayam eva āha mṛtyuḥ pārśvam mahātmanaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeyasya babhrāma viṣṇukiṃkaraśaṅkayā // NsP_7.59 //
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyasya babhrāma viṣṇu kiṃkara śaṅkayā

original: te 'py udyamyāśu muśalān āyasān viṣṇukiṃkarāḥ /
analyzed: te pi udyamya āśu muśalān āyasān viṣṇu kiṃkarāḥ

original: viṣṇvājñayā haniṣyāmo mṛtyum adyeti saṃsthitāḥ // NsP_7.60 //
analyzed: viṣṇu ājñayā haniṣyāmaḥ mṛtyum adyā iti saṃsthitāḥ

original: tato viṣṇvarpitamanā mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmatiḥ /
analyzed: tatas viṣṇu arpita manāḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: tuṣṭāva praṇato bhūtvā devadevaṃ janārdanam // NsP_7.61 //
analyzed: tuṣṭāva praṇataḥ bhūtvā devadevam janārdanam

original: viṣṇunaivoditaṃ yat tat stotraṃ karṇe mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇunā evā uditam yat tat stotram karṇe mahātmanaḥ

original: subhāṣitena manasā tena tuṣṭāva mādhavam // NsP_7.62 //
analyzed: su bhāṣitena manasā tena tuṣṭāva mādhavam

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: nārāyaṇaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ padmanābhaṃ purātanam /
analyzed: nārāyaṇam sahasrākṣam padmanābham purātanam

original: praṇato 'smi hṛṣīkeśaṃ kiṃ me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // NsP_7.63 //
analyzed: praṇataḥ smi hṛṣīkeśam kim me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: govindaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣam anantam ajam avyayam /
analyzed: govindam puṇḍarīkākṣam anantam ajam avyayam

original: keśavaṃ ca prapanno 'smi kiṃ me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // NsP_7.64 //
analyzed: keśavam ca smi kim me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: vāsudevaṃ jagadyoniṃ bhānuvarṇam atīndriyam /
analyzed: vāsudevam jagat yonim bhānu varṇam atīndriyam

original: dāmodaraṃ prapanno 'smi kiṃ me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // NsP_7.65 //
analyzed: dāmodaram smi kim me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: śaṅkhacakradharaṃ devaṃ channarūpiṇam avyayam /
analyzed: śaṅkha cakra dharam devam channa rūpiṇam avyayam

original: adhokṣajaṃ prapanno 'smi kiṃ me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // NsP_7.66 //
analyzed: adhokṣajam prapannaḥ smi kim me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: vārāhaṃ vāmanaṃ viṣṇuṃ narasiṃhaṃ janārdanam /
analyzed: vārāham vāmanam viṣṇum narasiṃham janārdanam

original: mādhavaṃ ca prapanno 'smi kiṃ me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // NsP_7.67 //
analyzed: mādhavam ca smi kim me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: puruṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ puṇyaṃ kṣemabījaṃ jagatpatim /
lokanāthaṃ prapanno 'smi kiṃ me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // NsP_7.68 //
analyzed: lokanātham smi kim me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: bhūtātmānaṃ mahātmānaṃ jagadyonim ayonijam /
analyzed: bhūtātmānam mahātmānam jagadyonim ayonijam

original: viśvarūpaṃ prapanno 'smi kiṃ me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // NsP_7.69 //
analyzed: viśvarūpam smi kim me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: sahasraśirasaṃ devaṃ vyaktāvyaktaṃ sanātanam /
analyzed: sahasra śirasam devam vyakta avyaktam sanātanam

original: mahāyogaṃ prapanno 'smi kiṃ me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // NsP_7.70 //
analyzed: mahā yogam smi kim me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: ity udīritam ākarṇya stotraṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: iti udīritam ākarṇya stotram tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: apayātas tato mṛtyur viṣṇudūtaiś ca pīḍitaḥ // NsP_7.71 //
analyzed: apayātaḥ tatas mṛtyuḥ viṣṇu dūtaiḥ ca pīḍitaḥ

original: iti tena jito mṛtyur mārkaṇḍeyena dhīmatā /
analyzed: iti tena jitaḥ mṛtyuḥ mārkaṇḍeyena dhīmatā

original: prasanne puṇḍarīkākṣe nṛsiṃhe nāsti durlabham // NsP_7.72 //
analyzed: prasanne puṇḍarīkākṣe nṛsiṃhe na asti durlabham

original: mṛtyuṃjayam idaṃ puṇyaṃ mṛtyupraśamanaṃ śubham /
analyzed: mṛtyuṃjayam idam puṇyam mṛtyu praśamanam śubham

original: mārkaṇḍeyahitārthāya svayaṃ viṣṇur uvāca ha // NsP_7.73 //
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeya hita arthāya svayam viṣṇuḥ uvāca ha

original: ya idaṃ paṭhete bhaktyā trikālaṃ niyataḥ śuciḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ idam paṭhete bhaktyā tri kālam niyataḥ śuciḥ

original: nākāle tasya mṛtyuḥ syān narasyācyutacetasaḥ // NsP_7.74 //
analyzed: na akāle tasya mṛtyuḥ syāt narasya acyuta cetasaḥ

original: hṛtpadmamadhye puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ śāśvatam ādidevam /
analyzed: hṛd padma madhye puruṣam purāṇam nārāyaṇam śāśvatam ādidevam

original: saṃcintya sūryād api rājamānaṃ mṛtyuṃ sa yogī jitavāṃs tadaiva // NsP_7.75 //
analyzed: saṃcintya sūryāt api rājamānam mṛtyum sa yogī jitavān tadā eva

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe mārkaṇḍeyamṛtyuṃjayo nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 7 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe mārkaṇḍeyamṛtyuṃjayaḥ nāma saptamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīvyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: śrī vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: mṛtyuś ca kiṃkarāś caiva viṣṇudūtaiḥ prapīḍitāḥ /
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ ca kiṃkarāḥ ca eva viṣṇu dūtaiḥ prapīḍitāḥ

original: svarājñas te 'nu nirveśaṃ gatvā te cukruśur bhṛśam // NsP_8.1 //
analyzed: sva rājñaḥ te nu nirveśam gatvā te cukruśuḥ bhṛśam

original: mṛtyukiṃkarā ūcuḥ:
analyzed: mṛtyu kiṃkarāḥ ūcuḥ

original: śṛṇu rājan vaco 'smākaṃ tavāgre yad bravīmahe /
analyzed: śṛṇu rājan vacaḥ smākam tava agre yat bravīmahe

original: tvadādeśād vayaṃ gatvā mṛtyuṃ saṃsthāpya dūrataḥ // NsP_8.2 //
analyzed: tvad ādeśāt vayam gatvā mṛtyum saṃsthāpya dūratas

original: brāhmaṇasya samīpaṃ ca bhṛgoḥ pautrasya sattama /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya samīpam ca bhṛgoḥ pautrasya sattama

original: taṃ dhyāyamānaṃ kamapi devam ekāgramānasam // NsP_8.3 //
analyzed: tam dhyāyamānam kam api devam ekāgra mānasam

original: gantuṃ na śaktās tatpārśvaṃ vayaṃ sarve mahāmate /
analyzed: gantum na śaktāḥ tad pārśvam vayam sarve mahāmate

original: yāvat tāvan mahākāyaiḥ puruṣair muśalair hatāḥ // NsP_8.4 //
analyzed: yāvat tāvat mahā kāyaiḥ puruṣaiḥ muśalaiḥ hatāḥ

original: vayaṃ nivṛttās tad vīkṣya mṛtyus tatra gataḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: vayam nivṛttāḥ tat vīkṣya mṛtyuḥ tatra gataḥ punar

original: asmān nirbhartsya tatrāyaṃ tair narair muśalair hataḥ // NsP_8.5 //
analyzed: asmān nirbhartsya tatra ayam taiḥ naraiḥ muśalaiḥ hataḥ

original: evam atra tam ānetuṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tapasi sthitam /
analyzed: evam atra tam ānetum brāhmaṇam tapasi sthitam

original: aśaktā vayam evātra mṛtyunā saha vai prabho // NsP_8.6 //
analyzed: aśaktāḥ vayam eva atra mṛtyunā saha vai prabho

original: tad bravīhi mahābhāga yad brahma brāhmaṇasya tu /
analyzed: tat bravīhi mahābhāga yat brahma brāhmaṇasya tu

original: devaṃ kaṃ dhyāyate vipraḥ ke vā te yair hatā vayam // NsP_8.7 //
analyzed: devam kam dhyāyate vipraḥ ke vā te yaiḥ hatāḥ vayam

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: ityuktaḥ kiṃkaraiḥ sarvair mṛtyunā ca mahāmate /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ kiṃkaraiḥ sarvaiḥ mṛtyunā ca mahāmate

original: dhyātvā kṣaṇaṃ mahābuddhiḥ prāha vaivasvato yamaḥ // NsP_8.8 //
analyzed: dhyātvā kṣaṇam mahā buddhiḥ prāha vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ

original: yama uvāca:
analyzed: yamaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇvantu kiṃkarāḥ sarve mṛtyuś cānye ca me vacaḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇvantu kiṃkarāḥ sarve mṛtyuḥ ca anye ca me vacaḥ

original: satyam etat pravakṣyāmi jñānaṃ yad yogamārgataḥ // NsP_8.9 //
analyzed: satyam etat pravakṣyāmi jñānam yat yoga mārgataḥ

original: bhṛgoḥ pautro mahābhāgo mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmatiḥ /
analyzed: bhṛgoḥ pautraḥ mahābhāgaḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: sa jñātvādyātmanaḥ kālaṃ gato mṛtyujigīṣayā // NsP_8.10 //
analyzed: sa jñātvā adya ātmanaḥ kālam gataḥ mṛtyu jigīṣayā

original: bhṛguṇoktena mārgeṇa sa tepe paramaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: bhṛguṇā uktena mārgeṇa sa tepe paramam tapaḥ

original: harim ārādhya medhāvī japan vai dvādaśākṣaram // NsP_8.11 //
analyzed: harim ārādhya medhāvī japan vai dvādaśa akṣaram

original: ekāgreṇaiva manasā dhyāyate hṛdi keśavam /
analyzed: ekāgreṇa eva manasā dhyāyate hṛdi keśavam

original: satataṃ yogayuktas tu sa munis tatra kiṃkarāḥ // NsP_8.12 //
analyzed: satatam yoga yuktaḥ tu sa muniḥ tatra kiṃkarāḥ

original: haridhyānamahādīkṣā- balaṃ tasya mahāmuneḥ /
analyzed: hari dhyāna mahā dīkṣā balam tasya mahā muneḥ

original: nānyad vai prāptakālasya balaṃ paśyāmi kiṃkarāḥ // NsP_8.13 //
analyzed: na anyat vai prāpta kālasya balam paśyāmi kiṃkarāḥ

original: hṛdisthe puṇḍarīkākṣe satataṃ bhaktavatsale /
analyzed: hṛdisthe puṇḍarīkākṣe satatam bhakta vatsale

original: paśyan taṃ viṣṇubhūtaṃ nu ko hi syāt keśavāśrayam // NsP_8.14 //
analyzed: paśyan tam viṣṇu bhūtam nu kaḥ hi syāt keśava āśrayam

original: te 'pi vai puruṣā viṣṇor yair yūyaṃ tāḍitā bhṛśam /
analyzed: te pi vai puruṣāḥ viṣṇoḥ yaiḥ yūyam tāḍitāḥ bhṛśam

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ na gantavyaṃ yatra vai vaiṣṇavāḥ sthitāḥ // NsP_8.15 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam na gantavyam yatra vai vaiṣṇavāḥ sthitāḥ

original: na citraṃ tāḍanaṃ tatra ahaṃ manye mahātmabhiḥ /
analyzed: na citram tāḍanam tatra aham manye mahātmabhiḥ

original: bhavatāṃ jīvanaṃ citraṃ yakṣair dattaṃ kṛpālubhiḥ // NsP_8.16 //
analyzed: bhavatām jīvanam citram yakṣaiḥ dattam kṛpālubhiḥ

original: nārāyaṇaparaṃ vipraṃ kas taṃ vīkṣitum utsahet /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa param vipram kaḥ tam vīkṣitum utsahet

original: yuṣmābhiś ca mahāpāpair mārkaṇḍeyaṃ haripriyam /
analyzed: yuṣmābhiḥ ca mahā pāpaiḥ mārkaṇḍeyam haripriyam

original: samānetuṃ kṛto yatnaḥ samīcīnaṃ na tat kṛtam // NsP_8.17 //
analyzed: samānetum kṛtaḥ yatnaḥ samīcīnam na tat kṛtam

original: narasiṃhaṃ mahādevaṃ ye narāḥ paryupāsate /
analyzed: narasiṃham mahādevam ye narāḥ paryupāsate

original: teṣāṃ pārśve na gantavyaṃ yuṣmābhir mama śāsanāt // NsP_8.18 //
analyzed: teṣām pārśve na gantavyam yuṣmābhiḥ mama śāsanāt

original: śrīvyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: śrī vyāsaḥ uvāca

analyzed: saḥ evam kiṃkarān uktvā mṛtyum ca puratas sthitam

analyzed: yamaḥ nirīkṣya ca janam naraka stham prapīḍitam

analyzed: kṛpayā parayā yuktaḥ viṣṇu bhaktyā viśeṣataḥ

original: janasyānugrahārthāya tenoktāś ca giraḥ śṛṇu // NsP_8.20 //
analyzed: janasya anugraha arthāya tena uktāḥ ca giraḥ śṛṇu

original: narake pacyamānasya yamena paribhāṣitam /
analyzed: narake pacyamānasya yamena paribhāṣitam

original: kiṃ tvayā nārcito devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ // NsP_8.21 //
analyzed: kim tvayā nā arcitaḥ devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśa nāśanaḥ

original: udakenāpy alābhe tu dravyāṇāṃ pūjitaḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: udakena api alābhe tu dravyāṇām pūjitaḥ prabhuḥ

original: yo dadāti svakaṃ lokaṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na pūjitaḥ // NsP_8.22 //
analyzed: yaḥ dadāti svakam lokam sa tvayā kim na pūjitaḥ

smaraṇān muktido nṛṇāṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na pūjitaḥ // NsP_8.23 //
analyzed: smaraṇāt mukti daḥ nṛṇām sa tvayā kim na pūjitaḥ

original: ity uktvā nārakān sarvān punar āha sa kiṃkarān /
analyzed: iti uktvā nārakān sarvān punar āha sa kiṃkarān
