analyzed: vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ sākṣāt viṣṇu bhakti samanvitaḥ

original: nāradāya sa viśvātmā prāhaivaṃ viṣṇur avyayaḥ /
analyzed: nāradāya sa viśvātmā prāha evam viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ

original: anyebhyo vaiṣṇavebhyaś ca siddhebhyaḥ satataṃ śrutam // NsP_8.25 //
analyzed: anyebhyaḥ vaiṣṇavebhyaḥ ca siddhebhyaḥ satatam śrutam

original: tad vaḥ prītyā pravakṣyāmi harivākyam anuttamam /
analyzed: tat vaḥ prītyā pravakṣyāmi hari vākyam anuttamam

original: śikṣārthaṃ kiṃkarāḥ sarve śṛṇuta praṇatā hareḥ // NsP_8.26 //
analyzed: śikṣā artham kiṃkarāḥ sarve śṛṇuta praṇatāḥ hareḥ

original: he kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: he kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa iti yaḥ mām smarati nityaśas

original: jalaṃ bhittvā yathā padmaṃ narakād uddharāmy aham // NsP_8.27 //
analyzed: jalam bhittvā yathā padmam narakāt uddharāmi aham

original: puṇḍarīkākṣa deveśa narasiṃha trivikrama /
analyzed: puṇḍarīkākṣa deveśa narasiṃha trivikrama

original: tvām ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ prāpta iti yas taṃ samuddhare // NsP_8.28 //
analyzed: tvām aham śaraṇam prāptaḥ iti yaḥ tam samuddhare

original: tvāṃ prapanno 'smi śaraṇaṃ devadeva janārdana /
analyzed: tvām prapannaḥ smi śaraṇam devadeva janārdana

original: iti yaḥ śaraṇaṃ prāptas taṃ kleśād uddharāmy aham // NsP_8.29 //
analyzed: iti yaḥ śaraṇam prāptaḥ tam kleśāt uddharāmi aham

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: ity udīritam ākarṇya harivākyaṃ yamena ca /
analyzed: iti udīritam ākarṇya hari vākyam yamena ca

original: nārakāḥ kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti nārasiṃheti cukruśuḥ // NsP_8.30 //
analyzed: nārakāḥ kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa iti nārasiṃha iti cukruśuḥ

analyzed: yathā yathā hareḥ nāma kīrtayanti atra nārakāḥ

analyzed: tathā tathā hareḥ bhaktim udvahantaḥ bruvan idam

analyzed: nārakāḥ ūcuḥ

analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate tasmai keśavāya mahātmane

bhaktapriyāya devāya rakṣāya haraye namaḥ /
analyzed: bhakta priyāya devāya rakṣāya haraye namaḥ

original: lokanāthāya śāntāya yajñeśāyādimūrtaye // NsP_8.33 //
analyzed: lokanāthāya śāntāya yajñeśāya ādimūrtaye

original: anantāyāprameyāya narasiṃhāya te namaḥ /
analyzed: anantāya aprameyāya narasiṃhāya te namaḥ

analyzed: nārāyaṇāya gurave śaṅkha cakra gadā bhṛte

original: vedapriyāya mahate vikramāya namo namaḥ /
analyzed: veda priyāya mahate vikramāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: vārāhāyāpratarkyāya vedāṅgāya mahībhṛte // NsP_8.35 //
analyzed: vārāhāya apratarkyāya vedāṅgāya mahībhṛte

original: namo dyutimate nityaṃ brāhmaṇāya namo namaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ dyutimate nityam brāhmaṇāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: vāmanāya bahujñāya vedavedāṅgadhāriṇe // NsP_8.36 //
analyzed: vāmanāya bahu jñāya veda vedāṅga dhāriṇe

original: balibandhanadakṣāya vedapālāya te namaḥ /
analyzed: bali bandhana dakṣāya vedapālāya te namaḥ

original: viṣṇave suranāthāya vyāpine paramātmane // NsP_8.37 //
analyzed: viṣṇave sura nāthāya vyāpine paramātmane

original: caturbhujāya śuddhāya śuddhadravyāya te namaḥ /
analyzed: caturbhujāya śuddhāya śuddha dravyāya te namaḥ

original: jāmadagnyāya rāmāya duṣṭakṣatrāntakāriṇe // NsP_8.38 //
analyzed: jāmadagnyāya rāmāya duṣṭa kṣatra anta kāriṇe

original: rāmāya rāvaṇāntāya namas tubhyaṃ mahātmane /
analyzed: rāmāya rāvaṇa antāya namaḥ tubhyam mahātmane

original: asmān uddhara govinda pūtigandhān namo 'stu te // NsP_8.39 //
analyzed: asmān uddhara govinda pūti gandhān namaḥ stu te

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: iti saṃkīrtite viṣṇau nārakair bhaktipūrvakam /
analyzed: iti saṃkīrtite viṣṇau nārakaiḥ bhakti pūrvakam

original: tadā sā nārakī pīḍā gatā teṣāṃ mahātmanām // NsP_8.40 //
analyzed: tadā sā nārakī pīḍā gatā teṣām mahātmanām

original: kṛṣṇarūpadharāḥ sarve divyavastravibhūṣitāḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rūpa dharāḥ sarve divya vastra vibhūṣitāḥ

original: divyagandhānuliptāṅgā divyābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ // NsP_8.41 //
analyzed: divya gandha anulipta aṅgāḥ divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitāḥ

original: tān āropya vimāneṣu divyeṣu haripūruṣāḥ /
analyzed: tān āropya vimāneṣu divyeṣu hari pūruṣāḥ

original: tarjayitvā yamabhaṭān nītās te keśavālayam // NsP_8.42 //
analyzed: tarjayitvā yama bhaṭān nītāḥ te keśava ālayam

original: nārakeṣu ca sarveṣu nīteṣu haripūruṣaiḥ /
analyzed: nārakeṣu ca sarveṣu nīteṣu hari pūruṣaiḥ

original: viṣṇulokaṃ yamo bhūyo namaś cakre tadā harim // NsP_8.43 //
analyzed: viṣṇu lokam yamaḥ bhūyas namaḥ cakre tadā harim

original: yannāmakīrtanād yātā nārakāḥ keśavālayam /
analyzed: yad nāma kīrtanāt yātāḥ nārakāḥ keśava ālayam

original: taṃ namāmi sadā devaṃ narasiṃham ahaṃ gurum // NsP_8.44 //
analyzed: tam namāmi sadā devam narasiṃham aham gurum

original: tasya vai narasiṃhasya viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ /
analyzed: tasya vai narasiṃhasya viṣṇoḥ amita tejasaḥ

original: praṇāmaṃ ye 'pi kurvanti tebhyo 'pīha namo namaḥ // NsP_8.45 //
analyzed: praṇāmam ye pi kurvanti tebhyaḥ pi iha namaḥ namaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā praśāntaṃ narakāgnim ugraṃ yantrādi sarvaṃ viparītam atra /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā praśāntam naraka agnim ugram yantra ādi sarvam viparītam atra

original: punaḥ sa śikṣārtham athātmadūtān yamo hi vaktuṃ kṛtavān manaḥ svayam // NsP_8.46 //
analyzed: punar sa śikṣā artham atha ātma dūtān yamaḥ hi vaktum kṛtavān manaḥ svayam

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe yamagītā nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 8 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe yamagītā nāma aṣṭamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīvyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: śrī vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: svapuruṣam abhivīkṣya pāśahastaṃ vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇamūle /
analyzed: sva puruṣam abhivīkṣya pāśa hastam vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇa mūle

original: parihara madhusūdanaprapannān prabhur aham anyanṛṇāṃ na vaiṣṇavānām // NsP_9.1 //
analyzed: parihara madhusūdana prapannān prabhuḥ aham anya nṛṇām na vaiṣṇavānām

original: aham amaragaṇārcitena dhātrā yama iti lokahitāhite niyuktaḥ /
analyzed: aham amara gaṇa arcitena dhātrā yamaḥ iti loka hita ahite niyuktaḥ

original: hariguruvimukhān praśāsmi martyān haricaraṇapraṇatān namas karomi // NsP_9.2 //
analyzed: hari guru vimukhān praśāsmi martyān hari caraṇa praṇatān namaḥ karomi

original: sugatim abhilaṣāmi vāsudevād aham api bhāgavate sthitāntarātmā /
analyzed: sugatim abhilaṣāmi vāsudevāt aham api bhāgavate sthita antarātmā

original: madhuvadhavaśago 'smi na svatantraḥ prabhavati saṃyamane mamāpi kṛṣṇaḥ // NsP_9.3 //
analyzed: madhu vadha vaśa gaḥ smi na svatantraḥ prabhavati saṃyamane mama api kṛṣṇaḥ

analyzed: bhagavati vimukhasya na asti siddhiḥ viṣam amṛtam bhavati iti na idam asti

original: varṣaśatam apīha pacyamānaṃ vrajati na kāñcanatām ayaḥ kadācit // NsP_9.4 //
analyzed: varṣa śatam api iha pacyamānam vrajati na kāñcana tām ayaḥ kadācid

original: na hi śaśikaluṣacchaviḥ kadācid viramati no ravitām upaiti candraḥ /
analyzed: na hi śaśi kaluṣa chaviḥ kadācid viramati no ravi tām upaiti candraḥ

original: bhagavati ca harāv ananyacetā bhṛśamalino 'pi virājate manuṣyaḥ // NsP_9.5 //
analyzed: bhagavati ca harau an anya cetāḥ bhṛśa malinaḥ virājate manuṣyaḥ

original: mahad api suvicārya lokatattvaṃ bhagavadupāstim ṛte na siddhir asti /
analyzed: mahat api su vicārya loka tattvam bhagavat upāstim ṛte na siddhiḥ asti

original: suragurusudṛḍhaprasādadau tau haricaraṇau smaratāpavargahetoḥ // NsP_9.6 //
analyzed: sura guru su dṛḍha prasāda dau tau hari caraṇau smaratā apavarga hetoḥ

original: śubham idam upalabhya mānuṣatvaṃ sukṛtaśatena vṛthendriyārthahetoḥ /
analyzed: śubham idam upalabhya mānuṣa tvam sukṛta śatena vṛthā indriyārtha hetoḥ

original: ramayati kurute na mokṣamārgaṃ dahayati candanam āśu bhasmahetoḥ // NsP_9.7 //
analyzed: ramayati kurute na mokṣa mārgam dahayati candanam āśu bhasma hetoḥ

original: mukulitakarakuḍmalaiḥ surendraiḥ satatanamaskṛtapādapaṅkajo yaḥ /
analyzed: mukulita kara kuḍmalaiḥ sura indraiḥ satata namaskṛta pāda paṅkajaḥ yaḥ

original: avihatagataye sanātanāya jagati janiṃ harate namo 'grajāya // NsP_9.8 //
analyzed: avihata gataye sanātanāya jagati janim harate namaḥ grajāya

original: yamāṣṭakam idaṃ puṇyaṃ paṭhate yaḥ śṛṇoti vā /
analyzed: yama aṣṭakam idam puṇyam paṭhate yaḥ śṛṇoti vā

original: mucyate sarvapāpebhyo viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // NsP_9.9 //
analyzed: mucyate sarva pāpebhyaḥ viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: itīdam uktaṃ yamavākyam uttamaṃ mayādhunā te haribhaktivardhanam /
analyzed: iti idam uktam yama vākyam uttamam mayā adhunā te hari bhakti vardhanam

original: punaḥ pravakṣyāmi purātanīṃ kathāṃ bhṛgos tu pautreṇa ca yā purā kṛtā // NsP_9.10 //
analyzed: punar pravakṣyāmi purātanīm kathām bhṛgoḥ tu pautreṇa ca yā purā kṛtā

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe navamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 9 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe navamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrivyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: śri vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: jitvaivam ātmano mṛtyuṃ tapasā śaṃsitavrataḥ /
analyzed: jitvā evam ātmanaḥ mṛtyum tapasā śaṃsita vrataḥ

original: sa jagāma pitur gehaṃ mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmatiḥ // NsP_10.1 //
analyzed: sa jagāma pituḥ geham mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: kṛtvā vivāhaṃ dharmeṇa bhṛgor vākyaviśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā vivāham dharmeṇa bhṛgoḥ vākya viśeṣataḥ

original: sa vedaśirasaṃ putram utpādya ca vidhānataḥ // NsP_10.2 //
analyzed: sa vedaśirasam putram utpādya ca vidhānataḥ

original: iṣṭvā yajñais tu deveśaṃ nārāyaṇam anāmayam /
analyzed: iṣṭvā yajñaiḥ tu deveśam nārāyaṇam anāmayam

original: śrāddhena tu pitṛn iṣṭvā annadānena cātithīn // NsP_10.3 //
analyzed: śrāddhena tu pitṛn iṣṭvā anna dānena ca atithīn

original: prayāgam āsādya punaḥ snātvā tīrthe garīyasi /
analyzed: prayāgam āsādya punar snātvā tīrthe garīyasi

original: mārkaṇḍeyo mahātejās tepe vaṭatale tapaḥ // NsP_10.4 //
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mahā tejāḥ tepe vaṭa tale tapaḥ

original: yasya prasādena purā jitavān mṛtyum ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: yasya prasādena purā jitavān mṛtyum ātmanaḥ

original: taṃ devaṃ draṣṭum icchan yaḥ sa tepe paramaṃ tapaḥ // NsP_10.5 //
analyzed: tam devam draṣṭum icchan yaḥ sa tepe paramam tapaḥ

original: vāyubhakṣaś ciraṃ kālaṃ tapasā śoṣayaṃs tanum /
analyzed: vāyubhakṣaḥ ciram kālam tapasā śoṣayan tanum

original: ekadā tu mahātejā mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmatiḥ // NsP_10.6 //
analyzed: ekadā tu mahā tejāḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: ārādhya mādhavaṃ devaṃ gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ /
analyzed: ārādhya mādhavam devam gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: agre vyagramanāḥ sthitvā hṛdaye tam anusmaran /
analyzed: agre vyagra manāḥ sthitvā hṛdaye tam anusmaran

original: śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇiṃ tuṣṭāva garuḍadhvajam // NsP_10.7 //
analyzed: śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim tuṣṭāva garuḍadhvajam

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: naraṃ nṛsiṃhaṃ naranātham acyutaṃ pralambabāhuṃ kamalāyatekṣaṇam /
analyzed: naram nṛsiṃham naranātham acyutam pralamba bāhum kamala āyata īkṣaṇam

original: kṣitīśvarair arcitapādapaṅkajaṃ namāmi viṣṇuṃ puruṣaṃ purātanam // NsP_10.8 //
analyzed: kṣitīśvaraiḥ arcita pāda paṅkajam namāmi viṣṇum puruṣam purātanam

original: jagatpatiṃ kṣīrasamudramandiraṃ taṃ śārṅgapāṇiṃ munivṛndavanditam /
analyzed: jagatpatim kṣīra samudra mandiram tam śārṅgapāṇim muni vṛnda vanditam

original: śriyaḥ patiṃ śrīdharam īśam īśvaraṃ namāmi govindam anantavarcasam // NsP_10.9 //
analyzed: śriyaḥ patim śrīdharam īśam īśvaram namāmi govindam ananta varcasam

original: ajaṃ vareṇyaṃ janaduḥkhanāśanaṃ guruṃ purāṇaṃ puruṣottamaṃ prabhum /
analyzed: ajam vareṇyam jana duḥkha nāśanam gurum purāṇam puruṣottamam prabhum

original: sahasrasūryadyutimantam acyutaṃ namāmi bhaktyā harim ādyamādhavam // NsP_10.10 //
analyzed: sahasra sūrya dyutimantam acyutam namāmi bhaktyā harim ādya mādhavam

original: puraskṛtaṃ puṇyavatāṃ parāṃ gatiṃ kṣitīśvaraṃ lokapatim prajāpatim /
analyzed: puraskṛtam puṇyavatām parām gatim kṣitīśvaram loka patim prajāpatim

original: paraṃ parāṇām api kāraṇaṃ hariṃ namāmi lokatrayakarmasākṣiṇam // NsP_10.11 //
analyzed: param parāṇām api kāraṇam harim namāmi lokatraya karma sākṣiṇam

original: bhoge tv anantasya payodadhau suraḥ purā hi śete bhagavān anādikṛt /
analyzed: bhoge tu anantasya payodadhau suraḥ purā hi śete bhagavān anādi kṛt

original: kṣīrodavīcīkaṇikāmbunokṣitaṃ taṃ śrīnivāsaṃ praṇato 'smi keśavam // NsP_10.12 //
analyzed: kṣīroda vīcī kaṇikā ambunā ukṣitam tam śrīnivāsam praṇataḥ smi keśavam

original: yo nārasiṃhaṃ vapur āsthito mahān suro murārir madhukaiṭabhāntakṛt /
analyzed: yaḥ nārasiṃham vapuḥ āsthitaḥ mahān suraḥ murāriḥ madhu kaiṭabha anta kṛt

original: samastalokārtiharaṃ hiraṇyakaṃ namāmi viṣṇuṃ satataṃ namāmi tam // NsP_10.13 //
analyzed: samasta loka ārti haram hiraṇyakam namāmi viṣṇum satatam namāmi tam

ḥsnigdhameghābhārcitadyutivirājita pītāmbaradhara kirīṭakaṭakakeyūrahāramaṇiratnāṃśudīptividyotitasarvadiśa // NsP_10.38 //
ḥkanakamaṇikuṇḍalamaṇḍitagaṇḍasthala madhusūdana viśvamūrte // NsP_10.39 //

original: jaya sarvaguro jñeya jaya śaṃbho namo 'stu te /

original: jaya kāmada bhaktānāṃ prabhaviṣṇo namo 'stu te // NsP_11.14 //

original: namaḥ kamalanābhāya namaḥ kamalamāline /

original: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya rāmāya namaś cakrāyudhāya ca /
analyzed: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya rāmāya namaḥ cakrāyudhāya ca

original: namaḥ śivāya devāya namas te bhuvaneśvara // NsP_11.18 //

original: tvam ārtānāṃ suhṛn mitraṃ priyas tvaṃ prapitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: tvam ārtānām suhṛd mitram priyaḥ tvam prapitāmahaḥ

original: tvaṃ gurus tvaṃ gatiḥ sākṣī tvaṃ patis tvaṃ parāyaṇaḥ // NsP_11.21 //
analyzed: tvam guruḥ tvam gatiḥ sākṣī tvam patiḥ tvam parāyaṇaḥ

original: tvaṃ dhruvas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkartā tvaṃ havis tvaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
analyzed: tvam dhruvaḥ tvam vaṣaṭkartā tvam haviḥ tvam hutāśanaḥ

original: tvaṃ śivas tvaṃ vasur dhātā tvaṃ brahmā tvaṃ sureśvaraḥ // NsP_11.22 //
analyzed: tvam śivaḥ tvam vasuḥ dhātā tvam brahmā tvam sura īśvaraḥ

original: tvaṃ yamas tvaṃ ravir vāyus tvaṃ jalaṃ tvaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tvam yamaḥ tvam raviḥ vāyuḥ tvam jalam tvam dhaneśvaraḥ

original: tvaṃ manus tvam ahorātraṃ tvaṃ niśā tvaṃ niśākaraḥ /
analyzed: tvam manuḥ tvam ahorātram tvam niśā tvam niśākaraḥ

original: tvaṃ dhṛtis tvaṃ śriyaḥ kāntis tvaṃ kṣamā tvaṃ dharādharaḥ // NsP_11.23 //
analyzed: tvam dhṛtiḥ tvam śriyaḥ kāntiḥ tvam kṣamā tvam dharādharaḥ

original: tvaṃ kartā jagatām īśas tvaṃ hantā madhusūdana /
analyzed: tvam kartā jagatām īśaḥ tvam hantā madhusūdana

original: tvam eva goptā sarvasya jagatas tvaṃ carācara // NsP_11.24 //
analyzed: tvam eva goptā sarvasya jagataḥ tvam carācara

original: karaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ kartā tvam eva parameśvaraḥ /
analyzed: karaṇam kāraṇam kartā tvam eva parameśvaraḥ

original: śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇe bho samuddhara mādhava // NsP_11.25 //
analyzed: śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇe bho samuddhara mādhava

original: priya padmapalāśākṣa śeṣaparyaṅkaśāyinam /
analyzed: priya padma palāśa akṣa śeṣa paryaṅka śāyinam

original: tvām eva bhaktyā satataṃ namāmi puruṣottamam // NsP_11.26 //
analyzed: tvām eva bhaktyā satatam namāmi puruṣottamam

original: śrīvatsāṅka jagadbījaṃ śyāmalaṃ kamalekṣaṇam /
analyzed: śrīvatsa aṅka jagat bījam śyāmalam kamala īkṣaṇam

original: namāmi te vapur deva kalikalmaṣanāśanam // NsP_11.27 //
analyzed: namāmi te vapuḥ deva kali kalmaṣa nāśanam

original: lakṣmīdharam udārāṅgaṃ divyamālāvibhūṣitam /
analyzed: lakṣmī dharam udāra aṅgam divya mālā vibhūṣitam

original: cārupṛṣṭhaṃ mahābāhuṃ cārubhūṣaṇabhūṣitam // NsP_11.28 //
analyzed: cāru pṛṣṭham mahā bāhum cāru bhūṣaṇa bhūṣitam

original: padmanābhaṃ viśālākṣaṃ padmapattranibhekṣaṇam /
dīrghatuṅgamahāghrāṇaṃ nīlajīmūtasaṃnibham // NsP_11.29 //
analyzed: dīrgha tuṅga mahā ghrāṇam nīla jīmūta saṃnibham

original: dīrghabāhuṃ suguptāṅgaṃ ratnahārojjvalorasam /
analyzed: dīrgha bāhum su gupta aṅgam ratna hāra ujjvala urasam

original: subhrūlalāṭamukuṭaṃ snigdhadantaṃ sulocanam // NsP_11.30 //
analyzed: su bhrū lalāṭa mukuṭam snigdha dantam su locanam

original: cārubāhuṃ sutāmrauṣṭhaṃ ratnojjvalitakuṇḍalam /
analyzed: cāru bāhum su tāmra oṣṭham ratna ujjvalita kuṇḍalam

original: vṛttakaṇṭhaṃ supīnāṃsaṃ sarasaṃ śrīdharaṃ harim // NsP_11.31 //
analyzed: vṛtta kaṇṭham su pīna aṃsam sarasam śrīdharam harim

original: sukumāram ajaṃ nityaṃ nīlakuñcitamūrdhajam /
analyzed: su kumāram ajam nityam nīla kuñcita mūrdhajam

original: unnatāṃsaṃ mahoraskaṃ karṇāntāyatalocanam // NsP_11.32 //
analyzed: unnata aṃsam mahā uraskam karṇa anta āyata locanam

original: hemāravindavadanam indirāyanam īśvaram /
analyzed: hema aravinda vadanam indirāyanam īśvaram

original: sarvalokavidhātāraṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ harim // NsP_11.33 //
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ sarvasattvamanoramam /
analyzed: sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannam sarva sattva manoramam

original: viṣṇum acyutam īśānam anantaṃ puruṣottamam // NsP_11.34 //
analyzed: viṣṇum acyutam īśānam anantam puruṣottamam

original: nato 'smi manasā nityaṃ nārāyaṇam anāmayam /
analyzed: nataḥ smi manasā nityam nārāyaṇam anāmayam

original: varadaṃ kāmadaṃ kāntam anantaṃ sūnṛtaṃ śivam // NsP_11.35 //
analyzed: vara dam kāma dam kāntam anantam sūnṛtam śivam

original: namāmi śirasā viṣṇo sadā tvāṃ bhaktavatsala /
analyzed: namāmi śirasā viṣṇo sadā tvām bhakta vatsala

original: asminn ekārṇave ghore vāyuskambhitacañcale // NsP_11.36 //
analyzed: asmin ekārṇave ghore vāyu skambhita cañcale

original: anantabhogaśayane sahasraphaṇaśobhite /
analyzed: ananta bhoga śayane sahasra phaṇa śobhite

original: vicitraśayane ramye sevite mandavāyunā // NsP_11.37 //
analyzed: vicitra śayane ramye sevite manda vāyunā

original: bhujapañcarasaṃsakta- kamalālayasevitam /
analyzed: kamala ālaya sevitam

original: iha tvāṃ manasā sarvam idānīṃ dṛṣṭavān aham // NsP_11.38 //
analyzed: iha tvām manasā sarvam idānīm dṛṣṭavān aham

original: idānīṃ tu suduḥkhārto māyayā tava mohitaḥ /
analyzed: idānīm tu su duḥkha ārtaḥ māyayā tava mohitaḥ

original: ekodake nirālambe naṣṭasthāvarajaṅgame // NsP_11.39 //
analyzed: eka udake nirālambe naṣṭa sthāvara jaṅgame

original: śūnye tamasi duṣpāre duḥkhapaṅke nirāmaye /
analyzed: śūnye tamasi duṣpāre duḥkha paṅke nirāmaye

original: śītātapajarāroga- śokatṛṣṇādibhiḥ sadā // NsP_11.40 //
analyzed: śīta ātapa jarā roga śoka tṛṣṇā ādibhiḥ sadā

original: pīḍito 'smi bhṛśaṃ tāta suciraṃ kālam acyuta /
analyzed: pīḍitaḥ smi bhṛśam tāta su ciram kālam acyuta

original: śokamohagrahagrasto vicaran bhavasāgare // NsP_11.41 //
analyzed: śoka moha graha grastaḥ vicaran bhava sāgare

original: ihādya vidhinā prāptas tava pādābjasaṃnidhau /
analyzed: iha adya vidhinā prāptaḥ tava pāda abja saṃnidhau

original: ekārṇave mahāghore dustare duḥkhapīḍitaḥ // NsP_11.42 //
analyzed: ekārṇave mahā ghore dustare duḥkha pīḍitaḥ

original: cirabhramapariśrāntas tvām adya śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: cira bhrama pariśrāntaḥ tvām adya śaraṇam gataḥ

original: prasīda sumahāmāya viṣṇo rājīvalocana // NsP_11.43 //
analyzed: prasīda su mahāmāya viṣṇo rājīva locana

original: viśvayone viśālākṣa viśvātman viśvasaṃbhava /
analyzed: viśvayone viśāla akṣa viśvātman viśva saṃbhava

original: ananyaśaraṇaṃ prāptam ato 'tra kulanandana // NsP_11.44 //
analyzed: an anya śaraṇam prāptam kula nandana

original: trāhi māṃ kṛpayā kṛṣṇa śaraṇāgatam āturam /
analyzed: trāhi mām kṛpayā kṛṣṇa śaraṇa āgatam āturam

original: namas te puṇḍarīkākṣa purāṇapuruṣottama // NsP_11.45 //
analyzed: namaḥ te puṇḍarīkākṣa purāṇa puruṣottama

original: añjanābha hṛṣīkeśa māyāmaya namo 'stu te /
analyzed: añjana ābha hṛṣīkeśa māyā maya namaḥ stu te

original: mām uddhara mahābāho magne saṃsārasāgare // NsP_11.46 //
analyzed: mām uddhara mahā bāho magne saṃsāra sāgare

original: gahvare dustare duḥkha- kliṣṭe kleśamahāgrahaiḥ /
analyzed: gahvare dustare duḥkha kliṣṭe kleśa mahā grahaiḥ

original: anāthaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ dīnaṃ patitaṃ bhavasāgare /
analyzed: anātham kṛpaṇam dīnam patitam bhava sāgare

original: māṃ samuddhara govinda varadeśa namo 'stu te // NsP_11.47 //
analyzed: mām samuddhara govinda vara deśa namaḥ stu te

original: namas trailokyanāthāya haraye bhūdharāya ca /
analyzed: namaḥ trailokya nāthāya haraye bhūdharāya ca

original: devadeva namas te 'stu śrīvallabha namo 'stu te // NsP_11.48 //
analyzed: devadeva namaḥ te stu śrīvallabha namaḥ stu te

original: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa kṛpālus tvam agatīnāṃ gatir bhavān /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa kṛpāluḥ tvam agatīnām gatiḥ bhavān

original: saṃsārārṇavamagnānāṃ prasīda madhusūdana // NsP_11.49 //
analyzed: saṃsāra arṇava magnānām prasīda madhusūdana

original: tvām ekam ādyaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ jagatpatiṃ kāraṇam acyutaṃ prabhum /
analyzed: tvām ekam ādyam puruṣam purāṇam jagatpatim kāraṇam acyutam prabhum

original: janārdanaṃ janmajarārtināśanaṃ sureśvaraṃ sundaram indirāpatim // NsP_11.50 //
analyzed: janārdanam janma jarā ārti nāśanam sureśvaram sundaram indirāpatim

original: bṛhadbhujaṃ śyāmalakomalaṃ śubhaṃ varānanaṃ vārijapattranetram /
analyzed: bṛhat bhujam śyāmala komalam śubham vara ānanam vārija pattra netram

original: taraṃgabhaṅgāyatakuntalaṃ hariṃ sukāntam īśaṃ praṇato 'smi śāśvatam // NsP_11.51 //
analyzed: taraṃga bhaṅga āyata kuntalam harim su kāntam īśam praṇataḥ smi śāśvatam

original: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti tac cittaṃ yat tvadarpitam /
analyzed: sā jihvā yā harim stauti tat cittam yat tvad arpitam

original: tāv eva kevalau ślāghyau yau tvatpūjākarau karau // NsP_11.52 //
analyzed: tau eva kevalau ślāghyau yau tvad pūjā karau karau

original: janmāntarasahasreṣu yan mayā pātakaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: janma antara sahasreṣu yat mayā pātakam kṛtam

original: tan me hara tvaṃ govinda vāsudeveti kīrtanāt // NsP_11.53 //
analyzed: tat me hara tvam govinda vāsudeva iti kīrtanāt

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: iti stutas tato viṣṇur mārkaṇḍeyena dhīmatā /
analyzed: iti stutaḥ tatas viṣṇuḥ mārkaṇḍeyena dhīmatā

original: saṃtuṣṭaḥ prāha viśvātmā taṃ muniṃ garuḍadhvajaḥ // NsP_11.54 //
analyzed: saṃtuṣṭaḥ prāha viśvātmā tam munim garuḍadhvajaḥ

original: śrībhagavān uvāca:
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: prīto 'smi tapasā vipra stutyā ca bhṛgunandana /
analyzed: prītaḥ smi tapasā vipra stutyā ca bhṛgu nandana

original: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te prārthitaṃ dadmi te varam // NsP_11.55 //
analyzed: varam vṛṇīṣva bhadram te prārthitam dadmi te varam

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: tvatpādapadme deveśa bhaktiṃ me dehi sarvadā /
analyzed: tvad pāda padme deveśa bhaktim me dehi sarvadā

original: yadi tuṣṭo mamādya tvam anyad ekaṃ vṛṇomy aham // NsP_11.56 //
analyzed: yadi tuṣṭaḥ mama adya tvam anyat ekam vṛṇomi aham

original: stotreṇānena deveśa yas tvāṃ stoṣyati nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: stotreṇa anena deveśa yaḥ tvām stoṣyati nityaśas

original: svarlokavasatiṃ tasya dehi deva jagatpate // NsP_11.57 //
analyzed: svar loka vasatim tasya dehi deva jagatpate

original: dīrghāyuṣṭvaṃ tu yad dattaṃ tvayā me tapyataḥ purā /
analyzed: dīrgha āyuḥ tvam tu yat dattam tvayā me tapyataḥ purā

original: tat sarvaṃ saphalaṃ jātam idānīṃ tava darśanāt // NsP_11.58 //
analyzed: tat sarvam saphalam jātam idānīm tava darśanāt

original: vastum icchāmi deveśa tava pādābjam arcayan /
analyzed: vastum icchāmi deveśa tava pāda abjam arcayan

original: atraiva bhagavan nityaṃ janmamṛtyuvivarjitaḥ // NsP_11.59 //
analyzed: atrā eva bhagavat nityam janma mṛtyu vivarjitaḥ

original: śrībhagavān uvāca:
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: mayy astu te bhṛguśreṣṭha bhaktir avyabhicāriṇī /
analyzed: mayi astu te bhṛgu śreṣṭha bhaktiḥ avyabhicāriṇī

original: bhaktyā muktir bhavaty eva tava kālena sattama // NsP_11.60 //
analyzed: bhaktyā muktiḥ bhavati eva tava kālena sattama

original: yas tv idaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ sāyaṃ prātas taveritam /
analyzed: yaḥ tu idam paṭhate stotram sāyam prātar tava īritam

original: mayi bhaktiṃ dṛḍhāṃ kṛtvā mama loke sa modate // NsP_11.61 //
analyzed: mayi bhaktim dṛḍhām kṛtvā mama loke sa modate

original: yatra yatra bhṛguśreṣṭha sthitas tvaṃ māṃ smariṣyasi /
analyzed: yatra yatra bhṛgu śreṣṭha sthitaḥ tvam mām smariṣyasi

original: tatra tatra sameṣyāmi dānto bhaktavaśo 'smi bhoḥ // NsP_11.62 //
analyzed: tatra tatra sameṣyāmi dāntaḥ bhakta vaśaḥ smi bhoḥ

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: ity uktvā taṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ sa mādhavaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktvā tam muni śreṣṭham mārkaṇḍeyam sa mādhavaḥ

original: virarāma sa sarvatra paśyan viṣṇuṃ yatas tataḥ // NsP_11.63 //
analyzed: virarāma sa sarvatra paśyan viṣṇum yatas tatas

original: iti te kathitaṃ vipra caritaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ /
analyzed: iti te kathitam vipra caritam tasya dhīmataḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeyasya ca munes tenaivoktaṃ purā mama // NsP_11.64 //
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyasya ca muneḥ tena evā uktam purā mama

original: ye viṣṇubhaktyā caritaṃ purāṇaṃ bhṛgos tu pautrasya paṭhanti nityam /
analyzed: ye viṣṇu bhaktyā caritam purāṇam bhṛgoḥ tu pautrasya paṭhanti nityam

original: te muktapāpā narasiṃhaloke vasanti bhaktair abhipūjyamānāḥ // NsP_11.65 //
analyzed: te mukta pāpāḥ narasiṃha loke vasanti bhaktaiḥ abhipūjyamānāḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe mārkaṇḍeyacaritaṃ nāma ekādaśo 'dhyāya // NarP 11 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe mārkaṇḍeyacaritam nāma ekādaśaḥ dhyāya

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: śrutvemām amṛtāṃ puṇyāṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśinīm /
analyzed: śrutvā imām amṛtām puṇyām sarva pāpa praṇāśinīm

original: avitṛptaḥ sa dharmātmā śuko vyāsam abhāṣata // NsP_12.1 //
analyzed: a vitṛptaḥ sa dharma ātmā śukaḥ vyāsam abhāṣata

original: śrīśuka uvāca:
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: aho 'tīva tapaścaryā mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmataḥ /
analyzed: aho tīva tapaḥ caryā mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmataḥ

original: yena dṛṣṭo hariḥ sākṣād yena mṛtyuḥ parājitaḥ // NsP_12.2 //
analyzed: yena dṛṣṭaḥ hariḥ sākṣāt yena mṛtyuḥ parājitaḥ

original: na tṛptir asti me tāta śrutvemāṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ kathām /
analyzed: na tṛptiḥ asti me tāta śrutvā imām vaiṣṇavīm kathām

original: puṇyāṃ pāpaharāṃ tāta tasmād anyat tu me vada // NsP_12.3 //
analyzed: puṇyām pāpa harām tāta tasmāt anyat tu me vada

original: narāṇāṃ dṛḍhacittānām akāryaṃ neha kurvatām /
analyzed: narāṇām dṛḍha cittānām akāryam na iha kurvatām

original: yat puṇyam ṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ tan me vada mahāmate // NsP_12.4 //
analyzed: yat puṇyam ṛṣibhiḥ proktam tat me vada mahāmate

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: narāṇāṃ dṛḍhacittānām iha loke paratra ca /
analyzed: narāṇām dṛḍha cittānām iha loke paratra ca

original: puṇyaṃ yat syān muniśreṣṭha tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu // NsP_12.5 //
analyzed: puṇyam yat syāt muni śreṣṭha tat me nigadataḥ śṛṇu

original: atraivodāharantīmām itihāsaṃ purātanam /
analyzed: atra eva udāharanti imām itihāsam purātanam

original: yamyā ca saha saṃvādaṃ yamasya ca mahātmanaḥ // NsP_12.6 //
analyzed: yamyā ca saha saṃvādam yamasya ca mahātmanaḥ

original: vivasvān aditeḥ putras tasya putrau suvarcasau /
analyzed: vivasvān aditeḥ putraḥ tasya putrau su varcasau

original: jajñāte sa yamaś caiva yamī cāpi yavīyasī // NsP_12.7 //
analyzed: jajñāte sa yamaḥ ca eva yamī ca api yavīyasī

original: tau tatra saṃvivardhete pitur bhavana uttame /
analyzed: tau tatra saṃvivardhete pituḥ bhavane uttame

original: krīḍamānau svabhāvena svacchandagamanāv ubhau // NsP_12.8 //
analyzed: krīḍamānau svabhāvena svacchanda gamanau ubhau

original: yamī yamaṃ samāsādya svasā bhrātaram abravīt // NsP_12.9 //
analyzed: yamī yamam samāsādya svasā bhrātaram abravīt

original: na bhrātā bhaginīṃ yogyāṃ kāmayantīṃ ca kāmayet /
analyzed: na bhrātā bhaginīm yogyām kāmayantīm ca kāmayet

original: bhrātṛbhūtena kiṃ tasya svasur yo na patir bhavet // NsP_12.10 //
analyzed: bhrātṛ bhūtena kim tasya svasuḥ yaḥ na patiḥ bhavet

original: abhūta iva sa jñeyo na tu bhūtaḥ kathaṃcana /
analyzed: abhūtaḥ iva sa jñeyaḥ na tu bhūtaḥ kathaṃcana

original: anāthāṃ nātham icchantīṃ svasāraṃ yo na nāthati // NsP_12.11 //
analyzed: anāthām nātham icchantīm svasāram yaḥ na nāthati

original: kāṅkṣantīṃ bhrātaraṃ nāthaṃ bhartāraṃ yas tu necchati /
analyzed: kāṅkṣantīm bhrātaram nātham bhartāram yaḥ tu na icchati

original: bhrāteti nocyate loke sa pumān munisattamaḥ // NsP_12.12 //
analyzed: bhrātā iti nā ucyate loke sa pumān muni sattamaḥ

original: syād vānyatanayā tasya bharyā bhavati kiṃ tayā /
analyzed: syāt vā anya tanayā tasya bharyā bhavati kim tayā

original: īkṣatas tu svasā bhrātuḥ kāmena paridahyate // NsP_12.13 //
analyzed: īkṣataḥ tu svasā bhrātuḥ kāmena paridahyate

original: yat kāryam aham icchāmi tvam eveccha tad eva hi /
analyzed: yat kāryam aham icchāmi tvam evā iccha tat eva hi

original: anyathāhaṃ mariṣyāmi tvām icchantī vicetanā // NsP_12.14 //
analyzed: anyathā aham mariṣyāmi tvām icchantī vicetanā

original: kāmaduḥkham asahyaṃ nu bhrātaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ na cecchasi /
analyzed: kāma duḥkham asahyam nu bhrātar kim tvam na ca icchasi

original: kāmāgninā bhṛśaṃ taptā pralīyāmy aṅga mā ciram // NsP_12.15 //
analyzed: kāma agninā bhṛśam taptā pralīyāmi aṅga mā ciram

original: kāmārtāyāḥ striyāḥ kānta vaśago bhava mā ciram /
analyzed: kāma ārtāyāḥ striyāḥ kānta vaśagaḥ bhava mā ciram

original: svena kāyena me kāyaṃ saṃyojayitum arhasi // NsP_12.16 //
analyzed: svena kāyena me kāyam saṃyojayitum arhasi

original: yama uvāca:
analyzed: yamaḥ uvāca

original: kim idaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ bhagini bhāṣase /
analyzed: kim idam loka vidviṣṭam dharmam bhagini bhāṣase

original: akāryam iha kaḥ kuryāt pumān bhadre sucetanaḥ // NsP_12.17 //
analyzed: akāryam iha kaḥ kuryāt pumān bhadre su cetanaḥ

original: na te saṃyojayiṣyāmi kāyaṃ kāyena bhāmini /
analyzed: na te saṃyojayiṣyāmi kāyam kāyena bhāmini

original: na bhrātā madanārtāyāḥ svasuḥ kāmaṃ prayacchati // NsP_12.18 //
analyzed: na bhrātā madana ārtāyāḥ svasuḥ kāmam prayacchati

original: mahāpātakam ity āhuḥ svasāraṃ yo 'dhigacchati /
analyzed: mahāpātakam iti āhuḥ svasāram yaḥ dhigacchati

original: paśūnām eṣa dharmaḥ syāt tiryagyonivatāṃ śubhe // NsP_12.19 //
analyzed: paśūnām eṣa dharmaḥ syāt tiryagyonivatām śubhe

original: yamy uvāca:
analyzed: yamī uvāca

original: ekasthāne yathā pūrvaṃ saṃyogo nau na duṣyati /
analyzed: eka sthāne yathā pūrvam saṃyogaḥ nau na duṣyati

original: mātṛgarbhe tathaivāyaṃ saṃyogo nau na duṣyati // NsP_12.20 //
analyzed: mātṛ garbhe tathā eva ayam saṃyogaḥ nau na duṣyati

original: kiṃ bhrātar apy anāthāṃ tvaṃ mā necchasi śobhanam /
analyzed: kim bhrātar api anāthām tvam mā nā icchasi śobhanam

original: svasāraṃ nirṛtī rakṣaḥ saṃgacchati ca nityaśaḥ // NsP_12.21 //
analyzed: svasāram nirṛtiḥ rakṣaḥ saṃgacchati ca nityaśas

original: yama uvāca:
analyzed: yamaḥ uvāca

original: svayaṃbhuvāpi nindyeta lokavṛttaṃ jugupsitam /
analyzed: svayaṃbhuvā api nindyeta loka vṛttam jugupsitam

original: pradhānapuruṣācīrṇaṃ loko 'yam anuvartate // NsP_12.22 //
analyzed: pradhānapuruṣa ācīrṇam lokaḥ yam anuvartate

original: tasmād aninditaṃ dharmaṃ pradhānapuruṣaś caret /
analyzed: tasmāt aninditam dharmam pradhāna puruṣaḥ caret

original: ninditaṃ varjayed yatnād etad dharmasya lakṣaṇam // NsP_12.23 //
analyzed: ninditam varjayet yatnāt etat dharmasya lakṣaṇam

original: yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas tat tad evetaro janaḥ /
analyzed: yat yat ācarati śreṣṭhaḥ tat tat eva itaraḥ janaḥ

original: sa yat pramāṇaṃ kurute lokas tad anuvartate // NsP_12.24 //
analyzed: sa yat pramāṇam kurute lokaḥ tat anuvartate

original: atipāpam ahaṃ manye subhage vacanaṃ tava /
analyzed: ati pāpam aham manye subhage vacanam tava

original: viruddhaṃ sarvadharmeṣu lokeṣu ca viśeṣataḥ // NsP_12.25 //
analyzed: viruddham sarva dharmeṣu lokeṣu ca viśeṣataḥ

original: matto 'nyo yo bhaved yo vai viśiṣṭo rūpaśīlataḥ /
analyzed: mattaḥ nyaḥ yaḥ bhavet yaḥ vai viśiṣṭaḥ rūpa śīlataḥ

original: tena sārdhaṃ pramodasva na te bhartā bhavāmy aham // NsP_12.26 //
analyzed: tena sārdham pramodasva na te bhartā bhavāmi aham

original: nāhaṃ spṛśāmi tanvā te tanuṃ bhadre dṛḍhavrataḥ /
analyzed: na aham spṛśāmi tanvā te tanum bhadre dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: munayaḥ pāpam āhus taṃ yaḥ svasāraṃ nigṛhṇati // NsP_12.27 //
analyzed: munayaḥ pāpam āhuḥ tam yaḥ svasāram nigṛhṇati

original: yamy uvāca:
analyzed: yamī uvāca

original: durlabhaṃ caiva paśyāmi loke rūpam ihedṛśam /
analyzed: durlabham ca eva paśyāmi loke rūpam iha īdṛśam

original: yatra rūpaṃ vayaś caiva pṛthivyāṃ kva pratiṣṭhitam // NsP_12.28 //
analyzed: yatra rūpam vayaḥ ca eva pṛthivyām kva pratiṣṭhitam

original: na vijānāmi te cittaṃ kuta etat pratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: na vijānāmi te cittam kutas etat pratiṣṭhitam

original: ātmarūpaguṇopetāṃ na kāmayasi mohitām // NsP_12.29 //
analyzed: ātma rūpa guṇa upetām na kāmayasi mohitām

original: lateva pādape lagnā kāmaṃ tvaccharaṇaṃ gatā /
analyzed: latā iva pādape lagnā kāmam tvad śaraṇam gatā

original: bāhubhyāṃ saṃpariṣvajya nivasāmi śucismitā // NsP_12.30 //
analyzed: bāhubhyām saṃpariṣvajya nivasāmi śuci smitā

original: yama uvāca:
analyzed: yamaḥ uvāca

original: anyaṃ śrayasva suśroṇi devaṃ devy asitekṣaṇe /
analyzed: anyam śrayasva su śroṇi devam devi asita īkṣaṇe

original: yas tu te kāmamohena cetasā vibhramaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu te kāma mohena cetasā vibhramam gataḥ

original: tasya devasya devī tvaṃ bhavethā varavarṇini // NsP_12.31 //
analyzed: tasya devasya devī tvam bhavethāḥ varavarṇini

original: īpsitāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ varyāṃ śaṃsanti mānavāḥ /
analyzed: īpsitām sarva bhūtānām varyām śaṃsanti mānavāḥ

original: subhadrāṃ cārusarvāṅgīṃ saṃskṛtāṃ paricakṣate // NsP_12.32 //
analyzed: su bhadrām cāru sarva aṅgīm saṃskṛtām paricakṣate

original: tatkṛte 'pi suvidvāṃso na kariṣyanti dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: tad kṛte pi su vidvāṃsaḥ na kariṣyanti dūṣaṇam

original: paritāpaṃ mahāprājñe na kariṣye dṛḍhavrataḥ // NsP_12.33 //
analyzed: paritāpam mahā prājñe na kariṣye dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: cittaṃ me nirmalaṃ bhadre viṣṇau rudre ca saṃsthitam /
analyzed: cittam me nirmalam bhadre viṣṇau rudre ca saṃsthitam

original: ataḥ pāpaṃ nu necchāmi dharmacitto dṛḍhavrataḥ // NsP_12.34 //
analyzed: atas pāpam nu na icchāmi dharma cittaḥ dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: asakṛt procyamāno 'pi tayā caivaṃ dṛḍhavrataḥ /
analyzed: asakṛt tayā ca evam dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: kṛtavān na yamaḥ kāryaṃ tena devatvam āptavān // NsP_12.35 //
analyzed: kṛtavān na yamaḥ kāryam tena deva tvam āptavān

original: narāṇāṃ dṛḍhacittānām evaṃ pāpam akurvatām /
analyzed: narāṇām dṛḍha cittānām evam pāpam a kurvatām

original: anantaṃ phalam ity āhus teṣāṃ svargaphalaṃ bhavet // NsP_12.36 //
analyzed: anantam phalam iti āhuḥ teṣām svarga phalam bhavet

original: etat tu yamyupākhyānaṃ pūrvavṛttaṃ sanātanam /
analyzed: etat tu yamī upākhyānam pūrva vṛttam sanātanam

original: sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ śrotavyam anasūyayā // NsP_12.37 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa haram puṇyam śrotavyam anasūyayā

original: yaś caitat paṭhate nityaṃ havyakavyeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca etat paṭhate nityam havya kavyeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ

original: saṃtṛptāḥ pitaras tasya na viśanti yamālayam // NsP_12.38 //
analyzed: saṃtṛptāḥ pitaraḥ tasya na viśanti yama ālayam

original: yaś caitat paṭhate nityaṃ pitṝṇām anṛṇo bhavet /
analyzed: yaḥ ca etat paṭhate nityam pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavet

original: vaivasvatībhyas tīvrābhyo yātanābhyaḥ pramucyate // NsP_12.39 //
analyzed: vaivasvatībhyaḥ tīvrābhyaḥ yātanābhyaḥ pramucyate

original: putraitad ākhyānam anuttamaṃ mayā tavoditaṃ vedapadārthaniścitam /
analyzed: putra etat ākhyānam anuttamam mayā tava uditam veda padārtha niścitam

original: purātanaṃ pāpaharaṃ sadā nṛṇāṃ kim anyad adyaiva vadāmi śaṃsa me // NsP_12.40 //
analyzed: purātanam pāpa haram sadā nṛṇām kim anyat adyā eva vadāmi śaṃsa me

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe yamīyamasaṃvādo nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāya // NarP 12 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe yamīyamasaṃvādaḥ nāma dvādaśaḥ

original: śrīśuka uvāca:
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: vicitreyaṃ kathā tāta vaidikī me tvayeritā /
analyzed: vicitrā iyam kathā tāta vaidikī me tvayā īritā

original: anyāḥ puṇyāś ca me brūhi kathāḥ pāpapraṇāśinīḥ // NsP_13.1 //
analyzed: anyāḥ puṇyāḥ ca me brūhi kathāḥ pāpa praṇāśinīḥ

original: ahaṃ te kathayiṣyāmi purāvṛttam anuttamam /
analyzed: aham te kathayiṣyāmi purāvṛttam anuttamam

original: pativratāyāḥ saṃvādaṃ kasyacid brahmacāriṇaḥ // NsP_13.2 //
analyzed: pativratāyāḥ saṃvādam kasyacid brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: kaśyapo nītimān nāma brāhmaṇo vedapāragaḥ /
analyzed: kaśyapaḥ nītimān nāma brāhmaṇaḥ vedapāragaḥ

original: sarvaśāstrārthatattvajño vyākhyāne pariniṣṭhitaḥ // NsP_13.3 //
analyzed: sarva śāstra artha tattva jñaḥ vyākhyāne pariniṣṭhitaḥ

original: svadharmakāryanirataḥ paradharmaparāṅmukhaḥ /
analyzed: svadharma kārya nirataḥ para dharma parāṅmukhaḥ

original: ṛtukālābhigāmī ca agnihotraparāyaṇaḥ // NsP_13.4 //
analyzed: ṛtu kāla abhigāmī ca agnihotra parāyaṇaḥ

original: sāyaṃprātar mahābhāga hutvāgniṃ tarpayan dvijān /
analyzed: sāyaṃprātar mahābhāga hutvā agnim tarpayan dvijān

original: atithīn āgatān gehaṃ narasiṃhaṃ ca pujayat // NsP_13.5 //
analyzed: atithīn āgatān geham narasiṃham ca pujayat

original: tasya patnī mahābhāgā sāvitrī nāma nāmataḥ /
analyzed: tasya patnī mahābhāgā sāvitrī nāma nāmataḥ

original: pativratā mahābhāgā patyuḥ priyahite ratā // NsP_13.6 //
analyzed: pativratā mahābhāgā patyuḥ priya hite ratā

original: bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇenaiva dīrghakālam aninditā /
analyzed: bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇena eva dīrgha kālam aninditā

original: parokṣajñānam āpannā kalyāṇī guṇasaṃmatā // NsP_13.7 //
analyzed: parokṣa jñānam āpannā kalyāṇī guṇa saṃmatā

original: tayā saha sa dharmātmā madhyadeśe mahāmatiḥ /
analyzed: tayā saha sa dharma ātmā madhyadeśe mahāmatiḥ

original: nandigrāme vasan dhīmān svānuṣṭhānaparāyaṇaḥ // NsP_13.8 //
analyzed: nandigrāme vasan dhīmān sva anuṣṭhāna parāyaṇaḥ

original: atha kauśaliko vipro yajñaśarmā mahāmatiḥ /
analyzed: atha kauśalikaḥ vipraḥ yajñaśarmā mahāmatiḥ

original: tasya bhāryābhavat sādhvī rohiṇī nāma nāmataḥ // NsP_13.9 //
analyzed: tasya bhāryā bhavat sādhvī rohiṇī nāma nāmataḥ

original: sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannā patiśuśrūṣaṇe ratā /
analyzed: sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannā pati śuśrūṣaṇe ratā

original: sā prasūtā sutaṃ tv ekaṃ tasmād bhartur aninditā // NsP_13.10 //
analyzed: sā prasūtā sutam tu ekam tasmāt bhartuḥ aninditā

original: sa yāyāvaravṛttis tu putre jāte vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: sa yāyāvara vṛttiḥ tu putre jāte vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: jātakarma tadā cakre snātvā putrasya mantrataḥ // NsP_13.11 //
analyzed: jātakarma tadā cakre snātvā putrasya mantrataḥ

original: dvādaśe 'hani tasyaiva devaśarmeti buddhimān /
analyzed: dvādaśe hani tasya eva devaśarmā iti buddhimān

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu nāma cakre yathāvidhi // NsP_13.12 //
analyzed: puṇyāham vācayitvā tu nāma cakre yathāvidhi

original: upaniṣkramaṇaṃ caiva caturthe māsi yatnataḥ /
analyzed: upaniṣkramaṇam ca eva caturthe māsi yatnataḥ

original: tathānnaprāśanaṃ ṣaṣṭhe māsi cakre yathāvidhi // NsP_13.13 //
analyzed: tathā annaprāśanam ṣaṣṭhe māsi cakre yathāvidhi

original: saṃvatsare tataḥ pūrṇe cūḍākarma ca dharmavit /
analyzed: saṃvatsare tatas pūrṇe cūḍākarma ca dharma vid

original: kṛtvā garbhāṣṭame varṣe vratabandhaṃ cakāra saḥ // NsP_13.14 //
analyzed: kṛtvā garbha aṣṭame varṣe vrata bandham cakāra saḥ

original: sopanīto yathānyāyaṃ pitrā vedam adhītavān /
analyzed: sa upanītaḥ yathānyāyam pitrā vedam adhītavān

original: svīkṛte tv ekavede tu pitā svarlokam āsthitaḥ // NsP_13.15 //
analyzed: svīkṛte tu eka vede tu pitā svar lokam āsthitaḥ

original: mātrā sahāsa duḥkhī sa pitary uparate sutaḥ /
analyzed: mātrā saha āsa duḥkhī sa pitari uparate sutaḥ

original: dhairyam āsthāya medhāvī sādhubhiḥ preritaḥ punaḥ // NsP_13.16 //
analyzed: dhairyam āsthāya medhāvī sādhubhiḥ preritaḥ punar

original: pretakāryāṇi kṛtvā tu devaśarmā gataḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: pretakāryāṇi kṛtvā tu devaśarmā gataḥ sutaḥ

original: gaṅgādiṣu sutīrtheṣu snānaṃ kṛtvā yathāvidhi // NsP_13.17 //
analyzed: gaṅgā ādiṣu su tīrtheṣu snānam kṛtvā yathāvidhi

original: tam eva prāptavān grāmaṃ yatrāste sā pativratā /
analyzed: tam eva prāptavān grāmam yatra āste sā pativratā

original: saṃprāpya viśrutaḥ so 'tha brahmacārī mahāmate // NsP_13.18 //
analyzed: saṃprāpya viśrutaḥ saḥ tha brahmacārī mahāmate

original: bhikṣāṭanaṃ tu kṛtvāsau japan vedam atandritaḥ /
analyzed: bhikṣāṭanam tu kṛtvā asau japan vedam atandritaḥ

original: kurvann evāgnikāryaṃ tu nandigrāme ca tasthivān // NsP_13.19 //
analyzed: kurvan evā agni kāryam tu nandigrāme ca tasthivān

original: mṛte bhartari tanmātā putre pravrajite tu sā /
analyzed: mṛte bhartari tad mātā putre pravrajite tu sā

original: duḥkhād duḥkham anuprāptā niyataṃ rakṣakaṃ vinā // NsP_13.20 //
analyzed: duḥkhāt duḥkham anuprāptāḥ niyatam rakṣakam vinā

original: atha snātvā tu nadyāṃ vai brahmacārī svakarpaṭam /
analyzed: atha snātvā tu nadyām vai brahmacārī sva karpaṭam

original: kṣitau prasārya śoṣārthaṃ japann āsīta vāgyataḥ // NsP_13.21 //
analyzed: kṣitau prasārya śoṣa artham japan āsīta vāgyataḥ

original: kāko balākā tad vastraṃ parigṛhyāśu jagmatuḥ /
analyzed: kākaḥ balākā tat vastram parigṛhya āśu jagmatuḥ

original: tau dṛṣṭvā bhartsayām_asa devaśarmā tato dvijaḥ // NsP_13.22 //
analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā bhartsayāmasa devaśarmā tatas dvijaḥ

original: viṣṭhām utsṛjya vastre tu jagmatus tasya bhartsanāt /
analyzed: viṣṭhām utsṛjya vastre tu jagmatuḥ tasya bhartsanāt

original: roṣeṇa vīkṣayām_asa khe yāntau pakṣiṇau tu saḥ // NsP_13.23 //
analyzed: roṣeṇa vīkṣayāmasa khe yāntau pakṣiṇau tu saḥ

original: tadroṣavahninā dagdhau bhūmyāṃ nipatitau khagau /
analyzed: tad roṣa vahninā dagdhau bhūmyām nipatitau khagau

original: sa dṛṣṭvā tau kṣitiṃ yātau pakṣiṇau vismayaṃ gataḥ // NsP_13.24 //
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā tau kṣitim yātau pakṣiṇau vismayam gataḥ

original: tapasā na mayā kaścit sadṛśo 'sti mahītale /
analyzed: tapasā na mayā kaścid sadṛśaḥ sti mahī tale

original: iti matvā gato bhikṣām aṭituṃ grāmam añjasā // NsP_13.25 //
analyzed: iti matvā gataḥ bhikṣām aṭitum grāmam añjasā

original: aṭan brāhmaṇageheṣu brahmacārī tapaḥsmayī /
analyzed: aṭan brāhmaṇa geheṣu brahmacārī tapaḥsmayī

original: praviṣṭas tad gṛhaṃ vatsa gṛhe yatra pativratā // NsP_13.26 //
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ tat gṛham vatsa gṛhe yatra pativratā

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā yācyamānāpi tena bhikṣāṃ pativratā /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā yācyamānā api tena bhikṣām pativratā

original: vāgyatā pūrvaṃ vijñāya bhartuḥ kṛtvānuśāsanam // NsP_13.27 //
analyzed: vāgyatā pūrvam vijñāya bhartuḥ kṛtvā anuśāsanam

original: kṣālayām_asa tatpādau bhūya uṣṇena vārinā /
analyzed: kṣālayāmasa tad pādau bhūyas uṣṇena vārinā

original: āśvāsya svapatiṃ sā tu bhikṣāṃ dātuṃ pracakrame // NsP_13.28 //
analyzed: āśvāsya sva patim sā tu bhikṣām dātum pracakrame

original: tataḥ krodhena raktākṣo brahmacārī pativratām /
analyzed: tatas krodhena rakta akṣaḥ brahmacārī pativratām

original: dagdhukāmas tapovīryāt punaḥ punar udaikṣata /
analyzed: dagdhu kāmaḥ tapaḥ vīryāt punar punar udaikṣata

original: sāvitrī tu nirīkṣyaivaṃ hasantī sā tam abravīt // NsP_13.29 //
analyzed: sāvitrī tu nirīkṣya evam hasantī sā tam abravīt

original: na kāko na balākāhaṃ tvatkrodhena tu yau mṛtau /
analyzed: na kākaḥ na balākā aham tvad krodhena tu yau mṛtau

original: nadītīre 'dya kopātman bhikṣāṃ matto yadīcchasi // NsP_13.30 //
analyzed: nadī tīre dya kopa ātman bhikṣām mattaḥ yadi icchasi

original: tayaivam uktaḥ sāvitryā bhikṣām ādāya so 'grataḥ /
analyzed: tayā evam uktaḥ sāvitryā bhikṣām ādāya saḥ gratas

original: cintayan manasā tasyāḥ śaktiṃ dūrārthavedinīm // NsP_13.31 //
analyzed: cintayan manasā tasyāḥ śaktim dūra artha vedinīm

original: etyāśrame maṭhe sthāpya bhikṣāpātraṃ prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: eti āśrame maṭhe sthāpya bhikṣā pātram prayatnataḥ

original: pativratāyāṃ bhuktāyāṃ gṛhasthe nirgate patau // NsP_13.32 //
analyzed: pativratāyām bhuktāyām gṛhasthe nirgate patau

original: punar āgamya tadgehaṃ tām uvāca pativratām // NsP_13.33ab //
analyzed: punar āgamya tad geham tām uvāca pativratām

original: brahmacāry uvāca:
analyzed: brahmacārī uvāca

original: prabrūhy etan mahābhāge pṛcchato me yathārthataḥ // NsP_13.33cd //
analyzed: prabrūhi etat mahābhāge pṛcchataḥ me yathārthataḥ

original: viprakṛṣṭārthavijñānaṃ katham āśu tavābhavat /
analyzed: viprakṛṣṭa artha vijñānam katham āśu tava abhavat

original: ityuktā tena sā sādhvī sāvitrī tu pativratā // NsP_13.34 //
analyzed: iti uktā tena sā sādhvī sāvitrī tu pativratā

original: taṃ brahmacāriṇaṃ prāha pṛcchantaṃ gṛham etya vai /
analyzed: tam brahmacāriṇam prāha pṛcchantam gṛham etya vai

original: śṛṇuṣvāvahito brahman yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // NsP_13.35 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ brahman yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi

original: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi svadharmaparibṛṃhitam /
analyzed: tat te ham saṃpravakṣyāmi svadharma paribṛṃhitam

original: strīṇāṃ tu patiśuśrūṣā dharma eṣa paristhitaḥ // NsP_13.36 //
analyzed: strīṇām tu pati śuśrūṣā dharmaḥ eṣa paristhitaḥ

original: tam evāhaṃ sadā kuryāṃ nānyam asmi mahāmate /
analyzed: tam eva aham sadā kuryām na anyam asmi mahāmate

original: divārātram asaṃdigdhaṃ śraddhayā paritoṣaṇam // NsP_13.37 //
analyzed: divārātram asaṃdigdham śraddhayā paritoṣaṇam

original: kurvantyā mama saṃbhūtaṃ viprakṛṣṭārthadarśanam /
analyzed: kurvantyāḥ mama saṃbhūtam viprakṛṣṭa artha darśanam

original: anyac ca te pravakṣyāmi nibodha tvaṃ yadīcchasi // NsP_13.38 //
analyzed: anyat ca te pravakṣyāmi nibodha tvam yadi icchasi

original: pitā yāyāvaraḥ śuddhas tasmād vedam adhītya vai /
analyzed: pitā yāyāvaraḥ śuddhaḥ tasmāt vedam adhītya vai

original: mṛte pitari kṛtvā tu pretakāryam ihāgataḥ // NsP_13.39 //
analyzed: mṛte pitari kṛtvā tu pretakāryam iha āgataḥ

original: utsṛjya mātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ vṛddhāṃ dīnāṃ tapasvinīm /
analyzed: utsṛjya mātaram draṣṭum vṛddhām dīnām tapasvinīm

original: anāthāṃ vidhavām atra nityaṃ svodaraposakaḥ // NsP_13.40 //
analyzed: anāthām vidhavām atra nityam sva udara posakaḥ

original: yayā garbhe dhṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ pālito lālitas tathā /
analyzed: yayā garbhe dhṛtaḥ pūrvam pālitaḥ lālitaḥ tathā

original: tāṃ tyaktvā vipine dharmaṃ caran vipra na lajjase // NsP_13.41 //
analyzed: tām tyaktvā vipine dharmam caran vipra na lajjase

original: yayā tava kṛtaṃ brahman bālye malanikṛntanam /
analyzed: yayā tava kṛtam brahman bālye mala nikṛntanam

original: duḥkhitāṃ tāṃ gṛhe tyaktvā kiṃ bhaved vipine 'ṭataḥ // NsP_13.42 //
analyzed: duḥkhitām tām gṛhe tyaktvā kim bhavet vipine

original: mātṛduḥkhena te vaktraṃ pūtigandham idaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: mātṛ duḥkhena te vaktram pūti gandham idam bhavet

original: pitraiva saṃskṛto yasmāt tasmāc chaktir abhūd iyam // NsP_13.43 //
analyzed: pitrā eva saṃskṛtaḥ yasmāt tasmāt śaktiḥ abhūt iyam

original: pakṣī dagdhaḥ sudurbuddhe pāpātman sāṃprataṃ vṛthā /
analyzed: pakṣī dagdhaḥ su durbuddhe pāpa ātman sāṃpratam vṛthā

original: vṛthā snānaṃ vṛthā tīrthaṃ vṛthā japtaṃ vṛthā hutam // NsP_13.44 //
analyzed: vṛthā snānam vṛthā tīrtham vṛthā japtam vṛthā hutam

original: sa jīvati vṛthā brahman yasya mātā suduḥkhitā /
analyzed: sa jīvati vṛthā brahman yasya mātā su duḥkhitā

original: yo rakṣet satataṃ bhaktyā mātaraṃ mātṛvatsalaḥ // NsP_13.45 //
analyzed: yaḥ rakṣet satatam bhaktyā mātaram mātṛ vatsalaḥ

original: tasyehānuṣṭhitaṃ sarvaṃ phalaṃ cāmutra ceha hi /
analyzed: tasya iha anuṣṭhitam sarvam phalam ca amutra ca iha hi

original: mātuś ca vacanaṃ brahman pālitaṃ yair narottamaiḥ // NsP_13.46 //
analyzed: mātuḥ ca vacanam brahman pālitam yaiḥ nara uttamaiḥ

original: te mānyās te namaskāryā iha loke paratra ca /
analyzed: te mānyāḥ te namaskāryāḥ iha loke paratra ca

original: atas tvaṃ tatra gatvādya yatra mātā vyavasthitā // NsP_13.47 //
analyzed: atas tvam tatra gatvā adya yatra mātā vyavasthitā

original: tāṃ tvaṃ rakṣaya jīvantīṃ tadrakṣā te paraṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: tām tvam rakṣaya jīvantīm tat rakṣā te param tapaḥ

original: krodhaṃ parityajainaṃ tvaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavighātakam // NsP_13.48 //
analyzed: krodham parityaja enam tvam dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa vighātakam

original: tayoḥ kuru vadhe śuddhiṃ pakṣiṇor ātmaśuddhaye /
analyzed: tayoḥ kuru vadhe śuddhim pakṣiṇoḥ ātma śuddhaye

original: yāthātathyena kathitam etat sarvaṃ mayā tava // NsP_13.49 //
analyzed: yāthātathyena kathitam etat sarvam mayā tava

original: brahmacārin kuruṣva tvaṃ yadīcchasi satāṃ gatim /
analyzed: brahmacārin kuruṣva tvam yadi icchasi satām gatim

original: ity uktvā virarāmātha dvijaputraṃ pativratā // NsP_13.50 //
analyzed: iti uktvā virarāma atha dvija putram pativratā

original: so 'pi tām āha bhūyo 'pi sāvitrīṃ tu kṣamāpayan /
analyzed: saḥ pi tām āha bhūyas pi sāvitrīm tu kṣamāpayan

original: ajñānāt kṛtapāpasya kṣamasva varavarṇini // NsP_13.51 //
analyzed: ajñānāt kṛta pāpasya kṣamasva varavarṇini

original: mayā tavāhitaṃ yac ca kṛtaṃ krodhanirīkṣaṇam /
analyzed: mayā tava ahitam yat ca kṛtam krodha nirīkṣaṇam

original: tat kṣamasva mahābhāge hitam uktaṃ pativrate // NsP_13.52 //
analyzed: tat kṣamasva mahābhāge hitam uktam pativrate

original: tatra gatvā mayā yāni karmāṇi tu śubhavrate /
analyzed: tatra gatvā mayā yāni karmāṇi tu śubha vrate

original: kāryāṇi tāni me brūhi yathā me sugatir bhavet // NsP_13.53 //
analyzed: kāryāṇi tāni me brūhi yathā me su gatiḥ bhavet

original: tenaivaṃ uktā sāpy āha taṃ pṛcchantaṃ pativratā /
analyzed: tena evam uktā sā api āha tam pṛcchantam pativratā

original: yāni kāryāṇi vakṣyāmi tvayā karmāṇi me śṛṇu // NsP_13.54 //
analyzed: yāni kāryāṇi vakṣyāmi tvayā karmāṇi me śṛṇu

original: poṣyā mātā tvayā tatra niścayaṃ bhaikṣavṛttinā /
analyzed: poṣyā mātā tvayā tatra niścayam bhaikṣa vṛttinā

original: atra vā tatra vā brahman prāyaścittaṃ ca pakṣiṇoḥ // NsP_13.55 //
analyzed: atra vā tatra vā brahman prāyaścittam ca pakṣiṇoḥ

original: yajñaśarmasutā kanyā bhāryā tava bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: yajñaśarma sutā kanyā bhāryā tava bhaviṣyati

original: tāṃ gṛhṇīṣva ca dharmeṇa gate tvayi sa dāsyati // NsP_13.56 //
analyzed: tām gṛhṇīṣva ca dharmeṇa gate tvayi sa dāsyati

original: putras te bhavitā tasyām ekaḥ saṃtativardhanaḥ /
analyzed: putraḥ te bhavitā tasyām ekaḥ saṃtati vardhanaḥ

original: yāyāvaradhanād vṛttiḥ pitṛvat te bhaviṣyati // NsP_13.57 //
analyzed: yāyāvara dhanāt vṛttiḥ pitṛ vat te bhaviṣyati

original: punar mṛtāyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ bhavitā tvaṃ tridaṇḍakaḥ /
analyzed: punar mṛtāyām bhāryāyām bhavitā tvam tridaṇḍakaḥ

original: sa yatyāśramadharmeṇa yathoktyānuṣṭhitena ca /
analyzed: sa yati āśrama dharmeṇa yathā uktyā anuṣṭhitena ca

original: narasiṃhaprasādena vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āpsyasi // NsP_13.58 //
analyzed: narasiṃha prasādena vaiṣṇavam padam āpsyasi

original: bhāvyam etat tu kathitaṃ mayā tava hi pṛcchataḥ /
analyzed: bhāvyam etat tu kathitam mayā tava hi pṛcchataḥ

original: manyase nānṛtaṃ tv etat kuru sarvaṃ hi me vacaḥ // NsP_13.59 //
analyzed: manyase na anṛtam tu etat kuru sarvam hi me vacaḥ

original: brāhmaṇa uvāca:
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: gacchāmi mātṛrakṣārtham adyaivāhaṃ pativrate /
analyzed: gacchāmi mātṛ rakṣā artham adya eva aham pativrate

original: kariṣye tvadvacaḥ sarvaṃ tatra gatvā śubhekṣaṇe // NsP_13.60 //
analyzed: kariṣye tvad vacaḥ sarvam tatra gatvā śubha īkṣaṇe

original: ity uktvā gatavān brahman devaśarmā tatas tvaran /
analyzed: iti uktvā gatavān brahman devaśarmā tatas tvaran

original: saṃrakṣya mātaraṃ yatnāt krodhamohavivarjitaḥ // NsP_13.61 //
analyzed: saṃrakṣya mātaram yatnāt krodha moha vivarjitaḥ

original: kṛtvā vivāham utpādya putraṃ vaṃśakaraṃ śubham /
analyzed: kṛtvā vivāham utpādya putram vaṃśa karam śubham

original: mṛtabhāryaś ca saṃnyasya samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ /
analyzed: mṛta bhāryaḥ ca saṃnyasya sama loṣṭa aśma kāñcanaḥ

original: narasiṃhaprasādena parāṃ siddhim avāptavān // NsP_13.62 //
analyzed: narasiṃha prasādena parām siddhim avāptavān

original: pativratāśaktir iyaṃ taveritā dharmaś ca mātuḥ parirakṣaṇaṃ param /
analyzed: pativratā śaktiḥ iyam tava īritā dharmaḥ ca mātuḥ parirakṣaṇam param

original: saṃsāravṛkṣaṃ ca nihatya bandhanaṃ chitvā ca viṣṇoḥ padam eti mānavaḥ // NsP_13.63 //
analyzed: saṃsāra vṛkṣam ca nihatya bandhanam chitvā ca viṣṇoḥ padam eti mānavaḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe brahmacārisaṃvādo nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāya // NarP 13 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe brahmacārisaṃvādaḥ nāma trayodaśaḥ dhyāya

original: vyāsa uvāca:
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu vatsa mahābuddhe śiṣyāś caitāṃ parāṃ kathām /
analyzed: śṛṇu vatsa mahābuddhe śiṣyāḥ ca etām parām kathām

original: mayocyamānāṃ śṛṇvantu sarvapāpapraṇāśinīm // NsP_14.1 //
analyzed: mayā ucyamānām śṛṇvantu sarva pāpa praṇāśinīm

original: purā dvijavaraḥ kaścid vedaśāstraviśāradaḥ /
analyzed: purā dvijavaraḥ kaścid veda śāstra viśāradaḥ

original: mṛtabhāryo gatas tīrthaṃ cakre snānaṃ yathāvidhi // NsP_14.2 //
analyzed: mṛta bhāryaḥ gataḥ tīrtham cakre snānam yathāvidhi

original: tapaḥ sutaptaṃ vijane niḥspṛho dārakarmaṇi /
analyzed: tapaḥ su taptam vijane niḥspṛhaḥ dārakarmaṇi

original: bhikṣāhāraḥ pravasito japasnānaparāyaṇaḥ // NsP_14.3 //
analyzed: bhikṣā āhāraḥ pravasitaḥ japa snāna parāyaṇaḥ

original: snātvā sa gaṅgāṃ yamunāṃ sarasvatīṃ puṇyāṃ vitastām atha gomatīṃ ca /
analyzed: snātvā sa gaṅgām yamunām sarasvatīm puṇyām vitastām atha gomatīm ca

original: gayāṃ samāsādya pitṛn pitāmahān saṃtarpayan san gatavān mahendram // NsP_14.4 //
analyzed: gayām samāsādya pitṛn pitāmahān saṃtarpayan san gatavān mahendram

original: tatrāpi kuṇḍeṣu girau mahāmatiḥ snātvā nu dṛṣṭvā bhṛgunandanottamam /
analyzed: tatra api kuṇḍeṣu girau mahāmatiḥ snātvā nu dṛṣṭvā bhṛgunandana uttamam

original: kṛtvā pitṛbhyas tu tathaiva tṛptiṃ vrajan vanaṃ pāpaharaṃ praviṣṭaḥ // NsP_14.5 //
analyzed: kṛtvā pitṛbhyaḥ tu tathā eva tṛptim vrajan vanam pāpa haram praviṣṭaḥ

original: dhārāṃ patantīṃ mahatīṃ śiloccayāt saṃdhārya bhaktyā tv anu nārasiṃhe /
analyzed: dhārām patantīm mahatīm śiloccayāt saṃdhārya bhaktyā tu anu nārasiṃhe

original: śirasy aśeṣāghavināśinīṃ tadā viśuddhadehaḥ sa babhūva vipraḥ // NsP_14.6 //
analyzed: śirasi aśeṣa agha vināśinīm tadā viśuddha dehaḥ sa babhūva vipraḥ

original: vindhyācale saktam anantam acyutaṃ bhaktair munīndrair api pūjitaṃ sadā /
analyzed: vindhya acale saktam anantam acyutam bhaktaiḥ muni indraiḥ api pūjitam sadā

original: ārādhya puṣpair girisaṃbhavair śubhais tatraiva siddhiṃ tv abhikāṅkṣya saṃsthitaḥ // NsP_14.7 //
analyzed: ārādhya puṣpaiḥ giri saṃbhavaiḥ śubhaiḥ tatra eva siddhim tu abhikāṅkṣya saṃsthitaḥ

original: sa nārasiṃho bahukālapūjayā tuṣṭaḥ sunidrāgatam āha bhaktam /
analyzed: sa nārasiṃhaḥ bahu kāla pūjayā tuṣṭaḥ sunidrā gatam āha bhaktam

original: anāśramitvaṃ gṛhabhaṅgakāraṇaṃ hy ato gṛhāṇāśramam uttamaṃ dvija // NsP_14.8 //
analyzed: anāśrami tvam gṛha bhaṅga kāraṇam hi atas gṛhāṇa āśramam uttamam dvija

original: anāśramīti dvija vedapāragān api tv ahaṃ nānugṛhṇāmi cātra /
analyzed: anāśramī iti dvija vedapāragān api tu aham na anugṛhṇāmi ca atra

original: tathāpi niṣṭhāṃ tava vīkṣya sattama tvayi prasannena mayety udīritam // NsP_14.9 //
analyzed: tathā api niṣṭhām tava vīkṣya sattama tvayi prasannena mayā iti udīritam

original: tenaivam uktaḥ parameśvareṇa dvijo 'pi buddhyā pravicintya vākyam /
analyzed: tena evam uktaḥ parameśvareṇa dvijaḥ buddhyā pravicintya vākyam

original: harer alaṅghyaṃ narasiṃhamūrter bhādhaṃ ca kṛtvā sa yatir babhūva // NsP_14.10 //
analyzed: hareḥ a laṅghyam narasiṃha mūrteḥ bhādham ca kṛtvā sa yatiḥ babhūva

original: tridaṇḍavṛkṣākṣapavitrapāṇir āplutya toye tv aghahāriṇi sthitaḥ /
analyzed: tridaṇḍa vṛkṣa akṣa pavitra pāṇiḥ āplutya toye tu agha hāriṇi sthitaḥ

original: japan sadā mantram apāstadoṣaṃ sāvitryam īśaṃ hṛdaye smaran harim // NsP_14.11 //
analyzed: japan sadā mantram apāsta doṣam sāvitryam īśam hṛdaye smaran harim

original: yathākathaṃcit pratilabhya śākaṃ bhaikṣyābhituṣṭo vanavāsavāsī /
analyzed: yathā kathaṃcid pratilabhya śākam bhaikṣya abhituṣṭaḥ vana vāsa vāsī

original: abhyarcya viṣṇuṃ narasiṃhamūrtiṃ dhyātvā ca nityaṃ hṛdi śuddham ādyam // NsP_14.12 //
analyzed: abhyarcya viṣṇum narasiṃha mūrtim dhyātvā ca nityam hṛdi śuddham ādyam

original: viviktadeśe vipule kuśāsane niveśya sarvaṃ hṛdaye 'sya sarvam /
analyzed: vivikta deśe vipule kuśa āsane niveśya sarvam hṛdaye sya sarvam

original: bāhyaṃ samastaṃ guṇam indriyāṇāṃ vilīya bhedaṃ bhagavaty anante // NsP_14.13 //
analyzed: bāhyam samastam guṇam indriyāṇām vilīya bhedam bhagavati anante

original: vijñeyam ānandam ajaṃ viśālaṃ satyātmakaṃ kṣemapadaṃ vareṇyam /
analyzed: vijñeyam ānandam ajam viśālam satya ātmakam kṣema padam vareṇyam

original: saṃcintya tasmin pravihāya dehaṃ babhūva muktaḥ paramātmarūpī // NsP_14.14 //
analyzed: saṃcintya tasmin pravihāya deham babhūva muktaḥ paramātma rūpī

original: imāṃ kathāṃ muktiparāṃ yathoktāṃ paṭhanti ye nārasiṃhaṃ smarantaḥ /
analyzed: imām kathām mukti parām yathā uktām paṭhanti ye nārasiṃham smarantaḥ

original: prayāgatīrthaplavane tu yat phalaṃ tat prāpya te yānti hareḥ padaṃ mahat // NsP_14.15 //
analyzed: prayāga tīrtha plavane tu yat phalam tat prāpya te yānti hareḥ padam mahat

original: ity etad uktaṃ tava putra pṛcchataḥ purātanaṃ puṇyatamaṃ pavitrakam /
analyzed: iti etat uktam tava putra pṛcchataḥ purātanam puṇyatamam pavitrakam

original: saṃsāravṛkṣasya vināśanaṃ paraṃ punaḥ kam icchasy abhivāñchitaṃ vada // NsP_14.16 //
analyzed: saṃsāra vṛkṣasya vināśanam param punar kam icchasi abhivāñchitam vada

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe caturdaśo 'dhyāya // NarP 14 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe caturdaśaḥ dhyāya

original: śrīśuka uvāca:
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ tāta sāṃprataṃ munibhiḥ saha /
analyzed: śrotum icchāmi aham tāta sāṃpratam munibhiḥ saha

original: saṃsāravṛkṣaṃ sakalaṃ yenedaṃ parivartate // NsP_15.1 //
analyzed: saṃsāra vṛkṣam sakalam yena idam parivartate

original: vaktum arhasi me tāta tvayaitat sūcitaṃ purā /
analyzed: vaktum arhasi me tāta tvayā etat sūcitam purā

original: nānyo vetti mahābhāga saṃsāroccāralakṣaṇam // NsP_15.2 //
analyzed: na anyaḥ vetti mahābhāga saṃsāra uccāra lakṣaṇam

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: sa putreṇaivam uktas tu śiṣyāṇāṃ madhyagena ca /
analyzed: sa putreṇa evam uktaḥ tu śiṣyāṇām madhya gena ca

original: kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prāha saṃsāratarulakṣaṇam // NsP_15.3 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prāha saṃsāra taru lakṣaṇam

original: vyāsa uvāca:

original: rākāraṃ kuṅkumābhaṃ tu yakāraṃ pītam ucyate /
analyzed: rākāram kuṅkuma ābham tu yakāram pītam ucyate

original: ṇākāram añjanābhaṃ tu yakāraṃ bahuvarṇakam // NsP_17.7 //
analyzed: ṇākāram añjana ābham tu yakāram bahu varṇakam

original: oṃ namo nārāyaṇāyeti mantraḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ /
analyzed: om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti mantraḥ sarva artha sādhakaḥ

original: bhaktānāṃ japatāṃ tāta svargamokṣaphalapradaḥ /
analyzed: bhaktānām japatām tāta svarga mokṣa phala pradaḥ

original: vedānāṃ praṇayenaiṣa siddho mantraḥ sanātanaḥ // NsP_17.8 //
analyzed: vedānām praṇayena eṣa siddhaḥ mantraḥ sanātanaḥ

original: sarvapāpaharaḥ śrīmān sarvamantreṣu cottamaḥ /
analyzed: sarva pāpa haraḥ śrīmān sarva mantreṣu ca uttamaḥ

original: enam aṣṭākṣaraṃ mantraṃ japan nārāyaṇaṃ smaret // NsP_17.9 //
analyzed: enam aṣṭa akṣaram mantram japan nārāyaṇam smaret

original: saṃdhyāvasāne satataṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate /
analyzed: saṃdhyā avasāne satatam sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: eṣa eva paro mantra eṣa eva paraṃ tapaḥ // NsP_17.10 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva paraḥ mantraḥ eṣaḥ eva param tapaḥ

original: eṣa eva paro mokṣa eṣa svarga udāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva paraḥ mokṣaḥ eṣa svargaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: sarvavedarahasyebhyaḥ sāra eṣa samuddhṛtaḥ // NsP_17.11 //
analyzed: sarva veda rahasyebhyaḥ sāraḥ eṣa samuddhṛtaḥ

original: viṣṇunā vaiṣṇavānāṃ hi hitāya manujāṃ purā /
analyzed: viṣṇunā vaiṣṇavānām hi hitāya manujām purā

original: evaṃ jñātvā tato vipro hy aṣṭākṣaram imaṃ smaret // NsP_17.12 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā tatas vipraḥ hi aṣṭa akṣaram imam smaret

original: snātvā śuciḥ śucau deśe japet pāpaviśuddhaye /
analyzed: snātvā śuciḥ śucau deśe japet pāpa viśuddhaye

original: jape dāne ca home ca gamane dhyānaparvasu // NsP_17.13 //
analyzed: jape dāne ca home ca gamane dhyāna parvasu

original: japen nārāyaṇaṃ mantraṃ karmapūrve pare tathā /
analyzed: japet nārāyaṇam mantram karma pūrve pare tathā

original: japet sahasraṃ niyutaṃ śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥ // NsP_17.14 //
analyzed: japet sahasram niyutam śuciḥ bhūtvā samāhitaḥ

original: māsi māsi tu dvādaśyāṃ viṣṇubhakto dvijottamaḥ /
analyzed: māsi māsi tu dvādaśyām viṣṇu bhaktaḥ dvijottamaḥ

original: snātvā śucir japed yas tu namo nārāyaṇaṃ śatam // NsP_17.15 //
analyzed: snātvā śuciḥ japet yaḥ tu namaḥ nārāyaṇam śatam

original: sa gacchet paramaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇam anāmayam /
analyzed: sa gacchet paramam devam nārāyaṇam anāmayam

original: gandhapuṣpādibhir viṣṇum anenārādhya yo japet // NsP_17.16 //
analyzed: gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ viṣṇum anena ārādhya yaḥ japet

original: mahāpātakayukto 'pi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: mahāpātaka yuktaḥ upi mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: hṛdi kṛtvā hariṃ devaṃ mantram enaṃ tu yo japet // NsP_17.17 //
analyzed: hṛdi kṛtvā harim devam mantram enam tu yaḥ japet

original: sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: sarva pāpa viśuddha ātmā sa gacchet paramām gatim

original: prathamena tu lakṣeṇa ātmaśuddhir bhaviṣyati // NsP_17.18 //
analyzed: prathamena tu lakṣeṇa ātma śuddhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: dvitīyena tu lakṣeṇa manusiddhim avāpnuyāt /
analyzed: dvitīyena tu lakṣeṇa manu siddhim avāpnuyāt

original: tṛtīyena tu lakṣeṇa svargalokam avāpnuyāt // NsP_17.19 //
analyzed: tṛtīyena tu lakṣeṇa svarga lokam avāpnuyāt

original: caturthena tu lakṣeṇa hareḥ sāmipyam āpnuyāt /
analyzed: caturthena tu lakṣeṇa hareḥ sāmipyam āpnuyāt

original: pañcamena tu lakṣeṇa nirmalaṃ jñānam āpnuyāt // NsP_17.20 //
analyzed: pañcamena tu lakṣeṇa nirmalam jñānam āpnuyāt

original: tathā ṣaṣṭhena lakṣeṇa bhaved viṣṇau sthirā matiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ṣaṣṭhena lakṣeṇa bhavet viṣṇau sthirā matiḥ

original: saptamena tu lakṣeṇa svarūpaṃ pratipadyate // NsP_17.21 //
analyzed: saptamena tu lakṣeṇa sva rūpam pratipadyate

original: aṣṭamena tu lakṣeṇa nirvāṇam adhigacchati /
analyzed: aṣṭamena tu lakṣeṇa nirvāṇam adhigacchati

original: svasvadharmasamāyuktaṃ japaṃ kuryād dvijottamaḥ // NsP_17.22 //
analyzed: sva svadharma samāyuktam japam kuryāt dvijottamaḥ

original: etat siddhikaraṃ mantram aṣṭākṣaram atandritaḥ /
analyzed: etat siddhi karam mantram aṣṭa akṣaram atandritaḥ

original: duḥsvapnāsurapaiśācā uragā brahmarākṣasāḥ // NsP_17.23 //
analyzed: duḥsvapna asura paiśācāḥ uragāḥ brahmarākṣasāḥ

original: jāpinaṃ nopasarpanti caurakṣudrādhayas tathā /
analyzed: jāpinam na upasarpanti caura kṣudra ādhayaḥ tathā

original: ekāgramanasāvyāgro viṣṇubhakto dṛḍhavrataḥ // NsP_17.24 //
analyzed: ekāgra manasā avyāgraḥ viṣṇu bhaktaḥ dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: japen nārāyaṇaṃ mantram etan mṛtyubhayāpaham /
analyzed: japet nārāyaṇam mantram etat mṛtyu bhaya apaham

original: mantrāṇāṃ paramo mantro devatānāṃ ca daivatam // NsP_17.25 //
analyzed: mantrāṇām paramaḥ mantraḥ devatānām ca daivatam

original: guhyānāṃ paramaṃ guhyam oṃkārādyakṣarāṣṭakam /
analyzed: guhyānām paramam guhyam oṃkāra ādi akṣara aṣṭakam

original: āyuṣyaṃ dhanaputrāṃś ca paśūn vidyāṃ mahad yaśaḥ // NsP_17.26 //
analyzed: āyuṣyam dhana putrān ca paśūn vidyām mahat yaśaḥ

original: dharmārthakāmamokṣāṃś ca labhate ca japan naraḥ /
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣān ca labhate ca japan naraḥ

original: etat satyaṃ ca dharmyaṃ ca vedaśrutinidarśanāt // NsP_17.27 //
analyzed: etat satyam ca dharmyam ca veda śruti nidarśanāt

original: etat siddhikaraṃ nṝṇāṃ mantrarūpaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: etat siddhi karam nṝṇām mantra rūpam na saṃśayaḥ

original: ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devāḥ siddhās tv asurarākṣasāḥ // NsP_17.28 //
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ pitaraḥ devāḥ siddhāḥ tu asura rākṣasāḥ

original: etad eva paraṃ japtvā parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ /
analyzed: etat eva param japtvā parām siddhim itas gatāḥ

original: jñātvā yas tv ātmanaḥ kālaṃ śāstrāntaravidhānataḥ /
analyzed: jñātvā yaḥ tu ātmanaḥ kālam śāstra antara vidhānataḥ

original: antakāle japann eti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NsP_17.29 //
analyzed: antakāle japan eti tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam

original: nārāyaṇāya nama ity ayam eva satyaṃ saṃsāraghoraviṣasaṃharaṇāya mantraḥ /
analyzed: nārāyaṇāya namaḥ iti ayam eva satyam saṃsāra ghora viṣa saṃharaṇāya mantraḥ

original: śṛṇvantu bhavyamatayo muditās tvarāgā uccais tarām upadiśāmy aham ūrdhvabāhuḥ // NsP_17.30 //
analyzed: śṛṇvantu bhavya matayaḥ muditāḥ tva rāgāḥ uccais tarām upadiśāmi aham ūrdhva bāhuḥ

original: bhūtvordhvabāhur adyāhaṃ satyapūrvaṃ bravīmy aham /
analyzed: bhūtvā ūrdhva bāhuḥ adya aham satya pūrvam bravīmi aham

original: he putra śiṣyāḥ śṛṇuta na mantro 'ṣṭākṣarāt paraḥ // NsP_17.31 //
analyzed: he putra śiṣyāḥ śṛṇuta na ṣṭa akṣarāt paraḥ

original: satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ satyam utkṣipya bhujam ucyate /
analyzed: satyam satyam punar satyam utkṣipya bhujam ucyate

original: vedāc chāstraṃ paraṃ nāsti na devaḥ keśavāt paraḥ // NsP_17.32 //
analyzed: vedāt śāstram param nā asti na devaḥ keśavāt paraḥ

original: ālocya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: ālocya sarva śāstrāṇi vicārya ca punar punar

original: idam ekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā // NsP_17.33 //
analyzed: idam ekam su niṣpannam dhyeyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sadā

original: ity etat sakalaṃ proktaṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ tava puṇyadam /
analyzed: iti etat sakalam proktam śiṣyāṇām tava puṇya dam

original: kathāś ca vividhāḥ proktā mayā bhaja janārdanam // NsP_17.34 //
analyzed: kathāḥ ca vividhāḥ proktāḥ mayā bhaja janārdanam

original: aṣṭākṣaram imaṃ mantraṃ sarvaduḥkhavināśanam /
analyzed: aṣṭa akṣaram imam mantram sarva duḥkha vināśanam

original: japa putra mahābuddhe yadi siddhim abhīpsasi // NsP_17.35 //
analyzed: japa putra mahābuddhe yadi siddhim abhīpsasi

original: idaṃ stavaṃ vyāsamukhāt tu nissṛtaṃ saṃdhyātraye ye puruṣāḥ paṭhanti /
analyzed: idam stavam vyāsa mukhāt tu nissṛtam saṃdhyā traye ye puruṣāḥ paṭhanti

original: te dhautapāṇḍurapaṭā iva rājahaṃsāḥ saṃsārasāgaram apetabhayās taranti // NsP_17.36 //
analyzed: te dhauta pāṇḍura paṭāḥ iva rājahaṃsāḥ saṃsāra sāgaram apeta bhayāḥ taranti

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe aṣṭākṣaramantramāhātmyaṃ nāma saptadaśo 'dhyāya // NarP 17 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe aṣṭākṣaramantramāhātmyam nāma saptadaśaḥ dhyāya

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: iti śrutvā kathāḥ puṇyāḥ sarvapāpapraṇāśinīḥ /
analyzed: iti śrutvā kathāḥ puṇyāḥ sarva pāpa praṇāśinīḥ

original: nānāvidhā muniśreṣṭhāḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāt punaḥ // NsP_18.1 //
analyzed: nānāvidhāḥ muni śreṣṭhāḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāt punar

original: śukaḥ pūrvaṃ mahābhāgo bharadvājo mahāmate /
analyzed: śukaḥ pūrvam mahābhāgaḥ bharadvājaḥ mahāmate

original: siddhair anyaiś ca sahito nārāyaṇaparo 'bhavat // NsP_18.2 //
analyzed: siddhaiḥ anyaiḥ ca sahitaḥ nārāyaṇa paraḥ bhavat

original: evaṃ te kathitā vipra mārkaṇḍeyādikāḥ kathāḥ /
analyzed: evam te kathitāḥ vipra mārkaṇḍeya ādikāḥ kathāḥ

original: mayā vicitrāḥ pāpaghnyaḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi // NsP_18.3 //
analyzed: mayā vicitrāḥ pāpa ghnyaḥ kim bhūyas śrotum icchasi

original: bharadvāja uvāca:
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ uvāca

original: vasvādīnāṃ tathā proktā mama sṛṣṭis tvayā purā /
analyzed: vasu ādīnām tathā proktā mama sṛṣṭiḥ tvayā purā

original: aśvinor marutāṃ caiva noktotpattis tu tāṃ vada // NsP_18.4 //
analyzed: aśvinoḥ marutām ca eva nā ukta utpattiḥ tu tām vada

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: marutāṃ vistareṇoktā vaiṣṇavākhye mahāmate /
analyzed: marutām vistareṇa uktāḥ vaiṣṇava ākhye mahāmate

original: purāṇe śaktiputreṇa purotpatiś ca vāyunā // NsP_18.5 //
analyzed: purāṇe śakti putreṇa purā utpatiḥ ca vāyunā

original: aśvinor devayoś caiva sṛṣṭir uktā suvistarāt /
analyzed: aśvinoḥ devayoḥ ca eva sṛṣṭiḥ uktā su vistarāt

original: saṃkṣepāt tava vakṣyāmi sṛṣṭim etāṃ śṛṇuṣva me // NsP_18.6 //
analyzed: saṃkṣepāt tava vakṣyāmi sṛṣṭim etām śṛṇuṣva me

original: ḥdakṣakanyāditiḥ /
analyzed: ḥ dakṣa kanyā aditiḥ

original: ḥaditer ādityaḥ putraḥ /
analyzed: ḥaditeḥ ādityaḥ putraḥ

original: ḥtasmai tvaṣṭā duhitaraṃ saṃjñāṃ nāma kanyāṃ dattavān // NsP_18.7 //
analyzed: tasmai tvaṣṭā duhitaram saṃjñām nāma kanyām dattavān

original: ḥso 'pi tvāṣṭrīṃ rūpavatīṃ manojñāṃ prāpya tayā saha reme /
analyzed: ḥsaḥ pi tvāṣṭrīm rūpavatīm manojñām prāpya tayā saha reme

original: ḥsā katipayāt kālāt svabhartur ādityasya tāpam asahantī pitur gṛhaṃ jagāma // NsP_18.8 //
analyzed: ḥsā katipayāt kālāt sva bhartuḥ ādityasya tāpam a sahantī pituḥ gṛham jagāma

original: ḥtām avalokya sutāṃ pitovāca kiṃ putri tava bhartā savitā snehāt tvāṃ rakṣaty uta paruṣa iti // NsP_18.9 //
analyzed: avalokya sutām pitā uvāca kim putri tava bhartā savitā snehāt tvām rakṣati uta paruṣaḥ iti

original: ḥevaṃ pitur vacanaṃ śrutvā saṃjñā taṃ pratyuvāca /
analyzed: evam pituḥ vacanam śrutvā saṃjñā tam pratyuvāca

original: ḥdagdhāhaṃ bhartuḥ pracaṇḍatāpād iti // NsP_18.10 //
analyzed: ḥdagdhā aham bhartuḥ pracaṇḍa tāpāt iti

original: ḥevaṃ śrutvā tām āha pitā gaccha putri bhartur gṛham iti // NsP_18.11 //
analyzed: evam śrutvā tām āha pitā gaccha putri bhartuḥ gṛham iti

original: ḥyuvatīstrīṇāṃ bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇam eva dharmaḥ śreyān /
analyzed: ḥyuvatī strīṇām bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇam eva dharmaḥ śreyān

original: ḥaham api katipayadivasād āgatyādityasyoṣṇatāṃ jāmātur uddhariṣyāmi // NsP_18.12 //
analyzed: ḥaham api katipaya divasāt āgatya ādityasya uṣṇa tām jāmātuḥ uddhariṣyāmi

original: ḥityuktā sā ca punar bhartur gṛhaṃ prāpya katipayadivasān manuṃ yamīṃ yamaṃ cāpatyatrayam ādityāt prāsūta /
analyzed: ḥiti uktā sā ca punar bhartuḥ gṛham prāpya katipaya divasān manum yamīm yamam ca apatya trayam ādityāt prāsūta

original: ḥpunas taduṣṇatām asahantī chāyāṃ bhartur apabhogāya svaprajñābalenotpādya tatra saṃsthāpya gatvottarakurūn adhiṣṭhāyāśvī bhūtvā vicacāra //
analyzed: ḥpunar tad uṣṇa tām a sahantī chāyām bhartuḥ apabhogāya sva prajñā balena utpādya tatra saṃsthāpya gatvā uttarakurūn adhiṣṭhāya aśvī bhūtvā vicacāra

original: ḥādityo 'pi saṃjñeyam iti matvā tasyāṃ jāyāṃ punar apatyatrayam utpādayām_asa // NsP_18.14 //
analyzed: saṃjñā iyam iti matvā tasyām jāyām punar apatya trayam utpādayāmasa

original: ḥmanuṃ śanaiścaraṃ tapatīṃ ca /
analyzed: ḥmanum śanaiścaram tapatīm ca

original: ḥsveṣv apatyeṣu pakṣapātena vartatīṃ chāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā yamaḥ svapitaram āha neyam asmanmāteti // NsP_18.15 //
analyzed: ḥsveṣu apatyeṣu pakṣapātena vartatīm chāyām dṛṣṭvā yamaḥ sva pitaram āha na iyam asmad mātā iti

original: ḥpitāpi tac chrutvā bhāryāṃ prāha /
analyzed: ḥ pitā api tat śrutvā bhāryām prāha

original: ḥsarveṣv apatyeṣu samam eva vartatām iti // NsP_18.16 //
analyzed: ḥ sarveṣu apatyeṣu samam eva vartatām iti

original: ḥpunar api sveṣv apatyeṣu snehāt pravartatīṃ chāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā yamo yamī ca tāṃ bahuvidham apīttham uvāca /
analyzed: ḥpunar api sveṣu apatyeṣu snehāt pravartatīm chāyām dṛṣṭvā yamaḥ yamī ca tām bahuvidham api ittham uvāca

original: ḥādityasaṃnidhānāt tūṣṇīṃ babhūvataḥ // NsP_18.17 //
analyzed: ḥāditya saṃnidhānāt tūṣṇīm babhūvataḥ

original: ḥtataś chāyā tayoḥ śāpaṃ dattavatī /
analyzed: ḥtatas chāyā tayoḥ śāpam dattavatī

original: ḥyama tvaṃ pretarājo bhava yami tvaṃ yamunā nāma nadī bhavet // NsP_18.18 //
analyzed: tvam preta rājaḥ bhava yami tvam yamunā nāma nadī bhavet

original: ḥtataḥ krodhād ādityo 'pi chāyāputrayoḥ śāpaṃ dattavān he putra śanaiścara tvaṃ graho bhava krūradṛṣṭir mandagāmī ca pāpagrahas tvaṃ ca //
analyzed: ḥtatas krodhāt ādityaḥ pi chāyā putrayoḥ śāpam dattavān he putra śanaiścara tvam grahaḥ bhava krūra dṛṣṭiḥ manda gāmī ca pāpa grahaḥ tvam ca

original: ḥputri tapatī nāma nadī bhaveti athādityo dhyānam āsthāya saṃjñā kva sthiteti vicārayām_asa // NsP_18.20 //
analyzed: ḥ putri tapatī nāma nadī bhava iti atha ādityaḥ dhyānam āsthāya saṃjñā kva sthitā iti vicārayāmasa

original: ḥsa dṛṣṭavān uttarakuruṣu dhyānacakṣuṣāśvībhūya vicarantī /
analyzed: ḥsa dṛṣṭavān uttarakuruṣu dhyānacakṣuṣā aśvībhūya vicarantī

original: ḥsvayaṃ cāśvarūpeṇa tatra gatvā tayā saha saṃparkaṃ kṛtavān // NsP_18.21 //
analyzed: ca aśvarūpeṇa tatra gatvā tayā saha saṃparkam kṛtavān

original: ḥtasyām evādityād aśvināv utpannau tayor atiśayavapuṣoḥ sākṣāt prajāpatir āgatya devatvaṃ yajñabhāgatvaṃ mukhyaṃ ca devānāṃ bhiṣajatvaṃ dattvā  #
analyzed: ḥtasyām eva ādityāt aśvinau utpannau tayoḥ atiśaya vapuṣoḥ sākṣāt prajāpatiḥ āgatya deva tvam yajñabhāga tvam mukhyam ca devānām bhiṣaja tvam dattvā

original: jagāma /
analyzed: jagāma

original: ḥādityaś cāśvarūpaṃ vihāya svabhāryāṃ saṃjñāṃ tvāṣṭrīṃ svarūpadhāriṇīṃ nītvā svarūpam āsthāya divaṃ jagāma // NsP_18.22 //

analyzed: ḥsaṃpāteḥ bhānu dattāyām sārvabhaumaḥ

original: ḥsārvabhaumasya vaidehyāṃ bhojaḥ // NsP_22.7 //
analyzed: ḥsārvabhaumasya vaidehyām bhojaḥ

original: ḥbhojasya liṅgāyāṃ duṣyantaḥ /
analyzed: ḥ bhojasya liṅgāyām duṣyantaḥ

original: ḥduṣyantasya śakuntalāyāṃ bharataḥ // NsP_22.8 //
analyzed: ḥduṣyantasya śakuntalāyām bharataḥ

original: ḥbharatasya nandāyām ajamīḍhaḥ /
analyzed: ḥbharatasya nandāyām ajamīḍhaḥ

original: ḥajamīḍhasya sudevyāṃ pṛśniḥ /
analyzed: ḥajamīḍhasya sudevyām pṛśniḥ

original: ḥpṛśner ugrasenāyāṃ prasaraḥ /
analyzed: ḥ pṛśneḥ ugrasenāyām prasaraḥ

original: ḥprasarasya bahurūpāyāṃ śaṃtanuḥ /
analyzed: ḥ prasarasya bahurūpāyām śaṃtanuḥ

original: ḥśaṃtanor yojanagandhāyāṃ vicitravīryaḥ /
analyzed: ḥśaṃtanoḥ yojana gandhāyām vicitra vīryaḥ

original: ḥvicitravīryasyāmbikāyāṃ pāṇḍuḥ // NsP_22.9 //
analyzed: ḥ vicitravīryasya ambikāyām pāṇḍuḥ

original: ḥpāṇḍoḥ kuntidevyām arjunaḥ /
analyzed: ḥpāṇḍoḥ kuntidevyām arjunaḥ

original: ḥarjunāt subhadrāyām abhimanyuḥ // NsP_22.10 //
analyzed: ḥarjunāt subhadrāyām abhimanyuḥ

analyzed: ḥabhimanyoḥ uttarāyām parīkṣitaḥ

original: ḥparīkṣitasya mātṛvatyāṃ janamejayaḥ /
analyzed: ḥ parīkṣitasya mātṛvatyām janamejayaḥ

original: ḥjanamejayasya puṇyavatyāṃ śatānīkaḥ // NsP_22.11 //
analyzed: ḥ janamejayasya puṇyavatyām śatānīkaḥ

original: ḥśatānīkasya puṣpavatyāṃ sahasrānīkaḥ /
analyzed: ḥśatānīkasya puṣpavatyām sahasrānīkaḥ

original: ḥsahasrānīkasya mṛgavatyām udayanaḥ /
analyzed: ḥsahasrānīkasya mṛgavatyām udayanaḥ

original: ḥtasya vāsavadattāyāṃ naravāhanaḥ // NsP_22.12 //
analyzed: ḥtasya vāsavadattāyām naravāhanaḥ

original: ḥnaravāhanasyāśvamedhāyāṃ kṣemakaḥ /
analyzed: ḥ naravāhanasya aśvamedhāyām kṣemakaḥ

original: ḥkṣemakāntāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ somavaṃśo nivartate // NsP_22.13 //
analyzed: pāṇḍavāḥ soma vaṃśaḥ nivartate

original: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ rājavaṃśam anuttamam /
analyzed: yaḥ idam śṛṇuyāt nityam rāja vaṃśam anuttamam

original: sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // NsP_22.14 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa viśuddha ātmā viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: yaś cedaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ śrāddhe vā śrāvayet pitṝn /
analyzed: yaḥ ca idam paṭhate nityam śrāddhe vā śrāvayet pitṝn

original: vaṃśānukīrtanaṃ puṇyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ dattam akṣayam // NsP_22.15 //
analyzed: vaṃśa anukīrtanam puṇyam pitṝṇām dattam akṣayam

original: rājñāṃ hi somasya mayā taveritā vaṃśānukīrtir dvija pāpanāśanī /
analyzed: rājñām hi somasya mayā tava īritā vaṃśa anukīrtiḥ dvija pāpa nāśanī

original: śṛṇuṣva viprendra mayocyamānaṃ manvantaraṃ cāpi caturdaśākhyam // NsP_22.16 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva vipra indra mayā ucyamānam manvantaram ca api caturdaśa ākhyam

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe somavaṃśānukīrtanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 22 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe somavaṃśānukīrtanam nāma dvāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: ḥprathamaṃ tāvat svāyaṃbhuvaṃ manvantaraṃ tatsvarūpaṃ kathitam /
analyzed: tāvat svāyaṃbhuvam manvantaram tad svarūpam kathitam

original: ḥsargādau svārociṣo nāma dvitīyo manuḥ // NsP_23.1 //
analyzed: ḥsarga ādau svārociṣaḥ nāma dvitīyaḥ manuḥ

original: ḥtasmin svārociṣe manvantare vipaścin nāma devendraḥ /
analyzed: ḥtasmin svārociṣe manvantare vipaścit nāma devendraḥ

original: ḥpārāvatāḥ satuṣitā devāḥ // NsP_23.2 //
analyzed: ḥ pārāvatāḥ sa tuṣitāḥ devāḥ

original: ḥūrjastambaḥ suprāṇo danto nirṛṣabho varīyān īśvaraḥ somaḥ saptarṣayaś caivaṃ kiṃpuruṣādyāḥ svārociṣasya manoḥ putrā rājāno bhavanti // NsP_23.3
analyzed: ḥūrjastambaḥ suprāṇaḥ dantaḥ nirṛṣabhaḥ varīyān īśvaraḥ somaḥ saptarṣayaḥ ca evam kiṃpuruṣa ādyāḥ svārociṣasya manoḥ putrāḥ rājānaḥ bhavanti  /

original: ḥtṛtīya uttamo nāma manuḥ /
analyzed: ḥ tṛtīyaḥ uttamaḥ nāma manuḥ

original: ḥsudhāmānaḥ satyāḥ śivāḥ pratardanā vaṃśavartinaś ca devāḥ /
analyzed: ḥsudhāmānaḥ satyāḥ śivāḥ pratardanāḥ vaṃśavartinaḥ ca devāḥ

original: ḥpañcaite dvādaśagaṇāḥ // NsP_23.4 //
analyzed: ḥ pañca ete dvādaśa gaṇāḥ

original: ḥteṣāṃ suśāntir indraḥ // NsP_23.5 //
analyzed: ḥ teṣām su śāntiḥ indraḥ

original: ḥvandyāḥ saptarṣayo 'bhavan /
analyzed: ḥvandyāḥ saptarṣayaḥ bhavan

original: ḥatra paraśucitrādyā manoḥ sutāḥ // NsP_23.6 //
analyzed: ḥatra paraśu citra ādyāḥ manoḥ sutāḥ

original: ḥcaturthas tāmaso nāma manuḥ /
analyzed: ḥ caturthaḥ tāmasaḥ nāma manuḥ

original: ḥtatra manvantare surāḥ parāḥ satyā sudhiyaś ca saptaviṃśatikā gaṇāḥ // NsP_23.7 //
analyzed: tatra manvantare surāḥ parāḥ satyā sudhiyaḥ ca saptaviṃśatikāḥ gaṇāḥ

original: ḥtatra bhṛśuṇḍī nāma devendraḥ /
analyzed: ḥtatra bhṛśuṇḍī nāma devendraḥ

original: ḥhiraṇyaromā devaśrīr ūrdhvabāhur devabāhuḥ sudhāmā ha parjanyo munir ity ete saptarṣayaḥ // NsP_23.8 //
analyzed: ḥ hiraṇyaromā deva śrīḥ ūrdhvabāhuḥ deva bāhuḥ sudhāmā ha parjanyaḥ muniḥ iti ete sapta ṛṣayaḥ

original: ḥjyotirdhāmā pṛthuḥ kāśyo 'gnir dhanaka ity ete tāmasasya manoḥ putrā rājānaḥ // NsP_23.9 //
analyzed: ḥ jyotirdhāmā pṛthuḥ kāśyaḥ gniḥ dhanakaḥ iti ete tāmasasya manoḥ putrāḥ rājānaḥ

original: ḥpañcamo nāma raivato manuḥ /
analyzed: ḥpañcamaḥ nāma raivataḥ manuḥ

original: ḥtasyāntare 'mitā niratā vaikuṇṭhāḥ sumedhasa ity ete devagaṇāś caturdaśakā gaṇāḥ /
analyzed: ḥtasya antare mitāḥ niratāḥ vaikuṇṭhāḥ sumedhasaḥ iti ete deva gaṇāḥ caturdaśakāḥ gaṇāḥ

original: ḥasurāntako nāma devendraḥ /
analyzed: ḥasurāntakaḥ nāma deva indraḥ

original: ḥsaptakādyā manoḥ sutā rājāno vai babhūvuḥ // NsP_23.10 //
analyzed: ḥsaptaka ādyāḥ manoḥ sutāḥ rājānaḥ vai babhūvuḥ

original: ḥśāntaḥ śāntabhayo vidvāṃs tapasvī medhāvī sutapāḥ saptarṣayo 'bhavan // NsP_23.11 //
analyzed: ḥśāntaḥ śāntabhayaḥ vidvān tapasvī medhāvī sutapāḥ saptarṣayaḥ bhavan

original: ḥṣaṣṭhaś cākṣuṣo nāma manuḥ /
analyzed: ḥṣaṣṭhaḥ cākṣuṣaḥ nāma manuḥ

original: ḥpuruśatadyumnapramukhās tasya sutā rājānaḥ /
analyzed: ḥ puru śatadyumna pramukhāḥ tasya sutāḥ rājānaḥ

original: ḥsuśāntā āpyāḥ prasūtā bhavyāḥ prathitāś ca mahānubhāvāḥ lekhādyāḥ pañcaite hy aṣṭakā gaṇās tatra devāḥ // NsP_23.12 //
analyzed: āpyāḥ prasūtāḥ bhavyāḥ prathitāḥ ca mahā anubhāvāḥ lekha ādyāḥ pañca ete hi aṣṭakāḥ gaṇāḥ tatra devāḥ

original: ḥteṣām indro manojavaḥ /
analyzed: ḥ teṣām indraḥ manaḥ javaḥ

original: ḥmedhāḥ sumedhā virajā haviṣmān uttamo matimān nāmnā sahiṣṇuś caite saptarṣayaḥ // NsP_23.13 //
analyzed: ḥmedhāḥ sumedhāḥ virajāḥ haviṣmān uttamaḥ matimān nāmnā sahiṣṇuḥ ca ete sapta ṛṣayaḥ

original: ḥsaptamo vaivasvato manuḥ sāṃprataṃ vartate /
analyzed: ḥsaptamaḥ vaivasvataḥ manuḥ sāṃpratam vartate

original: ḥtasya putrā ikṣvākuprabhṛtayaḥ kṣatriyā bhūbhujaḥ // NsP_23.14 //
analyzed: putrāḥ ikṣvāku prabhṛtayaḥ kṣatriyāḥ bhūbhujaḥ

original: ḥādityaviśvavasurudrādyā devāḥ puraṃdaro 'tra devendraḥ // NsP_23.15 //
analyzed: āditya viśvavasu rudra ādyāḥ devāḥ deva indraḥ

original: ḥvaśiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapo 'trir jamadagnir gautamaviśvāmitrabharadvājāḥ saptarṣayo bhavanti // NsP_23.16 //
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapaḥ tris jamadagniḥ gautama viśvāmitra bharadvājāḥ saptarṣayaḥ bhavanti

original: ḥbhaviṣyāṇi manvantarāṇi kathyante /
analyzed: ḥbhaviṣyāṇi manvantarāṇi kathyante

original: ḥtad yathā ādityāt saṃjñāyāṃ jāto yo manuḥ pūrvoktaś chāyāyām utpanno manur dvitīyaḥ sa tu /
analyzed: ḥtat yathā ādityāt saṃjñāyām jātaḥ yaḥ manuḥ pūrva uktaḥ chāyāyām utpannaḥ manuḥ dvitīyaḥ sa tu

original: ḥpūrvajasya sāvarṇasya manvantaraṃ sāvarṇikam aṣṭamaṃ śṛṇu // NsP_23.17 //
analyzed: ḥ pūrvajasya sāvarṇasya manvantaram sāvarṇikam aṣṭamam śṛṇu
