analyzed: ḥmanuḥ sāvarṇaḥ aṣṭamaḥ bhavitā tatra suta pādyāḥ deva gaṇāḥ teṣām baliḥ indraḥ bhavitā

original: ḥdīptimān gālavo nāma kṛpadrauṇivyāsarṣyaśṛṅgāś ca saptarṣayo bhavitāraḥ /
analyzed: ḍīptimān gālavaḥ nāma kṛpa drauṇi vyāsa ṛṣyaśṛṅgāḥ ca saptarṣayaḥ bhavitāraḥ

original: ḥvirājorvarīyanirmokādyāḥ sāvarṇasya manoḥ sutā rājāno bhaviṣyanti // NsP_23.19 //
analyzed: virāja urvarīya nirmoka ādyāḥ sāvarṇasya manoḥ sutāḥ rājānaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ḥnavamo dakṣasāvarṇir manur bhavitā /
analyzed: ḥnavamaḥ dakṣasāvarṇiḥ manuḥ bhavitā

original: ḥdhṛtiḥ kīrtir dīptiḥ ketuḥ pañcahasto nirāmayaḥ pṛthuśravādyā dakṣasāvarṇā rājāno 'sya manoḥ putrāḥ // NsP_23.20 //
analyzed: dhṛtiḥ kīrtiḥ dīptiḥ ketuḥ pañcahastaḥ nirāmayaḥ pṛthuśrava ādyāḥ dakṣasāvarṇāḥ rājānaḥ sya manoḥ putrāḥ

original: ḥmarīcigarbhāḥ sudharmāṇo haviṣmantas tatra devatāḥ /
analyzed: ḥ marīci garbhāḥ su dharmāṇaḥ haviṣmantaḥ tatra devatāḥ

original: ḥteṣāṃ indro 'dbhutaḥ // NsP_23.21 //
analyzed: ḥ teṣām indraḥ dbhutaḥ

original: ḥsavanaḥ kṛtimān havyo vasumedhātithir jyotiṣmān ity ete saptarṣayaḥ // NsP_23.22 //
analyzed: ḥsavanaḥ kṛtimān havyaḥ vasumedhātithiḥ jyotiṣmān iti ete sapta ṛṣayaḥ

original: ḥdaśamo brahmasāvarṇir manur bhavitā /
analyzed: ḥdaśamaḥ brahmasāvarṇiḥ manuḥ bhavitā

original: ḥviruddhādayas tatra devāḥ /
analyzed: ḥviruddha ādayaḥ tatra devāḥ

original: ḥteṣāṃ śāntir indraḥ /
analyzed: ḥ teṣām śāntiḥ indraḥ

original: ḥhaviṣmān sukṛtiḥ satyas tapomūrtir nābhāgaḥ pratimokaḥ saptaketur ity ete saptarṣayaḥ // NsP_23.23 //
analyzed: ḥhaviṣmān sukṛtiḥ satyaḥ tapomūrtiḥ nābhāgaḥ pratimokaḥ saptaketuḥ iti ete sapta ṛṣayaḥ

original: ḥsukṣetra uttamo bhūriṣeṇādayo brahmasāvarṇiputrā rājāno bhaviṣyanti // NsP_23.24 //
analyzed: ḥsukṣetre uttamaḥ bhūriṣeṇa ādayaḥ brahmasāvarṇi putrāḥ rājānaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ḥekādaśe manvantare dharmasāvarṇiko manuḥ // NsP_23.25 //
analyzed: ḥekādaśe manvantare dharmasāvarṇikaḥ manuḥ

original: ḥsiṃhasavanādayo devagaṇāḥ /
analyzed: ḥ siṃhasavana ādayaḥ deva gaṇāḥ

original: ḥteṣāṃ divaspatir indraḥ // NsP_23.26 //
analyzed: ḥ teṣām divaspatiḥ indraḥ

original: ḥnirmohas tattvadarśī nikaṃpo nirutsāho dhṛtimān rucya ity ete saptarṣayaḥ /
analyzed: nirmohaḥ tattvadarśī nikaṃpaḥ nirutsāhaḥ dhṛtimān rucyaḥ iti ete sapta ṛṣayaḥ

original: ḥcitrasenavicitrādyā dharmasāvarṇiputrā bhūbhṛto bhaviṣyanti // NsP_23.27 //
analyzed: ḥcitrasena vicitra ādyāḥ dharmasāvarṇi putrāḥ bhūbhṛtaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ḥrudrasāvarṇir bhavitā dvādaśo manuḥ // NsP_23.28 //
analyzed: ḥrudrasāvarṇiḥ bhavitā dvādaśaḥ manuḥ

original: ḥkṛtadhāmā tatrendro haritā rohitāḥ sumanasaḥ sukarmāṇaḥ sutapāś ca devāḥ // NsP_23.29 //
analyzed: tatra indraḥ haritāḥ rohitāḥ sumanasaḥ sukarmāṇaḥ sutapāḥ ca devāḥ

original: ḥtapasvī cārutapās tapomūrtis taporatis tapodhṛtir jyotis tapa ity ete saptarṣayaḥ // NsP_23.30 //
ḥdevavān devaśreṣṭhādyās tasya manoḥ sutā bhūpālā bhaviṣyanti // NsP_23.31 //
analyzed: ḥdevavān deva śreṣṭha ādyāḥ tasya manoḥ sutāḥ bhūpālāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ḥtrayodaśo rucir nāma manuḥ /
analyzed: ḥ trayodaśaḥ ruciḥ nāma manuḥ

original: ḥsragvī bāṇaḥ sudharmā prabhṛtayo devagaṇāḥ /
analyzed: ḥsragvī bāṇaḥ sudharmā prabhṛtayaḥ deva gaṇāḥ

original: ḥteṣām indra ṛṣabho nāma bhavitā // NsP_23.32 //
analyzed: ḥ teṣām indraḥ ṛṣabhaḥ nāma bhavitā

original: ḥniścito 'gnitejā vapuṣmān dhṛṣṭo vāruṇir haviṣmān nahuṣo bhavya iti saptarṣayaḥ /
analyzed: ḥniścitaḥ gnitejāḥ vapuṣmān dhṛṣṭaḥ vāruṇiḥ haviṣmān nahuṣaḥ bhavyaḥ iti sapta ṛṣayaḥ

original: ḥsudharmā devānīkādayas tasya manoḥ putrāḥ pṛthvīśvarā bhaviṣyanti // NsP_23.33 //
analyzed: devānīka ādayaḥ tasya manoḥ putrāḥ pṛthvīśvarāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ḥbhaumaś caturdaśo manur bhavitā /
analyzed: ḥbhaumaḥ caturdaśaḥ manuḥ bhavitā

original: ḥsurucis tatrendraḥ /
analyzed: ḥsuruciḥ tatra indraḥ

original: ḥcakṣuṣmantaḥ pavitrāḥ kaniṣṭhābhā devagaṇāḥ // NsP_23.34 //
analyzed: ḥcakṣuṣmantaḥ pavitrāḥ kaniṣṭha ābhāḥ deva gaṇāḥ

original: ḥagnibāhuśuciśukramādhavaśivābhīmajitaśvāsā ity ete saptarṣayaḥ /
analyzed: ḥagnibāhu śuci śukra mādhava śivā bhīma jitaśvāsāḥ iti ete saptarṣayaḥ

original: ḥurugaṃbhīrabrahmādyās tasya manoḥ sutāḥ rājanaḥ // NsP_23.35 //
analyzed: tasya manoḥ sutāḥ rājanaḥ

original: ḥevaṃ te caturdaśa manvantarāṇi kathitāni /
analyzed: evam te caturdaśa manvantarāṇi kathitāni

original: ḥrājānaś ca yair iyaṃ vasudhā pālyate // NsP_23.36 //
analyzed: ḥrājānaḥ ca yaiḥ iyam vasudhā pālyate

original: manuḥ saptarṣayo devā bhūpālāś ca manoḥ sutāḥ /
analyzed: manuḥ saptarṣayaḥ devāḥ bhūpālāḥ ca manoḥ sutāḥ

original: manvantare bhavanty ete śakrāś caivādhikāriṇaḥ // NsP_23.37 //
analyzed: manvantare bhavanti ete śakrāḥ ca eva adhikāriṇaḥ

original: caturdaśabhir etais tu gatair manvantarair dvija /
analyzed: caturdaśabhiḥ etaiḥ tu gataiḥ manvantaraiḥ dvija

original: sahasrayugaparyantaḥ kālo gacchati vāsaraḥ // NsP_23.38 //
analyzed: sahasra yuga paryantaḥ kālaḥ gacchati vāsaraḥ

original: tāvatpramāṇā ca niśā tato bhavati sattama /
analyzed: tāvat pramāṇā ca niśā tatas bhavati sattama

original: brahmarūpadharaḥ śete sarvātmā nṛhariḥ svayam // NsP_23.39 //
analyzed: brahma rūpa dharaḥ śete sarva ātmā nṛhariḥ svayam

original: trailokyam akhilaṃ grastā bhagavān ādikṛd vibhuḥ /
analyzed: trailokyam akhilam grastā bhagavān ādi kṛt vibhuḥ

original: svamāyām āsthito vipra sarvarūpī janārdanaḥ // NsP_23.40 //
analyzed: sva māyām āsthitaḥ vipra sarva rūpī janārdanaḥ

original: atha prabuddho bhagavān yathā pūrvaṃ tathā punaḥ /
analyzed: atha prabuddhaḥ bhagavān yathā pūrvam tathā punar

original: yugavyavasthāṃ kurute sṛṣṭiṃ ca puruṣottamaḥ // NsP_23.41 //
analyzed: yuga vyavasthām kurute sṛṣṭim ca puruṣottamaḥ

original: ete tavoktā manavo 'marāś ca putrāś ca bhūpā munayaś ca sarve /
analyzed: ete tava uktāḥ manavaḥ marāḥ ca putrāḥ ca bhūpāḥ munayaḥ ca sarve

original: vibhūtayas tasya sthitau sthitasya tasyaiva sarvaṃ tvam avehi vipra // NsP_23.42 //
analyzed: vibhūtayaḥ tasya sthitau sthitasya tasya eva sarvam tvam avehi vipra

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe trayoviṃśo 'dhyāya // NarP 23 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe trayoviṃśaḥ dhyāya

original: śrīsūta uvāca:
analyzed: śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vaṃśānucaritaṃ śubham /
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi vaṃśānucaritam śubham

original: śṛṇvatām api pāpaghnaṃ sūryasomanṛpātmakam // NsP_24.1 //
analyzed: śṛṇvatām api pāpa ghnam sūrya soma nṛpa ātmakam

original: sūryavaṃśodbhavo yo vai manuputraḥ puroditaḥ /
analyzed: sūrya vaṃśa udbhavaḥ yaḥ vai manu putraḥ purā uditaḥ

original: ikṣvākur nāma bhūpālaś caritaṃ tasya me śṛṇu // NsP_24.2 //
analyzed: ikṣvākuḥ nāma bhūpālaḥ caritam tasya me śṛṇu

original: āsīd bhūmau mahābhāga purī divyā suśobhanā /
analyzed: āsīt bhūmau mahābhāga purī divyā su śobhanā

analyzed: sarayū tīram āsādya ayodhyā nāma nāmataḥ

analyzed: amarāvatī atiśayā triṃśat yojana jālinī

analyzed: hasti aśva ratha patti oghaiḥ drumaiḥ kalpadruma prabhaiḥ

original: prākārāṭṭapratolībhis toraṇaiḥ kāñcanaprabhaiḥ /
analyzed: prākāra aṭṭa pratolībhiḥ toraṇaiḥ kāñcana prabhaiḥ

original: virājamānā sarvatra suvibhaktacatuṣpathā // NsP_24.5 //
analyzed: virājamānā sarvatra suvibhakta catuṣpathā

analyzed: aneka bhūmi prāsādā bahu bhāṇḍa su vikrayā

original: padmotpalaśubhais toyair vāpībhir upaśobhitā // NsP_24.6 //
analyzed: padma utpala śubhaiḥ toyaiḥ vāpībhiḥ upaśobhitā

original: devatāyatanair divyair vedaghoṣaiś ca śobhitā /
analyzed: devatāyatanaiḥ divyaiḥ veda ghoṣaiḥ ca śobhitā

original: vīṇāveṇumṛdaṅgaiś ca śabdair utkṛṣṭakair yutā // NsP_24.7 //
analyzed: vīṇā veṇu mṛdaṅgaiḥ ca śabdaiḥ utkṛṣṭakaiḥ yutā

analyzed: śālaiḥ tālaiḥ nālikeraiḥ panasa amala jambukaiḥ

original: tathaivāmrakapitthādyair aśokair upaśobhitā // NsP_24.8 //
analyzed: tathā eva āmra kapittha ādyaiḥ aśokaiḥ upaśobhitā

original: ārāmair vividhair yuktā sarvatra phalapādapaiḥ /
analyzed: ārāmaiḥ vividhaiḥ yuktā sarvatra phala pādapaiḥ

original: mallikāmālatījāti- pāṭalānāgacampakaḥ // NsP_24.9 //
karavīraiḥ karṇikāraiḥ ketakībhir alaṃkṛtā /
analyzed: karavīraiḥ karṇikāraiḥ ketakībhiḥ alaṃkṛtā

original: kadalīlavalījāti- mātuluṅgamahāphalaiḥ /
analyzed: kadalī lavalī jāti mātuluṅga mahāphalaiḥ

original: kvacic candanagandhādyair nāraṅgaiś ca suśobhitā // NsP_24.10 //
analyzed: kvacid candana gandha ādyaiḥ nāraṅgaiḥ ca su śobhitā

original: nityotsavapramuditā gītavādyavicakṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: nitya utsava pramuditā gīta vādya vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: naranārībhir āḍhyābhī rūpadraviṇaprekṣaṇaiḥ // NsP_24.11 //
analyzed: nara nārībhiḥ āḍhyābhiḥ rūpa draviṇa prekṣaṇaiḥ

original: nānājanapadākīrṇā patākādhvajaśobhitā /
analyzed: nānā janapada ākīrṇā patākā dhvaja śobhitā

original: devatulyaprabhāyuktair nṛpaputraiś ca saṃyutā // NsP_24.12 //
analyzed: deva tulya prabhā yuktaiḥ nṛpa putraiḥ ca saṃyutā

original: sarūpābhir varastrībhir devastrībhir ivāvṛtā /
analyzed: sarūpābhiḥ vara strībhiḥ deva strībhiḥ iva āvṛtā

original: vipraiḥ satkavibhir yuktā bṛhaspatisamaprabhaiḥ // NsP_24.13 //
analyzed: vipraiḥ sat kavibhiḥ yuktāḥ bṛhaspati sama prabhaiḥ

original: vaṇigjanais tathā pauraiḥ kalpavṛkṣavarair yutā /
analyzed: vaṇij janaiḥ tathā pauraiḥ kalpavṛkṣa varaiḥ yutā

original: aśvair uccaiḥśravastulyair dantibhir diggajair iva // NsP_24.14 //
analyzed: aśvaiḥ uccaiḥśravaḥ tulyaiḥ dantibhiḥ diggajaiḥ iva

original: iti nānāvidhair bhāvair ayodhyendrapurīsamā /
analyzed: iti nānāvidhaiḥ bhāvaiḥ ayodhyā indra purī samā

original: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā nāradaḥ ślokaṃ sabhāmadhye puroktavān // NsP_24.15 //
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā nāradaḥ ślokam sabhā madhye purā uktavān

original: svargaṃ vai sṛjamānasya vyarthaṃ syāt padmajanmanaḥ /
analyzed: svargam vai sṛjamānasya vyartham syāt padmajanmanaḥ

original: jātāyodhyādhikā svargāt kāmabhogasamanvitā // NsP_24.16 //
analyzed: jātā ayodhyā adhikā svargāt kāma bhoga samanvitā

original: tām āvasad ayodhyāṃ tu svabhiṣikto mahīpatiḥ /
analyzed: tām āvasat ayodhyām tu su abhiṣiktaḥ mahīpatiḥ

original: jitavān sarvabhūpālān dharmeṇa sa mahābalaḥ // NsP_24.17 //
analyzed: jitavān sarva bhūpālān dharmeṇa sa mahā balaḥ

original: māṇikyamukuṭair yuktai rājabhir maṇḍalādhipaiḥ /
analyzed: māṇikya mukuṭaiḥ yuktaiḥ rājabhiḥ maṇḍala adhipaiḥ

original: namadbhir bhaktibhītibhyāṃ pādau tasya kiṇīkṛtau // NsP_24.18 //
analyzed: namadbhiḥ bhakti bhītibhyām pādau tasya kiṇīkṛtau

original: ikṣvākur akṣatabalaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ /
tejasendreṇa sadṛśo manoḥ sūnuḥ pratāpavan // NsP_24.19 //
analyzed: tejasā indreṇa sadṛśaḥ manoḥ sūnuḥ pratāpavan

original: dharmato nyāyataś caiva vedajñair brāhmaṇair yutaḥ /
analyzed: dharmataḥ nyāyataḥ ca eva veda jñaiḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ yutaḥ

original: pālayām_asa dharmātmā āsamudrāṃ mahīm imām // NsP_24.20 //
analyzed: pālayāmasa dharma ātmā āsamudrām mahīm imām

original: astrair jigāya sakalān saṃyuge bhūpatīn balī /
analyzed: astraiḥ jigāya sakalān saṃyuge bhūpatīn balī

original: avajitya sutīkṣṇais tu tanmaṇḍalam athāharat // NsP_24.21 //
analyzed: avajitya su tīkṣṇaiḥ tu tat maṇḍalam atha āharat

original: jitavān paralokāṃś ca kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ /
analyzed: jitavān para lokān ca kratubhiḥ bhūri dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: dānaiś ca vividhair brahman rājekṣvākuḥ pratāpavān // NsP_24.22 //
analyzed: dānaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ brahman rāja ikṣvākuḥ pratāpavān

original: bāhudvayena vasudhāṃ jihvāgreṇa sarasvatīm /
analyzed: bāhu dvayena vasudhām jihvā agreṇa sarasvatīm

original: babhāra padmām urasā bhaktiṃ cittena mādhave // NsP_24.23 //
analyzed: babhāra padmām urasā bhaktim cittena mādhave

original: saṃtiṣṭhato hare rūpam upaviṣṭaṃ ca mādhavam /
analyzed: saṃtiṣṭhataḥ hareḥ rūpam upaviṣṭam ca mādhavam

original: śayānam apy anantaṃ tu kārayitvā paṭe 'malam // NsP_24.24 //
analyzed: śayānam api anantam tu kārayitvā paṭe malam

original: trikālaṃ trayam ārādhya rūpaṃ viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tri kālam trayam ārādhya rūpam viṣṇoḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: gandhapuṣpādibhir nityaṃ reme dṛṣṭvā paṭe harim // NsP_24.25 //
analyzed: gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ nityam reme dṛṣṭvā paṭe harim

original: kṛṣṇaṃ taṃ kṛṣṇameghābhaṃ bhujagendranivāsinam /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam tam kṛṣṇa megha ābham bhujaga indra nivāsinam

original: padmākṣaṃ pītavāsaṃ ca svapneṣv api sa dṛṣṭavān // NsP_24.26 //
analyzed: padma akṣam pīta vāsam ca svapneṣu api sa dṛṣṭavān

original: cakāra meghe tadvarṇe bahumānamatiṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: cakāra meghe tad varṇe bahu māna matim nṛpaḥ

original: pakṣapātaṃ ca tannāmni mṛge padme ca tādṛśe // NsP_24.27 //
analyzed: pakṣapātam ca tad nāmni mṛge padme ca tādṛśe

original: divyākṛtiṃ hareḥ sākṣād draṣṭuṃ tasya mahībhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: divya ākṛtim hareḥ sākṣāt draṣṭum tasya mahībhṛtaḥ

original: atīva tṛṣṇā saṃjātā apūrvaiva hi sattama // NsP_24.28 //
analyzed: atīva tṛṣṇā saṃjātā apūrvā eva hi sattama

original: tṛṣṇāyāṃ tu prabuddhāyāṃ manasaiva hi pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: tṛṣṇāyām tu prabuddhāyām manasā eva hi pārthivaḥ

original: cintayām_asa matimān rājyabhogam asāravat // NsP_24.29 //
analyzed: cintayāmasa matimān rājya bhogam asāra vat

original: veśmadārasutakṣetraṃ saṃyastaṃ yena duḥkhadam /
analyzed: veśma dāra suta kṣetram saṃyastam yena duḥkha dam

original: vairāgyajñānapūrveṇa loke 'smin nāsti tatsamaḥ // NsP_24.30 //
analyzed: vairāgya jñāna pūrveṇa loke smin na asti tad samaḥ

original: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu tapasy āsaktacetanaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam cintayitvā tu tapasi āsakta cetanaḥ

original: vasiṣṭhaṃ paripapraccha tatropāyaṃ purohitam // NsP_24.31 //
analyzed: vasiṣṭham paripapraccha tatra upāyam purohitam

original: tapobalena deveśaṃ nārāyaṇam ajaṃ mune /
analyzed: tapaḥ balena deveśam nārāyaṇam ajam mune

original: draṣṭum icchāmy ahaṃ tatra upāyaṃ taṃ vadasva me // NsP_24.32 //
analyzed: draṣṭum icchāmi aham tatra upāyam tam vadasva me

original: ityuktaḥ prāha rājānāṃ tapasy āsaktamānasam /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ prāha rājānām tapasi āsakta mānasam

original: vasiṣṭhaḥ sarvadharmajñaḥ sadā tasya hite rataḥ // NsP_24.33 //
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ sarva dharma jñaḥ sadā tasya hite rataḥ

original: yadīcchasi mahārāja draṣṭuṃ nārāyaṇaṃ param /
analyzed: yadi icchasi mahā rāja draṣṭum nārāyaṇam param

original: tapasā sukṛteneha ārādhaya janārdanam // NsP_24.34 //
analyzed: tapasā sukṛtena iha ārādhaya janārdanam

original: kenāpy ataptatapasā devadevo janārdanaḥ /
analyzed: kena api a tapta tapasā devadevaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: draṣṭuṃ na śakyate jātu tasmāt taṃ tapasārcaya // NsP_24.35 //
analyzed: draṣṭum na śakyate jātu tasmāt tam tapasā arcaya

original: pūrvadakṣiṇadigbhāge sarayūtīrage nṛpa /
analyzed: pūrva dakṣiṇa digbhāge sarayū tīra ge nṛpa

original: gālavapramukhānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇām asti cāśramaḥ // NsP_24.36 //
analyzed: gālava pramukhānām ca ṛṣīṇām asti ca āśramaḥ

original: pañcayojanam adhvānaṃ sthānam asmāt tu pāvanam /
analyzed: pañca yojanam adhvānam sthānam asmāt tu pāvanam

original: nānādrumalatākīrṇaṃ nānāpuṣpasamākulam // NsP_24.37 //
analyzed: nānā druma latā ākīrṇam nānā puṣpa samākulam

original: svamantriṇi mahāprājñe nītimaty arjune nṛpa /

original: svarājyabhāraṃ vinyasya karmakāṇḍam api dvija // NsP_24.38 //
analyzed: sva rājya bhāram vinyasya karmakāṇḍam api dvija

original: stutvārādhya gaṇādhyakṣam ito vraja vināyakam /
analyzed: stutvā ārādhya gaṇādhyakṣam itas vraja vināyakam

original: tapaḥsiddhyartham anvicchaṃs tasmāt tatra tapaḥ kuru // NsP_24.39 //
analyzed: tapaḥ siddhi artham anvicchan tasmāt tatra tapaḥ kuru

original: tāpasaṃ veṣam āsthāya śākamūlaphalāśanaḥ /
analyzed: tāpasam veṣam āsthāya śāka mūla phala aśanaḥ

original: dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ devam imaṃ mantraṃ sadā japa // NsP_24.40 //
analyzed: dhyāyan nārāyaṇam devam imam mantram sadā japa

original: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya /
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya

original: eṣa siddhikaro mantro dvādaśākṣarasaṃjñitaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa siddhi karaḥ mantraḥ dvādaśa akṣara saṃjñitaḥ

original: japtvainaṃ munayaḥ siddhiṃ parāṃ prāptāḥ purātanāḥ // NsP_24.41 //
analyzed: japtvā enam munayaḥ siddhim parām prāptāḥ purātanāḥ

original: gatvā gatvā nivartante candrasūryādayo grahāḥ /
analyzed: gatvā gatvā nivartante candra sūrya ādayaḥ grahāḥ

original: adyāpi na nivartante dvādaśākṣaracintakāḥ // NsP_24.42 //
analyzed: adya api na nivartante dvādaśa akṣara cintakāḥ

original: bāhyendriyaṃ hṛdi sthāpya manaḥ sūkṣme parātmani /
analyzed: bāhya indriyam hṛdi sthāpya manaḥ sūkṣme parātmani

original: nṛpa saṃjapa tan mantraṃ draṣṭavyo madhusūdanaḥ // NsP_24.43 //
analyzed: nṛpa saṃjapa tat mantram draṣṭavyaḥ madhusūdanaḥ

original: iti te kathitopāyo hariprāptes tapaḥkṛtau /
analyzed: iti te kathita upāyaḥ hari prāpteḥ tapaḥ kṛtau

original: pṛcchataḥ sāṃprataṃ bhūyo yadīcchasi kuruṣva tat // NsP_24.44 //
analyzed: pṛcchataḥ sāṃpratam bhūyas yadi icchasi kuruṣva tat

original: ity evam ukto muninā sa rājā rājyaṃ bhuvo mantrivare samarpya /
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ muninā sa rājā rājyam bhuvaḥ mantri vare samarpya

original: stutvā gaṇeśaṃ sumanobhir arcya gataḥ purāt svāt tapase dhṛtātmā // NsP_24.45 //
analyzed: stutvā gaṇeśam sumanobhiḥ arcya gataḥ purāt svāt tapase dhṛta ātmā

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe ikṣvākucaritraṃ caturviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 24 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe ikṣvākucaritram caturviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: bharadvāja uvāca:
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ uvāca

original: kathaṃ stuto gaṇādhyakṣas tena rājñā mahātmanā /
analyzed: katham stutaḥ gaṇādhyakṣaḥ tena rājñā mahātmanā

original: yathā tena tapas taptaṃ tan me vada mahāmate // NsP_25.1 //
analyzed: yathā tena tapaḥ taptam tat me vada mahāmate

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: caturthīdivase rājā snātvā triṣavaṇaṃ dvija /
analyzed: caturthī divase rājā snātvā triṣavaṇam dvija

original: raktāmbaradharo bhūtvā raktagandhānulepanaḥ // NsP_25.2 //
analyzed: rakta ambara dharaḥ bhūtvā rakta gandha anulepanaḥ

original: suraktakusumair hṛdyair vināyakam athārcayat /
analyzed: su rakta kusumaiḥ hṛdyaiḥ vināyakam atha arcayat

original: raktacandanatoyena snānapūrvaṃ yathāvidhi // NsP_25.3 //
analyzed: raktacandana toyena snāna pūrvam yathāvidhi

original: vilipya raktagandhena raktapuṣpaiḥ prapūjayat /
analyzed: vilipya rakta gandhena rakta puṣpaiḥ prapūjayat

original: tato 'sau dattavān dhūpam ājyayuktaṃ sacandanam /
analyzed: tatas sau dattavān dhūpam ājya yuktam sa candanam

original: naivedyaṃ caiva hāridraṃ guḍakhaṇḍaghṛtaplutam // NsP_25.4 //
analyzed: naivedyam ca eva hāridram guḍa khaṇḍa ghṛta plutam

original: evaṃ suvidhinā pūjya vināyakam athāstavīt // NsP_25.5ab //
analyzed: evam su vidhinā pūjya vināyakam atha astavīt

original: ikṣvākur uvāca:
analyzed: ikṣvākuḥ uvāca

original: namaskṛtya mahādevaṃ stoṣye 'ham taṃ vināyakam // NsP_25.5cd //
analyzed: namaskṛtya mahādevam stoṣye ham tam vināyakam

original: mahāgaṇapatiṃ śūram ajitaṃ jñānavardhanam /
analyzed: mahāgaṇapatim śūram ajitam jñāna vardhanam

original: ekadantaṃ dvidantaṃ ca caturdantaṃ caturbhujam // NsP_25.6 //
analyzed: eka dantam dvi dantam ca catur dantam catur bhujam

original: tryakṣaṃ triśūlahastaṃ ca raktanetraṃ varapradam /
analyzed: tri akṣam triśūla hastam ca rakta netram vara pradam

original: āmbikeyaṃ śūrpakarṇaṃ pracaṇḍaṃ ca vināyakam // NsP_25.7 //
analyzed: āmbikeyam śūrpakarṇam pracaṇḍam ca vināyakam

original: āraktaṃ daṇḍinaṃ caivam vahnivaktraṃ hutapriyam /
analyzed: āraktam daṇḍinam ca evam vahni vaktram huta priyam

original: anarcito vighnakaraḥ sarvakāryeṣu yo nṛṇām // NsP_25.8 //
analyzed: anarcitaḥ vighna karaḥ sarva kāryeṣu yaḥ nṛṇām

original: taṃ namāmi gaṇādhyakṣaṃ bhīmam ugram umāsutam /
analyzed: tam namāmi gaṇādhyakṣam bhīmam ugram umāsutam

original: madamattaṃ virūpākṣaṃ bhaktavighnanivārakam // NsP_25.9 //
sūryakoṭipratīkāśaṃ bhinnāñjanasamaprabham /
analyzed: sūrya koṭi pratīkāśam bhinnāñjana sama prabham

original: baddhaṃ sunirmalaṃ śāntaṃ namasyāmi vināyakam // NsP_25.10 //
analyzed: baddham su nirmalam śāntam namasyāmi vināyakam

original: namo 'stu gajavaktrāya gaṇānāṃ pataye namaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ stu gaja vaktrāya gaṇānām pataye namaḥ

original: merumandararūpāya namaḥ kailāsavāsine // NsP_25.11 //
analyzed: meru mandara rūpāya namaḥ kailāsa vāsine

original: virūpāya namas te 'stu namas te brahmacāriṇe /
analyzed: virūpāya namaḥ te stu namaḥ te brahmacāriṇe

original: bhaktastutāya devāya namas tubhyaṃ vināyaka // NsP_25.12 //
analyzed: bhakta stutāya devāya namaḥ tubhyam vināyaka

original: tvayā purāṇa pūrveṣāṃ devānāṃ kāryasiddhaye /
analyzed: tvayā purāṇa pūrveṣām devānām kārya siddhaye

original: gajarūpaṃ samāsthāya trāsitāḥ sarvadānavāḥ // NsP_25.13 //
analyzed: gaja rūpam samāsthāya trāsitāḥ sarva dānavāḥ

original: ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca nāyakatvaṃ prakāśitam /
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām devatānām ca nāyaka tvam prakāśitam

original: yatas tataḥ surair agre pūjyase tvaṃ bhavātmaja // NsP_25.14 //
analyzed: yatas tatas suraiḥ agre pūjyase tvam bhavātmaja

original: tvām ārādhya gaṇādhyakṣaṃ sarvajñaṃ kāmarūpiṇam /
analyzed: tvām ārādhya gaṇādhyakṣam sarvajñam kāmarūpiṇam

original: kāryārthaṃ raktakusumai raktacandanavāribhiḥ // NsP_25.15 //
analyzed: kārya artham rakta kusumaiḥ raktacandana vāribhiḥ

original: raktāmbaradharo bhūtvā caturthyām arcayej japet /
analyzed: rakta ambara dharaḥ bhūtvā caturthyām arcayet japet

original: trikālaṃ ekakālaṃ vā pūjayen niyatāśanaḥ // NsP_25.16 //
analyzed: tri kālam eka kālam vā pūjayet niyata aśanaḥ

original: rājānaṃ rājaputraṃ vā rājamantriṇam eva vā /
analyzed: rājānam rāja putram vā rāja mantriṇam eva vā

original: rājyaṃ ca sarvavighneśa vaśaṃ kuryāt sarāṣṭrakam // NsP_25.17 //
analyzed: rājyam ca sarva vighna īśa vaśam kuryāt sarāṣṭrakam

original: avighnaṃ tapaso mahyaṃ kuru naumi vināyaka /
analyzed: avighnam tapasaḥ mahyam kuru naumi vināyaka

original: mayetthaṃ saṃstuto bhaktyā pūjitaś ca viśeṣataḥ // NsP_25.18 //
analyzed: mayā ittham saṃstutaḥ bhaktyā pūjitaḥ ca viśeṣataḥ

original: yat phalaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu sarvayajñeṣu yat phalam /
analyzed: yat phalam sarva tīrtheṣu sarva yajñeṣu yat phalam

original: tat phalaṃ pūrṇam āpnoti stutvā devaṃ vināyakam // NsP_25.19 //
analyzed: tat phalam pūrṇam āpnoti stutvā devam vināyakam

original: viṣamaṃ na bhavet tasya na ca gacchet parābhavam /
analyzed: viṣamam na bhavet tasya na ca gacchet parābhavam

original: na ca vighno bhavet tasya jāto jātismaro bhavet // NsP_25.20 //
analyzed: na ca vighnaḥ bhavet tasya jātaḥ jātismaraḥ bhavet

original: ya idaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ ṣaḍbhir māsair varaṃ labhet /
analyzed: yaḥ idam paṭhate stotram ṣaḍbhiḥ māsaiḥ varam labhet

original: saṃvatsareṇa siddhiṃ ca labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NsP_25.21 //
analyzed: saṃvatsareṇa siddhim ca labhate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: ḥsūta uvācaḥ
analyzed: ḥsūtaḥ uvācaḥ

original: evaṃ stutvā purā rājā gaṇādhyakṣaṃ dvijottama /
analyzed: evam stutvā purā rājā gaṇādhyakṣam dvijottama

original: tāpasaṃ veṣam āsthāya tapaś cartum gato vanam // NsP_25.22 //
analyzed: tāpasam veṣam āsthāya tapaḥ cartum gataḥ vanam

original: utsṛjya vastraṃ nāgatvak- sadṛśaṃ bahumūlyakam /
analyzed: utsṛjya vastram nāga tvac sadṛśam bahu mūlyakam

original: kaṭhināṃ tu tvacaṃ vārkṣīṃ kaṭyāṃ dhatte nṛpottamaḥ // NsP_25.23 //
analyzed: kaṭhinām tu tvacam vārkṣīm kaṭyām dhatte nṛpa uttamaḥ

original: tathā ratnāni divyāni valayāni nirasya tu /
analyzed: tathā ratnāni divyāni valayāni nirasya tu

original: akṣasūtram alaṃkāraṃ phalaiḥ padmasya śobhanam // NsP_25.24 //
analyzed: akṣasūtram alaṃkāram phalaiḥ padmasya śobhanam

original: tathottamāṅge mukuṭaṃ ratnahāṭakaśobhitam /
analyzed: tathā uttamāṅge mukuṭam ratna hāṭaka śobhitam

original: tyaktvā jaṭākalāpaṃ tu taporthe bibhṛyān nṛpaḥ // NsP_25.25 //
analyzed: tyaktvā jaṭā kalāpam tu tapaḥ rthe bibhṛyāt nṛpaḥ

original: kṛtvetthaṃ sa tapoveṣaṃ vasiṣṭhoktaṃ tapovanam /
analyzed: kṛtvā ittham sa tapaḥ veṣam vasiṣṭha uktam tapaḥ vanam

original: praviśya ca tapas tepe śākamūlaphalāśanaḥ // NsP_25.26 //
analyzed: praviśya ca tapaḥ tepe śāka mūla phala aśanaḥ

original: grīṣme pañcāgnimadhyastho 'tapat kāle mahātapāḥ /
analyzed: grīṣme tapat kāle mahā tapāḥ

original: varṣākāle nirālambo hemante ca sarojale // NsP_25.27 //
analyzed: varṣā kāle nirālambaḥ hemante ca saraḥ jale

original: indriyāṇi samastāni niyamya hṛdaye punaḥ /
analyzed: indriyāṇi samastāni niyamya hṛdaye punar

original: mano viṣṇau samāveśya mantraṃ vai dvādaśākṣaram // NsP_25.28 //
analyzed: manaḥ viṣṇau samāveśya mantram vai dvādaśa akṣaram

original: japato vāyubhakṣasya tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: japataḥ vāyubhakṣasya tasya rājñaḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: āvir babhūva bhagavān brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ // NsP_25.29 //
analyzed: āvis babhūva bhagavān brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ

original: tam āgatam athālokya padmayoniṃ caturmukham /
analyzed: tam āgatam atha ālokya padmayonim caturmukham

original: praṇamya bhaktibhāvena stutyā ca paryatoṣayat // NsP_25.30 //
analyzed: praṇamya bhakti bhāvena stutyā ca paryatoṣayat

original: namo hiraṇyagarbhāya jagatsraṣṭre mahātmane /
analyzed: namaḥ hiraṇyagarbhāya jagatsraṣṭre mahātmane

original: vedaśāstrārthaviduṣe caturvaktrāya te namaḥ // NsP_25.31 //
analyzed: veda śāstra artha viduṣe caturvaktrāya te namaḥ

original: iti stuto jagatsraṣṭā brahmā prāha nṛpottamam // NsP_25.32ab //
analyzed: iti stutaḥ jagatsraṣṭā brahmā prāha nṛpa uttamam

original: tapasy abhirataṃ śāntaṃ tyaktarājyaṃ mahāsukham // NsP_25.32cd //
analyzed: tapasi abhiratam śāntam tyakta rājyam mahā sukham

original: brahmovāca:
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: lokaprakāśako rājan sūryas tava pitāmahaḥ // NsP_25.32ef //
analyzed: loka prakāśakaḥ rājan sūryaḥ tava pitāmahaḥ

original: munīnām api sarveṣāṃ sadā mānyo manuḥ pitā /
analyzed: munīnām api sarveṣām sadā mānyaḥ manuḥ pitā

original: kṛtavantau tapaḥ pūrvaṃ tīvraṃ pitṛpitāmahau // NsP_25.33 //
analyzed: kṛtavantau tapaḥ pūrvam tīvram pitṛ pitāmahau

original: kimarthaṃ rājyabhogaṃ tu tyaktvā sarvaṃ nṛpottama /
analyzed: kimartham rājya bhogam tu tyaktvā sarvam nṛpa uttama

original: tapaḥ karoṣi ghoraṃ tvaṃ samācakṣva mahāmate // NsP_25.34 //
analyzed: tapaḥ karoṣi ghoram tvam samācakṣva mahāmate

original: ityukto brahmaṇā rājā taṃ praṇamyābravīd vacaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ brahmaṇā rājā tam praṇamya abravīt vacaḥ

original: dṛṣṭum icchaṃs tapaścaryā- balena madhusūdanam // NsP_25.35 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭum icchan tapaḥ caryāḥ balena madhusūdanam

original: karomy evaṃ tapo brahman śaṅkhacakragadādharam /
analyzed: karomi evam tapaḥ brahman śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: ityuktaḥ prāha rājānaṃ padmajanmā hasann iva // NsP_25.36 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ prāha rājānam padmajanmā hasan iva

original: na śakyas tapasā draṣṭuṃ tvayā nārāyaṇo vibhuḥ /
analyzed: na śakyaḥ tapasā draṣṭum tvayā nārāyaṇaḥ vibhuḥ

original: mādṛśair api no dṛśyaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ // NsP_25.37 //
analyzed: mādṛśaiḥ api naḥ dṛśyaḥ keśavaḥ kleśa nāśanaḥ

original: purātanīṃ puṇyakathāṃ kathayāmi nibodha me /
analyzed: purātanīm puṇya kathām kathayāmi nibodha me

original: niśānte pralaye lokān ninīya kamalekṣaṇaḥ // NsP_25.38 //
analyzed: niśā ante pralaye lokān ninīya kamala īkṣaṇaḥ

original: anantabhogaśayane yoganidrāṃ gato hariḥ /
analyzed: ananta bhoga śayane yoganidrām gataḥ hariḥ

original: sanandanādyair munibhiḥ stūyamāno mahāmate // NsP_25.39 //
analyzed: sanandana ādyaiḥ munibhiḥ stūyamānaḥ mahāmate

original: tasya suptasya nābhau tu mahat padmam ajāyata /
analyzed: tasya suptasya nābhau tu mahat padmam ajāyata

original: tasmin padme śubhe rājan jāto 'haṃ vedavit purā // NsP_25.40 //
analyzed: tasmin padme śubhe rājan jātaḥ ham veda vid purā

original: tato bhūtvā tv adhodṛṣṭir dṛṣṭavān kamalekṣaṇam /
analyzed: tatas bhūtvā tu adhas dṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭavān kamala īkṣaṇam

original: anantabhogaparyaṅke bhinnāñjananibhaṃ harim // NsP_25.41 //
analyzed: ananta bhoga paryaṅke bhinnāñjana nibham harim

original: atasīkusumābhāsaṃ śayānaṃ pītavāsasam /
analyzed: atasī kusuma ābhāsam śayānam pīta vāsasam

original: divyaratnavicitrāṅgaṃ mukuṭena virājitam // NsP_25.42 //
analyzed: divya ratna vicitra aṅgam mukuṭena virājitam

original: kundendusadṛśākāram anantaṃ ca mahāmate /
analyzed: kunda indu sadṛśa ākāram anantam ca mahāmate

original: sahasraphaṇamadhyasthair maṇibhir dīptimattaram // NsP_25.43 //
analyzed: sahasra phaṇa madhya sthaiḥ maṇibhiḥ dīptimattaram

original: kṣaṇamātraṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā punas tatra na dṛṣṭavān /
analyzed: kṣaṇa mātram tu tam dṛṣṭvā punar tatra na dṛṣṭavān

original: duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭo babhūvāhaṃ nṛpottama // NsP_25.44 //
analyzed: duḥkhena mahatā āviṣṭaḥ babhūva aham nṛpa uttama

original: tato nv avātaraṃ tasmāt padmanālaṃ samāśritaḥ /
analyzed: tatas nu avātaram tasmāt padma nālam samāśritaḥ

original: kautūhalena taṃ draṣṭuṃ nārāyaṇam anāmayam // NsP_25.45 //
analyzed: kautūhalena tam draṣṭum nārāyaṇam anāmayam

original: tatas tv anviṣya rājendra salilānte na dṛṣṭavān /
analyzed: tatas tu anviṣya rāja indra salila ante na dṛṣṭavān

original: śrīśaṃ punas tam evāhaṃ padmam āśritya cintayan // NsP_25.46 //
analyzed: śrīśam punar tam eva aham padmam āśritya cintayan

original: tad rūpaṃ vāsudevasya draṣṭuṃ tepe mahat tapaḥ /
analyzed: tat rūpam vāsudevasya draṣṭum tepe mahat tapaḥ

original: tato mām antarikṣasthā vāg uvācāśarīriṇī // NsP_25.47 //
analyzed: tatas mām antarikṣa sthā vāc uvāca aśarīriṇī

original: vṛthā kiṃ kliśyate brahman sāṃprataṃ kuru me vacaḥ /
analyzed: vṛthā kim kliśyate brahman sāṃpratam kuru me vacaḥ

original: na dṛśyo bhagavān viṣṇus tapasā mahatāpi te // NsP_25.48 //
analyzed: na dṛśyaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ tapasā mahatā api te

original: sṛṣṭiṃ kuru tadājñapto yadi draṣṭum ihecchasi /
analyzed: sṛṣṭim kuru tad ājñaptaḥ yadi draṣṭum iha icchasi

original: śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśa- nāgaparyaṅkaśāyinam // NsP_25.49 //
analyzed: śuddha sphaṭika saṃkāśa nāga paryaṅka śāyinam

original: yad dṛṣṭaṃ śārṅgiṇo rūpaṃ bhinnāñjanasamaprabham /
analyzed: yat dṛṣṭam śārṅgiṇaḥ rūpam bhinnāñjana sama prabham

original: pratibhāniyataṃ rūpaṃ vimānasthaṃ mahāmate // NsP_25.50 //
analyzed: pratibhā niyatam rūpam vimāna stham mahāmate

original: bhaja nityam anālasyas tato drakṣyasi mādhavam /
analyzed: bhaja nityam anālasyaḥ tatas drakṣyasi mādhavam

original: tayetthaṃ codito rājaṃs tyaktvā taptam anukṣaṇam // NsP_25.51 //
analyzed: tayā ittham coditaḥ rājan tyaktvā taptam anu kṣaṇam

original: sṛṣṭavān lokabhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ sṛṣṭvā sthitasya ca /
analyzed: sṛṣṭavān loka bhūtānām sṛṣṭim sṛṣṭvā sthitasya ca

original: āvir babhūva manasi viśvakarmā prajāpatiḥ // NsP_25.52 //
analyzed: āvis babhūva manasi viśvakarmā prajāpatiḥ

original: anantakṛṣṇayos tena dve rūpe nirmite śubhe /
analyzed: ananta kṛṣṇayoḥ tena dve rūpe nirmite śubhe

original: vimānastho yathāpūrvaṃ mayā dṛṣṭo jale nṛpa // NsP_25.53 //
analyzed: vimāna sthaḥ yathāpūrvam mayā dṛṣṭaḥ jale nṛpa

original: tathaiva taṃ tato bhaktyā saṃpūjyāhaṃ hariṃ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva tam tatas bhaktyā saṃpūjya aham harim sthitaḥ

original: tatprasādāt tapaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ mayā jñānam anuttamam // NsP_25.54 //
analyzed: tad prasādāt tapaḥ śreṣṭham mayā jñānam anuttamam

original: labdhvā muktiṃ ca paśyāmi avikārakriyāsukham /
analyzed: labdhvā muktim ca paśyāmi avikāra kriyā sukham

original: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi hitaṃ nṛpavareśvara // NsP_25.55 //
analyzed: tat aham te pravakṣyāmi hitam nṛpa vara īśvara

original: visṛjyaitat tapo ghoraṃ purīṃ vraja nijāṃ nṛpa /
analyzed: visṛjya etat tapaḥ ghoram purīm vraja nijām nṛpa

original: prajānāṃ pālanaṃ dharmas tapaś caiva mahībhṛtām // NsP_25.56 //
analyzed: prajānām pālanam dharmaḥ tapaḥ ca eva mahībhṛtām

original: vimānaṃ preṣayiṣyāmi siddhadvijagaṇānvitam /
analyzed: vimānam preṣayiṣyāmi siddha dvija gaṇa anvitam

original: tatrārādhaya deveśaṃ bāhyārthair akhilaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NsP_25.57 //
analyzed: tatra ārādhaya deveśam bāhya arthaiḥ akhilaiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: nārāyaṇam anantākhye śayānaṃ kratubhir yajan /
analyzed: nārāyaṇam ananta ākhye śayānam kratubhiḥ yajan

original: niṣkāmo nṛpaśārdūla prajā dharmeṇa pālaya // NsP_25.58 //
analyzed: niṣkāmaḥ nṛpa śārdūla prajāḥ dharmeṇa pālaya

original: prasādād vāsudevasya muktis te bhavitā nṛpa /
analyzed: prasādāt vāsudevasya muktiḥ te bhavitā nṛpa

original: ity uktvā taṃ jagāmātha brahmalokaṃ pitāmahaḥ // NsP_25.59 //
analyzed: iti uktvā tam jagāma atha brahma lokam pitāmahaḥ

original: ikṣvākuś cintayann āste padmayonivaco dvija /
analyzed: ikṣvākuḥ cintayan āste padmayoni vacaḥ dvija

original: āvir babhūva purato vimānaṃ tan mahībhṛtaḥ // NsP_25.60 //
analyzed: āvis babhūva puratas vimānam tat mahībhṛtaḥ

original: brahmadattaṃ dvijayutaṃ mādhavānantayoḥ śubham /
analyzed: brahmadattam dvija yutam mādhava anantayoḥ śubham

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā parayā bhaktyā natvā ca puruṣottamam // NsP_25.61 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā parayā bhaktyā natvā ca puruṣottamam

original: ṛṣīn praṇamya viprāṃś ca tad ādāya yayau purīm /
analyzed: ṛṣīn praṇamya viprān ca tat ādāya yayau purīm

original: paurair janaiś ca nārībhir dṛṣṭaḥ śobhāsamanvitaiḥ // NsP_25.62 //
analyzed: pauraiḥ janaiḥ ca nārībhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ śobhā samanvitaiḥ

original: lājā vinikṣipadbhiś ca nīto rājā svakaṃ gṛham /
analyzed: lājāḥ vinikṣipadbhiḥ ca nītaḥ rājā svakam gṛham

original: svamandire viśāle tu vimānaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śubham // NsP_25.63 //
analyzed: sva mandire viśāle tu vimānam vaiṣṇavam śubham

original: saṃsthāpyārādhayām_asa tair dvijair arcitaṃ harim /
analyzed: saṃsthāpya ārādhayāmasa taiḥ dvijaiḥ arcitam harim

original: mahiṣyaḥ śobhanā yās tu piṣṭvā tu haricandanam // NsP_25.64 //
analyzed: mahiṣyaḥ śobhanāḥ yāḥ tu piṣṭvā tu haricandanam

original: mālāṃ kṛtvā sugandhāḍhyāṃ prītis tasya vavardha ha /
analyzed: mālām kṛtvā su gandha āḍhyām prītiḥ tasya vavardha ha

original: paurāḥ karpūraṃ śrīkhaṇḍaṃ kuṅkumādy aguruṃ tathā // NsP_25.65 //
analyzed: paurāḥ karpūram śrīkhaṇḍam kuṅkuma ādi agurum tathā

original: kṛtsnaṃ viśeṣato vastraṃ mahiṣākhyaṃ ca guggulam /
analyzed: kṛtsnam viśeṣataḥ vastram mahiṣa ākhyam ca guggulam

original: puṣpāṇi viṣṇuyogyāni dadur ānīya bhūpateḥ // NsP_25.66 //
analyzed: puṣpāṇi viṣṇu yogyāni daduḥ ānīya bhūpateḥ

original: vimānasthaṃ hariṃ pūjya gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ kramāt /
analyzed: vimāna stham harim pūjya gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ kramāt

original: trisaṃdhyaṃ parayā bhaktyā japaiḥ stotraiś ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ // NsP_25.67 //
analyzed: trisaṃdhyam parayā bhaktyā japaiḥ stotraiḥ ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ

original: gītaiḥ kolāhalaiḥ śabdaiḥ śaṅkhavāditranāditaiḥ /
analyzed: gītaiḥ kolāhalaiḥ śabdaiḥ śaṅkha vāditra nāditaiḥ

original: prekṣaṇair api śāstroktaiḥ prītaiś ca niśi jāgaraiḥ // NsP_25.68 //
analyzed: prekṣaṇaiḥ api śāstra uktaiḥ prītaiḥ ca niśi jāgaraiḥ

original: kārayām_asa suciram utsavaṃ paramaṃ hareḥ /
analyzed: kārayāmasa su ciram utsavam paramam hareḥ

original: yāgaiś ca toṣayitvā taṃ sarvadevamayaṃ harim // NsP_25.69 //
analyzed: yāgaiḥ ca toṣayitvā tam sarva deva mayam harim

original: niṣkāmo dānadharmaiś ca paraṃ jñānam avāptavān /
analyzed: niṣkāmaḥ dāna dharmaiḥ ca param jñānam avāptavān

original: yajan yajñaṃ mahīṃ rakṣan sa kurvan keśavārcanam // NsP_25.70 //
analyzed: yajan yajñam mahīm rakṣan sa kurvan keśava arcanam

original: utpādya putrān pitrarthaṃ dhyānāt tyaktvā kalevaram /
analyzed: utpādya putrān pitṛ artham dhyānāt tyaktvā kalevaram

original: dhyāyan vai kevalaṃ brahma prāptavān vaiṣṇavaṃ padam // NsP_25.71 //
analyzed: dhyāyan vai kevalam brahma prāptavān vaiṣṇavam padam

original: ajaṃ viśokaṃ vimalaṃ viśuddhaṃ śāntaṃ sadānandacidātmakaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: ajam viśokam vimalam viśuddham śāntam sadānanda cit ātmakam tatas

original: vihāya saṃsāram anantaduḥkhaṃ jagāma tad viṣṇupadaṃ hi rājā // NsP_25.72 //
analyzed: vihāya saṃsāram ananta duḥkham jagāma tat viṣṇu padam hi rājā

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe ikṣvākucarite pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 25 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe ikṣvākucarite pañcaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīsūta uvāca:
analyzed: śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: ḥikṣvākor vikukṣināmaputraḥ /
analyzed: ḥikṣvākoḥ vikukṣi nāma putraḥ

original: ḥsa tu siddhe pitari maharṣibhir abhiṣikto dharmeṇa pṛthivīṃ pālayan vimānastham
analyzed: ḥsa tu siddhe pitari mahā ṛṣibhiḥ abhiṣiktaḥ dharmeṇa pṛthivīm pālayan vimāna stham

original: anantabhogaśāyinam acyutam ārādhya yāgair api devān iṣṭvā svaputraṃ rājye subāhum
analyzed: ananta bhoga śāyinam acyutam ārādhya yāgaiḥ api devān iṣṭvā sva putram rājye subāhum

original: abhiṣicya divam āruroha /
analyzed: abhiṣicya divam āruroha

original: ḥsubāhor bhrājamānād udyoto 'bhigīyate /
analyzed: ḥsubāhoḥ bhrājamānāt udyotaḥ

original: ḥsa tu saptadvīpāṃ pṛthvīṃ dharmeṇa pālayitvā bhaktiṃ parāṃ nārāyaṇe pitāmahavat
analyzed: ḥsa tu sapta dvīpām pṛthvīm dharmeṇa pālayitvā bhaktim parām nārāyaṇe pitāmaha vat

original: kṛtvā kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇair yajñeśvaraṃ niṣkāmena manaseṣṭvā nityaṃ nirañjanaṃ
analyzed: kṛtvā kratubhiḥ bhūri dakṣiṇaiḥ yajñeśvaram niṣkāmena manasā iṣṭvā nityam nirañjanam

original: nirvikalpaṃ paraṃ jyotir amṛtākṣaraṃ paramātmarūpaṃ dhyātvā harim anantaṃ ca param
analyzed: nirvikalpam param jyotiḥ amṛta akṣaram paramātma rūpam dhyātvā harim anantam ca param

original: ārādhya svargalokaṃ gataḥ // NsP_26.1 //
analyzed: ārādhya svarga lokam gataḥ

original: ḥtasya yuvanāśvo yuvanāśvasya ca māndhātā putro 'bhavat /
analyzed: ḥtasya yuvanāśvaḥ yuvanāśvasya ca māndhātā putraḥ bhavat

original: ḥsa cābhiṣikto maharṣibhir nisargād eva viṣṇubhakto 'nantaśayanam acyutaṃ bhaktyārādhayan yāgaiś ca vividhair iṣṭvā saptadvīpavatīṃ pṛthivīṃ  #
analyzed: ḥsa ca abhiṣiktaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ nisargāt eva viṣṇu bhaktaḥ nanta śayanam acyutam bhaktyā ārādhayan yāgaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ iṣṭvā sapta dvīpavatīm pṛthivīm

original: paripālya divaṃ gataḥ // NsP_26.2 //
analyzed: paripālya divam gataḥ

original: ḥyasyaiṣa śloko gīyate /
analyzed: ḥyasya eṣa ślokaḥ gīyate

original: yāvat sūrya udeti sma yāvac ca pratitiṣṭhati /
analyzed: yāvat sūryaḥ udeti sma yāvat ca pratitiṣṭhati

original: sarvaṃ tad yauvanāśvasya māndhātuḥ kṣetram ucyate // NsP_26.3 //
analyzed: sarvam tat yauvanāśvasya māndhātuḥ kṣetram ucyate

original: ḥtasya purukuśyo 'bhavad yena devā brāhmaṇāś ca yāgadānaiḥ saṃtuṣṭāḥ // NsP_26.4 //
analyzed: ḥtasya puru kuśyaḥ bhavat yena devāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ca yāga dānaiḥ saṃtuṣṭāḥ

original: ḥpurukuśyād dṛṣado dṛṣadād abhiśaṃbhuḥ /
analyzed: ḥpurukuśyāt dṛṣadaḥ dṛṣadāt abhiśaṃbhuḥ

original: ḥabhiśaṃbhor dāruṇo dāruṇāt sagaraḥ // NsP_26.5 //
analyzed: ḥabhiśaṃbhoḥ dāruṇaḥ dāruṇāt sagaraḥ

original: ḥsagarād dharyaśvo haryaśvād dhārīto hārītād rohitāśvaḥ /
analyzed: ḥsagarāt haryaśvaḥ haryaśvāt dhārītaḥ hārītāt rohitāśvaḥ

original: ḥrohitāśvād aṃśumān // NsP_26.6 //
analyzed: ḥrohitāśvāt aṃśumān

original: ḥaṃśumato bhagīrathaḥ /
analyzed: ḥaṃśumataḥ bhagīrathaḥ

original: ḥyena mahatā tapasā purā divo gaṅgā aśeṣakalmaṣanāśinī caturvidhapuruṣārthadāyinī bhuvam ānītā /
analyzed: ḥyena mahatā tapasā purā divaḥ gaṅgā aśeṣa kalmaṣa nāśinī caturvidha puruṣa artha dāyinī bhuvam ānītā

original: ḥasthiśarkarābhūtāḥ kapilamaharṣinirdagdhāś ca guravaḥ sagarākhyā gaṅgātoyasaṃspṛṣṭā divam āropitāḥ /
analyzed: ḥasthiśarkarā bhūtāḥ kapila mahā ṛṣi nirdagdhāḥ ca guravaḥ sagara ākhyāḥ gaṅgā toya saṃspṛṣṭāḥ divam āropitāḥ

original: ḥbhagīrathāt saudāsaḥ saudāsāt satrasavaḥ // NsP_26.7 //
analyzed: ḥbhagīrathāt saudāsaḥ saudāsāt satrasavaḥ

original: ḥsatrasavād anaraṇyo 'naraṇyād dīrghabāhuḥ // NsP_26.8 //
analyzed: ḥsatrasavāt anaraṇyaḥ naraṇyāt dīrgha bāhuḥ

original: ḥdīrghabāhor ajo 'jād daśarathaḥ /
analyzed: ḥ dīrghabāhoḥ ajaḥ jāt daśarathaḥ

original: ḥtasya gṛhe rāvaṇavināśārthaṃ sākṣān nārāyaṇo 'vatīrṇo rāmaḥ // NsP_26.9 //
analyzed: ḥtasya gṛhe rāvaṇa vināśa artham sākṣāt nārāyaṇaḥ vatīrṇaḥ rāmaḥ

original: ḥsa tu pitṛvacanād bhrātṛbhāryāsahito daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ prāpya tapaś cacāra /
analyzed: ḥsa tu pitṛ vacanāt bhrātṛ bhāryā sahitaḥ daṇḍaka araṇyam prāpya tapaḥ cacāra

original: ḥvane rāvaṇāpahṛtabhāryo bhrātrā saha duḥkhito 'nekakoṭivānaranāyakasugrīvasahāyo
analyzed: rāvaṇa apahṛta bhāryaḥ bhrātrā saha duḥkhitaḥ neka koṭi vānara nāyaka sugrīva sahāyaḥ

original: mahodadhau setuṃ nibadhya tair gatvā laṅkāṃ rāvaṇaṃ devakaṇṭakaṃ sabāndhavaṃ hatvā
analyzed: mahā udadhau setum nibadhya taiḥ gatvā laṅkām rāvaṇam deva kaṇṭakam sa bāndhavam hatvā

original: sītām ādāya punar ayodhyāṃ prāpya bharatābhiṣikto vibhīṣaṇāya laṅkārājyaṃ vimānaṃ
analyzed: sītām ādāya punar ayodhyām prāpya bharata abhiṣiktaḥ vibhīṣaṇāya laṅkā rājyam vimānam

original: vā dattvā taṃ preṣayām_asa /
analyzed: vā dattvā tam preṣayāmasa

original: ḥsa tu parameśvaro vimānastho vibhīṣaṇena nīyamāno laṅkāyām api rākṣasapuryāṃ vastum anicchan puṇyāraṇyaṃ tatra sthāpitavān // NsP_26.10 //
analyzed: ḥsa tu parameśvaraḥ vimāna sthaḥ vibhīṣaṇena nīyamānaḥ laṅkāyām api rākṣasa puryām vastum an icchan puṇya araṇyam tatra sthāpitavān

original: ḥtan nirīkṣya tatraiva mahāhibhogaśayane bhagavān śete /
analyzed: nirīkṣya tatra eva mahā ahi bhoga śayane bhagavān śete

original: ḥso 'pi vibhīṣaṇas tatas tadvimānaṃ netum asamarthaḥ tadvacanāt svāṃ purīṃ jagāma // NsP_26.11 //
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ tatas tat vimānam netum asamarthaḥ tad vacanāt svām purīm jagāma

original: ḥnārāyaṇasaṃnidhānān mahad vaiṣṇavaṃ kṣetram abhavad adyāpi dṛśyate /
analyzed: mahat vaiṣṇavam kṣetram abhavat adya api dṛśyate

original: ḥrāmāl lavo lavāt padmaḥ padmād ṛtuparṇa ṛṭuparṇād astrapāṇiḥ /
analyzed: ḥrāmāt lavaḥ lavāt padmaḥ padmāt ṛtuparṇaḥ ṛṭuparṇāt astrapāṇiḥ

original: ḥastrapāṇeḥ śuddhodanaḥ śuddhodanād buddhaḥ /
analyzed: ḥastrapāṇeḥ śuddhodanaḥ śuddhodanāt buddhaḥ

original: ḥbuddhād vaṃśo nivartate // NsP_26.12 //
analyzed: ḥ buddhāt vaṃśaḥ nivartate

original: ete mahīpā ravivaṃśajās tava prādhānyatas te kathitā mahābalāḥ /
analyzed: ete mahīpāḥ ravi vaṃśa jāḥ tava prādhānyataḥ te kathitāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: purātanair yair vasudhā prapālitā yajñakriyābhiś ca divaukasair nṛpaiḥ // NsP_26.13 //
analyzed: purātanaiḥ yaiḥ vasudhā prapālitā yajña kriyābhiḥ ca divaukasaiḥ nṛpaiḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe sūryavaṃśānucaritaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 26 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe sūryavaṃśānucaritam nāma ṣaḍviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: ḥatha somavaṃśodbhavānāṃ bhūbhujāṃ saṃkṣepeṇa caritam ucyate // NsP_27.1 //
analyzed: atha soma vaṃśa udbhavānām bhūbhujām saṃkṣepeṇa caritam ucyate

original: ḥādau tāvat samastaṃ trailokyaṃ kukṣau kṛtvā ekārṇave mahāmbhasi nāgabhogaśayane // NsP_27.2 //
analyzed: ḥādau tāvat samastam trailokyam kukṣau kṛtvā ekārṇave mahā ambhasi nāga bhoga śayane

original: ḥṛṅmayo yajurmayaḥ sāmamayo 'tharvamayo bhagavān nārāyaṇo yoganidrāṃ samārebhe /
analyzed: ṛk mayaḥ yajuḥ mayaḥ sāma mayaḥ tharva mayaḥ bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ yoganidrām samārebhe

original: ḥtasya suptasya nābhau mahāpadmam ajāyata /
analyzed: ḥtasya suptasya nābhau mahāpadmam ajāyata

original: ḥtasmin padme caturmukho brahmābhavat // NsP_27.3 //
analyzed: ḥtasmin padme catur mukhaḥ brahmā abhavat

original: ḥtasya brahmaṇo mānasaḥ putro 'trir abhavat /
analyzed: ḥtasya brahmaṇaḥ mānasaḥ putraḥ u tris abhavat

original: ḥatrer anasūyāyāṃ somaḥ /
analyzed: ḥatreḥ anasūyāyām somaḥ

original: ḥsa tu prajāpater dakṣasya trayastriṃśat kanyā rohiṇyādyā bhāryārthaṃ gṛhītvā priyāyāṃ jyeṣṭhāyāṃ viśeṣāt prasannamanāḥ rohiṇyāṃ budhaṃ putram  #
analyzed: ḥsa tu prajāpateḥ dakṣasya trayastriṃśat kanyāḥ rohiṇī ādyāḥ bhāryā artham gṛhītvā priyāyām jyeṣṭhāyām viśeṣāt prasanna manāḥ rohiṇyām budham putram

original: utpādayām_asa // NsP_27.4 //
analyzed: utpādayāmasa

original: ḥbudho 'pi sarvaśāstrajñaḥ pratiṣṭhāne pure 'vasat /
analyzed: ḥbudhaḥ pi sarva śāstra jñaḥ pratiṣṭhāne pure vasat

original: ḥilāyāṃ purūravasaṃ putram utpādayām_asa /
analyzed: ḥilāyām purūravasam putram utpādayāmasa

original: ḥtasyātiśayarūpānvitasya svargabhogān vihāya urvaśī bahukālaṃ bhāryā babhūva // NsP_27.5 //
analyzed: ḥtasya atiśaya rūpa anvitasya svarga bhogān vihāya urvaśī bahu kālam bhāryā babhūva

original: ḥpurūravasaḥ urvaśyām āyuḥ putro jajñe /
analyzed: ḥ purūravasaḥ urvaśyām āyuḥ putraḥ jajñe

original: ḥsa tu rājyaṃ dharmataḥ kṛtvā divam āruroha // NsP_27.6 //
analyzed: ḥsa tu rājyam dharmataḥ kṛtvā divam āruroha

original: ḥāyo rūpavatyāṃ nahuṣaḥ putro 'bhavat /
analyzed: rūpavatyām nahuṣaḥ putraḥ bhavat

original: ḥyenendratvaṃ prāptam /
analyzed: ḥyena indra tvam prāptam

original: ḥnahuṣasyāpi pitṛmatyāṃ yayātiḥ // NsP_27.7 //
analyzed: ḥnahuṣasya api pitṛmatyām yayātiḥ

original: ḥyasya vaṃśajā vṛṣṇayaḥ /
analyzed: ḥyasya vaṃśa jāḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ

original: ḥyayāteḥ śarmiṣṭhāyāṃ pūrur abhavat // NsP_27.8 //
analyzed: ḥyayāteḥ śarmiṣṭhāyām pūruḥ abhavat

original: ḥpūror vaṃśadāyāṃ saṃyātiḥ putro 'bhavat /
analyzed: ḥpūroḥ vaṃśa dāyām saṃyātiḥ putraḥ bhavat

original: ḥyasya pṛthivyāṃ saṃpannāḥ sarve kāmāḥ // NsP_27.9 //
analyzed: ḥyasya pṛthivyām saṃpannāḥ sarve kāmāḥ

original: ḥsaṃyāter bhānudattāyāṃ sārvabhaumaḥ /
analyzed: ḥsaṃyāteḥ bhānu dattāyām sārvabhaumaḥ

original: ḥsa tu sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ dharmeṇa paripālayan narasiṃhaṃ bhagavantam ārādhya yāgadānaiḥ siddhim āpa // NsP_27.10 //
analyzed: ḥsa tu sarvām pṛthivīm dharmeṇa paripālayan narasiṃham bhagavantam ārādhya yāga dānaiḥ siddhim āpa

original: ḥtasya sārvabhaumasya vaidehyāṃ bhojaḥ /
analyzed: ḥtasya sārvabhaumasya vaidehyām bhojaḥ

original: ḥyasya vaṃśe purā devāsurasaṃgrāme viṣṇucakrahataḥ kālanemiḥ kaṃso bhūtvā vṛṣṇivaṃśajena vāsudevena ghātito nidhanaṃ gataḥ // NsP_27.11 //
analyzed: ḥyasya vaṃśe purā devāsura saṃgrāme viṣṇu cakra hataḥ kālanemiḥ kaṃsaḥ bhūtvā vṛṣṇi vaṃśa jena vāsudevena ghātitaḥ nidhanam gataḥ

original: ḥtasya bhojasya kaliṅgāyāṃ duṣyantaḥ /
analyzed: ḥtasya bhojasya kaliṅgāyām duṣyantaḥ

original: ḥsa tu narasiṃhaṃ bhagavantam ārādhya tatprasādān niṣkaṇṭakaṃ rājyaṃ dharmeṇa kṛtvā divaṃ prāptavān /
analyzed: ḥsa tu narasiṃham bhagavantam ārādhya tad prasādāt niṣkaṇṭakam rājyam dharmeṇa kṛtvā divam prāptavān

original: ḥduṣyantasya śakuntalāyāṃ bharataḥ sa tu dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kurvan kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
analyzed: ḥduṣyantasya śakuntalāyām bharataḥ sa tu dharmeṇa rājyam kurvan kratubhiḥ bhūri dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: sarvadevatāmayaṃ bhagavantam ārādhya nivṛttādhikāro brahmadhyānaparo vaiṣṇave pare
analyzed: sarva devatā mayam bhagavantam ārādhya nivṛtta adhikāraḥ brahma dhyāna paraḥ vaiṣṇave pare

original: jyotiṣi layam avāpa // NsP_27.12 //
analyzed: jyotiṣi layam avāpa

original: ḥbharatasya ānandāyām ajamīḍhaḥ /
analyzed: ḥbharatasya ānandāyām ajamīḍhaḥ

original: ḥsa ca paramavaiṣṇavo narasiṃham ārādhya jātaputro dharmeṇa kṛtarājyo viṣṇupuram āruroha // NsP_27.13 //
analyzed: ḥsa ca parama vaiṣṇavaḥ narasiṃham ārādhya jāta putraḥ dharmeṇa kṛta rājyaḥ viṣṇu puram āruroha

original: ḥajamīḍhasya sudevyāṃ vṛṣṇiḥ putro 'bhavat /
analyzed: ḥajamīḍhasya sudevyām vṛṣṇiḥ putraḥ bhavat

original: ḥso 'pi bahuvarṣaṃ dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kurvan duṣṭanigrahaṃ śiṣṭaparipālanaṃ saptadvīpāṃ vaśe cakre /
analyzed: ḥsaḥ pi bahu varṣam dharmeṇa rājyam kurvan duṣṭa nigraham śiṣṭa paripālanam saptadvīpām vaśe cakre

original: ḥvṛṣṇer ugrasenāyāṃ pratyañcaḥ putro babhūva // NsP_27.14 //
analyzed: vṛṣṇeḥ ugrasenāyām pratyañcaḥ putraḥ babhūva

original: ḥso 'pi dharmeṇa medinīṃ pālayan pratisaṃvatsaraṃ jyotiṣṭomaṃ cakāra /
analyzed: ḥsaḥ pi dharmeṇa medinīm pālayan pratisaṃvatsaram jyotiṣṭomam cakāra

original: ḥnirvāṇam api labdhavān /
analyzed: ḥnirvāṇam api labdhavān

original: ḥpratyañcasya bahurūpāyāṃ śāṃtanuḥ // NsP_27.15 //
analyzed: ḥ pratyañcasya bahu rūpāyām śāṃtanuḥ

original: ḥtasya devadattasyandanārohaṇam aśakyaṃ babhūva purataḥ śakyaṃ ca // NsP_27.16 //
analyzed: ḥtasya devadatta syandana ārohaṇam aśakyam babhūva puratas śakyam ca

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe somavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 27 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe somavaṃśavarṇanam nāma saptaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: bharadvāja uvāca:
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ uvāca

original: syandanārohaṇe pūrvam aśaktiḥ śāṃtanoḥ katham /
analyzed: syandana ārohaṇe pūrvam aśaktiḥ śāṃtanoḥ katham

original: paścāc chaktiḥ kathaṃ cāsīt tasya vai tad vadasva naḥ // NsP_28.1 //
analyzed: paścāt śaktiḥ katham ca āsīt tasya vai tat vadasva naḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: bharadvāja śṛṇuṣvaitat purāvṛttaṃ vadāmi te /
analyzed: bharadvāja śṛṇuṣva etat purāvṛttam vadāmi te

original: sarvapāpaharaṃ tad dhi caritaṃ śāṃtanor nṛṇām // NsP_28.2 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa haram tat hi caritam śāṃtanoḥ nṛṇām

original: babhūva śāṃtanur bhakto narasiṃhatanau purā /
analyzed: babhūva śāṃtanuḥ bhaktaḥ narasiṃha tanau purā

original: nāradoktavidhānena pūjayām_asa mādhavam // NsP_28.3 //
analyzed: nārada ukta vidhānena pūjayāmasa mādhavam

original: narasiṃhasya devasya nirmālyaṃ tena laṅghitam /
analyzed: narasiṃhasya devasya nirmālyam tena laṅghitam

original: rājñā śāṃtanunā vipra tasmāt syandanam uttamam // NsP_28.4 //
analyzed: rājñā śāṃtanunā vipra tasmāt syandanam uttamam

original: devadattaṃ tad āroḍhum aśaktas tatkṣaṇād abhūt /

analyzed: nārada etat na jānāmi gati bhaṅgasya kāraṇam

analyzed: atha svargāt upāgamyaḥ indra putraḥ rathena vai

analyzed: dine dine hṛte puṣpe mālākāraḥ pi acintayat

analyzed: na anyat dvāram vanasya asyāḥ laṅghya prākāram unnatam

analyzed: nirmālyam laṅghayāmase indra sūnuḥ aniṣṭa kṛt

analyzed: sārathiḥ uvāca

analyzed: iti uktaḥ kathayitvā tu yathāvṛttam anukramāt

analyzed: divam āruroha

analyzed: ḥyena bhārata yuddhe cakra vyūham praviśya aneka bhūbhujaḥ nidhanam prāpitāḥ

original: ḥtasya śatānīkasya phalavatyāṃ sahasrānīkaḥ // NsP_29.8 //
analyzed: śatānīkasya phalavatyām sahasrānīkaḥ

original: ḥtasya caritam upariṣṭād bhaviṣyati // NsP_29.9 //

original: ḥsahasrānīkasya mṛgavantyām udayanaḥ /

original: ḥso 'pi rājyaṃ kṛtvā dharmato nārāyaṇam ārādhya tatpuram avāpa // NsP_29.10 //

analyzed: ḥudayanasya vāsavadattāyām naravāhanaḥ

original: ḥsa tu yathānyāyaṃ rājyaṃ kṛtvā divam avāpa /
analyzed: ḥsa tu yathānyāyam rājyam kṛtvā divam avāpa

original: ḥnaravāhanasyāśvamedhadattāyāṃ kṣemakaḥ // NsP_29.11 //
analyzed: ḥ naravāhanasya aśvamedha dattāyām kṣemakaḥ

original: ḥsa ca rājyasthaḥ prajāḥ paripālya mlecchābhibhūte jagati jñānabalāt kalāpagrāmam āśritaḥ // NsP_29.12 //
analyzed: ḥsa ca rājya sthaḥ prajāḥ paripālya mleccha abhibhūte jagati jñāna balāt kalāpa grāmam āśritaḥ

original: yaḥ śraddadhānaḥ paṭhate śṛṇoti vā harau ca bhaktiṃ caritaṃ mahībhṛtām /
analyzed: yaḥ śraddadhānaḥ paṭhate śṛṇoti vā harau ca bhaktim caritam mahībhṛtām

original: sa saṃtatiṃ prāpya viśuddhakarmakṛd divaṃ samāsādya vasec ciraṃ sukhī // NsP_29.13 //
analyzed: sa saṃtatim prāpya viśuddha karma kṛt divam samāsādya vaset ciram sukhī

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe śaṃtanusaṃtativarṇanaṃ nāma ekonatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 29 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe śaṃtanusaṃtativarṇanam nāma ekonatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīsūta uvāca:
analyzed: śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi bhūgolaṃ dvijasattamāḥ /
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi bhū golam dvijasattamāḥ

original: saṃkṣepāt parvatākīrṇaṃ nadībhiś ca samantataḥ // NsP_30.1 //
analyzed: saṃkṣepāt parvata ākīrṇam nadībhiḥ ca samantataḥ

original: ḥjambuplakṣaśālmalakuśakrauñcaśākapuṣkarasaṃjñāḥ sapta dvīpāḥ /
analyzed: ḥ jambu plakṣa śālmala kuśa krauñca śāka puṣkara saṃjñāḥ sapta dvīpāḥ

original: ḥlakṣayojanapramāṇāj jambudvīpād uttarottaradviguṇāḥ /
analyzed: ḥlakṣa yojana pramāṇāt jambudvīpāt uttarottara dviguṇāḥ

original: ḥlavaṇekṣurasasurāsarpirdadhidugdhasvacchodakasaṃjñaiḥ parasparaṃ dviguṇaiḥ saptasamudrair valayākārais te dvīpāḥ paridhiṣṭhitāḥ // NsP_30.2
analyzed: ḥ lavaṇa ikṣu rasa surā sarpiḥ dadhi dugdha svaccha udaka saṃjñaiḥ parasparam dviguṇaiḥ sapta samudraiḥ valaya ākāraiḥ te dvīpāḥ paridhiṣṭhitāḥ  /

original: ḥyo 'sau manuputraḥ priyavrato nāma sa saptadvīpādhipatir babhūva /
analyzed: sau manu putraḥ priyavrataḥ nāma sa saptadvīpā adhipatiḥ babhūva

original: ḥtasya agnīdhrādayo daśa putrā babhūvuḥ // NsP_30.3 //
analyzed: agnīdhra ādayaḥ daśa putrāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: ḥtrayaḥ pravrajitāḥ /
analyzed: ḥ trayaḥ pravrajitāḥ

original: ḥśiṣṭānāṃ saptānāṃ saptadvīpāḥ pitrā dattāḥ /
analyzed: ḥśiṣṭānām saptānām sapta dvīpāḥ pitrā dattāḥ

original: ḥtatra jambudvīpādhipater agnīdhrasya nava putrāḥ jātāḥ // NsP_30.4 //
analyzed: ḥtatra jambudvīpa adhipateḥ agnīdhrasya nava putrāḥ jātāḥ

original: nābhiḥ kiṃpuruṣaś caiva harivarṣa ilāvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: nābhiḥ kiṃpuruṣaḥ ca eva harivarṣaḥ ilāvṛtaḥ

original: ramyo hiraṇyayaś caiva kurur bhadraś ca ketumān // NsP_30.5 //
analyzed: ramyaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ ca eva kuruḥ bhadraḥ ca ketumān

original: ḥnavavarṣāḥ vibhajya putrebhyaḥ pitrā dattā vanaṃ praviśatā /
analyzed: vibhajya putrebhyaḥ pitrā dattā vanam praviśatā

original: ḥagnīdhrīyaṃ himāhvayam /
analyzed: ḍagnīdhrīyam himāhvayam

original: ḥyasyādhipatir nābheḥ ṛṣabhaḥ putro babhūva // NsP_30.6 //
analyzed: ḥyasya adhipatiḥ nābheḥ ṛṣabhaḥ putraḥ babhūva

original: ḥṛṣabhād bharato bharatena cirakālaṃ dharmeṇa pālitatvād idaṃ bhārataṃ varṣam abhūt /
analyzed: ḥṛṣabhāt bharataḥ bharatena cira kālam dharmeṇa pālita tvāt idam bhāratam varṣam abhūt

original: ḥilāvṛtasya madhye meruḥ suvarṇamayaś caturaśītisahasrāṇi yojanāni tasyocchrāyaḥ /
analyzed: madhye meruḥ suvarṇa mayaḥ caturaśīti sahasrāṇi yojanāni tasya ucchrāyaḥ

original: ḥṣoḍaśasahasram apy adhastād avagāḍhaḥ /
analyzed: ḥṣoḍaśa sahasram api adhastāt avagāḍhaḥ

original: ḥtaddviguṇo mūrdhni vistāraḥ // NsP_30.7 //
analyzed: ḥ tad dviguṇaḥ mūrdhni vistāraḥ

original: ḥtanmadhye brahmaṇaḥ purī /
analyzed: ḥ tad madhye brahmaṇaḥ purī

original: ḥaindryām indrasya cāmarāvatī /
analyzed: ḥaindryām indrasya ca amarāvatī

original: ḥāgneyyām agnes tejovatī /
analyzed: ḥ āgneyyām agneḥ tejovatī

original: ḥyāmyāṃ yamasya saṃyamanī /
analyzed: ḥyāmyām yamasya saṃyamanī

original: ḥnairṛtyāṃ nirṛter bhayaṃkarī /
analyzed: ḥnairṛtyām nirṛteḥ bhayaṃkarī

original: ḥvāruṇyāṃ varuṇasya viśvāvatī /
analyzed: vāruṇyām varuṇasya viśvāvatī

original: ḥvāyavyāṃ vāyor gandhavatī /
analyzed: ḥ vāyavyām vāyoḥ gandhavatī

original: ḥudīcyāṃ somasya vibhāvarīti /
analyzed: ḥ udīcyām somasya vibhāvarī iti

original: ḥnavavarṣānvitaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ puṇyaparvataiḥ puṇyanadībhir anvitam // NsP_30.8 //
analyzed: ḥnava varṣa anvitam jambūdvīpam puṇya parvataiḥ puṇya nadībhiḥ anvitam

original: ḥkiṃpuruṣādīny aṣṭavarṣāṇi puṇyavatāṃ bhogasthānāni sākṣād bhāratavarṣam ekaṃ karmabhūmiś cāturvarṇyayutam // NsP_30.9 //
analyzed: ḥkiṃpuruṣa ādīni aṣṭa varṣāṇi puṇyavatām bhogasthānāni sākṣāt bhārata varṣam ekam karma bhūmiḥ cāturvarṇya yutam

original: tatraiva karmabhiḥ svargaṃ kṛteḥ prāpsyanti mānavāḥ /
analyzed: tatra eva karmabhiḥ svargam kṛteḥ prāpsyanti mānavāḥ

original: muktiś cātraiva niṣkāmaiḥ prāpyate jñānakarmabhiḥ /
analyzed: muktiḥ ca atra eva niṣkāmaiḥ prāpyate jñāna karmabhiḥ

original: adhogatim ito vipra yānti vai pāpakāriṇaḥ // NsP_30.10 //
analyzed: adhogatim itas vipra yānti vai pāpa kāriṇaḥ

original: ḥye pāpakāriṇas tān viddhi pātālatale narake koṭisamanvitān // NsP_30.11 //
analyzed: ḥye pāpa kāriṇaḥ tān viddhi pātāla tale narake koṭi samanvitān

original: ḥatha sapta kulaparvatāḥ kathyante /
analyzed: atha sapta kulaparvatāḥ kathyante

original: ḥmahendro malayaḥ śuktimān ṛṣyamūkaḥ sahyaparvato vindhyaḥ pāriyātraḥ /
analyzed: ḥmahendraḥ malayaḥ śuktimān ṛṣyamūkaḥ sahya parvataḥ vindhyaḥ pāriyātraḥ

original: ḥity ete bhārate kulaparvatāḥ // NsP_30.12 //
analyzed: ḥ iti ete bhārate kulaparvatāḥ

original: ḥnarmadā surasā ṛṣikulyā bhīmarathī kṛṣṇāveṇī candrabhāgā tāmraparṇī ity etāḥ sapta nadyaḥ /
analyzed: narmadā surasā ṛṣikulyā bhīmarathī kṛṣṇā veṇī candrabhāgā tāmraparṇī iti etāḥ sapta nadyaḥ

original: ḥgaṅgā yamunā godāvarī tuṅgabhadrā kāverī sarayūr ity etā mahānadyaḥ papaghnyaḥ // NsP_30.13 //
analyzed: ḥgaṅgā yamunā godāvarī tuṅgabhadrā kāverī sarayūḥ iti etāḥ mahā nadyaḥ papaghnyaḥ

original: jambunāmnā ca vikhyātaṃ jambudvīpam idaṃ śubham /
analyzed: jambu nāmnā ca vikhyātam jambudvīpam idam śubham

original: lakṣayojanavistīrṇam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tu bhāratam // NsP_30.14 //
analyzed: lakṣa yojana vistīrṇam idam śreṣṭham tu bhāratam

original: ḥṛkṣadvīpādipuṇyā janapadāḥ /
analyzed: ṛkṣadvīpa ādi puṇyāḥ janapadāḥ

original: ḥniṣkāmā ye svadharmeṇa narasiṃhaṃ yajanti te tatra nivasanti /
analyzed: ḥniṣkāmāḥ ye svadharmeṇa narasiṃham yajanti te tatra nivasanti

original: ḥadhikārakṣayān muktiṃ ca prāpnuvanti // NsP_30.15 //
analyzed: ḥadhikāra kṣayāt muktim ca prāpnuvanti

original: ḥjambvādyāḥ svādūdakāntāḥ sapta payodhayaḥ /
ḥtataḥ parā hiraṇmayī bhūmiḥ /
analyzed: ḥ tatas parā hiraṇmayī bhūmiḥ

original: ḥtato lokālokaparvataḥ eṣa bhūrlokaḥ // NsP_30.16 //
analyzed: ḥ tatas lokāloka parvataḥ eṣa bhūrlokaḥ

original: ḥasyopari antarikṣalokaḥ /
analyzed: ḥasya upari antarikṣa lokaḥ

original: ḥkhecarāṇāṃ ramyas tadūrdhvaṃ svargalokaḥ // NsP_30.17 //
analyzed: ramyaḥ tad ūrdhvam svarga lokaḥ

original: svargasthānaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ procyamānaṃ nibodhata /
analyzed: svarga sthānam mahā puṇyam procyamānam nibodhata

original: bhārate kṛtapuṇyānāṃ devānām api cālayam // NsP_30.18 //
analyzed: bhārate kṛta puṇyānām devānām api ca ālayam

original: madhye pṛthivyām adrīndro bhāsvān merur hiraṇmayaḥ /
analyzed: madhye pṛthivyām adri indraḥ bhāsvān meruḥ hiraṇmayaḥ

original: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi caturāśītim ucchritaḥ // NsP_30.19 //
analyzed: yojanānām sahasrāṇi catura aśītim ucchritaḥ

original: praviṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśādhastād dharaṇyāṃ dharaṇīdharaḥ /
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśa adhastāt dharaṇyām dharaṇīdharaḥ

original: tāvatpramāṇā pṛthivī parvatasya samantataḥ // NsP_30.20 //
analyzed: tāvat pramāṇā pṛthivī parvatasya samantataḥ

original: tasya śṛṅgatrayaṃ mūrdhni svargo yatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: tasya śṛṅga trayam mūrdhni svargaḥ yatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: nānādrumalatākīrṇaṃ nānāpuṣpopaśobhitam // NsP_30.21 //
analyzed: nānā druma latā ākīrṇam nānā puṣpa upaśobhitam

original: madhyamaṃ paścimaṃ pūrvaṃ meroḥ śṛṅgāṇi trīṇi vai /
analyzed: madhyamam paścimam pūrvam meroḥ śṛṅgāṇi trīṇi vai

original: madhyamaṃ sphāṭikaṃ śṛṅgaṃ vaiḍūryamaṇikāmayam // NsP_30.22 //
analyzed: madhyamam sphāṭikam śṛṅgam vaiḍūrya maṇikā mayam

original: indranīlamayaṃ pūrvaṃ māṇikyaṃ paścimaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: indranīla mayam pūrvam māṇikyam paścimam smṛtam

original: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi niyutāni caturdaśa // NsP_30.23 //
analyzed: yojanānām sahasrāṇi niyutāni caturdaśa

original: ucchritaṃ madhyamaṃ śṛṅgaṃ svargo yatra triviṣṭapaḥ /
analyzed: ucchritam madhyamam śṛṅgam svargaḥ yatra triviṣṭapaḥ

original: aprabhāntaritaṃ śṛṅgaṃ mūrdhni chatrākṛti sthitam // NsP_30.24 //
analyzed: aprabhā antaritam śṛṅgam mūrdhni chatra ākṛti sthitam

original: pūrvam uttaraśṛṅgāṇām antaraṃ madhyamasya ca /
analyzed: pūrvam uttara śṛṅgāṇām antaram madhyamasya ca

original: triviṣṭapo nākapṛṣṭhe hy apsarāḥ santi nirvṛtāḥ // NsP_30.25 //
analyzed: triviṣṭapaḥ nāka pṛṣṭhe hi apsarāḥ santi nirvṛtāḥ

original: ānando 'tha pramodaś ca svargaśṛṅge tu madhyame /
analyzed: pramodaḥ ca svarga śṛṅge tu madhyame

original: śvetaś ca pauṣṭikaś caiva upaśobhanamanmathau // NsP_30.26 //
analyzed: śvetaḥ ca pauṣṭikaḥ ca eva upaśobhana manmathau

original: āhlādaḥ svargarājā vai svargaśṛṅge tu paścime /
analyzed: āhlādaḥ svarga rājā vai svargaśṛṅge tu paścime

original: nirmamo nirahaṃkāraḥ saubhāgyaś cātinirmalaḥ // NsP_30.27 //
analyzed: nirmamaḥ nirahaṃkāraḥ saubhāgyaḥ ca ati nirmalaḥ

original: svargāś caiva dvijaśreṣṭha pūrvaśṛṅge samāsthitaḥ /
analyzed: svargāḥ ca eva dvijaśreṣṭha pūrva śṛṅge samāsthitaḥ

original: ekaviṃśāni svargā vai niviṣṭā merumūrdhani // NsP_30.28 //
analyzed: ekaviṃśāni svargāḥ vai niviṣṭāḥ meru mūrdhani

original: ahiṃsādānakartāro yajñānaṃ tapasāṃ tathā /
analyzed: ahiṃsā dāna kartāraḥ tapasām tathā

original: tat teṣu nivasanti sma janāḥ krodhavivarjitāḥ // NsP_30.29 //
analyzed: tat teṣu nivasanti sma janāḥ krodha vivarjitāḥ

original: jalapraveśe cānandaṃ pramodaṃ vahnisāhase /
analyzed: jala praveśe ca ānandam pramodam vahni sāhase

original: bhṛguprapāte saukhyaṃ ca raṇaṃ caivāsya nirmalam // NsP_30.30 //
analyzed: bhṛgu prapāte saukhyam ca raṇam ca eva asya nirmalam

original: anāśake tu saṃnyāse mṛto gacchet triviṣṭapam /
analyzed: anāśake tu saṃnyāse mṛtaḥ gacchet triviṣṭapam

original: ṛtuyājī nākapṛṣṭhaṃ agnihotrī ca nirvṛtim // NsP_30.31 //
analyzed: ṛtu yājī nāka pṛṣṭham agnihotrī ca nirvṛtim

original: taḍāgakūpakartā ca labhate pauṣṭikaṃ dvijaḥ /
analyzed: taḍāga kūpa kartā ca labhate pauṣṭikam dvijaḥ

original: suvarṇadāyī saubhāgyaṃ labhan svargaṃ tapaḥ phalam // NsP_30.32 //
analyzed: suvarṇa dāyī saubhāgyam labhan svargam tapaḥ phalam

original: śītakāle mahāvahniṃ prajvālayati yo naraḥ /
analyzed: śīta kāle mahā vahnim prajvālayati yaḥ naraḥ

original: sarvasattvahitārthāya svargaṃ so 'psarasaṃ labhet // NsP_30.33 //
analyzed: sarva sattva hita arthāya svargam saḥ psarasam labhet

original: hiraṇyagopradāne hi nirahaṃkāram āpnuyāt /
analyzed: hiraṇya go pradāne hi nirahaṃkāram āpnuyāt

original: bhūmidānena śuddhena labhate śāntikaṃ padam // NsP_30.34 //
analyzed: bhūmi dānena śuddhena labhate śāntikam padam

original: raupyadānena svargaṃ tu nirmalaṃ labhate naraḥ /
analyzed: raupya dānena svargam tu nirmalam labhate naraḥ

original: aśvadānena puṇyāhaṃ kanyādānena maṅgalam // NsP_30.35 //
analyzed: aśva dānena puṇyāham kanyā dānena maṅgalam

original: dvijebhyas tarpaṇaṃ kṛtvā dattvā vastrāṇi bhaktitaḥ /
analyzed: dvijebhyaḥ tarpaṇam kṛtvā dattvā vastrāṇi bhaktitaḥ

original: śvetaṃ tu labhate svargaṃ yatra gatvā na śocate // NsP_30.36 //
analyzed: śvetam tu labhate svargam yatra gatvā na śocate

original: kapilāgopradānena paramārthe mahīyate /
analyzed: kapilā go pradānena parama arthe mahīyate

original: govṛṣasya pradānena svargaṃ manmathām āpnuyāt // NsP_30.37 //
analyzed: go vṛṣasya pradānena svargam āpnuyāt

original: māghamāse saritsnāyī tiladhenupradas tathā /
chatropānahadātā ca svargaṃ yāty upaśobhanam // NsP_30.38 //
analyzed: chatra upānaha dātā ca svargam yāti upaśobhanam

original: devatāyatanaṃ kṛtvā dvijaśuśrūṣakas tathā /
analyzed: devatāyatanam kṛtvā dvija śuśrūṣakaḥ tathā

original: tīrthayātrāparaś caiva svargarāje mahīyate // NsP_30.39 //
analyzed: tīrtha yātrā paraḥ ca eva svargarāje mahīyate

original: ekānnabhogī yo martyo naktabhogī ca nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: eka anna bhogī yaḥ martyaḥ nakta bhogī ca nityaśas

original: upavāsī trirātrādyaiḥ śāntaḥ svargaṃ śubhaṃ labhet // NsP_30.40 //
analyzed: upavāsī tri rātra ādyaiḥ śāntaḥ svargam śubham labhet

original: saritsnāyī jitakrodho brahmacārī dṛḍhavrataḥ /
analyzed: sarit snāyī jita krodhaḥ brahmacārī dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: nirmalaṃ svargam āpnoti yathābhūtahite rataḥ /
analyzed: nirmalam svargam āpnoti yathā bhūta hite rataḥ

original: vidyādānena medhāvī nirahaṃkāram āpnuyāt // NsP_30.41 //
analyzed: vidyā dānena medhāvī nirahaṃkāram āpnuyāt

original: yena yena hi bhāvena yad yad dānaṃ prayacchati /
analyzed: yena yena hi bhāvena yat yat dānam prayacchati

original: tat tat svargam avāpnoti yad yad icchati mānavaḥ // NsP_30.42 //
analyzed: tat tat svargam avāpnoti yat yat icchati mānavaḥ

original: catvāri atidānāni kanyā gaur bhūḥ sarasvatī /
analyzed: catvāri atidānāni kanyā gauḥ bhūḥ sarasvatī

original: narakād uddharanty ete jayavāhanadohanāt // NsP_30.43 //
analyzed: narakāt uddharanti ete jaya vāhana dohanāt

original: yas tu sarvāṇi dānāni brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati /
analyzed: yaḥ tu sarvāṇi dānāni brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati

original: saṃprāpya na nivarteta svargaṃ śāntam anāmayam // NsP_30.44 //
analyzed: saṃprāpya na nivarteta svargam śāntam anāmayam

original: śṛṅge tu paścime yatra brahmā tatra sthitaḥ svayam /
analyzed: śṛṅge tu paścime yatra brahmā tatra sthitaḥ svayam

original: pūrvaśṛṅge svayaṃ viṣṇuḥ madhye caiva śivaḥ sthitaḥ // NsP_30.45 //
analyzed: pūrva śṛṅge svayam viṣṇuḥ madhye ca eva śivaḥ sthitaḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ tu viprendra svargādhvānam imaṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: atas param tu vipra indra svarga adhvānam imam śṛṇu

original: vimalaṃ vipulaṃ buddham upary upari saṃsthitaḥ // NsP_30.46 //
analyzed: vimalam vipulam buddham upari upari saṃsthitaḥ

original: prathame tu kumāras tu dvitīye mātaraḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: prathame tu kumāraḥ tu dvitīye mātaraḥ sthitaḥ

original: tṛtīye siddhagandharvās turye vidyādharā dvija // NsP_30.47 //
analyzed: tṛtīye siddha gandharvāḥ turye vidyādharāḥ dvija

original: pañcame nāgarājā ca ṣaṣṭhe tu vinatāsutaḥ /
analyzed: pañcame nāga rājā ca ṣaṣṭhe tu vinatā sutaḥ

original: saptame divyapitaro dharmarājas tathāṣṭame /
analyzed: saptame divya pitaraḥ dharmarājaḥ tathā aṣṭame

pulastya uvāca:

analyzed: kṣudh tarṣa varṣa ghana vāta mahā uṣṇa tā ādi śārīra duḥkha kulam asya na kiṃcana abhūt

analyzed: dhruvaḥ uvāca

ḥavadhīritasuranāthanāthitavipakṣapakṣaḥ /

ḥsvapratāpānalahutakālayavanaḥ /

ḥsunandanādibhāgavatopāsitaviśvarūpaḥ /
ḥpurāṇapuruṣottamaḥ /

original: ḥkundanibhaśaṅkhadharam indunibhavaktraṃ sundarasudarśanam udāratarahāsaṃ vidvajjanavanditam idaṃ ye rūpam atihṛdyam akhileśvaraṃ nato 'smi
analyzed: ḥkunda nibha śaṅkha dharam indu nibha vaktram sundara sudarśanam udāratara hāsam vidvas jana vanditam idam ye rūpam ati hṛdyam akhila īśvaram nataḥ smi

original: sthānābhikāmī tapasi sthito 'ham tvāṃ dṛṣṭavān sādhumunīndraguhyam /

analyzed: atas na yāce varam īśa yuṣmat pāda abja bhaktim satatam mama astu

original: imaṃ varaṃ devavara prayaccha punaḥ punas tvām idam eva yāce // NsP_31.93 //
analyzed: imam varam deva vara prayaccha punar punar tvām idam eva yāce

original: ity ātmasaṃdarśanalabdhadivya- jñānaṃ gadantaṃ bhagavāñ jagāda // NsP_31.94 //

original: śrībhagavān uvāca:
