original: ārādhya viṣṇuṃ kim anena labdhaṃ mā bhūñjane 'pīttham asādhuvādaḥ /
analyzed: ārādhya viṣṇum kim anena labdham mā bhūñjane pi ittham asādhuvādaḥ

original: sthānaṃ paraṃ prāpnuhi yan mataṃ te kālena māṃ prāpsyasi śuddhabhāvaḥ // NsP_31.95 //
analyzed: sthānam param prāpnuhi yat matam te kālena mām prāpsyasi śuddha bhāvaḥ

original: ādhārabhūtaḥ sakalagrahāṇāṃ kalpadrumaḥ sarvajanaiś ca vandyaḥ /
analyzed: ādhāra bhūtaḥ sakala grahāṇām kalpadrumaḥ sarva janaiḥ ca vandyaḥ

original: mama prasādāt tava sā ca mātā mamāntike yā ca sunītir āryā // NsP_31.96 //
analyzed: mama prasādāt tava sā ca mātā mama antike yā ca sunītiḥ āryā

original: śrīsūta uvāca:
analyzed: śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: taṃ sādhayitveti varair mukundaḥ svam ālayaṃ dṛśyavapur jagāma /
analyzed: tam sādhayitvā iti varaiḥ mukundaḥ svam ālayam dṛśya vapuḥ jagāma

original: tyaktvā śanair divyavapuḥ svabhaktaṃ muhuḥ parāvṛttya samīkṣamāṇaḥ // NsP_31.97 //
analyzed: tyaktvā śanais divya vapuḥ sva bhaktam muhur parāvṛttya samīkṣamāṇaḥ

original: tāvac ca sadyaḥ surasiddhasaṅghaḥ śrīviṣṇutadbhaktasamāgamaṃ tam /
analyzed: tāvat ca sadyas sura siddha saṅghaḥ śrī viṣṇu tad bhakta samāgamam tam

original: dṛṣṭvātha varṣan surapuṣpavṛṣṭiṃ tuṣṭāva harṣād dhruvam avyayaṃ ca // NsP_31.98 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā atha varṣan sura puṣpa vṛṣṭim tuṣṭāva harṣāt dhruvam avyayam ca

original: śriyābhimatyā ca sunītisūnur vibhāti devair api vandyamānaḥ /
analyzed: śriyā abhimatyā ca sunīti sūnuḥ vibhāti devaiḥ api vandyamānaḥ

original: yo 'yaṃ nṛṇāṃ kīrtanadarśanābhyām āyur yaśo vardhayati śriyaṃ ca // NsP_31.99 //
analyzed: yaḥ yam nṛṇām kīrtana darśanābhyām āyuḥ yaśaḥ vardhayati śriyam ca

original: itthaṃ dhruvaḥ prāpa padaṃ durāpaṃ hareḥ prasādān na ca citram etat /
analyzed: ittham dhruvaḥ prāpa padam durāpam hareḥ prasādāt na ca citram etat

original: tasmin prasanne dvijarājapatre na durlabhaṃ bhaktajaneṣu kiṃcit // NsP_31.100 //
analyzed: tasmin prasanne dvijarāja patre na durlabham bhakta janeṣu kiṃcid

original: sūryamaṇḍalamānāt tu dviguṇaṃ somamaṇḍalam /
analyzed: sūrya maṇḍala mānāt tu dviguṇam soma maṇḍalam

original: pūrṇe śatasahasre dve tasmān nakṣatramaṇḍalam // NsP_31.101 //
analyzed: pūrṇe śata sahasre dve tasmāt nakṣatra maṇḍalam

original: dve lakṣe 'pi budhasyāpi sthānaṃ nakṣatramaṇḍalāt /
analyzed: dve budhasya api sthānam nakṣatra maṇḍalāt

original: tāvatpramāṇabhāge tu budhasyāpy uśanā sthitaḥ // NsP_31.102 //
analyzed: tāvat pramāṇa bhāge tu budhasya api uśanā sthitaḥ

original: aṅgārako 'pi śukrasya tāvanmāne vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgārakaḥ pi śukrasya tāvat māne vyavasthitaḥ

original: lakṣadvayaṃ tu bhaumasya sthito devapurohitaḥ // NsP_31.103 //
analyzed: lakṣa dvayam tu bhaumasya sthitaḥ devapurohitaḥ

original: saurir bṛhaspateś cordhvaṃ dvilakṣe tu vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: sauriḥ bṛhaspateḥ ca ūrdhvam dvi lakṣe tu vyavasthitaḥ

original: tasmāc chanaiścarād ūrdhvaṃ lakṣe saptarṣimaṇḍalam // NsP_31.104 //
analyzed: tasmāt śanaiścarāt ūrdhvam lakṣe saptarṣi maṇḍalam

original: saptarṣimaṇḍalād ūrdhvam ekaṃ lakṣaṃ dhruvaḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: saptarṣi maṇḍalāt ūrdhvam ekam lakṣam dhruvaḥ sthitaḥ

original: meḍhībhūtaḥ samastasya jyotiścakrasya sattama // NsP_31.105 //
analyzed: meḍhī bhūtaḥ samastasya jyotiścakrasya sattama

original: svabhāvāt tapati viprendra adhaś cordhvaṃ ca raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: svabhāvāt tapati vipra indra adhas ca ūrdhvam ca raśmibhiḥ

original: kālasaṃkhyāṃ trilokasya sa karoti yuge yuge // NsP_31.106 //
analyzed: kāla saṃkhyām trilokasya sa karoti yuge yuge

original: janas tapas tathā satyam etāṃl lokān dvijottama /
analyzed: janaḥ tapaḥ tathā satyam etān lokān dvijottama

original: brahmaṇā muniśārdūla viṣṇubhaktivivardhitaḥ // NsP_31.107 //
analyzed: brahmaṇā muni śārdūla viṣṇu bhakti vivardhitaḥ

original: ūrdhvagatair dvijaśreṣṭha raśmibhis tapate raviḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhva gataiḥ dvijaśreṣṭha raśmibhiḥ tapate raviḥ

original: adhogataiś ca bhūrlokaṃ dyotate dīrghadīdhitiḥ // NsP_31.108 //
analyzed: adhas gataiḥ ca bhūrlokam dyotate dīrgha dīdhitiḥ

original: sarvapāpaharaḥ sūryaḥ kartā tribhuvanasya ca /
analyzed: sarva pāpa haraḥ sūryaḥ kartā tribhuvanasya ca

original: chatravat pratipaśyeta maṇḍalān maṇḍalaṃ param // NsP_31.109 //
analyzed: chatravat pratipaśyeta maṇḍalāt maṇḍalam param

original: ādityamaṇḍalādhastād bhuvarlokaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: āditya maṇḍala adhastāt bhuvarlokam pratiṣṭhitam

original: trailokyasyeśvaratvaṃ ca viṣṇudattaṃ śatakratoḥ // NsP_31.110 //
analyzed: trailokyasya īśvara tvam ca viṣṇu dattam śatakratoḥ

original: lokapālaiḥ sa sahito lokān rakṣati dharmataḥ /
analyzed: lokapālaiḥ sa sahitaḥ lokān rakṣati dharmataḥ

original: vaset svarge mahābhāga devendraḥ sa tu kīrtimān // NsP_31.111 //
analyzed: vaset svarge mahābhāga deva indraḥ sa tu kīrtimān

original: tato 'dhastān mune cedaṃ pātālaṃ viddhi saprabham /
analyzed: tatas dhastāt mune ca idam pātālam viddhi sa prabham

original: na tatra tapate sūryo na rātrir na niśākaraḥ // NsP_31.112 //
analyzed: na tatra tapate sūryaḥ na rātriḥ na niśākaraḥ

original: divyasvarūpam āsthāya tapanti satataṃ janāḥ /
analyzed: divya sva rūpam āsthāya tapanti satatam janāḥ

original: pātālasthā dvijaśreṣṭha dīpyamanāḥ svatejasā // NsP_31.113 //
analyzed: pātāla sthā dvijaśreṣṭha dīpya manāḥ sva tejasā

original: svarlokāt tu maharlokaḥ koṭimātre vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: svarlokāt tu mahar lokaḥ koṭi mātre vyavasthitaḥ

original: tato yojanamātreṇa dviguṇo maṇḍalena tu // NsP_31.114 //
analyzed: tatas yojana mātreṇa dviguṇaḥ maṇḍalena tu

original: janalokaḥ sthito vipra pañcamo munisevitaḥ /
analyzed: jana lokaḥ sthitaḥ vipra pañcamaḥ muni sevitaḥ

original: tatropari tapolokaś caturbhiḥ koṭibhiḥ sthitaḥ // NsP_31.115 //
analyzed: tatra upari tapolokaḥ caturbhiḥ koṭibhiḥ sthitaḥ

original: satyaloko 'ṣṭakoṭībhis tapolokoparisthitaḥ /
analyzed: ṣṭa koṭībhiḥ tapoloka upari sthitaḥ

original: sarve chatrākṛtijñeyā bhuvanoparisaṃsthitāḥ // NsP_31.116 //
analyzed: sarve chatra ākṛti jñeyāḥ bhuvana upari saṃsthitāḥ

original: brahmalokād viṣṇuloko dviguṇaś ca vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: brahma lokāt viṣṇu lokaḥ dviguṇaḥ ca vyavasthitaḥ

original: vārāhe tasya māhātmyaṃ kathitaṃ lokacintakaiḥ // NsP_31.117 //
analyzed: vārāhe tasya māhātmyam kathitam loka cintakaiḥ

original: tataḥ paraṃ dvijaśreṣṭha sthitaḥ paramapuruṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatas param dvijaśreṣṭha sthitaḥ paramapuruṣaḥ

original: brahmāṇḍāt paramaḥ sākṣān nirlepaḥ puruṣaḥ sthitaḥ // NsP_31.118 //
analyzed: brahmāṇḍāt paramaḥ sākṣāt nirlepaḥ puruṣaḥ sthitaḥ

original: paśupāśair vimucyeta tapojñānasamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: paśu pāśaiḥ vimucyeta tapaḥ jñāna samanvitaḥ

original: iti te saṃsthitiḥ proktā bhūgolasya mayānagha /
analyzed: iti te saṃsthitiḥ proktā bhū golasya mayā anagha

original: yas tu samyag imāṃ vetti sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // NsP_31.119 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu samyak imām vetti sa yāti paramām gatim

original: lokasya saṃsthānakaro 'prameyo viṣṇur nṛsiṃho naradevapūjitaḥ /
analyzed: lokasya prameyaḥ viṣṇuḥ nṛsiṃhaḥ naradeva pūjitaḥ

original: yuge yuge viṣṇur anādimūrtimān āsthāya viśvaṃ paripāti duṣṭahā // NsP_31.120 //
analyzed: yuge yuge viṣṇuḥ an ādi mūrtimān āsthāya viśvam paripāti duṣṭa hā

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe ekatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 31 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe ekatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: bharadvāja uvāca:
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ uvāca

original: sahasrānīkasya harer avatārāṃś ca śārṅgiṇaḥ /
analyzed: sahasrānīkasya hareḥ avatārān ca śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: sāṃprataṃ śrotum icchāmi tan me vada mahāmate // NsP_32.1 //
analyzed: sāṃpratam śrotum icchāmi tat me vada mahāmate

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi caritaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ /
analyzed: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi caritam tasya dhīmataḥ

original: sahasrānīkasya harer avatārāṃś ca me śṛṇu // NsP_32.2 //
analyzed: sahasrānīkasya hareḥ avatārān ca me śṛṇu

original: sahasrānīko 'bhiṣikto nijarājye dvijottamaiḥ /
analyzed: sahasrānīkaḥ bhiṣiktaḥ nija rājye dvijottamaiḥ

original: pālayām_asa dharmeṇa rājyaṃ sa tu nṛpātmajaḥ // NsP_32.3 //
analyzed: pālayāmasa dharmeṇa rājyam sa tu nṛpa ātmajaḥ

original: tasya pālayato rājyaṃ rājaputrasya dhīmataḥ /
analyzed: tasya pālayataḥ rājyam rāja putrasya dhīmataḥ

original: bhaktir babhūva deveśe narasiṃhe surottame // NsP_32.4 //
analyzed: bhaktiḥ babhūva deveśe narasiṃhe surottame

original: taṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ sākṣād viṣṇubhaktaṃ bhṛguḥ purā /
analyzed: tam draṣṭum āgataḥ sākṣāt viṣṇu bhaktam bhṛguḥ purā

original: arghyapādyāsanai rājā tam abhyarcyābravīd idam // NsP_32.5 //
analyzed: arghya pādya āsanaiḥ rājā tam abhyarcya abravīt idam

original: pāvito 'haṃ muniśreṣṭha sāṃprataṃ tava darśanāt /
analyzed: pāvitaḥ ham muni śreṣṭha sāṃpratam tava darśanāt

original: tvaddarśanam apuṇyānāṃ kalāv asmin sudurlabham // NsP_32.6 //
analyzed: tvad darśanam apuṇyānām kalau asmin su durlabham

original: narasiṃhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya devadevaṃ sanātanam /
analyzed: narasiṃham pratiṣṭhāpya devadevam sanātanam

original: ārādhayitum icchāmi vidhānaṃ tatra me vada // NsP_32.7 //
analyzed: ārādhayitum icchāmi vidhānam tatra me vada

original: avatārān aśeṣāṃś ca devadevasya cakriṇaḥ /
analyzed: avatārān aśeṣān ca devadevasya cakriṇaḥ

original: śrotum icchāmi sakalāṃs tān puṇyān api me vada // NsP_32.8 //
analyzed: śrotum icchāmi sakalān tān puṇyān api me vada

original: bhṛgur uvāca:
analyzed: bhṛguḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu bhūpālaputra tvaṃ na hi kaścit kalau yuge /
analyzed: śṛṇu bhūpāla putra tvam na hi kaścid kalau yuge

original: harau bhaktiṃ karoty atra nṛsiṃhe cātibhaktimān // NsP_32.9 //
analyzed: harau bhaktim karoti atra nṛsiṃhe ca ati bhaktimān

original: svabhāvād yasya bhaktiḥ syān narasiṃhe surottame /
analyzed: svabhāvāt yasya bhaktiḥ syāt narasiṃhe surottame

original: tasyārayaḥ praṇaśyanti kāryasiddhiś ca jāyate // NsP_32.10 //
analyzed: tasya arayaḥ praṇaśyanti kārya siddhiḥ ca jāyate

original: tvam atīva harer bhaktaḥ pāṇḍuvaṃśe 'pi sattamaḥ /
analyzed: tvam atīva hareḥ bhaktaḥ pāṇḍu vaṃśe sattamaḥ

original: tena te nikhilaṃ vakṣye śṛṇuṣvaikāgramānasaḥ // NsP_32.11 //
analyzed: tena te nikhilam vakṣye śṛṇuṣva ekāgra mānasaḥ

original: yaḥ kuryāc chobhanaṃ veśma narasiṃhasya bhaktimān /
analyzed: yaḥ kuryāt śobhanam veśma narasiṃhasya bhaktimān

original: sa sarvapāpanirmukto viṣṇulokam avāpnuyāt // NsP_32.12 //
analyzed: sa sarva pāpa nirmuktaḥ viṣṇu lokam avāpnuyāt

original: pratimāṃ lakṣaṇopetāṃ narasiṃhasya kārayet /
analyzed: pratimām lakṣaṇa upetām narasiṃhasya kārayet

original: sa sarvapāpanirmukto viṣṇulokam avāpnuyāt // NsP_32.13 //
analyzed: sa sarva pāpa nirmuktaḥ viṣṇu lokam avāpnuyāt

original: pratiṣṭhāṃ narasiṃhasya yaḥ karoti yathāvidhi /
analyzed: pratiṣṭhām narasiṃhasya yaḥ karoti yathāvidhi

original: niṣkāmo naraśārdūla dehabādhāt pramucyate // NsP_32.14 //
analyzed: niṣkāmaḥ nara śārdūla deha bādhāt pramucyate

original: narasiṃhaṃ pratiṣṭhapya yaḥ pūjām ācaren naraḥ /
analyzed: narasiṃham pratiṣṭhapya yaḥ pūjām ācaret naraḥ

original: tasya kāmāḥ prasidhyanti paramaṃ padam āpnuyāt // NsP_32.15 //
analyzed: tasya kāmāḥ prasidhyanti paramam padam āpnuyāt

original: brahmādayaḥ surāḥ sarve viṣṇum ārādhya te purā /
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ surāḥ sarve viṣṇum ārādhya te purā

original: svaṃ svaṃ padam anuprāptāḥ keśavasya prasādataḥ // NsP_32.16 //
analyzed: svam svam padam anuprāptāḥ keśavasya prasādataḥ

original: ye ye nṛpavarā rājan māndhātṛpramukhā nṛpāḥ /
analyzed: ye ye nṛpa varāḥ rājan māndhātṛ pramukhāḥ nṛpāḥ

original: te te viṣṇuṃ samārādhya svargalokam ito gatāḥ // NsP_32.17 //
analyzed: te te viṣṇum samārādhya svarga lokam itas gatāḥ

original: yas tu pūjayate nityaṃ narasiṃhaṃ sureśvaram /
analyzed: yaḥ tu pūjayate nityam narasiṃham sureśvaram

original: sa svargamokṣabhāgī syān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NsP_32.18 //
analyzed: sa svarga mokṣa bhāgī syāt na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: tasmād ekamanā bhūtvā yāvajjīvaṃ pratijñayā /
analyzed: tasmāt ekamanāḥ bhūtvā yāvajjīvam pratijñayā

original: arcanān narasiṃhasya prāpsyase svābhivāñchitam // NsP_32.19 //
analyzed: arcanāt narasiṃhasya prāpsyase sva abhivāñchitam

original: vidhivat sthāpayed yas tu kārayitvā janārdanam /
analyzed: vidhivat sthāpayet yaḥ tu kārayitvā janārdanam

original: na tu nirgamanaṃ tasya viṣṇulokād bhaven nṛpa // NsP_32.20 //
analyzed: na tu nirgamanam tasya viṣṇu lokāt bhavet nṛpa

original: naro nṛsiṃhaṃ tam anantavikramaṃ surāsurair arcitapādapaṅkajam /
analyzed: naraḥ nṛsiṃham tam ananta vikramam sura asuraiḥ arcita pāda paṅkajam

original: saṃsthāpya bhaktyā vidhivac ca pūjayet payāti sākṣāt parameśvaraṃ harim // NsP_32.21 //
analyzed: saṃsthāpya bhaktyā vidhivat ca pūjayet sākṣāt parameśvaram harim

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe sahasrānīkacarite dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 32 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe sahasrānīkacarite dvātriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: rājovāca:
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: harer arcāvidhiṃ puṇyāṃ śrotum icchāmi sattvataḥ /
analyzed: hareḥ arcā vidhim puṇyām śrotum icchāmi sattvataḥ

original: tvatprasādād viśeṣeṇa bhagavan prabravīhi me // NsP_33.1 //
analyzed: tvad prasādāt viśeṣeṇa bhagavan prabravīhi me

original: saṃmārjanakaro yaś ca narasiṃhasya mandire /
analyzed: saṃmārjana karaḥ yaḥ ca narasiṃhasya mandire

original: yat puṇyaṃ labhate tadvad upalepanakṛṇ naraḥ // NsP_33.2 //
analyzed: yat puṇyam labhate tadvat upalepana kṛt naraḥ

original: śuddhodakena yat puṇyaṃ snāpite keśave bhavet /
analyzed: śuddha udakena yat puṇyam snāpite keśave bhavet

original: kṣīrasnānena yat puṇyaṃ dadhnā ca madhunā tathā /
analyzed: kṣīra snānena yat puṇyam dadhnā ca madhunā tathā

original: ghṛtasnānena yat puṇyaṃ pañcagavyena yad bhavet // NsP_33.3 //
analyzed: ghṛta snānena yat puṇyam pañcagavyena yat bhavet

original: kṣālite coṣṇatoyena pratimāyāṃ ca bhaktitaḥ /
analyzed: kṣālite ca uṣṇa toyena pratimāyām ca bhaktitaḥ

original: karpūrāgurutoyena miśreṇa snāpitena ca // NsP_33.4 //
analyzed: karpūra aguru toyena miśreṇa snāpitena ca

original: arghyadānena yat puṇyaṃ pādyācamanadānake /
analyzed: arghya dānena yat puṇyam pādya ācamana dānake

original: mantreṇa snāpite yac ca vastradānena yad bhavet // NsP_33.5 //
analyzed: mantreṇa snāpite yat ca vastra dānena yat bhavet

original: śrīkhaṇḍakuṅkumābhyāṃ tu arcite kiṃ phalaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: śrīkhaṇḍa kuṅkumābhyām tu arcite kim phalam bhavet

original: puṣpair abhyarcite yac ca yat phalaṃ dhūpadīpayoḥ // NsP_33.6 //
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ abhyarcite yat ca yat phalam dhūpa dīpayoḥ

original: naivedyair yat phalaṃ proktaṃ pradakṣiṇakṛte tu yat /
analyzed: naivedyaiḥ yat phalam proktam pradakṣiṇa kṛte tu yat

original: namaskārakṛte yac ca phalaṃ yas stotragītayoḥ // NsP_33.7 //
analyzed: namaskāra kṛte yat ca phalam yaḥ stotra gītayoḥ

original: tālavṛntapradānena cāmarasya ca yad bhavet /
analyzed: tālavṛnta pradānena cāmarasya ca yat bhavet

original: dhvajapradāne yad viṣṇoḥ śaṅkhadānena yad bhavet // NsP_33.8 //
analyzed: dhvaja pradāne yat viṣṇoḥ śaṅkha dānena yat bhavet

original: etac cānyac ca yat kiṃcid ajñānān na pracoditam /
analyzed: etat ca anyat ca yat kiṃcid ajñānāt na pracoditam

original: tat sarvaṃ kathaya brahman bhaktasya mama keśave // NsP_33.9 //
analyzed: tat sarvam kathaya brahman bhaktasya mama keśave

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: iti saṃprerito vipras tena rājñā bhṛgus tadā /
analyzed: iti saṃpreritaḥ vipraḥ tena rājñā bhṛguḥ tadā

original: mārkaṇḍeyaṃ niyujyātha kathane sa gato muniḥ // NsP_33.10 //
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyam niyujya atha kathane sa gataḥ muniḥ

original: so 'pi tasmin mudāyukto haribhaktyā viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: saḥ pi tasmin mudā yuktaḥ hari bhaktyā viśeṣataḥ

original: rājñe pravaktum ārebhe bhṛguṇā codito muniḥ // NsP_33.11 //
analyzed: rājñe pravaktum ārebhe bhṛguṇā coditaḥ muniḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: rājaputra śṛṇuṣvedaṃ haripūjāvidhiṃ kramāt /
analyzed: rāja putra śṛṇuṣva idam hari pūjā vidhim kramāt

original: viṣṇubhaktasya vakṣyāmi tavāhaṃ pāṇḍuvaṃśaja // NsP_33.12 //
analyzed: viṣṇu bhaktasya vakṣyāmi tava aham pāṇḍu vaṃśa ja

original: narasiṃhasya nityaṃ ca yaḥ saṃmārjanam ārabhet /
analyzed: narasiṃhasya nityam ca yaḥ saṃmārjanam ārabhet

original: sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇuloke sa modate // NsP_33.13 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ viṣṇu loke sa modate

original: gomayena mṛdā toyair yaḥ karoty upalepanam /
analyzed: gomayena mṛdā toyaiḥ yaḥ karoti upalepanam

original: sa cākṣayaphalaṃ prāpya viṣṇuloke mahīyate // NsP_33.14 //
analyzed: sa ca akṣaya phalam prāpya viṣṇu loke mahīyate

original: atrārthe yat purāvṛttam itihāsaṃ purātanam /
analyzed: atra arthe yat purāvṛttam itihāsam purātanam

original: yac chrutvā sarvapāpebhyo muktir bhavati sattama // NsP_33.15 //
analyzed: yat śrutvā sarva pāpebhyaḥ muktiḥ bhavati sattama

original: purā yudhiṣṭhiro rājā pañcabhir bhrātṛbhir yutaḥ /
analyzed: purā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā pañcabhiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ yutaḥ

original: draupadyā saha rājendra kānanaṃ vicacāra ha // NsP_33.16 //
analyzed: draupadyā saha rāja indra kānanam vicacāra ha

original: śūlakaṇṭakaniṣkrāntās tatas te pañca pāṇḍavāḥ /
analyzed: śūla kaṇṭaka niṣkrāntāḥ tatas te pañca pāṇḍavāḥ

original: nārado 'pi gato nākaṃ juṣṭvedaṃ tīrtham uttamam // NsP_33.17 //
analyzed: nāradaḥ pi gataḥ nākam juṣṭvā idam tīrtham uttamam

original: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā prasthitas tīrtham uttamam /
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā prasthitaḥ tīrtham uttamam

original: darśanaṃ munimukhyasya tīrthadharmopadeśinaḥ // NsP_33.18 //
analyzed: darśanam muni mukhyasya tīrtha dharma upadeśinaḥ

original: cintayati ca dharmātmā krodhapaiśunyavarjitaḥ /
analyzed: cintayati ca dharma ātmā krodha paiśunya varjitaḥ

original: dānavo bahuromā ca tathā sthūlaśirā nṛpa // NsP_33.19 //
analyzed: dānavaḥ bahuromā ca tathā sthūlaśirāḥ nṛpa

original: pāṇḍavān gacchato vīkṣya dānavo draupadīcchayā /
analyzed: pāṇḍavān gacchataḥ vīkṣya dānavaḥ draupadī icchayā

original: kṛtvā bhūpa mune rupaṃ bahuromā gatas tadā // NsP_33.20 //
analyzed: kṛtvā bhūpa muneḥ rupam bahu romā gataḥ tadā

original: praṇidhānaṃ vidhāyātha āsīnaḥ kuśaviṣṭare /
analyzed: praṇidhānam vidhāya atha āsīnaḥ kuśa viṣṭare

original: bibhrat kamaṇḍaluṃ pārśve darbhasūcīṃ tathā kare // NsP_33.21 //
analyzed: bibhrat kamaṇḍalum pārśve darbha sūcīm tathā kare

original: akṣamālāṃ japan mantraṃ svanāsāgraṃ nirīkṣayan /
analyzed: akṣamālām japan mantram sva nāsā agram nirīkṣayan

original: sa dṛṣṭaḥ pāṇḍavais tatra revāyāṃ vanacāribhiḥ // NsP_33.22 //
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ tatra revāyām vana cāribhiḥ

original: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā taṃ praṇamya sahānujaḥ /
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā tam praṇamya sahānujaḥ

original: jagāda vacanaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāgyenāsi mahāmune // NsP_33.23 //
analyzed: jagāda vacanam dṛṣṭvā bhāgyena asi mahā mune

original: tīrthāni rudradehāyāḥ sugopyāni nivedaya /
analyzed: tīrthāni rudra dehāyāḥ su gopyāni nivedaya

original: munīnāṃ darśanaṃ nātha śrutaṃ dharmopadeśakam // NsP_33.24 //
analyzed: munīnām darśanam nātha śrutam dharma upadeśakam

original: yāvan munim uvācedaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
analyzed: yāvat munim uvāca idam dharmaputraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: tāvat sthūlaśirāḥ prāpto munirūpadharo 'paraḥ // NsP_33.25 //
analyzed: tāvat sthūlaśirāḥ prāptaḥ muni rūpa dharaḥ paraḥ

original: jalpann ity āturaṃ vākyaṃ ko nāmāsty atra rakṣakaḥ /
analyzed: jalpan iti āturam vākyam kaḥ nāma asti atra rakṣakaḥ

original: bhayāturaṃ naro jīvaṃ yo rakṣec charaṇāgatam // NsP_33.26 //
analyzed: bhaya āturam naraḥ jīvam yaḥ rakṣet śaraṇa āgatam

original: tasyānantaphalaṃ syād vai kiṃ punar māṃ dvijottamam /
analyzed: tasya ananta phalam syāt vai kim punar mām dvijottamam

original: ekato medinīdānaṃ merubhūdharadakṣiṇam // NsP_33.27 //
analyzed: ekatas medinī dānam meru bhūdhara dakṣiṇam

original: anyato hy ārtajīvānāṃ prāṇasaṃśayavāraṇam /
analyzed: anyatas hi ārta jīvānām prāṇa saṃśaya vāraṇam

original: dvijaṃ dhenuṃ striyaṃ bālaṃ piḍyamānaṃ ca durjanaiḥ // NsP_33.28 //
analyzed: dvijam dhenum striyam bālam piḍyamānam ca durjanaiḥ

original: upekṣeta naro yas tu sa ca gacchati rauravam /
analyzed: upekṣeta naraḥ yaḥ tu sa ca gacchati rauravam

original: atha māṃ hṛtasarvasvaṃ prāṇatyāgaparāyaṇam // NsP_33.29 //
analyzed: atha mām hṛta sarvasvam prāṇatyāga parāyaṇam

original: ko rakṣati naro vīraḥ parābhūtaṃ hi dānavaiḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ rakṣati naraḥ vīraḥ parābhūtam hi dānavaiḥ

original: gṛhītvā cākṣamālāṃ me tathā subhakamaṇḍalum // NsP_33.30 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā ca akṣamālām me tathā subha kamaṇḍalum

original: nihato 'haṃ karāghātais tathā khāṭo manoharaḥ /
analyzed: nihataḥ ham kara āghātaiḥ tathā khāṭaḥ manoharaḥ

original: gṛhītaṃ mama sarvasvaṃ dānavena durātmanā // NsP_33.31 //
analyzed: gṛhītam mama sarva svam dānavena durātmanā

original: ity ākarṇya vacaḥ klībaṃ pāṇḍavā jātasaṃbhramāḥ /
analyzed: iti ākarṇya vacaḥ klībam pāṇḍavāḥ jāta saṃbhramāḥ

original: yānti romāñcitā bhūyo vidhāyāgniṃ ca taṃ munim // NsP_33.32 //
analyzed: yānti romāñcitāḥ bhūyas vidhāya agnim ca tam munim

original: vimucya draupadīṃ tatra muneḥ pārśve mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: vimucya draupadīm tatra muneḥ pārśve mahātmanaḥ

original: tato dūrataraṃ prāptāḥ saṃrambhāt te ca pāṇḍavāḥ // NsP_33.33 //
analyzed: tatas dūrataram prāptāḥ saṃrambhāt te ca pāṇḍavāḥ

original: tato yudhiṣṭhiro 'vocat kiṃ ca no nātra dṛśyate /
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ vocat kim ca naḥ na atra dṛśyate

original: kṛṣṇāsaṃrakṣaṇārthāya vraja vyāvartya cārjuna // NsP_33.34 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇā saṃrakṣaṇa arthāya vraja vyāvartya ca arjuna

original: tato 'rjuno viniṣkrānto bandhuvākyapraṇoditaḥ /
analyzed: tatas rjunaḥ viniṣkrāntaḥ bandhu vākya praṇoditaḥ

original: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā satyāṃ vācam akalpayat // NsP_33.35 //
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā satyām vācam akalpayat

original: nirīkṣya maṇḍalaṃ bhānos tadā sugahane vane /
analyzed: nirīkṣya maṇḍalam bhānoḥ tadā sugahane vane

original: mama satyāc ca sukṛtād dharmasaṃbhāṣaṇāt prabho // NsP_33.36 //
analyzed: mama satyāt ca su kṛtāt dharma saṃbhāṣaṇāt prabho

original: tathyaṃ śaṃsantu tridaśā mama saṃśayabhājinaḥ /
analyzed: tathyam śaṃsantu tridaśāḥ mama saṃśaya bhājinaḥ

original: tato 'mbare 'bhavad vāṇī tadā bhūpāśarīriṇī // NsP_33.37 //
analyzed: tatas mbare bhavat vāṇī tadā bhūpa aśarīriṇī

original: dānavo 'yaṃ mahārāja muniḥ sthūlaśirāḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: dānavaḥ yam mahā rāja muniḥ sthūlaśirāḥ sthitaḥ

original: nāsāv upadrutaḥ kena māyaiṣāsya durātmanaḥ // NsP_33.38 //
analyzed: na asau upadrutaḥ kena māyā eṣā asya durātmanaḥ

original: tato bhīmaḥ karāghātair naśyamānaṃ hi dānavam /
analyzed: tatas bhīmaḥ kara āghātaiḥ naśyamānam hi dānavam

original: saṃrambhāt kupito 'tyarthaṃ maulideśe jaghāna tam // NsP_33.39 //
analyzed: saṃrambhāt kupitaḥ u tyartham mauli deśe jaghāna tam

original: so 'pi rūpaṃ nijaṃ prāpya raudraṃ bhīmam atāḍayat /
analyzed: saḥ pi rūpam nijam prāpya raudram bhīmam atāḍayat

original: tatra yuddhaṃ pravavṛte dāruṇaṃ bhīmadaityayoḥ // NsP_33.40 //
analyzed: tatra yuddham pravavṛte dāruṇam bhīma daityayoḥ

original: kaṣṭād babhañja bhīmo 'pi tasya sthūlaṃ śiro vane /
analyzed: kaṣṭāt babhañja bhīmaḥ u pi tasya sthūlam śiraḥ vane

original: arjuno 'pi samāyāto naiva paśyati taṃ munim // NsP_33.41 //
analyzed: arjunaḥ pi samāyātaḥ na eva paśyati tam munim

original: tathā ca draupadīṃ bhūyaḥ sādhvīṃ kāntāṃ ca vallabhām /
analyzed: tathā ca draupadīm bhūyas sādhvīm kāntām ca vallabhām

original: tato vṛkṣaṃ samāruhya yāvat paśyati cārjunaḥ // NsP_33.42 //
analyzed: tatas vṛkṣam samāruhya yāvat paśyati ca arjunaḥ

original: tāvad vidhāya tāṃ skandhe śīghraṃ dhāvati dānavaḥ /
analyzed: tāvat vidhāya tām skandhe śīghram dhāvati dānavaḥ

original: saṃhṛtā yāti duṣṭena rudatī kurarī yathā // NsP_33.43 //
analyzed: saṃhṛtā yāti duṣṭena rudatī kurarī yathā

original: kurvatī bhīmabhīmeti dharmaputreti vādinī /
analyzed: kurvatī bhīma bhīma iti dharmaputra iti vādinī

original: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa yayau vīraḥ śabdair saṃnādayan diśaḥ // NsP_33.44 //
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā sa yayau vīraḥ śabdaiḥ saṃnādayan diśaḥ

original: pādanyāsoruvegena prabhagnāḥ pādapā bhṛśam /
analyzed: pāda nyāsa ūru vegena prabhagnāḥ pādapāḥ bhṛśam

original: tato daityo 'pi tāṃ tanvīṃ vihāyāśu palāyitaḥ // NsP_33.45 //
analyzed: tatas daityaḥ pi tām tanvīm vihāya āśu palāyitaḥ

original: tathāpi cārjuno tasya kopān muñcati nāsuram /
analyzed: tathā api ca arjuno tasya kopāt muñcati na asuram

original: patito medinīpṛṣṭhe tāvad eva caturbhujaḥ // NsP_33.46 //
analyzed: patitaḥ medinī pṛṣṭhe tāvat eva catur bhujaḥ

original: pīte cavāsasī bibhrat śaṅkhacakrāyudhāni ca /
analyzed: pīte ca vāsasī bibhrat śaṅkha cakra āyudhāni ca

original: tataḥ sa vismayākrānto natvā pārtho vaco 'vadat // NsP_33.47 //
analyzed: tatas sa vismaya ākrāntaḥ natvā pārthaḥ vacaḥ vadat

original: arjuna uvāca:
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: kathaṃ kṛtaiṣā bhagavaṃs tvayā māyātra vaiṣṇavī /
analyzed: katham kṛtā eṣā bhagavan tvayā māyā atra vaiṣṇavī

original: mayāpy apakṛtaṃ nātha tat kṣamasva namo 'stu te // NsP_33.48 //
analyzed: mayā api apakṛtam nātha tat kṣamasva namaḥ stu te

original: nūnam ajñānabhāvena karmaitad dāruṇaṃ mayā /
analyzed: nūnam ajñāna bhāvena karma etat dāruṇam mayā

original: tat kṣantavyaṃ jagannātha caitanyaṃ mānave kutaḥ // NsP_33.49 //
analyzed: tat kṣantavyam jagannātha caitanyam mānave kutas

original: caturbhuja uvāca:
analyzed: caturbhujaḥ uvāca

original: nāhaṃ kṛṣṇo mahābāho bahuromāsmi dānavaḥ /
analyzed: na aham kṛṣṇaḥ mahā bāho bahu romā asmi dānavaḥ

original: upayāto harer dehaṃ pūrvakarmaprabhāvataḥ // NsP_33.50 //
analyzed: upayātaḥ hareḥ deham pūrva karma prabhāvataḥ

original: arjuna uvāca:
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: bahuroman purvajātiṃ karma me śaṃsa tattvataḥ /
analyzed: bahuroman purva jātim karma me śaṃsa tattvataḥ

original: kena karmavipākena viṣṇoḥ sārūpyam āptavān // NsP_33.51 //
analyzed: kena karma vipākena viṣṇoḥ sārūpyam āptavān

original: caturbhuja uvāca:
analyzed: caturbhujaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇv arjuna mahābhāga sahito bhrātṛbhir mama /
analyzed: śṛṇu arjuna mahābhāga sahitaḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ mama

original: caritaṃ citram atyarthaṃ śṛṇvatāṃ mudavardhanam // NsP_33.52 //
analyzed: caritam citram atyartham śṛṇvatām muda vardhanam

original: aham āsaṃ purā rājā somavaṃśasamudbhavaḥ /
analyzed: aham āsam purā rājā soma vaṃśa samudbhavaḥ

original: jayadhvaja iti khyāto nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ // NsP_33.53 //
analyzed: jayadhvajaḥ iti khyātaḥ nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ

original: viṣṇor devālaye nityaṃ saṃmārjanaparāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ devālaye nityam saṃmārjana parāyaṇaḥ

original: upaleparataś caiva dīpadāne samudyataḥ // NsP_33.54 //
analyzed: upalepa rataḥ ca eva dīpa dāne samudyataḥ

original: vītihotra iti khyāta āsīt sādhupurohitaḥ /
analyzed: vītihotraḥ iti khyātaḥ āsīt sādhu purohitaḥ

original: mama taccaritaṃ dṛṣṭvā vipro vismayam āgataḥ // NsP_33.55 //
analyzed: mama tat caritam dṛṣṭvā vipraḥ vismayam āgataḥ

original: mārkaṇḍaya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍayaḥ uvāca

original: kadācid upaviṣṭaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ viṣṇutatparam /
analyzed: kadācid upaviṣṭam tam rājānam viṣṇu tatparam

original: apṛcchad vītihotras taṃ vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ // NsP_33.56 //
analyzed: apṛcchat vītihotraḥ tam veda vedāṅga pāragaḥ

original: rājan paramadharmajña haribhaktaparāyaṇa /
analyzed: rājan parama dharma jña hari bhakta parāyaṇa

original: viṣṇubhaktimatāṃ puṃsāṃ śreṣṭho 'si puruṣarṣabha // NsP_33.57 //
analyzed: viṣṇu bhaktimatām puṃsām si puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: saṃmārjanaparo nityaṃ upaleparatas tathā /
analyzed: saṃmārjana paraḥ nityam upalepa rataḥ tathā

original: tan me vada mahābhāga tvayā kiṃ viditaṃ phalam // NsP_33.58 //
analyzed: tat me vada mahābhāga tvayā kim viditam phalam

original: karmāṇy anyāni santy eva viṣṇoḥ priyatarāṇi vai /
analyzed: karmāṇi anyāni santi eva viṣṇoḥ priyatarāṇi vai

original: tathāpi tvaṃ mahābhāga etayoḥ satatodyataḥ // NsP_33.59 //
analyzed: tathā api tvam mahābhāgaḥ etayoḥ satata udyataḥ

original: sarvātmanā mahāpuṇyaṃ janeśa viditaṃ tava /
analyzed: sarva ātmanā mahā puṇyam janeśa viditam tava

original: tad brūhi yady aguhyaṃ ca prītir mayi tavāsti cet // NsP_33.60 //
analyzed: tat brūhi yadi a guhyam ca prītiḥ mayi tava asti ced

original: jayadhvaja uvāca:
analyzed: jayadhvajaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇuṣva vipraśārdūla mamaiva caritaṃ purā // NsP_33.61 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva vipra śārdūla mama eva caritam purā

original: jātismaratvāj jānāmi śrotṝṇāṃ vismayāvaham /
analyzed: jātismara tvāt jānāmi śrotṝṇām vismaya āvaham

original: pūrvajanmani viprendra raivato nāma vāḍavaḥ // NsP_33.62 //
analyzed: pūrva janmani vipra indra raivataḥ nāma vāḍavaḥ

original: ayājyayājako 'haṃ vai sadaiva grāmayājakaḥ /
analyzed: a yājya yājakaḥ ham vai sadā eva grāmayājakaḥ

original: piśuno niṣṭhuraś caiva apaṇyanāṃ ca vikrayī // NsP_33.63 //
analyzed: piśunaḥ niṣṭhuraḥ ca eva a paṇya nām ca vikrayī

original: niṣiddhakarmācaraṇāt parityaktaḥ svabandhubhiḥ /
analyzed: niṣiddha karma ācaraṇāt parityaktaḥ sva bandhubhiḥ

original: mahāpāparato nityaṃ brahmadveṣaratas tathā // NsP_33.64 //
analyzed: mahā pāpa rataḥ nityam brahma dveṣa rataḥ tathā

original: paradāraparadravya- lolupo jantuhiṃsakaḥ /
madyapānarato nityaṃ brahmadveṣaratas tathā // NsP_33.65 //
analyzed: madya pāna rataḥ nityam brahma dveṣa rataḥ tathā

original: evaṃ paparato nityaṃ bahuśo mārgarodhakṛt /
analyzed: evam nityam bahuśas mārga rodha kṛt

original: kadācit kāmacāro 'haṃ gṛhītvā brāhmaṇastriyaḥ // NsP_33.66 //
analyzed: kadācid kāmacāraḥ ham gṛhītvā brāhmaṇa striyaḥ

original: śūnyaṃ pūjādibhir viṣṇor mandiraṃ prāptavān niśi /
analyzed: śūnyam pūjā ādibhiḥ viṣṇoḥ mandiram prāptavān niśi

original: svavastraprāntato brahman kiyadaṃśaḥ sa mārjitaḥ // NsP_33.67 //
analyzed: sva vastra prāntataḥ brahman kiyat aṃśaḥ sa mārjitaḥ

original: pradīpaḥ sthāpitas tatra suratārthād dvijottama /
analyzed: pradīpaḥ sthāpitaḥ tatra surata arthāt dvijottama

analyzed: tena api mama duṣkarma niḥśeṣam kṣayam āgatam

original: evaṃ sthitaṃ viṣṇugṛhe mayā bhogecchayā dvija /
analyzed: evam sthitam viṣṇu gṛhe mayā bhoga icchayā dvija

analyzed: tadā eva dīpakam dṛṣṭvā āgatāḥ pura pālakāḥ

analyzed: khaḍgena tīkṣṇa dhāreṇa śiraḥ chittvā ca te gatāḥ

analyzed: divyam vimānam āruhya prabhu dāsa samanvitam

analyzed: gandharvaiḥ gīyamānaḥ ham svarga lokam tadā gataḥ

original: caturbhuja uvāca:

original: jayadhvaja iti khyāto rājā rājīvalocanaḥ // NsP_33.73 //
analyzed: jayadhvajaḥ iti khyātaḥ rājā rājīva locanaḥ

analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ ca namitaḥ nā eva garvāt me hasitaḥ ca saḥ

analyzed: yadā revā maṭhe rājan dharmaputrasya dhīmataḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

analyzed: tartum yadi icchatha dvijāḥ dustaram bhava sāgaram

original: // iti śrīnarasimhapurāṇe sahasrānīkacarite mārkaṇḍeyenopadiṣṭasaṃmārjanopalepaphalaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 33 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasimhapurāṇe sahasrānīkacarite mārkaṇḍeyenopadiṣṭasaṃmārjanopalepaphalam nāma trayastriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

analyzed: śrī saharsānīkaḥ uvāca

analyzed: nirmālya apanayāt viṣṇoḥ yat puṇyam tat vadasva me

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

analyzed: kuryāt

dhūpaṃ dadāti rājendra narasiṃhasya bhaktimān /

namaskāraḥ kṛto yena bhaktyā vai mādhavasya ca // NsP_34.33 //
analyzed: namaskāraḥ kṛtaḥ yena bhaktyā vai mādhavasya ca

original: parvakāle viśeṣeṇa kāmagaḥ kāmarūpavān // NsP_34.36 //

original: susaṃgītavidaiś caiva sevyamāno 'psarogaṇaiḥ /

original: mahārhamaṇicitreṇa vimānena virājatā // NsP_34.37 //

original: viṣṇulokam avāpnoti sevyamāno 'psarogaṇaiḥ // NsP_34.39 //

original: suvarṇābharaṇair divyair hārakeyūrakuṇḍalaiḥ /

original: mukuṭābharaṇādyaiś ca yo viṣṇuṃ pūjayen nṛpa // NsP_34.40 //
analyzed: mukuṭa ābharaṇa ādyaiḥ ca yaḥ viṣṇum pūjayet nṛpa

original: sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sarvabhūṣaṇabhūṣitaḥ /
analyzed: sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ sarva bhūṣaṇa bhūṣitaḥ

original: indraloke vased dhīmān yāvad indrāś caturdaśa // NsP_34.41 //
analyzed: indra loke vaset dhīmān yāvat indrāḥ caturdaśa

original: yo gāṃ payasvinīṃ viṣṇoḥ kapilāṃ saṃprayacchati /
analyzed: yaḥ gām payasvinīm viṣṇoḥ kapilām saṃprayacchati

original: ārādhya tam athāgre tu yat kiṃcid dagdham uttamam // NsP_34.42 //
analyzed: ārādhya tam atha agre tu yat kiṃcid dagdham uttamam

original: tad dattvā narasiṃhāya viṣṇuloke mahīyate /
analyzed: tat dattvā narasiṃhāya viṣṇu loke mahīyate

analyzed: pitaraḥ tasya modante śvetadvīpe ciram nṛpa

analyzed: evam yaḥ pūjayet rājan narasiṃham narottamaḥ

original: tasya svargāpavargau tu bhavato nātra saṃśayaḥ // NsP_34.44 //
analyzed: tasya svarga apavargau tu bhavataḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: yatraivaṃ pūjyate viṣṇur narasiṃho narair nṛpa /
analyzed: yatra evam pūjyate viṣṇuḥ narasiṃhaḥ naraiḥ nṛpa

original: na tatra vyādhidurbhikṣa- rājacaurādikaṃ bhayam // NsP_34.45 //
analyzed: na tatra rāja caura ādikam bhayam

analyzed: narasiṃham samārādhya vidhinā anena mādhavam

original: nānāsvargasukhaṃ bhuktvā na bhūyaḥ stanapo bhavet // NsP_34.46 //
analyzed: nānā svarga sukham bhuktvā na bhūyas stanapaḥ bhavet

original: nityaṃ sarpis tilair homo grāme yasmin pravartate /
analyzed: nityam sarpiḥ tilaiḥ homaḥ grāme yasmin pravartate

original: na bhavet tasya grāmasya bhayaṃ vā tatra kutracit // NsP_34.47 //
analyzed: na bhavet tasya grāmasya bhayam vā tatra kutracid

original: anāvṛṣṭir māhāmārī doṣā no dāhakā nṛpa /
analyzed: anāvṛṣṭiḥ māhāmārī doṣāḥ naḥ dāhakāḥ nṛpa

original: narasiṃhaṃ samārādhya brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ // NsP_34.48 //
analyzed: narasiṃham samārādhya brāhmaṇaiḥ vedapāragaiḥ

original: kārayel lakṣahomaṃ tu grāme yatra purādhipaḥ /
analyzed: kārayet lakṣa homam tu grāme yatra pura adhipaḥ

analyzed: kṛte tasmin mayā ukte tu āgacchati na tat bhayam

original: dṛṣṭopasargamaraṇaṃ prajānām ātmanaś ca hi /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa upasarga maraṇam prajānām ātmanaḥ ca hi

original: samyagārādhanīyaṃ tu narasiṃhasya mandire // NsP_34.50 //
analyzed: samyak ārādhanīyam tu narasiṃhasya mandire

original: śaṃkarāyatane cāpi koṭihomaṃ narādhipa /
analyzed: śaṃkarāyatane ca api koṭi homam narādhipa

original: kārayet saṃyatair vipraiḥ sabhojanasadakṣiṇaiḥ // NsP_34.51 //
analyzed: kārayet saṃyataiḥ vipraiḥ sa bhojana sa dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: kṛte tasmin nṛpaśreṣṭha narasiṃhaprasādataḥ /
analyzed: kṛte tasmin nṛpa śreṣṭha narasiṃha prasādataḥ

analyzed: upasarga ādi maraṇam prajānām upaśāmyati

original: homaṃ ca bhojanaṃ caiva tasya doṣaḥ praṇaśyati // NsP_34.53 //
analyzed: homam ca bhojanam ca eva tasya doṣaḥ praṇaśyati

analyzed: ayane viṣuve ca eva candra sūrya grahe tathā

original: narasiṃhaṃ samārādhya lakṣahomaṃ tu kārayet // NsP_34.54 //
analyzed: narasiṃham samārādhya lakṣa homam tu kārayet

analyzed: evamādi phala upetam narasiṃha arcanam nṛpa

analyzed: kuru tvam bhūpateḥ putra yadi vāñchasi sat gatim

analyzed: atas parataram nā asti svarga mokṣa phala pradam

analyzed: santi araṇye hi amūlyāni patra puṣpāṇi śākhinām

original: toyaṃ nadītaḍāgeṣu devaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: toyam nadī taḍāgeṣu devaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ sthitaḥ

analyzed: manaḥ niyamayet ekam vidyā sādhana karmaṇi

analyzed: manaḥ niyamitam yena muktiḥ tasya kare sthitā

analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe sahasrānīkacarite śrīviṣṇoḥ pūjāvidhiḥ nāma catustriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: rājovāca:

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

analyzed: yat tasmai kathayāmasa śaunakaḥ tat te

analyzed: śaunakam tu sukha āsīnam paryapṛcchat bṛhaspatiḥ

original: bṛhaspatir uvāca:

analyzed: iti uktaḥ guruṇā saḥ tha lakṣa homa ādikam vidhim

analyzed: pravakṣyāmi yathāvat te śṛṇu deva purohita

analyzed: su saṃskṛtām samām snigdhām pūrva pūrvam atha uttamām

analyzed: upari mekhalām kuryāt catur asrām su vistarām

analyzed: tatas vyāhṛtibhiḥ paścāt juhuyāt ca tila anvitam

original: yāvat prapūryate saṃkhyā lakṣaṃ vā koṭir eva vā // NsP_35.19 //
analyzed: yāvat prapūryate saṃkhyā lakṣam vā koṭiḥ eva vā

analyzed: tāvat homam tilaiḥ kuryāt acyuta arcana pūrvakam

analyzed: dīna anātha janebhyaḥ tu yajamānaḥ prayatnataḥ

analyzed: tāvat ca bhojanam dadyāt yāvat homam samācaret

analyzed: prokṣayet grāma madhye tu vyādhitān tu viśeṣataḥ

original: evaṃ kṛte tu homasya purasya nagarasya ca /
analyzed: evam kṛte tu homasya purasya nagarasya ca

analyzed: sarva bādhā praśamanī śāntiḥ bhavati sarvadā

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: ity etac chaunakaproktaṃ kathitaṃ nṛpanandana /
analyzed: iti etat śaunaka proktam kathitam nṛpa nandana

grāme gṛhe vā purabāhyadeśe dvijair ayaṃ yatnakṛtaḥ purovidhiḥ /
analyzed: grāme gṛhe vā pura bāhya deśe dvijaiḥ ayam yatna kṛtaḥ puras vidhiḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe lakṣahomavidhir nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 35 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe lakṣahomavidhiḥ nāma pañcatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

analyzed: madhu kaiṭabhau ca nidhanam prāpitau ca mahātmanā

analyzed: yathā pṛthvī dhṛtā rājan vārāheṇa mahātmanā

analyzed: tena eva nidhanam prāptaḥ yathā rājan mahā balaḥ

analyzed: yathā hiraṇyakaśipuḥ tridaśānām ariḥ purā

analyzed: narasiṃhena devena prāpitaḥ nidhanam nṛpa

analyzed: balabhadreṇa rāmeṇa yathā daityaḥ purā hataḥ

analyzed: yathā kṛṣṇena kaṃsa ādyāḥ hatāḥ daityāḥ suradviṣaḥ

analyzed: kalau prāpte yathā buddhaḥ bhavet nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ

analyzed: samāpte tu kalau bhūyas tathā te kathayāmi aham

analyzed: mayā ucyamānam ca vimucya pāpam prayāti viṣṇoḥ padam ati udāram

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe hareḥ prādurbhāvānukramaṇe ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 36 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe hareḥ prādurbhāva anukramaṇe ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: nānātvād avatārāṇām acyutasya mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: nānātvāt avatārāṇām acyutasya mahātmanaḥ

original: na śakyaṃ vistarād vaktuṃ tān bravīmi samāsataḥ // NsP_37.1 //
analyzed: na śakyam vistarāt vaktum tān bravīmi samāsatas

original: purā kila jagatsraṣṭā bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ /
analyzed: purā kila jagatsraṣṭā bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ

original: anantabhogaśayane yoganidrāṃ samāgataḥ // NsP_37.2 //
analyzed: ananta bhoga śayane yoganidrām samāgataḥ

original: atha tasya prasuptasya devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ /
analyzed: atha tasya prasuptasya devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: śrotrābhyām apatat toye svedabindudvayaṃ nṛpa // NsP_37.3 //
analyzed: śrotrābhyām apatat toye sveda bindu dvayam nṛpa

original: madhukaiṭabhanāmānau tasmāj jātau mahābalau /
analyzed: madhu kaiṭabha nāmānau tasmāt jātau mahā balau

original: mahākāyau mahāvīryau mahābalaparākramau // NsP_37.4 //
analyzed: mahā kāyau mahā vīryau mahā bala parākramau

analyzed: acyutasya prasuptasya mahat padmam ajāyata

original: nābhimadhye nṛpaśreṣṭha tasmin brahmābhyajāyata // NsP_37.5 //
analyzed: nābhi madhye nṛpa śreṣṭha tasmin brahmā abhyajāyata

original: sa cokto viṣṇunā rājan prajāḥ sṛja mahāmate /
analyzed: sa ca uktaḥ viṣṇunā rājan prajāḥ sṛja mahāmate

original: tathety uktvā jagannāthaṃ brahmāpi kamalodbhavaḥ // NsP_37.6 //
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā jagannātham brahmā api kamalodbhavaḥ

original: vedaśāstravaśād yāvat prajā sraṣṭuṃ samudyataḥ /
analyzed: veda śāstra vaśāt yāvat prajā sraṣṭum samudyataḥ

original: tāvat tatra samāyātau tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau // NsP_37.7 //
analyzed: tāvat tatra samāyātau tau ubhau madhu kaiṭabhau

original: āgatya vedaśāstrārtha- vijñānaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: āgatya veda śāstra artha vijñānam brahmaṇaḥ kṣaṇāt

original: apakṛtya gatau ghorau dānavau baladarpitau // NsP_37.8 //
analyzed: apakṛtya gatau ghorau dānavau bala darpitau

original: tataḥ padmodbhavo rājan jñānahīno 'bhavat kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: tatas padmodbhavaḥ rājan jñāna hīnaḥ bhavat kṣaṇāt

original: duḥkhitaś cintayām_asa kathaṃ srakṣyāmi vai prajāḥ // NsP_37.9 //
analyzed: duḥkhitaḥ cintayāmasa katham srakṣyāmi vai prajāḥ

original: coditas tvaṃ sṛjasveti prajā devena tat katham /
analyzed: coditaḥ tvam sṛjasva iti prajāḥ devena tat katham

original: srakṣye 'haṃ jñānahīnas tu aho kaṣṭam upasthitam // NsP_37.10 //
analyzed: srakṣye ham jñāna hīnaḥ tu aho kaṣṭam upasthitam

original: iti saṃcintya duḥkhārto brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: iti saṃcintya duḥkha ārtaḥ brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ

original: yatnato vedaśāstrāṇi smarann api na dṛṣṭavān // NsP_37.11 //
analyzed: yatnataḥ veda śāstrāṇi smaran api na dṛṣṭavān

original: tato viṣaṇṇacittas tu taṃ devaṃ puruṣottamam /
analyzed: tatas viṣaṇṇa cittaḥ tu tam devam puruṣottamam

original: ekāgramanasā samyak śāstreṇa stotum ārabhat // NsP_37.12 //
analyzed: ekāgra manasā samyak śāstreṇa stotum ārabhat

original: brahmovāca:
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: oṃ namo vedanidhaye śāstrāṇāṃ nidhaye namaḥ /
analyzed: om namaḥ veda nidhaye śāstrāṇām nidhaye namaḥ

original: vijñānanidhaye nityaṃ karmaṇāṃ nidhaye namaḥ // NsP_37.13 //
analyzed: vijñāna nidhaye nityam karmaṇām nidhaye namaḥ

original: vidyādharāya devāya vāgīśāya namo namaḥ /
analyzed: vidyādharāya devāya vāgīśāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: acintyāya namo nityaṃ sarvajñāya namo namaḥ // NsP_37.14 //
analyzed: acintyāya namaḥ nityam sarvajñāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: amūrtis tvaṃ mahābāho yajñamūrtir adhokṣaja /
analyzed: amūrtiḥ tvam mahā bāho yajñamūrtiḥ adhokṣaja

original: sāmnāṃ mūrtis tvam evādya sarvadā sarvarūpavān // NsP_37.15 //
analyzed: sāmnām mūrtiḥ tvam eva adya sarvadā sarva rūpavān

original: sarvajñānamayo 'si tvaṃ hṛdi jñānamayo 'cyuta /
analyzed: sarva jñāna mayaḥ si tvam hṛdi jñāna mayaḥ cyuta

original: dehi me tvaṃ sarvajñānaṃ devadeva namo namaḥ // NsP_37.16 //
analyzed: dehi me tvam sarva jñānam devadeva namaḥ namaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: itthaṃ stutas tadā tena śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ /
analyzed: ittham stutaḥ tadā tena śaṅkha cakra gadā dharaḥ

original: brahmāṇam āha deveśo dāsye te jñānam uttamam // NsP_37.17 //
analyzed: brahmāṇam āha deveśaḥ dāsye te jñānam uttamam

original: ity uktvā tu tadā viṣṇuś cintayām_asa pārthiva /
analyzed: iti uktvā tu tadā viṣṇuḥ cintayāmasa pārthiva

original: kenāsya nītaṃ vijñānaṃ kena rūpeṇa cādadhe // NsP_37.18 //
analyzed: kena asya nītam vijñānam kena rūpeṇa ca ādadhe

original: madhukaiṭabhakṛtaṃ sarvam iti jñātvā janārdanaḥ /
analyzed: madhu kaiṭabha kṛtam sarvam iti jñātvā janārdanaḥ

original: mātsyaṃ rūpaṃ samāsthāya bahuyojanam āyatam /
analyzed: mātsyam rūpam samāsthāya bahu yojanam āyatam

original: bahuyojanavistīrṇaṃ sarvajñānamayaṃ nṛpa // NsP_37.19 //
analyzed: bahu yojana vistīrṇam sarva jñāna mayam nṛpa

original: sa praviśya jalaṃ tūrṇaṃ kṣobhayām_asa taṃ hariḥ /
analyzed: sa praviśya jalam tūrṇam kṣobhayāmasa tam hariḥ

original: praviśya ca sa pātālaṃ dṛṣṭavān madhukaiṭabhau // NsP_37.20 //
analyzed: praviśya ca sa pātālam dṛṣṭavān madhu kaiṭabhau

original: tau mohayitvā tumulaṃ taj jñānaṃ jagṛhe hariḥ /
analyzed: tau mohayitvā tumulam tat jñānam jagṛhe hariḥ

original: vedaśāstrāṇi munibhiḥ saṃstuto madhusūdanaḥ // NsP_37.21 //
analyzed: veda śāstrāṇi munibhiḥ saṃstutaḥ madhusūdanaḥ

original: ānīya brahmaṇe dattvā tyaktvā tan mātsyakaṃ nṛpa /
analyzed: ānīya brahmaṇe dattvā tyaktvā tat mātsyakam nṛpa

original: jagaddhitāya sa punar yoganidrāvaśaṃ gataḥ // NsP_37.22 //
analyzed: jagat hitāya sa punar yoganidrā vaśam gataḥ

original: tataḥ prabuddhau saṃkruddhau tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau /
analyzed: tatas prabuddhau saṃkruddhau tau ubhau madhu kaiṭabhau

original: āgatya dadṛśāte tu śayānaṃ devam avyayam // NsP_37.23 //
analyzed: āgatya dadṛśāte tu śayānam devam avyayam

original: ayaṃ sa puruṣo dhūrta āvāṃ saṃmohya māyayā /
analyzed: ayam sa puruṣaḥ dhūrtaḥ āvām saṃmohya māyayā

original: ānīya vedaśāstrāṇi dattvā śete 'tra sādhuvat // NsP_37.24 //
analyzed: ānīya veda śāstrāṇi dattvā śete sādhu vat

original: ity uktvā tau mahāghorau dānavau madhukaiṭabhau /
analyzed: iti uktvā tau mahā ghorau dānavau madhu kaiṭabhau

original: bodhayām_asatus tūrṇaṃ śayānaṃ keśavaṃ nṛpa // NsP_37.25 //
analyzed: bodhayāmasatuḥ tūrṇam śayānam keśavam nṛpa

original: yuddhārtham āgatāv atra tvayā saha mahāmate /
analyzed: yuddha artham āgatau atra tvayā saha mahāmate

original: āvayor dehi saṃgrāmaṃ yudhyasvotthāya sāṃpratam // NsP_37.26 //
analyzed: āvayoḥ dehi saṃgrāmam yudhyasva utthāya sāṃpratam

original: ityukto bhagavāṃs tābhyāṃ devadevo nṛpottama /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ bhagavān tābhyām devadevaḥ nṛpa uttama

original: tatheti coktvā tau devaḥ śārṅgaṃ sajjam athākarot // NsP_37.27 //
analyzed: tathā iti ca uktvā tau devaḥ śārṅgam sajjam athā akarot

original: jyāghoṣatalaghoṣeṇa śaṅkhaśabdena mādhavaḥ /
analyzed: jyā ghoṣa tala ghoṣeṇa śaṅkha śabdena mādhavaḥ

original: khaṃ diśaḥ pradiśaś caiva pūrayām_asa līlayā // NsP_37.28 //
analyzed: kham diśaḥ pradiśaḥ ca eva pūrayāmasa līlayā

original: tau ca rājan mahāvīryau jyāghoṣaṃ cakratus tadā /
analyzed: tau ca rājan mahā vīryau jyā ghoṣam cakratuḥ tadā

original: yuyudhāte mahāghorau hariṇā madhukaiṭabhau // NsP_37.29 //
analyzed: yuyudhāte mahā ghorau hariṇā madhu kaiṭabhau

original: kṛṣṇaś ca yuyudhe tābhyāṃ līlayā jagataḥ patiḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ ca yuyudhe tābhyām līlayā jagataḥ patiḥ

original: samaṃ yuddhaṃ abhūd evaṃ teṣām astrāṇi muñcatām // NsP_37.30 //
analyzed: samam yuddham abhūt evam teṣām astrāṇi muñcatām

original: keśavaḥ śārṅganirmuktaiḥ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ /
analyzed: keśavaḥ śārṅga nirmuktaiḥ śaraiḥ āśīviṣa upamaiḥ

original: tāni śastrāṇi sarvāṇi ciccheda tilaśas tadā // NsP_37.31 //
analyzed: tāni śastrāṇi sarvāṇi ciccheda tilaśas tadā

original: tau yuddhvā suciraṃ tena dānavau madhukaiṭabhau /
analyzed: tau yuddhvā su ciram tena dānavau madhu kaiṭabhau

original: hatau śārṅgavinirmuktaiḥ śaraiḥ kṛṣṇena durmadau // NsP_37.32 //
analyzed: hatau śārṅga vinirmuktaiḥ śaraiḥ kṛṣṇena durmadau

original: tayos tu medasā rājan viṣṇunā kalpitā mahī /
analyzed: tayoḥ tu medasā rājan viṣṇunā kalpitā mahī

original: medinīti tataḥ saṃjñām avāpeyaṃ vasuṃdharā // NsP_37.33 //
analyzed: medinī iti tatas saṃjñām avāpa iyam vasuṃdharā

original: evaṃ kṛṣṇaprasādena vedāṃl labdhvā prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: evam kṛṣṇa prasādena vedān labdhvā prajāpatiḥ

original: prajāḥ sasarja bhūpāla vedadṛṣṭena karmaṇā // NsP_37.34 //
analyzed: prajāḥ sasarja bhūpāla veda dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ prādurbhāvaṃ harer nṛpa /
analyzed: yaḥ idam śṛṇuyāt nityam prādurbhāvam hareḥ nṛpa

original: vasitvā candrasadane vedavid brāhmaṇo bhavet // NsP_37.35 //
analyzed: vasitvā candra sadane veda vid brāhmaṇaḥ bhavet

original: mātsyaṃ vapus tan mahad adritulyaṃ vidyāmayaṃ lokahitāya viṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: mātsyam vapuḥ tat mahat adri tulyam vidyā mayam loka hitāya viṣṇuḥ

original: āsthāya bhīmaṃ janalokasaṃsthaiḥ stuto 'tha yas taṃ smara bhūmipāla // NsP_37.36 //
analyzed: āsthāya bhīmam jana loka saṃsthaiḥ yaḥ tam smara bhūmipāla

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapūrāṇe matsyaprādurbhāvo nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 37 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapūrāṇe matsyaprādurbhāvaḥ nāma saptatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: purā devāsure yuddhe devā daityaiḥ parājitāḥ /
analyzed: purā devāsure yuddhe devāḥ daityaiḥ parājitāḥ

original: sarve te śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ kṣīrābdhitanayāpatim // NsP_38.1 //
analyzed: sarve te śaraṇam jagmuḥ kṣīrābdhi tanayā patim

original: stotreṇa tuṣṭuvuḥ sarve samārādhya jagatpatim /
analyzed: stotreṇa tuṣṭuvuḥ sarve samārādhya jagatpatim

original: kṛtāñjalipuṭā rājan brahmādyā devatāgaṇāḥ // NsP_38.2 //
analyzed: kṛta añjali puṭāḥ rājan brahma ādyāḥ devatā gaṇāḥ

original: devā ūcuḥ:
analyzed: devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: namas te devadevāya lokanāthāya śārṅgiṇe /
analyzed: namaḥ te devadevāya lokanāthāya śārṅgiṇe

original: namas te padmanābhāya lokanāthāya śārṅgiṇe // NsP_38.3 //
analyzed: namaḥ te padmanābhāya loka nāthāya śārṅgiṇe

original: namas te padmanābhāya sarvaduḥkhāpahāriṇe /
analyzed: namaḥ te padmanābhāya sarva duḥkha apahāriṇe

original: namas te viśvarūpāya sarvadevamayāya ca // NsP_38.4 //
analyzed: namaḥ te viśvarūpāya sarva deva mayāya ca

original: madhukaiṭabhanāśāya keśavāya namo namaḥ // NsP_38.5 //
analyzed: madhu kaiṭabha nāśāya keśavāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: daityaiḥ parājitā deva vayaṃ yuddhe balānvitaiḥ /
analyzed: daityaiḥ parājitāḥ deva vayam yuddhe bala anvitaiḥ

original: jayopāyaṃ hi no brūhi karuṇākara te namaḥ // NsP_38.6 //
analyzed: jaya upāyam hi naḥ brūhi karuṇākara te namaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: iti stuto tadā daivair devadevo janārdanaḥ /
analyzed: iti tadā daivaiḥ devadevaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: tān abravīd dharir devān teṣām evāgrataḥ sthitaḥ // NsP_38.7 //
analyzed: tān abravīt hariḥ devān teṣām eva agratas sthitaḥ

original: śrībhagavān uvāca:
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: gatvā tatra surāḥ sarve saṃdhiṃ kuruta dānavaiḥ /
analyzed: gatvā tatra surāḥ sarve saṃdhim kuruta dānavaiḥ

original: manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim // NsP_38.8 //
analyzed: manthānam mandaram kṛtvā netram kṛtvā ca vāsukim

original: sarvauṣadhīḥ samānīya prakṣipyābdhau tvarānvitāḥ /
analyzed: sarva oṣadhīḥ samānīya prakṣipya abdhau tvarā anvitāḥ

original: dānavaiḥ sahitā bhūtvā manthadhvaṃ kṣīrasāgaram // NsP_38.9 //
analyzed: dānavaiḥ sahitāḥ bhūtvā manthadhvam kṣīrasāgaram

original: ahaṃ ca tatra sāhāyyaṃ kariṣyāmi divaukasaḥ /
analyzed: aham ca tatra sāhāyyam kariṣyāmi divaukasaḥ

original: bhaviṣyaty amṛtaṃ tatra tatpānād balavattarāḥ // NsP_38.10 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati amṛtam tatra tad pānāt balavattarāḥ

original: bhaviṣyanti kṣaṇād devā amṛtasya prabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti kṣaṇāt devāḥ amṛtasya prabhāvataḥ

original: yūyaṃ sarve mahābhāgās tejiṣṭhā raṇavikramāḥ // NsP_38.11 //
analyzed: yūyam sarve mahābhāgāḥ tejiṣṭhāḥ raṇa vikramāḥ

original: indrādyās tu mahotsāhās tal labdhvāmṛtam uttamam /
analyzed: indra ādyāḥ tu mahā utsāhāḥ tat labdhvā amṛtam uttamam

original: tato hi dānavāñ jetuṃ samarthā nātra saṃśayaḥ // NsP_38.12 //
analyzed: tatas hi dānavām jetum samarthāḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: ityuktā devadevena devāḥ sarve jagatpatim /
analyzed: iti uktāḥ devadevena devāḥ sarve jagatpatim

original: praṇamyāgatya nilayaṃ saṃdhiṃ kṛtvātha dānavaiḥ // NsP_38.13 //
analyzed: praṇamya āgatya nilayam saṃdhim kṛtvā atha dānavaiḥ

original: kṣīrābdher manthane sarve cakrur udyogam uttamam /
analyzed: kṣīrābdheḥ manthane sarve cakruḥ udyogam uttamam

original: balinā coddhṛto rājan mandarākhyo mahāgiriḥ // NsP_38.14 //
analyzed: balinā ca uddhṛtaḥ rājan mandara ākhyaḥ mahā giriḥ

original: kṣīrābdhau kṣepitaś caiva tenaikena nṛpottama /
analyzed: kṣīrābdhau kṣepitaḥ ca eva tena ekena nṛpa uttama

original: sarvauṣadhīṃś ca prakṣipya devadaityaiḥ payonidhau // NsP_38.15 //
analyzed: sarva oṣadhīn ca prakṣipya deva daityaiḥ payonidhau

original: vāsukiś cāgatas tatra rājan nārāyaṇājñayā /
analyzed: vāsukiḥ ca āgataḥ tatra rājan nārāyaṇa ājñayā

original: sarve devahitārthāya viṣṇuś ca svayam āgataḥ // NsP_38.16 //
analyzed: sarve deva hita arthāya viṣṇuḥ ca svayam āgataḥ

original: tatra viṣṇuṃ samāsādya tataḥ sarve surāsurāḥ /
analyzed: tatra viṣṇum samāsādya tatas sarve sura asurāḥ

original: sarve te maitrabhāvena kṣīrābdhes taṭam āśritāḥ // NsP_38.17 //
analyzed: sarve te maitra bhāvena kṣīrābdheḥ taṭam āśritāḥ

original: manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvātha vāsukim /
analyzed: manthānam mandaram kṛtvā netram kṛtvā atha vāsukim

original: tato mathitum ārabdhaṃ nṛpate tarasāmṛtam // NsP_38.18 //
analyzed: tatas mathitum ārabdham nṛpate tarasā amṛtam

original: viṣṇunā mukhabhāge tu yojitā dānavās tadā /
analyzed: viṣṇunā mukha bhāge tu yojitāḥ dānavāḥ tadā

original: devatāḥ pucchabhāge tu mathanāya niyojitāḥ // NsP_38.19 //
analyzed: devatāḥ puccha bhāge tu mathanāya niyojitāḥ

original: evaṃ ca mathanāt tatra mandaro 'dhaḥ praviśya ca /
analyzed: evam ca mathanāt tatra mandaraḥ dhas praviśya ca

original: ādhāreṇa vinā rājan taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā hariḥ // NsP_38.20 //
analyzed: ādhāreṇa vinā rājan tam dṛṣṭvā sahasā hariḥ

original: sarvalokahitārthāya kūrmarūpam ādhārayat /
analyzed: sarva loka hita arthāya kūrma rūpam ādhārayat

original: ātmānaṃ saṃpraviśyātha mandarasya girer adhaḥ // NsP_38.21 //
analyzed: ātmānam saṃpraviśya atha mandarasya gireḥ adhas

original: praviśya dhṛtavān śailaṃ mandaraṃ madhusūdanaḥ /
analyzed: praviśya dhṛtavān śailam mandaram madhusūdanaḥ

original: upary ākrāntavān śailaṃ pṛthagrūpeṇa keśavaḥ // NsP_38.22 //
analyzed: upari ākrāntavān śailam pṛthak rūpeṇa keśavaḥ

original: cakarṣa nāgarājaṃ ca devaiḥ sārdhaṃ janārdanaḥ /
analyzed: cakarṣa nāga rājam ca devaiḥ sārdham janārdanaḥ

original: surair adṛśyarūpeṇa daityamadhye janārdanaḥ /
analyzed: suraiḥ adṛśya rūpeṇa daitya madhye janārdanaḥ

original: tatas te tvarayā yuktā mamanthuḥ kṣīrasāgaram // NsP_38.23 //
analyzed: tatas te tvarayā yuktāḥ mamanthuḥ kṣīrasāgaram

original: yāvacchaktyā nṛpaśreṣṭha balavantaḥ surāsurāḥ /
analyzed: yāvat śaktyā nṛpa śreṣṭha balavantaḥ sura asurāḥ

original: mathyamānāt tatas tasmāt kṣīrābdher abhavan nṛpa // NsP_38.24 //
analyzed: mathyamānāt tatas tasmāt kṣīrābdheḥ abhavat nṛpa

original: kālakūṭam iti khyātaṃ viṣam atyantaduḥsaham /
analyzed: kālakūṭam iti khyātam viṣam atyanta duḥsaham

original: taṃ nāgā jagṛhuḥ sarve taccheṣaṃ śaṃkaro 'grahīt // NsP_38.25 //
analyzed: tam nāgāḥ jagṛhuḥ sarve tad śeṣam śaṃkaraḥ grahīt

original: nārāyaṇājñayā tena nīlakaṇṭhatvam āptavān /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa ājñayā tena nīlakaṇṭha tvam āptavān

original: airāvataś ca nāgendro hariś coccaiḥśravāḥ punaḥ // NsP_38.26 //
analyzed: airāvataḥ ca nāga indraḥ hariḥ ca uccaiḥśravāḥ punar

original: dvitīyāvartanād rājann utpannāv iti naḥ śrutam /
analyzed: dvitīya āvartanāt rājan utpannau iti naḥ śrutam

original: tṛtīyāvartanād rājann apsarāś ca suśobhanā /
analyzed: tṛtīya āvartanāt rājan apsarāḥ ca su śobhanā

original: caturthāt parijātaś ca utpannaḥ sa mahādrumaḥ // NsP_38.27 //
analyzed: caturthāt parijātaḥ ca utpannaḥ sa mahā drumaḥ

original: pañcamād dhi himāṃśus tu protthitaḥ kṣīrasāgarāt /
analyzed: pañcamāt hi himāṃśuḥ tu protthitaḥ kṣīrasāgarāt

original: taṃ bhavaḥ śirasā dhatte nārīvat svastikaṃ nṛpa // NsP_38.28 //
analyzed: tam bhavaḥ śirasā dhatte nārī vat svastikam nṛpa

original: nānāvidhāni divyāni ratnāny ābharaṇāni ca /
analyzed: nānāvidhāni divyāni ratnāni ābharaṇāni ca

original: kṣīrodadher utthitāś ca gandharvāś ca sahasraśaḥ // NsP_38.29 //
analyzed: kṣīrodadheḥ utthitāḥ ca gandharvāḥ ca sahasraśas

original: etān dṛṣṭvā tathotpannān atyāścaryasamanvitān /
analyzed: etān dṛṣṭvā tathā utpannān ati āścarya samanvitān

original: abhavan jātaharṣās te tatra sarve surāsurāḥ // NsP_38.30 //
analyzed: abhavan jāta harṣāḥ te tatra sarve sura asurāḥ

original: devapakṣe tato meghāḥ svalpaṃ varṣanti saṃsthitāḥ /
analyzed: devapakṣe tatas meghāḥ su alpam varṣanti saṃsthitāḥ

original: kṛṣṇājñayā ca vāyuś ca sukhaṃ vāti surān prati // NsP_38.31 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa ājñayā ca vāyuḥ ca sukham vāti surān prati

original: viṣaniḥśvāsavātena vāsukeś cāpare hatāḥ /
analyzed: viṣa niḥśvāsa vātena vāsukeḥ ca apare hatāḥ

original: nistejaso 'bhavan daityā nirvīryāś ca mahāmate // NsP_38.32 //
analyzed: nistejasaḥ bhavan daityāḥ nirvīryāḥ ca mahāmate

original: tataḥ śrīr utthitā tasmāt kṣīrodād dhṛtapaṅkajā /
analyzed: tatas śrīḥ utthitā tasmāt kṣīrodāt dhṛta paṅkajā

original: vibhrājamānā rājendra diśaḥ sarvāḥ svatejasā // NsP_38.33 //
analyzed: vibhrājamānāḥ rāja indra diśaḥ sarvāḥ sva tejasā

original: tatas tīrthodakaiḥ snātā divyavastrair alaṃkṛtā /
analyzed: tatas tīrtha udakaiḥ snātā divya vastraiḥ alaṃkṛtā

original: divyagandhānuliptāṅgī sumanobhiḥ subhūṣaṇaih // NsP_38.34 //
analyzed: divya gandha anulipta aṅgī sumanobhiḥ subhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: devapakṣaṃ samāsādya sthitvā kṣaṇam ariṃdama /
analyzed: deva pakṣam samāsādya sthitvā kṣaṇam ariṃdama

original: harivakṣaḥsthalaṃ prāptā tataḥ sā kamalālayā // NsP_38.35 //
analyzed: hari vakṣaḥ sthalam prāptā tatas sā kamala ālayā

original: tato 'mṛtaghaṭaṃ pūrṇaṃ dugdhvā tu payaso nidheḥ /
analyzed: tatas mṛta ghaṭam pūrṇam dugdhvā tu payasaḥ nidheḥ

analyzed: dhanvantariḥ samuttasthau tatas prītāḥ surāḥ nṛpa

original: daityāḥ śriyā parityaktā duḥkhitās te 'bhavan nṛpa /
analyzed: daityāḥ śriyā parityaktāḥ duḥkhitāḥ te bhavat nṛpa

original: nītvāmṛtaghaṭaṃ pūrṇaṃ te ca jagmur yathāsukham // NsP_38.37 //
analyzed: nītvā amṛta ghaṭam pūrṇam te ca jagmuḥ yathāsukham

original: tataḥ strīrūpam akarod viṣṇur devahitāya vai /
analyzed: tatas strī rūpam akarot viṣṇuḥ deva hitāya vai

original: ātmānaṃ nṛpaśārdūla sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyutam // NsP_38.38 //
analyzed: ātmānam nṛpa śārdūla sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutam

analyzed: tatas jagāma bhagavān strī rūpeṇa asurān prati

analyzed: divya rūpām tu tām dṛṣṭvā mohitāḥ te suradviṣaḥ

original: sudhāpūrṇaghaṭaṃ te tu mohaiḥ saṃsthāpya sattama /
analyzed: sudhā pūrṇa ghaṭam te tu mohaiḥ saṃsthāpya sattama

original: kāmena pīḍitā hy āsann asurās tatra tatkṣaṇāt // NsP_38.40 //
analyzed: kāmena pīḍitāḥ hi āsan asurāḥ tatra tad kṣaṇāt

original: mohayitvā tu tān evam asurān avanīpate /
analyzed: mohayitvā tu tān evam asurān avanīpate

analyzed: amṛtam tu samādāya devebhyaḥ pradadau hariḥ

analyzed: tat pītvā tu tatas devāḥ devadeva prasādataḥ

analyzed: balavantaḥ mahā vīryāḥ raṇe jagmuḥ tatas surān

analyzed: jitvā raṇe surān devāḥ svāni rājyāni cakrire

analyzed: etat te kathitam rājan prādurbhāvaḥ hareḥ ayam

analyzed: kūrma ākhyaḥ puṇya daḥ nṝṇām śṛṇvatām paṭhatām api

analyzed: āviskṛtam kaurmam ananta varcasam nārāyaṇena adbhuta karma kāriṇā

analyzed: divaukasānām tu hitāya kevalam rūpam param pāvanam eva kīrtitam

analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe kūrmaprādurbhāvaḥ nāma aṣṭatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

analyzed: trailokyam akhilam vyāpya tiṣṭhanti ambhāṃsi sattama

analyzed: rātrim yuga sahasra antām brahma rūpī jagatpatiḥ

analyzed: hiraṇyākṣaḥ iti khyātaḥ mahā bala parākramaḥ

analyzed: yajvinām apākārāya yatate sa tu bhū tale

original: iti matvā hiraṇyākṣaḥ kṛtasargaṃ tu brahmaṇā /
analyzed: iti matvā hiraṇyākṣaḥ kṛta sargam tu brahmaṇā

analyzed: bhūmeḥ yā dhāraṇā śaktiḥ tām nītvā sa mahā asuraḥ

analyzed: nidrā avasāne sarvātmā kva sthitā medinī iti vai

analyzed: saṃcintya jñātvā yogena rasātala talam gatām

analyzed: agni jihvam srucam tuṇḍam candra arka nayanam mahat

original: pūrteṣṭadharmaśravaṇaṃ divyaṃ tat sāmaniḥsvanam /

original: prāgvaṃśakāyaṃ havirnāsaṃ kuśadarbhatanūruham // NsP_39.13 //
analyzed: prāgvaṃśa kāyam haviḥ nāsam kuśa darbha tanūruham

analyzed: stūyamānaḥ mara gaṇaiḥ sthāpayāmasa pūrvavat

analyzed: saṃsthāpya parvatān sarvān yathāsthānam akalpayat

analyzed: vihāya rūpam vārāham tīrthe koka iti viśrute

analyzed: vaiṣṇavānām hita arthāya kṣetram tat guptam uttamam

analyzed: brahma rūpam samāsthāya punar sṛṣṭim cakāra saḥ

analyzed: hanti ca ante jagat sarvam rudra rūpī janārdanaḥ

analyzed: vedānta vedyaḥ puruṣaḥ vṛṣākapeḥ kathām imām yaḥ ca śṛṇoti mānavaḥ

analyzed: dṛḍhām matim yajña tanau viveśya vai vihāya pāpam ca naraḥ harim vrajet

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

analyzed: vārāhaḥ kathitaḥ hi evam prādurbhāvaḥ hareḥ tava

original: sāṃprataṃ nārasiṃhaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi nibodha me // NsP_40.1 //
analyzed: sāṃpratam nārasiṃham tu pravakṣyāmi nibodha me

original: diteḥ putro mahān āsīd *dhiraṇyakaśipuḥ purā /
analyzed: diteḥ putraḥ mahān āsīt hiraṇyakaśipuḥ purā

original: tapas tepe nirāhāro bahuvarṣasahasrakam // NsP_40.2 //
analyzed: tapaḥ tepe nirāhāraḥ bahu varṣa sahasrakam

original: tapatas tasya saṃtuṣṭo brahmā taṃ prāha dānavam /
analyzed: tapataḥ tasya saṃtuṣṭaḥ brahmā tam prāha dānavam

original: varaṃ varaya daityendra yas te manasi vartate // NsP_40.3 //
analyzed: varam varaya daitya indra yaḥ te manasi vartate

original: ityukto brahmaṇā daityo hiraṇyakaśipuḥ purā /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ brahmaṇā daityaḥ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ purā

original: uvāca natvā deveśaṃ brahmāṇaṃ vinayānvitaḥ // NsP_40.4 //
analyzed: uvāca natvā deveśam brahmāṇam vinaya anvitaḥ

original: hiraṇyakaśipur uvāca:
analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca

original: yadi tvaṃ varadānāya pravṛtto bhagavan mama /
analyzed: yadi tvam vara dānāya pravṛttaḥ bhagavat mama

original: yad yad vṛṇomy ahaṃ brahmaṃs tat tan me dātum arhasi // NsP_40.5 //
analyzed: yat yat vṛṇomi aham brahman tat tat me dātum arhasi

original: na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa na jalena na vahninā /
analyzed: na śuṣkeṇa na ca ārdreṇa na jalena na vahninā

original: na kāṣṭhena na kīṭena pāṣāṇena na vāyunā // NsP_40.6 //
analyzed: na kāṣṭhena na kīṭena pāṣāṇena na vāyunā

original: nāyudhena na śūlena na śailena na mānuṣaiḥ /
analyzed: na āyudhena na śūlena na śailena na mānuṣaiḥ

original: na surair asurair vāpi na gandharvair na rākṣasaiḥ // NsP_40.7 //
analyzed: na suraiḥ asuraiḥ vā api na gandharvaiḥ na rākṣasaiḥ

original: na kiṃnarair na yakṣais tu vidyādharabhujaṃgamaiḥ /
analyzed: na kiṃnaraiḥ na yakṣaiḥ tu vidyādhara bhujaṃgamaiḥ

original: na vānarair mṛgair vāpi naiva mātṛgaṇair api // NsP_40.8 //
analyzed: na vānaraiḥ mṛgaiḥ vā api nā eva mātṛ gaṇaiḥ api

original: nābhyantare na bāhye tu nānyair maraṇahetubhiḥ /
analyzed: na abhyantare na bāhye tu na anyaiḥ maraṇa hetubhiḥ

original: na dine na ca naktaṃ me tvatprasādād bhaven mṛtiḥ // NsP_40.9 //
analyzed: na dine na ca naktam me tvad prasādāt bhavet mṛtiḥ

original: iti vai devadeveśa varaṃ tvatto vṛṇomy aham // NsP_40.10ab //
analyzed: iti vai devadeveśa varam tvattaḥ vṛṇomi aham

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: ityukto daityarājena brahmā taṃ prāha pārthiva // NsP_40.10cd //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ daitya rājena brahmā tam prāha pārthiva

original: tapasā tava tuṣṭo 'haṃ mahatā tu varān imān /
analyzed: tapasā tava tuṣṭaḥ ham mahatā tu varān imān

original: durlabhān api daityendra dadāmi paramādbhutān // NsP_40.11 //
analyzed: durlabhān api daitya indra dadāmi parama adbhutān

original: anyeṣāṃ nedṛśaṃ dattaṃ na tair itthaṃ tapaḥ kṛtam /
analyzed: anyeṣām nā īdṛśam dattam na taiḥ ittham tapaḥ kṛtam

original: tvatprārthitaṃ mayā dattaṃ sarvaṃ te cāstu daityapa // NsP_40.12 //
analyzed: tvad prārthitam mayā dattam sarvam te ca astu daityapa

original: gaccha bhuṅkṣva mahābāho tapasām ūrjitaṃ phalam /
analyzed: gaccha bhuṅkṣva mahā bāho tapasām ūrjitam phalam

original: ity evaṃ daityarājasya hiraṇyakaśipoḥ purā // NsP_40.13 //
analyzed: iti evam daitya rājasya hiraṇyakaśipoḥ purā

original: dattvā varān yayau brahmā brahmalokam anuttamam /
analyzed: dattvā varān yayau brahmā brahma lokam anuttamam

analyzed: devān siṃhān raṇe jitvā divaḥ prācyāvayat bhuvi

original: na yaṣṭavyaṃ na hotavyaṃ na dātavyaṃ surān prati /

analyzed: gate kāle tu mahati devāḥ sa indrāḥ bṛhaspatim

analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipoḥ asya vināśam muni sattama

analyzed: jyotiṣmān dyutimān śrīmān āyuṣmān puruṣottamaḥ

narasiṃho mahābhīmo vajradaṃstro nakhāyudhaḥ /
ādidevo jagatkartā yogeśo garuḍadhvajaḥ // NsP_40.40 //

padmanābho hṛṣīkeśo vibhur dāmodaro hariḥ // NsP_40.41 //

vāmano duṣṭadamano govindo gopavallabhaḥ // NsP_40.42 //

analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ jagatsvāmī matim me saṃpradāsyati

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: ity uktvānamya pitaraṃ vāsudevaṃ hṛdi smaran /
