analyzed: prayātaḥ parvatena eva sārdham sa muni puṃgavaḥ

original: kalaviṅkau tu tau bhūtvā kailāśaṃ parvatottamam /
analyzed: kalaviṅkau tu tau bhūtvā kailāśam parvata uttamam

original: yatrāste ditijaśreṣṭho dvitrair mitraiḥ parīvṛtaḥ // NsP_41.14 //
analyzed: yatra āste ditija śreṣṭhaḥ dvitraiḥ mitraiḥ parīvṛtaḥ

original: kṛtasnāno munis tatra vṛkṣaśākhāsamāśritaḥ /
analyzed: kṛta snānaḥ muniḥ tatra vṛkṣa śākhā samāśritaḥ

original: śṛṇvatas tasya daityasya prāha gambhīrayā girā // NsP_41.15 //
analyzed: śṛṇvataḥ tasya daityasya prāha gambhīrayā girā

original: namo nārāyaṇāyeti punaḥ punar udāradhīḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti punar punar udāra dhīḥ

original: trivāraṃ prajapitvā vai nārado maunam āśritaḥ // NsP_41.16 //
analyzed: tri vāram prajapitvā vai nāradaḥ maunam āśritaḥ

original: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kalaviṅkasya sādaram /
analyzed: tat śrutvā vacanam tasya kalaviṅkasya sa ādaram

original: hiraṇyakaśipur daityaḥ kruddhaś cāpaṃ samādade // NsP_41.17 //
analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipuḥ daityaḥ kruddhaḥ cāpam samādade

original: bāṇaṃ dhanuṣi saṃdhāya yāvan muñcati tau prati /
analyzed: bāṇam dhanuṣi saṃdhāya yāvat muñcati tau prati

original: tāvad uḍḍīya tau bhūpa gatau nāradaparvatau // NsP_41.18 //
analyzed: tāvat uḍḍīya tau bhūpa gatau nārada parvatau

original: so 'pi krodhaparītāṅgo hiraṇyakaśipus tadā /
analyzed: saḥ pi krodha parīta aṅgaḥ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ tadā

original: tyaktvā tam āśramaṃ bhūyo nagaraṃ svaṃ mahīpate // NsP_41.19 //
analyzed: tyaktvā tam āśramam bhūyas nagaram svam mahīpate

original: tasyāpi bhāryā suśroṇī kayādhūr nāma nāmataḥ /
analyzed: tasya api bhāryā su śroṇī kayādhūḥ nāma nāmataḥ

original: tadā rajasvalā bhūtvā snātābhūd daivayogataḥ // NsP_41.20 //
analyzed: tadā rajasvalā bhūtvā snātā abhūt daiva yogataḥ

original: rātrāv ekāntasamaye tayā pṛṣṭaḥ sa daityarāṭ /
analyzed: rātrau ekānta samaye tayā pṛṣṭaḥ sa daitya rāj

original: svāmin yadā tapaścaryāṃ kartuṃ gehād vanaṃ gataḥ // NsP_41.21 //
analyzed: svāmin yadā tapaḥ caryām kartum gehāt vanam gataḥ

original: tadā tvayoktaṃ varṣāṇām ayutaṃ me tapas tv idam /
analyzed: tadā tvayā uktam varṣāṇām ayutam me tapaḥ tu idam

original: tat kimarthaṃ mahārāja sāṃprataṃ tyaktavān vratam // NsP_41.22 //
analyzed: tat kimartham mahā rāja sāṃpratam tyaktavān vratam

original: tathyaṃ kathaya me nātha snehāt pṛcchāmi daityapa // NsP_41.23ab //
analyzed: tathyam kathaya me nātha snehāt pṛcchāmi daityapa

original: hiraṇyakaśipur uvāca:
analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu cārvaṅgi me tathyāṃ vācaṃ vratavināśinīm // NsP_41.23cd //
analyzed: śṛṇu cārvaṅgi me tathyām vācam vrata vināśinīm

original: krodhasyātīva jananīṃ devānāṃ mudavardhanīm /
analyzed: krodhasya atīva jananīm devānām muda vardhanīm

original: kailāsaśikhare devi mahadānandakānane // NsP_41.24 //
analyzed: kailāsa śikhare devi mahat ānanda kānane

original: vyāharantau śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ namo nārāyaṇeti ca /
analyzed: vyāharantau śubhām vāṇīm namaḥ nārāyaṇa iti ca

original: vāradvayaṃ trayaṃ ceti vyāhṛtaṃ vacanaṃ śubhe // NsP_41.25 //
analyzed: vāra dvayam trayam ca iti vyāhṛtam vacanam śubhe

original: tena me manasi krodho jāto 'tīva varānane /
analyzed: tena me manasi krodhaḥ jātaḥ tīva varānane

original: kodaṇḍe śaram ādhāya yāvan muñcāmi bhāmini // NsP_41.26 //
analyzed: kodaṇḍe śaram ādhāya yāvat muñcāmi bhāmini

original: tāvat tau pakṣiṇau bhītau gatau deśāntaraṃ tv aham /
analyzed: tāvat tau pakṣiṇau bhītau gatau deśa antaram tu aham

original: tyaktvā vrataṃ samāyāto bhāvikāryabalena vai // NsP_41.27 //
analyzed: tyaktvā vratam samāyātaḥ bhāvi kārya balena vai

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: ity ucyamāne vacane vīryadrāvo 'bhavat tadā /
analyzed: iti ucyamāne vacane vīrya drāvaḥ bhavat tadā

original: ṛtukāle tu saṃprāpte jāto garbhas tadaiva hi // NsP_41.28 //
analyzed: ṛtu kāle tu saṃprāpte jātaḥ garbhaḥ tadā eva hi

original: punaḥ pravardhamānasya garbhe garbhasya dhīmataḥ /
analyzed: punar pravardhamānasya garbhe garbhasya dhīmataḥ

original: nāradasyopadeśena vaiṣṇavaḥ samajāyata // NsP_41.29 //
analyzed: nāradasya upadeśena vaiṣṇavaḥ samajāyata

original: tad agre kathayiṣyāmi bhūpa śraddhāparo bhava /
analyzed: tat agre kathayiṣyāmi bhūpa śraddhā paraḥ bhava

original: tasya sūnur abhud bhaktaḥ prahlādo janmavaiṣṇavaḥ // NsP_41.30 //
analyzed: tasya sūnuḥ abhud bhaktaḥ prahlādaḥ janma vaiṣṇavaḥ

original: so 'vardhatāsurakule nirmalo malināśraye /
analyzed: saḥ vardhata asura kule nirmalaḥ malina āśraye

original: yathā kalau harer bhaktiḥ pāśasaṃsāramocanī // NsP_41.31 //
analyzed: yathā kalau hareḥ bhaktiḥ pāśa saṃsāra mocanī

original: sa vardhamāno virarāja bālaiḥ saha trayīnāthapadeṣu bhaktyā /
analyzed: sa vardhamānaḥ virarāja bālaiḥ saha trayīnātha padeṣu bhaktyā

original: bālo 'lpadeho mahatīṃ mahātmā vistārayan bhāti sa viṣṇubhaktim // NsP_41.32 //
analyzed: bālaḥ lpa dehaḥ mahatīm mahātmā vistārayan bhāti sa viṣṇu bhaktim

original: yathā caturthaṃ yugam āptadharma kāmārthamokṣaṃ kila kīrtidaṃ hi /
analyzed: yathā caturtham yugam āpta dharma kāma artha mokṣam kila kīrti dam hi

original: sa bālalīlāsu sahānyaḍimbhaiḥ prahelikākrīḍanakeṣu nityam // NsP_41.33 //
analyzed: sa bāla līlāsu saha anya ḍimbhaiḥ prahelikā krīḍanakeṣu nityam

original: kathāprasaṅgeṣu ca kṛṣṇam eva provāca yasmāt sa hi tatsvabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kathā prasaṅgeṣu ca kṛṣṇam eva provāca yasmāt sa hi tad svabhāvaḥ

original: itthaṃ śiśutve 'pi vicitrakārī vyavardhateśasmaraṇāmṛtāśaḥ // NsP_41.34 //
analyzed: ittham śiśu tve vicitra kārī vyavardhata īśa smaraṇa amṛta āśaḥ

original: taṃ padmavaktraṃ daityendraḥ kadācit strīvṛtaḥ khalaḥ /
analyzed: tam padma vaktram daitya indraḥ kadācid strī vṛtaḥ khalaḥ

original: bālaṃ gurugṛhāyātaṃ dadarśa svāyatekṣaṇam // NsP_41.35 //
analyzed: bālam guru gṛha āyātam dadarśa su āyata īkṣaṇam

original: gṛhītvā tu kare putraṃ paṭṭikā yā suśobhanā /
analyzed: gṛhītvā tu kare putram paṭṭikā yā su śobhanā

original: mūrdhni cakrāṅkitā paṭṭī kṛṣṇanāmāṅkitādarāt // NsP_41.36 //
analyzed: mūrdhni cakra aṅkitā paṭṭī kṛṣṇa nāma aṅkita ādarāt

original: tam āhūya mudāviṣṭo lālayan prāha putrakam /
analyzed: tam āhūya mudā āviṣṭaḥ lālayan prāha putrakam

original: putra te jananī nityaṃ sudhīr me tvā praśaṃsati // NsP_41.37 //
analyzed: putra te jananī nityam sudhīḥ me tvā praśaṃsati

original: atha tad vada yat kiṃcid guruveśmani śikṣitam /
analyzed: atha tat vada yat kiṃcid guru veśmani śikṣitam

original: vicāryānandajananaṃ samyag āyāti tad vada // NsP_41.38 //
analyzed: vicārya ānanda jananam samyak āyāti tat vada

original: athāha pitaraṃ harṣāt prahlādo janmavaiṣṇavaḥ /
analyzed: atha āha pitaram harṣāt prahlādaḥ janma vaiṣṇavaḥ

original: govindaṃ trijagadvandyaṃ prabhuṃ natvā bravīmi te // NsP_41.39 //
analyzed: govindam trijagat vandyam prabhum natvā bravīmi te

original: iti śatroḥ stavaṃ śrutvā putroktaṃ strīvṛtaḥ khalaḥ /
analyzed: iti śatroḥ stavam śrutvā putra uktam strī vṛtaḥ khalaḥ

original: kruddho 'pi taṃ vañcayituṃ jahāsoccaiḥ prahṛṣṭavat // NsP_41.40 //
analyzed: kruddhaḥ pi tam vañcayitum jahāsa uccais prahṛṣṭa vat

original: āliṅgya tanayaṃ prāha śṛṇu bāla hitaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: āliṅgya tanayam prāha śṛṇu bāla hitam vacaḥ

original: rāma govinda kṛṣṇeti viṣṇo mādhava śrīpate // NsP_41.41 //
analyzed: rāma govinda kṛṣṇa iti viṣṇo mādhava śrīpate

original: evaṃ vadanti ye sarve te putra mama vairiṇaḥ /
analyzed: evam vadanti ye sarve te putra mama vairiṇaḥ

original: śāsitās tu mayedānīṃ tvayedaṃ kva śrutaṃ vacaḥ // NsP_41.42 //
analyzed: śāsitāḥ tu mayā idānīm tvayā idam kva śrutam vacaḥ

original: pitur vacanam ākarṇya dhīmān abhayasaṃyutaḥ /
analyzed: pituḥ vacanam ākarṇya dhīmān abhaya saṃyutaḥ

original: prahlādaḥ prāha he ārya maivaṃ brūyāḥ kadācana // NsP_41.43 //
analyzed: prahlādaḥ prāha he ārya mā evam brūyāḥ kadācana

original: sarvaiśvaryapradaṃ mantraṃ dharmādiparivardhanam /
analyzed: sarva aiśvarya pradam mantram dharma ādi parivardhanam

original: kṛṣṇeti yo naro brūyāt so 'bhayaṃ vindate padam // NsP_41.44 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇā iti yaḥ naraḥ brūyāt saḥ bhayam vindate padam

original: kṛṣṇanindāsamutthasya aghasyānto na vidyate /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa nindā samutthasya aghasya antaḥ na vidyate

original: rāma mādhava kṛṣṇeti smara bhaktyātmaśuddhaye // NsP_41.45 //
analyzed: rāma mādhava kṛṣṇa iti smara bhaktyā ātma śuddhaye

original: gurave 'pi bravīmy etad yato hitakaraṃ param /
analyzed: gurave bravīmi etat yatas hita karam param

original: śaraṇaṃ vraja sarveśaṃ sarvapāpakṣayaṃkaram // NsP_41.46 //
analyzed: śaraṇam vraja sarveśam sarva pāpa kṣayaṃkaram

original: athāha prakaṭakrodhaḥ surārir bhartsayan sutam /
analyzed: athā āha prakaṭa krodhaḥ surāriḥ bhartsayan sutam

original: kenāyaṃ bālako nīto daśām etāṃ sumadhyamām // NsP_41.47 //
analyzed: kena ayam bālakaḥ nītaḥ daśām etām sumadhyamām

original: dhig dhig hāheti duṣputra kiṃ me kṛtam aghaṃ mahat /
analyzed: dhik dhik hāhā iti duṣputra kim me kṛtam agham mahat

original: yāhi yāhi durācāra pāpiṣṭha puruṣādhama /
analyzed: yāhi yāhi durācāra pāpiṣṭha puruṣa adhama

original: uktveti parito vīkṣya punar āha śiśor gurum // NsP_41.48 //
analyzed: uktvā iti paritas vīkṣya punar āha śiśoḥ gurum

original: buddhvā cānīyatāṃ daityaiḥ krūraiḥ krūraparākramaiḥ /
analyzed: buddhvā ca ānīyatām daityaiḥ krūraiḥ krūra parākramaiḥ

original: iti śrutvā tato daityās tam ānīya nyavedayan /
analyzed: iti śrutvā tatas daityāḥ tam ānīya nyavedayan

original: dhīmān ūce khalaṃ bhūpaṃ devāntaka parīkṣatām // NsP_41.49 //
analyzed: dhīmān ūce khalam bhūpam devāntaka parīkṣatām

original: līlayaiva jitaṃ deva trailokyaṃ nikhilaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: līlayā eva jitam deva trailokyam nikhilam tvayā

original: asakṛn na hi roṣeṇa kiṃ kruddhasyālpake mayi // NsP_41.50 //
analyzed: asakṛt na hi roṣeṇa kim kruddhasya alpake mayi

original: iti sāmavacaḥ śrutvā dvijoktaṃ prāha daityarāṭ /
analyzed: iti sāma vacaḥ śrutvā dvija uktam prāha daitya rāj

original: viṣṇustavaṃ mama sutaṃ pāpa bālam apīpaṭhaḥ // NsP_41.51 //
analyzed: viṣṇu stavam mama sutam pāpa bālam apīpaṭhaḥ

original: uktveti tanayaṃ prāha rājā sāmnāmalaṃ sutam /
analyzed: uktvā iti tanayam prāha rājā sāmnām alam sutam

original: mamātmajasya kiṃ jāḍyāṃ tava caitad dvijaiḥ kṛtam // NsP_41.52 //
analyzed: mama ātmajasya kim jāḍyām tava ca etat dvijaiḥ kṛtam

original: viṣṇupakṣair dhruvaṃ dhūrtair mūḍha nityaṃ parityaja /
analyzed: viṣṇu pakṣaiḥ dhruvam dhūrtaiḥ mūḍha nityam parityaja

original: tyaja dvijaprasaṅgaṃ hi dvijasaṅgo hy aśobhanaḥ // NsP_41.53 //
analyzed: tyaja dvija prasaṅgam hi dvija saṅgaḥ hi aśobhanaḥ

original: asmatkulocitaṃ tejo yair dvijais tu tirohitam /
analyzed: asmad kula ucitam tejaḥ yaiḥ dvijaiḥ tu tirohitam

original: yasya yat saṃgatiḥ puṃso maṇivat syāt sa tadguṇaḥ // NsP_41.54 //
analyzed: yasya yat saṃgatiḥ puṃsaḥ maṇi vat syāt sa tad guṇaḥ

original: svakularddhyai tato dhīmān svayūthān eva saṃśrayet /
analyzed: sva kula ṛddhyai tatas dhīmān sva yūthān eva saṃśrayet

original: matsutasyocitaṃ tyaktvā viṣṇupakṣīyanāśanam // NsP_41.55 //
analyzed: mad sutasya ucitam tyaktvā viṣṇu pakṣīya nāśanam

original: svayam eva bhajan viṣṇuṃ manda kiṃ tvaṃ na lajjase /
analyzed: svayam eva bhajan viṣṇum manda kim tvam na lajjase

original: viśvanāthasya me sūnur bhūtvānyaṃ nātham icchasi // NsP_41.56 //
analyzed: viśva nāthasya me sūnuḥ bhūtvā anyam nātham icchasi

original: śṛṇu vatsa jagattattvaṃ kaścin nāsti nijaḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇu vatsa jagat tattvam kaścid nā asti nijaḥ prabhuḥ

original: yaḥ śūraḥ sa śriyaṃ bhuṅkte sa prabhuḥ sa maheśvaraḥ // NsP_41.57 //
analyzed: yaḥ śūraḥ sa śriyam bhuṅkte sa prabhuḥ sa maheśvaraḥ

original: sa devaḥ sakalādhyakṣo yathāhaṃ trijagajjayī /
analyzed: sa devaḥ sakala adhyakṣaḥ yathā aham trijagat jayī

original: tyaja jāḍyam ataḥ śauryaṃ bhajasva svakulocitam // NsP_41.58 //
analyzed: tyaja jāḍyam atas śauryam bhajasva sva kula ucitam

original: anye 'pi tvāṃ haniṣyanti vadiṣyanti janās tv idam /
analyzed: anye pi tvām haniṣyanti vadiṣyanti janāḥ tu idam

original: asuro 'yaṃ surān stauti mārjāra iva mūṣakān // NsP_41.59 //
analyzed: asuraḥ yam surān stauti mārjāraḥ iva mūṣakān

original: dveṣyān śikhīva phaṇino durnimittam idaṃ dhruvam /
analyzed: dveṣyān śikhī iva phaṇinaḥ durnimittam idam dhruvam

original: labdhvāpi mahad aiśvaryaṃ lāghavaṃ yānty abuddhayaḥ // NsP_41.60 //
analyzed: labdhvā api mahat aiśvaryam lāghavam yānti abuddhayaḥ

original: yathāyaṃ matsutaḥ stutyaḥ stāvakān stauti nīcavat /
analyzed: yathā ayam mad sutaḥ stutyaḥ stāvakān stauti nīca vat

original: re mūḍha dṛṣṭvāpy aiśvasryaṃ mama brūṣe puro harim // NsP_41.61 //
analyzed: re mūḍha dṛṣṭvā api aiśvasryam mama brūṣe puras harim

original: asadṛśasya tu hareḥ stutir eṣā viḍambanā /
analyzed: asadṛśasya tu hareḥ stutiḥ eṣā viḍambanā

original: ity uktvā tanayaṃ bhūpa jātakrodho bhayānakaḥ // NsP_41.62 //
analyzed: iti uktvā tanayam bhūpa jāta krodhaḥ bhayānakaḥ

original: jihmaṃ nirīkṣya ca prāha tadguruṃ kampayan ruṣā /
analyzed: jihmam nirīkṣya ca prāha tad gurum kampayan ruṣā

original: yāhi yāhi dvijapaśo sādhu śādhi sutaṃ mama // NsP_41.63 //
analyzed: yāhi yāhi dvija paśo sādhu śādhi sutam mama

original: prasāda ity eṣa vadan sa vipro jagāma gehaṃ khalarājasevī /
analyzed: prasādaḥ iti eṣa vadan sa vipraḥ jagāma geham khala rāja sevī

original: viṣṇuṃ visṛjyānvasarac ca daityaṃ kiṃ vā na kuryur bharaṇāya lubdhāḥ // NsP_41.64 //
analyzed: viṣṇum visṛjya anvasarat ca daityam kim vā na kuryuḥ bharaṇāya lubdhāḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe nṛsiṃhaprādurbhāve ekacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 41 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe nṛsiṃhaprādurbhāve ekacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: so 'py āśu nīto guruveśma daityair daityendrasūnur haribhaktibhūṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ pi āśu nītaḥ guru veśma daityaiḥ daitya indra sūnuḥ hari bhakti bhūṣaṇaḥ

original: aśeṣavidyānivahena sākaṃ kālena kaumāram avāpa yogī // NsP_42.1 //
analyzed: aśeṣa vidyā nivahena sākam kālena kaumāram avāpa yogī

original: prāyeṇa kaumāram avāpya lokaḥ puṣṇāti nāstikyam asadgatiṃ ca /
analyzed: prāyeṇa kaumāram avāpya lokaḥ puṣṇāti nāstikyam asat gatim ca

original: tasmin vayaḥsthasya bahirviraktir bhavaty abhūc citram aje ca bhaktiḥ // NsP_42.2 //
analyzed: tasmin vayaḥsthasya bahis viraktiḥ bhavati abhūt citram aje ca bhaktiḥ

original: atha saṃpūrṇavidyaṃ taṃ kadācid ditijeśvaraḥ /
analyzed: atha saṃpūrṇa vidyam tam kadācid ditija īśvaraḥ

original: ānāyya praṇataṃ prāha prahlādaṃ viditeśvaram // NsP_42.3 //
analyzed: ānāyya praṇatam prāha prahlādam vidita īśvaram

original: sādhv ajñānanidher bālyān mukto 'si surasūdana /
analyzed: sādhu ajñāna nidheḥ bālyāt muktaḥ si surasūdana

original: idānīṃ bhrājase bhāsvān nīhārād iva nirgataḥ // NsP_42.4 //
analyzed: idānīm bhrājase bhāsvān nīhārāt iva nirgataḥ

original: bālye vayaṃ ca tvam iva dvijair jāḍyāya mohitāḥ /
analyzed: bālye vayam ca tvam iva dvijaiḥ jāḍyāya mohitāḥ

original: vayasā vardhamānena putrakaivaṃ suśikṣitāḥ // NsP_42.5 //
analyzed: vayasā vardhamānena putraka evam su śikṣitāḥ

original: tad adya tvayi dhurye 'haṃ saṃsakaṇṭakatādhuram /
analyzed: tat adya tvayi dhurye haṃ saṃsa kaṇṭaka tā dhuram

original: vinyasya svāṃ ciradhṛtāṃ sukhī paśyan śriyaṃ tava // NsP_42.6 //
analyzed: vinyasya svām cira dhṛtām sukhī paśyan śriyam tava

original: yadā yadā hi naipuṇyaṃ pitā putrasya paśyati /
analyzed: yadā yadā hi naipuṇyam pitā putrasya paśyati

original: tadā tadādhiṃ tyaktvā nu mahat saukhyam avāpnuyāt // NsP_42.7 //
analyzed: tadā tad ādhim tyaktvā nu mahat saukhyam avāpnuyāt

original: guruś cātīva naipuṇyaṃ mamāgre 'varṇayat tava /
analyzed: guruḥ ca atīva naipuṇyam mama agre varṇayat tava

original: na citraṃ putra tac chrotuṃ kiṃ nu me vāñchataḥ śrutī // NsP_42.8 //
analyzed: na citram putra tat śrotum kim nu me vāñchataḥ śrutī

original: netrayoḥ śatrudāridryaṃ śrotrayoḥ sutasūktayaḥ /
analyzed: netrayoḥ śatru dāridryam śrotrayoḥ suta sūktayaḥ

original: yuddhavraṇaṃ ca gātreṣu māyināṃ ca mahotsavaḥ // NsP_42.9 //
analyzed: yuddha vraṇam ca gātreṣu māyinām ca mahā utsavaḥ

original: śrutveti nikṛtiprajñaṃ daityādhipavacas tataḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā iti nikṛti prajñam daitya adhipa vacaḥ tatas

original: jagāda yogī niśśaṅkaṃ prahlādaḥ praṇato gurum // NsP_42.10 //
analyzed: jagāda yogī niśśaṅkam prahlādaḥ praṇataḥ gurum

original: sūktayaḥ śrotrayoḥ satyaṃ mahārāja mahotsavaḥ /
analyzed: sūktayaḥ śrotrayoḥ satyam mahā rāja mahā utsavaḥ

original: kiṃtu tā vaiṣṇavīr vāco muktvā nānyā vicārayet // NsP_42.11 //
analyzed: kiṃtu tāḥ vaiṣṇavīḥ vācaḥ muktvā na anyāḥ vicārayet

original: nītiḥ sūktiḥ kathāḥ śrāvyāḥ śrāvyaṃ kāvyaṃ ca tad vacaḥ /
analyzed: nītiḥ su uktiḥ kathāḥ śrāvyāḥ śrāvyam kāvyam ca tat vacaḥ

original: yatra saṃsṛtiduḥkhaugha- kakṣāgnir gīyate hariḥ // NsP_42.12 //
analyzed: yatra saṃsṛti duḥkha ogha kakṣa agniḥ gīyate hariḥ

original: acintyaḥ stūyate yatra bhaktyā bhaktepsitapradaḥ /
analyzed: acintyaḥ stūyate yatra bhaktyā bhakta īpsita pradaḥ

original: arthaśātreṇa kiṃ tāta yatra saṃsṛtisaṃtatiḥ // NsP_42.13 //
analyzed: artha śātreṇa kim tāta yatra saṃsṛti saṃtatiḥ

original: śāstraśrameṇa kiṃ tāta yenātmaiva vihaṃsyate /
analyzed: śāstra śrameṇa kim tāta yena ātmā eva vihaṃsyate

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ vāṅmayaṃ tasmāc *chrāvyaṃ sevyaṃ ca sarvadā // NsP_42.14 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam vāc mayam tasmāt śrāvyam sevyam ca sarvadā

original: mumukṣubhir bhavakleśān no cen naiva sukhī bhavet /
analyzed: mumukṣubhiḥ bhava kleśān no ced nā eva sukhī bhavet

original: iti tasya vacaḥ śṛṇvan hiraṇyakaśipus tadā // NsP_42.15 //
analyzed: iti tasya vacaḥ śṛṇvan hiraṇyakaśipuḥ tadā

original: jajvāla daityarāṭ tapta- sarpir adbhir ivādhikam /
analyzed: jajvāla daitya rāj tapta sarpiḥ adbhiḥ iva adhikam

original: prahlādasya giraṃ puṇyāṃ janasaṃsṛtināśinīm // NsP_42.16 //
analyzed: prahlādasya giram puṇyām jana saṃsṛti nāśinīm

original: nāmṛsyatāsuraḥ kṣudro ghūko bhānuprabhām iva /
analyzed: na amṛsyata asuraḥ kṣudraḥ ghūkaḥ bhānu prabhām iva

original: parito vīkṣya saṃprāha kruddho daityabhaṭān idam // NsP_42.17 //
analyzed: paritas vīkṣya saṃprāha kruddhaḥ daitya bhaṭān idam

original: hanyatām eṣa kuṭilaḥ śastrapātaiḥ subhīṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: hanyatām eṣa kuṭilaḥ śastra pātaiḥ su bhīṣaṇaiḥ

original: utkṛttyotkṛttya marmāṇi rakṣitāstu hariḥ svayam // NsP_42.18 //
analyzed: utkṛttya utkṛttya marmāṇi rakṣitā astu hariḥ svayam

original: paśyatv idānīm evaiṣa harisaṃstavajaṃ phalam /
analyzed: paśyatu idānīm eva eṣa hari saṃstava jam phalam

original: kākolakaṅkagṛdhrebhyo hy asyāṅgaṃ saṃvibhajyatām // NsP_42.19 //
analyzed: kākola kaṅka gṛdhrebhyaḥ hi asya aṅgam saṃvibhajyatām

original: athoddhṛtāstrā daiteyas tarjayantaḥ pragarjitaiḥ /
analyzed: atha uddhṛta astrāḥ daiteyaḥ tarjayantaḥ pragarjitaiḥ

original: acyutasya priyaṃ bhaktaṃ taṃ jagnuḥ patinoditāḥ // NsP_42.20 //
analyzed: acyutasya priyam bhaktam tam jagnuḥ patinā uditāḥ

original: prahlādo 'pi prabhuṃ natvā dhyānavajraṃ samādade /
analyzed: prahlādaḥ pi prabhum natvā dhyāna vajram samādade

original: akṛtrimarasam bhaktaṃ tam itthaṃ dhyānaniścalam // NsP_42.21 //
analyzed: akṛtrima rasam bhaktam tam ittham dhyāna niścalam

original: rarakṣa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ prahlādaṃ bhaktaduḥkhahṛt /
analyzed: rarakṣa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ prahlādam bhakta duḥkha hṛt

original: athālabdhapadāny asya gātre śastrāṇi rakṣasām // NsP_42.22 //
analyzed: atha a labdha padāni asya gātre śastrāṇi rakṣasām

original: nīlābjaśakalānīva petuś chinnāny anekadhā /
analyzed: nīla abja śakalāni iva petuḥ chinnāni anekadhā

original: kiṃ prākṛtāni śastrāṇi kariṣyanti haripriye // NsP_42.23 //
analyzed: kim prākṛtāni śastrāṇi kariṣyanti haripriye

original: tāpatrayamahāstraughaḥ sarvo 'py asmād bibheti vai /
analyzed: tāpa traya mahā astra oghaḥ sarvaḥ api asmāt bibheti vai

original: pīḍayanti janāṃs tāvad vyādhayo rākṣasā grahāḥ // NsP_42.24 //
analyzed: pīḍayanti janān tāvat vyādhayaḥ rākṣasāḥ grahāḥ

original: yāvad guhāśayaṃ viṣṇuṃ sūkṣmaṃ ceto na vindati /
analyzed: yāvat guhā āśayam viṣṇum sūkṣmam cetaḥ na vindati

original: te tu bhagnāstraśakalaiḥ pratīpotthair itas tataḥ // NsP_42.25 //
analyzed: te tu bhagna astra śakalaiḥ pratīpa utthaiḥ itas tatas

original: hanyamānā nyavartanta sadyaḥ phaladadair iva /
analyzed: hanyamānāḥ nyavartanta sadyas phaladadaiḥ iva

original: na citraṃ vibudhānāṃ tad ajñānāṃ vismayāvaham // NsP_42.26 //
analyzed: na citram vibudhānām tat ajñānām vismaya āvaham

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ balam ālokya rājā nūnaṃ bhayaṃ dadhau /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam balam ālokya rājā nūnam bhayam

original: punas tasya vadhopāyaṃ cintayan sa sudurmatiḥ // NsP_42.27 //
analyzed: punar tasya vadha upāyam cintayan sa su durmatiḥ

original: samādiśat samāhūya daṃdaśūkān sudurviṣān /
analyzed: samādiśat samāhūya daṃdaśūkān su durviṣān

original: aśastravadhayogyo 'yam asmayo haritoṣakṛt // NsP_42.28 //
analyzed: a śastra vadha yogyaḥ yam asmayaḥ hari toṣa kṛt

original: tasmād bhavadibhir acirād hanyatāṃ garalāyudhāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt bhavadibhiḥ acirāt hanyatām garala āyudhāḥ

original: hiraṇyakaśipoḥ śrutvā vacanaṃ te bhujaṃgamāḥ /
analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipoḥ śrutvā vacanam te bhujaṃgamāḥ

original: tasyājñāṃ jagṛhur mūrdhnā praharṣād deśavartinaḥ // NsP_42.29 //
analyzed: tasya ājñām jagṛhuḥ mūrdhnā praharṣāt deśa vartinaḥ

original: atha jvaladdaśanakarāladaṃṣṭriṇa sphuṭasphuraddaśanasahasrabhīṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: atha jvalat daśana karāla daṃṣṭriṇa sphuṭa sphurat daśana sahasra bhīṣaṇāḥ

original: akarṣakā harimahisvakarṣakā haripriyaṃ drutataram āpatan ruṣā // NsP_42.30 //
analyzed: a karṣakāḥ hari mahi sva karṣakāḥ haripriyam drutataram āpatan ruṣā

original: garāyudhās tvacam api bhettum alpikāṃ vapuṣyajasmṛtibaladurbhidākṛteḥ /
analyzed: gara āyudhāḥ tvacam api bhettum alpikām vapuṣi aja smṛti bala durbhida ākṛteḥ

original: alaṃ na te harivapuṣaṃ tu kevalaṃ vidaśya taṃ nijadaśanair vinā kṛtāḥ // NsP_42.31 //
analyzed: alam na te hari vapuṣam tu kevalam vidaśya tam nija daśanaiḥ vinā kṛtāḥ

original: tataḥ sravatkṣatajaviṣaṇṇamūrtayo dvidhākṛtādbhutadaśanā bhujaṃgamāḥ /
analyzed: tatas sravat kṣataja viṣaṇṇa mūrtayaḥ dvidhākṛta adbhuta daśanāḥ bhujaṃgamāḥ

original: sametya te ditijapatiṃ vyajijñapan viniḥśvasatpracalaphaṇā bhujaṃgamāḥ // NsP_42.32 //
analyzed: sametya te ditija patim vyajijñapan viniḥśvasat pracala phaṇāḥ bhujaṃgamāḥ

original: prabho mahīdhrān api bhasmaśeṣāṃs tasminn aśaktās tu tadaiva vadhyāḥ /
analyzed: prabho mahīdhrān api bhasma śeṣān tasmin aśaktāḥ tu tadā eva vadhyāḥ

original: mahānubhāvasya tavātmajasya vadhe niyuktvā daśanair vinā kṛtāḥ // NsP_42.33 //
analyzed: mahā anubhāvasya tava ātmajasya vadhe niyuktvā daśanaiḥ vinā kṛtāḥ

original: itthaṃ dvijihvāḥ kaṭhinaṃ nivedya yayur visṛṣṭāḥ prabhuṇākṛtārthāḥ /
analyzed: ittham dvijihvāḥ kaṭhinam nivedya yayuḥ visṛṣṭāḥ prabhuṇā akṛtārthāḥ

original: vicintayantaḥ pṛthuvismayena prahlādasāmarthyanidānam eva // NsP_42.34 //
analyzed: vicintayantaḥ pṛthu vismayena prahlāda sāmarthya nidānam eva

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: athāsureśaḥ sacivair vicārya niścitya sūnuṃ tam adaṇḍasādhyam /
analyzed: athā asura īśaḥ sacivaiḥ vicārya niścitya sūnum tam a daṇḍa sādhyam

original: āhūya sāmnā praṇataṃ jagāda vākyaṃ sadā nirmalapuṇyacittam /
analyzed: āhūya sāmnā praṇatam jagāda vākyam sadā nirmala puṇya cittam

original: prahlāda duṣṭo 'pi nijāṅgajāto na vadhya ity adya kṛpā mamābhūt // NsP_42.35 //
analyzed: prahlāda nija aṅga jātaḥ na vadhyaḥ iti adya kṛpā mama abhūt

original: tatas tūrṇaṃ samāgatya daityarājapurohitāḥ /
analyzed: tatas tūrṇam samāgatya daitya rāja purohitāḥ

original: mūḍhāḥ prāñjalayaḥ prāhur dvijāḥ śāstraviśāradāḥ // NsP_42.36 //
analyzed: mūḍhāḥ prāñjalayaḥ prāhuḥ dvijāḥ śāstra viśāradāḥ

original: trailokyaṃ kampate deva bhṛśaṃ tvayy abhikāṅkṣiṇi /
analyzed: trailokyam kampate deva bhṛśam tvayi abhikāṅkṣiṇi

original: prahlādas tvāṃ na jānāti kruddhaṃ svalpo mahābalam // NsP_42.37 //
analyzed: prahlādaḥ tvām na jānāti kruddham su alpaḥ mahā balam

original: tad alaṃ deva roṣeṇa dayāṃ kartuṃ tvam arhasi /
analyzed: tat alam deva roṣeṇa dayām kartum tvam arhasi

original: putraḥ kuputratām eti na mātāpitarau kadā // NsP_42.38 //
analyzed: putraḥ kuputra tām eti na mātā pitarau kadā

original: uktveti kuṭilaprajñaṃ daityaṃ daityapurohitāḥ /
analyzed: uktvā iti kuṭila prajñam daityam daitya purohitāḥ

original: ādāya tadanujñātaṃ prahlādaṃ dhīdhanaṃ yayuḥ // NsP_42.39 //
analyzed: ādāya tad anujñātam prahlādam dhīdhanam yayuḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe narasiṃhaprādurbhāve dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 42 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe narasiṃha prādurbhāve dvicatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: atha sa gurugṛhe 'pi vartamānaḥ sakalavidacyutasaktapuṇyacetāḥ /
analyzed: atha sa guru gṛhe vartamānaḥ sakala vid acyuta sakta puṇya cetāḥ

original: jaḍa iva vicacāra bāhyakṛtye satatam anantamayam jagat prapaśyan // NsP_43.1 //
analyzed: jaḍaḥ iva vicacāra bāhyakṛtye satatam ananta mayam jagat prapaśyan

original: sahagurukulavāsinaḥ kadācic chrutiviratā hy avadan sametya bālāḥ /
analyzed: saha guru kula vāsinaḥ kadācid śruti viratāḥ hi avadan sametya bālāḥ

original: tava caritam aho vicitram etat kṣitipatiputra yato 'sy abhogalubdhaḥ /
analyzed: tava caritam aho vicitram etat kṣitipati putra yatas si a bhoga lubdhaḥ

original: hṛdi kim api vicintya hṛṣṭaromā bhavasi sadā ca vadāṅga yady aguhyam // NsP_43.2 //
analyzed: hṛdi kim api vicintya hṛṣṭa romā bhavasi sadā ca vada aṅga yadi a guhyam

original: iti gaditavataḥ sa mantriputrān avadad idaṃ nṛpa sarvavatsalatvāt /
analyzed: iti gaditavataḥ sa mantri putrān avadat idam nṛpa sarva vatsala tvāt

original: śṛṇuta sumanasaḥ surāriputrā yad aham ananyaratir vadāmi pṛṣṭaḥ // NsP_43.3 //
analyzed: śṛṇuta sumanasaḥ surāri putrāḥ yat aham an anya ratiḥ vadāmi pṛṣṭaḥ

original: dhanajanataruṇīvilāsaramyo bhavavibhavaḥ kila bhāti yas tam enam /
analyzed: dhana jana taruṇī vilāsa ramyaḥ bhava vibhavaḥ kila bhāti yaḥ tam enam

original: vimṛśata subudhair utaiṣa sevyo drutam atha vā parivarjya eva dūrāt // NsP_43.4 //
analyzed: vimṛśata su budhaiḥ uta eṣa sevyaḥ drutam atha vā parivarjyaḥ eva dūrāt

original: prathamam iha vicāryatāṃ yad ambā jaṭharagatair anubhūyate suduḥkham /
analyzed: prathamam iha vicāryatām yat ambā jaṭhara gataiḥ anubhūyate su duḥkham

original: sukuṭilatanubhis tadagnitaptair vividhapurājananāni saṃsmaradbhiḥ // NsP_43.5 //
analyzed: su kuṭila tanubhiḥ tad agni taptaiḥ vividha purā jananāni saṃsmaradbhiḥ

original: kārāgṛhe dasyur ivāsmi baddho jarāyuṇā viṭkṛmimūtragehe /
analyzed: kārā gṛhe dasyuḥ iva asmi baddhaḥ jarāyuṇā viṣ kṛmi mūtra gehe

original: paśyāmi garbhe 'pi sakṛn mukunda- pādābjayor asmaraṇena kaṣṭam // NsP_43.6 //
analyzed: paśyāmi garbhe sakṛt mukunda pāda abjayoḥ a smaraṇena kaṣṭam

original: tasmāt sukhaṃ garbhaśayasya nāsti bālye tathā yauvanavārddhake vā /
analyzed: tasmāt sukham garbhaśayasya nā asti bālye tathā yauvana vārddhake vā

original: evaṃ bhavo duḥkhamayaḥ sadaiva sevyaḥ kathaṃ daityasutāḥ prabuddhaiḥ /
analyzed: evam bhavaḥ duḥkha mayaḥ sadā eva sevyaḥ katham daitya sutāḥ prabuddhaiḥ

original: evaṃ bhave 'smin parimṛgyamāṇā vīkṣāmahe naiva sukhāṃśaleśam // NsP_43.7 //
analyzed: evam bhave smin parimṛgyamāṇāḥ vīkṣāmahe nā eva sukha aṃśa leśam

original: yathā yathā sādhu vicārayāmas tathā tathā duḥkhataraṃ ca vidmaḥ /
analyzed: yathā yathā sādhu vicārayāmaḥ tathā tathā duḥkhataram ca vidmaḥ

original: tasmād bhave 'smin kila cārurūpe duḥkhākare naiva patanti santaḥ // NsP_43.8 //
analyzed: tasmāt bhave smin kila cāru rūpe duḥkha ākare nā eva patanti santaḥ

original: patanty atho 'tattvavidaḥ sumūḍhā vahnau pataṃgā iva darśanīye /
analyzed: patanti atho tattva vidaḥ su mūḍhāḥ vahnau pataṃgāḥ iva darśanīye

original: yady asti nānyac charaṇaṃ sukhāya yuktaṃ tadaitat patanaṃ sukhābhe // NsP_43.9 //
analyzed: yadi asti na anyat śaraṇam sukhāya yuktam tadā etat patanam sukha ābhe

original: avindatām annam aho kṛśānāṃ yuktaṃ hi piṇyākatuṣādibhakṣaṇam /
analyzed: avindatām annam aho kṛśānām yuktam hi piṇyāka tuṣa ādi bhakṣaṇam

original: asti tv ajaṃ śrīpatipādapadma dvaṃdvārcanaprāpyam anantam ādyam // NsP_43.10 //
analyzed: asti tu ajam śrīpati pāda padma dvaṃdva arcana prāpyam anantam ādyam

original: akleśataḥ prāpyam idaṃ visṛjya mahāsukhaṃ yo 'nyasukhāni vāñchet /
analyzed: akleśataḥ prāpyam idam visṛjya mahā sukham yaḥ nyasukhāni vāñchet

original: rājyaṃ karasthaṃ svam asau visṛjya bhikṣām aṭed dīnamanāḥ sumūḍhaḥ // NsP_43.11 //
analyzed: rājyam kara stham svam asau visṛjya bhikṣām aṭet dīna manāḥ su mūḍhaḥ

original: tac cārcyate śrīpatipādapadma dvaṃdvaṃ na vastrair na dhanaiḥ śramair na /
analyzed: tat ca arcyate śrīpati pāda padma dvaṃdvam na vastraiḥ na dhanaiḥ śramaiḥ na

original: ananyacittena nareṇa kiṃtu uccāryate keśava mādhaveti // NsP_43.12 //
analyzed: an anya cittena nareṇa kiṃtu uccāryate keśava mādhava iti

original: evaṃ bhavaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ viditvā daityātmajāḥ sādhu hariṃ bhajadhvam /
analyzed: evam bhavam duḥkha mayam viditvā daitya ātmajāḥ sādhu harim bhajadhvam

original: evaṃ jano janmaphalaṃ labheta no ced bhavābdhau prapated adho 'dhaḥ // NsP_43.13 //
analyzed: evam janaḥ janma phalam labheta no ced bhava abdhau prapatet adhas dhas

original: tasmād bhave 'smin hṛdi śaṅkacakra gadādharaṃ devam anantam īḍyam /
analyzed: tasmāt bhave smin hṛdi śaṅka cakra gadā dharam devam anantam īḍyam

original: smarantu nityaṃ varadaṃ mukundaṃ sadbhaktiyogena nivṛttakāmāḥ // NsP_43.14 //
analyzed: smarantu nityam vara dam mukundam sat bhakti yogena nivṛtta kāmāḥ

original: anāstikatvāt kṛpayā bhavadbhyo vadāmi guhyaṃ bhavasindhusaṃsthāḥ /
analyzed: anāstika tvāt kṛpayā bhavadbhyaḥ vadāmi guhyam bhava sindhu saṃsthāḥ

original: sarveṣu bhūteṣu ca mitrabhāvaṃ bhajantv ayaṃ sarvagato hi viṣṇuḥ // NsP_43.15 //
analyzed: sarveṣu bhūteṣu ca mitra bhāvam bhajantu ayam sarva gataḥ hi viṣṇuḥ

original: daityaputrā ūcuḥ:
analyzed: daitya putrāḥ ūcuḥ

original: prahlāda tvaṃ vayaṃ cāpi bālabhāvān mahāmate /
analyzed: prahlāda tvam vayam ca api bāla bhāvāt mahāmate

original: ṣaṇḍāmarkāt paraṃ mitraṃ guruṃ cānyaṃ na vidmahe // NsP_43.16 //
analyzed: ṣaṇḍāmarkāt param mitram gurum ca anyam na vidmahe

original: tvayaitac chikṣitaṃ kutra tathyaṃ no vada nistuṣam // NsP_43.17ab //
analyzed: tvayā etat śikṣitam kutra tathyam naḥ vada nistuṣam

original: prahlāda uvāca:
analyzed: prahlādaḥ uvāca

original: yadā tātaḥ prayāto me taporthaṃ kānanaṃ mahat // NsP_43.17cd //
analyzed: yadā tātaḥ prayātaḥ me tapaḥ rtham kānanam mahat

original: tadā cendraḥ samāgatya puraṃ tasya rurodha ha /
analyzed: tadā ca indraḥ samāgatya puram tasya rurodha ha

original: mṛtaṃ vijñāya daityendraṃ hiraṇyakaśipuṃ tadā // NsP_43.18 //
analyzed: mṛtam vijñāya daitya indram hiraṇyakaśipum tadā

original: indro me jananīṃ gṛhya prayāto manmathāgninā /
analyzed: indraḥ me jananīm gṛhya prayātaḥ manmatha agninā

original: dahyamāno mahābhāgāṃ mārge gacchati satvaram // NsP_43.19 //
analyzed: dahyamānaḥ mahābhāgām mārge gacchati sa tvaram

original: tadā māṃ garbhagaṃ jñātvā nārado devadarśanaḥ /
analyzed: tadā mām garbha gam jñātvā nāradaḥ devadarśanaḥ

original: āgatyendraṃ jagādoccair mūḍha muñca pativratām // NsP_43.20 //
analyzed: āgatya indram jagāda uccais mūḍha muñca pativratām

original: asyā garbhe sthito yo 'sau sa vai bhāgavatottamaḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ garbhe sthitaḥ sa vai bhāgavata uttamaḥ

original: tac chrutvā nāradavaco mātaraṃ praṇipatya me // NsP_43.21 //
analyzed: tat śrutvā nārada vacaḥ mātaram praṇipatya me

original: viṣṇubhaktyā pramucyātha gataḥ svaṃ bhuvanaṃ hariḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇu bhaktyā pramucya atha gataḥ svam bhuvanam hariḥ

original: nāradas tāṃ samānīya āśramaṃ svaṃ śubhavrataḥ // NsP_43.22 //
analyzed: nāradaḥ tām samānīya āśramam svam śubha vrataḥ

original: mām uddiśya mahābhāgām etad vai kathitaṃ tadā /
analyzed: mām uddiśya mahābhāgām etat vai kathitam tadā

original: tathā me vismṛtaṃ naiva bālābhyāsād danoḥ sutāḥ // NsP_43.23 //
analyzed: tathā me vismṛtam nā eva bāla abhyāsāt danoḥ sutāḥ

original: viṣṇoś cānugraheṇaiva nāradasyopadeśataḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ ca anugraheṇa eva nāradasya upadeśataḥ

original: ekadā guptacaryāyāṃ gato 'sau rākṣasādhipaḥ // NsP_43.24 //
analyzed: ekadā gupta caryāyām sau rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: śṛṇoti rātrau nagare jaya rāmeti kīrtanam /
analyzed: śṛṇoti rātrau nagare jaya rāma iti kīrtanam

original: avait putrakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ balavān dānaveśvaraḥ // NsP_43.25 //
analyzed: avait putra kṛtam sarvam balavān dānava īśvaraḥ

original: athāhūyāha daityendraḥ krodhāndhaḥ sa purohitān /
analyzed: athā āhūya āha daitya indraḥ krodha andhaḥ sa purohitān

original: re re kṣudradvijā yūyam atimumūrṣatāṃ gatāḥ // NsP_43.26 //
analyzed: re re kṣudra dvijāḥ yūyam ati mumūrṣa tām gatāḥ

original: prahlādo 'yaṃ mṛṣālāpān vakty anyān pāṭhayaty api /
analyzed: prahlādaḥ yam mṛṣā ālāpān vakti anyān pāṭhayati api

original: iti nirbhartsya tān viprān śvasan rājāviśad gṛham // NsP_43.27 //
analyzed: iti nirbhartsya tān viprān śvasan rājā aviśat gṛham

original: na ca putravadhe cintāṃ jahau svavadhakāriṇīm /
analyzed: na ca putra vadhe cintām jahau sva vadha kāriṇīm

original: āsannamaraṇo 'marṣāt kṛtyam ekaṃ vimṛśya saḥ // NsP_43.28 //
analyzed: āsanna maraṇaḥ marṣāt kṛtyam ekam vimṛśya saḥ

original: akṛtyam eva daityādīn āhūyopādiśad rahaḥ /
analyzed: akṛtyam eva daitya ādīn āhūya upādiśat rahaḥ

original: adya kṣapāyāṃ prahlādaṃ prasuptaṃ duṣṭam ulbaṇaiḥ // NsP_43.29 //
analyzed: adya kṣapāyām prahlādam prasuptam duṣṭam ulbaṇaiḥ

original: nāgapāśair dṛḍhaṃ baddhvā madhye nikṣipatāmbudheḥ /
analyzed: nāgapāśaiḥ dṛḍham baddhvā madhye nikṣipata ambudheḥ

original: tadājñāṃ śirasādāya dadṛśus tam upetya te // NsP_43.30 //
analyzed: tad ājñām śirasā ādāya dadṛśuḥ tam upetya te

original: rātripriyaṃ samādhisthaṃ prabuddhaṃ suptavat sthitam /
analyzed: rātripriyam samādhi stham prabuddham supta vat sthitam

original: saṃchinnarāgalobhādi- mahābandhaṃ kṣapācarāḥ // NsP_43.31 //
analyzed: saṃchinna rāga lobha ādi mahā bandham kṣapācarāḥ

original: babandhus taṃ mahātmānaṃ phalgubhiḥ sarparajjubhiḥ /
analyzed: babandhuḥ tam mahātmānam phalgubhiḥ sarpa rajjubhiḥ

original: garuḍadhvajabhaktaṃ taṃ buddhvāhibhir abuddhayaḥ // NsP_43.32 //
analyzed: garuḍa dhvaja bhaktam tam buddhvā ahibhiḥ abuddhayaḥ

original: jalaśāyipriyaṃ nītvā jalarāśau nicikṣipuḥ /
analyzed: jalaśāyi priyam nītvā jala rāśau nicikṣipuḥ

original: balinas te 'calān daityā tasyopari nidhāya ca // NsP_43.33 //
analyzed: balinaḥ te calān daityā tasya upari nidhāya ca

original: śaśaṃsus taṃ priyaṃ rājñe drutaṃ tān so 'py amānayat /
analyzed: śaśaṃsuḥ tam priyam rājñe drutam tān saḥ api amānayat

original: prahlādaṃ cābdhimadhyasthaṃ tam aurvāgnim ivāparam // NsP_43.34 //
analyzed: prahlādam ca abdhi madhya stham tam aurva agnim iva aparam

original: jvalantaṃ tejasā viṣṇor grāhā bhūribhiyātyajan /
analyzed: jvalantam tejasā viṣṇoḥ grāhāḥ bhūri bhiyā atyajan

original: sa cābhinnacidānanda- sindhumadhye samāhitaḥ // NsP_43.35 //
analyzed: sa ca abhinna cit ānanda sindhu madhye samāhitaḥ

original: na veda baddham ātmānaṃ lavaṇāmbudhimadhyagam /
analyzed: na veda baddham ātmānam lavaṇa ambudhi madhya gam

original: atha brahmāmṛtāmbhodhi,
analyzed: atha brahma amṛta ambhodhi

original: maye svasmin sthite munau // NsP_43.36 //
analyzed: maye svasmin sthite munau

original: yayau kṣobhaṃ dvitīyābdhi- praveśād iva sāgaraḥ /
analyzed: yayau kṣobham dvitīya abdhi praveśāt iva sāgaraḥ

original: kleśāt kleśān ivoddhūya prahlādam atha vīcayaḥ // NsP_43.37 //
analyzed: kleśāt kleśān iva uddhūya prahlādam atha vīcayaḥ

original: ninyus tīre 'plavāmbhodheḥ gurūktaya ivāmbudheḥ /
analyzed: ninyuḥ tīre plava ambhodheḥ guru uktayaḥ iva ambudheḥ

original: dhyānena viṣṇubhūtaṃ taṃ bhagavān varuṇālayaḥ // NsP_43.38 //
analyzed: dhyānena viṣṇu bhūtam tam bhagavān varuṇālayaḥ

original: vinyasya tīre ratnāni gṛhītvā draṣṭum āyayau /
analyzed: vinyasya tīre ratnāni gṛhītvā draṣṭum āyayau

original: tāvad bhagavatādiṣṭaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ pannagāśanaḥ // NsP_43.39 //
analyzed: tāvat bhagavatā ādiṣṭaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ pannagāśanaḥ

original: bandhanāhīn samabhyetya bhakṣayitvā punar yayau /
analyzed: bandhana ahīn samabhyetya bhakṣayitvā punar yayau

original: athābabhāṣe prahlādaṃ gambhīradhvanir arṇavaḥ // NsP_43.40 //
analyzed: athā ābabhāṣe prahlādam gambhīra dhvaniḥ arṇavaḥ

original: praṇamya divyarūpaḥ san samādhisthaṃ hareḥ priyam /
analyzed: praṇamya divya rūpaḥ san samādhi stham hareḥ priyam

original: prahlāda bhagavadbhakta puṇyātmann arṇavo 'smy aham // NsP_43.41 //
analyzed: prahlāda bhagavat bhakta puṇya ātman arṇavaḥ smi aham

original: cakṣurbhyām atha māṃ dṛṣṭvā pāvayārthinam āgatam /
analyzed: cakṣurbhyām atha mām dṛṣṭvā pāvaya arthinam āgatam

original: ity ambudhigiraḥ śrutvā sa mahātmā hareḥ priyaḥ // NsP_43.42 //
analyzed: iti ambudhi giraḥ śrutvā sa mahātmā hareḥ priyaḥ

original: udvīkṣya sahasā devaṃ taṃ natvāhāsurātmajaḥ /
analyzed: udvīkṣya sahasā devam tam natvā āha asura ātmajaḥ

original: kadāgataṃ bhagavatā tam athāmbudhir abravīt // NsP_43.43 //
analyzed: kadāgatam bhagavatā tam atha ambudhiḥ abravīt

original: yoginn ajñātavṛttas tvam aparāddhaṃ tavāsuraiḥ /
analyzed: yogin ajñāta vṛttaḥ tvam aparāddham tava asuraiḥ

original: baddhas tvam ahibhir daityair mayi kṣipto 'dya vaiṣṇava // NsP_43.44 //
analyzed: baddhaḥ tvam ahibhiḥ daityaiḥ mayi kṣiptaḥ dya vaiṣṇava

original: tatas tūrṇaṃ mayā tīre nyastas tvaṃ phaṇinaś ca tān /
analyzed: tatas tūrṇam mayā tīre nyastaḥ tvam phaṇinaḥ ca tān

original: idānīm eva garuḍo bhakṣayitvā gato mahān // NsP_43.45 //
analyzed: idānīm eva garuḍaḥ bhakṣayitvā gataḥ mahān

original: mahātmann anugṛhṇīṣva tvaṃ māṃ satsaṅgam ārthinam /
analyzed: mahātman anugṛhṇīṣva tvam mām sat saṅgam ārthinam

original: gṛhāṇemāni ratnāni pūjyas tvaṃ me harir yathā // NsP_43.46 //
analyzed: gṛhāṇa imāni ratnāni pūjyaḥ tvam me hariḥ yathā

original: yady apy etair na te kṛtyaṃ ratnair dāsyāmy athāpy aham /
analyzed: yadi api etaiḥ na te kṛtyam ratnaiḥ dāsyāmi atha api aham

original: dīpān nivedayaty eva bhāskarasyāpi bhaktimān // NsP_43.47 //
analyzed: dīpān nivedayati eva bhāskarasya api bhaktimān

original: tvam āpatsv api ghorāsu viṣṇunaiva hi rakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: tvam āpatsu api ghorāsu viṣṇunā eva hi rakṣitaḥ

original: tvādṛśā nirmalātmāno na santi bahavo 'rkavat // NsP_43.48 //
analyzed: tvādṛśāḥ nirmala ātmānaḥ na santi bahavaḥ rka vat

original: bahunā kiṃ kṛtārtho 'smi yat tiṣṭhāmi tvayā saha /
analyzed: bahunā kim kṛtārthaḥ smi yat tiṣṭhāmi tvayā saha

original: ālapāmi kṣaṇam api nekṣe hy etat phalopamām // NsP_43.49 //
analyzed: ālapāmi kṣaṇam api nā īkṣe hi etat phala upamām

original: ity abdhinā stutaḥ śrīśa- māhātmyavacanaiḥ svayam /
analyzed: iti abdhinā stutaḥ śrīśa māhātmya vacanaiḥ svayam

original: yayau lajjāṃ praharṣaṃ ca prahlādo bhagavatpriyaḥ // NsP_43.50 //
analyzed: yayau lajjām praharṣam ca prahlādaḥ bhagavat priyaḥ

original: pratigṛhya sa ratnāni vatsalaḥ prāha vāridhim /
analyzed: pratigṛhya sa ratnāni vatsalaḥ prāha vāridhim

original: mahātman sutarāṃ dhanyaḥ śete tvayi hi sa prabhuḥ // NsP_43.51 //
analyzed: mahātman sutarām dhanyaḥ śete tvayi hi sa prabhuḥ

original: kalpānte 'pi jagat kṛtsnaṃ grasitvā sa jaganmayaḥ /
analyzed: kalpa ante jagat kṛtsnam grasitvā sa jagat mayaḥ

original: tvayy evaikārṇavībhūte śete kila mahātmani // NsP_43.52 //
analyzed: tvayi evā ekārṇavībhūte śete kila mahātmani

original: locanābhyāṃ jagannāthaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi vāridhe /
analyzed: locanābhyām jagannātham draṣṭum icchāmi vāridhe

original: tvaṃ paśyasi sadā dhanyas tatropāyaṃ prayaccha me // NsP_43.53 //
analyzed: tvam paśyasi sadā dhanyaḥ tatra upāyam prayaccha me

original: uktveti pādāvanataṃ tūrṇam utthāpya sāgaraḥ /
analyzed: uktvā iti pāda avanatam tūrṇam utthāpya sāgaraḥ

original: prahlādaṃ prāha yogīndra tvaṃ paśyasi sadā hṛdi // NsP_43.54 //
analyzed: prahlādam prāha yogi indra tvam paśyasi sadā hṛdi

original: draṣṭum icchasy athākṣibhyāṃ stuhi taṃ bhaktavatsalam /
analyzed: draṣṭum icchasi atha akṣibhyām stuhi tam bhakta vatsalam

original: uktveti sindhuḥ prahlādam ātmanaḥ sa jale 'viśat // NsP_43.55 //
analyzed: uktvā iti sindhuḥ prahlādam ātmanaḥ sa jale viśat

original: gate nadīndre sthitvaiko hariṃ rātrau sa daityajaḥ /
analyzed: gate nadīndre sthitvā ekaḥ harim rātrau sa daitya jaḥ

original: bhaktyāstaud iti manvānas taddarśanam asaṃbhavam // NsP_43.56 //
analyzed: bhaktyā astaut iti manvānaḥ tad darśanam asaṃbhavam

original: prahlāda uvāca:
analyzed: prahlādaḥ uvāca

original: vedāntavākyaśatamārutasaṃpravṛddha vairāgyavahniśikhayā paritāpya cittam /
analyzed: vedānta vākya śata māruta saṃpravṛddha vairāgya vahni śikhayā paritāpya cittam

original: saṃśodhayanti yadavekṣaṇayogyatāyai dhīrāḥ sadaiva sa kathaṃ mama gocaraḥ syāt // NsP_43.57 //
analyzed: saṃśodhayanti yad avekṣaṇa yogya tāyai dhīrāḥ sadā eva sa katham mama gocaraḥ syāt

original: mātsaryaroṣasmaralobhamoha madādibhir vā sudṛḍhaiḥ suṣaḍbhiḥ /
analyzed: mātsarya roṣa smara lobha moha mada ādibhiḥ vā su dṛḍhaiḥ su ṣaḍbhiḥ

original: uparyuparyāvaraṇaiḥ subaddham andhaṃ mano me kva hariḥ kva vāham // NsP_43.58 //
analyzed: upari upari āvaraṇaiḥ su baddham andham manaḥ me kva hariḥ kva vā aham

original: yaṃ dhātṛmukhyā vibudhā bhayeṣu śāntyarthinaḥ kṣīranidher upāntam /
analyzed: yam dhātṛ mukhyāḥ vibudhāḥ bhayeṣu śānti arthinaḥ kṣīranidheḥ upāntam

original: gatvottamastotrakṛtaḥ kathaṃcit paśyanti taṃ draṣṭum aho mamāśā // NsP_43.59 //
analyzed: gatvā uttama stotra kṛtaḥ kathaṃcid paśyanti tam draṣṭum aho mama āśā

original: ayogyam ātmānam itīśadarśane sa manyamānas tadanāptikātaraḥ /
analyzed: ayogyam ātmānam iti īśa darśane sa manyamānaḥ tad anāpti kātaraḥ

original: udvegaduḥkhārṇavamagnamānasaḥ srutāśrudhāro nṛpa mūrcchito 'patat // NsP_43.60 //
analyzed: udvega duḥkha arṇava magna mānasaḥ sruta aśru dhāraḥ nṛpa patat

original: atha kṣaṇāt sarvagataś caturbhujaḥ śubhākṛtir bhaktajanaikavallabhaḥ /
analyzed: atha kṣaṇāt sarva gataḥ catur bhujaḥ śubha ākṛtiḥ bhakta jana eka vallabhaḥ

original: duḥsthaṃ tam āśliṣya sudhāmayair bhujais tatraiva bhūpāvir abhūd dayānidhiḥ // NsP_43.61 //
analyzed: duḥstham tam āśliṣya sudhā mayaiḥ bhujaiḥ tatra eva bhūpa āviḥ abhūt dayā nidhiḥ

original: sa labdhasaṃjño 'tha tadaṅgasaṅgād unmīlitākṣaḥ sahasā dadarśa /
analyzed: sa labdha saṃjñaḥ tad aṅga saṅgāt unmīlita akṣaḥ sahasā dadarśa

original: prasannavaktraṃ kamalāyatākṣaṃ sudīrghabāhuṃ yamunāsavarṇam // NsP_43.62 //
analyzed: prasanna vaktram kamala āyata akṣam su dīrgha bāhum yamunā savarṇam

original: udāratejomayam aprameyaṃ gadāriśaṅkhāmbujacārucihnitam /
analyzed: udāra tejaḥ mayam aprameyam gadā ari śaṅkha ambuja cāru cihnitam

original: sthitaṃ samāliṅgya vibhuṃ sa dṛṣṭvā prakampito vismayabhītiharṣaiḥ // NsP_43.63 //
analyzed: sthitam samāliṅgya vibhum sa dṛṣṭvā prakampitaḥ vismaya bhīti harṣaiḥ

original: tat svapnam evātha sa manyamānaḥ svapne 'pi paśyāmi hariṃ kṛtārtham /
analyzed: tat svapnam eva atha sa manyamānaḥ svapne pi paśyāmi harim kṛtārtham

original: iti praharṣārṇavamagnacetāḥ svānandamūrchāṃ sa punaś ca bheje // NsP_43.64 //
analyzed: iti praharṣa arṇava magna cetāḥ sva ānanda mūrchām sa punar ca bheje

original: tataḥ kṣitāv eva niviśya nāthaḥ kṛtvā tam aṅke svajanaikabandhuḥ /
analyzed: tatas kṣitau eva niviśya nāthaḥ kṛtvā tam aṅke sva jana eka bandhuḥ

original: śanair vidhunvan karapallavena spṛśan muhur mātṛvad āliliṅga // NsP_43.65 //
analyzed: śanais vidhunvan karapallavena spṛśan muhur mātṛ vat āliliṅga

original: tataś cireṇa prahlādaḥ saṃmukhonmīlitekṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tatas cireṇa prahlādaḥ saṃmukha unmīlita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: āluloke jagannāthaṃ vismayāviṣṭacetasā // NsP_43.66 //
analyzed: āluloke jagannātham vismaya āviṣṭa cetasā

original: tataś cirāt taṃ saṃbhāvya dhīraḥ śrīśāṅkaśāyinam /
analyzed: tatas cirāt tam saṃbhāvya dhīraḥ śrīśāṅka śāyinam

original: ātmānaṃ sahasottasthau sadyaḥ sabhayasaṃbhramaḥ // NsP_43.67 //
analyzed: ātmānam sahasā uttasthau sadyas sa bhaya saṃbhramaḥ

original: praṇāmāyāpatac corvyāṃ prasīdeti vadan muhuḥ /
analyzed: praṇāmāya apatat ca urvyām prasīda iti vadan muhur

original: saṃbhramāt sa bahujño 'pi nānyāṃ pūjoktim asmarat // NsP_43.68 //
analyzed: saṃbhramāt sa bahu jñaḥ na anyām pūjā uktim asmarat

original: tam athābhayahastena gadāśaṅkhāridhṛk prabhuḥ /
analyzed: tam atha abhaya hastena gadā śaṅkha ari dhṛk prabhuḥ

original: gṛhītvā sthāpayām_asa prahlādaṃ sa dayānidhiḥ // NsP_43.69 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā sthāpayāmasa prahlādam sa dayā nidhiḥ

original: karābjasparśanāhlāda- galadaśruṃ savepathum /
analyzed: kara abja sparśana āhlāda galat aśrum sa vepathum

original: bhūyo 'thāhlādayan svāmī taṃ jagādeti sāntvayan // NsP_43.70 //
analyzed: bhūyas thā āhlādayan svāmī tam jagāda iti sāntvayan

original: sabhayaṃ saṃbhramaṃ vatsa madgauravakṛtaṃ tyaja /
analyzed: sa bhayam saṃbhramam vatsa mad gaurava kṛtam tyaja

original: naivaṃ priyo me bhakteṣu svādhīnapraṇayī bhava // NsP_43.71 //
analyzed: na evam priyaḥ me bhakteṣu svādhīna praṇayī bhava

original: nityaṃ saṃpūrṇakāmasya janmāni vividhāni me /
analyzed: nityam saṃpūrṇa kāmasya janmāni vividhāni me

original: bhaktasarveṣṭadānāya tasmāt kiṃ te priyaṃ vada // NsP_43.72 //
analyzed: bhakta sarva iṣṭa dānāya tasmāt kim te priyam vada

original: atha vyajijñapad viṣṇuṃ prahlādaḥ prāñjalir naman /
analyzed: atha vyajijñapat viṣṇum prahlādaḥ prāñjaliḥ naman

original: salaulyam utphulladṛśā paśyann evaṃ ca tanmukham // NsP_43.73 //
analyzed: sa laulyam utphulla dṛśā paśyan evam ca tad mukham

original: nāpy ayaṃ varadānāya kālo naiṣa prasīda me /
analyzed: nā api ayam vara dānāya kālaḥ nā eṣa prasīda me

original: tvaddarśanāmṛtāsvādād antarātmā na tṛpyati // NsP_43.74 //
analyzed: tvad darśana amṛta āsvādāt antarātmā na tṛpyati

original: brahmādidevair durlakṣyaṃ tvām eva paśyataḥ prabho /
analyzed: brahma ādi devaiḥ durlakṣyam tvām eva paśyataḥ prabho

original: tṛptiṃ neṣyati me cittaṃ kalpāyutaśatair api // NsP_43.75 //
analyzed: tṛptim neṣyati me cittam kalpa ayuta śataiḥ api

original: naivam etad dhy atṛptasya tvāṃ dṛṣṭvānyad vṛṇoti kim /
analyzed: na evam etat hi atṛptasya tvām dṛṣṭvā anyat vṛṇoti kim

original: tataḥ smitasudhāpūraiḥ pūrayan sa priyaṃ priyāt // NsP_43.76 //
analyzed: tatas smita sudhā pūraiḥ pūrayan sa priyam priyāt

original: yojayan mokṣalakṣmyaiva taṃ jagāda jagatpatiḥ /
analyzed: yojayan mokṣa lakṣmyā eva tam jagāda jagatpatiḥ

original: satyaṃ maddarśanād anyad vatsa naivāsti te priyam // NsP_43.77 //
analyzed: satyam mad darśanāt anyat vatsa nā evā asti te priyam

original: kiṃcit te dātum iṣṭaṃ me matpriyārthaṃ vṛṇīṣva tat /
analyzed: kiṃcid te dātum iṣṭam me mad priya artham vṛṇīṣva tat

original: prahlādo 'thābravīd dhīmān deva janmāntareṣv api // NsP_43.78 //
analyzed: prahlādaḥ thā bravīt dhīmān deva janmāntareṣu api

original: dāsas tavāhaṃ bhūyāsaṃ garutmān iva bhaktimān /
analyzed: dāsaḥ tava aham bhūyāsam garutmān iva bhaktimān

original: athāha nāthaḥ prahlādaṃ saṃkaṭaṃ khalv idaṃ kṛtam // NsP_43.79 //
analyzed: atha āha nāthaḥ prahlādam saṃkaṭam khalu idam kṛtam

original: ahaṃ tavātmadānecchus tvaṃ tu bhṛtyatvam icchasi /
analyzed: aham tava ātma dāna icchuḥ tvam tu bhṛtya tvam icchasi

original: varān anyāṃś ca varaya dhīman daityeśvarātmaja // NsP_43.80 //
analyzed: varān anyān ca varaya dhīman daitya īśvara ātmaja

original: prahlādo 'pi punaḥ prāha bhaktakāmapradaṃ harim /
analyzed: prahlādaḥ pi punar prāha bhakta kāma pradam harim

original: prasīda sāstu me nātha tvadbhaktiḥ sāttvikī sthirā // NsP_43.81 //
analyzed: prasīda sā astu me nātha tvad bhaktiḥ sāttvikī sthirā

original: anayātha ca tvāṃ naumi nṛtyāmi tvatparaḥ sadā /
analyzed: anayā atha ca tvām naumi nṛtyāmi tvad paraḥ sadā

original: athābhituṣṭo bhagavān priyam āha priyaṃvadam // NsP_43.82 //
analyzed: athā abhituṣṭaḥ bhagavān priyam āha priyaṃvadam

original: vatsa yad yad abhīṣṭaṃ te tat tad astu sukhī bhava /
analyzed: vatsa yat yat abhīṣṭam te tat tat astu sukhī bhava

original: antarhite ca mayy atra mā khida tvaṃ mahāmate // NsP_43.83 //
analyzed: antarhite ca mayi atra mā khida tvam mahāmate

original: tvaccittān nāpayāsyāmi kṣīrābdher iva supriyāt /
analyzed: tvad cittāt na apayāsyāmi kṣīrābdheḥ iva su priyāt

original: punar dvitridinais tvaṃ māṃ draṣṭā duṣṭavadhodyatam // NsP_43.84 //
analyzed: punar dvi tri dinaiḥ tvam mām draṣṭā duṣṭa vadha udyatam

original: apūrvāviṣkṛtākāraṃ nṛsiṃhaṃ pāpabhīṣaṇam /
analyzed: apūrva āviṣkṛta ākāram nṛsiṃham pāpa bhīṣaṇam

original: uktvety ataḥ praṇamataḥ paśyataś cātilālasam // NsP_43.85 //
analyzed: uktvā iti atas praṇamataḥ paśyataḥ ca ati lālasam

original: atuṣṭasyaiva tasyeśo māyayāntar dadhe hariḥ /
analyzed: atuṣṭasya eva tasya īśaḥ māyayā antar dadhe hariḥ

original: tato haṭhād adṛṣṭvā taṃ sarvato bhaktavatsalam // NsP_43.86 //
analyzed: tatas haṭhāt a dṛṣṭvā tam sarvatas bhakta vatsalam

original: hāhety aśruplutaḥ procya vavande sa cirād iti /
analyzed: hāhā iti aśru plutaḥ procya vavande sa cirāt iti

original: śrūyamāṇe 'tha paritaḥ pratibuddhajanasvane // NsP_43.87 //
analyzed: śrūyamāṇe tha paritas pratibuddha jana svane

original: utthāyābdhitaṭād dhīmān prahlādaḥ svapuraṃ yayau // NsP_43.88 //
analyzed: utthāya abdhi taṭāt dhīmān prahlādaḥ sva puram yayau

original: atha ditijasutaś ciraṃ prahṛṣṭaḥ smṛtibalataḥ paritas tam eva paśyan /
analyzed: atha ditija sutaḥ ciram prahṛṣṭaḥ smṛti balataḥ paritas tam eva paśyan

original: harimanujagatiṃ tv alaṃ ca paśyan gurugṛham utpulakaḥ śanair avāpa // NsP_43.89 //
analyzed: hari manu ja gatim tu alam ca paśyan guru gṛham utpulakaḥ śanais avāpa

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe narasiṃhaprādurbhāve tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 43 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe narasiṃha prādurbhāve tricatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: athāgataṃ te prahlādaṃ dṛṣṭvā daityāḥ suvismitāḥ /
analyzed: atha āgatam te prahlādam dṛṣṭvā daityāḥ su vismitāḥ

original: śaśaṃsur daityapataye yaiḥ kṣiptaḥ sa mahārṇave // NsP_44.1 //
analyzed: śaśaṃsuḥ daitya pataye yaiḥ kṣiptaḥ sa mahā arṇave

original: svasthaṃ tam āgataṃ śrutvā daityarāḍ vismayākulaḥ /
analyzed: svastham tam āgatam śrutvā daitya rāj vismaya ākulaḥ

original: āhūyatāṃ ca ity āha krodhān mṛtyuvaśe sthitaḥ // NsP_44.2 //
analyzed: āhūyatām ca iti āha krodhāt mṛtyu vaśe sthitaḥ

original: tathāsurair durānītaḥ samāsīnaṃ sa divyadṛk /
analyzed: tathā asuraiḥ durānītaḥ samāsīnam sa divya dṛś

original: āsannamṛtyuṃ daityendraṃ dadarśātyūrjitaśriyam // NsP_44.3 //
analyzed: āsanna mṛtyum daitya indram dadarśa ati ūrjita śriyam

original: nīlāṃśumiśramāṇikya- dyuticchannavibhūṣaṇam /
sadhūmāgnim iva vyāptam uccāsanacitisthitam // NsP_44.4 //
analyzed: sa dhūma agnim iva vyāptam ucca āsana citi sthitam

original: daṃṣṭrotkaṭair ghoratarair ghanacchavibhir udbhaṭaiḥ /
analyzed: daṃṣṭra utkaṭaiḥ ghorataraiḥ ghana chavibhiḥ udbhaṭaiḥ

original: kumārgadarśibhir daityair yamadūtair ivāvṛtam // NsP_44.5 //
analyzed: ku mārga darśibhiḥ daityaiḥ yama dūtaiḥ iva āvṛtam

original: dūrāt praṇamya pitaraṃ prāñjalis tu vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: dūrāt praṇamya pitaram prāñjaliḥ tu vyavasthitaḥ

original: athāhākaraṇakrodhaḥ sa khalo bhartsayan sutam // NsP_44.6 //
analyzed: atha āhākaraṇa krodhaḥ sa khalaḥ bhartsayan sutam

original: bhagavatpriyam atyuccair mṛtyum evāśrayann iva /
analyzed: bhagavat priyam atyuccais mṛtyum eva āśrayan iva

original: mūḍha re śṛṇu madvākyam etad evāntimaṃ dhruvam // NsP_44.7 //
analyzed: mūḍha re śṛṇu mad vākyam etat evā antimam dhruvam

original: ito na tvāṃ pravakṣyāmi śrutvā kuru yathepsitam /
analyzed: itas na tvām pravakṣyāmi śrutvā kuru yathepsitam

original: uktveti drūtam ākṛṣya candrahāsāsim adbhutam // NsP_44.8 //
analyzed: uktvā iti drūtam ākṛṣya candra hāsa asim adbhutam

original: saṃbhramād vīkṣitaḥ sarvaiś cālayann āha taṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: saṃbhramāt vīkṣitaḥ sarvaiḥ cālayan āha tam punar

original: kva cāsti mūḍha te viṣṇuḥ sa tvām adya prarakṣatu // NsP_44.9 //
analyzed: kva ca asti mūḍha te viṣṇuḥ sa tvām adya prarakṣatu

original: tvayoktaṃ sa hi sarvatra kasmāt stambhe na dṛśyate /
analyzed: tvayā uktam sa hi sarvatra kasmāt stambhe na dṛśyate

original: yadi paśyāmi taṃ viṣṇum adhunā stambhamadhyagam // NsP_44.10 //
analyzed: yadi paśyāmi tam viṣṇum adhunā stambha madhya gam

original: tarhi tvāṃ na vadhiṣyāmi bhaviṣyasi dvidhānyathā /
analyzed: tarhi tvām na vadhiṣyāmi bhaviṣyasi dvidhā anyathā

original: prahlādo 'pi tathā dṛṣṭvā dadhyau taṃ parameśvaram // NsP_44.11 //
analyzed: prahlādaḥ pi tathā dṛṣṭvā dadhyau tam parameśvaram

original: puroktaṃ tadvacaḥ smṛtvā praṇanāma kṛtāñjaliḥ /
analyzed: purā uktam tat vacaḥ smṛtvā praṇanāma kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: tāvatprasphuṭitastambho vīkṣito daityasūnunā // NsP_44.12 //
analyzed: tāvat prasphuṭita stambhaḥ vīkṣitaḥ daitya sūnunā

original: ādarśarūpe daityasya khaḍgajo yaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: ādarśa rūpe daityasya khaḍga jaḥ yaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: tanmadhye dṛśyate rūpaṃ bahuyojanam āyatam // NsP_44.13 //
analyzed: tad madhye dṛśyate rūpam bahu yojanam āyatam

original: atiraudraṃ mahākāyaṃ dānavānāṃ bhayaṃkaram /
analyzed: ati raudram mahā kāyam dānavānām bhayaṃkaram

original: mahānetraṃ mahāvaktraṃ mahādaṃṣṭraṃ mahābhujam // NsP_44.14 //
analyzed: mahā netram mahā vaktram mahā daṃṣṭram mahā bhujam

original: mahānakhaṃ mahāpādaṃ kālāgnisadṛśānanam /
analyzed: mahā nakham mahā pādam kālāgni sadṛśa ānanam

original: karṇāntakṛtavistāra- vadanaṃ cātibhīṣaṇam // NsP_44.15 //
analyzed: karṇa anta kṛta vistāra vadanam ca ati bhīṣaṇam

original: kṛtvetthaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ tu yayau viṣṇus trivikramaḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā ittham nārasiṃham tu yayau viṣṇuḥ trivikramaḥ

original: narasiṃhaḥ stambhamadhyād nirgatya praṇanāda ca // NsP_44.16 //
analyzed: narasiṃhaḥ stambha madhyāt nirgatya praṇanāda ca

original: ninādaśravaṇād daityā narasiṃham aveṣṭayan /
analyzed: nināda śravaṇāt daityāḥ narasiṃham aveṣṭayan

original: tān hatvā sakalāṃs tatra svapauruṣaparākramāt // NsP_44.17 //
analyzed: tān hatvā sakalān tatra sva pauruṣa parākramāt

original: babhañja ca sabhāṃ divyāṃ hiraṇyakaśipor nṛpa /
analyzed: babhañja ca sabhām divyām hiraṇyakaśipoḥ nṛpa

original: vārayām_asur abhyetya narasiṃhaṃ mahābhaṭāḥ // NsP_44.18 //
analyzed: vārayāmasuḥ abhyetya narasiṃham mahā bhaṭāḥ

original: te tu rājan kṣaṇād eva narasiṃhena vai hatāḥ /
analyzed: te tu rājan kṣaṇāt eva narasiṃhena vai hatāḥ

original: tataḥ śastrāṇi varṣanti narasiṃhe pratāpini // NsP_44.19 //
analyzed: tatas śastrāṇi varṣanti nara siṃhe pratāpini

original: sa tu kṣaṇena bhagavān hatvā tad balam ojasā /
analyzed: sa tu kṣaṇena bhagavān hatvā tat balam ojasā

original: nanāda ca mahānādaṃ diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan // NsP_44.20 //
analyzed: nanāda ca mahā nādam diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan

original: tān mṛtān api vijñāya punar anyān mahāsuraḥ /
analyzed: tān mṛtān api vijñāya punar anyān mahā asuraḥ

original: aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi hetihastān samādiśat // NsP_44.21 //
analyzed: aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇi heti hastān samādiśat

original: te 'py āgatya vai taṃ devaṃ rurudhuḥ sarvato diśam /
analyzed: te pi āgatya vai tam devam rurudhuḥ sarvatas diśam

original: hatvā tān akhilān yuddhe yudhyamāno nanāda saḥ // NsP_44.22 //
analyzed: hatvā tān akhilān yuddhe yudhyamānaḥ nanāda saḥ

original: punaḥ sabhāṃ babhañjāsau hiraṇyakaśipoḥ śubhām /
analyzed: punar sabhām babhañja asau hiraṇyakaśipoḥ śubhām

original: tān hatān api vijñāya krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ // NsP_44.23 //
analyzed: tān hatān api vijñāya krodha saṃrakta locanaḥ

original: tato hiraṇyakaśipur niścakrāma mahābalaḥ /
analyzed: tatas hiraṇyakaśipuḥ niścakrāma mahā balaḥ

original: uvāca ca mahīpāla dānavān baladarpitān // NsP_44.24 //
analyzed: uvāca ca mahīpāla dānavān bala darpitān

original: hanyatāṃ hanyatām eva gṛhyatāṃ gṛhyatām ayam /
analyzed: hanyatām hanyatām eva gṛhyatām gṛhyatām ayam

original: ity evaṃ vadatas tasya pramukhe tu mahāsurān // NsP_44.25 //
analyzed: iti evam vadataḥ tasya pramukhe tu mahā asurān

original: yudhyamānān raṇe hatvā narasiṃho nanāda ca /
analyzed: yudhyamānān raṇe hatvā narasiṃhaḥ nanāda ca

original: tato 'tidudruvur daityā hataśeṣā diśo diśaḥ // NsP_44.26 //
analyzed: tidudruvuḥ daityāḥ hata śeṣāḥ diśaḥ diśaḥ

original: yāvad dhatā yudhyamānā daityāḥ koṭisahasraśaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat hatāḥ yudhyamānāḥ daityāḥ koṭi sahasraśas

original: narasiṃhena tāvac ca nabhobhāgaṃ gato raviḥ // NsP_44.27 //
analyzed: narasiṃhena tāvat ca nabhaḥ bhāgam gataḥ raviḥ

original: śastrāstravarṣacaturaṃ hiraṇyakaśipuṃ javāt /
analyzed: śastra astra varṣa caturam hiraṇyakaśipum javāt

original: pragṛhya tu balād rājan narasiṃho mahābalaḥ // NsP_44.28 //
analyzed: pragṛhya tu balāt rājan narasiṃhaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: saṃdhyākāle gṛhadvāri sthitvorau sthāpya taṃ ripum /
analyzed: saṃdhyā kāle gṛha dvāri sthitvā ūrau sthāpya tam ripum

original: vajratulyamahoraskaṃ hiraṇyakaśipuṃ ruṣā /
analyzed: vajra tulya mahā uraskam hiraṇyakaśipum ruṣā

original: nakhair kisalayam iva dārayaty āha so 'suraḥ // NsP_44.29 //
analyzed: nakhaiḥ kisalayam iva dārayati āha saḥ suraḥ

original: yatrākhaṇḍaladantidantamusalāny ākhaṇḍitāny āhave dhārā yatra pinākapāṇiparaśor ākuṇṭhatām āgamat /
analyzed: yatra ākhaṇḍala danti danta musalāni ākhaṇḍitāni āhave dhārā yatra pinākapāṇi paraśoḥ ākuṇṭha tām āgamat

original: tan me tāvad uro nṛsiṃhakarajair vyādīryate sāṃprataṃ daive durjanatāṃ gate tṛṇam api prāyo 'py avajñāyate // NsP_44.30 //
analyzed: tat me tāvat uraḥ nṛsiṃha kara jaiḥ vyādīryate sāṃpratam daive durjana tām gate tṛṇam api prāyas u pi avajñāyate

original: evaṃ vadati daityendre dadāra narakesarī /
analyzed: evam vadati daitya indre dadāra narakesarī

original: hṛdayaṃ daityarājasya padmapatram iva dvipaḥ // NsP_44.31 //
analyzed: hṛdayam daitya rājasya padma patram iva dvipaḥ

original: śakale dve tirobhūte nakharandhre mahātmane /
analyzed: śakale dve tirobhūte nakha randhre mahātmane

original: tataḥ kva yāto duṣṭo 'sāv iti devo 'tivismitaḥ // NsP_44.32 //
analyzed: tatas kva yātaḥ duṣṭaḥ sau iti devaḥ ti vismitaḥ

original: nirīkṣya sarvato rājan vṛthaitat karma me 'bhavat /
analyzed: nirīkṣya sarvatas rājan vṛthā etat karma me bhavat

original: iti saṃcintya rājendra narasiṃho mahābalaḥ // NsP_44.33 //
analyzed: iti saṃcintya rāja indra narasiṃhaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: vyadhūnayat karāv uccais tatas te śakale nṛpa /
analyzed: vyadhūnayat karau uccais tatas te śakale nṛpa

original: nakharandhrān nipatite bhūmau reṇusame hareḥ // NsP_44.34 //
analyzed: nakha randhrāt nipatite bhūmau reṇu same hareḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā vyatītasaṃroṣo jahāsa parameśvaraḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vyatīta saṃroṣaḥ jahāsa parameśvaraḥ

original: puṣpavarṣaṃ ca varṣanto narasiṃhasya mūrdhani // NsP_44.35 //
analyzed: puṣpa varṣam ca varṣantaḥ narasiṃhasya mūrdhani

original: devā sabrahmakāḥ sarve āgatāḥ prītisaṃyutāḥ /
analyzed: devā sa brahmakāḥ sarve āgatāḥ prīti saṃyutāḥ

original: āgatya pūjayām_asur narasiṃhaṃ paraṃ prabhum // NsP_44.36 //
analyzed: āgatya pūjayāmasuḥ narasiṃham param prabhum

original: brahmā ca daityarājānaṃ prahlādam abhiṣecayat /
analyzed: brahmā ca daitya rājānam prahlādam abhiṣecayat

original: dharme ratiḥ samastānāṃ janānām abhavat tadā // NsP_44.37 //
analyzed: dharme ratiḥ samastānām janānām abhavat tadā

original: indro 'pi sarvadevais tu hariṇā sthāpito divi /
analyzed: indraḥ pi sarva devaiḥ tu hariṇā sthāpitaḥ divi

original: narasiṃho 'pi bhagavān sarvalokahitāya vai // NsP_44.38 //
analyzed: narasiṃhaḥ pi bhagavān sarva loka hitāya vai

original: śrīśailaśikharaṃ prāpya viśrutaḥ surapūjitaḥ /
analyzed: śrīśaila śikharam prāpya viśrutaḥ sura pūjitaḥ

original: sthito bhaktahitārthāya abhaktānāṃ kṣamāya ca // NsP_44.39 //
analyzed: sthitaḥ bhakta hita arthāya abhaktānām kṣamāya ca

original: ity etan narasiṃhasya māhātmyaṃ yaḥ paṭhen naraḥ /
analyzed: iti etat narasiṃhasya māhātmyam yaḥ paṭhet naraḥ

original: śṛṇoti vā nṛpaśreṣṭha mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // NsP_44.40 //
analyzed: śṛṇoti vā nṛpa śreṣṭha mucyate sarva pātakaiḥ

original: naro vā yadi vā nārī śṛṇoty ākhyānam uttamam /
analyzed: naraḥ vā yadi vā nārī śṛṇoti ākhyānam uttamam

analyzed: viparītam idam dṛṣṭvā śukram āha mahā balaḥ

original: śukra uvāca:

analyzed: ṛtvijaḥ ca na bhāsante homa mantraḥ bale

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:

analyzed: devānām upakārāya bhavatām saṃkṣayāya ca

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe vāmanaprādurbhāve pañcacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 45 //

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: dattātreyaṃ samārādhya cakravartitvam āptavān // NsP_46.4 //

original: jamadagnis tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā caturaṅgabalānvitam // NsP_46.5 //
