original: dugdhvā prakalpan munir āha pārthivaṃ gṛhaṃ kṛtaṃ te praviśeha rājan // NsP_46.9 //
analyzed: dugdhvā muniḥ āha pārthivam gṛham kṛtam te praviśa iha rājan

original: ime ca mantripravarā janās te gṛheṣu divyeṣu viśantu śīghram /
analyzed: ime ca mantri pravarāḥ janāḥ te gṛheṣu divyeṣu viśantu śīghram

original: hastyaśvajātyaś ca viśantu śālāṃ bhṛtyāś ca nīceṣu gṛheṣu santu // NsP_46.10 //
analyzed: hasti aśva jātyaḥ ca viśantu śālām bhṛtyāḥ ca nīceṣu gṛheṣu santu

original: ityuktamātre muninā nṛpo 'sau gṛhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ praviveśa rājā /
analyzed: iti ukta mātre muninā nṛpaḥ sau gṛham variṣṭham praviveśa rājā

original: anyeṣu cānyeṣu gṛheṣu satsu muniḥ punaḥ pārthivam ābabhāṣe // NsP_46.11 //
analyzed: anyeṣu ca anyeṣu gṛheṣu satsu muniḥ punar pārthivam ābabhāṣe

original: snānapradānārtham idaṃ mayā te prakalpitaṃ strīśatam uttamaṃ nṛpa /
analyzed: snāna pradāna artham idam mayā te prakalpitam strī śatam uttamam nṛpa

original: snāhi tvam adyātra yathāprakāmaṃ yathā surendro divi nṛtyagītaiḥ // NsP_46.12 //
analyzed: snāhi tvam adya atra yathāprakāmam yathā sura indraḥ divi nṛtya gītaiḥ

original: sa snātavāṃs tatra surendravan nṛpo gītyādiśabdair madhuraiś ca vādyaiḥ /
analyzed: sa snātavān tatra sura indra vat nṛpaḥ gīti ādi śabdaiḥ madhuraiḥ ca vādyaiḥ

original: snātasya tasyāśu śubhe_2 ca vastre_2 dadau munir bhūpa vibhūṣite_2 dve // NsP_46.13 //
analyzed: snātasya tasya āśu śubhe ca vastre dadau muniḥ bhūpa vibhūṣite dve

original: paridhāya vastraṃ ca kṛtottarīyaḥ kṛtakriyo viṣṇupūjāṃ cakāra /
analyzed: paridhāya vastram ca kṛta uttarīyaḥ kṛta kriyaḥ viṣṇu pūjām cakāra

original: muniś ca dugdhvānnamayaṃ mahāgiriṃ nṛpāya bhṛtyāya ca dattavān asau // NsP_46.14 //
analyzed: muniḥ ca dugdhvā anna mayam mahā girim nṛpāya bhṛtyāya ca dattavān asau

original: yāvat sa rājā bubhuje sabhṛtyas tāvac ca sūryo gatavān nṛpāstam /
analyzed: yāvat sa rājā bubhuje sa bhṛtyaḥ tāvat ca sūryaḥ gatavān nṛpa astam

original: rātrau ca gītādivinodayuktaḥ śete sa rājā muninirmite gṛhe // NsP_46.15 //
analyzed: rātrau ca gīta ādi vinoda yuktaḥ śete sa rājā muni nirmite gṛhe

original: tataḥ prabhāte vimale svapnalabdham ivābhavat /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte vimale svapna labdham iva abhavat

original: bhūmibhāgaṃ tataḥ kaṃcid dṛṣṭvāsau cintayan nṛpaḥ // NsP_46.16 //
analyzed: bhūmi bhāgam tatas kaṃcid dṛṣṭvā asau cintayan nṛpaḥ

original: kim iyaṃ tapasaḥ śaktir muner asya mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: kim iyam tapasaḥ śaktiḥ muneḥ asya mahātmanaḥ

original: surabhyā vā mahābhāga brūhi me tvaṃ purohita // NsP_46.17 //
analyzed: surabhyā vā mahābhāga brūhi me tvam purohita

original: ityuktaḥ kārtavīryeṇa tam uvāca purohitaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ kārtavīryeṇa tam uvāca purohitaḥ

original: muneḥ sāmarthyam apy asti siddhiś ceyaṃ hi gor nṛpa // NsP_46.18 //
analyzed: muneḥ sāmarthyam api asti siddhiḥ ca iyam hi goḥ nṛpa

original: tathāpi sā na hartavyā tvayā lobhān narādhipa /
analyzed: tathā api sā na hartavyā tvayā lobhāt narādhipa

original: yas tv etāṃ hartum icched vai tasya nāśo dhruvaṃ bhavet // NsP_46.19 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu etām hartum icchet vai tasya nāśaḥ dhruvam bhavet

original: atha mantrivaraḥ prāha brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇapriyaḥ /
analyzed: atha mantri varaḥ prāha brāhmaṇaḥ brāhmaṇa priyaḥ

original: rājakāryaṃ ne paśyed vai svapakṣasyaiva poṣaṇāt // NsP_46.20 //
analyzed: rāja kāryam paśyet vai sva pakṣasya eva poṣaṇāt

original: he rājaṃs tvayi tiṣṭhanti gṛhāṇi vividhāni ca /
analyzed: he rājan tvayi tiṣṭhanti gṛhāṇi vividhāni ca

original: tathā suvarṇapātrāṇi śayanādīni ca striyaḥ // NsP_46.21 //
analyzed: tathā suvarṇa pātrāṇi śayana ādīni ca striyaḥ

original: tāṃ dhenuṃ prāpya rājendra līyamānāni tatkṣaṇāt /
analyzed: tām dhenum prāpya rāja indra līyamānāni tad kṣaṇāt

original: asmābhis tatra dṛṣṭāni nīyatāṃ dhenur uttamā // NsP_46.22 //
analyzed: asmābhiḥ tatra dṛṣṭāni nīyatām dhenuḥ uttamā

original: tavaiva yogyā rājendra yadīcchasi mahāmate /
analyzed: tava eva yogyā rāja indra yadi icchasi mahāmate

original: gatavāham ānayiṣyāmi ājñāṃ me dehi bhūbhuja // NsP_46.23 //
analyzed: gatavāham ānayiṣyāmi ājñām me dehi bhūbhuja

original: ityukto mantriṇā rājā tathety āha nṛpottama /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ mantriṇā rājā tathā iti āha nṛpa uttama

original: sacivas tatra gatvātha surabhiṃ hartum ārabhat // NsP_46.24 //
analyzed: sacivaḥ tatra gatvā atha surabhim hartum ārabhat

original: vārayām_asa sacivaṃ jamadagniḥ samantataḥ /
analyzed: vārayāmasa sacivam jamadagniḥ samantataḥ

original: rājayogyām imāṃ brahman dehi rājñe mahāmate // NsP_46.25 //
analyzed: rāja yogyām imām brahman dehi rājñe mahāmate

original: tvaṃ tu śākaphalāhārī kiṃ dhenvā te prayojanam /
analyzed: tvam tu śāka phala āhārī kim dhenvā te prayojanam

original: ity uktvā tāṃ balād dhṛtvā netuṃ mantrī pracakrame // NsP_46.26 //
analyzed: iti uktvā tām balāt dhṛtvā netum mantrī pracakrame

original: punaḥ sabhāryaḥ sa munir vārayām_asa taṃ nṛpam /
analyzed: punar sa bhāryaḥ sa muniḥ vārayāmasa tam nṛpam

original: tato mantrī suduṣṭātmā muniṃ hatvā tu taṃ nṛpa // NsP_46.27 //
analyzed: tatas mantrī su duṣṭa ātmā munim hatvā tu tam nṛpa

original: brahmahā netum ārebhe vāyumārgeṇa sā gatā /
analyzed: brahma hā netum ārebhe vāyu mārgeṇa sā gatā

original: rājā ca kṣubdhahṛdayo yayau māhiṣmatīṃ purīm // NsP_46.28 //
analyzed: rājā ca kṣubdha hṛdayaḥ yayau māhiṣmatīm purīm

original: munipatnī suduḥkhārtā rodayantī bhṛśaṃ tadā /
analyzed: muni patnī su duḥkha ārtā rodayantī bhṛśam tadā

original: trisaptakṛtvaḥ svāṃ kukṣiṃ tāḍayām_asa pārthiva // NsP_46.29 //
analyzed: tri sapta kṛtvas svām kukṣim tāḍayāmasa pārthiva

original: tac chṛṇvann āgato rāmo gṛhītaparaśus tadā /
analyzed: tat śṛṇvan āgataḥ rāmaḥ gṛhīta paraśuḥ tadā

original: puṣpādīni gṛhītvā tu vanān mātaram abravīt // NsP_46.30 //
analyzed: puṣpa ādīni gṛhītvā tu vanāt mātaram abravīt

original: alam amba prahāreṇa nimittād viditaṃ mayā /
analyzed: alam amba prahāreṇa nimittāt viditam mayā

original: haniṣyāmi durācāram arjunaṃ duṣṭamantriṇam // NsP_46.31 //
analyzed: haniṣyāmi durācāram arjunam duṣṭa mantriṇam

original: tvayaikaviṃśavāreṇa yasmāt kukṣiś ca tāḍitā /
analyzed: tvayā ekaviṃśa vāreṇa yasmāt kukṣiḥ ca tāḍitā

original: triḥsaptakṛtvas tasmāt tu haniṣye bhuvi pārthivān // NsP_46.32 //
analyzed: tris sapta kṛtvas tasmāt tu haniṣye bhuvi pārthivān

original: iti kṛtvā pratijñāṃ sa gṛhītvā paraśuṃ yayau /
analyzed: iti kṛtvā pratijñām sa gṛhītvā paraśum yayau

original: māhiṣmatīṃ purīṃ prāpya kārtavīryam athāhvayat // NsP_46.33 //
analyzed: māhiṣmatīm purīm prāpya kārtavīryam atha āhvayat

original: yuddhārtham āgataḥ so 'tha anekākṣauhiṇīyutaḥ /
analyzed: yuddha artham āgataḥ saḥ tha aneka akṣauhiṇī yutaḥ

original: tayor yuddham abhūt tatra bhairavaṃ lomaharṣaṇam // NsP_46.34 //
analyzed: tayoḥ yuddham abhūt tatra bhairavam loma harṣaṇam

original: piśitāśijanānandaṃ śastrāstraśatasaṃkulam /
analyzed: piśitāśi jana ānandam śastra astra śata saṃkulam

original: tataḥ paraśurāmo 'bhūn mahābalaparākramaḥ // NsP_46.35 //
analyzed: tatas paraśurāmaḥ bhūt mahā bala parākramaḥ

original: paraṃ jyotir acintyātmā viṣṇuḥ kāraṇamūrtimān /
analyzed: param jyotiḥ acintya ātmā viṣṇuḥ kāraṇa mūrtimān

original: kārtavīryabalaṃ sarvam anekaiḥ kṣatriyaiḥ saha // NsP_46.36 //
analyzed: kārtavīrya balam sarvam anekaiḥ kṣatriyaiḥ saha

original: hatvā nipātya bhūmau tu paramādbhutavikramaḥ /
analyzed: hatvā nipātya bhūmau tu parama adbhuta vikramaḥ

original: kārtavīryasya bāhūnāṃ vanaṃ ciccheda roṣavān /
analyzed: kārtavīryasya bāhūnām vanam ciccheda roṣavān

original: chinne bāhuvane tasya śiraś ciccheda bhārgavaḥ // NsP_46.37 //
analyzed: chinne bāhu vane tasya śiraḥ ciccheda bhārgavaḥ

original: viṣṇuhastād vadhaṃ prāpya cakravartī sa pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇu hastāt vadham prāpya cakravartī sa pārthivaḥ

original: divyarūpadharaḥ śrīmān divyagandhānulepanaḥ // NsP_46.38 //
analyzed: divya rūpa dharaḥ śrīmān divya gandha anulepanaḥ

original: divyaṃ vimānam āruhya viṣṇulokam avāptavān /
analyzed: divyam vimānam āruhya viṣṇu lokam avāptavān

original: krodhāt paraśurāmo 'pi mahābalaparākramaḥ // NsP_46.39 //
analyzed: krodhāt paraśurāmaḥ mahā bala parākramaḥ

original: triḥsaptakṛtvo bhūmyāṃ vai pārthivān nijaghāna saḥ /
analyzed: tris sapta kṛtvas bhūmyām vai pārthivān nijaghāna saḥ

original: kṣatriyāṇāṃ vadhāt tena bhūmer bhāro 'vatāritaḥ // NsP_46.40 //
analyzed: kṣatriyāṇām vadhāt tena bhūmeḥ bhāraḥ vatāritaḥ

original: bhūmiś ca sakalā dattā kaśyapāya mahātmane /
analyzed: bhūmiḥ ca sakalā dattā kaśyapāya mahātmane

original: ity eṣa jāmadagnyākhyaḥ prādurbhāvo mayoditaḥ // NsP_46.41 //
analyzed: iti eṣa jāmadagnya ākhyaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ mayā uditaḥ

original: yaś ca tac chṛṇuyād bhaktyā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // NsP_46.42 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca tat śṛṇuyāt bhaktyā sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: avatīrya bhūmau harir eṣa sākṣāt triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ kṣitipān nihatya sa /
analyzed: avatīrya bhūmau hariḥ eṣa sākṣāt triḥsapta kṛtvas kṣitipān nihatya sa

original: kṣātraṃ ca tejo pravibhajya rājan rāmaḥ sthito 'dyāpi girau mahendre // NsP_46.43 //
analyzed: kṣātram ca tejaḥ pravibhajya rājan rāmaḥ sthitaḥ girau mahā indre

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe paraśurāmaprādurbhāvo nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 46 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe paraśurāmaprādurbhāvaḥ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu rājan pravakṣyāmi prādurbhāvaṃ hareḥ śubham /
analyzed: śṛṇu rājan pravakṣyāmi prādurbhāvam hareḥ śubham

original: nihato rāvaṇo yena sagaṇo devakaṇṭakaḥ // NsP_47.1 //
analyzed: nihataḥ rāvaṇaḥ yena sa gaṇaḥ deva kaṇṭakaḥ

original: brahmaṇo mānasaḥ putraḥ pulastyo 'bhūn mahāmuniḥ /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ mānasaḥ putraḥ pulastyaḥ bhūt mahā muniḥ

original: tasya vai viśravā nāma putro 'bhūt tasya rākṣasaḥ // NsP_47.2 //
analyzed: tasya vai viśravāḥ nāma putraḥ bhūt tasya rākṣasaḥ

original: tasmāj jāto mahāvīro rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt jātaḥ mahā vīraḥ rāvaṇaḥ loka rāvaṇaḥ

original: tapasā mahatā yuktaḥ sa tu lokān upādravat // NsP_47.3 //
analyzed: tapasā mahatā yuktaḥ sa tu lokān upādravat

original: sendrā devā jitāstena gandharvāḥ kiṃnarās tathā /
analyzed: sa indrāḥ devāḥ jitāḥ tena gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāḥ tathā

original: yakṣāś ca dānavāś caiva tena rājan vinirjitāḥ // NsP_47.4 //
analyzed: yakṣāḥ ca dānavāḥ ca eva tena rājan vinirjitāḥ

original: striyaś caiva surūpiṇyo hṛtās tena durātmanā /
analyzed: striyaḥ ca eva surūpiṇyaḥ hṛtāḥ tena durātmanā

original: devādīnāṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha ratnāni vividhani ca // NsP_47.5 //
analyzed: deva ādīnām nṛpa śreṣṭha ratnāni ca

original: raṇe kuberaṃ nijitya rāvaṇo baladarpitaḥ /
analyzed: raṇe kuberam nijitya rāvaṇaḥ bala darpitaḥ

original: tatpurīṃ jagṛhe laṅkāṃ vimānaṃ cāpi puṣpakam // NsP_47.6 //
analyzed: tat purīm jagṛhe laṅkām vimānam ca api puṣpakam

original: tasyāṃ puryāṃ daśagrīvo rakṣasām adhipo 'bhavat /
analyzed: tasyām puryām daśagrīvaḥ rakṣasām adhipaḥ bhavat

original: putrāś ca bahavas tasya babhūvur amitaujasaḥ // NsP_47.7 //
analyzed: putrāḥ ca bahavaḥ tasya babhūvuḥ amita ojasaḥ

original: rākṣasāś ca tam āśritya mahābalaparākramāḥ /
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ ca tam āśritya mahā bala parākramāḥ

original: anekakoṭayo rājan laṅkāyāṃ nivasanti ye // NsP_47.8 //
analyzed: aneka koṭayaḥ rājan laṅkāyām nivasanti ye

original: devān pitṝn manuṣyāṃś ca vidyādharagaṇān api /
analyzed: devān pitṝn manuṣyān ca vidyādhara gaṇān api

original: yakṣāṃś caiva tataḥ sarve ghātayanti divāniśam // NsP_47.9 //
analyzed: yakṣān ca eva tatas sarve ghātayanti divāniśam

original: saṃtrastaṃ tadbhayād eva jagad āsīc carācaram /
analyzed: saṃtrastam tad bhayāt eva jagat āsīt carācaram

original: duḥkhābhibhūtam atyarthaṃ saṃbabhūva narādhipa // NsP_47.10 //
analyzed: duḥkha abhibhūtam atyartham saṃbabhūva narādhipa

original: etasminn eva kāle tu devāḥ sendrā maharṣayaḥ /
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle tu devāḥ sa indrāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: siddhā vidyādharāś caiva gandharvāḥ kiṃnarās tathā // NsP_47.11 //
analyzed: siddhāḥ vidyādharāḥ ca eva gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāḥ tathā

original: guhyakā bhujagā yakṣā ye cānye svargavāsinaḥ /
analyzed: guhyakāḥ bhujagāḥ yakṣāḥ ye ca anye svarga vāsinaḥ

original: brahmāṇam agrataḥ kṛtvā śaṃkaraṃ ca narādhipa // NsP_47.12 //
analyzed: brahmāṇam agratas kṛtvā śaṃkaram ca narādhipa

original: te yayur hatavikrāntāḥ kṣīrābdhes taṭam uttamam /
analyzed: te yayuḥ hata vikrāntāḥ kṣīrābdheḥ taṭam uttamam

original: tatrārādhya hariṃ devās tasthuḥ prāñjalayas tadā // NsP_47.13 //
analyzed: tatra ārādhya harim devāḥ tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ tadā

original: brahmā ca viṣṇum ārādhya gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ /
analyzed: brahmā ca viṣṇum ārādhya gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: prāñjaliḥ praṇato bhūtvā vāsudevam athāstuvan // NsP_47.14 //
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ bhūtvā vāsudevam atha astuvan

original: brahmovāca:
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: namaḥ kṣīrābdhivāsāya nāgaparyaṅkaśāyine /
analyzed: namaḥ kṣīrābdhi vāsāya nāga paryaṅka śāyine

original: namaḥ śrīkarasaṃspṛṣṭa- divyapādāya viṣṇave // NsP_47.15 //
analyzed: namaḥ śrī kara saṃspṛṣṭa divi apādāya viṣṇave

original: namas te yoganidrāya yogāntarbhāvitāya ca /
analyzed: namaḥ te yoganidrāya yoga antar bhāvitāya ca

original: tārkṣyāsanāya devāya govindāya namo namaḥ // NsP_47.16 //
analyzed: tārkṣyāsanāya devāya govindāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: namaḥ kṣīrābdhikallola- spṛṣṭamātrāya śārṅgiṇe /
analyzed: namaḥ kṣīrābdhi kallola spṛṣṭa mātrāya śārṅgiṇe

original: namo 'ravindapādāya padmanābhāya viṣṇave // NsP_47.17 //
analyzed: namaḥ ravinda pādāya padmanābhāya viṣṇave

original: bhaktārcitasupādāya namo yogapriyāya vai /
analyzed: bhakta arcita su pādāya namaḥ yoga priyāya vai

original: śubhāṅgāya sunetrāya mādhavāya namo namaḥ // NsP_47.18 //
analyzed: śubha aṅgāya sunetrāya mādhavāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: sukeśāya sunetrāya sulalāṭāya cakriṇe /
analyzed: su keśāya su netrāya su lalāṭāya cakriṇe

original: suvaktrāya sukarṇāya śrīdharāya namo namaḥ // NsP_47.19 //
analyzed: su vaktrāya su karṇāya śrīdharāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: suvakṣase sunābhāya padmanābhāya vai namaḥ /
analyzed: su vakṣase sunābhāya padmanābhāya vai namaḥ

original: subhruve cārudehāya cārudantāya śārṅgiṇe // NsP_47.20 //
analyzed: su bhruve cāru dehāya cāru dantāya śārṅgiṇe

original: cārujaṅghāya divyāya keśavāya namo namaḥ /
analyzed: cārujaṅghāya divyāya keśavāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: sunakhāya suśāntāya suvidyāya gadābhṛte // NsP_47.21 //
analyzed: su nakhāya su śāntāya su vidyāya gadā bhṛte

original: dharmapriyāya devāya vāmanāya namo namaḥ /
analyzed: dharma priyāya devāya vāmanāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: asuraghnāya cogrāya rakṣoghnāya namo namaḥ // NsP_47.22 //
analyzed: asura ghnāya ca ugrāya rakṣaḥ ghnāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: devānām ārtināśāya bhīmakarmakṛte namaḥ /
analyzed: devānām ārti nāśāya bhīma karma kṛte namaḥ

original: namas te lokanāthāya rāvaṇāntakṛte namaḥ // NsP_47.23 //
analyzed: namaḥ te loka nāthāya rāvaṇa anta kṛte namaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: iti stuto hṛṣīkeśas tutoṣa parameṣṭhinā /
analyzed: iti stutaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ tutoṣa parameṣṭhinā

original: svarūpaṃ darśayitvā tu pitāmaham uvāca ha // NsP_47.24 //
analyzed: sva rūpam darśayitvā tu pitāmaham uvāca ha

original: kimarthaṃ tu suraiḥ sārdham āgatas tvaṃ pitāmaha /
analyzed: kimartham tu suraiḥ sārdham āgataḥ tvam pitāmaha

original: yat kāryaṃ brūhi me brahman yadarthaṃ saṃstutas tvayā // NsP_47.25 //
analyzed: yat kāryam brūhi me brahman yad artham saṃstutaḥ tvayā

original: ityukto devadevena viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ devadevena viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā

original: sarvadevagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmā prāha janārdanam // NsP_47.26 //
analyzed: sarva deva gaṇaiḥ sārdham brahmā prāha janārdanam

original: brahmovāca:
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: nāśitaṃ tu jagat sarvaṃ rāvaṇena durātmanā /
analyzed: nāśitam tu jagat sarvam rāvaṇena durātmanā

original: sendrāḥ parājitās tena bahuśo rakṣasā vibho // NsP_47.27 //
analyzed: sa indrāḥ parājitāḥ tena bahuśas rakṣasā vibho

original: rākṣasair bhakṣitā martyā yajñāś cāpi vidūṣitāḥ /
analyzed: rākṣasaiḥ bhakṣitāḥ martyāḥ yajñāḥ ca api vidūṣitāḥ

original: devakanyā hṛtās tena balāc chatasahasraśaḥ // NsP_47.28 //
analyzed: deva kanyāḥ hṛtāḥ tena balāt śata sahasraśas

original: tvām ṛte puṇḍarīkākṣa rāvaṇasya vadhaṃ prati /
analyzed: tvām ṛte puṇḍarīkākṣa rāvaṇasya vadham prati

original: na samarthā yato devās tvam atas tadvadhaṃ kuru // NsP_47.29 //
analyzed: na samarthāḥ yatas devāḥ tvam atas tad vadham kuru

original: ityukto brahmaṇā viṣṇur brahmāṇam idam abravīt /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ brahmaṇā viṣṇuḥ brahmāṇam idam abravīt

original: śṛṇuṣvāvahito brahman yad vadāmi hitaṃ vacaḥ // NsP_47.30 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ brahman yat vadāmi hitam vacaḥ

original: sūryavaṃśodbhavaḥ śrīmān rājāsīd bhuvi vīryavān /
analyzed: sūrya vaṃśa udbhavaḥ śrīmān rājā āsīt bhuvi vīryavān

original: nāmnā daśarathakhyātas tasya putro bhavāmy aham // NsP_47.31 //
analyzed: nāmnā daśaratha khyātaḥ tasya putraḥ bhavāmi aham

original: rāvaṇasya vadhārthāya caturdhāṃśena sattama /
analyzed: rāvaṇasya vadha arthāya caturdhāṃśena sattama

original: svāṃśair vānararūpeṇa sakalā devatāgaṇāḥ // NsP_47.32 //
analyzed: sva aṃśaiḥ vānara rūpeṇa sakalāḥ devatā gaṇāḥ

original: vartāyantāṃ viśvakartaḥ syād evaṃ rāvaṇakṣayaḥ /
analyzed: vartāyantām viśvakartaḥ syāt evam rāvaṇa kṣayaḥ

original: ityukto devadevena brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ // NsP_47.33 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ devadevena brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ

original: devāś ca te praṇamyātha merupṛṣṭhaṃ tadā yayuḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ ca te praṇamya atha meru pṛṣṭham tadā yayuḥ

original: svāṃśair vānararūpeṇa avateruś ca bhūtale // NsP_47.34 //
analyzed: sva aṃśaiḥ vānara rūpeṇa avateruḥ ca bhū tale

original: athāputro daśaratho munibhir vedapāragaiḥ /
analyzed: atha aputraḥ daśarathaḥ munibhiḥ vedapāragaiḥ

original: iṣṭiṃ tu kārayām_asa putraprāptikarīṃ nṛpaḥ // NsP_47.35 //
analyzed: iṣṭim tu kārayāmasa putra prāpti karīm nṛpaḥ

original: tataḥ sauvarṇapātrasthaṃ havir ādāya pāyasam /
analyzed: tatas sauvarṇa pātra stham haviḥ ādāya pāyasam

original: vahniḥ kuṇḍāt samuttasthau nūnaṃ devena noditaḥ // NsP_47.36 //
analyzed: vahniḥ kuṇḍāt samuttasthau nūnam devena noditaḥ

original: ādāya munayo mantrāc cakruḥ piṇḍadvayaṃ śubham /
analyzed: ādāya munayaḥ mantrāt cakruḥ piṇḍa dvayam śubham

original: datte kauśalyakaikeyyor dve piṇḍe_2 mantramantrite_2 // NsP_47.37 //
analyzed: datte kauśalya kaikeyyoḥ dve piṇḍe mantra mantrite

original: te piṇḍaprāśane kāle sumitrāyā mahāmate /
analyzed: te piṇḍaprāśane kāle sumitrāyāḥ mahāmate

original: piṇḍābhyām alpam alpaṃ tu subhāginyāḥ prayacchataḥ // NsP_47.38 //
analyzed: piṇḍābhyām alpam alpam tu subhāginyāḥ prayacchataḥ

original: tatas tāḥ prāśayām_asū rājapatnyo yathāvidhi /
analyzed: tatas tāḥ prāśayāmasuḥ rāja patnyaḥ yathāvidhi

original: piṇḍān devakṛtān prāśya prāpur garbhān aninditān // NsP_47.39 //
analyzed: piṇḍān deva kṛtān prāśya prāpuḥ garbhān aninditān

original: evaṃ viṣṇur daśarathāj jātas tatpatniṣu triṣu /
analyzed: evam viṣṇuḥ daśarathāt jātaḥ tad patniṣu triṣu

original: svāṃśair lokahitāyaiva caturdhā jagatīpate // NsP_47.40 //
analyzed: sva aṃśaiḥ loka hitāya eva caturdhā jagatīpate

original: rāmaś ca lakṣmaṇaś caiva bharataḥ śatrughnaiva ca /
analyzed: rāmaḥ ca lakṣmaṇaḥ ca eva bharataḥ śatrughna eva ca

original: jātakarmādikaṃ prāpya saṃskāraṃ munisaṃskṛtam // NsP_47.41 //
analyzed: jātakarma ādikam prāpya saṃskāram muni saṃskṛtam

original: mantrapiṇḍavaśād yogaṃ prāpya cerur yathārbhakāḥ /
analyzed: mantra piṇḍa vaśāt yogam prāpya ceruḥ yathā arbhakāḥ

original: rāmaś ca lakṣmaṇaś caiva saha nityaṃ viceratuḥ // NsP_47.42 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ ca lakṣmaṇaḥ ca eva saha nityam viceratuḥ

original: janmādikṛtasaṃskārau pituḥ prītikarau nṛpa /
analyzed: janma ādi kṛta saṃskārau pituḥ prīti karau nṛpa

original: vavṛdhāte mahāvīryau śrutiśabdātilakṣaṇau // NsP_47.43 //
analyzed: vavṛdhāte mahā vīryau śruti śabda atilakṣaṇau

original: bharataḥ kaikayo rājan bhrātrā saha gṛhe 'vasat /
analyzed: bharataḥ kaikayaḥ rājan bhrātrā saha gṛhe vasat

original: vedaśāstrāṇi bubudhe śastraśāstraṃ nṛpottama // NsP_47.44 //
analyzed: veda śāstrāṇi bubudhe śastra śāstram nṛpa uttama

original: etasminn eva kāle tu viśvāmitro mahātapā /
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle tu viśvāmitraḥ mahā tapā

original: yāgena yaṣṭum ārebhe vidhinā madhusūdanam // NsP_47.45 //
analyzed: yāgena yaṣṭum ārebhe vidhinā madhusūdanam

original: sa tu vighnena yāgo 'bhūd rākṣasair bahuśaḥ purā /
analyzed: sa tu vighnena yāgaḥ bhūt rākṣasaiḥ bahuśas purā

original: netuṃ sa yāgarākṣārthaṃ saṃprāpto rāmalakṣmaṇau // NsP_47.46 //
analyzed: netum sa yāga rākṣa artham saṃprāptaḥ rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: viśvāmitro nṛpaśreṣṭha tatpitur mandiraṃ śubham /
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ nṛpa śreṣṭha tad pituḥ mandiram śubham

original: daśarathas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā pratyutthāya mahāmatiḥ // NsP_47.47 //
analyzed: daśarathaḥ tu tam dṛṣṭvā pratyutthāya mahāmatiḥ

original: arghyapādyādividhina viśvāmitram apūjayat /
analyzed: arghya pādya ādi vidhina viśvāmitram apūjayat

original: sa pūjito muniḥ prāha rājānaṃ rājasaṃmnidhau // NsP_47.48 //
analyzed: sa pūjitaḥ muniḥ prāha rājānam rāja saṃmnidhau

original: śṛṇu rājan daśaratha yadartham aham āgataḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇu rājan daśaratha yad artham aham āgataḥ

original: tat kāryaṃ nṛpaśārdūla kathayāmi tavāgrataḥ // NsP_47.49 //
analyzed: tat kāryam nṛpa śārdūla kathayāmi tava agratas

original: rākṣasair nāśito yāgo bahuśo me durāsadaiḥ /
analyzed: rākṣasaiḥ nāśitaḥ yāgaḥ bahuśas me durāsadaiḥ

original: yajñasya rakṣaṇārthaṃ me dehi tvaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau // NsP_47.50 //
analyzed: yajñasya rakṣaṇa artham me dehi tvam rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: rājā daśarathaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitravaco nṛpa /
analyzed: rājā daśarathaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitra vacaḥ nṛpa

original: viṣaṇṇavadano bhūtva viśvāmitram uvāca ha // NsP_47.51 //
analyzed: viṣaṇṇa vadanaḥ bhūtvā viśvāmitram uvāca ha

original: bālābhyāṃ mama putrābhyāṃ kiṃ te kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: bālābhyām mama putrābhyām kim te kāryam bhaviṣyati

original: ahaṃ tvayā sahāgatya śaktyā rakṣāmi te makham // NsP_47.52 //
analyzed: aham tvayā saha āgatya śaktyā rakṣāmi te makham

original: rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājānaṃ munir abravīt /
analyzed: rājñaḥ tu vacanam śrutvā rājānam muniḥ abravīt

original: rāmo 'pi śaknute nūnaṃ sarvān nāśayituṃ nṛpa // NsP_47.53 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ u pi śaknute nūnam sarvān nāśayitum nṛpa

original: rāmeṇaiva hi te śakyā na tvayā rākṣasā nṛpa /
analyzed: rāmeṇa eva hi te śakyāḥ na tvayā rākṣasāḥ nṛpa

original: ato me dehi rāmaṃ ca na cintāṃ kartum arhasi // NsP_47.54 //
analyzed: atas me dehi rāmam ca na cintām kartum arhasi

original: ityukto muninā tena viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ muninā tena viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā

original: tuṣṇīṃ sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ rājā munivaryam uvāca ha // NsP_47.55 //
analyzed: tuṣṇīm sthitvā kṣaṇam rājā muni varyam uvāca ha

original: yad bravīmi muniśreṣṭha prasannas tvaṃ nibodha me /
analyzed: yat bravīmi muni śreṣṭha prasannaḥ tvam nibodha me

original: rājīvalocanaṃ rāmam ahaṃ dāsye sahānujam // NsP_47.56 //
analyzed: rājīva locanam rāmam aham dāsye sahānujam

original: kiṃ tv asya jananī brahman adṛṣṭvainaṃ mariṣyati /
analyzed: kim tu asya jananī brahman a dṛṣṭvā enam mariṣyati

original: ato 'haṃ caturaṅgeṇa balena sahito mune // NsP_47.57 //
analyzed: atas ham catur aṅgeṇa balena sahitaḥ mune

original: āgatya rākṣasān hanmīty evaṃ me manasi sthitam /
analyzed: āgatya rākṣasān hanmi iti evam me manasi sthitam

original: viśvāmitraḥ punaḥ prāha rājānam amitaujasam // NsP_47.58 //
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ punar prāha rājānam amita ojasam

original: nājño rāmo nṛpaśreṣṭha sa sarvajñaḥ samaḥ kṣamaḥ /
analyzed: na ajñaḥ rāmaḥ nṛpa śreṣṭha sa sarva jñaḥ samaḥ kṣamaḥ

original: śeṣanārāyaṇāv etau tava putrau na saṃśayaḥ // NsP_47.59 //
analyzed: śeṣa nārāyaṇau etau tava putrau na saṃśayaḥ

original: duṣṭānāṃ nigrahārthāya śiṣṭānāṃ pālanāya ca /
analyzed: duṣṭānām nigraha arthāya śiṣṭānām pālanāya ca

original: avatīrṇau na saṃdeho gṛhe tava narādhipa // NsP_47.60 //
analyzed: avatīrṇau na saṃdehaḥ gṛhe tava narādhipa

original: na mātrā na tvayā rājan śokaḥ kāryo 'tra cāṇv api /
analyzed: na mātrā na tvayā rājan śokaḥ kāryaḥ ca aṇu api

original: niḥkṣepe ca mahārāja arpayiṣyāmi te sutau // NsP_47.61 //
analyzed: niḥkṣepe ca mahā rāja arpayiṣyāmi te sutau

original: ityukto daśarathas tena viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ daśarathaḥ tena viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā

original: tacchāpabhīto manasā nīyatām ity abhāṣata // NsP_47.62 //
analyzed: tad śāpa bhītaḥ manasā nīyatām iti abhāṣata

original: kṛcchrāt pitrā vinirmuktaṃ rāmam ādāya sānujam /
analyzed: kṛcchrāt pitrā vinirmuktam rāmam ādāya sa anujam

original: tataḥ siddhāśramaṃ rājan saṃpratasthe sa kauśikaḥ // NsP_47.63 //
analyzed: tatas siddhāśramam rājan saṃpratasthe sa kauśikaḥ

original: taṃ prasthitam athālokya rājā daśarathas tadā /
analyzed: tam prasthitam atha ālokya rājā daśarathaḥ tadā

original: anuvrajyābravīd etad vaco daśarathas tadā // NsP_47.64 //
analyzed: anuvrajya abravīt etat vacaḥ daśarathaḥ tadā

original: aputro 'haṃ purā brahman bahubhiḥ kāmyakarmabhiḥ /
analyzed: aputraḥ ham purā brahman bahubhiḥ kāmya karmabhiḥ

original: muniprasādād adhunā putravān asmi sattama // NsP_47.65 //
analyzed: muni prasādāt adhunā putravān asmi sattama

original: manasā tadviyogaṃ tu na śakṣyāmi viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: manasā tad viyogam tu na śakṣyāmi viśeṣataḥ

original: tvam eva jānāsi mune nītvā śīghraṃ prayaccha me // NsP_47.66 //
analyzed: tvam eva jānāsi mune nītvā śīghram prayaccha me

original: ity evam ukto rājānaṃ viśvāmitro 'bravīt punaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ rājānam viśvāmitraḥ bravīt punar

original: samāptayajñaś ca punar neṣye rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇam // NsP_47.67 //
analyzed: samāpta yajñaḥ ca punar neṣye rāmam ca lakṣmaṇam

original: satyapūrvaṃ tu dāsyāmi na cintāṃ kartum arhasi /
analyzed: satya pūrvam tu dāsyāmi na cintām kartum arhasi

original: ityuktaḥ preṣayām_asa rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇasaṃyutam // NsP_47.68 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ preṣayāmasa rāmam lakṣmaṇa saṃyutam

original: anicchann api rājāsau muniśāpabhayān nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: an icchan api rājā asau muni śāpa bhayāt nṛpaḥ

original: viśvāmitras tu tau gṛhya ayodhyāyā yayau śanaiḥ // NsP_47.69 //
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ tu tau gṛhya ayodhyāyāḥ yayau śanais

original: sarayvās tīram āsādya gacchann eva sa kauśikaḥ /
analyzed: sarayvāḥ tīram āsādya gacchan eva sa kauśikaḥ

original: tayoḥ prītyā sa rājendra dve vidye prathamaṃ dadau // NsP_47.70 //
analyzed: tayoḥ prītyā sa rāja indra dve vidye prathamam dadau

original: valām ativalāṃ caiva samantre ca sasaṃgrahe /
analyzed: valām ativalām ca eva sa mantre ca sa saṃgrahe

original: kṣutpipāsāpanayane punaś caiva mahāmatiḥ // NsP_47.71 //
analyzed: kṣudh pipāsā apanayane punar ca eva mahāmatiḥ

original: astragrāmam aśeṣaṃ tu śikṣayitvā tu tau tadā /
analyzed: astra grāmam aśeṣam tu śikṣayitvā tu tau tadā

original: āśramāni ca divyāni munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām // NsP_47.72 //
analyzed: āśramāni ca divyāni munīnām bhāvitātmanām

original: darśayitvā uṣitvā ca puṇyasthāneṣu sattamaḥ /
analyzed: darśayitvā uṣitvā ca puṇya sthāneṣu sattamaḥ

original: gaṅgām uttīrya śoṇasya tīram āsādya paścimam // NsP_47.73 //
analyzed: gaṅgām uttīrya śoṇasya tīram āsādya paścimam

original: munidhārmikasiddhāṃś ca paśyantau rāmalakṣmaṇau /
analyzed: muni dhārmika siddhān ca paśyantau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: ṛṣibhyaś ca varān prāpya tena nītau nṛpātmajau // NsP_47.74 //
analyzed: ṛṣibhyaḥ ca varān prāpya tena nītau nṛpa ātmajau

original: tāṭakāyā vanaṃ ghoraṃ mṛtyor mukham ivāparam /
analyzed: tāṭakāyāḥ vanam ghoram mṛtyoḥ mukham iva aparam

original: gate tatra nṛpaśreṣṭha viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ // NsP_47.75 //
analyzed: gate tatra nṛpa śreṣṭha viśvāmitraḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: rāmam akliṣṭakarmāṇam idaṃ vacanam abravīt rāma rāma mahābāho tāṭakā nāma rākṣasī /
analyzed: rāmam akliṣṭa karmāṇam idam vacanam abravīt rāma rāma mahā bāho tāṭakā nāma rākṣasī

original: rāvaṇasya niyogena vasaty asmin mahāvane tayā manuṣyā bahavo muniputrā mṛgās tathā // NsP_47.77 //
analyzed: rāvaṇasya niyogena vasati asmin mahā vane tayā manuṣyāḥ bahavaḥ muni putrāḥ mṛgāḥ tathā

original: nihatā bhakṣitāś caiva tasmāt tāṃ vadha sattama /
analyzed: nihatāḥ bhakṣitāḥ ca eva tasmāt tām vadha sattama

original: ity evamukto muninā rāmas taṃ munim abravīt // NsP_47.78 //
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ muninā rāmaḥ tam munim abravīt

original: kathaṃ hi strīvadhaṃ kuryām aham adya mahāmune /
analyzed: katham hi strī vadham kuryām aham adya mahā mune

original: strīvadhe tu mahāpāpaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ // NsP_47.79 //
analyzed: strī vadhe tu mahā pāpam pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ

original: iti rāmavacaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitra uvāca tam /
analyzed: iti rāma vacaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitraḥ uvāca tam

original: tasyās tu nidhanād rāma janāḥ sarve nirākulāḥ // NsP_47.80 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu nidhanāt rāma janāḥ sarve nirākulāḥ

original: bhavanti satataṃ tasmāt tasyāḥ puṇyaprado vadhaḥ /
analyzed: bhavanti satatam tasmāt tasyāḥ puṇya pradaḥ vadhaḥ

original: ity evaṃ vādini munau viśvāmitre niśācarī // NsP_47.81 //
analyzed: iti evam vādini munau viśvāmitre niśācarī

original: āgatā sumahāghorā tāṭakā vivṛtānanā /
analyzed: āgatā su mahā ghorā tāṭakā vivṛta ānanā

original: muninā prerito rāmas tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vivṛtānanām // NsP_47.82 //
analyzed: muninā preritaḥ rāmaḥ tām dṛṣṭvā vivṛta ānanām

original: udyataikabhujayaṣṭim āyatīṃ śroṇilambipuruṣāntramekhalām /
analyzed: udyata eka bhuja yaṣṭim āyatīm śroṇi lambi puruṣa antra mekhalām

original: tāṃ vilokya vanitāvadhe ghṛṇāṃ patriṇā saha mumoca rāghavaḥ // NsP_47.83 //
analyzed: tām vilokya vanitā vadhe ghṛṇām patriṇā saha mumoca rāghavaḥ

original: śaraṃ saṃdhāya vegena tena tasyā uraḥsthalam /
analyzed: śaram saṃdhāya vegena tena tasyāḥ uraḥ sthalam

original: vipāṭitaṃ dvidhā rājan sā papāta mamāra ca // NsP_47.84 //
analyzed: vipāṭitam dvidhā rājan sā papāta mamāra ca

original: ghātayitvā tu tām evaṃ tāv ānīya munis tu tau /
analyzed: ghātayitvā tu tām evam tau ānīya muniḥ tu tau

original: prāpayām_asa taṃ tatra nānāṛṣiniṣevitam // NsP_47.85 //
analyzed: prāpayāmasa tam tatra nānā ṛṣi niṣevitam

original: nānādrumalatākīrṇaṃ nānāpuṣpopaśobhitam /
analyzed: nānā druma latā ākīrṇam nānā puṣpa upaśobhitam

original: nānānirjharatoyāḍhyaṃ vindhyaśailāntarasthitam // NsP_47.86 //
analyzed: nānā nirjhara toya āḍhyam vindhya śaila antara sthitam

original: śākamūlaphalopetaṃ divyaṃ siddhāśramaṃ svakam /
analyzed: śāka mūla phala upetam divyam siddhāśramam svakam

original: rakṣārthaṃ tāv ubhau sthāpya śikṣayitvā viśeṣataḥ // NsP_47.87 //
analyzed: rakṣā artham tau ubhau sthāpya śikṣayitvā viśeṣataḥ

original: tataś cārabdhavān yāgaṃ viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca ārabdhavān yāgam viśvāmitraḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: dīkṣāṃ praviṣṭe ca munau viśvāmitre mahātmani // NsP_47.88 //
analyzed: dīkṣām praviṣṭe ca munau viśvāmitre mahātmani

original: yajñe tu vitate tatra karma kurvanti ṛtvijaḥ /
analyzed: yajñe tu vitate tatra karma kurvanti ṛtvijaḥ

original: mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca bahavaś cānyarākṣasāḥ // NsP_47.89 //
analyzed: mārīcaḥ ca subāhuḥ ca bahavaḥ ca anya rākṣasāḥ

original: āgatā yāganāśāya rāvaṇena niyojitāḥ /
analyzed: āgatāḥ yāga nāśāya rāvaṇena niyojitāḥ

original: tān āgatān sa vijñāya rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ // NsP_47.90 //
analyzed: tān āgatān sa vijñāya rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: śareṇa pātayām_asa subāhuṃ dharaṇītale /
analyzed: śareṇa pātayāmasa su bāhum dharaṇī tale

original: asṛkpravāhaṃ varṣantaṃ mārīcaṃ bhallakena tu // NsP_47.91 //
analyzed: asṛj pravāham varṣantam mārīcam bhallakena tu

original: pratāḍya nītavān abdhiṃ yathā parṇaṃ tu vāyunā /
analyzed: pratāḍya nītavān abdhim yathā parṇam tu vāyunā

original: śeṣāṃs tu hatavān rāmo lakṣmaṇāś ca niśācarān // NsP_47.92 //
analyzed: śeṣān tu hatavān rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇāḥ ca niśācarān

original: rāmeṇa rakṣitamakho viśvāmitro mahāyaśāḥ /
analyzed: rāmeṇa rakṣita makhaḥ viśvāmitraḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: samāpya yāgaṃ vidhivat pūjayām_asa ṛtvijān // NsP_47.93 //
analyzed: samāpya yāgam vidhivat pūjayāmase ṛtvijān

original: sadasyān api saṃpūjya yathārhaṃ ca hy ariṃdama /
analyzed: sadasyān api saṃpūjya yathārham ca hi ariṃdama

original: rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva pūjayām_asa bhaktitaḥ // NsP_47.94 //
analyzed: rāmam ca lakṣmaṇam ca eva pūjayāmasa bhaktitaḥ

original: tato devagaṇas tuṣṭo yajñabhāgena sattama /
analyzed: tatas deva gaṇaḥ tuṣṭaḥ yajña bhāgena sattama

original: vavarṣa puṣpavarṣaṃ tu rāmadevasya mūrdhani // NsP_47.95 //
analyzed: vavarṣa puṣpa varṣam tu rāmadevasya mūrdhani

original: nivārya rākṣasabhayaṃ kārayitvā tu tanmakham /
analyzed: nivārya rākṣasa bhayam kārayitvā tu tad makham

original: śrutvā nānākathāḥ puṇyā rāmo bhrātṛsamanvitaḥ // NsP_47.96 //
analyzed: śrutvā nānā kathāḥ puṇyāḥ rāmaḥ bhrātṛ samanvitaḥ

original: tena nīto vinītātmā ahalyā yatra tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: tena nītaḥ vinīta ātmā ahalyā yatra tiṣṭhati

original: vyabhicārān mahendreṇa bhartrā śaptā hi sā purā // NsP_47.97 //
analyzed: vyabhicārāt mahā indreṇa bhartrā śaptā hi sā purā

original: pāṣāṇabhūtā rājendra tasya rāmasya darśanāt /
analyzed: pāṣāṇa bhūtāḥ rāja indra tasya rāmasya darśanāt

original: ahalyā muktaśāpā ca jagāma gautamaṃ prati // NsP_47.98 //
analyzed: ahalyā mukta śāpā ca jagāma gautamam prati

original: viśvāmitras tatas tatra cintayām_asa vai kṣaṇam /
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ tatas tatra cintayāmasa vai kṣaṇam

original: kṛtadāro mayā neyo rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ // NsP_47.99 //
analyzed: kṛtadāraḥ mayā neyaḥ rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: iti saṃcintya tau gṛhya viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ /
analyzed: iti saṃcintya tau gṛhya viśvāmitraḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto 'nekair jagāma mithilāṃ prati // NsP_47.100 //
analyzed: śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtaḥ nekaiḥ jagāma mithilām prati

original: nānādeśād athāyātā janakasya niveśanam /
analyzed: nānādeśāt atha āyātāḥ janakasya niveśanam

original: rājaputrā mahāvīryāḥ pūrvaṃ sītābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ // NsP_47.101 //
analyzed: rāja putrāḥ mahā vīryāḥ pūrvam sītā abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: tān dṛṣṭvā pūjayitvā tu janakaś ca yathārhataḥ /
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā pūjayitvā tu janakaḥ ca yathārhataḥ

original: yat sītāyāḥ samutpannaṃ dhanur māheśvaraṃ mahat // NsP_47.102 //
analyzed: yat sītāyāḥ samutpannam dhanuḥ māheśvaram mahat

original: arcitaṃ gandhamālābhī ramyaśobhāsamanvite /
analyzed: arcitam gandha mālābhiḥ ramya śobhā samanvite

original: raṅge mahati vistīrṇe sthāpayām_asa tad dhanuḥ // NsP_47.103 //
analyzed: raṅge mahati vistīrṇe sthāpayāmasa tat dhanuḥ

original: uvāca ca nṛpān sarvāṃs tadoccair janako nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: uvāca ca nṛpān sarvān tadā uccais janakaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: ākarṣaṇād idaṃ yena dhanur bhagnaṃ nṛpātmajāḥ // NsP_47.104 //
analyzed: ākarṣaṇāt idam yena dhanuḥ bhagnam nṛpa ātmajāḥ

original: tasyeyaṃ dharmato bhāryā sītā sarvāṅgaśobhanā /
analyzed: tasya iyam dharmataḥ bhāryā sītā sarva aṅga śobhanā

original: ity evaṃ śrāvite tena janakena mahātmanā // NsP_47.105 //
analyzed: iti evam śrāvite tena janakena mahātmanā

original: kramād ādāya te tat tu sajyīkartum athābhavan /
analyzed: kramāt ādāya te tat tu sajyīkartum atha abhavan

original: dhanuṣā tāḍitāḥ sarve kramāt tena mahīpate // NsP_47.106 //
analyzed: dhanuṣā tāḍitāḥ sarve kramāt tena mahīpate

original: vidhūya patitā rājan vilajjās tatra pārthivāḥ /
analyzed: vidhūya patitāḥ rājan vilajjāḥ tatra pārthivāḥ

original: teṣu bhagneṣu janakas tad dhanus tryambakaṃ nṛpa // NsP_47.107 //
analyzed: teṣu bhagneṣu janakaḥ tat dhanuḥ tryambakam nṛpa

original: saṃsthāpya sthitavān vīro rāmāgamanakāṅkṣayā /
analyzed: saṃsthāpya sthitavān vīraḥ rāma āgamana kāṅkṣayā

original: viśvāmitras tataḥ prāpto mithilādhipater gṛham // NsP_47.108 //
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ tatas prāptaḥ mithilā adhipateḥ gṛham

original: janako 'pi ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā viśvāmitraṃ gṛhāgatam /
analyzed: janakaḥ pi ca tam dṛṣṭvā viśvāmitram gṛha āgatam

original: rāmalakṣmaṇasaṃyuktaṃ śiṣyaiś cābhigataṃ tadā // NsP_47.109 //
analyzed: rāma lakṣmaṇa saṃyuktam śiṣyaiḥ ca abhigatam tadā

original: taṃ pūjayitvā vidhivat prājñaṃ viprānuyāyinam /
analyzed: tam pūjayitvā vidhivat prājñam vipra anuyāyinam

original: rāmaṃ raghupatiṃ cāpi lāvaṇyādiguṇair yutam // NsP_47.110 //
analyzed: rāmam raghu patim ca api lāvaṇya ādi guṇaiḥ yutam

original: śīlācāraguṇopetaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāmatim /
analyzed: śīla ācāra guṇa upetam lakṣmaṇam ca mahāmatim

original: pūjayitvā yathānyāyaṃ janakaḥ prītamānasaḥ // NsP_47.111 //
analyzed: pūjayitvā yathānyāyam janakaḥ prīta mānasaḥ

original: hemapīṭhe sukhāsīnaṃ śiṣyaiḥ pūrvāparair vṛtam /
analyzed: hema pīṭhe sukha āsīnam śiṣyaiḥ pūrva aparaiḥ vṛtam

original: viśvāmitram uvācātha kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayeti saḥ // NsP_47.112 //
analyzed: viśvāmitram uvāca atha kim kartavyam mayā iti saḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: iti śrutvā vacas tasya muniḥ prāha mahīpatim /
analyzed: iti śrutvā vacaḥ tasya muniḥ prāha mahīpatim

original: eṣa rāmo mahārāja viṣṇuḥ sākṣān mahīpatiḥ // NsP_47.113 //
analyzed: eṣa rāmaḥ mahā rāja viṣṇuḥ sākṣāt mahīpatiḥ

original: rakṣārthaṃ viṣṭapānāṃ tu jāto daśarathātmajaḥ /
analyzed: rakṣā artham viṣṭapānām tu jātaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ

original: asmai sītāṃ prayaccha tvaṃ devakanyām iva sthitām // NsP_47.114 //
analyzed: asmai sītām prayaccha tvam deva kanyām iva sthitām

original: asyā vivāhe rājendra dhanurbhaṅgam ūdīritam /
analyzed: asyāḥ vivāhe rāja indra dhanuḥ bhaṅgam

original: tad ānaya bhavadhanur arcayasva janādhipa // NsP_47.115 //
analyzed: tat ānaya bhava dhanuḥ arcayasva janādhipa

original: tathety uktvā ca rājā hi bhavacāpaṃ tad adbhutam /
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā ca rājā hi bhava cāpam tat adbhutam

original: anekabhūbhujāṃ bhaṅgi sthāpayām_asa pūrvavat // NsP_47.116 //
analyzed: aneka bhūbhujām bhaṅgi sthāpayāmasa pūrvavat

original: tato daśarathasuto viśvāmitreṇa coditaḥ /
analyzed: tatas daśaratha sutaḥ viśvāmitreṇa coditaḥ

original: teṣāṃ madhyāt samutthāya rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ // NsP_47.117 //
analyzed: teṣām madhyāt samutthāya rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: praṇamya viprān devāṃś ca dhanur ādāya tat tadā /
analyzed: praṇamya viprān devān ca dhanuḥ ādāya tat tadā

original: sajyaṃ kṛtvā mahābāhur jyāghoṣam akarot tadā // NsP_47.118 //
analyzed: sajyam kṛtvā mahā bāhuḥ jyā ghoṣam akarot tadā

original: ākṛṣyamāṇaṃ tu balāt tena bhagnaṃ mahad dhanuḥ /
analyzed: ākṛṣyamāṇam tu balāt tena bhagnam mahat dhanuḥ

original: sītā ca mālam ādāya śubhāṃ rāmasya mūrdhani // NsP_47.119 //
analyzed: sītā ca mālam ādāya śubhām rāmasya mūrdhani

original: kṣiptvā saṃvarayām_asa sarvakṣatriyasaṃnidhau /
analyzed: kṣiptvā saṃvarayāmasa sarva kṣatriya saṃnidhau

original: tatas te kṣatriyāḥ kruddhā rāmam āsādya sarvataḥ // NsP_47.120 //
analyzed: tatas te kṣatriyāḥ kruddhāḥ rāmam āsādya sarvatas

original: mumucuḥ śarajālāni garjayanto mahābalāḥ /
analyzed: mumucuḥ śara jālāni garjayantaḥ mahā balāḥ

original: tān nirīkṣya tato rāmo dhanur ādāya vegavān // NsP_47.121 //
analyzed: tān nirīkṣya tatas rāmaḥ dhanuḥ ādāya vegavān

original: jyāghoṣatalaghoṣeṇa kampayām_asa tān nṛpān /
analyzed: jyā ghoṣa tala ghoṣeṇa kampayāmasa tān nṛpān

original: ciccheda śarajālāni teṣāṃ svāstrai rathāṃs tataḥ // NsP_47.122 //
analyzed: ciccheda śara jālāni teṣām sva astraiḥ rathān tatas

original: dhanūṃṣi ca patākāś ca rāmaś ciccheda līlayā /
analyzed: dhanūṃṣi ca patākāḥ ca rāmaḥ ciccheda līlayā

original: saṃnahya svabalaṃ sarvaṃ mithilādhipatis tataḥ // NsP_47.123 //
analyzed: saṃnahya sva balam sarvam mithilā adhipatiḥ tatas

original: jāmātaraṃ raṇe rakṣan pārṣṇigrāho babhūva ha /

original: lakṣmaṇas ca mahāvīro vidrāvya yudhi tān nṛpān // NsP_47.124 //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā vīraḥ vidrāvya yudhi tān nṛpān

original: hastyaśvāñ jagṛhe teṣāṃ syandanāni bahūni ca /

original: vāhanāni parityajya palāyanaparān nṛpān // NsP_47.125 //
analyzed: vāhanāni parityajya palāyana parān nṛpān

original: tān nihantuṃ ca dhāvat sa pṛṣṭhato lakṣmaṇas tadā /
analyzed: tān nihantum ca dhāvat sa pṛṣṭhatas lakṣmaṇaḥ tadā

analyzed: mithilā adhipatiḥ tam ca vārayāmasa kauśikaḥ

original: jitasenaṃ mahāvīraṃ rāmaṃ bhrātrā samanvitam /
analyzed: jitasenam mahā vīram rāmam bhrātrā samanvitam

original: ādāya prativeśātha janakaḥ svagṛhaṃ śubham // NsP_47.127 //
analyzed: ādāya prativeśā atha janakaḥ sva gṛham śubham

original: dūtaṃ ca preṣayām_asa tadā daśarathāya saḥ /
