original: śrutvā dūtamukhāt sarvaṃ viditārthaḥ saḥ pārthivaḥ // NsP_47.128 //
analyzed: śrutvā dūta mukhāt sarvam vidita arthaḥ saḥ pārthivaḥ

original: sabhāryaḥ sasutaḥ śrīmān hastyaśvarathavāhanaḥ /
analyzed: sa bhāryaḥ sa sutaḥ śrīmān hasti aśva ratha vāhanaḥ

original: mithilām ājagāmāśu svabalena samanvitaḥ // NsP_47.129 //
analyzed: mithilām ājagāma āśu sva balena samanvitaḥ

original: janako 'py asya satkāraṃ kṛtvā svāṃ ca sutāṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: janakaḥ pi asya satkāram kṛtvā svām ca sutām tatas

original: vidhivat kṛtaśulkāṃ tāṃ dadau rāmāya pārthiva // NsP_47.130 //
analyzed: vidhivat kṛta śulkām tām dadau rāmāya pārthiva

original: aparāś ca sutās tisro rūpavatyaḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: aparāḥ ca sutāḥ tisraḥ rūpavatyaḥ su alaṃkṛtāḥ

original: tribhyas tu lakṣmaṇādibhyaḥ svakanyā vidhivad dadau // NsP_47.131 //
analyzed: tribhyaḥ tu lakṣmaṇa ādibhyaḥ sva kanyāḥ vidhivat dadau

original: evaṃ kṛtavivāho 'sau rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ /
analyzed: evam kṛta vivāhaḥ sau rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: bhrātṛbhir mātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ pitrā balavatā saha // NsP_47.132 //
analyzed: bhrātṛbhiḥ mātṛbhiḥ sārdham pitrā balavatā saha

original: dināni katicit tatra sthito vividhabhojanaiḥ /
analyzed: dināni katicid tatra sthitaḥ vividha bhojanaiḥ

original: tato 'yodhyāpurīṃ gantum utsukaṃ sasutaṃ nṛpam /
analyzed: tatas yodhyā purīm gantum utsukam sa sutam nṛpam

original: dṛṣṭvā daśarathaṃ rājā sītāyāḥ pradadau vasu // NsP_47.133 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā daśaratham rājā sītāyāḥ pradadau vasu

original: ratnāni divyāni bahūni dattvā rāmāya vastrāṇy atiśobhanāni /
analyzed: ratnāni divyāni bahūni dattvā rāmāya vastrāṇi ati śobhanāni

original: hastyaśvadāsān api karmayogyān dāsījanāṃś ca pravarāḥ striyaś ca // NsP_47.134 //
analyzed: hasti aśva dāsān api karma yogyān dāsī janān ca pravarāḥ striyaḥ ca

original: sītāṃ suśīlāṃ bahuratnabhūṣitāṃ rathaṃ samāropya sutāṃ surūpām /
analyzed: sītām su śīlām bahu ratna bhūṣitām ratham samāropya sutām surūpām

original: vedādighoṣair bahumaṅgalaiś ca saṃpreṣayāṃ āsa sa pārthivo balī // NsP_47.135 //
analyzed: veda ādi ghoṣaiḥ bahu maṅgalaiḥ ca saṃpreṣayān āsa sa pārthivaḥ balī

original: preṣayitvā sutāṃ diyāṃ natvā daśarathaṃ nṛpam /
analyzed: preṣayitvā sutām diyām natvā daśaratham nṛpam

original: viśvāmitraṃ namaskṛtya janakaḥ saṃnivṛttavān // NsP_47.136 //
analyzed: viśvāmitram namaskṛtya janakaḥ saṃnivṛttavān

original: tasya patnyo mahābhāgāḥ śikṣayitvā sutāṃ tadā /
analyzed: tasya patnyaḥ mahābhāgāḥ śikṣayitvā sutām tadā

original: bhartṛbhaktiṃ kuru śubhe śvaśrūṇāṃ śvaśurasya ca // NsP_47.137 //
analyzed: bhartṛ bhaktim kuru śubhe śvaśrūṇām śvaśurasya ca

original: śvaśrūṇām arpayitvā tāṃ nivṛttā viviśuḥ puram /
analyzed: śvaśrūṇām arpayitvā tām nivṛttāḥ viviśuḥ puram

original: tatas tu rāmaṃ gacchantam ayodhyāṃ prabalānvitam // NsP_47.138 //
analyzed: tatas tu rāmam gacchantam ayodhyām prabala anvitam

original: śrutvā paraśurāmo vai panthānaṃ saṃrurodha ha /
analyzed: śrutvā paraśurāmaḥ vai panthānam saṃrurodha ha

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājapuruṣāḥ sarve te dīnamānasāḥ // NsP_47.139 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā rāja puruṣāḥ sarve te dīna mānasāḥ

original: āsīd daśarathaś cāpi duḥkhaśokapariplutaḥ /
analyzed: āsīt daśarathaḥ ca api duḥkha śoka pariplutaḥ

original: sabhāryaḥ saparīvāro bhārgavasya bhayān nṛpa // NsP_47.140 //
analyzed: sa bhāryaḥ sa parīvāraḥ bhārgavasya bhayāt nṛpa

original: tato 'bravīj janān sarvān rājānaṃ ca suduḥkhitam /
analyzed: tatas bravīt janān sarvān rājānam ca su duḥkhitam

original: vasiṣṭhaś corjitatapā brahmacārī mahāmuniḥ // NsP_47.141 //
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ ca ūrjita tapāḥ brahmacārī mahā muniḥ

original: vasiṣṭha uvāca:
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca

original: yuṣmābhir atra rāmārthaṃ na kāryaṃ duḥkham aṇv api // NsP_47.142 //
analyzed: yuṣmābhiḥ atra rāma artham na kāryam duḥkham aṇu api

original: pitrā vā mātṛbhir vāpi anyair bhṛtyajanair api /
analyzed: pitrā vā mātṛbhiḥ vā api anyaiḥ bhṛtya janaiḥ api

original: ayaṃ hi nṛpate rāma sākṣād viṣṇus tu te gṛhe // NsP_47.143 //
analyzed: ayam hi nṛpate rāma sākṣāt viṣṇuḥ tu te gṛhe

original: jagataḥ pālanārthāya janmaprāpto na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: jagataḥ pālana arthāya janma prāptaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: yasya saṃkīrtyaṃ nāmāpi bhavabhītiḥ praṇaśyati // NsP_47.144 //
analyzed: yasya saṃkīrtyam nāma api bhava bhītiḥ praṇaśyati

original: brahma mūrtaṃ svayaṃ yatra bhayādes tatra kā kathā /
analyzed: brahma mūrtam svayam yatra bhaya ādeḥ tatra kā kathā

original: yatra saṃkīrtyate rāma- kathāmātram api prabho // NsP_47.145 //
analyzed: yatra saṃkīrtyate rāma kathā mātram api prabho

original: nopasargabhayaṃ tatra nākālamaraṇaṃ nṛṇām /
analyzed: na upasarga bhayam tatra na akāla maraṇam nṛṇām

original: ityukte bhārgavo rāmo rāmam āhāgrataḥ sthitam // NsP_47.146 //
analyzed: iti ukte bhārgavaḥ rāmaḥ rāmam āha agratas sthitam

original: tyaja tvaṃ rāmasaṃjñāṃ tu mayā vā saṃgaraṃ kuru /
analyzed: tyaja tvam rāma saṃjñām tu mayā vā saṃgaram kuru

original: ityukte rāghavaḥ prāha bhārgavaṃ taṃ pathi sthitam // NsP_47.147 //
analyzed: iti ukte rāghavaḥ prāha bhārgavam tam pathi sthitam

original: rāmasaṃjñāṃ kutas tyakṣye tvayā yotsye sthiro bhava /
analyzed: rāma saṃjñām kutas tyakṣye tvayā yotsye sthiraḥ bhava

original: ity uktvā taṃ pṛthak sthitvā rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ // NsP_47.148 //
analyzed: iti uktvā tam pṛthak sthitvā rāmaḥ rājīva locanaḥ

original: jyāghoṣam akarod vīro vīrasyaivāgratas tadā /
analyzed: jyā ghoṣam akarot vīraḥ vīrasya eva agratas tadā

original: tataḥ paraśurāmasya dehān niṣkramya vaiṣṇavam // NsP_47.149 //
analyzed: tatas paraśurāmasya dehāt niṣkramya vaiṣṇavam

original: paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tejo rāmamukhe 'viśat /
analyzed: paśyatām sarva bhūtānām tejaḥ rāma mukhe viśat

original: dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhārgavo rāmaḥ prasannavadano 'bravīt // NsP_47.150 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam bhārgavaḥ rāmaḥ prasanna vadanaḥ bravīt

original: rāma rāma mahābāho rāmas tvaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: rāma rāma mahā bāho rāmaḥ tvam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: viṣṇur eva bhavāñ jāto jñāto 'sy adya mayā vibho // NsP_47.151 //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ eva jātaḥ jñātaḥ si adya mayā vibho

original: gaccha vīra yathākāmaṃ devakāryaṃ ca vai kuru /
analyzed: gaccha vīra yathākāmam deva kāryam ca vai kuru

original: duṣṭānāṃ nidhanaṃ kṛtvā śiṣṭāṃś ca paripālaya // NsP_47.152 //
analyzed: duṣṭānām nidhanam kṛtvā śiṣṭān ca paripālaya

original: yāhi tvaṃ svecchayā rāma ahaṃ gacche tapovanam /
analyzed: yāhi tvam sva icchayā rāma aham gacche tapaḥ vanam

original: ity uktvā pūjitas tais tu munibhāvena bhārgavaḥ // NsP_47.153 //
analyzed: iti uktvā pūjitaḥ taiḥ tu muni bhāvena bhārgavaḥ

original: mahendrādriṃ jagāmātha tapase dhṛtamānasaḥ /
analyzed: mahendra adrim jagāma atha tapase dhṛta mānasaḥ

original: tatas tu jātaharṣās te janā daśarathaś ca ha // NsP_47.154 //
analyzed: tatas tu jāta harṣāḥ te janāḥ daśarathaḥ ca ha

original: purīm ayodhyāṃ saṃprāpya rāmeṇa saha pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: purīm ayodhyām saṃprāpya rāmeṇa saha pārthivaḥ

original: divyaśobhāṃ purīṃ kṛtvā sarvato bhadraśālinīm // NsP_47.155 //
analyzed: divya śobhām purīm kṛtvā sarvatas bhadra śālinīm

original: pratyutthāya tataḥ paurāḥ śaṅkhatūryādibhiḥ svanaiḥ /
analyzed: pratyutthāya tatas paurāḥ śaṅkha tūrya ādibhiḥ svanaiḥ

original: viśantaṃ rāmam āgatya kṛtadāraṃ raṇe 'jitam // NsP_47.156 //
analyzed: viśantam rāmam āgatya kṛta dāram raṇe jitam

original: taṃ vīkṣya harṣitāḥ santo viviśus tena vai purīm /
analyzed: tam vīkṣya harṣitāḥ santaḥ viviśuḥ tena vai purīm

original: tau dṛṣṭvā sa muniḥ prāptau rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇam antike // NsP_47.157 //
analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā sa muniḥ prāptau rāmam lakṣmaṇam antike

original: daśarathāya tatpitre mātṛbhyaś ca viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: daśarathāya tad pitre mātṛbhyaḥ ca viśeṣataḥ

original: tau samarpya muniśreṣṭhas tena rājñā ca pūjitaḥ /
analyzed: tau samarpya muni śreṣṭhaḥ tena rājñā ca pūjitaḥ

original: viśvāmitraś ca sahasā pratigantuṃ mano dadhe // NsP_47.158 //
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ ca sahasā pratigantum manaḥ dadhe

original: samarpya rāmaṃ sa muniḥ sahānujaṃ sabhāryam agre pitur ekavallabham /
analyzed: samarpya rāmam sa muniḥ sahānujam sa bhāryam agre pituḥ eka vallabham

original: punaḥ punaḥ śrāvya hasan mahāmatir jagāma siddhāśramam evam ātmanaḥ // NsP_47.159 //
analyzed: punar punar śrāvya hasan mahāmatiḥ jagāma siddhāśramam evam ātmanaḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe rāmaprādurbhāve saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 47 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe rāmaprādurbhāve saptacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: kṛtadāro mahātejā rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ /
analyzed: kṛta dāraḥ mahā tejāḥ rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: pitre sumahatīṃ prītiṃ janānām upapādayan // NsP_48.1 //
analyzed: pitre su mahatīm prītim janānām upapādayan

original: ayodhyāyāṃ sthito rāmaḥ sarvabhogasamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: ayodhyāyām sthitaḥ rāmaḥ sarva bhoga samanvitaḥ

original: prītyā nandaty ayodhyāyāṃ rāme raghupatau nṛpa // NsP_48.2 //
analyzed: prītyā nandati ayodhyāyām rāme raghupatau nṛpa

original: bhrātā śatrughnasahito bharato mātulaṃ yayau /
analyzed: bhrātā śatrughna sahitaḥ bharataḥ mātulam yayau

original: tato daśaratho rājā prasamīkṣya suśobhanam // NsP_48.3 //
analyzed: tatas daśarathaḥ rājā prasamīkṣya su śobhanam

original: yuvānaṃ balinaṃ yogyaṃ bhūpasiddhyai sutaṃ kavim /
analyzed: yuvānam balinam yogyam bhūpa siddhyai sutam kavim

original: abhiṣicya rājyabhāraṃ rāme saṃsthāpya vaiṣṇavam // NsP_48.4 //
analyzed: abhiṣicya rājya bhāram rāme saṃsthāpya vaiṣṇavam

original: padaṃ prāptuṃ mahad yatnaṃ kariṣyāmīty acintayat /
analyzed: padam prāptum mahat yatnam kariṣyāmi iti acintayat

original: saṃcintya tatparo rājā sarvadikṣu samādiśat // NsP_48.5 //
analyzed: saṃcintya tad paraḥ rājā sarva dikṣu samādiśat

original: prājñān bhṛtyān mahīpālān mantrigaṇaś ca tvarānvitaḥ /
analyzed: prājñān bhṛtyān mahīpālān mantri gaṇaḥ ca tvarā anvitaḥ

original: rāmābhiṣekadravyāṇi ṛṣiproktāni yāni vai // NsP_48.6 //
analyzed: rāma abhiṣeka dravyāṇi ṛṣi proktāni yāni vai

original: tāni bhṛtyāḥ samāhṛtya śīghram āgantum arhatha /
analyzed: tāni bhṛtyāḥ samāhṛtya śīghram āgantum arhatha

original: dūtāmātyāḥ samādeśāt sarvadikṣu narādhipān // NsP_48.7 //
analyzed: dūta amātyāḥ samādeśāt sarva dikṣu narādhipān

original: āhūya tān samāhṛtya śīghram āgantum arhatha /
analyzed: āhūya tān samāhṛtya śīghram āgantum arhatha

original: ayodhyāpuram atyarthaṃ sarvaśobhāsamanvitam // NsP_48.8 //
analyzed: ayodhyā puram atyartham sarva śobhā samanvitam

original: janāḥ kuruta sarvatra nṛtyagītādinanditam /
analyzed: janāḥ kuruta sarvatra nṛtya gīta ādi nanditam

original: puravāsijanānandaṃ deśavāsimanaḥpriyam // NsP_48.9 //
analyzed: pura vāsi jana ānandam deśa vāsi manaḥ priyam

original: rāmābhiṣekaṃ vipulaṃ śvo bhaviṣyati jānatha /
analyzed: rāma abhiṣekam vipulam śvas bhaviṣyati jānatha

original: śrutvetthaṃ mantriṇaḥ prāhus taṃ nṛpaṃ praṇipatya ca // NsP_48.10 //
analyzed: śrutvā ittham mantriṇaḥ prāhuḥ tam nṛpam praṇipatya ca

original: śobhanaṃ te mataṃ rājan yad idaṃ paribhāṣitam /
analyzed: śobhanam te matam rājan yat idam paribhāṣitam

original: rāmābhiṣekam asmākaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca priyaṃkaram // NsP_48.11 //
analyzed: rāma abhiṣekam asmākam sarveṣām ca priyaṃkaram

original: ityukto daśarathas tais tān sarvān punar abravīt /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ daśarathaḥ taiḥ tān sarvān punar abravīt

original: ānīyantāṃ drutaṃ sarve saṃbhārā mama śāsanāt // NsP_48.12 //
analyzed: ānīyantām drutam sarve saṃbhārāḥ mama śāsanāt

original: sarvataḥ sārabhūtā ca purī ceyaṃ samantataḥ /
analyzed: sarvatas sāra bhūtā ca purī ca iyam samantataḥ

original: adya śobhānvitā kāryā kartavyaṃ yāgamaṇḍalam // NsP_48.13 //
analyzed: adya śobhā anvitā kāryā kartavyam yāga maṇḍalam

original: ity evamuktā rājñā te mantriṇaḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam uktāḥ rājñā te mantriṇaḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ

original: tathaiva cakrus te sarve punaḥ punar udīritāḥ // NsP_48.14 //
analyzed: tathā eva cakruḥ te sarve punar punar udīritāḥ

original: prāptaharṣaḥ sa rājā ca śubhaṃ dinam udīkṣayan /
analyzed: prāpta harṣaḥ sa rājā ca śubham dinam udīkṣayan

original: kauśalyā lakṣmaṇaś caiva sumitrā nāgaro janaḥ // NsP_48.15 //
analyzed: kauśalyāḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca eva sumitrāḥ nāgaraḥ janaḥ

original: rāmābhiṣekam ākarṇya mudaṃ prāpyātiharṣitaḥ /
analyzed: rāma abhiṣekam ākarṇya mudam prāpya ati harṣitaḥ

original: śvaśruśvaśurayoḥ samyak śuśrūṣaṇaparā tu sā // NsP_48.16 //
analyzed: śvaśru śvaśurayoḥ samyak śuśrūṣaṇa parā tu sā

original: mudānvitā sitā sītā bhartur ākarṇya śobhanam /
analyzed: mudā anvitā sitā sītā bhartuḥ ākarṇya śobhanam

original: śvobhāviny abhiṣeke tu rāmasya viditātmanaḥ // NsP_48.17 //
analyzed: śvas bhāvini abhiṣeke tu rāmasya vidita ātmanaḥ

original: dāsī tu mantharānāmnī kaikeyyāḥ kubjarūpiṇī /
analyzed: dāsī tu mantharā nāmnī kaikeyyāḥ kubja rūpiṇī

original: svāṃ svāminīṃ tu kaikeyīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // NsP_48.18 //
analyzed: svām svāminīm tu kaikeyīm idam vacanam abravīt

original: śṛṇu rājñi mabhābhāge vacanaṃ mama śobhanam /
analyzed: śṛṇu rājñi mabhābhāge vacanam mama śobhanam

original: tvatpatis tu mahārājas tava nāśāya codyataḥ // NsP_48.19 //
analyzed: tvad patiḥ tu mahā rājaḥ tava nāśāya ca udyataḥ

original: rāmo 'sau kauśalīputraḥ śvo bhaviṣyati bhūpatiḥ /
analyzed: kauśalīputraḥ śvas bhaviṣyati bhūpatiḥ

original: vasuvāhanakośādi rājyaṃ ca sakalaṃ śubhe // NsP_48.20 //
analyzed: vasu vāhana kośa ādi rājyam ca sakalam śubhe

original: bhaviṣyaty adya rāmasya bharatasya na kiṃcana /
analyzed: bhaviṣyati adya rāmasya bharatasya na kiṃcana

original: bharato 'pi gato dūraṃ mātulasya gṛhaṃ prati // NsP_48.21 //
analyzed: bharataḥ pi gataḥ dūram mātulasya gṛham prati

original: hā kaṣṭaṃ mandabhāgyāsi sāpatnyād duḥkhitā bhṛśam /
analyzed: hā kaṣṭam mandabhāgyā asi sāpatnyāt duḥkhitā bhṛśam

original: saivam ākarṇya kaikeyī kubjām idam athābravīt // NsP_48.22 //
analyzed: sā evam ākarṇya kaikeyī kubjām idam atha abravīt

original: paśya me dakṣatāṃ kubje adyaiva tvaṃ vicakṣaṇe /
analyzed: paśya me dakṣa tām kubje adyā eva tvam vicakṣaṇe

original: yathā tu sakalaṃ rājyaṃ bharatasya bhaviṣyati // NsP_48.23 //
analyzed: yathā tu sakalam rājyam bharatasya bhaviṣyati

original: rāmasya vanavāsaś ca tathā yatnaṃ karomy aham /
analyzed: rāmasya vana vāsaḥ ca tathā yatnam karomi aham

original: ity uktvā mantharāṃ sā tu unmucya svāṅgabhūṣaṇam // NsP_48.24 //
analyzed: iti uktvā mantharām sā tu unmucya sva aṅga bhūṣaṇam

original: vastraṃ puṣpāṇi conmucya sthūlavāsodharābhavat /
analyzed: vastram puṣpāṇi ca unmucya sthūla vāsaḥ dharā bhavat

original: nirmālyapuṣpadhṛk kaṣṭā kaśmalāṅgī virūpiṇī // NsP_48.25 //
bhasmadhūlyādinirdigdhā bhasmadhūlyā tathā śrite /
analyzed: bhasma dhūlya ādi nirdigdhāḥ bhasma dhūlyā tathā śrite

original: bhūbhāge śāntadīpe sā saṃdhyākāle suduḥkhitā // NsP_48.26 //
analyzed: bhū bhāge śānta dīpe sā saṃdhyā kāle su duḥkhitā

original: lalāṭe śvetacailaṃ tu baddhvā suṣvāpa bhāminī /
analyzed: lalāṭe śveta cailam tu baddhvā suṣvāpa bhāminī

original: mantribhiḥ saha kāryāṇi saṃmantrya sakalāni tu // NsP_48.27 //
analyzed: mantribhiḥ saha kāryāṇi saṃmantrya sakalāni tu

original: puṇyāhaḥsvastimāṅgalyaiḥ sthāpya rāmaṃ tu maṇḍale /
analyzed: puṇya ahar svasti māṅgalyaiḥ sthāpya rāmam tu maṇḍale

original: ṛṣibhis tu vasiṣṭhādyaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃbhāramaṇḍape // NsP_48.28 //
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ tu vasiṣṭha ādyaiḥ sārdham saṃbhāra maṇḍape

original: vṛddhijāgaraṇīyaiś ca sarvatas tūryanādite /
analyzed: vṛddhi jāgaraṇīyaiḥ ca sarvatas tūrya nādite

original: gītanṛtyasamakīrṇe śaṅkhakāhalaniḥsvanaiḥ // NsP_48.29 //
analyzed: gīta nṛtya sama kīrṇe śaṅkha kāhala niḥsvanaiḥ

original: svayaṃ daśarathas tatra sthitvā pratyāgataḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: svayam daśarathaḥ tatra sthitvā pratyāgataḥ punar

original: kaikeyyā veśmano dvāraṃ jaradbhiḥ parirakṣitam // NsP_48.30 //
analyzed: kaikeyyāḥ veśmanaḥ dvāram jaradbhiḥ parirakṣitam

original: rāmābhiṣekaṃ kaikeyīṃ vaktukāmaḥ sa pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: rāma abhiṣekam kaikeyīm vaktu kāmaḥ sa pārthivaḥ

original: kaikeyībhavanaṃ vīkṣya sāndhakāram athābravīt // NsP_48.31 //
analyzed: kaikeyī bhavanam vīkṣya sa andhakāram atha abravīt

original: andhakāram idaṃ kasmād adya te mandire priye /
analyzed: andhakāram idam kasmāt adya te mandire priye

original: rāmābhiṣekaṃ harṣāya antyajā api menire // NsP_48.32 //
analyzed: rāma abhiṣekam harṣāya antyajāḥ api menire

original: gṛhālaṃkaraṇaṃ kurvanty adya lokā manoharam /
analyzed: gṛha alaṃkaraṇam kurvanti adya lokāḥ manoharam

original: tvayādya na kṛtaṃ kasmād ity uktvā ca mahīpatiḥ // NsP_48.33 //
analyzed: tvayā adya na kṛtam kasmāt iti uktvā ca mahīpatiḥ

original: jvālayitvā gṛhe dīpān praviveśa gṛhaṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: jvālayitvā gṛhe dīpān praviveśa gṛham nṛpaḥ

original: aśobhanāṅgīṃ kaikeyīṃ svapatnīṃ patitāṃ bhuvi // NsP_48.34 //
analyzed: aśobhana aṅgīm kaikeyīm sva patnīm patitām bhuvi

original: dṛṣṭvā daśarathaḥ prāha tasyāḥ priyam idaṃ tv iti /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā daśarathaḥ prāha tasyāḥ priyam idam tu iti

original: āśliṣyotthāya tāṃ rājā śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ // NsP_48.35 //
analyzed: āśliṣya utthāya tām rājā śṛṇu me paramam vacaḥ

original: svamātur adhikāṃ nityaṃ yas te bhaktiṃ karoti vai /
analyzed: sva mātuḥ adhikām nityam yaḥ te bhaktim karoti vai

original: tasyābhiṣekaṃ rāmasya śvo bhaviṣyati śobhane // NsP_48.36 //
analyzed: tasya abhiṣekam rāmasya śvas bhaviṣyati śobhane

original: ityuktā pārthivenāpi kiṃcin novāca sā śubhā /
analyzed: iti uktā pārthivena api kiṃcid nā uvāca sā śubhā

original: muñcantī dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca roṣocchvāsaṃ muhur muhuḥ // NsP_48.37 //
analyzed: muñcantī dīrgham uṣṇam ca roṣa ucchvāsam muhur muhur

original: tasthāv āśliṣya hastābhyāṃ pārthivaḥ prāha roṣitām /
analyzed: tasthau āśliṣya hastābhyām pārthivaḥ prāha roṣitām

original: kiṃ te kaikeyi duḥkhasya kāraṇaṃ vada śobhane // NsP_48.38 //
analyzed: kim te kaikeyi duḥkhasya kāraṇam vada śobhane

original: vastrābharaṇaratnādi yad yad icchasi śobhane /
analyzed: vastra ābharaṇa ratna ādi yat yat icchasi śobhane

original: tat tvaṃ gṛhṇīṣva niḥśaṅkaṃ bhāṇḍārāt sukhinī bhava // NsP_48.39 //
analyzed: tat tvam gṛhṇīṣva niḥśaṅkam bhāṇḍārāt sukhinī bhava

original: bhāṇḍāreṇa mama śubhe śvo 'rthasiddhir bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: bhāṇḍāreṇa mama śubhe śvas rtha siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: yadābhiṣekaṃ saṃprāpte rāme rājīvalocane // NsP_48.40 //
analyzed: yadā abhiṣekam saṃprāpte rāme rājīva locane

original: bhāṇḍāgārasya me dvāraṃ mayā muktaṃ nirargalam /
analyzed: bhāṇḍāgārasya me dvāram mayā muktam nirargalam

original: bhaviṣyati punaḥ pūrṇaṃ rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // NsP_48.41 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati punar pūrṇam rāme rājyam praśāsati

original: bahu mānaya rāmasya abhiṣekaṃ mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: bahu mānaya rāmasya abhiṣekam mahātmanaḥ

original: ityuktā rājavaryeṇa kaikeyī pāpalakṣaṇā // NsP_48.42 //
analyzed: iti uktā rāja varyeṇa kaikeyī pāpa lakṣaṇā

original: kumatir nirghṛṇā duṣṭā kubjayā śikṣitābravīt /
analyzed: kumatiḥ nirghṛṇā duṣṭā kubjayā śikṣitā bravīt

original: rājānaṃ svapatiṃ vākyaṃ krūram atyantaniṣṭhuram // NsP_48.43 //
analyzed: rājānam sva patim vākyam krūram atyanta niṣṭhuram

original: ratnādi sakalaṃ yat te tan mamaiva na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: ratna ādi sakalam yat te tat mama eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: devāsuramahāyuddhe prītyā yan me varadvayam // NsP_48.44 //
analyzed: deva asura mahā yuddhe prītyā yat me vara dvayam

original: purā dattaṃ tvayā rājaṃs tad idānīṃ prayaccha me /
analyzed: purā dattam tvayā rājan tat idānīm prayaccha me

original: ityuktaḥ pārthivaḥ prāha kaikeyīm aśubhāṃ tadā // NsP_48.45 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ pārthivaḥ prāha kaikeyīm aśubhām tadā

original: adattam apy ahaṃ dāsye tava nānyasya vā śubhe /
analyzed: adattam api aham dāsye tava na anyasya vā śubhe

original: kiṃ me pratiśrutaṃ pūrvaṃ dattam eva mayā tava // NsP_48.46 //
analyzed: kim me pratiśrutam pūrvam dattam eva mayā tava

original: śubhāṅgī bhava kalyāṇi tyaja kopam anarthakam /
analyzed: śubha aṅgī bhava kalyāṇi tyaja kopam anarthakam

original: rāmābhiṣekajaṃ harṣaṃ bhajottiṣṭha sukhī bhava // NsP_48.47 //
analyzed: rāma abhiṣeka jam harṣam bhaja uttiṣṭha sukhī bhava

original: ityuktā rājavaryeṇa kaikeyī kalahapriyā /
analyzed: iti uktā rāja varyeṇa kaikeyī kalaha priyā

original: uvāca paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rājño maraṇakāraṇam // NsP_48.48 //
analyzed: uvāca paruṣam vākyam rājñaḥ maraṇa kāraṇam

original: varadvayaṃ pūrvadattaṃ yadi dāsyasi me vibho /
analyzed: vara dvayam pūrva dattam yadi dāsyasi me vibho

original: śvobhūte gacchatu vanaṃ rāmo 'yaṃ kośalātmajaḥ // NsP_48.49 //
analyzed: śvobhūte gacchatu vanam rāmaḥ yam kośala ātmajaḥ

original: dvādaśābdaṃ nivasatu tvadvākyād daṇḍake vane /
analyzed: dvādaśa abdam nivasatu tvad vākyāt daṇḍake vane

original: abhiṣekaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca bharatasya bhaviṣyati // NsP_48.50 //
analyzed: abhiṣekam ca rājyam ca bharatasya bhaviṣyati

original: ity ākarṇya sa kaikeyyā vacanaṃ ghoram apriyam /
analyzed: iti ākarṇya sa kaikeyyāḥ vacanam ghoram apriyam

original: papāta bhuvi niḥsaṃjño rājā sāpi vibhūṣitā // NsP_48.51 //
analyzed: papāta bhuvi niḥsaṃjñaḥ rājā sā api vibhūṣitā

original: rātriśeṣaṃ nayitvā tu prabhāte sā mudāvatī /
analyzed: rātri śeṣam nayitvā tu prabhāte sā mudāvatī

original: dūtaṃ sumantram āhaivaṃ rāma ānīyatām iti // NsP_48.52 //
analyzed: dūtam sumantram āha evam rāmaḥ ānīyatām iti

original: rāmas tu kṛtapuṇyāhaḥ kṛtasvastyayano dvijaiḥ /
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu kṛta puṇya ahaḥ kṛta svastyayanaḥ dvijaiḥ

original: yāgamaṇḍapamadhyasthaḥ śaṅkhatūryaravānvitaḥ // NsP_48.53 //
analyzed: yāga maṇḍapa madhya sthaḥ śaṅkha tūrya rava anvitaḥ

original: tam āsādya tato dūtaḥ praṇipatya puraḥsthitaḥ /
analyzed: tam āsādya tatas dūtaḥ praṇipatya puras sthitaḥ

original: rāma rāma mahābāho ājñāpayati te pitā // NsP_48.54 //
analyzed: rāma rāma mahā bāho ājñāpayati te pitā

original: drutam uttiṣṭha gaccha tvaṃ yatra tiṣṭhati te pitā /
analyzed: drutam uttiṣṭha gaccha tvam yatra tiṣṭhati te pitā

original: ityuktas tena dūtena śīghram utthāya rāghavaḥ // NsP_48.55 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tena dūtena śīghram utthāya rāghavaḥ

original: anujñāpya dvijān prāptaḥ kaikeyyā bhavanaṃ prati /
analyzed: anujñāpya dvijān prāptaḥ kaikeyyāḥ bhavanam prati

original: praviśantaṃ gṛhaṃ rāmaṃ kaikeyī prāha nirghṛṇā // NsP_48.56 //
analyzed: praviśantam gṛham rāmam kaikeyī prāha nirghṛṇā

original: pitus tava mataṃ vatsa idaṃ te prabravīmy aham /
analyzed: pituḥ tava matam vatsa idam te prabravīmi aham

original: vane vasa mahābāho gatvā tvaṃ dvādaśābdakam // NsP_48.57 //
analyzed: vane vasa mahā bāho gatvā tvam dvādaśa abdakam

original: adyaiva gamyatāṃ vīra tapase dhṛtamānasaḥ /
analyzed: adyā eva gamyatām vīra tapase dhṛta mānasaḥ

original: na cintyam anyathā vatsa ādarāt kuru me vacaḥ // NsP_48.58 //
analyzed: na cintyam anyathā vatsa ādarāt kuru me vacaḥ

original: etac chrutvā pitur vākyaṃ rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ /
analyzed: etat śrutvā pituḥ vākyam rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: tathety ājñāṃ gṛhītvāsau namaskṛtya ca tāv ubhau // NsP_48.59 //
analyzed: tathā iti ājñām gṛhītvā asau namaskṛtya ca tau ubhau

original: niṣkramya tadgṛhād rāmo dhanur ādāya veśmataḥ /
analyzed: niṣkramya tad gṛhāt rāmaḥ dhanuḥ ādāya veśmataḥ

original: kauśalyāṃ ca namaskṛtya sumitrāṃ gantum udyataḥ // NsP_48.60 //
analyzed: kauśalyām ca namaskṛtya sumitrām gantum udyataḥ

original: tac chrutvā tu tataḥ paurā duḥkhaśokapariplutāḥ /
analyzed: tat śrutvā tu tatas paurāḥ duḥkha śoka pariplutāḥ

original: vivyathuś cātha saumitriḥ kaikeyīṃ prati roṣitaḥ // NsP_48.61 //
analyzed: vivyathuḥ ca atha saumitriḥ kaikeyīm prati roṣitaḥ

original: tatas taṃ rāghavo dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ raktalocanam /
analyzed: tatas tam rāghavaḥ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam rakta locanam

original: vārayām_asa dharmajño dharmavāgbhir mahāmatiḥ // NsP_48.62 //
analyzed: vārayāmasa dharma jñaḥ dharma vāgbhiḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: tatas tu tatra ye vṛddhās tān praṇamya munīṃś ca saḥ /
analyzed: tatas tu tatra ye vṛddhāḥ tān praṇamya munīn ca saḥ

original: rāmo rathaṃ khinnasūtaṃ prasthānāyāruroha vai // NsP_48.63 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ ratham khinna sūtam prasthānāya āruroha vai

original: ātmīyaṃ sakalaṃ dravyaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo nṛpātmajaḥ /
analyzed: ātmīyam sakalam dravyam brāhmaṇebhyaḥ nṛpa ātmajaḥ

original: śraddhayā parayā dattvā vastrāṇi vividhāni ca // NsP_48.64 //
analyzed: śraddhayā parayā dattvā vastrāṇi vividhāni ca

original: tisraḥ śvaśrūḥ samāmantrya śvaśuraṃ ca visaṃjñitam /
analyzed: tisraḥ śvaśrūḥ samāmantrya śvaśuram ca visaṃjñitam

original: muñcantam aśrudhārāṇi netrayoḥ śokajāni ca // NsP_48.65 //
analyzed: muñcantam aśru dhārāṇi netrayoḥ śoka jāni ca

original: paśyatī sarvataḥ sītā cāruroha tathā ratham /
analyzed: paśyatī sarvatas sītā ca āruroha tathā ratham

original: ratham āruhya gacchantaṃ sītayā saha rāghavam // NsP_48.66 //
analyzed: ratham āruhya gacchantam sītayā saha rāghavam

original: dṛṣṭvā sumitrā vacanaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ cāha duḥkhitā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sumitrā vacanam lakṣmaṇam ca āha duḥkhitā

original: rāmaṃ daśarathaṃ viddhi māṃ viddhi janakātmajām // NsP_48.67 //
analyzed: rāmam daśaratham viddhi mām viddhi janakātmajām

original: ayodhyām aṭavīṃ viddhi vraja tābhyāṃ guṇākara /
analyzed: ayodhyām aṭavīm viddhi vraja tābhyām guṇa ākara

original: mātraivamukto dharmātmā stanakṣīrārdradehayā // NsP_48.68 //
analyzed: mātrā evam uktaḥ dharma ātmā stana kṣīra ārdra dehayā

original: tāṃ natvā cāruyānaṃ tam āruroha sa lakṣmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tām natvā cāru yānam tam āruroha sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: gacchato lakṣmaṇo bhrātā sītā caiva pativratā // NsP_48.69 //
analyzed: gacchataḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ bhrātā sītā ca eva pativratā

original: rāmasya pṛṣṭhato yātau purād dhīrau mahāmate /
analyzed: rāmasya pṛṣṭhatas yātau purāt dhīrau mahāmate

original: vidhicchinnābhiṣekaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam // NsP_48.70 //
analyzed: vidhi chinna abhiṣekam tam rāmam rājīva locanam

original: ayodhyāyā viniṣkrāntam anuyātāḥ purohitāḥ /
analyzed: ayodhyāyāḥ viniṣkrāntam anuyātāḥ purohitāḥ

original: mantriṇaḥ pauramukhyāś ca duḥkhena mahatānvitāḥ // NsP_48.71 //
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ paura mukhyāḥ ca duḥkhena mahatā anvitāḥ

original: taṃ ca prāpya hi gacchantaṃ rāmam ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: tam ca prāpya hi gacchantam rāmam ūcuḥ idam vacaḥ

original: rāma rāma mahābāho gantuṃ nārhasi śobhana // NsP_48.72 //
analyzed: rāma rāma mahā bāho gantum nā arhasi śobhana

original: rājann atra nivartasva vihāyāsmān kva gacchasi /
analyzed: rājan atra nivartasva vihāya asmān kva gacchasi

original: ityukto rāghavas tais tu tān uvāca dṛḍhavrataḥ // NsP_48.73 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ rāghavaḥ taiḥ tu tān uvāca dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: gacchadhvaṃ mantriṇaḥ paurā gacchadhvaṃ ca purodhasaḥ /
analyzed: gacchadhvam mantriṇaḥ paurāḥ gacchadhvam ca purodhasaḥ

original: pitrādeśaṃ mayā kāryam abhiyāsyāmi vai vanam // NsP_48.74 //
analyzed: pitṛ ādeśam mayā kāryam abhiyāsyāmi vai vanam

original: dvādaśābdaṃ vrataṃ caitan nītvāhaṃ daṇḍake vane /
analyzed: dvādaśa abdam vratam ca etat nītvā aham daṇḍake vane

original: āgacchāmi pituḥ pādaṃ mātṝṇāṃ draṣṭum añjasā // NsP_48.75 //
analyzed: āgacchāmi pituḥ pādam mātṝṇām draṣṭum añjasā

original: ity uktvā tāñ jagāmātha rāmaḥ satyaparāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktvā tām jagāma atha rāmaḥ satya parāyaṇaḥ

original: taṃ gacchantaṃ punar yātāḥ pṛṣṭhato duḥkhitā janāḥ // NsP_48.76 //
analyzed: tam gacchantam punar yātāḥ pṛṣṭhatas duḥkhitāḥ janāḥ

original: punaḥ prāha sa kākutstho gacchadhvaṃ nagarīm imām /
analyzed: punar prāha sa kākutsthaḥ gacchadhvam nagarīm imām

original: mātṝś ca pitaraṃ caiva śatrughnaṃ nagarīm imām // NsP_48.77 //
analyzed: mātṝḥ ca pitaram ca eva śatrughnam nagarīm imām

original: prajāḥ samastās tatrasthā rājyaṃ bharatam eva ca /
analyzed: prajāḥ samastāḥ tatrasthāḥ rājyam bharatam eva ca

original: pālayadhvaṃ mahābhāgās tapase yāmy ahaṃ vanam // NsP_48.78 //
analyzed: pālayadhvam mahābhāgāḥ tapase yāmi aham vanam

original: atha lakṣmaṇam āhedaṃ vacanaṃ rāghavas tadā /
analyzed: atha lakṣmaṇam āha idam vacanam rāghavaḥ tadā

original: sītām arpaya rājānaṃ janakaṃ mithileśvaram // NsP_48.79 //
analyzed: sītām arpaya rājānam janakam mithilā īśvaram

original: pitṛmātṛvaśe tiṣṭha gaccha lakṣmaṇa yāmy aham /
analyzed: pitṛ mātṛ vaśe tiṣṭha gaccha lakṣmaṇa yāmi aham

original: ityuktaḥ prāha dharmātmā lakṣmaṇo bhrātṛvatsalaḥ // NsP_48.80 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ prāha dharma ātmā lakṣmaṇaḥ bhrātṛ vatsalaḥ

original: maivam ājñāpaya vibho mām adya karuṇākara /
analyzed: mā evam ājñāpaya vibho mām adya karuṇākara

original: gantum icchasi yatra tvam avaśyaṃ tatra yāmy aham // NsP_48.81 //
analyzed: gantum icchasi yatra tvam avaśyam tatra yāmi aham

original: ityukto lakṣmaṇenāsau sītāṃ tām āha rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ lakṣmaṇena asau sītām tām āha rāghavaḥ

original: sīte gaccha mamādeśāt pitaraṃ prati śobhane // NsP_48.82 //
analyzed: sīte gaccha mama ādeśāt pitaram prati śobhane

original: sumitrāyā gṛhe cāpi kauśalyāyāḥ sumadhyame /
analyzed: sumitrāyāḥ gṛhe ca api kauśalyāyāḥ sumadhyame

original: nivartasva hi tāvat tvaṃ yāvad āgamanaṃ mama // NsP_48.83 //
analyzed: nivartasva hi tāvat tvam yāvat āgamanam mama

original: ityuktā rāghavenāpi sītā prāha kṛtāñjaliḥ /
analyzed: iti uktā rāghavena api sītā prāha kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: yatra gatvā vane vāsaṃ tvaṃ karoṣi mahābhuja // NsP_48.84 //
analyzed: yatra gatvā vane vāsam tvam karoṣi mahā bhuja

original: tatra gatvā tvayā sārdhaṃ vasāmy aham ariṃdama /
analyzed: tatra gatvā tvayā sārdham vasāmi aham ariṃdama

original: viyogaṃ no sahe rājaṃs tvayā satyavatā kvacit // NsP_48.85 //
analyzed: viyogam no sahe rājan tvayā satyavatā kvacid

original: atas tvāṃ prārthayiṣyāmi dayāṃ kuru mama prabho /
analyzed: atas tvām prārthayiṣyāmi dayām kuru mama prabho

original: gantum icchasi yatra tvam avaśyaṃ tatra yāmy aham // NsP_48.86 //
analyzed: gantum icchasi yatra tvam avaśyam tatra yāmi aham

original: nānāyānair upagatāñ janān vīkṣya sa pṛṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: nānā yānaiḥ upagatām janān vīkṣya sa pṛṣṭhatas

original: yoṣitāṃ ca gaṇān rāmo vārayām_asa dharmavit // NsP_48.87 //
analyzed: yoṣitām ca gaṇān rāmaḥ vārayāmasa dharma vid

original: nivṛttya sthīyatāṃ svairam ayodhyāyāṃ janāḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: nivṛttya sthīyatām svairam ayodhyāyām janāḥ striyaḥ

original: gatvāhaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ tapase dhṛtamānasaḥ // NsP_48.88 //
analyzed: gatvā aham daṇḍaka araṇyam tapase dhṛta mānasaḥ

original: katipayābdād āyāsye nānyathā satyam īritam /
analyzed: katipaya abdāt āyāsye na anyathā satyam īritam

original: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca svabhāryayā // NsP_48.89 //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca sva bhāryayā

original: janān nivartya rāmo 'sau jagāma ca guhāśramam /
analyzed: janān nivartya sau jagāma ca guhā āśramam

original: guhas tu rāmabhakto 'sau svabhāvād eva vaiṣṇavaḥ // NsP_48.90 //
analyzed: guhaḥ tu sau svabhāvāt eva vaiṣṇavaḥ

original: kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā kiṃ kartavyam iti sthitaḥ /
analyzed: kṛta añjali puṭaḥ bhūtvā kim kartavyam iti sthitaḥ

original: mahatā tapasaānītā guruṇā yā hi vaḥ purā // NsP_48.91 //
analyzed: mahatā tapasā ānītāḥ guruṇā yāḥ hi vaḥ purā

original: bhāgīrathena yā bhūmiṃ sarvapāpaharā śubhā /
analyzed: bhāgīrathena yā bhūmim sarva pāpa harā śubhā

original: nānāmunijanair juṣṭā kūrmamatsyasamākulā // NsP_48.92 //
analyzed: nānā muni janaiḥ juṣṭā kūrma matsya samākulā

original: gaṅgā tuṅgormimālāḍhyā sphaṭikābhajalāvahā /
guhopanītanāvā tu tāṃ gaṅgāṃ sa mahādyutiḥ // NsP_48.93 //
analyzed: guhā upanīta nāvā tu tām gaṅgām sa mahā dyutiḥ

original: uttīrya bhagavān rāmo bharadvājāśramaṃ subham /
analyzed: uttīrya bhagavān rāmaḥ bharadvāja āśramam subham

original: prayāge tu tatas tasmin snātvā tīrthe yathāvidhi // NsP_48.94 //
analyzed: prayāge tu tatas tasmin snātvā tīrthe yathāvidhi

original: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā rāghavaḥ sītayā saha /
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā rāghavaḥ sītayā saha

original: bharadvājāśrame tatra viśrāntas tena pūjitaḥ // NsP_48.95 //
analyzed: bharadvāja āśrame tatra viśrāntaḥ tena pūjitaḥ

original: tataḥ prabhāte vimale tam anujñāpya rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte vimale tam anujñāpya rāghavaḥ

original: bharadvājoktamārgeṇa citrakūṭaṃ śanair yayau // NsP_48.96 //
analyzed: bharadvāja ukta mārgeṇa citrakūṭam śanais yayau

original: nānādrumalatākīrṇaṃ puṇyatīrtham anuttamam /
analyzed: nānā druma latā ākīrṇam puṇya tīrtham anuttamam

original: tāpasaṃ veṣam āsthāya jahnukanyām atītya vai // NsP_48.97 //
analyzed: tāpasam veṣam āsthāya jahnukanyām atītya vai

original: gate rāme sabhārye tu saha bhrātrā sasārathau /
analyzed: gate rāme sa bhārye tu saha bhrātrā sa sārathau

original: ayodhyām avasan bhūpa naṣṭasobhāṃ suduḥkhitāḥ // NsP_48.98 //
analyzed: ayodhyām avasan bhūpa naṣṭa sobhām su duḥkhitāḥ

original: naṣṭasaṃjño daśarathaḥ śrutvā vacanam apriyam /
analyzed: naṣṭa saṃjñaḥ daśarathaḥ śrutvā vacanam apriyam

original: rāmapravāsajananaṃ kaikeyyā mukhaniḥsṛtam // NsP_48.99 //
analyzed: rāma pravāsa jananam kaikeyyāḥ mukha niḥsṛtam

original: labdhasaṃjñaḥ kṣaṇād rājā rāma rāmeti cukruśe /
analyzed: labdha saṃjñaḥ kṣaṇāt rājā rāma rāma iti cukruśe

original: kaikeyy uvāca bhūpālaṃ bharataṃ cābhiṣecaya // NsP_48.100 //
analyzed: kaikeyī uvāca bhūpālam bharatam ca abhiṣecaya

original: sītālakṣmaṇasaṃyukto rāmacandro vanaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: sītā lakṣmaṇa saṃyuktaḥ rāmacandraḥ vanam gataḥ

original: putraśokābhisaṃtapto rājā daśarathas tadā // NsP_48.101 //
analyzed: putra śoka abhisaṃtaptaḥ rājā daśarathaḥ tadā

original: vihāya dehaṃ duḥkhena devalokaṃ gatas tadā /
analyzed: vihāya deham duḥkhena deva lokam gataḥ tadā

original: tatas tasya mahāpuryyām ayodhyāyām ariṃdama // NsP_48.102 //
analyzed: tatas tasya mahā puryyām ayodhyāyām ariṃdama

original: rurudur duḥkhaśokārtā janāḥ sarve ca yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: ruruduḥ duḥkha śoka ārtāḥ janāḥ sarve ca yoṣitaḥ

original: kauśalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī kaṣṭakāriṇī // NsP_48.103 //
analyzed: kauśalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī kaṣṭa kāriṇī

original: parivārya mṛtaṃ tatra rurudus tāḥ patiṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: parivārya mṛtam tatra ruruduḥ tāḥ patim tatas

original: tataḥ purohitas tatra vasiṣṭhaḥ sarvadharmavit // NsP_48.104 //
analyzed: tatas purohitaḥ tatra vasiṣṭhaḥ sarva dharma vid

original: tailadroṇyāṃ vinikṣipya mṛtaṃ rajakalevaram /
analyzed: taila droṇyām vinikṣipya mṛtam raja kalevaram

original: dūtaṃ vai preṣayām_asa sahamantrigaṇaiḥ sthitaḥ // NsP_48.105 //
analyzed: dūtam vai preṣayāmasa saha mantri gaṇaiḥ sthitaḥ

original: sa gatvā yatra bharataḥ śatrughnena saha sthitaḥ /
analyzed: sa gatvā yatra bharataḥ śatrughnena saha sthitaḥ

original: tatra prāpya tathā vārtā saṃnivartya nṛpātmajau // NsP_48.106 //
analyzed: tatra prāpya tathā vārtā saṃnivartya nṛpa ātmajau

original: tāv ānīya tataḥ śīghram ayodhyāṃ punar āgataḥ /
analyzed: tau ānīya tatas śīghram ayodhyām punar āgataḥ

original: krūrāṇi dṛṣṭvā bharato nimittāni ca vai pathi // NsP_48.107 //
analyzed: krūrāṇi dṛṣṭvā bharataḥ nimittāni ca vai pathi

original: viparītaṃ tv ayodhyāyām iti mene sa pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: viparītam tu ayodhyāyām iti mene sa pārthivaḥ

original: niḥśobhāṃ nirgataśrīkāṃ duḥkhaśokānvitāṃ purīm // NsP_48.108 //
analyzed: niḥśobhām nirgata śrīkām duḥkha śoka anvitām purīm

original: kaikeyyagnivinirdagdhām ayodhyāṃ praviveśa saḥ /
analyzed: kaikeyī agni vinirdagdhām ayodhyām praviveśa saḥ

original: duḥkhānvitā janāḥ sarve tau dṛṣṭvā rurudur bhṛśam // NsP_48.109 //
analyzed: duḥkha anvitāḥ janāḥ sarve tau dṛṣṭvā ruruduḥ bhṛśam

original: hā tāta rāma hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: hā tāta rāma hā sīte lakṣmaṇa iti punar punar

original: ruroda bharatas tatra śatrughnaś ca suduḥkhitaḥ // NsP_48.110 //
analyzed: ruroda bharataḥ tatra śatrughnaḥ ca su duḥkhitaḥ

original: kaikeyyās tatkṣaṇāc chrutvā cukrodha bharatas tadā /
analyzed: kaikeyyāḥ tad kṣaṇāt śrutvā cukrodha bharataḥ tadā

original: duṣṭā tvaṃ duṣṭacittā ca yayā rāmaḥ pravāsitaḥ // NsP_48.111 //
analyzed: duṣṭā tvam duṣṭa cittā ca yayā rāmaḥ pravāsitaḥ

original: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā rāghavaḥ sītayā vanam /
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā rāghavaḥ sītayā vanam

original: sāhasaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ duṣṭe tvayā sadyo 'lpabhāgyayā // NsP_48.112 //
analyzed: sāhasam kim kṛtam duṣṭe tvayā sadyas lpabhāgyayā

original: udvāsya sītayā rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā /
analyzed: udvāsya sītayā rāmam lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā

original: mamaiva putraṃ rājānaṃ karotv iti matis tava // NsP_48.113 //
analyzed: mama eva putram rājānam karotu iti matiḥ tava

original: duṣṭāyā naṣṭabhāgyāyāḥ putro 'haṃ bhāgyavarjitaḥ /
analyzed: duṣṭāyāḥ naṣṭa bhāgyāyāḥ putraḥ ham bhāgya varjitaḥ

original: bhrātrā rāmeṇa rahito nāhaṃ rājyaṃ karomi vai // NsP_48.114 //
analyzed: bhrātrā rāmeṇa rahitaḥ na aham rājyam karomi vai

original: yatra rāmo naravyāghraḥ padmapatrāyatekṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: yatra rāmaḥ nara vyāghraḥ padma patra āyata īkṣaṇaḥ

original: dharmajño sarvaśāstrajño matimān bandhuvatsalaḥ // NsP_48.115 //
analyzed: sarva śāstra jñaḥ matimān bandhu vatsalaḥ

original: sītā ca yatra vaidehī niyamavratacāriṇī /
analyzed: sītā ca yatra vaidehī niyama vrata cāriṇī

original: pativratā mahābhāgā sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyutā // NsP_48.116 //
analyzed: pativratā mahābhāgā sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutā

original: lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāvīryo guṇavān bhrātṛvatsalaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā vīryaḥ guṇavān bhrātṛ vatsalaḥ

original: tatra yāsyāmi kaikeyi mahat pāpaṃ tvayā kṛtam // NsP_48.117 //
analyzed: tatra yāsyāmi kaikeyi mahat pāpam tvayā kṛtam

original: rāma eva mama bhrātā jyeṣṭho matimatāṃ varaḥ /
analyzed: rāmaḥ eva mama bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ matimatām varaḥ

original: sa eva rājā duṣṭātme bhṛtyo 'haṃ tasya vai sadā // NsP_48.118 //
analyzed: saḥ eva rājā duṣṭa ātme bhṛtyaḥ ham tasya vai sadā

original: ity uktvā mātaraṃ tatra ruroda bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktvā mātaram tatra ruroda bhṛśa duḥkhitaḥ

original: hā rājan pṛthivīpāla māṃ vihāya suduḥkhitam // NsP_48.119 //
analyzed: hā rājan pṛthivīpāla mām vihāya su duḥkhitam

original: kva gato 'sy adya vai tāta kiṃ karomīha tad vada /
analyzed: kva gataḥ sī adya vai tāta kim karomi iha tat vada

original: bhrātā pitrā samaḥ kvāste jyeṣṭho me karunākaraḥ // NsP_48.120 //
analyzed: bhrātā pitrā samaḥ kva āste jyeṣṭhaḥ me karunākaraḥ

original: sītā ca mātṛtulyā me kva gato lakṣmaṇaś ca ha /
analyzed: sītā ca mātṛ tulyā me kva gataḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca ha

original: ity evaṃ vilapantaṃ taṃ bharataṃ mantribhiḥ saha // NsP_48.121 //
analyzed: iti evam vilapantam tam bharatam mantribhiḥ saha

original: vasiṣṭho bhagavān āha kālakarmavibhāgavit /
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān āha kāla karma vibhāga vid

original: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha vatsa tvaṃ na śokaṃ kartum arhasi // NsP_48.122 //
analyzed: uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha vatsa tvam na śokam kartum arhasi

original: karmakālavaśād eva pitā te svargam āsthitaḥ /
analyzed: karma kāla vaśāt eva pitā te svargam āsthitaḥ

original: tasya saṃskārakāryāṇi karmāṇi kuru śobhana // NsP_48.123 //
analyzed: tasya saṃskāra kāryāṇi karmāṇi kuru śobhana

original: rāmo 'pi duṣṭanāśāya śiṣṭānāṃ pālanāya ca /
analyzed: duṣṭa nāśāya śiṣṭānām pālanāya ca

original: avatīrṇo jagatsvāmī svāṃśena bhuvi mādhavaḥ // NsP_48.124 //
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ jagatsvāmī sva aṃśena bhuvi mādhavaḥ

original: prāyas tatrāsti rāmeṇa kartavyaṃ lakṣmaṇena ca /
analyzed: prāyas tatra asti rāmeṇa kartavyam lakṣmaṇena ca

original: yatrāsau bhagavān vīraḥ karmaṇā tena coditaḥ // NsP_48.125 //
analyzed: yatra asau bhagavān vīraḥ karmaṇā tena coditaḥ

original: tat kṛtvā punar āyāti rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ /
analyzed: tat kṛtvā punar āyāti rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: ityukto bharatas tena vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā // NsP_48.126 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ bharataḥ tena vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā

original: saṃskāraṃ lambhayām_asa vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā /
analyzed: saṃskāram lambhayāmasa vidhi dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: agnihotrāgninā dagdhvā pitur dehaṃ vidhānataḥ // NsP_48.127 //
analyzed: agnihotra agninā dagdhvā pituḥ deham vidhānataḥ

original: snātvā sarayvāḥ salile kṛtvā tasyodakakriyām /
analyzed: snātvā sarayvāḥ salile kṛtvā tasya udakakriyām

original: śatrughnena saha śrīmān mātṛbhir bāndhavaiḥ saha // NsP_48.128 //
analyzed: śatrughnena saha śrīmān mātṛbhiḥ bāndhavaiḥ saha

original: tasyaurdhvadehikaṃ kṛtvā mantriṇā mantrināyakaḥ /
analyzed: tasya aurdhvadehikam kṛtvā mantriṇā mantri nāyakaḥ

original: hastyaśvarathapattībhiḥ saha prāyān mahāmatiḥ // NsP_48.129 //
analyzed: hasti aśva ratha pattībhiḥ saha prāyāt mahāmatiḥ

original: bharato rāmam anveṣṭuṃ rāmamārgeṇa sattamaḥ /
analyzed: bharataḥ rāmam anveṣṭum rāma mārgeṇa sattamaḥ

original: tam āyāntaṃ mahāsenaṃ rāmasyānuvirodhinam // NsP_48.130 //
analyzed: tam āyāntam mahāsenam rāmasya anuvirodhinam

original: matvā taṃ bharataṃ śatruṃ rāmabhakto guhas tadā /
analyzed: matvā tam bharatam śatrum rāma bhaktaḥ guhaḥ tadā

original: svaṃ sainyaṃ vartulaṃ kṛtvā saṃnaddhaḥ kavacī rathī // NsP_48.131 //
analyzed: svam sainyam vartulam kṛtvā saṃnaddhaḥ kavacī rathī

original: mahābalaparīvāro rurodha bharataṃ pathi // NsP_48.132 //
analyzed: mahā bala parīvāraḥ rurodha bharatam pathi

original: sabhrātṛkaṃ sabhāryaṃ me rāmaṃ svāminam uttamam /
analyzed: sa bhrātṛkam sa bhāryam me rāmam svāminam uttamam

original: prāpayas tvaṃ vanaṃ duṣṭa sāṃprataṃ hantum icchasi // NsP_48.133 //
analyzed: prāpayaḥ tvam vanam duṣṭa sāṃpratam hantum icchasi

original: gamiṣyasi durātmaṃs tvaṃ senayā saha durmate /
analyzed: gamiṣyasi durātman tvam senayā saha durmate

original: ityukto bharatas tatra guhena nṛpanandanaḥ // NsP_48.134 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ bharataḥ tatra guhena nṛpa nandanaḥ

original: tam uvāca vinītātmā rāmāyātha kṛtāñjaliḥ /
analyzed: tam uvāca vinīta ātmā rāmāya atha kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: yathā tvaṃ rāmabhakto 'si tathāham api bhaktimān // NsP_48.135 //
analyzed: yathā tvam rāma bhaktaḥ si tathā aham api bhaktimān

original: proṣite mayi kaikeyyā kṛtam etan mahāmate /
analyzed: proṣite mayi kaikeyyā kṛtam etat mahāmate

original: rāmasyānayanārthāya vrajāmy adya mahāmate // NsP_48.136 //
analyzed: rāmasya ānayana arthāya vrajāmi adya mahāmate

original: satyapūrvaṃ gamiṣyāmi panthānaṃ dehi me guha /
analyzed: satya pūrvam gamiṣyāmi panthānam dehi me guha

original: iti viśvāsam ānīya jāhnavīṃ tena tāritaḥ // NsP_48.137 //
analyzed: iti viśvāsam ānīya jāhnavīm tena tāritaḥ

original: naukāvṛndair anekais tu snātvāsau jāhnavījale /
analyzed: naukā vṛndaiḥ anekaiḥ tu snātvā asau jāhnavī jale

original: bharadvājāśramaṃ prāpto bharatas taṃ mahāmunim // NsP_48.138 //
analyzed: bharadvāja āśramam prāptaḥ bharataḥ tam mahā munim

original: praṇamya śirasā tasmai yathāvṛttam uvāca ha /
analyzed: praṇamya śirasā tasmai yathāvṛttam uvāca ha

original: bharadvājo 'pi taṃ prāha kālena kṛtam īdṛśam // NsP_48.139 //
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ pi tam prāha kālena kṛtam īdṛśam

original: duḥkhaṃ na tāvat kartavyaṃ rāmārthe 'pi tvayādhunā /
analyzed: duḥkham na tāvat kartavyam rāma arthe tvayā adhunā

original: vartate citrakūṭe 'sau rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ // NsP_48.140 //
analyzed: vartate citrakūṭe sau rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ

original: tvayi tatra gate vāpi prāyo 'sau nāgamiṣyati /
analyzed: tvayi tatra gate vā api prāyo sau nā āgamiṣyati

original: tathāpi tatra gaccha tvaṃ yas asau vakti tat kuru // NsP_48.141 //
analyzed: tathā api tatra gaccha tvam yaḥ asau vakti tat kuru

original: rāmas tu sītayā sārdhaṃ vanakhaṇḍe sthitaḥ śubhe /
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu sītayā sārdham vanakhaṇḍe sthitaḥ śubhe

original: lakṣmaṇas tu mahāvīryo duṣṭālokanatatparaḥ // NsP_48.142 //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ tu mahā vīryaḥ duṣṭa ālokana tatparaḥ

original: ityukto bharatas tatra bhāradvājena dhīmatā /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ bharataḥ tatra bhāradvājena dhīmatā

original: uttīrya yamunāṃ yātaś citrakūṭaṃ mahān agam // NsP_48.143 //
analyzed: uttīrya yamunām yātaḥ citrakūṭam mahān agam

original: sthito 'sau dṛṣṭavān dūrāt sadhūlīṃ cottarāṃ diśam /
analyzed: sthitaḥ u sau dṛṣṭavān dūrāt sa dhūlīm ca uttarām diśam

original: rāmāya kathayitvāsa tadādeśāt tu lakṣmaṇaḥ // NsP_48.144 //
analyzed: rāmāya kathayitvā āsa tad ādeśāt tu lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: vṛkṣam āruhya medhāvī vīkṣamāṇaḥ prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: vṛkṣam āruhya medhāvī vīkṣamāṇaḥ prayatnataḥ

original: sa tato dṛṣṭavān hṛṣṭām āyāntīṃ mahatīṃ camūm // NsP_48.145 //
analyzed: sa tatas dṛṣṭavān hṛṣṭām āyāntīm mahatīm camūm

original: hastyaśvarathasaṃyuktāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmam athābravīt /
analyzed: hasti aśva ratha saṃyuktām dṛṣṭvā rāmam atha abravīt

original: he bhrātas tvaṃ mahābāho sītāpārśve sthiro bhava // NsP_48.146 //
analyzed: he bhrātar tvam mahā bāho sītā pārśve sthiraḥ bhava

original: bhūpo 'sti balavān kaścid *dhastyaśvarathapattibhiḥ /
analyzed: bhūpaḥ u sti balavān kaścid hasti aśva ratha pattibhiḥ

original: ity ākarṇya vacas tasya lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ // NsP_48.147 //
analyzed: iti ākarṇya vacaḥ tasya lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ

original: rāmas tam abravīd vīro vīraṃ satyaparākramaḥ /
analyzed: rāmaḥ tam abravīt vīraḥ vīram satya parākramaḥ

original: prāyeṇa bharato 'smākaṃ draṣṭum āyāti lakṣmaṇa // NsP_48.148 //
analyzed: prāyeṇa bharataḥ smākam draṣṭum āyāti lakṣmaṇa

original: ity evaṃ vadatas tasya rāmasya viditātmanaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam vadataḥ tasya rāmasya vidita ātmanaḥ

original: ārāt saṃsthāpya senāṃ tāṃ bharato vinayānvitaḥ // NsP_48.149 //
analyzed: ārāt saṃsthāpya senām tām bharataḥ vinaya anvitaḥ

original: brāhmaṇair mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ rudann āgatya pādayoḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaiḥ mantribhiḥ sārdham rudan āgatya pādayoḥ

original: rāmasya nipapātātha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇasya ca // NsP_48.150 //
analyzed: rāmasya nipapāta atha vaidehyāḥ lakṣmaṇasya ca

original: mantriṇo mātṛvargaś ca snigdhabandhusuhṛjjanāḥ /
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ mātṛ vargaḥ ca snigdha bandhu suhṛd janāḥ

original: parivārya tato rāmaṃ ruruduḥ śokakātarāḥ // NsP_48.151 //
analyzed: parivārya tatas rāmam ruruduḥ śoka kātarāḥ

original: svaryātaṃ pitaraṃ jñātvā tato rāmo mahāmatiḥ /
analyzed: svaryātam pitaram jñātvā tatas rāmaḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyātha samanvitaḥ // NsP_48.152 //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā atha samanvitaḥ

original: snātvā malāpahe tīrthe dattvā ca salilāñ jalim /
analyzed: snātvā malāpahe tīrthe dattvā ca salilām jalim

original: mātrādīn abhivādyātha rāmo duḥkhasamanvitaḥ // NsP_48.153 //
analyzed: mātrā ādīn abhivādya atha rāmaḥ duḥkha samanvitaḥ

original: uvāca bharataṃ rājan duḥkhena mahatānvitam /
analyzed: uvāca bharatam rājan duḥkhena mahatā anvitam

original: ayodhyāṃ gaccha bharata itaḥ śīghraṃ mahāmate // NsP_48.154 //
analyzed: ayodhyām gaccha bharataḥ itas śīghram mahāmate

original: rājñā vihīnāṃ nagarīṃ anāthāṃ paripālaya /
analyzed: rājñā vihīnām nagarīm anāthām paripālaya

original: ityukto bharato prāha rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam // NsP_48.155 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ bharataḥ prāha rāmam rājīva locanam

original: tvām ṛte puruṣavyāghra na yāsye 'ham ito dhruvam /
analyzed: tvām ṛte puruṣa vyāghra na yāsye ham itas dhruvam

original: yatra tvaṃ tatra yāsyāmi vaidehī lakṣmaṇo yathā // NsP_48.156 //
analyzed: yatra tvam tatra yāsyāmi vaidehī lakṣmaṇaḥ yathā

original: ity ākarṇya punaḥ prāha bharataṃ purataḥ sthitam /
analyzed: iti ākarṇya punar prāha bharatam puratas sthitam

original: nṛṇāṃ pitṛsamo jyeṣṭhaḥ svadharmam anuvartinām // NsP_48.157 //
analyzed: nṛṇām pitṛ samaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ svadharmam anuvartinām

original: yathā na laṅghyaṃ vacanaṃ mayā pitṛmukheritam /
analyzed: yathā na laṅghyam vacanam mayā pitṛ mukha īritam

original: tathā tvayā na laṅghyaṃ syād vacanaṃ mama sattama // NsP_48.158 //
analyzed: tathā tvayā na laṅghyam syāt vacanam mama sattama

original: matsamīpād ito gatvā prajās tvaṃ paripālaya /
analyzed: mad samīpāt itas gatvā prajāḥ tvam paripālaya

original: dvādaśābdikam etan me vrataṃ pitṛmukheritam // NsP_48.159 //
analyzed: dvādaśa ābdikam etat me vratam pitṛ mukha īritam

original: tad araṇye caritvā tu āgamisyāmi te 'ntikam /
analyzed: tat araṇye caritvā tu āgamisyāmi te ntikam

original: gaccha tiṣṭha mamādeśe na duḥkhaṃ kartum arhasi // NsP_48.160 //
analyzed: gaccha tiṣṭha mama ādeśe na duḥkham kartum arhasi

original: ityukto bharataḥ prāha bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ bharataḥ prāha bāṣpa paryākula īkṣaṇaḥ

original: yathā pitā tathā tvaṃ me nātra karyā vicāraṇā // NsP_48.161 //
analyzed: yathā pitā tathā tvam me na atra karyā vicāraṇā

original: tavādeśān mayā kāryaṃ dehi tvaṃ pāduke_2 mama /
analyzed: tava ādeśāt mayā kāryam dehi tvam pāduke mama

original: nandigrāme vasiṣye 'haṃ pāduke_2 dvādaśābdikam // NsP_48.162 //
analyzed: nandigrāme vasiṣye haṃ pāduke dvādaśa ābdikam

original: tvadveṣam eva madveṣaṃ tvadvrataṃ me mahāvratam /
analyzed: tvad veṣam eva mad veṣam tvad vratam me mahāvratam

original: tvaṃ dvādaśābdikād ūrdhvaṃ yadi nāyāsi sattama // NsP_48.163 //
analyzed: tvam dvādaśa ābdikāt ūrdhvam yadi na āyāsi sattama

original: tato havir yathā cāgnau pradhakṣyāmi kalevaram /
analyzed: tatas haviḥ yathā ca agnau pradhakṣyāmi kalevaram

original: ity evaṃ śapathaṃ kṛtvā bharato hi suduḥkhitaḥ // NsP_48.164 //
analyzed: iti evam śapatham kṛtvā bharataḥ hi su duḥkhitaḥ

original: bahu pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā namaskṛtya ca rāghavam /
analyzed: bahu pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā namaskṛtya ca rāghavam

original: pāduke_2 śirasā sthāpya bharataḥ prasthitaḥ śanaiḥ // NsP_48.165 //
analyzed: pāduke śirasā sthāpya bharataḥ prasthitaḥ śanais

original: sa kurvan bhrātur ādeśaṃ nandigrāme sthito vaśī /
analyzed: sa kurvan bhrātuḥ ādeśam nandigrāme sthitaḥ vaśī

original: tapasvī niyatāhāraḥ śākamūlaphalāśanaḥ // NsP_48.166 //
analyzed: tapasvī niyata āhāraḥ śāka mūla phala aśanaḥ

original: jaṭākalāpaṃ śirasā ca bibhrat tvacaś ca vārkṣīḥ kila vanyabhojī /
analyzed: jaṭā kalāpam śirasā ca bibhrat tvacaḥ ca vārkṣīḥ kila vanya bhojī

original: rāmasya vākyādarato hṛdi sthitaṃ babhāra bhūbhāram aninditātmā // NsP_48.167 //
analyzed: rāmasya vākya ādarataḥ hṛdi sthitam babhāra bhū bhāram anindita ātmā

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe śrīrāmaprādurbhāve aṣṭacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 48 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe śrī rāmaprādurbhāve aṣṭacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: gate 'tha bharate tasmin rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ /
analyzed: gate tha bharate tasmin rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā bhāryayā sītayā saha // NsP_49.1 //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā bhāryayā sītayā saha

original: śākamūlaphalāhāro vicacāra mahāvane /
analyzed: śāka mūla phala āhāraḥ vicacāra mahā vane

original: kadācil lakṣmaṇam ṛte rāmadevaḥ pratāpavān // NsP_49.2 //
analyzed: kadācid lakṣmaṇam ṛte rāmadevaḥ pratāpavān

original: citrakūṭavanoddeśe vaidehyutsaṅgam āśritaḥ /
analyzed: citrakūṭa vana uddeśe vaidehī utsaṅgam āśritaḥ

original: suṣvāpa sa muhūrtaṃ tu tataḥ kāko durātmavān // NsP_49.3 //
analyzed: suṣvāpa sa muhūrtam tu tatas kākaḥ durātmavān

original: sītābhimukham abhyetya vidadāra stanāntaram /
analyzed: sītā abhimukham abhyetya vidadāra stanāntaram

original: vidārya vṛkṣam āruhya sthito 'sau vāyasādhamaḥ // NsP_49.4 //
analyzed: vidārya vṛkṣam āruhya sthitaḥ sau vāyasa adhamaḥ

original: tataḥ prabuddho rāmo 'sau dṛṣṭvā raktaṃ stanāntare /
analyzed: tatas prabuddhaḥ dṛṣṭvā raktam stanāntare

original: śokāviṣṭāṃ tu sītāṃ tām uvāca kamalekṣaṇaḥ // NsP_49.5 //
analyzed: śoka āviṣṭām tu sītām tām uvāca kamala īkṣaṇaḥ

original: vada stanāntare bhadre tava raktasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: vada stanāntare bhadre tava raktasya kāraṇam

original: ityuktā sā ca taṃ prāha bhartāraṃ vinayānvitā // NsP_49.6 //
analyzed: iti uktā sā ca tam prāha bhartāram vinaya anvitā

original: paśya rājendra vṛkṣāgre vāyasaṃ duṣṭaceṣṭitam /
analyzed: paśya rāja indra vṛkṣa agre vāyasam duṣṭa ceṣṭitam

original: anenaiva kṛtaṃ karma supte tvayi mahāmate // NsP_49.7 //
analyzed: anena eva kṛtam karma supte tvayi mahāmate

original: rāmo 'pi dṛṣṭavān kākaṃ tasmin krodham athākarot /
analyzed: rāmaḥ pi dṛṣṭavān kākam tasmin krodham atha akarot

original: iṣīkāstraṃ samādhaya brahmāstreṇābhimantritam // NsP_49.8 //
analyzed: iṣīkā astram brahmāstreṇa abhimantritam

original: kākam uddiśya cikṣepa so 'py adhāvad bhayānvitaḥ /
analyzed: kākam uddiśya cikṣepa saḥ pi adhāvat bhaya anvitaḥ

original: sa tv indrasya suto rājann indralokaṃ viveśa ha // NsP_49.9 //
analyzed: sa tu indrasya sutaḥ rājan indra lokam viveśa ha

original: rāmāstraṃ prajvalad dīptaṃ tasyānu praviveśa vai /
analyzed: rāma astram prajvalat dīptam tasya anu praviveśa vai

original: viditārthaś ca devendro devaiḥ saha samanvitaḥ // NsP_49.10 //
analyzed: vidita arthaḥ ca deva indraḥ devaiḥ saha samanvitaḥ

original: niṣkrāmayac ca taṃ duṣṭaṃ rāghavasyāpakāriṇam /
analyzed: niṣkrāmayat ca tam duṣṭam rāghavasya apakāriṇam

original: tato 'sau sarvadevais tu devalokād bahiḥ kṛtaḥ // NsP_49.11 //
analyzed: tatas sau sarva devaiḥ tu deva lokāt bahis kṛtaḥ

original: punaḥ so 'py apatad rāmaṃ rājānaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: punar saḥ api apatat rāmam rājānam śaraṇam gataḥ

original: pāhi rāma mahābāho ajñānād apakāriṇam // NsP_49.12 //
analyzed: pāhi rāma mahā bāho ajñānāt apakāriṇam

original: iti bruvantaṃ taṃ prāha rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ /
analyzed: iti bruvantam tam prāha rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: amoghaṃ ca mamaivāstram aṅgam ekaṃ prayaccha vai // NsP_49.13 //
analyzed: amogham ca mama eva astram aṅgam ekam prayaccha vai

original: tato jīvasi duṣṭa tvam apakāro mahān kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tatas jīvasi duṣṭa tvam apakāraḥ mahān kṛtaḥ

original: ityukto 'sau svakaṃ netram ekam astrāya dattavān // NsP_49.14 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sau svakam netram ekam astrāya dattavān

original: astraṃ tannetram ekaṃ tu bhasmīkṛtya samāyayau /
analyzed: astram tat netram ekam tu bhasmīkṛtya samāyayau

original: tataḥ prabhṛti kākānāṃ sarveṣām ekanetratā // NsP_49.15 //
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti kākānām sarveṣām eka netra tā

original: cakṣuṣaikena paśyanti hetunā tena pārthiva /
analyzed: cakṣuṣā ekena paśyanti hetunā tena pārthiva

original: uṣitvā tatra suciraṃ citrakūṭe sa rāghavaḥ // NsP_49.16 //
analyzed: uṣitvā tatra su ciram citrakūṭe sa rāghavaḥ

original: jagāma daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ nānāmuniniṣevitam /
analyzed: jagāma daṇḍaka araṇyam nānā muni niṣevitam

original: sabhrātṛkaḥ sabhāryaś ca tāpasaṃ veṣam āsthitaḥ // NsP_49.17 //
analyzed: sa bhrātṛkaḥ sa bhāryaḥ ca tāpasam veṣam āsthitaḥ

original: dhanuḥparvasupāṇiśca seṣudhiś ca mahābalaḥ /
analyzed: dhanuḥ parva su pāṇiḥ ca sa iṣudhiḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: tato dadarśa tatrasthān ambubhakṣān mahāmunīn // NsP_49.18 //
analyzed: tatas dadarśa tatrasthān ambu bhakṣān mahā munīn

original: aśmakuṭṭān anekāṃś ca dantolūkhalinas tathā /
analyzed: aśmakuṭṭān anekān ca dantolūkhalinaḥ tathā

original: pañcāgnimadhyagān anyān anyān ugratapaś carān // NsP_49.19 //
analyzed: pañca agni madhya gān anyān anyān ugra tapaḥ carān

original: tān dṛṣṭvā praṇipatyoccai rāmas taiś cābhinanditaḥ /
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā praṇipatya uccais rāmaḥ taiḥ ca abhinanditaḥ

original: tato 'khilaṃ vanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ sākṣāj janārdanaḥ // NsP_49.20 //
analyzed: khilam vanam dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ sākṣāt janārdanaḥ

original: bhrātṛbhāryāsahāyaś ca saṃpratasthe mahāmatiḥ /
analyzed: bhrātṛ bhāryā sahāyaḥ ca saṃpratasthe mahāmatiḥ

original: darśayitvā tu sītāyai vanaṃ kusumitaṃ śubham // NsP_49.21 //
analyzed: darśayitvā tu sītāyai vanam kusumitam śubham

original: nānāścaryasamāyuktaṃ śanair gacchan sa dṛṣṭavān /
analyzed: nānā āścarya samāyuktam śanais gacchan sa dṛṣṭavān

original: kṛṣṇāṅgaṃ raktanetraṃ tu sthūlaśailasamānakam // NsP_49.22 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa aṅgam rakta netram tu sthūla śaila samānakam

original: śubhradaṃṣṭraṃ mahābāhuṃ saṃdhyāghanaśiroruham /
analyzed: śubhra daṃṣṭram mahā bāhum saṃdhyā ghana śiroruham

original: meghasvanaṃ sāparādhaṃ śaraṃ saṃdhāya rāghavaḥ // NsP_49.23 //
analyzed: megha svanam sa aparādham śaram saṃdhāya rāghavaḥ

analyzed: vivyādha rākṣasam krodhāt lakṣmaṇena saha prabhuḥ

analyzed: anyaiḥ avadhyam hatvā tam giri garte mahā tanum

original: taṃ natvā tatra viśramya tatkathātuṣṭamānasaḥ // NsP_49.25 //
analyzed: tam natvā tatra viśramya tad kathā tuṣṭa mānasaḥ

original: tīkṣṇāśramam upāgamya dṛṣṭavāṃs taṃ mahāmunim /
analyzed: tīkṣṇa āśramam upāgamya dṛṣṭavān tam mahā munim

original: tenādiṣṭena mārgeṇa gatvāgastyaṃ dadarśa ha // NsP_49.26 //
analyzed: tena ādiṣṭena mārgeṇa gatvā agastyam dadarśa ha

analyzed: khaḍgam tu vimalam tasmāt avāpa raghunandanaḥ

analyzed: iṣudhi ca akṣaya śaram cāpam ca eva tu vaiṣṇavam

analyzed: tatas gastya āśramāt rāmaḥ bhrātṛ bhāryā samanvitaḥ

original: godāvaryāḥ samīpe tu pañcavaṭyām uvāsa saḥ // NsP_49.28 //
analyzed: godāvaryāḥ samīpe tu pañcavaṭyām uvāsa saḥ

original: tato jaṭāyur abhyetya rāmaṃ kamalalocanam /
analyzed: tatas jaṭāyuḥ abhyetya rāmam kamala locanam

original: natvā svakulam ākhyāya sthitavān gṛdhranāyakaḥ // NsP_49.29 //
analyzed: natvā sva kulam ākhyāya sthitavān gṛdhra nāyakaḥ

analyzed: kathayitvā tu tam prāha sītām rakṣa mahāmate

original: kāryārthaṃ tu gate rāme bhrātrā saha vanāntaram // NsP_49.31 //
analyzed: kārya artham tu gate rāme bhrātrā saha vana antaram

original: ahaṃ rakṣyāmi te bhāryāṃ sthīyatām atra śobhana /
analyzed: aham rakṣyāmi te bhāryām sthīyatām atra śobhana

original: ity uktvā gatavān rāmaṃ gṛdhrarājaḥ svam āśramam // NsP_49.32 //
analyzed: iti uktvā gatavān rāmam gṛdhra rājaḥ svam āśramam

original: samīpe dakṣiṇe bhāge nānāpakṣiniṣevite /
analyzed: samīpe dakṣiṇe bhāge nānā pakṣi niṣevite

original: vasantaṃ rāghavaṃ tatra sītayā saha sundaram // NsP_49.33 //
analyzed: vasantam rāghavam tatra sītayā saha sundaram

original: manmathākārasadṛśaṃ kathayantaṃ mahākathāḥ /
analyzed: manmatha ākāra sadṛśam kathayantam mahā kathāḥ

original: kṛtvā māyāmayaṃ rūpaṃ lāvaṇyaguṇasaṃyutam // NsP_49.34 //
analyzed: kṛtvā māyā mayam rūpam lāvaṇya guṇa saṃyutam

original: madanākrāntahṛdayā kadācid rāvaṇānujā /

original: gāyantī susvaraṃ gītaṃ śanair āgatya rākṣasī // NsP_49.35 //
analyzed: gāyantī su svaram gītam śanais āgatya rākṣasī

original: dadarśa rāmam āsīnaṃ kānane sītayā saha /
analyzed: dadarśa rāmam āsīnam kānane sītayā saha

analyzed: atha śūrpaṇakhā ghorā māyā rūpa dharā śubhā

original: niḥśaṅkā duṣṭacittā sā rāghavaṃ pratyabhāṣata /
analyzed: niḥśaṅkā duṣṭa cittā sā rāghavam pratyabhāṣata

original: bhaja māṃ kānta kalyāṇīṃ bhajantīṃ kāminīm iha // NsP_49.37 //
analyzed: bhaja mām kānta kalyāṇīm bhajantīm kāminīm iha

original: bhajamānāṃ tyajed yas tu tasya doṣo mahān bhavet /
analyzed: bhajamānām tyajet yaḥ tu tasya doṣaḥ mahān bhavet

original: ityuktaḥ śūrpaṇakhayā rāmas tām āha pārthivaḥ // NsP_49.38 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ śūrpaṇakhayā rāmaḥ tām āha pārthivaḥ

original: kalatravān ahaṃ bāle kanīyāṃsaṃ bhajasva me /
analyzed: kalatravān aham bāle kanīyāṃsam bhajasva me

original: iti śrutvā tataḥ prāha rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī // NsP_49.39 //
analyzed: iti śrutvā tatas prāha rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī

original: atīva nipuṇā cāhaṃ ratikarmaṇi rāghava /
analyzed: atīva nipuṇā ca aham rati karmaṇi rāghava

original: tyaktvainām anabhijñāṃ tvaṃ sītāṃ māṃ bhaja śobhanam // NsP_49.40 //

original: ity ākarṇya vacaḥ prāha rāmas tāṃ dharmatatparaḥ /
analyzed: iti ākarṇya vacaḥ prāha rāmaḥ tām dharma tatparaḥ

original: parastriyaṃ na gacche 'haṃ tvam ito gaccha lakṣmaṇam // NsP_49.41 //
analyzed: para striyam na gacche ham tvam itas gaccha lakṣmaṇam

original: tasya nātra vane bhāryā tvām asau saṃgrahīṣyati /
analyzed: tasya na atra vane bhāryā tvām asau saṃgrahīṣyati

original: ityuktā sā punaḥ prāha rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam // NsP_49.42 //
analyzed: iti uktā sā punar prāha rāmam rājīva locanam

original: yathā syāl lakṣmaṇo bhartā tathā tvaṃ dehi patrakam /
analyzed: yathā syāt lakṣmaṇaḥ bhartā tathā tvam dehi patrakam

original: tathaivam uktvā matimān rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ // NsP_49.43 //
analyzed: tathā evam uktvā matimān rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: chindhy asyā nāsikām iti moktavyā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: chindhi asyāḥ nāsikām iti moktavyā na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: iti rāmo mahārājo likhya patraṃ pradattavān // NsP_49.44 //
analyzed: iti rāmaḥ mahā rājaḥ likhya patram pradattavān

original: sā gṛhītvā tu tatpatraṃ gatvā tasmān mudānvitā /
analyzed: sā gṛhītvā tu tat patram gatvā tasmāt mudā anvitā

original: gatvā dattavatī tadval lakṣmaṇāya mahātmane // NsP_49.45 //
analyzed: gatvā dattavatī tadvat lakṣmaṇāya mahātmane

original: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaḥ prāha rākṣasīṃ kāmarūpiṇīm /
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaḥ prāha rākṣasīm kāmarūpiṇīm

original: na laṅghyaṃ raghavavaco mayā tiṣṭhātmakaśmale // NsP_49.46 //
analyzed: na laṅghyam raghava vacaḥ mayā tiṣṭha ātma kaśmale

original: tāṃ pragṛhya tataḥ khaḍgam udyamya vimalaṃ sudhīḥ /
analyzed: tām pragṛhya tatas khaḍgam udyamya vimalam sudhīḥ

original: tena tatkarṇanāsāṃ tu viccheda tilakāṇḍavat // NsP_49.47 //
analyzed: tena tad karṇa nāsām tu viccheda tila kāṇḍa vat

original: chinnanāsā tataḥ sā tu ruroda bhṛśaduḥkhitā /
analyzed: chinna nāsā tatas sā tu ruroda bhṛśa duḥkhitā

original: hā daśāsya mama bhrātaḥ sarvadevavimardaka // NsP_49.48 //
analyzed: hā daśa asya mama bhrātar sarva deva vimardaka

original: hā kaṣṭaṃ kumbhakarṇādyāyātā me cāpadā parā /
analyzed: hā kaṣṭam kumbhakarṇa adya āyātā me ca āpadā parā

original: hā hā kaṣṭaṃ guṇanidhe vibhīṣaṇa mahāmate // NsP_49.49 //
analyzed: hā hā kaṣṭam guṇa nidhe vibhīṣaṇa mahāmate

original: ity evam ārtā rudatī sā gatvā kharadūṣaṇau /
analyzed: iti evam ārtā rudatī sā gatvā khara dūṣaṇau

original: triśirasaṃ ca sā dṛṣṭvā nivedyātmaparābhavam // NsP_49.50 //
analyzed: triśirasam ca sā dṛṣṭvā nivedya ātma parābhavam

original: rāmam āha janasthāne bhrātrā saha mahābalam /
analyzed: rāmam āha janasthāne bhrātrā saha mahā balam

original: jñātvā te rāghavaṃ kruddhāḥ preṣayām_asur ūrjitān // NsP_49.51 //
analyzed: jñātvā te rāghavam kruddhāḥ preṣayāmasuḥ ūrjitān

original: caturdaśasahasrāṇi rākṣasānāṃ balīyasām /
analyzed: caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rākṣasānām balīyasām

original: agre nijagmus tenaiva rakṣasāṃ nāyakās trayaḥ // NsP_49.52 //
analyzed: agre nijagmuḥ tena eva rakṣasām nāyakāḥ trayaḥ

original: rāvaṇena niyuktās te puraiva tu mahābalāḥ /
analyzed: rāvaṇena niyuktāḥ te purā eva tu mahā balāḥ

original: mahābalaparīvārā janasthānam upāgatāḥ // NsP_49.53 //
analyzed: mahā bala parīvārāḥ janasthānam upāgatāḥ

original: krodhena mahatāviṣṭā dṛṣṭvā tāṃ chinnanāsikām /
analyzed: krodhena mahatā āviṣṭāḥ dṛṣṭvā tām chinna nāsikām

original: rudatīm aśrudigdhāṅgīṃ bhaginīṃ rāvaṇasya tu // NsP_49.54 //
analyzed: rudatīm aśru digdha aṅgīm bhaginīm rāvaṇasya tu

original: rāmo 'pi tadbalaṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasānāṃ balīyasām /
analyzed: rāmaḥ u pi tat balam dṛṣṭvā rākṣasānām balīyasām

original: saṃsthāpya lakṣmaṇaṃ tatra sītāyā rakṣaṇaṃ prati // NsP_49.55 //
analyzed: saṃsthāpya lakṣmaṇam tatra sītāyāḥ rakṣaṇam prati

original: gatvā tu prahitais tatra rākṣasair baladarpitaiḥ /
analyzed: gatvā tu prahitaiḥ tatra rākṣasaiḥ bala darpitaiḥ

original: caturdaśasahasraṃ tu rākṣasānāṃ mahābalam // NsP_49.56 //
analyzed: caturdaśa sahasram tu rākṣasānām mahā balam

original: kṣaṇena nihataṃ tena śarair agniśikhopamaiḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇena nihatam tena śaraiḥ agni śikhā upamaiḥ

original: kharaś ca nihatas tena dūṣaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ // NsP_49.57 //
analyzed: kharaḥ ca nihataḥ tena dūṣaṇaḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: triśirāś ca mahāroṣād raṇe rāmeṇa pātitaḥ /
analyzed: triśirāḥ ca mahā roṣāt raṇe rāmeṇa pātitaḥ

original: hatvā tān rākṣasān duṣṭān rāmaś cāśramam āviśat // NsP_49.58 //
analyzed: hatvā tān rākṣasān duṣṭān rāmaḥ ca āśramam āviśat

original: śūrpaṇakhā ca rudatī rāvaṇāntikam āgatā /
analyzed: śūrpaṇakhā ca rudatī rāvaṇa antikam āgatā

original: chinnanāsāṃ ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo bhaginīṃ tadā // NsP_49.59 //
analyzed: chinna nāsām ca tām dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaḥ bhaginīm tadā

original: mārīcaṃ prāha durbuddhiḥ sītāharaṇakarmaṇi /
analyzed: mārīcam prāha durbuddhiḥ sītā haraṇa karmaṇi

original: puṣpakeṇa vimānena gatvāhaṃ tvaṃ ca mātula // NsP_49.60 //
analyzed: puṣpakeṇa vimānena gatvā aham tvam ca mātula

original: janasthānasamīpe tu sthitvā tatra mamājñayā /
analyzed: janasthāna samīpe tu sthitvā tatra mama ājñayā

original: sauvarṇamṛgarūpaṃ tvam āsthāya tu śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // NsP_49.61 //
analyzed: sauvarṇa mṛga rūpam tvam āsthāya tu śanais śanais

original: gaccha tvaṃ tatra kāryārthaṃ yatra sītā vyavasthitā /
analyzed: gaccha tvam tatra kārya artham yatra sītā vyavasthitā

original: dṛṣṭvā sā mṛgapotaṃ tvāṃ sauvarṇaṃ tvayi mātula // NsP_49.62 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sā mṛga potam tvām sauvarṇam tvayi mātula

original: spṛhāṃ kariṣyate rāmaṃ preṣayiṣyati bandhane /
analyzed: spṛhām kariṣyate rāmam preṣayiṣyati bandhane

original: tadvākyāt tatra gachantaṃ dhāvasva gahane vane // NsP_49.63 //
analyzed: tad vākyāt tatra gacchantam dhāvasva gahane vane

original: lakṣmaṇasyāpakarṣārthaṃ vaktavyaṃ vāgudīraṇam /
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya apakarṣa artham vaktavyam vāc udīraṇam

original: tataḥ puṣpakam āruhya māyārūpeṇa cāpy aham // NsP_49.64 //
analyzed: tatas puṣpakam āruhya māyā rūpeṇa ca api aham

original: tāṃ sītām aham āneṣye tasyām āsaktamānasaḥ /
analyzed: tām sītām aham āneṣye tasyām āsakta mānasaḥ

original: tvam api svecchayā paścād āgamiṣyasi śobhana // NsP_49.65 //
analyzed: tvam api sva icchayā paścāt āgamiṣyasi śobhana

original: ityukte rāvaṇenātha mārīco vākyam abravīt /
analyzed: iti ukte rāvaṇena atha mārīcaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: tvam eva gaccha pāpiṣṭha nāhaṃ gacchāmi tatra vai // NsP_49.66 //
analyzed: tvam eva gaccha pāpiṣṭha na aham gacchāmi tatra vai

original: puraivānena rāmeṇa vyathito 'haṃ muner makhe /
analyzed: purā eva anena rāmeṇa vyathitaḥ ham muneḥ makhe

original: ityuktavati mārīce rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ // NsP_49.67 //
analyzed: iti uktavati mārīce rāvaṇaḥ krodha mūrcchitaḥ

original: mārīcaṃ hantum ārebhe mārīco 'py āha rāvaṇam /
analyzed: mārīcam hantum ārebhe mārīcaḥ u pi āha rāvaṇam

original: tava hastavadhād vīra rāmeṇa maraṇaṃ varam // NsP_49.68 //
analyzed: tava hasta vadhāt vīra rāmeṇa maraṇam varam

original: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi tatra yatra tvaṃ netum icchasi /
analyzed: aham gamiṣyāmi tatra yatra tvam netum icchasi

original: atha puṣpakam āruhya janasthānam upāgataḥ // NsP_49.69 //
analyzed: atha puṣpakam āruhya janasthānam upāgataḥ

original: mārīcas tatra sauvarṇaṃ mṛgam āsthāya cāgrataḥ /
analyzed: mārīcaḥ tatra sauvarṇam mṛgam āsthāya ca agratas

original: jagāma yatra sā sītā vartate janakātmajā // NsP_49.70 //
analyzed: jagāma yatra sā sītā vartate janakātmajā

original: sauvarṇaṃ mṛgapotaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā sītā yaśasvinī /
analyzed: sauvarṇam mṛga potam tu dṛṣṭvā sītā yaśasvinī

original: bhāvikarmavaśād rāmam uvāca patim ātmanaḥ // NsP_49.71 //
analyzed: bhāvi karma vaśāt rāmam uvāca patim ātmanaḥ

original: gṛhītvā dehi sauvarṇaṃ mṛgapotaṃ nṛpātmaja /
analyzed: gṛhītvā dehi sauvarṇam mṛga potam nṛpa ātmaja

original: ayodhāyāṃ tu madgehe krīḍanārtham idaṃ mama // NsP_49.72 //
analyzed: ayodhāyām tu mad gehe krīḍana artham idam mama

original: tayaivam ukto rāmas tu lakṣmaṇaṃ sthāpya tatra vai /
analyzed: tayā evam uktaḥ rāmaḥ tu lakṣmaṇam sthāpya tatra vai

original: rakṣaṇārthaṃ tu sītāyā gato 'sau mṛgapṛṣṭhatah // NsP_49.73 //
analyzed: rakṣaṇa artham tu sītāyāḥ gataḥ sau mṛga pṛṣṭhatas

original: rāmeṇa cānuyāto 'sau abhyadhāvad vane mṛgaḥ /
analyzed: rāmeṇa ca anuyātaḥ sau abhyadhāvat vane mṛgaḥ

original: tataḥ sareṇa vivyādha rāmas taṃ mṛgapotakam // NsP_49.74 //
analyzed: tatas sareṇa vivyādha rāmaḥ tam mṛga potakam

original: hā lakṣmaṇeti coktvāsau nipapāta mahītale /
analyzed: hā lakṣmaṇa iti ca uktvā asau nipapāta mahī tale

original: mārīcaḥ parvatākāras tena naṣṭo babhūva saḥ // NsP_49.75 //
analyzed: mārīcaḥ parvata ākāraḥ tena naṣṭaḥ babhūva saḥ

original: ākarṇya rudataḥ śabdaṃ sītā lakṣmaṇam abravīt /
analyzed: ākarṇya rudataḥ śabdam sītā lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: gaccha lakṣmaṇa putra tvaṃ yatrāyaṃ śabda utthitaḥ // NsP_49.76 //
analyzed: gaccha lakṣmaṇa putra tvam yatra ayam śabdaḥ utthitaḥ

original: bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya tat tvaṃ vai rudataḥ śrūyate dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: bhrātuḥ jyeṣṭhasya tat tvam vai rudataḥ śrūyate dhvaniḥ

original: prāyo rāmasya saṃdehaṃ lakṣaye 'ham mahātmanaḥ // NsP_49.77 //
analyzed: prāyas rāmasya saṃdeham lakṣaye ham mahātmanaḥ

original: ityuktaḥ sa tathā prāha lakṣmaṇas tām aninditām /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa tathā prāha lakṣmaṇaḥ tām aninditām

original: na hi rāmasya saṃdeho na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // NsP_49.78 //
analyzed: na hi rāmasya saṃdehaḥ na bhayam vidyate kvacid

original: iti bruvānaṃ taṃ sītā bhāvikarmabalād bhṛtam /
analyzed: iti bruvānam tam sītā bhāvi karma balāt bhṛtam

original: lakṣmaṇaṃ prāha vaidehī viruddhavacanaṃ tadā // NsP_49.79 //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam prāha vaidehī viruddha vacanam tadā

original: mṛte rāme tu mām icchann atas tvaṃ na gamiṣyasi /
analyzed: mṛte rāme tu mām icchan atas tvam na gamiṣyasi

original: ityuktaḥ sa vinītātmā asahann apriyaṃ vacaḥ // NsP_49.80 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa vinīta ātmā asahan apriyam vacaḥ

original: jagāma rāmam anveṣṭuṃ tadā pārthivanandanaḥ /
analyzed: jagāma rāmam anveṣṭum tadā pārthiva nandanaḥ

original: saṃnyāsaveṣam āsthāya rāvaṇo 'pi durātmavān // NsP_49.81 //
analyzed: saṃnyāsa veṣam āsthāya rāvaṇaḥ durātmavān

original: sa sītāpārśvam āsādya vacanaṃ cedam uktavān /
analyzed: sa sītā pārśvam āsādya vacanam ca idam uktavān

original: āgato bharataḥ śrīmān ayodhyāyā mahāmatiḥ // NsP_49.82 //
analyzed: āgataḥ bharataḥ śrīmān ayodhyāyāḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: rāmeṇa saha saṃbhāṣya sthitavāṃs tatra kānane /
analyzed: rāmeṇa saha saṃbhāṣya sthitavān tatra kānane

original: māṃ ca preṣitavān rāmo vimānam idam āruha // NsP_49.83 //
analyzed: mām ca preṣitavān rāmaḥ vimānam idam āruha

original: ayodhyāṃ yāti rāmas tu bharatena prasāditaḥ /
analyzed: ayodhyām yāti rāmaḥ tu bharatena prasāditaḥ

original: mṛgabālaṃ tu vaidehi krīḍārthaṃ te gṛhītavān // NsP_49.84 //
analyzed: mṛga bālam tu vaidehi krīḍā artham te gṛhītavān

original: kleśitāsi mahāraṇye bahukālaṃ tvam īdṛśam /
analyzed: kleśitā asi mahā araṇye bahu kālam tvam īdṛśam

original: saṃprāptarājyas te bhartā rāmaḥ sa rucirānanaḥ // NsP_49.85 //
analyzed: saṃprāpta rājyaḥ te bhartā rāmaḥ sa rucira ānanaḥ

original: lakṣmaṇaś ca vinītātmā vimānam idam āruha /
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ ca vinīta ātmā vimānam idam āruha

original: ityuktā sā tathā gatvā nītā tena mahātmanā // NsP_49.86 //
analyzed: iti uktā sā tathā gatvā nītā tena mahātmanā

original: āruroha vimānaṃ tu chadmanā preritā satī /
analyzed: āruroha vimānam tu chadmanā preritā satī

original: taj jagāma tataḥ śīghraṃ vimānaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam // NsP_49.87 //
analyzed: tat jagāma tatas śīghram vimānam dakṣiṇām diśam

original: tataḥ sītā suduḥkhārtā vilalāpa suduḥkhitā /
analyzed: tatas sītā su duḥkha ārtā vilalāpa su duḥkhitā

original: vimāne khe 'pi rodantyāś cakre sparśaṃ na rākṣasaḥ // NsP_49.88 //
analyzed: vimāne khe rodantyāḥ cakre sparśam na rākṣasaḥ

original: rāvaṇaḥ svena rūpeṇa babhūvātha mahātanuḥ /
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ svena rūpeṇa babhūva atha mahā tanuḥ

original: daśagrīvaṃ mahākāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā sītā suduḥkhitā // NsP_49.89 //
analyzed: daśagrīvam mahā kāyam dṛṣṭvā sītā su duḥkhitā

original: hā rāma vañcitādyāhaṃ kenāpi cchadmarūpiṇā /
analyzed: hā rāma vañcitā adya aham kena api chadma rūpiṇā

original: rakṣasā ghorarūpeṇa trāyasveti bhayārditā // NsP_49.90 //
analyzed: rakṣasā ghora rūpeṇa trāyasva iti bhaya arditā

original: he lakṣmaṇa mahābāho māṃ hi duṣṭena rakṣasā /
analyzed: he lakṣmaṇa mahā bāho mām hi duṣṭena rakṣasā

original: drutam āgatya rakṣasva nīyamānām athākulām // NsP_49.91 //
analyzed: drutam āgatya rakṣasva nīyamānām atha ākulām

original: evaṃ pralapamānāyāḥ sītāyās tan mahat svanam /
analyzed: evam pralapamānāyāḥ sītāyāḥ tat mahat svanam

original: ākarṇya gṛdhrarājas tu jaṭāyus tatra cāgataḥ // NsP_49.92 //
analyzed: ākarṇya gṛdhra rājaḥ tu jaṭāyuḥ tatra ca āgataḥ

original: tiṣṭha rāvaṇa duṣṭātman muñca muñcātra maithilīm /
analyzed: tiṣṭha rāvaṇa duṣṭa ātman muñca muñca atra maithilīm

original: ity uktvā yuyudhe tena jaṭāyus tatra vīryavān // NsP_49.93 //
analyzed: iti uktvā yuyudhe tena jaṭāyuḥ tatra vīryavān

original: pakṣābhyāṃ tāḍayām_asa jaṭāyus tasya vakṣasi /
analyzed: pakṣābhyām tāḍayāmasa jaṭāyuḥ tasya vakṣasi

original: tāḍayantaṃ tu taṃ matvā balavān iti rāvaṇaḥ // NsP_49.94 //
analyzed: tāḍayantam tu tam matvā balavān iti rāvaṇaḥ

original: tuṇḍacañcuprahārais tu bhṛśaṃ tena prapīḍitaḥ /
analyzed: tuṇḍa cañcu prahāraiḥ tu bhṛśam tena prapīḍitaḥ

original: tata utthāpya vegena candrahāsam asiṃ mahat // NsP_49.95 //
analyzed: tatas utthāpya vegena candra hāsam asim mahat

original: jaghāna tena duṣṭātmā jaṭāyuṃ dharmacāriṇam /
analyzed: jaghāna tena duṣṭa ātmā jaṭāyum dharma cāriṇam

original: nipapāta mahīpṛṣṭhe jaṭāyuḥ kṣīṇacetanaḥ // NsP_49.96 //
analyzed: nipapāta mahī pṛṣṭhe jaṭāyuḥ kṣīṇa cetanaḥ

original: uvāca ca daśagrīvaṃ duṣṭātman na tvayā hataḥ /
analyzed: uvāca ca daśagrīvam duṣṭa ātman na tvayā hataḥ

original: candrahāsasya vīryeṇa hato 'haṃ rākṣasādhama // NsP_49.97 //
analyzed: candrahāsasya vīryeṇa hataḥ ham rākṣasa adhama

original: nirāyudhaṃ ko hanen mūḍha sāyudhas tvām ṛte janaḥ /
analyzed: nirāyudham kaḥ hanet mūḍha sa āyudhaḥ tvām ṛte janaḥ

original: sītāpaharaṇaṃ viddhi mṛtyus te duṣṭa rākṣasa // NsP_49.98 //
analyzed: sītā apaharaṇam viddhi mṛtyuḥ te duṣṭa rākṣasa

original: duṣṭa rāvaṇa rāmas tvāṃ vadhiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: duṣṭa rāvaṇa rāmaḥ tvām vadhiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: rudatī duḥkhaśokārtā jaṭāyuṃ prāha maithilī // NsP_49.99 //
analyzed: rudatī duḥkha śoka ārtā jaṭāyum prāha maithilī

original: matkṛte maraṇam yasmāt tvayā prāptaṃ dvijottama /
analyzed: mad kṛte maraṇam yasmāt tvayā prāptam dvijottama

original: tasmād rāmaprasādena viṣṇulokam avāpsyasi // NsP_49.100 //
analyzed: tasmāt rāma prasādena viṣṇu lokam avāpsyasi

original: yāvad rāmeṇa saṅgas te bhaviṣyati mahādvija /
analyzed: yāvat rāmeṇa saṅgaḥ te bhaviṣyati mahā dvija

original: tāvat tiṣṭhantu te prāṇā ity uktvā tu khagottamam // NsP_49.101 //
analyzed: tāvat tiṣṭhantu te prāṇāḥ iti uktvā tu khaga uttamam

original: tatas tāny arpitāny aṅgād bhūṣaṇāni vimucya sā /
analyzed: tatas tāni arpitāni aṅgāt bhūṣaṇāni vimucya sā

original: śīghraṃ nibadhya vastreṇa rāmahastaṃ gamiṣyatha // NsP_49.102 //
analyzed: śīghram nibadhya vastreṇa rāma hastam gamiṣyatha

original: ity uktvā pātayām_asa bhūmau sītā suduḥkhitā /
analyzed: iti uktvā pātayāmasa bhūmau sītā su duḥkhitā

original: evaṃ hṛtvā sa sītāṃ tu jaṭāyuṃ pātya bhūtale // NsP_49.103 //
analyzed: evam hṛtvā sa sītām tu jaṭāyum pātya bhū tale

original: puṣpakeṇa gataḥ śīghraṃ laṅkāṃ duṣṭaniśācaraḥ /
analyzed: puṣpakeṇa gataḥ śīghram laṅkām duṣṭa niśācaraḥ

original: aśokavanikāmadhye sthāpayitvā sa maithilīm // NsP_49.104 //
analyzed: aśoka vanikā madhye sthāpayitvā sa maithilīm

original: imām atraiva rakṣadhvaṃ rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ /
analyzed: imām atra eva rakṣadhvam rākṣasyaḥ vikṛta ānanāḥ

original: ity ādiśya gṛhaṃ yāto rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ // NsP_49.105 //
analyzed: iti ādiśya gṛham yātaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: laṅkānivāsinaś cocur ekāntaṃ ca parasparam /
analyzed: laṅkā nivāsinaḥ ca ūcuḥ ekāntam ca parasparam

original: asyāḥ puryā vināśārthaṃ sthāpiteyaṃ durātmanā // NsP_49.106 //
analyzed: asyāḥ puryāḥ vināśa artham sthāpitā iyam durātmanā

original: rākṣasībhir virūpābhī rakṣyamāṇā samantataḥ /
analyzed: rākṣasībhiḥ virūpābhiḥ rakṣyamāṇā samantataḥ

original: sītā ca duḥkhitā tatra smarantī rāmam eva sā // NsP_49.107 //
analyzed: sītā ca duḥkhitā tatra smarantī rāmam eva sā

original: uvāsa sā suduḥkhārtā duḥkhitā rudatī bhṛśam /
analyzed: uvāsa sā su duḥkha ārtā duḥkhitā rudatī bhṛśam

original: yathā jñānakhale devī haṃsayānā sarasvatī // NsP_49.108 //
analyzed: yathā jñāna khale devī haṃsa yānā sarasvatī

original: sugrīvabhṛtyā harayaś caturaś ca yadṛcchayā /
analyzed: sugrīva bhṛtyāḥ harayaḥ caturaḥ ca yadṛcchayā

original: vastrabaddhaṃ tayotsṛṣṭaṃ gṛhītvā bhūṣaṇaṃ drutam // NsP_49.109 //
analyzed: vastra baddham tayā utsṛṣṭam gṛhītvā bhūṣaṇam drutam

original: svabhartre vinivedyocuḥ sugrīvāya mahātmane /
analyzed: sva bhartre vinivedya ūcuḥ sugrīvāya mahātmane

original: araṇye 'bhūn mahāyuddhaṃ jaṭāyo rāvaṇasya ca // NsP_49.110 //
analyzed: araṇye bhūt mahā yuddham jaṭāyoḥ rāvaṇasya ca

original: atha rāmaś ca taṃ hatvā mārīcaṃ māyayāgatam /
analyzed: atha rāmaḥ ca tam hatvā mārīcam māyayā āgatam

original: nivṛtto lakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā tena gatvā svam āśramam // NsP_49.111 //
analyzed: nivṛttaḥ lakṣaṇam dṛṣṭvā tena gatvā svam āśramam

original: sītām apaśyan duḥkhārtaḥ praruroda sa rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: sītām a paśyan duḥkha ārtaḥ praruroda sa rāghavaḥ

original: lakṣmaṇaś ca mahātejā ruroda bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ // NsP_49.112 //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ ruroda bhṛśa duḥkhitaḥ

original: bahuprakāram asvasthaṃ rudantaṃ rāghavaṃ tadā /
analyzed: bahu prakāram asvastham rudantam rāghavam tadā

original: bhūtale patitaṃ dhīmān utthāpyāśvāsya lakṣmaṇaḥ // NsP_49.113 //
analyzed: bhū tale patitam dhīmān utthāpya āśvāsya lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: uvāca vacanaṃ prāptaṃ tadā yat tac chṛṇuṣva me /
analyzed: uvāca vacanam prāptam tadā yat tat śṛṇuṣva me

original: ativelaṃ mahārāja na śokaṃ kartum arhasi // NsP_49.114 //
analyzed: ativelam mahā rāja na śokam kartum arhasi

original: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha śīghraṃ tvaṃ sītāṃ mṛgayituṃ prabho /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha śīghram tvam sītām mṛgayitum prabho

original: ity evaṃ vadatā tena lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā // NsP_49.115 //
analyzed: iti evam vadatā tena lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā

original: utthāpito narapatir duḥkhito duḥkhitena tu /
analyzed: utthāpitaḥ narapatiḥ duḥkhitaḥ duḥkhitena tu

original: bhrātrā saha jagāmātha sītāṃ mṛgayituṃ vanam // NsP_49.116 //
analyzed: bhrātrā saha jagāma atha sītām mṛgayitum vanam

original: vanāni sarvāṇi viśodhya rāghavo girīn samastān girisānugocarān /
analyzed: vanāni sarvāṇi viśodhya rāghavaḥ girīn samastān giri sānu gocarān

original: tathā munīnām api cāśramān bahūṃs tṛṇādivallīgahaneṣu bhūmiṣu // NsP_49.117 //
analyzed: tathā munīnām api ca āśramān bahūn tṛṇa ādi vallī gahaneṣu bhūmiṣu

original: nadītaṭe bhūvivare guhāyāṃ nirīkṣamāṇo 'pi mahānubhāvaḥ /
analyzed: nadī taṭe bhū vivare guhāyām nirīkṣamāṇaḥ pi mahā anubhāvaḥ

original: priyām apaśyan bhṛśaduḥkhitas tadā jaṭāyuṣaṃ vīkṣya ca ghātitaṃ nṛpaḥ // NsP_49.118 //
analyzed: priyām a paśyan bhṛśa duḥkhitaḥ tadā jaṭāyuṣam vīkṣya ca ghātitam nṛpaḥ

original: aho bhavān kena hatas tvam īdṛśīṃ daśām avāpto 'si mṛto 'si jīvasi /
analyzed: aho bhavān kena hataḥ tvam īdṛśīm daśām avāptaḥ si mṛtaḥ si jīvasi

original: mamādya sarvaṃ samaduḥkhitasya bhoḥ patnīviyogād iha cāgatasya vai // NsP_49.119 //
analyzed: mama adya sarvam sama duḥkhitasya bhoḥ patnī viyogāt iha ca āgatasya vai

original: ityuktamātre vihago 'tha kṛcchrād uvāca vācaṃ madhurāṃ tadānīm /
analyzed: iti ukta mātre vihagaḥ tha kṛcchrāt uvāca vācam madhurām tadānīm

original: śṛṇuṣva rājan mama vṛttam atra vadāmi dṛṣṭaṃ ca kṛtaṃ ca sadyaḥ // NsP_49.120 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva rājan mama vṛttam atra vadāmi dṛṣṭam ca kṛtam ca sadyas

original: daśānanas tām apanīya māyayā sītāṃ samāropya vimānam uttamam /
analyzed: daśānanaḥ tām apanīya māyayā sītām samāropya vimānam uttamam

original: jagāma khe dakṣiṇadiṅmukho 'sau sītā ca mātā vilalāpa duḥkhitā // NsP_49.121 //
analyzed: jagāma khe sītā ca mātā vilalāpa duḥkhitā

original: ākarṇya sītāsvanam āgato 'haṃ sītāṃ vimoktuṃ svabalena rāghava /
analyzed: ākarṇya sītā svanam āgataḥ ham sītām vimoktum sva balena rāghava

original: yuddhaṃ ca tenāham atīva kṛtvā hataḥ punaḥ khaḍgabalena rakṣasā // NsP_49.122 //
analyzed: yuddham ca tena aham atīva kṛtvā hataḥ punar khaḍga balena rakṣasā

original: vaidehivākyād iha jīvatā mayā dṛṣṭo bhavān svargam ito gamiṣye /
analyzed: vaidehi vākyāt iha jīvatā mayā dṛṣṭaḥ bhavān svargam itas gamiṣye

original: mā rāma śokaṃ kuru bhūmipāla jahy adya duṣṭaṃ sagaṇaṃ tu nairṛtam // NsP_49.123 //
analyzed: mā rāma śokam kuru bhūmipāla jahi adya duṣṭam sa gaṇam tu nairṛtam

original: rāmo jaṭāyuṣetyuktaḥ punas taṃ cāha śokataḥ /
analyzed: rāmaḥ jaṭāyuṣā iti uktaḥ punar tam ca āha śokataḥ

original: svasty astu te dvijavara gatis tu paramāstu te // NsP_49.124 //
analyzed: svasti astu te dvijavara gatiḥ tu paramā astu te

original: tato jaṭāyuḥ svaṃ dehaṃ vihāya gatavān divam /
analyzed: tatas jaṭāyuḥ svam deham vihāya gatavān divam

original: vimānena tu ramyeṇa sevyamāno 'psarogaṇaiḥ // NsP_49.125 //
