analyzed: vegavadbhiḥ vinītaiḥ ca aśvaiḥ citrarathe sthitaḥ

original: athāyāntaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ prāha daśānanam /
analyzed: atha āyāntam tu tam dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ prāha daśānanam

original: rāmo 'ham atra duṣṭātmann ehi rāvaṇa māṃ prati // NsP_52.80 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ ham atra duṣṭa ātman ehi rāvaṇa mām prati

original: ityukte lakṣmaṇaḥ prāha rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam /
analyzed: iti ukte lakṣmaṇaḥ prāha rāmam rājīva locanam

original: anena rākṣasā yotsye tvaṃ tiṣṭheti mahābalaḥ // NsP_52.81 //
analyzed: anena rākṣasāḥ yotsye tvam tiṣṭha iti mahā balaḥ

original: tatas tu lakṣmaṇo gatvā rurodha śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ /
analyzed: tatas tu lakṣmaṇaḥ gatvā rurodha śara vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: viṃśadbāhuvisṛṣṭais tu śastrāstrair lakṣmaṇaṃ yudhi // NsP_52.82 //
analyzed: viṃśat bāhu visṛṣṭaiḥ tu śastra astraiḥ lakṣmaṇam yudhi

original: rurodha sa daśagrīvaḥ tayor yuddham abhūn mahat /
analyzed: rurodha sa daśagrīvaḥ tayoḥ yuddham abhūt mahat

original: devā vyomni vimānasthā vīkṣya tasthur mahāhavam // NsP_52.83 //
analyzed: devāḥ vyomni vimāna sthāḥ vīkṣya tasthuḥ mahā āhavam

original: tato rāvaṇaśastrāṇi *cchittvā svais tīkṣṇasāyakaiḥ /
analyzed: tatas rāvaṇa śastrāṇi chittvā svaiḥ tīkṣṇa sāyakaiḥ

original: lakṣmaṇaḥ sārathiṃ hatvā tasyāśvān api bhallakaiḥ // NsP_52.84 //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ sārathim hatvā tasya aśvān api bhallakaiḥ

original: rāvaṇasya dhanuś chittvā dhvajaṃ ca niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
analyzed: rāvaṇasya dhanuḥ chittvā dhvajam ca niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: vakṣaḥsthalaṃ mahāvīryo vivyādha paravīrahā // NsP_52.85 //
analyzed: vakṣaḥ sthalam mahā vīryaḥ vivyādha para vīra hā

original: tato rathān nipatyādhaḥ kṣipraṃ rākṣasanāyakaḥ /
analyzed: tatas rathāt nipatya adhas kṣipram rākṣasa nāyakaḥ

original: śaktiṃ jagrāha kupito ghaṇṭānādavinādinīm // NsP_52.86 //
analyzed: śaktim jagrāha kupitaḥ ghaṇṭā nāda vinādinīm

original: agnijvālājvalajjihvāṃ maholkāsadṛśadyutim /
analyzed: agni jvālā jvalat jihvām mahā ulkā sadṛśa dyutim

original: dṛḍhamuṣṭyā tu nikṣiptā śaktiḥ sā lakṣmaṇorasi // NsP_52.87 //
analyzed: dṛḍha muṣṭyā tu nikṣiptā śaktiḥ sā lakṣmaṇa urasi

original: vidāryāntaḥpraviṣṭātha devās trastās tato 'mbare /
analyzed: vidāryā antar praviṣṭā atha devāḥ trastāḥ tatas mbare

original: lakṣmaṇaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā rudadbhir vānareśvaraiḥ // NsP_52.88 //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam patitam dṛṣṭvā rudadbhiḥ vānara īśvaraiḥ

original: duḥkhitaḥ śīghram āgamya tatpārśvaṃ prāha rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: duḥkhitaḥ śīghram āgamya tad pārśvam prāha rāghavaḥ

original: kva gato hanumān vīro mitro me pavanātmajaḥ // NsP_52.89 //
analyzed: kva gataḥ hanumān vīraḥ mitraḥ me pavanātmajaḥ

original: yadi jīvati me bhrātā kathaṃcit patito bhuvi /
analyzed: yadi jīvati me bhrātā kathaṃcid patitaḥ bhuvi

original: ityukte hanumān rājan vīro vikhyātapauruṣaḥ // NsP_52.90 //
analyzed: iti ukte hanumān rājan vīraḥ vikhyāta pauruṣaḥ

original: baddhvāñjaliṃ babhāṣedaṃ dehy anujñāṃ sthito 'smi bhoḥ /
analyzed: baddhvā añjalim babhāṣa idam dehi anujñām sthitaḥ smi bhoḥ

original: rāmaḥ prāha mahāvīra viśalyakaraṇī mama // NsP_52.91 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ prāha mahā vīra viśalya karaṇī mama

original: anujaṃ virujaṃ śīghraṃ kuru mitra mahābala /
analyzed: anujam virujam śīghram kuru mitra mahā bala

original: tato vegāt samutpatya gatvā droṇagiriṃ kapiḥ // NsP_52.92 //
analyzed: tatas vegāt samutpatya gatvā droṇa girim kapiḥ

original: baddhvā ca śighram ānīya lakṣmaṇaṃ nīrujaṃ kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: baddhvā ca śighram ānīya lakṣmaṇam nīrujam kṣaṇāt

original: cakāra devadeveśāṃ paśyatāṃ rāghavasya ca // NsP_52.93 //
analyzed: cakāra devadeva īśām paśyatām rāghavasya ca

original: tataḥ kruddho jagannātho rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ /
analyzed: tatas kruddhaḥ jagannāthaḥ rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: rāvaṇasya balaṃ śiṣṭaṃ hastyaśvaratharākṣasam // NsP_52.94 //
analyzed: rāvaṇasya balam śiṣṭam hasti aśva ratha rākṣasam

original: hatvā kṣaṇena rāmas tu taccharīraṃ tu sāyakaiḥ /
analyzed: hatvā kṣaṇena rāmaḥ tu tat śarīram tu sāyakaiḥ

original: tīkṣṇair jarjaritaṃ kṛtvā tasthivān vānarair vṛtaḥ // NsP_52.95 //
analyzed: tīkṣṇaiḥ jarjaritam kṛtvā tasthivān vānaraiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: astaceṣṭo daśagrīvaḥ saṃjñāṃ prāpya śanaiḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: asta ceṣṭaḥ daśagrīvaḥ saṃjñām prāpya śanais punar

original: utthāya rāvaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ siṃhanādaṃ nanāda ca // NsP_52.96 //
analyzed: utthāya rāvaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ siṃhanādam nanāda ca

original: tannādaśravaṇair vyomni vitrasto devatāgaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tad nāda śravaṇaiḥ vyomni vitrastaḥ devatā gaṇaḥ

original: etasminn eva kale tu rāmaṃ prāpya mahāmuniḥ // NsP_52.97 //
analyzed: etasmin eva kale tu rāmam prāpya mahā muniḥ

original: rāvaṇe baddhavairas tu agastyo vai jayapradam /
analyzed: rāvaṇe baddha vairaḥ tu agastyaḥ vai jaya pradam

original: ādityahṛdayaṃ nāma mantraṃ prādāj jayapradam // NsP_52.98 //
analyzed: ādityahṛdayam nāma mantram prādāt jaya pradam

original: rāmo 'pi japtvā tanmantram agastyoktaṃ jayapradam /
analyzed: rāmaḥ japtvā tat mantram agastya uktam jaya pradam

original: taddattaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ cāpam atulaṃ sadguṇaṃ dṛḍham // NsP_52.99 //
analyzed: tat dattam vaiṣṇavam cāpam atulam sat guṇam dṛḍham

original: pūjayitvā tad ādāya sajyaṃ kṛtvā mahābalaḥ /
analyzed: pūjayitvā tat ādāya sajyam kṛtvā mahā balaḥ

original: sauvarṇapuṅkhais tīkṣṇais tu śarair marmavidāraṇaiḥ // NsP_52.100 //
analyzed: sauvarṇa puṅkhaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ tu śaraiḥ marma vidāraṇaiḥ

original: yuyudhe rākṣasendreṇa raghunāthaḥ pratāpavān /
analyzed: yuyudhe rākṣasa indreṇa raghunāthaḥ pratāpavān

original: tayos tu yudhyatos tatra bhīmaśaktyor mahāmate // NsP_52.101 //
analyzed: tayoḥ tu yudhyatoḥ tatra bhīma śaktyoḥ mahāmate

original: parasparavisṛṣṭas tu vyomni saṃvarddhito 'nalaḥ /
analyzed: paraspara visṛṣṭaḥ tu vyomni saṃvarddhitaḥ nalaḥ

original: samutthito nṛpaśreṣṭha rāmarāvaṇayor yudhi // NsP_52.102 //
analyzed: samutthitaḥ nṛpa śreṣṭha rāma rāvaṇayoḥ yudhi

original: saṃgare vartamāne tu rāmo dāśarathis tadā /
analyzed: saṃgare vartamāne tu rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ tadā

original: padātir yuyudhe vīro rāmo 'nuktaparākramaḥ // NsP_52.103 //
analyzed: padātiḥ yuyudhe vīraḥ rāmaḥ nukta parākramaḥ

original: sahasrāśvayutaṃ divyaṃ rathaṃ mātalim eva ca /
analyzed: sahasra aśva yutam divyam ratham mātalim eva ca

original: preṣayām_asa devendro mahāntaṃ lokaviśrutam // NsP_52.104 //
analyzed: preṣayāmasa deva indraḥ mahāntam loka viśrutam

original: rāmas tam ratham āruhya pūjyamānaḥ surottamaiḥ /
analyzed: rāmaḥ tam ratham āruhya pūjyamānaḥ sura uttamaiḥ

original: mātulyuktopadeśas tu rāmacandraḥ pratāpavān // NsP_52.105 //
analyzed: mātulī ukta upadeśaḥ tu rāmacandraḥ pratāpavān

original: brahmadattavaraṃ duṣṭaṃ brahmāstreṇa daśānanam /
analyzed: brahma datta varam duṣṭam brahmāstreṇa daśānanam

original: jaghāna vairiṇaṃ krūraṃ rāmadevaḥ pratāpavān // NsP_52.106 //
analyzed: jaghāna vairiṇam krūram rāmadevaḥ pratāpavān

original: rāmeṇa nihate tatra rāvaṇe sagaṇe ripau /
analyzed: rāmeṇa nihate tatra rāvaṇe sa gaṇe ripau

original: indrādyā devatāḥ sarvāḥ parasparam athābruvan // NsP_52.107 //
analyzed: indra ādyāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ parasparam atha abruvan

original: rāmo bhūtvā harir yasmād asmākaṃ vairiṇaṃ raṇe /
analyzed: rāmaḥ bhūtvā hariḥ yasmāt asmākam vairiṇam raṇe

original: anyair avadhyam apy enaṃ jaghāna yudhi rāvaṇam // NsP_52.108 //
analyzed: anyaiḥ avadhyam api enam jaghāna yudhi rāvaṇam

original: tasmāt taṃ rāmanāmānam anantam aparājitam /
analyzed: tasmāt tam rāma nāmānam anantam aparājitam

original: pūjayāmo 'vatīryainam ity uktvā te divaukasaḥ // NsP_52.109 //
analyzed: pūjayāmaḥ vatīrya enam iti uktvā te divaukasaḥ

original: nānāvimānaiḥ śrīmadbhir avatīrya mahītale /
analyzed: nānā vimānaiḥ śrīmadbhiḥ avatīrya mahī tale

original: rudrendravasucandrādyā vidhātāraṃ sanātanam // NsP_52.110 //
analyzed: rudra indra vasu candra ādyāḥ vidhātāram sanātanam

original: viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ jaganmūrtiṃ sānujaṃ rāmam avyayam /
analyzed: viṣṇum jiṣṇum jagat mūrtim sa anujam rāmam avyayam

original: taṃ pūjayitvā vidhivat parivāryopatasthire // NsP_52.111 //
analyzed: tam pūjayitvā vidhivat parivārya upatasthire

original: rāmo 'yaṃ dṛśyatāṃ devā lakṣmaṇo 'yaṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: rāmaḥ yam dṛśyatām devāḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ yam vyavasthitaḥ

original: sugrīvo raviputro 'yaṃ vāyuputro 'yam āsthitaḥ // NsP_52.112 //
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ ravi putraḥ yam vāyu putraḥ yam āsthitaḥ

original: aṅgadādyā ime sarve ity ūcus te divaukasaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgada ādyāḥ ime sarve iti ūcuḥ te divaukasaḥ

original: gandhāmoditadikpālā bhramarālipadānugā // NsP_52.113 //
analyzed: gandha āmodita dikpālā bhramara ali padānugā

original: devastrīkaranirmuktā rāmamūrdhani śobhitā /
analyzed: deva strī kara nirmuktā rāma mūrdhani śobhitā

original: papāta puṣpavṛṣṭis tu lakṣmaṇasya ca mūrdhani // NsP_52.114 //
analyzed: papāta puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ tu lakṣmaṇasya ca mūrdhani

original: tato brahmā samāgatya haṃsayānena rāghavam /
analyzed: tatas brahmā samāgatya haṃsa yānena rāghavam

original: amoghākhyena stotreṇa stutvā rāmam avocata // NsP_52.114 //
analyzed: amogha ākhyena stotreṇa stutvā rāmam avocata

original: brahmovāca:
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: tvaṃ viṣṇur ādir bhūtānām ananto jñānadṛk prabhuḥ /
analyzed: tvam viṣṇuḥ ādiḥ bhūtānām anantaḥ jñāna dṛś prabhuḥ

original: tvam eva śāśvataṃ brahma vedānte viditaṃ param // NsP_52.116 //
analyzed: tvam eva śāśvatam brahma veda ante viditam param

original: tvayā yad adya nihato rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tvayā yat adya nihataḥ rāvaṇaḥ loka rāvaṇaḥ

original: tadāśru sarvalokānāṃ devānāṃ karma sādhitam // NsP_52.117 //
analyzed: tadā aśru sarva lokānām devānām karma sādhitam

original: ityukte padmayonau tu śaṃkaraḥ pritim āsthitaḥ /
analyzed: iti ukte padmayonau tu śaṃkaraḥ pritim āsthitaḥ

original: praṇamya rāmaṃ tasmai taṃ bhūyo daśarathaṃ nṛpam // NsP_52.118 //
analyzed: praṇamya rāmam tasmai tam bhūyas daśaratham nṛpam

original: darśayitvā gato devaḥ sītā suddheti kīrtayan /
analyzed: darśayitvā gataḥ devaḥ sītā suddhā iti kīrtayan

original: tato bāhubalaprāptaṃ vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ śubham // NsP_52.119 //
analyzed: tatas bāhu bala prāptam vimānam puṣpakam śubham

original: pūtām āropya sītāṃ tām ādiṣṭaḥ pavanātmajaḥ /
analyzed: pūtām āropya sītām tām ādiṣṭaḥ pavanātmajaḥ

original: tatas tu jānakīṃ devīṃ viśokāṃ bhūṣaṇānvitām // NsP_52.120 //
analyzed: tatas tu jānakīm devīm viśokām bhūṣaṇa anvitām

original: vanditāṃ vānarendrais tu sārdhaṃ bhrātā mahābalaḥ /
analyzed: vanditām vānara indraiḥ tu sārdham bhrātā mahā balaḥ

original: pratiṣṭhāpya mahādevaṃ setumadhye sa rāghavaḥ // NsP_52.121 //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpya mahādevam setu madhye sa rāghavaḥ

original: labdhavān paramaṃ bhaktiṃ śive śaṃbhor anugrahāt /
analyzed: labdhavān paramam bhaktim śive śaṃbhoḥ anugrahāt

original: rāmeśvara iti khyāto mahādevaḥ pinākadhṛk // NsP_52.122 //
analyzed: rāmeśvaraḥ iti khyātaḥ mahādevaḥ pinākadhṛk

original: tasya darśanamātreṇa sarvahatyāṃ vyapohati /
analyzed: tasya darśana mātreṇa sarva hatyām vyapohati

original: rāmas tīrṇapratijño 'sau bharatāsaktamānasaḥ // NsP_52.123 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ tīrṇa pratijñaḥ sau bharata āsakta mānasaḥ

original: tato 'yodhyāṃ purīṃ divyāṃ gatvā tasyāṃ dvijottamaiḥ /
analyzed: tatas yodhyām purīm divyām gatvā tasyām dvijottamaiḥ

original: abhiṣikto vasiṣṭhādyair bharatena prasāditaḥ /
analyzed: abhiṣiktaḥ vasiṣṭha ādyaiḥ bharatena prasāditaḥ

original: akarod dharmato rājyaṃ ciraṃ rāmaḥ pratāpavān // NsP_52.124 //
analyzed: akarot dharmataḥ rājyam ciram rāmaḥ pratāpavān

original: yajñādikaṃ karma nijaṃ ca kṛtvā paurais tu rāmo divam āruroha /
analyzed: yajña ādikam karma nijam ca kṛtvā pauraiḥ tu rāmaḥ divam āruroha

original: rājan mayā te kathitaṃ samāsato rāmasya bhūmyāṃ caritaṃ mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: rājan mayā te kathitam samāsatas rāmasya bhūmyām caritam mahātmanaḥ

original: idaṃ subhaktyā paṭhatāṃ ca śṛṇvatāṃ dadāti rāmaḥ svapadaṃ jagatpatiḥ // NsP_52.125 //
analyzed: idam su bhaktyā paṭhatām ca śṛṇvatām dadāti rāmaḥ sva padam jagatpatiḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe rāmaprādurbhāve dvipañcāśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 52 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe rāmaprādurbhāve dvipañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi prādurbhāvadvayaṃ śubham /
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi prādurbhāva dvayam śubham

original: tṛtīyasya tu rāmasya kṛṣṇasya tu samāsataḥ // NsP_53.1 //
analyzed: tṛtīyasya tu rāmasya kṛṣṇasya tu samāsatas

original: purā hy asurabhārārtā mahī prāha nṛpottama /
analyzed: purā hi asura bhāra ārtā mahī prāha nṛpa uttama

original: āsīnaṃ devamadhye tu brahmāṇaṃ kamalāsanam // NsP_53.2 //
analyzed: āsīnam deva madhye tu brahmāṇam kamalāsanam

original: devāsure hatā ye tu viṣṇunā daityadānavāḥ /
analyzed: devāsure hatāḥ ye tu viṣṇunā daitya dānavāḥ

original: te sarve kṣatriyā jātāḥ kaṃsādyāḥ kamalodbhava // NsP_53.3 //
analyzed: te sarve kṣatriyāḥ jātāḥ kaṃsa ādyāḥ kamalodbhava

original: tadbhūribhārasaṃprāptā sīdantī caturānana /
analyzed: tad bhūri bhāra saṃprāptā sīdantī caturānana

original: mama tadbhārahāniḥ syād yathā deva tathā kuru // NsP_53.4 //
analyzed: mama tad bhāra hāniḥ syāt yathā deva tathā kuru

original: tayaivam ukto brahmātha devaiḥ saha jagāma ha /
analyzed: tayā evam uktaḥ brahmā atha devaiḥ saha jagāma ha

original: kṣīrodasyottaraṃ kūlaṃ viṣṇuṃ bhaktivibodhitam // NsP_53.5 //
analyzed: kṣīrodasya uttaram kūlam viṣṇum bhakti vibodhitam

original: tatra gatvā jagatsraṣṭā devaiḥ sārdhaṃ janārdanam /
analyzed: tatra gatvā jagatsraṣṭā devaiḥ sārdham janārdanam

original: narasiṃhaṃ mahādevaṃ gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ kramāt // NsP_53.6 //
analyzed: narasiṃham mahādevam gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ kramāt

original: abhyarcya bhaktyā govindaṃ vākpuṣpeṇa ca keśavam /
analyzed: abhyarcya bhaktyā govindam vāc puṣpeṇa ca keśavam

original: pūjayām_asa rājendra tena tuṣṭo jagatpatiḥ // NsP_53.7 //
analyzed: pūjayāmasa rāja indra tena tuṣṭaḥ jagatpatiḥ

original: rājovāca:
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: vākpuṣpeṇa kathaṃ brahman brahmāpy arcitavān harim /
analyzed: vāc puṣpeṇa katham brahman brahmā api arcitavān harim

original: tan me kathaya viprendra brahmoktaṃ stotram uttamam // NsP_53.8 //
analyzed: tat me kathaya vipra indra brahma uktam stotram uttamam

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu rājan pravakṣyāmi stotraṃ brahmamukheritam /
analyzed: śṛṇu rājan pravakṣyāmi stotram brahma mukha īritam

original: sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ viṣṇutuṣṭikaraṃ param // NsP_53.9 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa haram puṇyam viṣṇu tuṣṭi karam param

original: tam ārādhya jagannātham ūrdhvabāhuḥ pitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: tam ārādhya jagannātham ūrdhvabāhuḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: bhūtvaikāgramanā rājann idaṃ stotram udīrayat // NsP_53.10 //
analyzed: bhūtvā ekāgra manāḥ rājan idam stotram udīrayat

original: brahmovāca:
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: namāmi devaṃ naranātham acyutaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ lokaguruṃ sanātanam /
analyzed: namāmi devam naranātham acyutam nārāyaṇam loka gurum sanātanam

original: anādim avyaktam acintyam avyayaṃ vedāntavedyaṃ puruṣottamaṃ harim // NsP_53.11 //
analyzed: anādim avyaktam acintyam avyayam vedānta vedyam puruṣottamam harim

original: ānandarūpaṃ paramaṃ parāt paraṃ cidātmakaṃ jñānavatāṃ parāṃ gatim /
analyzed: ānanda rūpam paramam parāt param cit ātmakam jñānavatām parām gatim

original: sarvātmakaṃ sarvagataikarūpaṃ dhyeyasvarūpaṃ praṇamāmi mādhavam // NsP_53.12 //
analyzed: sarva ātmakam sarva gata eka rūpam dhyeya svarūpam praṇamāmi mādhavam

original: bhaktapriyaṃ kāntam atīvaṃ nirmalaṃ surādhipaṃ sūrijanair abhiṣṭutam /
analyzed: bhakta priyam kāntam atīvam nirmalam sura adhipam sūri janaiḥ abhiṣṭutam

original: caturbhujaṃ nīrajavarṇam īśvaraṃ rathāṅgapāṇiṃ praṇato 'smi keśavam // NsP_53.13 //
analyzed: catur bhujam nīraja varṇam īśvaram rathāṅga pāṇim praṇataḥ smi keśavam

original: gadāsiśaṅkhābjakaraṃ śriyaḥ patiṃ sadāśivaṃ śārṅgadharaṃ raviprabham /
analyzed: gadā asi śaṅkha abja karam śriyaḥ patim sadāśivam śārṅga dharam ravi prabham

original: pītāmbaraṃ hāravirājitodaraṃ namāmi viṣṇuṃ satataṃ kirīṭinam // NsP_53.14 //
analyzed: pīta ambaram hāra virājita udaram namāmi viṣṇum satatam kirīṭinam

original: gaṇḍasthalāsaktasuraktakuṇḍalaṃ sudīpitāśeṣadiśaṃ nijatviṣā /
analyzed: gaṇḍa sthala āsakta su rakta kuṇḍalam su dīpita aśeṣa diśam nija tviṣā

original: gandharvasiddhair upagītam ṛgdhvaniṃ janārdanaṃ bhūtapatiṃ namāmi tam // NsP_53.15 //
analyzed: gandharva siddhaiḥ upagītam ṛc dhvanim janārdanam bhūtapatim namāmi tam

original: hatvāsurān pāti yuge yuge surān svadharmasaṃsthān bhuvi saṃsthito hariḥ /
analyzed: hatvā asurān pāti yuge yuge surān svadharma saṃsthān bhuvi saṃsthitaḥ hariḥ

original: karoti sṛṣṭiṃ jagataḥ kṣayaṃ yas taṃ vāsudevaṃ praṇato 'smi keśavam // NsP_53.16 //
analyzed: karoti sṛṣṭim jagataḥ kṣayam yaḥ tam vāsudevam praṇataḥ smi keśavam

original: yo matsyarūpeṇa rasātalasthitān vedān samāhṛtya mama pradattavān /
analyzed: yaḥ matsya rūpeṇa rasātala sthitān vedān samāhṛtya mama pradattavān

original: nihatya yuddhe madhukaiṭabhāv ubhau taṃ vedavedyaṃ praṇato 'smy ahaṃ sadā // NsP_53.17 //
analyzed: nihatya yuddhe madhu kaiṭabhau ubhau tam veda vedyam praṇataḥ smi aham sadā

original: devāsuraiḥ kṣīrasamudramadhyato nyasto girir yena dhṛtaḥ purā mahān /
analyzed: deva asuraiḥ kṣīra samudra madhyatas nyastaḥ giriḥ yena dhṛtaḥ purā mahān

original: hitāya kaurmaṃ vapur āsthito yas taṃ viṣṇum ādyaṃ praṇato 'smi bhāskaram // NsP_53.18 //
analyzed: hitāya kaurmam vapuḥ āsthitaḥ yaḥ tam viṣṇum ādyam praṇataḥ smi bhāskaram

original: hatvā hiraṇyākṣam atīvaṃ darpitaṃ varāharūpī bhagavān sanātanaḥ /
analyzed: hatvā hiraṇyākṣam atīva darpitam varāha rūpī bhagavān sanātanaḥ

original: yo bhūmim etāṃ sakalāṃ samuddharaṃs taṃ vedamūrtiṃ praṇamāmi sūkaram // NsP_53.19 //
analyzed: yaḥ bhūmim etām sakalām samuddharan tam vedamūrtim praṇamāmi sūkaram

original: kṛtvā nṛsiṃhaṃ vapur ātmanaḥ paraṃ hitāya lokasya sanātano hariḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā nṛsiṃham vapuḥ ātmanaḥ param hitāya lokasya sanātanaḥ hariḥ

original: jaghāna yas tīkṣṇanakhair diteḥ sutaṃ taṃ nārasiṃhaṃ puruṣaṃ namāmi // NsP_53.20 //
analyzed: jaghāna yaḥ tīkṣṇa nakhaiḥ diteḥ sutam tam nārasiṃham puruṣam namāmi

original: yo vāmano 'sau bhagavān janārdano baliṃ babandha tribhir ūrjitaiḥ padaiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sau bhagavān janārdanaḥ balim babandha tribhiḥ ūrjitaiḥ padaiḥ

original: jagattrayaṃ kramya dadau puraṃdare tad evaṃ ādyaṃ praṇato 'smi vāmanam // NsP_53.21 //
analyzed: jagattrayam kramya dadau puraṃdare tat evam ādyam praṇataḥ smi vāmanam

original: yaḥ kārtavīryaṃ nijaghāna roṣāt triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ kṣitipātmajān api /
analyzed: yaḥ kārtavīryam nijaghāna roṣāt tris sapta kṛtvas kṣitipa ātmajān api

original: taṃ jāmadagnyaṃ kṣitibhāranāśakaṃ nato 'smi viṣṇuṃ puruṣottamaṃ sadā // NsP_53.22 //
analyzed: tam jāmadagnyam kṣiti bhāra nāśakam nataḥ smi viṣṇum puruṣottamam sadā

original: setuṃ mahāntaṃ jaladhau babandha yaḥ saṃprāpya laṅkāṃ sagaṇaṃ daśānanam /
analyzed: setum mahāntam jaladhau babandha yaḥ saṃprāpya laṅkām sa gaṇam daśānanam

original: jaghāna bhṛtyai jagatāṃ sanātanaṃ taṃ rāmadevaṃ satataṃ nato 'smi // NsP_53.23 //
analyzed: jaghāna bhṛtyai jagatām sanātanam tam rāmadevam satatam nataḥ smi

original: yathā tu vārāhanṛsiṃharūpaiḥ kṛtaṃ tvayā deva hitaṃ surāṇām /
analyzed: yathā tu vārāha nṛsiṃha rūpaiḥ kṛtam tvayā deva hitam surāṇām

original: tathādya bhūmeḥ kuru bhārahāniṃ prasīda viṣṇo bhagavan namas te // NsP_53.24 //
analyzed: tathā adya bhūmeḥ kuru bhāra hānim prasīda viṣṇo bhagavat namaḥ te

original: śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: iti stuto jagannāthaḥ śrīdharaḥ padmayoninā /
analyzed: iti stutaḥ jagannāthaḥ śrīdharaḥ padmayoninā

original: āvir babhūva bhagavān śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ // NsP_53.25 //
analyzed: āvis babhūva bhagavān śaṅkha cakra gadā dharaḥ

original: uvāca ca hṛṣīkeśaḥ padmayoniṃ surān api /
analyzed: uvāca ca hṛṣīkeśaḥ padmayonim surān api

original: stutyānayāhaṃ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pitāmaha divaukasaḥ // NsP_53.26 //
analyzed: stutyā anayā aham saṃtuṣṭaḥ pitāmaha divaukasaḥ

original: paṭhatāṃ pāpanāśāya nṛṇāṃ bhaktimatām api /
analyzed: paṭhatām pāpa nāśāya nṛṇām bhaktimatām api

original: yato 'smi prakaṭībhūto durlabho 'pi hariḥ surāḥ // NsP_53.27 //
analyzed: yatas smi prakaṭībhūtaḥ durlabhaḥ hariḥ surāḥ

original: devaiḥ sendraiḥ sarudrais tu pṛthvyā ca prārthito hy aham /
analyzed: devaiḥ sa indraiḥ sa rudraiḥ tu pṛthvyā ca prārthitaḥ hi aham

original: padmayone vadādya tvaṃ śrutvā tat karavāṇi te // NsP_53.28 //
analyzed: padmayone vada adya tvam śrutvā tat karavāṇi te

original: ityukte viṣṇunā prāha brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: iti ukte viṣṇunā prāha brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ

original: daityānāṃ gurubhāreṇa pīḍiteyaṃ mahī bhṛśam // NsP_53.29 //
analyzed: daityānām guru bhāreṇa pīḍitā iyam mahī bhṛśam

original: laghvīm imāṃ kārayituṃ tvayāhaṃ puruṣottama /
analyzed: laghvīm imām kārayitum tvayā aham puruṣa uttama

original: tenāgataḥ suraiḥ sārdhaṃ nānyad astīti kāraṇam // NsP_53.30 //
analyzed: tena āgataḥ suraiḥ sārdham na anyat asti iti kāraṇam

original: ityukto bhagavān prāha gacchadhvam amarāḥ svayam /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ bhagavān prāha gacchadhvam amarāḥ svayam

original: sthānaṃ nirāmayāḥ sarve padmayonis tu gacchatu // NsP_53.31 //
analyzed: sthānam nirāmayāḥ sarve padmayoniḥ tu gacchatu

original: devakyāṃ vasudevāc ca avatīrya mahītale /
analyzed: devakyām vasudevāt ca avatīrya mahī tale

original: sitakṛṣṇe ca macchaktī kaṃsādīn ghātayiṣyataḥ // NsP_53.32 //
analyzed: sita kṛṣṇe ca mad śaktī kaṃsa ādīn ghātayiṣyataḥ

original: ity ākarṇya harer vākyaṃ hariṃ natvā yayuḥ surāḥ /
analyzed: iti ākarṇya hareḥ vākyam harim natvā yayuḥ surāḥ

original: gateṣu tridivaukaḥsu devadevo janārdanaḥ // NsP_53.33 //
analyzed: gateṣu tridivaukaḥsu devadevaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: śiṣṭānāṃ pālanārthāya duṣṭanigrahaṇāya ca /
analyzed: śiṣṭānām pālana arthāya duṣṭa nigrahaṇāya ca

original: preṣayām_asa te śaktī sitakṛṣṇe svake nṛpa // NsP_53.34 //
analyzed: preṣayāmasa te śaktī sita kṛṣṇe svake nṛpa

original: tayoḥ sitā ca rohiṇyāṃ vasudevād babhūva ha /
analyzed: tayoḥ sitā ca rohiṇyām vasudevāt babhūva ha

original: tadvat kṛṣṇā ca devakyāṃ vasudevād babhūva ha // NsP_53.35 //
analyzed: tadvat kṛṣṇā ca devakyām vasudevāt babhūva ha

original: rauhiṇeyo 'tha puṇyātmā rāmanāmāśrito mahān /
analyzed: rauhiṇeyaḥ puṇya ātmā rāma nāma āśritaḥ mahān

original: devakīnandanaḥ kṛṣṇas tayoḥ karma śṛṇuṣva me // NsP_53.36 //
analyzed: devakīnandanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tayoḥ karma śṛṇuṣva me

original: gokule bālakāle tu rākṣasī śakunī niśi /
analyzed: gokule bāla kāle tu rākṣasī śakunī niśi

original: rāmeṇa nihatā rājan tathā kṛṣṇena pūtanā // NsP_53.37 //
analyzed: rāmeṇa nihatā rājan tathā kṛṣṇena pūtanā

original: dhenukaḥ sagaṇas tāla- vane rāmeṇa ghātitaḥ /
analyzed: dhenukaḥ sa gaṇaḥ vane rāmeṇa ghātitaḥ

original: śakaṭaś cārjunau vṛkṣau tadvat kṛṣṇena ghātitau // NsP_53.38 //
analyzed: śakaṭaḥ ca arjunau vṛkṣau tadvat kṛṣṇena ghātitau

original: pralambo nidhanaṃ nīto daityo rāmeṇa muṣṭinā /
analyzed: pralambaḥ nidhanam nītaḥ daityaḥ rāmeṇa muṣṭinā

original: kāliyo damitas toye kālindyāṃ viṣapannagaḥ // NsP_53.39 //
analyzed: kāliyaḥ damitaḥ toye kālindyām viṣa pannagaḥ

original: govardhanaś ca kṛṣṇena dhṛto varṣati vāsave /
analyzed: govardhanaḥ ca kṛṣṇena dhṛtaḥ varṣati vāsave

original: gokulaṃ rakṣatā tena ariṣṭaś ca nipātitaḥ // NsP_53.40 //
analyzed: go kulam rakṣatā tena ariṣṭaḥ ca nipātitaḥ

original: keśī ca nidhanaṃ nīto duṣṭavājī mahāsuraḥ /
analyzed: keśī ca nidhanam nītaḥ duṣṭa vājī mahā asuraḥ

original: akrūreṇa ca tau nītau mathurāyāṃ mahātmanā // NsP_53.41 //
analyzed: akrūreṇa ca tau nītau mathurāyām mahātmanā

original: dadarśa tu nimagnaś ca rāmakṛṣṇau mahāmate /
analyzed: dadarśa tu nimagnaḥ ca rāma kṛṣṇau mahāmate

original: svaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ jale tasya akrūrasya vibhūtidam // NsP_53.42 //
analyzed: svam svam rūpam jale tasya akrūrasya vibhūti dam

original: anayor bhāvam atulaṃ jñātvā dṛṣṭvā ca yādavāḥ /
analyzed: anayoḥ bhāvam atulam jñātvā dṛṣṭvā ca yādavāḥ

original: babhūvuḥ prītamanaso hy akrūraś ca nṛpātmaja // NsP_53.43 //
analyzed: babhūvuḥ prīta manasaḥ hi akrūraḥ ca nṛpa ātmaja

original: durvacaś ca prajalpantaṃ kaṃsasya rajakaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: durvacaḥ ca prajalpantam kaṃsasya rajakam tatas

original: kṛṣṇo jaghāna rāmaś ca tadvastraṃ brahmaṇe dadau // NsP_53.44 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ jaghāna rāmaḥ ca tat vastram brahmaṇe dadau

original: mālākāreṇa bhaktyā tu sumanobhiḥ prapūjitau /
analyzed: mālākāreṇa bhaktyā tu sumanobhiḥ prapūjitau

original: tatas tasya varān dattvā durlabhān rāmakeśavau // NsP_53.45 //
analyzed: tatas tasya varān dattvā durlabhān rāma keśavau

original: gacchantau rājamārge tu kubjayā pūjitau tataḥ /
analyzed: gacchantau rājamārge tu kubjayā pūjitau tatas

original: tatkauṭilyam apānīya virūpaṃ kārmukaṃ tataḥ // NsP_53.46 //
analyzed: tat kauṭilyam apānīya virūpam kārmukam tatas

original: babhañja kṛṣṇo balavān kaṃsasyākṛṣya tatkṣaṇāt /
analyzed: babhañja kṛṣṇaḥ balavān kaṃsasya ākṛṣya tad kṣaṇāt

original: rakṣapālān jaghānātha rāmas tatra khalān bahūn /
analyzed: rakṣa pālān jaghāna atha rāmaḥ tatra khalān bahūn

original: hatvā kuvalayākhyaṃ ca gajaṃ rāmajanārdanau // NsP_53.47 //
analyzed: hatvā kuvalaya ākhyam ca gajam rāma janārdanau

original: praviśya raṅgaṃ gajadantapāṇī madānuliptau vasudevaputrau /
analyzed: praviśya raṅgam gaja danta pāṇī mada anuliptau vasudeva putrau

original: yuddhe tu rāmo nijaghāna mallaṃ śailopamaṃ muṣṭikam avyayātmā // NsP_53.48 //
analyzed: yuddhe tu rāmaḥ nijaghāna mallam śaila upamam muṣṭikam avyaya ātmā

original: kṛṣṇo 'pi cāṇūram atiprasiddhaṃ balena vīryeṇa ca kaṃsamallakam /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ u pi cāṇūram ati prasiddham balena vīryeṇa ca kaṃsa mallakam

original: yuddhvā tu tenātha ciraṃ jaghāna taṃ daityamallaṃ janasaṃsadīśaḥ // NsP_53.49 //
analyzed: yuddhvā tu tena atha ciram jaghāna tam daitya mallam jana saṃsad īśaḥ

original: mṛtasya mallasya ca muṣṭikasya mitraṃ punaḥ puṣkarakaṃ sa rāmaḥ /
analyzed: mṛtasya mallasya ca muṣṭikasya mitram punar puṣkarakam sa rāmaḥ

original: yuddhārtham utthāya kṛtakṣaṇaṃ taṃ muṣṭiprahāreṇa jaghāna vīraḥ // NsP_53.50 //
analyzed: yuddha artham utthāya kṛtakṣaṇam tam muṣṭi prahāreṇa jaghāna vīraḥ

original: kṛṣṇaḥ punas tān sakalān nihatya nigṛhya kaṃsaṃ vinipātya bhūmau /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ punar tān sakalān nihatya nigṛhya kaṃsam vinipātya bhūmau

original: svayaṃ ca dehe vinipatya tasya hatvā tathorvyāṃ nicakarṣa kṛṣṇaḥ // NsP_53.51 //
analyzed: svayam ca dehe vinipatya tasya hatvā tathā urvyām nicakarṣa kṛṣṇaḥ

original: hate tu kaṃse hariṇātikruddho bhrātāpi tasyātiruṣeṇa cotthitaḥ /
analyzed: hate tu kaṃse hariṇā ati kruddhaḥ bhrātā api tasya ati ruṣeṇa ca utthitaḥ

original: sunābhasaṃjño balavīryayukto rāmeṇa nīto yamasādanaṃ kṣaṇāt // NsP_53.52 //
analyzed: sunābha saṃjñaḥ bala vīrya yuktaḥ rāmeṇa nītaḥ yama sādanam kṣaṇāt

original: tau vandya mātāpitarau suhṛṣṭau janaiḥ samastair yadubhiḥ susaṃvṛtau /
analyzed: tau vandya mātā pitarau su hṛṣṭau janaiḥ samastaiḥ yadubhiḥ su saṃvṛtau

original: kṛtvā nṛpaṃ cograsenaṃ yadūnāṃ sabhāṃ sudharmāṃ dadatur mahendrīm // NsP_53.53 //
analyzed: kṛtvā nṛpam ca ugrasenam yadūnām sabhām sudharmām dadatuḥ mahendrīm

original: sarvajñabhāvāv api rāmakṛṣṇau saṃprāpya sāṃdīpanito 'stravidyām /
analyzed: sarvajña bhāvau api rāma kṛṣṇau saṃprāpya stra vidyām

original: guroḥ kṛte pañcajanaṃ nihatya yamaṃ ca jitvā gurave sutaṃ dadau // NsP_53.54 //
analyzed: guroḥ kṛte pañcajanam nihatya yamam ca jitvā gurave sutam dadau

original: nihatya rāmo magadheśvarasya balaṃ samastaṃ bahuśaḥ samāgatam /
analyzed: nihatya rāmaḥ magadha īśvarasya balam samastam bahuśas samāgatam

original: divyāstrapūrair amarāv imāv ubhau śubhāṃ purīṃ cakratuḥ sāgarānte // NsP_53.55 //
analyzed: divya astra pūraiḥ amarau imau ubhau śubhām purīm cakratuḥ sāgara ante

original: tasyāṃ vidhāyātha janasya vāsaṃ hatvā śṛgālaṃ harir avyayātmā /
analyzed: tasyām vidhāya atha janasya vāsam hatvā śṛgālam hariḥ avyaya ātmā

original: dagdhvā mahāntaṃ yavanaṃ hy upāyād varaṃ ca dattvā nṛpater jagāma // NsP_53.56 //
analyzed: dagdhvā mahāntam yavanam hi upāyāt varam ca dattvā nṛpateḥ jagāma

original: rāmo 'tha saṃśāntasamastavigrahaḥ saṃprāpya nandasya punaḥ sa gokulam /
analyzed: saṃśānta samasta vigrahaḥ saṃprāpya nandasya punar sa gokulam

original: vṛndāvane gopajanaiḥ subhāṣitaḥ sīreṇa rāmo yamunāṃ cakarṣa // NsP_53.57 //
analyzed: vṛndāvane gopa janaiḥ su bhāṣitaḥ sīreṇa rāmaḥ yamunām cakarṣa

original: saṃprāpya bhāryām atha revatīṃ ca reme tayā dvāravatīṃ sa lāṅgalī /
analyzed: saṃprāpya bhāryām atha revatīm ca reme tayā dvāravatīm sa lāṅgalī

original: kṣātreṇa saṃprāpya tadā sa rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo 'pi reme puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ // NsP_53.58 //
analyzed: kṣātreṇa saṃprāpya tadā sa rukmiṇīm kṛṣṇaḥ pi reme puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: dyūte kaliṅgarājasya dantān utpāṭya lāṅgalī /
analyzed: dyūte kaliṅga rājasya dantān utpāṭya lāṅgalī

original: jaghānāṣṭapadenaiva rukmiṇaṃ cānṛtānvitam // NsP_53.59 //
analyzed: jaghāna aṣṭapadena eva rukmiṇam ca anṛta anvitam

original: kṛṣṇaḥ prāgjyotiṣo daityān hayagrīvādikān bahūn /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ prāgjyotiṣaḥ daityān hayagrīva ādikān bahūn

original: hatvā tu narakaṃ cāpi jagrāha ca mahad dhanam // NsP_53.60 //
analyzed: hatvā tu narakam ca api jagrāha ca mahat dhanam

original: adityai kuṇḍale dattvā jitvendraṃ daivataiḥ saha /
analyzed: adityai kuṇḍale dattvā jitvā indram daivataiḥ saha

original: gṛhītvā pārijātaṃ tu tato dvārāvatīṃ purīm // NsP_53.61 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā pārijātam tu tatas dvārāvatīm purīm

original: kurubhiś ca dhṛtaṃ sāmbaṃ rāma eko mahābalaḥ /
analyzed: kurubhiḥ ca dhṛtam sāmbam rāmaḥ ekaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: kurūṇāṃ bhayam utpādya mocayām_asa vīryavān // NsP_53.62 //
analyzed: kurūṇām bhayam utpādya mocayāmasa vīryavān

original: bāṇabāhuvanaṃ chinnaṃ kṛṣṇena yudhi dhīmatā /
analyzed: bāṇa bāhu vanam chinnam kṛṣṇena yudhi dhīmatā

original: rāmeṇa tadbalaṃ nītaṃ kṣayaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ kṣaṇāt // NsP_53.63 //
analyzed: rāmeṇa tat balam nītam kṣayam koṭi guṇam kṣaṇāt

original: devāpakārī rāmeṇa nihato vānaro mahān /
analyzed: deva apakārī rāmeṇa nihataḥ vānaraḥ mahān

original: tato 'rjunasya sāhāyyaṃ kurvatā kaṃsaśatruṇā // NsP_53.64 //
analyzed: tatas rjunasya sāhāyyam kurvatā kaṃsa śatruṇā

original: sarvabhūtavadhād rājan bhuvo bhāro 'varopitaḥ /
analyzed: sarva bhūta vadhāt rājan bhuvaḥ bhāraḥ varopitaḥ

original: tīrthayātrā kṛtā tadvad rāmeṇa jagataḥ kṛte // NsP_53.65 //
analyzed: tīrtha yātrā kṛtā tadvat rāmeṇa jagataḥ kṛte

original: rāmeṇa nihitā ye tu tān na saṃkhyātum utsahe /
analyzed: rāmeṇa nihitāḥ ye tu tān na saṃkhyātum utsahe

original: evaṃ tau rāmakṛṣṇau tu kṛtvā duṣṭavadhaṃ nṛpa // NsP_53.66 //
analyzed: evam tau rāma kṛṣṇau tu kṛtvā duṣṭa vadham nṛpa

original: avatārya bhuvo bhāraṃ jagmatuḥ svecchayā divam /
analyzed: avatārya bhuvaḥ bhāram jagmatuḥ sva icchayā divam

original: ity etau kathitau divyau prādurbhāvau mayā tava /
analyzed: iti etau kathitau divyau prādurbhāvau mayā tava

original: saṃkṣepād rāmakṛṣṇasya kālkyaṃ śṛṇu mamādhunā // NsP_53.67 //
analyzed: saṃkṣepāt rāmakṛṣṇasya kālkyam śṛṇu mama adhunā

original: itthaṃ hi śaktī sitakṛṣṇarūpe harer anantasya mahābalāḍhye /

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe kṛṣṇaprādurbhāve nāma tripañcāśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 53 //

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

analyzed: sarve dharmāḥ vinaśyanti kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇa tvam āgate

analyzed: tasmāt kaliḥ mahā ghoraḥ sarva pāpasya sādhakaḥ

analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ dharma parāṅmukhāḥ

analyzed: ghore kali yuge prāpte dvijadeva parāṅmukhāḥ

analyzed: asūyā niratāḥ ca eva vṛthā ahaṃkāra dūṣitāḥ

analyzed: aham eva adhikaḥ iti sarve eva vadanti vai

analyzed: vidyā grahaṇa śūnya tvāt adharmaḥ vartate punar

analyzed: kāma krodha parāḥ mūḍhāḥ vṛthā saṃtāpa pīḍitāḥ

analyzed: baddhavairāḥ bhaviṣyanti paraspara vadha īpsavaḥ

analyzed: śūdra tulyāḥ bhaviṣyanti tapaḥ satya vivarjitāḥ

analyzed: uttamāḥ nīca tām yānti nīcāḥ ca uttama tām tathā

analyzed: pitṝn putrāḥ niyokṣyanti vadhvaḥ śvaśrūḥ ca karmasu

analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge

analyzed: gīta vādya ratāḥ viprāḥ veda vāda parāṅmukhāḥ

analyzed: na bhāryā na patiḥ ca eva bhavitā tatra saṃkare

analyzed: ubhābhyām api pāṇibhyām śiraḥ kaṇḍūyanam striyaḥ

analyzed: kurvantyaḥ guru bhartṛṇām ājñāḥ bhetsyanti tāḥ hitāḥ

analyzed: yadā yadā na yakṣyanti na hoṣyanti dvijātayaḥ

analyzed: tadā tadā kaleḥ vṛddhiḥ anumeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: sarvadharmeṣu naṣṭeṣu yāti niḥśrīkatāṃ jagat // NsP_54.50ab //

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ kaleḥ svarūpaṃ tat kathitaṃ viprasattamāḥ // NsP_54.50cd //
analyzed: evam kaleḥ svarūpam tat kathitam vipra sattamāḥ

original: haribhaktiparān evaṃ na kalir bādhate dvijāḥ /
analyzed: hari bhakti parān evam na kaliḥ bādhate dvijāḥ

analyzed: tapaḥ param kṛta yuge tretāyām dhyānam eva hi

analyzed: yatate daśabhiḥ varṣaiḥ tretāyām hāyanena tat

original: dvāpare tac ca māsena ahorātreṇa tat kalau /

original: dhyāyan kṛte yajan yajñais tretāyāṃ dvāpare 'rcayan // NsP_54.53 //
analyzed: dhyāyan kṛte yajan yajñaiḥ tretāyām dvāpare rcayan

original: yad āpnoti tad āpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam /
analyzed: yat āpnoti tat āpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam

original: samastajagadādhāraṃ paramārthasvarūpiṇam // NsP_54.54 //
analyzed: samasta jagat ādhāram paramārtha svarūpiṇam

original: ghore kaliyuge prāpte viṣṇuṃ dhyāyan na sīdati /
analyzed: ghore kali yuge prāpte viṣṇum dhyāyan na sīdati

original: aho 'tīva mahābhāgyāḥ sakṛd ye keśavārcakāḥ // NsP_54.55 //
analyzed: aho tīva mahābhāgyāḥ sakṛt ye keśava arcakāḥ

original: ghore kaliyuge prāpte sarvakarmabahiṣkṛte /
analyzed: ghore kali yuge prāpte sarva karma bahiṣkṛte

original: nyūnātiriktatā na syāt kalau vedoktakarmaṇām // NsP_54.56 //
analyzed: nyūna atirikta tā na syāt kalau veda ukta karmaṇām

original: harismaraṇam evātra saṃpūrṇaphaladāyakam /
hare keśava govinda vāsudeva jaganmaya // NsP_54.57 //
analyzed: hare keśava govinda vāsudeva jagat maya

original: janārdana jagaddhāma pītāmbaradharācyuta /
analyzed: janārdana jagat dhāma pīta ambara dhara acyuta

original: itīrayanti ye nityaṃ na hi tān bādhate kaliḥ // NsP_54.58 //
analyzed: iti īrayanti ye nityam na hi tān bādhate kaliḥ

original: aho hariparā ye tu kalau sarvabhayaṃkare /
analyzed: aho hari parāḥ ye tu kalau sarva bhayaṃkare

original: te sabhāgyā mahātmānas tatsaṃgatiratā api // NsP_54.59 //
analyzed: te sa bhāgyāḥ mahātmānaḥ tad saṃgati ratāḥ api

original: harināmaparā ye ca harikīrtanatatparāḥ /
analyzed: hari nāma parāḥ ye ca hari kīrtana tatparāḥ

original: haripūjāratā ye ca te kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // NsP_54.60 //
analyzed: hari pūjā ratāḥ ye ca te kṛtārthāḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: ity etad vaḥ samākhyātaṃ sarvaduḥkhanivāraṇam /
analyzed: iti etat vaḥ samākhyātam sarva duḥkha nivāraṇam

original: samastapuṇyaphaladaṃ kalau viṣṇoḥ prakīrtanam // NsP_54.61 //
analyzed: samasta puṇya phala dam kalau viṣṇoḥ prakīrtanam

original: // ity śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe kalilakṣaṇakīrtanaṃ catuḥpañcāśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 54 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe kalilakṣaṇakīrtanam catuḥpañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: rājovāca:
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: mārkaṇḍeya kathaṃ śukraḥ purā balimakhe guruḥ /
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeya katham śukraḥ purā bali makhe guruḥ

original: vāmanena sa viddhākṣaḥ stutvā tallabdhavān katham // NsP_55.1 //
analyzed: vāmanena sa viddha akṣaḥ stutvā tat labdhavān katham

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: vāmanena sa viddhākṣo bahutīrtheṣu bhārgavaḥ /
analyzed: vāmanena sa viddha akṣaḥ bahu tīrtheṣu bhārgavaḥ

original: jāhnavīsalile sthitvā devam abhyarcya vāmanam // NsP_55.2 //
analyzed: jāhnavī salile sthitvā devam abhyarcya vāmanam

original: ūrdhvabāhuḥ sa deveśaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam /
analyzed: ūrdhva bāhuḥ sa deveśam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: hṛdi saṃcintya tuṣṭāva narasiṃhaṃ sanātanam // NsP_55.3 //
analyzed: hṛdi saṃcintya tuṣṭāva narasiṃham sanātanam

original: śukra uvāca:
analyzed: śukraḥ uvāca

original: namāmi devaṃ viśveśaṃ vāmanaṃ viṣṇurūpiṇam /
analyzed: namāmi devam viśveśam vāmanam viṣṇu rūpiṇam

original: balidarpaharaṃ śāntaṃ śāśvataṃ puruṣottamam // NsP_55.4 //
analyzed: bali darpa haram śāntam śāśvatam puruṣottamam

original: dhīraṃ śūraṃ mahādevaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam /
analyzed: dhīram śūram mahādevam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: viśuddhaṃ jñānasaṃpannaṃ namāmi harim acyutam // NsP_55.5 //
analyzed: viśuddham jñāna saṃpannam namāmi harim acyutam

original: sarvaśaktimayaṃ devaṃ sarvagaṃ sarvabhāvanam /
analyzed: sarva śakti mayam devam sarva gam sarva bhāvanam

original: anādim ajaraṃ nityaṃ namāmi garuḍadhvajam // NsP_55.6 //
analyzed: anādim ajaram nityam namāmi garuḍadhvajam

original: surāsurair bhaktimadbhiḥ stuto nārāyaṇaḥ sadā /
analyzed: sura asuraiḥ bhaktimadbhiḥ stutaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sadā

original: pūjitaṃ ca hṛṣikeśaṃ taṃ namāmi jagadgurum // NsP_55.7 //
analyzed: pūjitam ca hṛṣikeśam tam namāmi jagadgurum

original: hṛdi saṃkalpya yadrūpaṃ dhyāyanti yatayaḥ sadā /
analyzed: hṛdi saṃkalpya yat rūpam dhyāyanti yatayaḥ sadā

original: jyotīrūpam anaupamyaṃ narasiṃhaṃ namāmy aham // NsP_55.8 //
analyzed: jyotīrūpam anaupamyam narasiṃham namāmi aham

original: na jānanti paraṃ rūpaṃ brahmādyā devatāgaṇāḥ /
analyzed: na jānanti param rūpam brahma ādyāḥ devatā gaṇāḥ

original: yasyāvatārarūpāṇi samarcanti namāmi tam // NsP_55.9 //
analyzed: yasya avatāra rūpāṇi samarcanti namāmi tam

original: etat samastaṃ yenādau sṛṣṭaṃ duṣṭavadhāt punaḥ /
analyzed: etat samastam yena ādau sṛṣṭam duṣṭa vadhāt punar

original: trātaṃ yatra jagal līnaṃ taṃ namāmi janārdanam // NsP_55.10 //
analyzed: trātam yatra jagat līnam tam namāmi janārdanam

original: bhaktair abhyarcito yas tu nityaṃ bhaktapriyo hi yaḥ /
analyzed: bhaktaiḥ abhyarcitaḥ yaḥ tu nityam bhakta priyaḥ hi yaḥ

original: taṃ devam amalaṃ divyaṃ praṇamāmi jagatpatim // NsP_55.11 //
analyzed: tam devam amalam divyam praṇamāmi jagatpatim

original: durlabhaṃ cāpi bhaktānāṃ yaḥ prayacchati toṣitaḥ /
analyzed: durlabham ca api bhaktānām yaḥ prayacchati toṣitaḥ

original: taṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ praṇamāmi sanātanam // NsP_55.12 //
analyzed: tam sarva sākṣiṇam viṣṇum praṇamāmi sanātanam

original: śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: iti stuto jagannāthaḥ purā śukreṇa pārthiva /
analyzed: iti stutaḥ jagannāthaḥ purā śukreṇa pārthiva

original: prādur babhūva tasyāgre śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ // NsP_55.13 //
analyzed: prādur babhūva tasya agre śaṅkha cakra gadā dharaḥ

original: uvāca śukram ekākṣaṃ devo nārāyaṇas tadā /
analyzed: uvāca śukram eka akṣam devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ tadā

original: kimarthaṃ jāhnavītīre stuto 'haṃ tad bravīhi me // NsP_55.14 //
analyzed: kimartham jāhnavī tīre stutaḥ ham tat bravīhi me

original: śukra uvāca:
analyzed: śukraḥ uvāca

original: devadeva mayā pūrvam aparādho mahān kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: devadeva mayā pūrvam aparādhaḥ mahān kṛtaḥ

original: taddoṣasyāpanuttyarthaṃ stutavān asmi sāṃpratam // NsP_55.15 //
analyzed: tad doṣasya apanutti artham stutavān asmi sāṃpratam

original: śrībhagavān uvāca:
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: mamāparādhān nayanaṃ naṣṭam ekaṃ tavādhunā /
analyzed: mama aparādhāt nayanam naṣṭam ekam tava adhunā

original: saṃtuṣṭo 'smi tataḥ śukra stotreṇānena te mune // NsP_55.16 //
analyzed: saṃtuṣṭaḥ smi tatas śukra stotreṇa anena te mune

original: ity uktvā devadeveśas taṃ muniṃ prahasann iva /
analyzed: iti uktvā devadeveśaḥ tam munim prahasan iva

original: pāñcajanyena taccakṣuḥ pasparśa ca janārdanaḥ // NsP_55.17 //
analyzed: pāñcajanyena tat cakṣuḥ pasparśa ca janārdanaḥ

original: spṛṣṭamātre tu śaṅkhena devadevena śārṅgiṇā /
analyzed: spṛṣṭa mātre tu śaṅkhena devadevena śārṅgiṇā

original: babhūva nirmalaṃ cakṣuḥ pūrvavan nṛpasattama // NsP_55.18 //
analyzed: babhūva nirmalam cakṣuḥ pūrvavat nṛpa sattama

original: evaṃ dattvā muneś cakṣuḥ pūjitas tena mādhavaḥ /
analyzed: evam dattvā muneḥ cakṣuḥ pūjitaḥ tena mādhavaḥ

original: jagāmādarśanaṃ sadyaḥ śukro 'pi svāśramaṃ yayau // NsP_55.19 //
analyzed: jagāma adarśanam sadyas śukraḥ pi sva āśramam yayau

original: ity etad uktaṃ muninā mahātmanā prāptaṃ purā devavaraprasādāt /
analyzed: iti etat uktam muninā mahātmanā prāptam purā deva vara prasādāt

original: śukreṇa kiṃ te kathayāmi rājan punaś ca māṃ pṛccha manorathāntaḥ // NsP_55.20 //
analyzed: śukreṇa kim te kathayāmi rājan punar ca mām pṛccha manoratha antar

original: // ity śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe śukravarapradāno nāma pañcapañcāśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 55 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe śukravarapradānaḥ nāma pañcapañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: rājovāca:
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: sāṃprataṃ devadevasya narasiṃh asya śārṅgiṇaḥ /
analyzed: sāṃpratam devadevasya narasiṃh asya śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: śrotum icchāmi sakalaṃ pratiṣṭhāyāḥ paraṃ vidhim // NsP_56.1 //
analyzed: śrotum icchāmi sakalam pratiṣṭhāyāḥ param vidhim

original: śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: pratiṣṭhāyā vidhiṃ viṣṇor devadevasya cakriṇaḥ /
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāyāḥ vidhim viṣṇoḥ devadevasya cakriṇaḥ

original: pravakṣyāmi yathāśāstraṃ śṛṇu bhūpāla puṇyadam // NsP_56.2 //
analyzed: pravakṣyāmi yathāśāstram śṛṇu bhūpāla puṇya dam

original: kartuṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ yaś cātra viṣṇor icchati pārthiva /
analyzed: kartum pratiṣṭhām yaḥ ca atra viṣṇoḥ icchati pārthiva

original: sa pūrvaṃ sthiranakṣatre bhūmiśodhanam ārabhet // NsP_56.3 //
analyzed: sa pūrvam sthira nakṣatre bhūmi śodhanam ārabhet

original: khātvā puruṣamātraṃ tu bāhudvayam athāpi vā /
analyzed: khātvā puruṣa mātram tu bāhu dvayam atha api vā

original: pūrayec chuddhamṛdbhis tu jalāktaiḥ śarkarānvitaiḥ // NsP_56.4 //
analyzed: pūrayet śuddha mṛdbhiḥ tu jala aktaiḥ śarkarā anvitaiḥ

original: adhiṣṭhānaṃ tato buddhvā pāṣāṇoṣṭakamṛṇmayam /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhānam tatas buddhvā pāṣāṇa uṣṭaka mṛṇmayam

original: prāsādaṃ kārayet tatra vāstuvidyāvidā nṛpa // NsP_56.5 //
analyzed: prāsādam kārayet tatra vāstu vidyā vidā nṛpa

original: caturasraṃ sūtramārge catuḥkoṇaṃ samantataḥ /
analyzed: catur asram sūtra mārge catur koṇam samantataḥ

original: śilābhittikam utkṛṣṭaṃ tadalābheṣṭikāmayam // NsP_56.6 //
analyzed: śilā bhittikam utkṛṣṭam tat alābha iṣṭikā mayam

original: tadalābhe tu mṛtkuḍyaṃ pūrvadvāraṃ suśobhanam /
analyzed: tad alābhe tu mṛd kuḍyam pūrva dvāram su śobhanam

original: jātikāṣṭhamayaiḥ stambhais tallagnaiḥ phaladānvitaiḥ // NsP_56.7 //
analyzed: jāti kāṣṭha mayaiḥ stambhaiḥ tad lagnaiḥ phalada anvitaiḥ

original: utpalaiḥ padmapatraiś ca pātitaiś citraśilpibhiḥ /
analyzed: utpalaiḥ padma patraiḥ ca pātitaiḥ citra śilpibhiḥ

original: itthaṃ tu kārayitvā hi harer veśma suśobhanam // NsP_56.8 //
analyzed: ittham tu kārayitvā hi hareḥ veśma su śobhanam

original: pūrvadvāraṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha sukapāṭaṃ sucitritam /
analyzed: pūrva dvāram nṛpa śreṣṭha su kapāṭam su citritam

original: ativṛddhātibālais tu kārayen nākṛtiṃ hareḥ // NsP_56.9 //
analyzed: ati vṛddha ati bālaiḥ tu kārayet na ākṛtim hareḥ

original: kuṣṭhādyupahatair vāpi anyair vā dīrgharogibhiḥ /
analyzed: kuṣṭha ādi upahataiḥ vā api anyaiḥ vā dīrgha rogibhiḥ

original: viśvakarmoktamārgeṇa purāṇoktāṃ nṛpottama // NsP_56.10 //
analyzed: viśvakarma ukta mārgeṇa purāṇa uktām nṛpa uttama

original: kārayet pratimāṃ divyāṃ puṣṭāṅgena tu dhīmatā /
analyzed: kārayet pratimām divyām puṣṭa aṅgena tu dhīmatā

original: saumyānanāṃ suśravanāṃ sunāsāṃ ca sulocanām // NsP_56.11 //
analyzed: saumya ānanām su śravanām su nāsām ca su locanām

original: nādhodṛṣṭiṃ nordhvadṛṣṭiṃ tiryagdṛṣṭiṃ na kārayet /
analyzed: na adhas dṛṣṭim na ūrdhva dṛṣṭim tiryak dṛṣṭim na kārayet

original: kārayet samadṛṣṭiṃ tu padmapatrāyatekṣaṇām // NsP_56.12 //
analyzed: kārayet sama dṛṣṭim tu padma patra āyata īkṣaṇām

original: subhruvaṃ sulalātāṃ ca sukapolāṃ samāṃ śubhām /
analyzed: su bhruvam su lalātām ca su kapolām samām śubhām

original: bimbauṣṭhīṃ suṣṭhucibukāṃ sugrīvāṃ kārayed budhaḥ // NsP_56.13 //
analyzed: bimba oṣṭhīm suṣṭhu cibukām su grīvām kārayet budhaḥ

original: upabāhukare deyaṃ dakṣiṇe cakram arkavat /
analyzed: upa bāhu kare deyam dakṣiṇe cakram arka vat

original: nābhisaṃlagnadivyāraṃ parito nemisaṃyutam // NsP_56.14 //
analyzed: nābhi saṃlagna divya āram paritas nemi saṃyutam

original: vāmapārśve ity upabhuje deyaṃ śaṅkhaṃ śaśiprabham /
analyzed: vāma pārśve iti upa bhuje deyam śaṅkham śaśi prabham

original: pāñcajanyam iti khyātaṃ daityadarpaharaṃ śubham // NsP_56.15 //
analyzed: pāñcajanyam iti khyātam daitya darpa haram śubham

original: hārārpitavarāṃ divyāṃ kaṇṭhe trivalisaṃyutām /
analyzed: hāra arpita varām divyām kaṇṭhe tri vali saṃyutām

original: sustanīṃ cāruhṛdayāṃ sujaṭharāṃ samāṃ śubhām // NsP_56.16 //
analyzed: su stanīm cāru hṛdayām su jaṭharām samām śubhām

original: kaṭilagnavāmakarāṃ padmalagnāṃ ca dakṣiṇām /
analyzed: kaṭi lagna vāma karām padma lagnām ca dakṣiṇām

original: keyūrabāhukāṃ divyāṃ sunābhivalibhaṅgikām // NsP_56.17 //
analyzed: keyūra bāhukām divyām su nābhi vali bhaṅgikām

original: sukaṭīṃ ca sujaṅghorūṃ vastramekhalabhūṣitām /
analyzed: su kaṭīm ca su jaṅghā ūrūm vastra mekhala bhūṣitām

original: evaṃ tāṃ kārayitvā tu pratimāṃ rājasattama // NsP_56.18 //
analyzed: evam tām kārayitvā tu pratimām rāja sattama

original: suvarṇavastradānena tatkartṝn pūjya sattama /
analyzed: suvarṇa vastra dānena tad kartṝn pūjya sattama

original: pūrvapakṣe śubhe kāle pratimāṃ sthāpayed budhaḥ // NsP_56.19 //
analyzed: pūrvapakṣe śubhe kāle pratimām sthāpayet budhaḥ

original: prāsādasyāgrataḥ kṛtvā yāgamaṇḍapam uttamam /
analyzed: prāsādasya agratas kṛtvā yāga maṇḍapam uttamam

original: caturdvāraṃ caturdikṣu caturbhis toraṇair yutam // NsP_56.20 //
analyzed: catur dvāram catur dikṣu caturbhiḥ toraṇaiḥ yutam

original: saptadhānyāṅkurair yuktaṃ śaṅkhabherīnināditam /
analyzed: sapta dhānya aṅkuraiḥ yuktam śaṅkha bherī nināditam

original: pratimāṃ kṣālya vidvadbhiḥ ṣattriṃśadbhir ghaṭodakaiḥ // NsP_56.21 //
analyzed: pratimām kṣālya vidvadbhiḥ ṣattriṃśadbhiḥ ghaṭa udakaiḥ

original: praviśya maṇḍape tasmin brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ /
analyzed: praviśya maṇḍape tasmin brāhmaṇaiḥ vedapāragaiḥ

original: tatrāpi snāpayet paścāt pañcagavyaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak // NsP_56.22 //
analyzed: tatra api snāpayet paścāt pañcagavyaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: tathoṣṇavāriṇā snāpya punaḥ śītodakena ca /
analyzed: tathā uṣṇa vāriṇā snāpya punar śīta udakena ca

original: haridrākuṅkumādyais tu candanaiś copalepayet // NsP_56.23 //
analyzed: haridrā kuṅkuma ādyaiḥ tu candanaiḥ ca upalepayet

original: puṣpamālyair alaṃkṛtya vastrair ācchādya tāṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: puṣpa mālyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya vastraiḥ ācchādya tām punar

original: puṇyāhaṃ tatra kṛtvā tu ṛgbhis tā prokṣya vāribhiḥ // NsP_56.24 //
analyzed: puṇyāham tatra kṛtvā tu ṛgbhiḥ tāḥ prokṣya vāribhiḥ

original: snātvā tāṃ brāhmaṇair bhaktaiḥ śaṅkhabherīsvanair yuktam /
analyzed: snātvā tām brāhmaṇaiḥ bhaktaiḥ śaṅkha bherī svanaiḥ yuktam

original: vāsayet saptarātraṃ tu trirātraṃ vā nadījale // NsP_56.25 //
analyzed: vāsayet sapta rātram tu tri rātram vā nadī jale

original: hṛde tu vimale śuddhe taḍāge vāpi rakṣayet /
analyzed: hṛde tu vimale śuddhe taḍāge vā api rakṣayet

original: adhivāsya jale devam evaṃ pārthivapuṃgava // NsP_56.26 //
analyzed: adhivāsya jale devam evam pārthiva puṃgava

original: tata utthāpya viprais tu sthāpyālaṃkṛtya pūrvavat /
analyzed: tatas utthāpya vipraiḥ tu sthāpya alaṃkṛtya pūrvavat

original: tato bherīninādais tu vedaghoṣaiś ca keśavam // NsP_56.27 //
analyzed: tatas bherī ninādaiḥ tu veda ghoṣaiḥ ca keśavam

original: ānīya maṇḍape śuddhe padmākāravinirmite /
analyzed: ānīya maṇḍape śuddhe padma ākāra vinirmite

original: kṛtvā punas tataḥ snāpya viṣṇubhaktair alaṃkriyāt // NsP_56.28 //
analyzed: kṛtvā punar tatas snāpya viṣṇu bhaktaiḥ alaṃkriyāt

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu vidhivat ṣoḍaśartvijaḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu vidhivat ṣoḍaśa ṛtvijaḥ

original: caturbhir adhyayanaṃ kāryaṃ caturbhir pālanaṃ tathā // NsP_56.29 //
analyzed: caturbhiḥ adhyayanam kāryam caturbhiḥ pālanam tathā

original: caturbhis tu caturdikṣu homaḥ kāryo vicakṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: caturbhiḥ tu catur dikṣu homaḥ kāryaḥ vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: pūṣpākṣatānnamiśreṇa dadyād dikṣu balīn nṛpa // NsP_56.30 //
analyzed: pūṣpa akṣata anna miśreṇa dadyāt dikṣu balīn nṛpa

original: ekena dāpayet teṣām indrādyaḥ prīyantām iti /
analyzed: ekena dāpayet teṣām indra ādyaḥ prīyantām iti

original: pratyekaṃ sāyaṃ saṃdhyāyāṃ madhyarātre tathoṣasi // NsP_56.31 //
analyzed: pratyekam sāyam saṃdhyāyām madhyarātre tathā uṣasi

original: udite ca tato dadyān mātṛvipragaṇāya vā /
analyzed: udite ca tatas dadyāt mātṛ vipra gaṇāya vā

original: japan puruṣasūktaṃ tu ekatas tu punaḥ punaḥ // NsP_56.32 //
analyzed: japan puruṣasūktam tu ekatas tu punar punar

original: ekato manasā rājan viṣṇor mandiramadhyagaḥ /
analyzed: ekatas manasā rājan viṣṇoḥ mandira madhya gaḥ

original: ahorātroṣito bhūtvā yajamāno dvijaiḥ saha // NsP_56.33 //
analyzed: ahar rātra uṣitaḥ bhūtvā yajamānaḥ dvijaiḥ saha

original: praviśya pratimādvāraṃ śubhalagne vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: praviśya pratimā dvāram śubha lagne vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: devasūktaṃ dvijaiḥ sārdham upasthāpya ca tāṃ dṛḍham // NsP_56.34 //
analyzed: devasūktam dvijaiḥ sārdham upasthāpya ca tām dṛḍham

original: saṃsthāpya viṣṇusūktena pavamānena vā punaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsthāpya viṣṇusūktena pavamānena vā punar

original: prokṣayed devadeveśam ācāryaḥ kuśavāriṇā // NsP_56.35 //
analyzed: prokṣayet devadeveśam ācāryaḥ kuśa vāriṇā

original: tadagre cāgnim ādhāya saṃparistīrya yatnataḥ /
analyzed: tad agre ca agnim ādhāya saṃparistīrya yatnataḥ

original: juhuyāj jātakarmādi gāyatryā vaiṣṇavena tu // NsP_56.36 //
analyzed: juhuyāt jātakarma ādi gāyatryā vaiṣṇavena tu

original: caturbhir ājyāhutibhir ekām ekāṃ kriyāṃ prati /
analyzed: caturbhiḥ ājya āhutibhiḥ ekām ekām kriyām prati

original: ācāryas tu svayaṃ kuryād astrair bandhaṃ ca kārayet // NsP_56.37 //
analyzed: ācāryaḥ tu svayam kuryāt astraiḥ bandham ca kārayet

original: trātāram iti caindryāṃ tu kuryād ājyapraṇunnakam /
analyzed: trātāram iti ca aindryām tu kuryāt ājya praṇunnakam

original: parodiveti yāmyāyāṃ vāruṇyāṃ niṣaveti ca // NsP_56.38 //
analyzed: parodivā iti yāmyāyām vāruṇyām niṣavā iti ca

original: yā te rudreti sāumyāṃ tu huved ājyāhutīr nṛpa /
analyzed: yā te rudra iti sāumyām tu huvet ājya āhutīḥ nṛpa

original: paromātreti sūktābhyāṃ sarvatrājyāhutīr nṛpa // NsP_56.39 //
analyzed: paromātrā iti sūktābhyām sarvatra ājya āhutīḥ nṛpa

original: hutvā japec ca vidhivad yad asyeti ca sviṣṭakṛt /
analyzed: hutvā japet ca vidhivat yat asya iti ca sviṣṭakṛt

original: tataḥ sa dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād ṛtvigbhyaś ca yathārhataḥ // NsP_56.40 //
analyzed: tatas sa dakṣiṇām dadyāt ṛtvigbhyaḥ ca yathārhataḥ

original: vastre dve kuṇḍale caiva gurave cāṅgulīyakam /
analyzed: vastre dve kuṇḍale ca eva gurave ca aṅgulīyakam

original: yajamānas tato dadyād vibhave sati kāñcanam // NsP_56.41 //
analyzed: yajamānaḥ tatas dadyāt vibhave sati kāñcanam

original: kalaśāṣṭasahasreṇa kalaśāṣṭaśatena vā /
analyzed: kalaśa aṣṭa sahasreṇa kalaśa aṣṭaśatena vā

original: ekaviṃśatinā vāpi snapanaṃ kārayed budhaḥ // NsP_56.42 //
analyzed: ekaviṃśatinā vā api snapanam kārayet budhaḥ

original: śaṅkhadundubhinirghoṣair vedaghoṣaiś ca maṅgalaiḥ /
analyzed: śaṅkha dundubhi nirghoṣaiḥ veda ghoṣaiḥ ca maṅgalaiḥ

original: yavavrīhiyutaiḥ pātrair uddhṛtair ucchritāṅkuraiḥ // NsP_56.43 //
analyzed: yava vrīhi yutaiḥ pātraiḥ uddhṛtaiḥ ucchrita aṅkuraiḥ

original: dīpayaṣṭipatākābhiś chatracāmaratoraṇaiḥ /
analyzed: dīpa yaṣṭi patākābhiḥ chatra cāmara toraṇaiḥ

original: snapanaṃ kārayitvā tu yathāvibhavavistaram // NsP_56.44 //
analyzed: snapanam kārayitvā tu yathā vibhava vistaram

original: tatrāpi dadyād viprebhyo yathāśaktyā tu dakṣiṇām /
analyzed: tatra api dadyāt viprebhyaḥ yathāśaktyā tu dakṣiṇām

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute rājan pratiṣṭhāṃ devacakriṇaḥ // NsP_56.45 //
analyzed: evam yaḥ kurute rājan pratiṣṭhām deva cakriṇaḥ

original: sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sarvabhūṣaṇabhūṣitaḥ /
analyzed: sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ sarva bhūṣaṇa bhūṣitaḥ

original: vimānena vicitreṇa trissaptakulajair vṛtaḥ // NsP_56.46 //
analyzed: vimānena vicitreṇa tris sapta kula jaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: pūjāṃ saṃprāpya mahatīm indralokādiṣu kramāt /
analyzed: pūjām saṃprāpya mahatīm indra loka ādiṣu kramāt

original: bāndhavāṃs teṣu saṃsthāpya viṣṇuloke mahīyate // NsP_56.47 //
analyzed: bāndhavān teṣu saṃsthāpya viṣṇu loke mahīyate

original: tatraiva jñānam āsādya vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
analyzed: tatra eva jñānam āsādya vaiṣṇavam padam āpnuyāt

original: pratiṣṭhāvidhir ayaṃ viṣṇor mayaivaṃ te prakīrtitaḥ // NsP_56.47 //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā vidhiḥ ayam viṣṇoḥ mayā evam te prakīrtitaḥ

original: paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpapraṇāśanaḥ // NsP_56.49 //
analyzed: paṭhatām śṛṇvatām ca eva sarva pāpa praṇāśanaḥ

original: yadā nṛsiṃhaṃ naranātha bhūmau saṃsthāpya viṣṇuṃ vidhinā hy anena /
analyzed: yadā nṛsiṃham nara nātha bhūmau saṃsthāpya viṣṇum vidhinā hi anena

original: tadā hy asau yāti hareḥ padaṃ tu yatra sthito 'yaṃ na nivartate punaḥ // NsP_56.50 //
analyzed: tadā hi asau yāti hareḥ padam tu yatra sthitaḥ yam na nivartate punar

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe pratiṣṭhāvidhir nāma ṣaṭpañcāśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 56 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe pratiṣṭhāvidhiḥ nāma ṣaṭpañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: rājovāca:
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: bhaktānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi narasiṃh asya me dvija /
analyzed: bhaktānām lakṣaṇam brūhi narasiṃh asya me dvija

original: yeṣāṃ saṃgatimātreṇa viṣṇuloko na dūrataḥ // NsP_57.1 //
analyzed: yeṣām saṃgati mātreṇa viṣṇu lokaḥ na dūratas

original: śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: viṣṇubhaktā mahotsāhā viṣṇvarcanavidhau sadā /
analyzed: viṣṇu bhaktāḥ mahā utsāhāḥ viṣṇu arcana vidhau sadā

original: saṃyatā dharmasaṃpannāḥ sarvārthān sādhayanti te // NsP_57.2 //
analyzed: saṃyatāḥ dharma saṃpannāḥ sarva arthān sādhayanti te

original: paropakāraniratā guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ /
analyzed: para upakāra niratāḥ guru śuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ

original: varṇāśramācārayutāḥ sarveṣāṃ supriyaṃvadāḥ // NsP_57.3 //
analyzed: varṇa āśrama ācāra yutāḥ sarveṣām su priyaṃvadāḥ

original: vedavedārthatattvajñā gataroṣā gataspṛhāḥ /
analyzed: veda veda artha tattva jñāḥ gata roṣāḥ gata spṛhāḥ

original: śāntāś ca saumyavadanā nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇāḥ // NsP_57.4 //
analyzed: śāntāḥ ca saumya vadanāḥ nityam dharma parāyaṇāḥ

original: hitaṃ mitaṃ ca vaktāraḥ kāle śaktyātithipriyāḥ /
analyzed: hitam mitam ca vaktāraḥ kāle śaktyā atithi priyāḥ

original: dambhamāyāvinirmuktāḥ kāmakrodhavivarjitāḥ // NsP_57.5 //
analyzed: dambha māyā vinirmuktāḥ kāma krodha vivarjitāḥ

original: īdṛgvidhā narā dhīrāḥ kṣamāvanto bahuśrutāḥ /
analyzed: īdṛgvidhāḥ narāḥ dhīrāḥ kṣamāvantaḥ bahu śrutāḥ

original: viṣṇukīrtanasaṃjāta- harṣā romāñcitā janāḥ // NsP_57.6 //
analyzed: viṣṇu kīrtana saṃjāta harṣāḥ romāñcitāḥ janāḥ

original: viṣṇvarcāpūjane yattās tatkathāyāṃ kṛtādarāḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇu arcā pūjane yattāḥ tad kathāyām kṛta ādarāḥ

original: īdṛgvidhā mahātmāno viṣṇubhaktāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // NsP_57.7 //
analyzed: īdṛgvidhāḥ mahātmānaḥ viṣṇu bhaktāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: rājovāca:
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: ye varṇāśramadharmasthās te bhaktāḥ keśavaṃ prati /
analyzed: ye varṇa āśrama dharma sthāḥ te bhaktāḥ keśavam prati

original: iti proktaṃ tvayā vidvan bhṛguvarya guro mama // NsP_57.8 //
analyzed: iti proktam tvayā vidvan bhṛgu varya guro mama

original: varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca dharmaṃ me vaktum arhasi /
analyzed: varṇānām āśramāṇām ca dharmam me vaktum arhasi

original: yaiḥ kṛtais tuṣyate devo narasiṃhaḥ sanātanaḥ // NsP_57.9 //
analyzed: yaiḥ kṛtaiḥ tuṣyate devaḥ narasiṃhaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: atre te varṇayiṣyāmi purāvṛttam anuttamam /
analyzed: atre te varṇayiṣyāmi purāvṛttam anuttamam

original: munibhiḥ saha saṃvādaṃ hārītasya mahātmanaḥ // NsP_57.10 //
analyzed: munibhiḥ saha saṃvādam hārītasya mahātmanaḥ

original: hārītaṃ dharmatattvajñam āsīnaṃ bahupāṭhakam /
analyzed: hārītam dharma tattva jñam āsīnam bahu pāṭhakam

original: praṇipatyābruvan sarve munayo dharmakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // NsP_57.11 //
analyzed: praṇipatya abruvan sarve munayaḥ dharma kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: bhagavan sarvadharmajña sarvadharmapravartaka /
analyzed: bhagavan sarva dharma jña sarva dharma pravartaka

original: varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca dharmaṃ prabrūhi śāśvatam // NsP_57.12 //
analyzed: varṇānām āśramāṇām ca dharmam prabrūhi śāśvatam

original: hārīta uvāca:
analyzed: hārītaḥ uvāca

original: nārāyaṇaḥ purā devo jagatsraṣṭā jalopari /
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ purā devaḥ jagatsraṣṭā jala upari

original: suṣvāpa bhogiparyaṅke śayane tu śriyā saha // NsP_57.13 //
analyzed: suṣvāpa bhogi paryaṅke śayane tu śriyā saha

original: tasya suptasya nābhau tu divyaṃ padmam abhūt kila /
analyzed: tasya suptasya nābhau tu divyam padmam abhūt kila

original: tanmadhye cābhavad brahmā vedavedāṅgabhūṣaṇaḥ // NsP_57.14 //
analyzed: tad madhye ca abhavat brahmā veda vedāṅga bhūṣaṇaḥ

original: sa coktas tena devena brāhmaṇān mukhato 'sṛjat /
analyzed: sa ca uktaḥ tena devena brāhmaṇān mukhataḥ sṛjat

original: asṛjat kṣatriyān bāhvor vaiśyāṃs tu ūruto 'sṛjat // NsP_57.15 //
analyzed: asṛjat kṣatriyān bāhvoḥ vaiśyān tu ūrutaḥ sṛjat

original: śūdrās tu pādataḥ sṛṣṭās teṣāṃ caivānupūrvaśaḥ /
analyzed: śūdrāḥ tu pādataḥ sṛṣṭāḥ teṣām ca eva anupūrvaśas

original: dharmaśāstraṃ ca maryādāṃ provāca kamalodbhavaḥ // NsP_57.16 //
analyzed: dharma śāstram ca maryādām provāca kamalodbhavaḥ

original: tadvat sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇuta dvijasattamāḥ /
analyzed: tadvat sarvam pravakṣyāmi śṛṇuta dvijasattamāḥ

original: dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargamokṣaphalapradam // NsP_57.17 //
analyzed: dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam svarga mokṣa phala pradam

original: brāhmaṇyāṃ brāhmaṇenaiva cotpanno brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇyām brāhmaṇena eva ca utpannaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tasya dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi tadyogyaṃ deśam eva ca // NsP_57.18 //
analyzed: tasya dharmam pravakṣyāmi tad yogyam deśam eva ca

original: kṛṣṇasāro mṛgo yatra svabhāvāt tu pravartate /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa sāraḥ mṛgaḥ yatra svabhāvāt tu pravartate

original: tasmin deśe vaser dharmaṃ kuru brāhmaṇapuṃgava // NsP_57.19 //
analyzed: tasmin deśe vaseḥ dharmam kuru brāhmaṇa puṃgava

original: ṣaṭkarmāṇi ca yāny āhur brāhmaṇasya manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭkarmāṇi ca yāni āhuḥ brāhmaṇasya manīṣiṇaḥ

original: tair eva satataṃ yas tu pravṛttaḥ sukham edhate // NsP_57.20 //
analyzed: taiḥ eva satatam yaḥ tu pravṛttaḥ sukham edhate

original: adhyayanādhyāpanaṃ ca yajanaṃ yājanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: adhyayana adhyāpanam ca yajanam yājanam tathā

original: dānaṃ pratigrahaś ceti karmaṣaṭkam ihocyate // NsP_57.21 //
analyzed: dānam pratigrahaḥ ca iti karma ṣaṭkam iha ucyate

original: adhyāpanaṃ ca trividhaṃ dharmasyārthasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: adhyāpanam ca trividham dharmasya arthasya kāraṇam

original: śuśrūṣākāraṇaṃ caiva trividhaṃ parikīrtitam // NsP_57.22 //
analyzed: śuśrūṣā kāraṇam ca eva trividham parikīrtitam

original: yogyān adhyāpayec chiṣyān yājyān api ca yājayet /
analyzed: yogyān adhyāpayet śiṣyān yājyān api ca yājayet

original: vidhinā pratigṛhṇaṃś ca gṛhadharmapasiddhaye // NsP_57.23 //
analyzed: vidhinā pratigṛhṇan ca gṛha dharma pa siddhaye

original: vedam evābhyasen nityaṃ śubhe deśe samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: vedam eva abhyaset nityam śubhe deśe samāhitaḥ

original: nityaṃ naimittakaṃ kāmyaṃ karma kuryāt prayatnataḥ // NsP_57.24 //
analyzed: nityam naimittakam kāmyam karma kuryāt prayatnataḥ

original: guruśuśrūṣaṇaṃ caiva yathānyāyam atandritaḥ /
analyzed: guru śuśrūṣaṇam ca eva yathānyāyam atandritaḥ

original: sāyaṃ prātar upāsīta vidhināgniṃ dvijottamaḥ // NsP_57.25 //
analyzed: sāyam prātar upāsīta vidhinā agnim dvijottamaḥ

original: kṛtasnānas tu kurvīta vaiśvadevaṃ dine dine /
analyzed: kṛta snānaḥ tu kurvīta vaiśvadevam dine dine

original: atithiṃ cāgataṃ bhaktyā pūjayec chaktito gṛhī // NsP_57.26 //
analyzed: atithim ca āgatam bhaktyā pūjayet śaktitas gṛhī

original: anyān athāgatān dṛṣṭvā pūjayed avirodhataḥ /
analyzed: anyān atha āgatān dṛṣṭvā pūjayet avirodhataḥ

original: svadāranirato nityaṃ paradāravivarjitaḥ // NsP_57.27 //
analyzed: sva dāra nirataḥ nityam para dāra vivarjitaḥ

original: satyavādī jitakrodhaḥ svadharmanirato bhavet /
analyzed: satya vādī jita krodhaḥ svadharma nirataḥ bhavet

original: svakarmaṇi ca saṃprāpte pramādaṃ naiva kārayet // NsP_57.28 //
analyzed: sva karmaṇi ca saṃprāpte pramādam na eva kārayet

original: priyāṃ hitāṃ vaded vācaṃ paralokāvirodhinīm /
analyzed: priyām hitām vadet vācam para loka avirodhinīm

original: evaṃ dharmaḥ samuddiṣṭo brāhmaṇasya samāsataḥ /
analyzed: evam dharmaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ brāhmaṇasya samāsatas

original: dharmam evaṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt sa yāti brahmaṇaḥ padam // NsP_57.29 //
analyzed: dharmam evam tu yaḥ kuryāt sa yāti brahmaṇaḥ padam

original: ity eṣa dharmaḥ kathitomayā vai viprasya viprā akhilāghahārī /
analyzed: iti eṣa dharmaḥ kathitaḥ umayā vai viprasya viprāḥ akhila agha hārī

original: vadāmi rājādijanasya dharmaṃ pṛthak pṛthag bodhata vipravaryāḥ // NsP_57.30 //
analyzed: vadāmi rāja ādi janasya dharmam pṛthak pṛthak bodhata vipra varyāḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe brāhmaṇadharmakathanaṃ nāma saptapañcāśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 57 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe brāhmaṇadharmakathanam nāma saptapañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: hārīta uvāca:
analyzed: hārītaḥ uvāca

original: kṣatrādīnāṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ /
analyzed: kṣatra ādīnām pravakṣyāmi yathāvat anupūrvaśas

original: yena yena pravartante vidhinā kṣatriyādayaḥ // NsP_58.1 //
analyzed: yena yena pravartante vidhinā kṣatriya ādayaḥ

original: rājyasthaḥ kṣatriyaś caiva prajā dharmeṇa pālayet /
analyzed: rājya sthaḥ kṣatriyaḥ ca eva prajāḥ dharmeṇa pālayet

original: kuryād adhyayanaṃ samyag yajed yajñān yathāvidhi // NsP_58.2 //
analyzed: kuryāt adhyayanam samyak yajet yajñān yathāvidhi

original: dadyād dānaṃ dvijāgryebhyo dharmabuddhisamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: dadyāt dānam dvijāgryebhyaḥ dharma buddhi samanvitaḥ

original: svadāranirato nityaṃ paradāravivarjitaḥ // NsP_58.3 //
analyzed: sva dāra nirataḥ nityam para dāra vivarjitaḥ

original: nītiśāstrārthakuśalaḥ saṃdhivigrahatattvavit /
devabrāhmaṇabhaktaś ca pitṛkāryaparas tathā // NsP_58.4 //
analyzed: deva brāhmaṇa bhaktaḥ ca pitṛ kārya paraḥ tathā

original: dharmeṇaiva jayaṃ kāṅkṣed adharmaṃ parivarjayet /
analyzed: dharmeṇa eva jayam kāṅkṣet adharmam parivarjayet

original: uttamāṃ gatim āpnoti kṣatriyo 'thaivam ācaran // NsP_58.5 //
analyzed: uttamām gatim āpnoti kṣatriyaḥ tha evam ācaran

original: gorakṣākṛṣivāṇijyaṃ kuryād vaiśyo yathāvidhi /
analyzed: gorakṣā kṛṣi vāṇijyam kuryāt vaiśyaḥ yathāvidhi

original: dānadharmaṃ yathāśaktyā guruśuśrūṣaṇaṃ tathā // NsP_58.6 //
analyzed: dāna dharmam yathāśaktyā guru śuśrūṣaṇam tathā

original: lobhadambhavinirmuktaḥ satyavāg anasūyakaḥ /
analyzed: lobha dambha vinirmuktaḥ satya vāc anasūyakaḥ

original: svadāranirato dāntaḥ paradāravivarjitaḥ // NsP_58.7 //
analyzed: sva dāra nirataḥ dāntaḥ para dāra vivarjitaḥ

original: dhanair viprān samarceta yajñakāle tvarānvitaḥ /

original: yajñādhyayanadānāni kuryān nityam atandritaḥ // NsP_58.8 //
analyzed: yajña adhyayana dānāni kuryāt nityam atandritaḥ

original: pitṛkāryaṃ ca tatkāle narasiṃhārcanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: pitṛ kāryam ca tad kāle narasiṃha arcanam tathā

original: etad vaiśyasya karmoktaṃ svadharmam anutiṣṭataḥ // NsP_58.9 //
analyzed: etat vaiśyasya karma uktam svadharmam anutiṣṭataḥ

original: etad āsevamānas tu sa svargī syān na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: etat āsevamānaḥ tu sa svargī syāt na saṃśayaḥ

original: varṇatrayasya śuśrūṣāṃ kuryāc chūdraḥ prayatnataḥ // NsP_58.10 //
analyzed: varṇa trayasya śuśrūṣām kuryāt śūdraḥ prayatnataḥ

original: dāsavad brāhmaṇānāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa samācaret /
analyzed: dāsa vat brāhmaṇānām ca viśeṣeṇa samācaret

original: ayācitaṃ pradātavyaṃ kṛṣiṃ vṛttyartham ācaret // NsP_58.11 //
analyzed: a yācitam pradātavyam kṛṣim vṛtti artham ācaret

original: grahāṇāṃ māsikaṃ kāryaṃ pūjanaṃ nyāyadharmataḥ /
analyzed: grahāṇām māsikam kāryam pūjanam nyāya dharmataḥ

original: dhāraṇaṃ jīrṇavastrasya viprasyocchiṣṭamārjanam // NsP_58.12 //
analyzed: dhāraṇam jīrṇa vastrasya viprasya ucchiṣṭa mārjanam

original: svadāreṣu ratiṃ kuryāt paradāravivarjitaḥ /
analyzed: sva dāreṣu ratim kuryāt para dāra vivarjitaḥ

original: purāṇaśravaṇaṃ viprān narasiṃhasya pūjanam // NsP_58.13 //
analyzed: purāṇa śravaṇam viprāt narasiṃhasya pūjanam

original: tathā vipranamaskāraṃ kāryaṃ śraddhāsamanvitam /
analyzed: tathā vipra namaskāram kāryam śraddhā samanvitam

original: satyasaṃbhāṣaṇaṃ caiva rāgadveṣavivarjanam // NsP_58.14 //
analyzed: satya saṃbhāṣaṇam ca eva rāga dveṣa vivarjanam

original: itthaṃ kurvan sadā śūdro manovākkāyakarmabhiḥ /
analyzed: ittham kurvan sadā śūdraḥ manaḥ vāc kāya karmabhiḥ

original: sthānam aindram avāpnoti naṣṭapāpas tu puṇyabhāk // NsP_58.15 //
analyzed: sthānam aindram avāpnoti naṣṭa pāpaḥ tu puṇya bhāj

original: varṇeṣu dharmā vividhā mayoktā yathākramaṃ brāhmaṇavaryasādhitāḥ /
analyzed: varṇeṣu dharmāḥ vividhāḥ mayā uktāḥ yathākramam brāhmaṇa varya sādhitāḥ

original: śṛṇudhvam atrāśramadharmam ādyaṃ mayocyamānaṃ kramaśo munīndrāḥ // NsP_58.16 //
analyzed: śṛṇudhvam atrā āśrama dharmam ādyam mayā ucyamānam kramaśas muni indrāḥ

original: hārīta uvāca:
analyzed: hārītaḥ uvāca

original: upanīto māṇavako vased gurukule sadā /
analyzed: upanītaḥ māṇavakaḥ vaset guru kule sadā

analyzed: guroḥ priya hitam kāryam karmaṇā manasā girā

original: udakumbhaṃ guror dadyāt tathā cendhanam āharet // NsP_58.18 //
analyzed: uda kumbham guroḥ dadyāt tathā ca indhanam āharet

original: kuryād adhyayanaṃ pūrvaṃ brahmacārī yathāvidhi /
analyzed: kuryāt adhyayanam pūrvam brahmacārī yathāvidhi

original: vidhiṃ hitvā prakurvāṇo na svādhyāyaphalaṃ labhet // NsP_58.19 //
analyzed: vidhim hitvā prakurvāṇaḥ na svādhyāya phalam labhet

analyzed: na tad phalam avāpnoti kurvāṇaḥ vidhi vicyutaḥ

analyzed: śauca ācāram aśeṣam tu śikṣayet guru saṃnidhau

analyzed: ajinam daṇḍa kāṣṭham ca mekhalām ca upavītakam

original: dhārayed apramattas tu brahmacārī samāhitaḥ // NsP_58.22 //
analyzed: dhārayet apramattaḥ tu brahmacārī samāhitaḥ

original: sāyaṃ prātaś cared bhaikṣaṃ bhojanaṃ saṃyatendriyaḥ /
analyzed: sāyam prātar caret bhaikṣam bhojanam saṃyata indriyaḥ

original: guroḥ kule na bhikṣeta na jñātikulabandhuṣu // NsP_58.23 //
analyzed: guroḥ kule na bhikṣeta na jñāti kula bandhuṣu

original: alābhe tv anyagehānāṃ pūrvapurvaṃ ca varjayet /
analyzed: alābhe tu anya gehānām pūrva purvam ca varjayet

analyzed: ācamya prayataḥ nityam aśnīyāt guru anujñayā

original: śayanāt pūrvam utthāya darbhamṛddantaśodhanam /

original: vastrādikam athānyac ca gurave pratipādayet // NsP_58.25 //
analyzed: vastra ādikam atha anyat ca gurave pratipādayet

analyzed: snāne kṛte gurau paścāt snānam kurvīta yatnavān

original: brahmacārī vratī nityaṃ na kuryād dantaśodhanam // NsP_58.26 //
analyzed: brahmacārī vratī nityam na kuryāt danta śodhanam

original: nṛtyagītakathālāpaṃ maithunaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // NsP_58.27 //
analyzed: nṛtya gīta kathā ālāpam maithunam ca viśeṣataḥ

analyzed: varjayet madhu māṃsam ca rasa āsvādam tathā striyaḥ

original: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca parivādaṃ tathā nṛṇām // NsP_58.28 //
analyzed: kāmam krodham ca lobham ca parivādam tathā nṛṇām

original: strīṇāṃ ca prekṣaṇālambham upaghātaṃ parasya ca /
analyzed: strīṇām ca prekṣaṇa ālambham upaghātam parasya ca

original: ekaḥ śayīta sarvatra na retaḥ skandayet kvacit // NsP_58.29 //
analyzed: ekaḥ śayīta sarvatra na retaḥ skandayet kvacid

original: svapne siktvā brahmacārī dvijaḥ śukram akāmataḥ /
analyzed: svapne siktvā brahmacārī dvijaḥ śukram akāmataḥ

analyzed: snātvā arkam arcayitvā agnim punar mām iti ṛcam japet

analyzed: āstikaḥ har ahar saṃdhyām tri kālam saṃyata indriyaḥ

analyzed: upāsīta yathānyāyam brahmacāri vrate sthitaḥ

analyzed: yathāyogam prakurvīta mātā pitroḥ tu bhaktitaḥ

analyzed: adhītya caturaḥ vedān vedau vedam atha api vā

analyzed: saṃnyaset a kṛta udvāhaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ brahmacaryavān

analyzed: tena bhūyas prajāyeta brahmacārī dṛḍha vrataḥ

analyzed: yaḥ brahmacārī vidhim etam āsthitaḥ caret pṛthivyām guru sevane rataḥ

original: hārīta uvāca:
analyzed: hārītaḥ uvāca

original: gṛhītavedādhyayanaḥ śrutiśāstrārthatattvavit /
analyzed: gṛhīta veda adhyayanaḥ śruti śāstra artha tattva vid

original: guror dattavaraḥ samyak samāvartanam ārabhet // NsP_58.39 //

original: sarvāvayavasaṃyuktāṃ sadvṛttām udvahet tataḥ // NsP_58.40 //

analyzed: brāhmeṇa vidhinā kuryāt praśastena dvijottamaḥ

original: yathāyogaṃ tathā hy evaṃ vivāhaṃ varṇadharmataḥ // NsP_58.44 //
analyzed: yathāyogam tathā hi evam vivāham varṇa dharmataḥ

analyzed: kuryāt snānam tatas vidvān danta dhāvana pūrvakam

original: apāmārgaṃ ca bilvaṃ ca arkaś codumbaras tathā // NsP_58.47 //

analyzed: dantadhāvana kāṣṭham ca vakṣyāmi tad praśasta tām

analyzed: aṣṭa aṅgulena mānena tat pramāṇam iha ucyate

original: prādeśamātram athavā tena dantān viśodhayet /

analyzed: pratipad darśa ṣaṣṭhīṣu navamyām ca eva sattamāḥ

analyzed: dantānām kāṣṭha saṃyogāt dahati āsaptamam kulam

original: alābhe dantakāṣṭhasya pratiṣiddhe ca taddine // NsP_58.51 //

original: apāṃ dvādaśagaṇḍūṣair mukhaśuddhir vidhīyate /

analyzed: snātvā mantravat ācamya punar ācamanam caret

original: ādityena saha prātar mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ // NsP_58.53 //

original: yudhyanti varadānena brahmaṇo 'vyaktajanmanaḥ /
analyzed: yudhyanti vara dānena brahmaṇaḥ vyakta janmanaḥ

original: udakāñjalivikṣepo gāyatryā cābhimantritaḥ // NsP_58.54 //
analyzed: udaka añjali vikṣepaḥ gāyatryā ca abhimantritaḥ

original: tān hanti rākṣasān sarvān mandehān ravivairiṇaḥ /

original: tataḥ prayāti savitā brāhmaṇai rakṣito divi // NsP_58.55 //
analyzed: tatas prayāti savitā brāhmaṇaiḥ rakṣitaḥ divi

original: marīcyādyair mahābhāgaiḥ sanakādyais ca yogibhiḥ /
analyzed: marīci ādyaiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ sanaka ādyaiḥ ca yogibhiḥ

original: tasmān na laṅghayet saṃdhyāṃ sāyaṃ prātar dvijaḥ sadā // NsP_58.56 //
analyzed: tasmāt na laṅghayet saṃdhyām sāyam prātar dvijaḥ sadā

original: ullaṅghayati yo mohāt sa yāti narakaṃ dhruvam /
analyzed: ullaṅghayati yaḥ mohāt sa yāti narakam dhruvam

original: sāyaṃ mantravad ācamya prokṣya sūryasya cāñjalim // NsP_58.57 //
analyzed: sāyam mantravat ācamya prokṣya sūryasya ca añjalim
