analyzed: gāyatrīm abhyaset tāvat yāvat ṛkṣāṇi paśyati

original: tatas tv āvasathaṃ prāpya homaṃ kuryāt svayaṃ budhaḥ // NsP_58.59 //
analyzed: tatas tu āvasatham prāpya homam kuryāt svayam budhaḥ

original: saṃcintya bhṛtyavargasya bharaṇārthaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: saṃcintya bhṛtya vargasya bharaṇa artham vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: tataḥ śiṣyahitārthāya svādhyāyaṃ kiṃcid ācaret // NsP_58.60 //
analyzed: tatas śiṣya hita arthāya svādhyāyam kiṃcid ācaret

original: īśvaraṃ caiva rakṣārtham abhigacched dvijottamaḥ /
analyzed: īśvaram ca eva rakṣā artham abhigacchet dvijottamaḥ

original: kuśapuṣpendhanādīni gatvā dūrāt samāharet // NsP_58.61 //
analyzed: kuśa puṣpa indhana ādīni gatvā dūrāt samāharet

original: mādhyāhnikīṃ kriyāṃ kuryāc *chucau deśe samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: mādhyāhnikīm kriyām kuryāt śucau deśe samāhitaḥ

original: vidhiṃ snānasya vakṣyāmi samāsāt pāpanāśanam // NsP_58.62 //
analyzed: vidhim snānasya vakṣyāmi samāsāt pāpa nāśanam

original: snātvā yena vidhānena sadyo mucyeta kilbiṣāt /
analyzed: snātvā yena vidhānena sadyas mucyeta kilbiṣāt

original: sudhīḥ snānārtham ādāya suklāṃ kuśatilaiḥ saha // NsP_58.63 //
analyzed: sudhīḥ snāna artham ādāya su klām kuśa tilaiḥ saha

original: sumanāś ca tato gacchen nadīṃ śuddhāṃ manoramām /
analyzed: sumanāḥ ca tatas gacchet nadīm śuddhām manoramām

original: nadyāṃ tu vidyamānāyāṃ na snāyād alpavāriṣu // NsP_58.64 //
analyzed: nadyām tu vidyamānāyām na snāyāt alpa vāriṣu

original: śucau deśe samabhyukṣya sthāpayet kuśamṛttikām /
analyzed: śucau deśe samabhyukṣya sthāpayet kuśa mṛttikām

original: mṛttoyena svakaṃ deham abhiprakṣālya yatnataḥ // NsP_58.65 //
analyzed: mṛd toyena svakam deham abhiprakṣālya yatnataḥ

original: snānāc charīraṃ saṃśodhya kuryād ācamanaṃ budhaḥ /
analyzed: snānāt śarīram saṃśodhya kuryāt ācamanam budhaḥ

original: śubhe jale praviśyātha named varuṇam appatim // NsP_58.66 //
analyzed: śubhe jale praviśya atha namet varuṇam appatim

original: harim eva smaraṃś citte nimajjec ca bahūdake /
analyzed: harim eva smaran citte nimajjet ca bahu udake

original: tataḥ snānaṃ samāsādyā apa ācamya mantrataḥ // NsP_58.67 //
analyzed: tatas snānam samāsādya apaḥ ācamya mantrataḥ

original: prokṣayed varuṇaṃ devaṃ tair mantraiḥ pāvamānibhiḥ /
analyzed: prokṣayet varuṇam devam taiḥ mantraiḥ pāvamānibhiḥ

original: kuśāgrasthena toyena prokṣyātmānaṃ prayatnataḥ // NsP_58.68 //
analyzed: kuśa agra sthena toyena prokṣya ātmānam prayatnataḥ

original: ālabhen mṛttikāṃ gātre idaṃ viṣṇur iti tridhā /
analyzed: ālabhet mṛttikām gātre idam viṣṇuḥ iti tridhā

original: tato nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ saṃsmaran praviśej jalam // NsP_58.69 //
analyzed: tatas nārāyaṇam devam saṃsmaran praviśet jalam

original: nimajjyāntarjale samyak triḥ paṭhed aghamarṣaṇam /
analyzed: nimajjya antar jale samyak tris paṭhet aghamarṣaṇam

original: snātvā kuśatilais tadvad devarṣīn pitṛbhiḥ saha // NsP_58.70 //
analyzed: snātvā kuśa tilaiḥ tadvat devarṣīn pitṛbhiḥ saha

original: tarpayitvā jalāt tasmān niṣkramya ca samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: tarpayitvā jalāt tasmāt niṣkramya ca samāhitaḥ

original: jalatīraṃ samāsādya dhaute śukle ca vāsasī // NsP_58.71 //
analyzed: jala tīram samāsādya dhaute śukle ca vāsasī

original: paridhāyottarīyaṃ ca na kuryāt keśadhūnanam /
analyzed: paridhāya uttarīyam ca na kuryāt keśa dhūnanam

original: na raktam ulbaṇaṃ vāso na nīlaṃ tat praśasyate // NsP_58.72 //
analyzed: na raktam ulbaṇam vāsaḥ na nīlam tat praśasyate

original: malāktaṃ tu daśāhīnaṃ varjayed ambaraṃ budhaḥ /
analyzed: mala aktam tu daśā hīnam varjayet ambaram budhaḥ

original: tataḥ prakṣālayet pādau mṛttoyena vicakṣaṇaḥ // NsP_58.73 //
analyzed: tatas prakṣālayet pādau mṛd toyena vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: triḥ pibed vīkṣitaṃ toyam āsyaṃ dviḥ parimārjayet /
analyzed: tris pibet vīkṣitam toyam āsyam dvis parimārjayet

original: pādau śirasi cābhyukṣet trir ācamya tu saṃspṛśet // NsP_58.74 //
analyzed: pādau śirasi ca abhyukṣet tris ācamya tu saṃspṛśet

original: aṅguṣṭhena pradeśinyā nāsikāṃ samupaspṛśet /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhena pradeśinyāḥ nāsikām samupaspṛśet

original: aṅguṣṭhakaniṣṭhikābhyāṃ nābhau hṛdi talena ca // NsP_58.75 //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha kaniṣṭhikābhyām nābhau hṛdi talena ca

original: śiraś cāṅgulibhiḥ sarvair bāhuṃ caiva tataḥ spṛśet /
analyzed: śiraḥ ca aṅgulibhiḥ sarvaiḥ bāhum ca eva tatas spṛśet

original: anena vidhinācamya brāhmaṇaḥ śuddhamānasaḥ // NsP_58.76 //
analyzed: anena vidhinā ācamya brāhmaṇaḥ śuddha mānasaḥ

original: darbhe tu darbhapāṇiḥ syāt prāṅmukhaḥ susamāhitaḥ /
analyzed: darbhe tu darbha pāṇiḥ syāt prāc mukhaḥ su samāhitaḥ

original: prāṇāyāmāṃs tu kurvīta yathāśāstram atandritaḥ // NsP_58.77 //
analyzed: prāṇāyāmān tu kurvīta yathāśāstram atandritaḥ

original: japayajñaṃ tataḥ kuryād gāyatrīṃ vedamātaram /
analyzed: japa yajñam tatas kuryāt gāyatrīm vedamātaram

original: trividho japayajñaḥ syāt tasya bhedaṃ nibodhata // NsP_58.78 //
analyzed: trividhaḥ japa yajñaḥ syāt tasya bhedam nibodhata

original: vācikaś ca upāṃśuś ca mānasas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vācikaḥ ca upāṃśuḥ ca mānasaḥ trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: trayāṇāṃ japayajñānāṃ śreyaḥ syād uttarottamam // NsP_58.79 //
analyzed: trayāṇām japa yajñānām śreyaḥ syāt uttarottamam

original: yad uccanīcasvaritaiḥ spaṣṭaśabdavadakṣaraiḥ /
analyzed: yat ucca nīca svaritaiḥ spaṣṭa śabdavat akṣaraiḥ

original: śabdam uccārayed vācā japayajñaḥ sa vācikaḥ // NsP_58.80 //
analyzed: śabdam uccārayet vācā japa yajñaḥ sa vācikaḥ

original: śanair uccārayen mantram īṣad oṣṭhau pracālayet /
analyzed: śanais uccārayet mantram īṣat oṣṭhau pracālayet

original: kiṃcin mantraṃ svayaṃ vindyād upāṃśuḥ sa japaḥ smṛtaḥ // NsP_58.81 //
analyzed: kiṃcid mantram svayam vindyāt upāṃśuḥ sa japaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: dhiyā yad akṣaraśreṇyā varṇād varṇaṃ padāt padam /
analyzed: dhiyā yat akṣara śreṇyā varṇāt varṇam padāt padam

original: śabdārthacintanaṃ dhyānaṃ tad uktaṃ mānasaṃ japaḥ // NsP_58.82 //
analyzed: śabda artha cintanam dhyānam tat uktam mānasam japaḥ

original: japena devatā nityaṃ stūyamānā prasīdati /
analyzed: japena devatā nityam stūyamānā prasīdati

original: prasannā vipulān bhogān dadyān muktiṃ ca śāśvatīm // NsP_58.83 //
analyzed: prasannā vipulān bhogān dadyāt muktim ca śāśvatīm

original: yakṣarakṣaḥ piśācāś ca grahāḥ sūryādidūṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: yakṣa rakṣaḥ piśācāḥ ca grahāḥ sūrya ādi dūṣaṇāḥ

original: jāpinaṃ nopasarpanti dūrad evāpayānti te // NsP_58.84 //
analyzed: jāpinam na upasarpanti dūrat eva apayānti te

original: ṛkṣādikaṃ parijñāya japayajñam atandritaḥ /
analyzed: ṛkṣa ādikam parijñāya japa yajñam atandritaḥ

original: japed ahar ahaḥ snātvā sāvitrīṃ tanmanā dvijaḥ // NsP_58.85 //
analyzed: japet ahar ahar snātvā sāvitrīm tad manāḥ dvijaḥ

original: sahasraparamāṃ devīṃ śatamadhyāṃ daśāvarām /
analyzed: sahasra paramām devīm śata madhyām daśa avarām

original: gāyatrīṃ yo japen nityaṃ na sa pāpair hi lipyate // NsP_58.86 //
analyzed: gāyatrīm yaḥ japet nityam na sa pāpaiḥ hi lipyate

original: atha puṣpāñjaliṃ dattvā bhānave cordhvabāhukaḥ /
analyzed: atha puṣpa añjalim dattvā bhānave ca ūrdhva bāhukaḥ

original: udutyaṃ ca japen mantraṃ citraṃ taccakṣur ity api // NsP_58.87 //
analyzed: udutyam ca japet mantram citram tat cakṣuḥ iti api

original: pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya namas kuryād divākaram /
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya namaḥ kuryāt divākaram

original: svena tīrthena devādīn adbhiḥ saṃtarpayed budhaḥ // NsP_58.88 //
analyzed: svena tīrthena deva ādīn adbhiḥ saṃtarpayet budhaḥ

original: devān devagaṇāṃś caiva ṛṣīn ṛṣigaṇāṃs tathā /
analyzed: devān deva gaṇān ca eva ṛṣīn ṛṣi gaṇān tathā

original: pitṝn pitṛgaṇāṃś caiva nityaṃ saṃtarpayed budhaḥ // NsP_58.89 //
analyzed: pitṝn pitṛ gaṇān ca eva nityam saṃtarpayet budhaḥ

original: snānavastraṃ tataḥ pīḍya punar ācamanaṃ caret /
analyzed: snāna vastram tatas pīḍya punar ācamanam caret

original: darbheṣu darbhapāṇiḥ syād brahmayajñavidhānataḥ // NsP_58.90 //
analyzed: darbheṣu darbha pāṇiḥ syāt brahmayajña vidhānataḥ

original: prāṅmukho brahmayajñaṃ tu kuryād buddhisamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: prāc mukhaḥ brahmayajñam tu kuryāt buddhi samanvitaḥ

original: tato 'rghaṃ bhānave dadyāt tilapuṣpajalānvitam // NsP_58.91 //
analyzed: tatas ṛgham bhānave dadyāt tila puṣpa jala anvitam

original: utthāya mūrdhaparyantaṃ haṃsaḥ śuciṣad ity ṛcā /
analyzed: utthāya mūrdha paryantam haṃsaḥ śuciṣad iti ṛcā

original: jale devaṃ namaskṛtya tato gṛhagataḥ punaḥ // NsP_58.92 //
analyzed: jale devam namaskṛtya tatas gṛha gataḥ punar

original: vidhinā puruṣasūktena tatra viṣṇuṃ samarcayet /
analyzed: vidhinā puruṣasūktena tatra viṣṇum samarcayet

original: vaiśvadevaṃ tataḥ kuryād balikarma yathāvidhi // NsP_58.93 //
analyzed: vaiśvadevam tatas kuryāt bali karma yathāvidhi

original: godohamātram atithiṃ prativīkṣeta vai gṛhī /
analyzed: godoha mātram atithim prativīkṣeta vai gṛhī

original: adṛṣṭapūrvam atithim āgataṃ prāk samarcayet // NsP_58.94 //
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvam atithim āgatam prāk samarcayet

original: āgatya ca punar dvāraṃ pratyutthānena sādhunā /
analyzed: āgatya ca punar dvāram pratyutthānena sādhunā

original: svāgatenāgnayas tuṣṭā bhavanti gṛhamedhinām // NsP_58.95 //
analyzed: svāgatena agnayaḥ tuṣṭāḥ bhavanti gṛhamedhinām

original: āsanena tu dattena prīto bhavati devarāṭ /
analyzed: āsanena tu dattena prītaḥ bhavati devarāj

original: pādaśaucena pitaraḥ prītim āyānti tasya ca // NsP_58.96 //
analyzed: pāda śaucena pitaraḥ prītim āyānti tasya ca

original: annādyena ca dattena tṛpyatīha prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: annādyena ca dattena tṛpyati iha prajāpatiḥ

original: tasmād atithaye kāryaṃ pūjanaṃ gṛhamedhinā // NsP_58.97 //
analyzed: tasmāt atithaye kāryam pūjanam gṛhamedhinā

original: bhaktyā ca bhaktimān nityaṃ viṣṇum abhyarcya cintayet /
analyzed: bhaktyā ca bhaktimān nityam viṣṇum abhyarcya cintayet

original: bhikṣāṃ ca bhikṣave dadyāt parivrāḍbrahmacāriṇe // NsP_58.98 //
analyzed: bhikṣām ca bhikṣave dadyāt parivrāj brahmacāriṇe

original: ākalpitānnād uddhṛtya sarvavyañjanasaṃyutam /
analyzed: ākalpita annāt uddhṛtya sarva vyañjana saṃyutam

original: dadyāc ca manasā nityaṃ bhikṣāṃ bhikṣoḥ prayatnataḥ // NsP_58.99 //
analyzed: dadyāt ca manasā nityam bhikṣām bhikṣoḥ prayatnataḥ

original: akṛte vaiśvadeve tu bhikṣau bhikṣārtham āgate /
analyzed: a kṛte vaiśvadeve tu bhikṣau bhikṣā artham āgate

original: avaśyam eva dātavyaṃ svargasopānakārakam // NsP_58.100 //
analyzed: avaśyam eva dātavyam svarga sopāna kārakam

original: uddhṛtya vaiśvadevānnaṃ bhikṣāṃ dattvā visarjayet /
analyzed: uddhṛtya vaiśvadeva annam bhikṣām dattvā visarjayet

original: vaiśvadevākṛtaṃ doṣaṃ śakto bhikṣur vyapohitum // NsP_58.101 //
analyzed: vaiśvadeva a kṛtam doṣam śaktaḥ bhikṣuḥ vyapohitum

original: suvāsinīḥ kumārīś ca bhojayitvāturān api /
analyzed: suvāsinīḥ kumārīḥ ca bhojayitvā āturān api

original: bālavṛddhāṃs tataḥ śeṣaṃ svayaṃ bhuñjīta vai gṛhī // NsP_58.102 //
analyzed: bāla vṛddhān tatas śeṣam svayam bhuñjīta vai gṛhī

original: prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi maunī ca mitabhāṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: prāc mukha udak mukhaḥ vā api maunī ca mita bhāṣaṇaḥ

original: annaṃ pūrvaṃ namaskṛtya prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā // NsP_58.103 //
analyzed: annam pūrvam namaskṛtya prahṛṣṭena antarātmanā

original: pañca prāṇāhutīḥ kuryāt sa mantreṇa pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: pañca prāṇāhutīḥ kuryāt sa mantreṇa pṛthak pṛthak

original: tataḥ svādukaraṃ cānnaṃ bhuñjīta susamāhitaḥ // NsP_58.104 //
analyzed: tatas svādu karam ca annam bhuñjīta su samāhitaḥ

original: ācamya devatām iṣṭāṃ saṃsmared udaraṃ spṛśan /
analyzed: ācamya devatām iṣṭām saṃsmaret udaram spṛśan

original: itihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ kaṃcit kālaṃ nayed budhaḥ // NsP_58.105 //
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇābhyām kaṃcid kālam nayet budhaḥ

original: tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsīta bahir gatvā vidhānataḥ /
analyzed: tatas saṃdhyām upāsīta bahis gatvā vidhānataḥ

original: kṛtahomaś ca bhuñjīta rātrāv atithim arcayet // NsP_58.106 //
analyzed: kṛta homaḥ ca bhuñjīta rātrau atithim arcayet

original: sāyaṃ prātar dvijātīnām aśanaṃ śruticoditam /
analyzed: sāyam prātar dvijātīnām aśanam śruti coditam

original: nāntarā bhojanaṃ kuryād agnihotrasamo vidhiḥ // NsP_58.107 //
analyzed: na antarā bhojanam kuryāt agnihotra samaḥ vidhiḥ

original: śiṣyān adhyāpayet tadvad anadhyāyaṃ vivarjayet /
analyzed: śiṣyān adhyāpayet tadvat anadhyāyam vivarjayet

original: smṛtyuktān sakalān pūrvaṃ purāṇoktān api dvijaḥ // NsP_58.108 //
analyzed: smṛti uktān sakalān pūrvam purāṇa uktān api dvijaḥ

original: mahānavamyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ bharaṇyām api caiva hi /
analyzed: mahānavamyām dvādaśyām bharaṇyām api ca eva hi

original: tathākṣayyatṛtīyāyāṃ śiṣyān nādhyāpayed budhaḥ // NsP_58.109 //
analyzed: tathā akṣayyatṛtīyāyām śiṣyān na adhyāpayet budhaḥ

original: māghamāse tu saptamyāṃ rathyām adhyayanaṃ tyajet /
analyzed: māgha māse tu saptamyām rathyām adhyayanam tyajet

original: adhyāpanam athābhyajya snānakāle vivarjayet // NsP_58.110 //
analyzed: adhyāpanam atha abhyajya snāna kāle vivarjayet

original: dānaṃ ca vidhinā deyaṃ gṛhasthena hitaiṣiṇā /
analyzed: dānam ca vidhinā deyam gṛhasthena hita eṣiṇā

original: hiraṇyadānaṃ godānaṃ bhūmidānaṃ viśeṣataḥ // NsP_58.111 //
analyzed: hiraṇya dānam go dānam bhūmi dānam viśeṣataḥ

original: etāni yaḥ prayaccheta śrotriyebhyo dvijottamaḥ /
analyzed: etāni yaḥ prayaccheta śrotriyebhyaḥ dvijottamaḥ

original: sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ svargaloke mahīyate // NsP_58.112 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ svarga loke mahīyate

original: maṅgalācārayuktaś ca śuciḥ śraddhāparo gṛhī /
analyzed: maṅgalācāra yuktaḥ ca śuciḥ śraddhā paraḥ gṛhī

original: śrāddhaṃ ca śraddhayā kuryāt sa yāti brahmaṇaḥ padam // NsP_58.113 //
analyzed: śrāddham ca śraddhayā kuryāt sa yāti brahmaṇaḥ padam

original: jātāv utkarṣam āyāti narasiṃhaprasādataḥ /
analyzed: jātau utkarṣam āyāti narasiṃha prasādataḥ

original: sa tasmān muktim āpnoti brahmaṇā saha sattamāḥ // NsP_58.114 //
analyzed: sa tasmāt muktim āpnoti brahmaṇā saha sattamāḥ

original: evaṃ hi viprāḥ kathito mayā vaḥ samāsataḥ śāśvatadharmarāśiḥ /
analyzed: evam hi viprāḥ kathitaḥ mayā vaḥ samāsatas śāśvata dharma rāśiḥ

original: samyag gṛhasthasya sato hi dharmaṃ kurvan prayatnād dharim eti muktaḥ // NsP_58.115 //
analyzed: samyak gṛhasthasya sataḥ hi dharmam kurvan prayatnāt dharim eti muktaḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe gṛhasthadharmo nāmāṣṭapañcāśo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 58 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe gṛhasthadharmaḥ nāma aṣṭapañcāśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: hārīta uvāca:
analyzed: hārītaḥ uvāca

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vānaprasthasya lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi vānaprasthasya lakṣaṇam

original: dharmam agryaṃ mahābhāgāḥ kathyamānaṃ nibodhata // NsP_59.1 //
analyzed: dharmam agryam mahābhāgāḥ kathyamānam nibodhata

original: gṛhasthaḥ putrapautrādīn dṛṣṭvā palitam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: gṛhasthaḥ putra pautra ādīn dṛṣṭvā palitam ātmanaḥ

original: svabhāryāṃ tanaye sthāpye svaśiṣyaiḥ praviśed vanam // NsP_59.2 //
analyzed: sva bhāryām tanaye sthāpye sva śiṣyaiḥ praviśet vanam

original: jaṭākalāpacīrāṇi nakhagātraruhāṇi vā /
analyzed: jaṭā kalāpa cīrāṇi nakha gātra ruhāṇi vā

original: dhārayañ juhuyād agnau vaitānavidhinā sthitaḥ // NsP_59.3 //
analyzed: juhuyāt agnau vaitāna vidhinā sthitaḥ

original: bhṛtaparṇair mṛtsaṃbhūtair nīvārādyair atandritaḥ /
analyzed: bhṛta parṇaiḥ mṛd saṃbhūtaiḥ nīvāra ādyaiḥ atandritaḥ

original: kandamūlaphalair vāpi kuryān nityakriyāṃ budhaḥ // NsP_59.4 //
analyzed: kanda mūla phalaiḥ vā api kuryāt nityakriyām budhaḥ

original: trikālaṃ snānayuktas tu kuryāt tīvraṃ tapaḥ sadā /
analyzed: tri kālam snāna yuktaḥ tu kuryāt tīvram tapaḥ sadā

original: pakṣe gate vā aśnīyān māsānte vā parākakṛt // NsP_59.5 //
analyzed: pakṣe gate vā aśnīyāt māsa ante vā parāka kṛt

original: catuḥkāle 'pi cāśnīyāt kāle 'py uta tathāṣṭame /
analyzed: catuṣkāle pi ca aśnīyāt kāle pi uta tathā aṣṭame

original: ṣaṣṭhāhnakāle hy athavā athavā vāyubhakṣakaḥ // NsP_59.6 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhāhna kāle hi athavā athavā vāyubhakṣakaḥ

original: gharme pañcāgnimadhyastho dhārāvarṣāsu vai nayet /
analyzed: gharme pañcāgni madhya sthaḥ dhārā varṣāsu vai nayet

original: haimantike jale sthitvā nayet kālaṃ tapaś caran // NsP_59.7 //
analyzed: haimantike jale sthitvā nayet kālam tapaḥ caran

original: evaṃ svakarmabhogena kṛtvā śuddhim athātmanaḥ /
analyzed: evam sva karma bhogena kṛtvā śuddhim atha ātmanaḥ

original: agniṃ cātmani vai kṛtvā vrajed vāthottarāṃ diśam // NsP_59.8 //
analyzed: agnim ca ātmani vai kṛtvā vrajet vā atha uttarām diśam

original: ādehapātād vanago maunam āsthāya tāpasaḥ /
analyzed: ā dehapātāt vana gaḥ maunam āsthāya tāpasaḥ

original: smarann atīndriyaṃ brahma brahmaloke mahīyate // NsP_59.9 //
analyzed: smaran atīndriyam brahma brahma loke mahīyate

original: tapo hi yaḥ sevati kānanastho vasen mahatsattvasamādhiyuktaḥ /
analyzed: tapaḥ hi yaḥ sevati kānana sthaḥ vaset mahat sattva samādhi yuktaḥ

original: vimuktapāpo hi manaḥpraśāntaḥ prayāti viṣṇoḥ sadanaṃ dvijendraḥ // NsP_59.10 //
analyzed: vimukta pāpaḥ hi manaḥ praśāntaḥ prayāti viṣṇoḥ sadanam dvijendraḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe vānaprasthadharmo nāma ekonaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 59 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe vānaprasthadharmaḥ nāma ekonaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: hārīta uvāca:
analyzed: hārītaḥ uvāca

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi yatidharmam anuttamam /
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi yati dharmam anuttamam

original: śraddhayā yad anuṣṭhāya yatir mucyeta bandhanāt // NsP_60.1 //
analyzed: śraddhayā yat anuṣṭhāya yatiḥ mucyeta bandhanāt

original: evaṃ vanāśrame tiṣṭhaṃs tapasā dagdhakilbiṣaḥ /
analyzed: evam vana āśrame tiṣṭhan tapasā dagdha kilbiṣaḥ

original: caturtham āśramaṃ gacchet saṃnyasya vidhinā dvijaḥ // NsP_60.2 //
analyzed: caturtham āśramam gacchet saṃnyasya vidhinā dvijaḥ

original: divyaṃ ṛṣibhyo devebhyaḥ svapitṛbhyaś ca yatnataḥ /
analyzed: divyam ṛṣibhyaḥ devebhyaḥ sva pitṛbhyaḥ ca yatnataḥ

original: dattvā śrāddham ṛṣibhyaś ca manujebhyas tathātmane // NsP_60.3 //
analyzed: dattvā śrāddham ṛṣibhyaḥ ca manujebhyaḥ tathā ātmane

original: iṣṭiṃ vaiśvānarīṃ kṛtvā prājāpatyam athāpi vā /
analyzed: iṣṭim vaiśvānarīm kṛtvā prājāpatyam atha api vā

original: agniṃ svātmani saṃsthāpya mantravat pravrajet punaḥ // NsP_60.4 //
analyzed: agnim sva ātmani saṃsthāpya mantravat pravrajet punar

original: tataḥ prabhṛti putrādau sukhalobhādi varjayet /
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti putra ādau sukha lobha ādi varjayet

original: dadyāc ca bhūmāv udakaṃ sarvabhūtābhayaṃkaram // NsP_60.5 //
analyzed: dadyāt ca bhūmau udakam sarva bhūta abhayaṃkaram

original: tridaṇḍaṃ vaiṇavaṃ saumyaṃ satvacaṃ samaparvakam /
analyzed: tri daṇḍam vaiṇavam saumyam sa tvacam sama parvakam

original: veṣṭitaṃ kṛṣṇagovāla- rajjvā ca caturaṅgulam // NsP_60.6 //
analyzed: veṣṭitam rajjvā ca catur aṅgulam

original: granthibhir vā tribhir yuktaṃ jalapūtaṃ ca dhārayet /
analyzed: granthibhiḥ vā tribhiḥ yuktam jala pūtam ca dhārayet

original: gṛhṇīyād dakṣiṇe haste mantreṇaiva tu mantravit // NsP_60.7 //
analyzed: gṛhṇīyāt dakṣiṇe haste mantreṇa eva tu mantra vid

original: kaupīnāc chādanaṃ vāsaḥ kuthāṃ śītanivāriṇīm /
analyzed: kaupīnāt chādanam vāsaḥ kuthām śīta nivāriṇīm

original: pāduke cāpi gṛhṇīyāt kuryān nānyasya saṃgraham // NsP_60.8 //
analyzed: pāduke ca api gṛhṇīyāt kuryāt na anyasya saṃgraham

original: etāni tasya liṅgāni yateḥ proktāni dharmataḥ /
analyzed: etāni tasya liṅgāni yateḥ proktāni dharmataḥ

original: saṃgṛhya kṛtasaṃnyāso gatvā tīrtham anuttamam // NsP_60.9 //
analyzed: saṃgṛhya kṛta saṃnyāsaḥ gatvā tīrtham anuttamam

original: snātvā hy ācamya vidhivaj jalayuktāṃśukena vai /
analyzed: snātvā hi ācamya vidhivat jala yukta aṃśukena vai

original: vāriṇā tarpayitvā tu mantravad bhāskaraṃ namet // NsP_60.10 //
analyzed: vāriṇā tarpayitvā tu mantravat bhāskaram namet

original: āsīnaḥ prāṅmukho maunī prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ caret /
analyzed: āsīnaḥ prāc mukhaḥ maunī prāṇāyāma trayam caret

original: gāyatrīṃ ca yathāśakti japtvā dhyāyet paraṃ padam // NsP_60.11 //
analyzed: gāyatrīm ca yathāśakti japtvā dhyāyet param padam

original: sthityartham ātmano nityaṃ bhikṣāṭanam athācaret /
analyzed: sthiti artham ātmanaḥ nityam bhikṣāṭanam atha ācaret

original: sāyāhnakāle viprāṇāṃ gṛhāṇi vicared yatiḥ // NsP_60.12 //
analyzed: sāyāhna kāle viprāṇām gṛhāṇi vicaret yatiḥ

original: syād arthī yāvatānnena tāvad bhaikṣaṃ samācaret /
analyzed: syāt arthī yāvatā annena tāvat bhaikṣam samācaret

original: tato nivṛttya tatpātram abhyukṣyācamya saṃyamī // NsP_60.13 //
analyzed: tatas nivṛttya tat pātram abhyukṣya ācamya saṃyamī

original: sūryādidaivatebhyo hi dattvānnaṃ prokṣya vāriṇā /
analyzed: sūrya ādi daivatebhyaḥ hi dattvā annam prokṣya vāriṇā

original: bhuñjīta parṇapuṭake pātre vā vagyato yatiḥ // NsP_60.14 //
analyzed: bhuñjīta parṇapuṭake pātre vā vagyataḥ yatiḥ

original: vaṭakāśvatthapatreṣu kumbhītindukapatrayoḥ /
analyzed: vaṭaka aśvattha patreṣu kumbhī tinduka patrayoḥ

original: kovidārakarañjeṣu na bhūñjīta kadācana // NsP_60.15 //
analyzed: kovidāra karañjeṣu na bhūñjīta kadācana

original: bhuktvācamya niruddhāsur upatiṣṭheta bhāskaram /
analyzed: bhuktvā ācamya niruddha asuḥ upatiṣṭheta bhāskaram

original: japadhyānetihāsais tu dinaśeṣaṃ nayed yatiḥ // NsP_60.16 //
analyzed: japa dhyāna itihāsaiḥ tu dina śeṣam nayet yatiḥ

original: palāśāḥ sarva ucyante yatayaḥ kāṃsyabhojinaḥ /
analyzed: palāśāḥ sarve ucyante yatayaḥ kāṃsya bhojinaḥ

original: kāṃsyasyeva tu yatpātraṃ gṛhasthasya tathaiva ca // NsP_60.17*1 //
analyzed: kāṃsyasya iva tu yat pātram gṛhasthasya tathā eva ca

original: kāṃsyabhojī yatiḥ sarvaṃ prāpnuyāt kilbiṣaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: kāṃsya bhojī yatiḥ sarvam prāpnuyāt kilbiṣam punar

original: bhuktapātre yatir nityaṃ bhakṣayen mantrapūrvakam // NsP_60.17*2 //
analyzed: bhukta pātre yatiḥ nityam bhakṣayet mantra pūrvakam

original: na duṣyet tasya tat pātraṃ yajñeṣu camasā iva /
analyzed: na duṣyet tasya tat pātram yajñeṣu camasāḥ iva

original: kṛtasaṃdhyas tato rātriṃ nayed devagṛhādiṣu // NsP_60.17*3 //
analyzed: kṛta saṃdhyaḥ tatas rātrim nayet devagṛha ādiṣu

original: hṛtpuṇḍarīkanilaye dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ harim /
analyzed: hṛd puṇḍarīka nilaye dhyāyan nārāyaṇam harim

original: tatpadaṃ samavāpnoti yat prāpya na nivartate // NsP_60.17*4 //
analyzed: tat padam samavāpnoti yat prāpya na nivartate

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe yatidharmo nāma ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 60 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe yatidharmaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: hārīta uvāca:
analyzed: hārītaḥ uvāca

original: varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca kathitaṃ dharmalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: varṇānām āśramāṇām ca kathitam dharma lakṣaṇam

original: yataḥ svargāpavargau tu prāpnuyus te dvijādayaḥ // NsP_61.1 //
analyzed: yatas svarga apavargau tu prāpnuyuḥ te dvija ādayaḥ

original: yogaśāstrasya vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepāt sāram uttamam /
analyzed: yoga śāstrasya vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepāt sāram uttamam

original: yasyābhyāsabalād yānti mokṣaṃ ceha mumukṣavaḥ // NsP_61.2 //
analyzed: yasya abhyāsa balāt yānti mokṣam ca iha mumukṣavaḥ

original: yogābhyāsaratasyeha naśyeyuḥ pātakāni ca /
analyzed: yoga abhyāsa ratasya iha naśyeyuḥ pātakāni ca

original: tasmād yogaparo bhūtvā dhyāyen nityaṃ kriyāntare // NsP_61.3 //
analyzed: tasmāt yoga paraḥ bhūtvā dhyāyet nityam kriyā antare

original: prāṇāyāmena vacanaṃ pratyāhāreṇa cendriyam /
analyzed: prāṇāyāmena vacanam pratyāhāreṇa ca indriyam

original: dhāraṇābhir vaśīkṛtya punar durdharṣaṇaṃ manaḥ // NsP_61.4 //
analyzed: dhāraṇābhiḥ vaśīkṛtya punar durdharṣaṇam manaḥ

original: ekaṃ kāraṇam ānanda- bodhaṃ ca tam anāmayam /
analyzed: ekam kāraṇam ānanda bodham ca tam anāmayam

original: sukṣmāt sūkṣmataraṃ dhyāyej jagadādhāram acyutam // NsP_61.5 //
analyzed: sukṣmāt sūkṣmataram dhyāyet jagat ādhāram acyutam

original: ātmānam aravindasthaṃ taptacāmīkaraprabham /
analyzed: ātmānam aravinda stham tapta cāmīkara prabham

original: rahasy ekāntam āsīta dhyāyed ātmahṛdi sthitam // NsP_61.6 //
analyzed: rahasi ekāntam āsīta dhyāyet ātma hṛdi sthitam

original: yaḥ sarvaprāṇacittajño yaḥ sarveṣāṃ hṛdi sthitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sarva prāṇa citta jñaḥ yaḥ sarveṣām hṛdi sthitaḥ

original: yaś ca sarvajanair jñeyaḥ so 'ham asmīti cintayet // NsP_61.7 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca sarva janaiḥ jñeyaḥ saḥ ham asmi iti cintayet

original: ātmalābhasukhaṃ yāvat tāvad dhyānam udāhṛtam /
analyzed: ātma lābha sukham yāvat tāvat dhyānam udāhṛtam

original: śrutismṛtyuditaṃ karma tattadūrdhvaṃ samācaret // NsP_61.8 //
analyzed: śruti smṛti uditam karma tat tat ūrdhvam samācaret

original: yathāśvā rathahīnāś ca rathāś cāśvair vinā yathā /
analyzed: yathā aśvāḥ ratha hīnāḥ ca rathāḥ ca aśvaiḥ vinā yathā

original: evaṃ tapaś ca vidyā ca ubhāv api tapasvinaḥ // NsP_61.9 //
analyzed: evam tapaḥ ca vidyā ca ubhau api tapasvinaḥ

original: yathānnaṃ madhusaṃyuktaṃ madhu cānnena saṃyutam /
analyzed: yathā annam madhu saṃyuktam madhu ca annena saṃyutam

original: evaṃ tapaś ca vidyā ca saṃyukte bheṣajaṃ mahat // NsP_61.10 //
analyzed: evam tapaḥ ca vidyā ca saṃyukte bheṣajam mahat

original: dvābhyām eva hi pakṣābhyāṃ yathā vai pakṣiṇāṃ gatiḥ /
analyzed: dvābhyām eva hi pakṣābhyām yathā vai pakṣiṇām gatiḥ

original: tathaiva jñānakarmabhyāṃ prāpyate brahma śāśvatam // NsP_61.11 //
analyzed: tathā eva jñāna karmabhyām prāpyate brahma śāśvatam

original: vidyātapobhyāṃ saṃpanno brāhmaṇo yogatatparaḥ /
analyzed: vidyā tapobhyām saṃpannaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yoga tatparaḥ

original: dehadvandvaṃ vihāyāśu mukto bhavati bandhanāt // NsP_61.12 //
analyzed: deha dvandvam vihāya āśu muktaḥ bhavati bandhanāt

original: na devayānamārgeṇa yāvat prāptaṃ paraṃ padam /
analyzed: na deva yāna mārgeṇa yāvat prāptam param padam

original: na tāvad dehaliṅgasya vināśo vidyate kvacit // NsP_61.13 //
analyzed: na tāvat deha liṅgasya vināśaḥ vidyate kvacid

original: mayā vaḥ kathitaḥ sarvo varṇāśramavibhāgaśaḥ /
analyzed: mayā vaḥ kathitaḥ sarvaḥ varṇa āśrama vibhāgaśaḥ

original: saṃkṣepeṇa dvijaśreṣṭhā dharmas teṣāṃ sanātanaḥ // NsP_61.14 //
analyzed: saṃkṣepeṇa dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ dharmaḥ teṣām sanātanaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: śrutvaivam ṛṣayo dharmaṃ svargamokṣaphalapradam /
analyzed: śrutvā evam ṛṣayaḥ dharmam svarga mokṣa phala pradam

original: praṇamya tam ṛṣiṃ jagmur muditās te svam ālayam // NsP_61.15 //
analyzed: praṇamya tam ṛṣim jagmuḥ muditāḥ te svam ālayam

original: dharmaśāstram idaṃ yas tu hārītamukhaniḥsṛtam /
analyzed: dharma śāstram idam yaḥ tu hārīta mukha niḥsṛtam

original: śrutvā ca kurute dharmaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // NsP_61.16 //
analyzed: śrutvā ca kurute dharmam sa yāti paramām gatim

original: mukhajasya tu yat karma karma yad bāhujasya tu /
analyzed: mukha jasya tu yat karma karma yat bāhu jasya tu

original: ūrujasya tu yat karma pādajasya tathā nṛpa // NsP_61.17 //
analyzed: ūru jasya tu yat karma pāda jasya tathā nṛpa

original: svaṃ svaṃ karma prakurvāṇā viprādyā yānti sadgatim /
analyzed: svam svam karma prakurvāṇāḥ vipra ādyāḥ yānti sat gatim

original: anyathā vartamāno hi sadyaḥ patati yāty adhaḥ // NsP_61.18 //
analyzed: anyathā vartamānaḥ hi sadyas patati yāti adhas

original: yasya ye 'bhihitā dharmāḥ sa tu tais taiḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: yasya ye bhihitāḥ dharmāḥ sa tu taiḥ taiḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: tasmāt svadharmaṃ kurvīta nityam evam anāpadi // NsP_61.19 //
analyzed: tasmāt svadharmam kurvīta nityam evam anāpadi

original: caturvarṇāś ca rājendra catvāraś cāpi cāśramāḥ /
analyzed: catur varṇāḥ ca rāja indra catvāraḥ ca api ca āśramāḥ

original: svadharmaṃ ye 'nutiṣṭhanti te yānti paramāṃ gatim // NsP_61.20 //
analyzed: svadharmam ye nutiṣṭhanti te yānti paramām gatim

original: svadharmeṇa yathā nṛṇāṃ narasiṃhaḥ pratuṣyati /
analyzed: svadharmeṇa yathā nṛṇām narasiṃhaḥ pratuṣyati

original: varṇadharmānusāreṇa narasiṃhaṃ tathārcayet // NsP_61.21 //
analyzed: varṇa dharma anusāreṇa narasiṃham tathā arcayet

original: utpannavairāgyabalena yogād dhyāyet paraṃ brahma sadā kriyāvān /
analyzed: utpanna vairāgya balena yogāt dhyāyet param brahma sadā kriyāvān

original: satyātmakaṃ citsukharūpam ādyaṃ vihāya dehaṃ padam eti viṣṇoḥ // NsP_61.22 //
analyzed: satya ātmakam cit sukha rūpam ādyam vihāya deham padam eti viṣṇoḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe yogādhyāyo nāmaikaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 61 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe yoga adhyāyaḥ nāma ekaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca kathitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tava /
analyzed: varṇānām āśramāṇām ca kathitam lakṣaṇam tava

original: bhūyaḥ kathaya rājendra śuśrūṣā tatra kā nṛpa // NsP_62.1 //
analyzed: bhūyas kathaya rāja indra śuśrūṣā tatra kā nṛpa

original: sahasrānīka uvāca:
analyzed: sahasrānīkaḥ uvāca

original: snātvā veśmani deveśam arcayed acyutaṃ tv iti /
analyzed: snātvā veśmani deveśam arcayet acyutam tu iti

original: tvayoktaṃ mama viprendra tat kathaṃ pūjanaṃ bhavet // NsP_62.2 //
analyzed: tvayā uktam mama vipra indra tat katham pūjanam bhavet

original: yair mantrair arcyate viṣṇur yeṣu sthāneṣu vai mune /
analyzed: yaiḥ mantraiḥ arcyate viṣṇuḥ yeṣu sthāneṣu vai mune

original: tāni sthānāni tān mantrāṃs tvam ācakṣva mahāmune // NsP_62.3 //
analyzed: tāni sthānāni tān mantrān tvam ācakṣva mahā mune

original: śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: arcanaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ /
analyzed: arcanam saṃpravakṣyāmi viṣṇoḥ amita tejasaḥ

original: yat kṛtvā munayaḥ sarve paraṃ nirvāṇam āpnuyuḥ // NsP_62.4 //
analyzed: yat kṛtvā munayaḥ sarve param nirvāṇam āpnuyuḥ

original: agnau kriyāvatāṃ devo hṛdi devo manīṣiṇām /
analyzed: agnau kriyāvatām devaḥ hṛdi devaḥ manīṣiṇām

original: pratimāsv alpabuddhīnāṃ yogināṃ hṛdaye hariḥ // NsP_62.5 //
analyzed: pratimāsu alpabuddhīnām yoginām hṛdaye hariḥ

original: ato 'gnau hṛdaye sūrye sthaṇḍile pratimāsu ca /
analyzed: atas gnau hṛdaye sūrye sthaṇḍile pratimāsu ca

original: eteṣu ca hareḥ samyag arcanaṃ munibhiḥ smṛtam // NsP_62.6 //
analyzed: eteṣu ca hareḥ samyak arcanam munibhiḥ smṛtam

original: tasya sarvamayatvāc ca sthaṇḍile pratimāsu ca /
analyzed: tasya sarva maya tvāt ca sthaṇḍile pratimāsu ca

original: ānuṣṭubhasya sūktasya viṣṇus tasya ca devatā // NsP_62.7 //
analyzed: ānuṣṭubhasya sūktasya viṣṇuḥ tasya ca devatā

original: puruṣo yo jagadbījaṃ ṛṣir nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ yaḥ jagat bījam ṛṣiḥ nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: dadyāt puruṣasūktena yaḥ puṣpāṇy apa eva ca // NsP_62.8 //
analyzed: dadyāt puruṣasūktena yaḥ puṣpāṇi apaḥ eva ca

original: arcitaṃ syāj jagat sarvaṃ tena vai sacarācaram /
analyzed: arcitam syāt jagat sarvam tena vai sacarācaram

original: ādyayāvāhayed devam ṛcā tu puruṣottamam // NsP_62.9 //
analyzed: ādyayā āvāhayet devam ṛcā tu puruṣottamam

original: dvitīyayāsanaṃ dadyāt pādyaṃ dadyāt tṛtīyayā /
analyzed: dvitīyayā āsanam dadyāt pādyam dadyāt tṛtīyayā

original: caturthyārghyaḥ pradātavyaḥ pañcamyācamanīyakam // NsP_62.10 //
analyzed: caturthyā arghyaḥ pradātavyaḥ pañcamyā ācamanīyakam

original: ṣaṣṭhyā snānaṃ prakurvīta saptamyā vastram eva ca /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhyā snānam prakurvīta saptamyā vastram eva ca

original: yajñopavītam aṣṭamyā navamyā gandham eva ca // NsP_62.11 //
analyzed: yajñopavītam aṣṭamyāḥ navamyāḥ gandham eva ca

original: daśamyā puṣpadānaṃ syād ekādaśyā ca dhūpakam /
analyzed: daśamyā puṣpa dānam syāt ekādaśyā ca dhūpakam

original: dvādaśyā ca tathā dīpaṃ trayodaśyārcanaṃ tathā // NsP_62.12 //
analyzed: dvādaśyā ca tathā dīpam trayodaśyā arcanam tathā

original: caturdaśyā stutiṃ kṛtvā pañcadaśyā pradakṣiṇam /
analyzed: caturdaśyā stutim kṛtvā pañcadaśyā pradakṣiṇam

original: ṣoḍaśyodvāsanaṃ kuryāc *cheṣakarmāṇi pūrvavat // NsP_62.13 //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśyā udvāsanam kuryāt śeṣa karmāṇi pūrvavat

original: snānaṃ vastraṃ ca naivedyaṃ dadyād ācanamīyakam /
analyzed: snānam vastram ca naivedyam dadyāt ācanamīyakam

original: ṣaṇmāsāt siddhim āpnoti devadevaṃ samarcayan // NsP_62.14 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ māsāt siddhim āpnoti devadevam samarcayan

original: saṃvatsareṇa tenaiva sāyujyam adhigachati /
analyzed: saṃvatsareṇa tena eva sāyujyam adhigacchati

original: haviṣāgnau jale puṣpair dhyānena hṛdaye harim // NsP_62.15 //
analyzed: haviṣā agnau jale puṣpaiḥ dhyānena hṛdaye harim

original: arcanti sūrayo nityaṃ japena ravimaṇḍale /
analyzed: arcanti sūrayaḥ nityam japena ravi maṇḍale

original: ādityamaṇḍale divyaṃ devadevam anāmayam /
analyzed: āditya maṇḍale divyam devadevam anāmayam

original: śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇiṃ dhyātvā viṣṇum upāsate // NsP_62.16 //
analyzed: śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇim dhyātvā viṣṇum upāsate

original: dhyeyaḥ sadā savitṛmaṇḍalamadhyavartī nārāyaṇaḥ sarasijāsanasaṃniviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: dhyeyaḥ sadā savitṛ maṇḍala madhya vartī nārāyaṇaḥ sarasija āsana saṃniviṣṭaḥ

original: keyūravān makarakuṇḍalavān kirīṭī hārī hiraṇmayavapur dhṛtaśaṅkhacakraḥ // NsP_62.17 //
analyzed: keyūravān makara kuṇḍalavān kirīṭī hārī hiraṇmaya vapuḥ dhṛta śaṅkha cakraḥ

original: etat paṭhan kevalam eva sūktaṃ dine dine bhāvitaviṣṇubuddhiḥ /
analyzed: etat paṭhan kevalam eva sūktam dine dine bhāvita viṣṇu buddhiḥ

original: sa sarvapāpaṃ pravihāya vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ prayāty acyutatuṣṭikṛn naraḥ // NsP_62.18 //
analyzed: sa sarva pāpam pravihāya vaiṣṇavam padam prayāti acyuta tuṣṭi kṛt naraḥ

original: patreṣu puṣpeṣu phaleṣu toyeṣv akrītalabhyeṣu sadaiva satsu /
analyzed: patreṣu puṣpeṣu phaleṣu toyeṣu a krīta labhyeṣu sadā eva satsu

original: bhaktyaikalabhye puruṣe purāṇe muktyai kimarthaṃ kriyate na yatnaḥ // NsP_62.19 //
analyzed: bhaktyā eka labhye puruṣe purāṇe muktyai kimartham kriyate na yatnaḥ

original: ity evam uktaḥ puruṣasya viṣṇor arcāvidhis te 'dya mayā nṛpendra /
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ puruṣasya viṣṇoḥ arcā vidhiḥ te dya mayā nṛpa indra

original: anena nityaṃ kuru viṣṇupūjāṃ prāptuṃ tadiṣṭaṃ yadi vaiṣṇavaṃ padam // NsP_62.20 //
analyzed: anena nityam kuru viṣṇu pūjām prāptum tat iṣṭam yadi vaiṣṇavam padam

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe viṣṇor arcāvidhir nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 62 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe viṣṇor arcāvidhiḥ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: sahasrānīka uvāca:
analyzed: sahasrānīkaḥ uvāca

original: satyam uktaṃ tvayā brahman vaidikaḥ paramo vidhiḥ /
analyzed: satyam uktam tvayā brahman vaidikaḥ paramaḥ vidhiḥ

original: viṣṇor devātidevasya pūjanaṃ prati me 'dhunā // NsP_63.1 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ devātidevasya pūjanam prati me dhunā

original: anena vidhinā brahman pūjyate madhusūdanaḥ /
analyzed: anena vidhinā brahman pūjyate madhusūdanaḥ

original: vedajñair eva nānyais tu tasmāt sarvahitaṃ vada // NsP_63.2 //
analyzed: veda jñaiḥ eva na anyaiḥ tu tasmāt sarva hitam vada

original: śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: aṣṭākṣareṇa deveśaṃ narasiṃham anāmayam /
analyzed: aṣṭa akṣareṇa deveśam narasiṃham anāmayam

original: gandhapuṣpādibhir nityam arcayed acyutaṃ naraḥ // NsP_63.3 //
analyzed: gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ nityam arcayet acyutam naraḥ

original: rājann aṣṭākṣaro mantraḥ sarvapāpaharaḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: rājan aṣṭa akṣaraḥ mantraḥ sarva pāpa haraḥ paraḥ

original: samastayajñaphaladaḥ sarvaśāntikaraḥ śubhaḥ // NsP_63.4 //
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya /
analyzed: om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya

original: gandhapuṣpādisakalam anena vai nivedayet /
analyzed: gandha puṣpa ādi sakalam anena vai nivedayet

original: anenābhyarcito devaḥ prīto bhavati tatkṣaṇāt // NsP_63.5 //
analyzed: anena abhyarcitaḥ devaḥ prītaḥ bhavati tad kṣaṇāt

original: kiṃ tasya bahubhir mantraiḥ kiṃ tasya bahubhir vrataiḥ /
analyzed: kim tasya bahubhiḥ mantraiḥ kim tasya bahubhiḥ vrataiḥ

original: oṃ namo nārāyaṇāyeti mantraḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ // NsP_63.6 //
analyzed: om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti mantraḥ sarva artha sādhakaḥ

original: imaṃ mantraṃ japed yas tu śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: imam mantram japet yaḥ tu śuciḥ bhūtvā samāhitaḥ

original: sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇusāyujyam āpnuyāt // NsP_63.7 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ viṣṇu sāyujyam āpnuyāt

original: sarvatīrthaphalaṃ hy etat sarvatīrthavaraṃ nṛpa /
analyzed: sarva tīrtha phalam hi etat sarva tīrtha varam nṛpa

original: harer arcanam avyagraṃ sarvayajñaphalaṃ nṛpa // NsP_63.8 //
analyzed: hareḥ arcanam avyagram sarva yajña phalam nṛpa

original: tasmāt kuru nṛpaśreṣṭha pratimādiṣu cārcanam dānāni vipramukhebhyaḥ prayaccha vidhinā nṛpa /
analyzed: tasmāt kuru nṛpa śreṣṭha pratimā ādiṣu ca arcanam dānāni vipra mukhebhyaḥ prayaccha vidhinā nṛpa

original: evaṃ kṛte nṛpaśreṣṭha narasiṃhaprasādataḥ prāpnoti vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo yat kāṅkṣanti mumukṣavaḥ // NsP_63.9 //
analyzed: evam kṛte nṛpa śreṣṭha narasiṃha prasādataḥ prāpnoti vaiṣṇavam tejaḥ yat kāṅkṣanti mumukṣavaḥ

original: purā puraṃdaro rājan strītvaṃ prāpto 'padharmataḥ /
analyzed: purā puraṃdaraḥ rājan strī tvam prāptaḥ u padharmataḥ

original: tṛṇabindumuneḥ śāpān mukto hy aṣṭākṣarāj japāt // NsP_63.10 //
analyzed: tṛṇabindu muneḥ śāpāt muktaḥ hi aṣṭa akṣarāt japāt

original: sahasrānīka uvāca:
analyzed: sahasrānīkaḥ uvāca

original: etat kathaya bhūdeva devendrasyāghamocanam /
analyzed: etat kathaya bhūdeva devendrasya agha mocanam

original: ko 'padharmaḥ kathaṃ strītvaṃ prāpto me vada kāraṇam // NsP_63.11 //
analyzed: kaḥ padharmaḥ katham strī tvam prāptaḥ me vada kāraṇam

original: śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: rājendra mahad ākhyānaṃ śṛṇu kautūhalānvitam /
analyzed: rāja indra mahat ākhyānam śṛṇu kautūhala anvitam

original: viṣṇubhaktiprajananaṃ śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatām idam // NsP_63.12 //
analyzed: viṣṇu bhakti prajananam śṛṇvatām paṭhatām idam

original: purā puraṃdarasyaiva devarājyaṃ prakurvataḥ /
analyzed: purā puraṃdarasya eva deva rājyam prakurvataḥ

original: vairāgyasyāpi jananaṃ saṃbhūtaṃ bāhyavastuṣu // NsP_63.13 //
analyzed: vairāgyasya api jananam saṃbhūtam bāhya vastuṣu

original: indras tadābhūd viṣamasvabhāvo rājyeṣu bhogeṣv api so 'py acintayat /
analyzed: indraḥ tadā abhūt viṣama svabhāvaḥ rājyeṣu bhogeṣu api saḥ pi acintayat

original: dhruvaṃ virāgīkṛtamānasānāṃ svargasya rājyaṃ na ca kiṃcid eva // NsP_63.14 //
analyzed: dhruvam virāgīkṛta mānasānām svargasya rājyam na ca kiṃcid eva

original: rājyasya sāraṃ viṣayeṣu bhogo bhogasya cānte na ca kiṃcid asti /
analyzed: rājyasya sāram viṣayeṣu bhogaḥ bhogasya ca ante na ca kiṃcid asti

original: vimṛśya caitan munayo 'py ajasraṃ mokṣādhikāraṃ paricintayanti // NsP_63.15 //
analyzed: vimṛśya ca etat munayaḥ api ajasram mokṣa adhikāram paricintayanti

original: sadaiva bhogāya tapaḥpravṛttir bhogāvasāne hi tapo vinaṣṭam /
analyzed: sadā eva bhogāya tapaḥ pravṛttiḥ bhoga avasāne hi tapaḥ vinaṣṭam

original: maitryādisaṃyogaparāṅmukhānāṃ vimuktibhājāṃ na tapo na bhogaḥ // NsP_63.16 //
analyzed: maitrī ādi saṃyoga parāṅmukhānām vimukti bhājām na tapaḥ na bhogaḥ

original: vimṛśya caitat sa surādhinātho vimānam āruhya sakiṅkiṇīkam /
analyzed: vimṛśya ca etat sa surādhināthaḥ vimānam āruhya sa kiṅkiṇīkam

original: nūnaṃ harārādhanakāraṇena kailāsam abhyeti vimuktikāmaḥ // NsP_63.17 //
analyzed: nūnam hara ārādhana kāraṇena kailāsam abhyeti vimukti kāmaḥ

original: sa ekadā mānasam āgataḥ san saṃvīkṣya tāṃ yakṣapateś ca kāntām /
analyzed: saḥ ekadā mānasam āgataḥ san saṃvīkṣya tām yakṣapateḥ ca kāntām

original: samarcayantīṃ girijāṅghriyugmaṃ dhvajām ivānaṅgamahārathasya // NsP_63.18 //
analyzed: samarcayantīm girijā aṅghri yugmam dhvajām iva anaṅga mahā rathasya

original: pradhānajāmbūnadaśuddhavarṇāṃ karṇāntasaṃlagnamanojñanetrām /
analyzed: pradhāna jāmbūnada śuddha varṇām karṇa anta saṃlagna manojña netrām

original: susūkṣmavastrāntaradṛśyagātrāṃ nīhāramadhyād iva candralekhām // NsP_63.19 //
analyzed: su sūkṣma vastra antara dṛśya gātrām nīhāra madhyāt iva candralekhām

original: tāṃ vīkṣya vīkṣaṇasahasrabhareṇa kāmaṃ kāmāṅgamohitamatir na yayau tadānīm /
analyzed: tām vīkṣya vīkṣaṇa sahasra bhareṇa kāmam kāma aṅga mohita matiḥ na yayau tadānīm

original: dūrādhvagaṃ svagṛham etya susaṃcitārthas tasthau tadā surapatir viṣayābhilāṣī // NsP_63.20 //
analyzed: dūra adhva gam sva gṛham etya su saṃcita arthaḥ tasthau tadā surapatiḥ viṣaya abhilāṣī

original: pūrvaṃ varaṃ syāt sukule 'pi janma tato hi sarvāṅgaśarīrarūpam /
analyzed: pūrvam varam syāt su kule janma tatas hi sarva aṅga śarīra rūpam

original: tato dhanaṃ durlabham eva paścād dhanādhipatyaṃ sukṛtena labhyam // NsP_63.21 //
analyzed: tatas dhanam durlabham eva paścāt dhana ādhipatyam sukṛtena labhyam

original: svargādhipatyaṃ ca mayā pralabdhaṃ tathāpi bhogāya na cāsti bhāgyam /
analyzed: svarga ādhipatyam ca mayā pralabdham tathā api bhogāya na ca asti bhāgyam

original: yaḥ svaṃ parityajya vimuktikāmas tiṣṭhāmi me durmatir asti citte // NsP_63.22 //
analyzed: yaḥ svam parityajya vimukti kāmaḥ tiṣṭhāmi me durmatiḥ asti citte

original: mokṣo 'munā yady api mohanīyo mokṣe 'pi kiṃ kāraṇam asti rājye /
analyzed: mokṣaḥ munā yadi api mohanīyaḥ mokṣe kim kāraṇam asti rājye

original: kṣetraṃ supakvaṃ parihṛtya dvāre kiṃ nāma cāraṇyakṛṣiṃ karoti // NsP_63.23 //
analyzed: kṣetram su pakvam parihṛtya dvāre kim nāma ca araṇya kṛṣim karoti

original: saṃsāraduḥkhopahatā narā ye kartuṃ samarthā na ca kiṃcid eva /
analyzed: saṃsāra duḥkha upahatāḥ narāḥ ye kartum samarthāḥ na ca kiṃcid eva

original: akarmiṇo bhāgyavivarjitāś ca vāñchanti te mokṣapathaṃ vimūḍhāḥ // NsP_63.24 //
analyzed: akarmiṇaḥ bhāgya vivarjitāḥ ca vāñchanti te mokṣa patham vimūḍhāḥ

original: etad vimṛśya bahudhā matimān pravīro rūpeṇa mohitamanā dhanadāṅganāyāḥ /
analyzed: etat vimṛśya bahudhā matimān pravīraḥ rūpeṇa mohita manāḥ dhanada aṅganāyāḥ

original: sarvādhir ākulamatiḥ parimuktadhairyaḥ sasmāra māram amarādhipacakravartī // NsP_63.25 //
analyzed: sarva ādhiḥ ākula matiḥ parimukta dhairyaḥ sasmāra māram amara adhipa cakravartī

original: samāgato 'sau parimandamandaṃ kāmo 'tikāmākulacittavṛttiḥ /
analyzed: samāgataḥ sau parimanda mandam

original: purā maheśena kṛtāṅganāśo dhairyāl layaṃ gacchati ko viśaṅkaḥ // NsP_63.26 //
analyzed: purā maheśena kṛta aṅga nāśaḥ dhairyāt layam gacchati kaḥ viśaṅkaḥ

original: ādiśyatāṃ nātha yad asti kāryaṃ ko nāma te saṃprati śatrubhūtaḥ /
analyzed: ādiśyatām nātha yat asti kāryam kaḥ nāma te saṃprati śatru bhūtaḥ

original: śīghraṃ samādeśaya mā vilambaṃ tasyāpadaṃ saṃprati bho diśāmi // NsP_63.27 //
analyzed: śīghram samādeśaya mā vilambam tasya āpadam saṃprati bho diśāmi

original: śrutvā tadā tasya vaco abhirāmaṃ manogataṃ tat paramaṃ tutoṣa /
analyzed: śrutvā tadā tasya vacaḥ abhirāmam manogatam tat paramam tutoṣa

original: niṣpannam arthaṃ sahasaiva matvā jagāda vākyaṃ sa vihasya vīraḥ // NsP_63.28 //
analyzed: niṣpannam artham sahasā eva matvā jagāda vākyam sa vihasya vīraḥ

original: rudro 'pi yenārdhaśarīramātraś cakre 'py anaṅgatvam upāgatena /
analyzed: rudraḥ pi yena ardha śarīra mātraḥ cakre pi anaṅga tvam upāgatena

original: soḍhuṃ samartho 'tha paro 'pi loke ko nāma te māra śarābhighātam // NsP_63.29 //
analyzed: soḍhum samarthaḥ loke kaḥ nāma te śara abhighātam

original: ekāgracittā girijārcane 'pi yā mohayaty eva mamātra cittam /
analyzed: ekāgra cittā girijā arcane yā mohayati eva mama atra cittam

original: etām anaṅgāyatalocanākhyāṃ madaṅgasaṅgaikarasāṃ vidhehi // NsP_63.30 //
analyzed: etām anaṅga āyata locana ākhyām mad aṅga saṅga ekarasām vidhehi

original: sa evam uktaḥ suravallabhena svakāryabhāvādhikagauraveṇa /
analyzed: saḥ evam uktaḥ suravallabhena sva kārya bhāva adhika gauraveṇa

original: saṃdhāya bāṇaṃ kusumāyudho 'pi sasmāra māraḥ parimohanaṃ sudhīḥ // NsP_63.31 //
analyzed: saṃdhāya bāṇam kusumāyudhaḥ pi sasmāra māraḥ parimohanam sudhīḥ

original: saṃmohitā puṣpaśareṇa bālā kāmena kāmaṃ madavihvalāṅgī /
analyzed: saṃmohitā puṣpa śareṇa bālā kāmena kāmam mada vihvala aṅgī

original: vihāya pūjāṃ hasate sureśaṃ kaḥ kāmakodaṇḍaravaṃ saheta // NsP_63.32 //
analyzed: vihāya pūjām hasate sureśam kaḥ kāma kodaṇḍa ravam saheta

original: vilolanetre ayi kāsi bāle surādhipo vākyam idaṃ jagāda /
analyzed: vilola netre ayi kā asi bāle surādhipaḥ vākyam idam jagāda

original: saṃmohayantīva manāṃsi puṃsāṃ kasyeha kāntā vada puṇyabhājaḥ // NsP_63.33 //
analyzed: saṃmohayanti iva manāṃsi puṃsām kasya iha kāntāḥ vada puṇya bhājaḥ

original: uktāpi bālā madavihvalāṅgī romāñcasaṃsvedasakampagātrā /
analyzed: uktā api bālā mada vihvala aṅgī romāñca saṃsveda sa kampa gātrā

original: kṛtākulā kāmaśilīmukhena sagadgadaṃ vākyam uvāca mandam // NsP_63.34 //
analyzed: kṛta ākulā kāma śilīmukhena sa gadgadam vākyam uvāca mandam

original: kāntā dhaneśasya ca yakṣakanyā prāptā ca gaurīcaraṇārcanāya /
analyzed: kāntā dhaneśasya ca yakṣa kanyā prāptā ca gaurī caraṇa arcanāya

original: prabrūhi kāryaṃ ca tavāsti nātha kas tvaṃ vades tiṣṭhasi kāmarūpaḥ // NsP_63.35 //
analyzed: prabrūhi kāryam ca tava asti nātha kaḥ tvam vadeḥ tiṣṭhasi kāmarūpaḥ

original: indra uvāca:
analyzed: indraḥ uvāca

original: sā tvaṃ samāgaccha bhajasva māṃ cirān madaṅgasaṅgotsukatāṃ vrajāśu /
analyzed: sā tvam samāgaccha bhajasva mām cirāt mad aṅga saṅga utsuka tām vraja āśu

original: tvayā vinā jīvitam apy analpaṃ svargasya rājyaṃ mama niṣphalaṃ syāt // NsP_63.36 //
analyzed: tvayā vinā jīvitam api analpam svargasya rājyam mama niṣphalam syāt

original: uktā ca saivaṃ madhuraṃ ca tena kandarpasaṃtāpitacārudehā /
analyzed: uktā ca sā evam madhuram ca tena kandarpa saṃtāpita cāru dehā

original: vimānam āruhya calatpatākaṃ sureśakaṇṭhagrahaṇaṃ cakāra // NsP_63.37 //
analyzed: vimānam āruhya calat patākam sureśa kaṇṭha grahaṇam cakāra

original: jagāma śīghraṃ sa hi nākanāthaḥ sākaṃ tayā mandarakandarāsu /
analyzed: jagāma śīghram sa hi nākanāthaḥ sākam tayā mandara kandarāsu

original: adṛṣṭadevāsurasaṃcarāsu vicitraratnāṅkurabhāsurāsu // NsP_63.38 //
analyzed: adṛṣṭa deva asura saṃcarāsu vicitra ratna aṅkura bhāsurāsu

original: reme tayā sākam udāravīryaś citraṃ suraiśvaryagatādaro 'pi /
analyzed: reme tayā sākam udāra vīryaḥ citram sura aiśvarya gata ādaraḥ pi

original: svayaṃ ca yasyā laghupuṣpaśayyāṃ cakāra cāturyanidhiḥ sakāmaḥ // NsP_63.39 //
analyzed: svayam ca yasyāḥ laghu puṣpa śayyām cakāra cāturya nidhiḥ sa kāmaḥ

original: jātaḥ kṛtārtho 'maravṛndanāthaḥ sakāmabhogeṣu sadā vidagdhaḥ /
analyzed: jātaḥ kṛtārthaḥ mara vṛnda nāthaḥ sa kāma bhogeṣu sadā vidagdhaḥ

original: mokṣādhikaṃ sneharasātimṛṣṭaṃ parāṅganāliṅganasaṅgasaukhyam // NsP_63.40 //
analyzed: mokṣa adhikam sneha rasa atimṛṣṭam para aṅganā āliṅgana saṅga saukhyam

original: athāgatā yakṣapateḥ samīpaṃ nāryo 'nuvarjyaiva ca citrasenām /
analyzed: athā āgatāḥ yakṣapateḥ samīpam nāryaḥ nuvarjya eva ca citrasenām

original: sasaṃbhramāḥ saṃbhramakhinnagātrāḥ sagadgadaṃ procur asāhasajñāḥ // NsP_63.41 //
analyzed: sa saṃbhramāḥ saṃbhrama khinna gātrāḥ sa gadgadam procuḥ asāhasajñāḥ

original: nūnaṃ samākarṇaya yakṣanātha vimānam āropya jagāma kaścit /
analyzed: nūnam samākarṇaya yakṣa nātha vimānam āropya jagāma kaścid

original: saṃvīkṣamāṇaḥ kakubho 'pi kāntāṃ vigṛhya vegād iha so 'pi taskaraḥ // NsP_63.42 //
analyzed: saṃvīkṣamāṇaḥ kakubhaḥ pi kāntām vigṛhya vegāt iha saḥ pi taskaraḥ

original: vaco niśamyātha dhanādhinātho viṣopamaṃ jātamaṣīnibhānanaḥ /
analyzed: vacaḥ niśamya atha dhanādhināthaḥ viṣa upamam jāta maṣī nibha ānanaḥ

original: jagāda bhūyo na ca kiṃcid eva babhūva vai vṛkṣa ivāgnidagdhaḥ // NsP_63.43 //
analyzed: jagāda bhūyas na ca kiṃcid eva babhūva vai vṛkṣaḥ iva agni dagdhaḥ

original: vijñāpitārtho varakanyakābhir yaś citrasenāsahacāriṇībhiḥ /
analyzed: vijñāpita arthaḥ vara kanyakābhiḥ yaḥ citrasenā sahacāriṇībhiḥ

original: mohāpanodāya matiṃ dadhānaḥ sa kaṇṭhakubjo 'pi samājagāma // NsP_63.44 //
analyzed: moha apanodāya matim dadhānaḥ sa kaṇṭha kubjaḥ samājagāma

original: śrutvāgataṃ vīkṣya sa rājarāja unmīlitākṣo vacanaṃ jagāda /
analyzed: śrutvā āgatam vīkṣya sa rājarājaḥ unmīlita akṣaḥ vacanam jagāda

original: viniḥśvasan gāḍhasakampagātraḥ svasthaṃ mano 'py āśu vidhāya dīnaḥ // NsP_63.45 //
analyzed: viniḥśvasan gāḍha sa kampa gātraḥ svastham manaḥ pi āśu vidhāya dīnaḥ

original: tad yauvanaṃ yad yuvatīvinodo dhanaṃ tu caitat svajanopayogi /
analyzed: tat yauvanam yat yuvatī vinodaḥ dhanam tu ca etat sva jana upayogi

original: taṃ jīvitaṃ yat kriyate sudharmas tad ādhipatyaṃ yadi naṣṭavigraham // NsP_63.46 //
analyzed: tam jīvitam yat kriyate sudharmaḥ tat ādhipatyam yadi naṣṭa vigraham

original: dhiṅ me dhanaṃ jīvitam atyanalpaṃ rājyaṃ bṛhat saṃprati guhyakānām /
analyzed: dhik me dhanam jīvitam ati analpam rājyam bṛhat saṃprati guhyakānām

original: viśāmi cāgniṃ na ca veda kaścit parābhavo 'stīti ca ko mṛtānām // NsP_63.47 //
analyzed: viśāmi ca agnim na ca veda kaścid parābhavaḥ asti iti ca kaḥ mṛtānām

original: pārśve sthitasyāpi ca jīvito me gatā taḍāgaṃ girijārcanāya /
analyzed: pārśve sthitasya api ca jīvitaḥ me gatā taḍāgam girijā arcanāya

original: hṛtā ca kenāpi vayaṃ na vidmo dhruvaṃ na tasyāsti bhayaṃ ca mṛtyoḥ // NsP_63.48 //
analyzed: hṛtā ca kena api vayam na vidmaḥ dhruvam na tasya asti bhayam ca mṛtyoḥ

original: jagāda vākyaṃ sa ca kaṇṭhakubjo mohāpanodāya vibhoḥ sa mantrī /
analyzed: jagāda vākyam sa ca kaṇṭha kubjaḥ moha apanodāya vibhoḥ sa mantrī

original: ākarṇyatāṃ nātha na cāsti yogyaḥ kāntāviyoge nijadehaghātaḥ // NsP_63.49 //
analyzed: ākarṇyatām nātha na ca asti yogyaḥ kāntā viyoge nija deha ghātaḥ

original: ekā purā rāmavadhūr hṛtā ca niśācareṇāpi mṛto na so 'pi /
analyzed: ekā purā rāma vadhūḥ hṛtā ca niśācareṇa api mṛtaḥ na saḥ

original: anekaśaḥ santi tavātra nāryaḥ ko nāma citte kriyate viṣādaḥ // NsP_63.50 //
analyzed: anekaśas santi tava atra nāryaḥ kaḥ nāma citte kriyate viṣādaḥ

original: vimucya śokaṃ kuru vikrame matiṃ dhairyaṃ samālambaya yakṣarāja /
analyzed: vimucya śokam kuru vikrame matim dhairyam samālambaya yakṣa rāja

original: bhṛśaṃ na jalpanti rudanti sādhavaḥ parābhavaṃ bāhyakṛtaṃ sahante // NsP_63.51 //
analyzed: bhṛśam na jalpanti rudanti sādhavaḥ parābhavam bāhya kṛtam sahante

original: kṛtaṃ hi kāryaṃ guru darśayanti sahāyavān vittapa kātaro 'si kim /
analyzed: kṛtam hi kāryam guru darśayanti sahāyavān vittapa kātaraḥ si kim

original: sahāyakāryaṃ kurute hi saṃprati svayaṃ hi yasyāvarajo vibhīṣaṇaḥ // NsP_63.52 //
analyzed: sahāya kāryam kurute hi saṃprati svayam hi yasya avarajaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: dhanada uvāca:
analyzed: dhanadaḥ uvāca

original: vibhīṣaṇo me pratipakṣabhūto dāyādabhāvaṃ na vimuñcatīti /
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ me pratipakṣa bhūtaḥ dāyāda bhāvam na vimuñcati iti

original: dhruvaṃ prasannā na bhavanti durjanāḥ kṛtopakārā harivajraniṣṭhurāḥ // NsP_63.53 //
analyzed: dhruvam prasannāḥ na bhavanti durjanāḥ kṛta upakārāḥ hari vajra niṣṭhurāḥ

original: na copakārair na guṇair na sauhṛdaiḥ prasādam āyāti mano hi gotriṇaḥ /
analyzed: na ca upakāraiḥ na guṇaiḥ na sauhṛdaiḥ prasādam āyāti manaḥ hi gotriṇaḥ

original: uvāca vākyaṃ sa ca kaṇṭhakubjo yuktaṃ tvayoktaṃ ca dhanādhinātha // NsP_63.54 //
analyzed: uvāca vākyam sa ca kaṇṭha kubjaḥ yuktam tvayā uktam ca dhanādhinātha

original: parasparaṃ ghnanti ca te viruddhās tathāpi loke na parābhavo 'sti /
analyzed: parasparam ghnanti ca te viruddhāḥ tathā api loke na

original: parābhavaṃ nānyakṛtaṃ sahante noṣṇaṃ jalaṃ jvālayate tṛṇāni // NsP_63.55 //
analyzed: parābhavam na anya kṛtam sahante na uṣṇam jalam jvālayate tṛṇāni

original: tasmāt samāgaccha dhanādhinātha pārśvaṃ na vegena vibhīṣaṇasya /
analyzed: tasmāt samāgaccha dhanādhinātha pārśvam na vegena vibhīṣaṇasya

original: svabāhuvīryārjitavittabhogināṃ svabandhuvargeṣu hi ko virodhaḥ // NsP_63.56 //
analyzed: sva bāhu vīrya arjita vitta bhoginām sva bandhu vargeṣu hi kaḥ virodhaḥ

original: ityuktaḥ sa tadā tena kaṇṭhakubjena mantriṇā /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa tadā tena kaṇṭha kubjena mantriṇā

original: vibhīṣaṇasya sāmīpyaṃ jagāmāśu vicārayan // NsP_63.57 //
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇasya sāmīpyam jagāma āśu vicārayan

original: tato laṅkādhipaḥ śrutvā bāndhavaṃ pūrvajaṃ tadā /
analyzed: tatas laṅkā adhipaḥ śrutvā bāndhavam pūrvajam tadā

original: prāptaṃ pratyājagāmāśu vinayena samanvitaḥ // NsP_63.58 //
analyzed: prāptam pratyājagāma āśu vinayena samanvitaḥ

original: tato vibhīṣaṇo dṛṣṭvā tadā dīnaṃ ca bāndhavam /
analyzed: tatas vibhīṣaṇaḥ dṛṣṭvā tadā dīnam ca bāndhavam

original: saṃtaptamānaso bhūpa jagādedaṃ vaco mahat // NsP_63.59 //
analyzed: saṃtapta mānasaḥ bhūpa jagāda idam vacaḥ mahat

original: vibhīṣaṇa uvāca:
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ uvāca

original: kathaṃ dīno 'si yakṣeśa kiṃ kaṣṭaṃ tava cetasi /
analyzed: katham dīnaḥ si yakṣa īśa kim kaṣṭam tava cetasi

original: nivedayādhunāsmākaṃ niścayān mārjayāmi tat // NsP_63.60 //
analyzed: nivedaya adhunā asmākam niścayāt mārjayāmi tat

original: tadaikāntaṃ samāsādya kathayām_asa vedanām // NsP_63.61ab //
analyzed: tadā ekāntam samāsādya kathayāmasa vedanām

original: dhanada uvāca:
analyzed: dhanadaḥ uvāca

original: gṛhītā kiṃ svayaṃ yātā nihatā kenacid dviṣā // NsP_63.61cd //
analyzed: gṛhītā kim svayam yātā nihatā kenacid dviṣā

original: bhrātaḥ kāntāṃ na paśyāmi citrasenāṃ manoramām /
analyzed: bhrātar kāntām na paśyāmi citrasenām manoramām

original: etad bandho mahat kaṣṭaṃ mama nārīsamudbhavam // NsP_63.62 //
analyzed: etat bandho mahat kaṣṭam mama nārī samudbhavam

original: prāṇān vai ghātayiṣyāmi anāsādya ca vallabhām // NsP_63.63ab //
analyzed: prāṇān vai ghātayiṣyāmi an āsādya ca vallabhām

original: vibhīṣaṇa uvāca:
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ uvāca

original: ānayiṣyāmi te kāntāṃ yatra tatra sthitāṃ vibho // NsP_63.63cd //
analyzed: ānayiṣyāmi te kāntām yatra tatra sthitām vibho

original: kaḥ samartho 'dhunāsmākaṃ hartuṃ nātha tṛṇasya ca /
analyzed: kaḥ samarthaḥ dhuna asmākam hartum nātha tṛṇasya ca

original: tato vibhīṣaṇas tatra nāḍījaṅghāṃ niśācarīm // NsP_63.64 //
analyzed: tatas vibhīṣaṇaḥ tatra nāḍījaṅghām niśācarīm

original: bhṛśaṃ saṃjalpayām_asa nānāmāyāgarīyasīm /
analyzed: bhṛśam saṃjalpayāmasa nānā māyā garīyasīm

original: dhanadasya ca yā kāntā citrasenāvidhānataḥ // NsP_63.65 //
analyzed: dhanadasya ca yā kāntā citrasenā vidhānataḥ

original: sā ca kena hṛtā loke manase sarasi sthitā /
analyzed: sā ca kena hṛtā loke manase sarasi sthitā

original: tāṃ ca jānīhi saṃvīkṣya devarājādiveśmasu // NsP_63.66 //
analyzed: tām ca jānīhi saṃvīkṣya devarāja ādi veśmasu

original: tato niśācarī bhūpa kṛtvā māyāmayaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: tatas niśācarī bhūpa kṛtvā māyā mayam vapuḥ

original: jagāma tridivaṃ śīghraṃ devarājādiveśmasu // NsP_63.67 //
analyzed: jagāma tridivam śīghram devarāja ādi veśmasu

original: yayā dṛṣṭyā kṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭo mohaṃ yāsyati copalaḥ /
analyzed: yayā dṛṣṭyā kṣaṇam dṛṣṭaḥ moham yāsyati ca upalaḥ

original: yasyāḥ samaṃ dhruvaṃ rūpaṃ vidyate na carācare // NsP_63.68 //
analyzed: yasyāḥ samam dhruvam rūpam vidyate na carācare

original: etasminn eva kāle ca devarājo 'pi bhūpate /
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle ca devarājaḥ pi bhūpate

original: saṃprāpto mandarāc chīghraṃ preritaś citrasenayā // NsP_63.69 //
analyzed: saṃprāptaḥ mandarāt śīghram preritaḥ citrasenayā

original: grahītuṃ divyapuṣpāṇi nandanaprabhavāṇi ca /
analyzed: grahītum divya puṣpāṇi nandana prabhavāṇi ca

original: tatra paśyan sa tāṃ tanvīṃ nijasthāne sabhāgatām // NsP_63.70 //
analyzed: tatra paśyan sa tām tanvīm nija sthāne sabhā gatām

original: atīvarūpasaṃpannāṃ gītagānaparāyaṇām /
analyzed: atīva rūpa saṃpannām gīta gāna parāyaṇām

original: tāṃ vīkṣya devarājo 'pi sa kāmavaśago 'bhavat // NsP_63.71 //
analyzed: tām vīkṣya sa kāma vaśagaḥ bhavat

original: tataḥ saṃprerayām_asa devavaidyau surādhipaḥ /
analyzed: tatas saṃprerayāmasa deva vaidyau surādhipaḥ

original: tasyāḥ pārśve samānetuṃ dhruvaṃ cāntaḥpure tadā // NsP_63.72 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ pārśve samānetum dhruvam ca antaḥpure tadā

original: devavaidyau tadāgatya jalpataś cāgrataḥ sthitau /
analyzed: deva vaidyau tadā āgatya jalpataḥ ca agratas sthitau

original: āgaccha bhava tanvaṅgi devarājasamīpagā // NsP_63.73 //
analyzed: āgaccha bhava tanvaṅgi devarāja samīpa gā

original: ityuktā sā tadā tābhyāṃ jagāda madhurākṣaram // NsP_63.74ab //
analyzed: iti uktā sā tadā tābhyām jagāda madhura akṣaram

original: nāḍījaṅghovāca:
analyzed: nāḍījaṅghā uvāca

original: devarājaḥ svayaṃ yan me pārśvaṃ cātrāgamiṣyati // NsP_63.74cd //
analyzed: devarājaḥ svayam yat me pārśvam ca atrā āgamiṣyati

original: tasya vācyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nānyathā sarvathā mayā /
analyzed: tasya vācyam ca kartavyam na anyathā sarvathā mayā

original: tau tadā vāsavaṃ gatvā ūcatur vacanaṃ śubham // NsP_63.75 //
analyzed: tau tadā vāsavam gatvā ūcatuḥ vacanam śubham

original: vāsava uvāca:
analyzed: vāsavaḥ uvāca

original: samādeśaya tanvaṅgi kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayādhunā /
analyzed: samādeśaya tanvaṅgi kim kartavyam mayā adhunā

original: sarvadā dāsabhūtas te yācase tad dadāmy aham // NsP_63.76 //
analyzed: sarvadā dāsa bhūtaḥ te yācase tat dadāmi aham

original: tanvaṅgy uvāca:
analyzed: tanvaṅgī uvāca

original: yācitaṃ yadi me nātha dāsyasīti na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: yācitam yadi me nātha dāsyasi iti na saṃśayaḥ

original: tato 'haṃ vaśagā deva bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // NsP_63.77 //
analyzed: tatas ham vaśa gā deva bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ

original: adya tvaṃ darśayāsmākaṃ sarvaḥ kāntāparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: adya tvam darśaya asmākam sarvaḥ kāntā parigrahaḥ

original: mama rūpasamā rāmā kāntā te cāsti vā na vā // NsP_63.78 //
analyzed: mama rūpa samā rāmā kāntā te ca asti vā na vā

original: tayā cokte ca vacane sa bhūyo vāsavo 'vadat /
analyzed: tayā ca ukte ca vacane sa bhūyas vāsavaḥ vadat

original: darśayiṣyāmi sarvaṃ te devi kāntāparigraham // NsP_63.79 //
analyzed: darśayiṣyāmi sarvam te devi kāntā parigraham

original: sa sarvaṃ darśayām_asa vāsavo 'ntaḥpuraṃ tadā /
analyzed: sa sarvam darśayāmasa vāsavaḥ ntaḥpuram tadā

original: tato jagāda bhūyaḥ sa kiṃcid gūḍhaṃ mama sthitam // NsP_63.80 //
analyzed: tatas jagāda bhūyas sa kiṃcid gūḍham mama sthitam

original: vimucyaikāṃ ca yuvatīṃ sarvaṃ te darśitaṃ mayā // NsP_63.81ab //
analyzed: vimucya ekām ca yuvatīm sarvam te darśitam mayā

original: indra uvāca:
analyzed: indraḥ uvāca

original: sā rāmā mandare cāsti avijñātā surāsuraiḥ // NsP_63.81cd //
analyzed: sā rāmā mandare ca asti avijñātā sura asuraiḥ

original: tāṃ ca te darśayiṣyāmi nākhyeyaṃ kasyacit tvayā /
analyzed: tām ca te darśayiṣyāmi na ākhyeyam kasyacid tvayā

original: tataḥ sa devarājo 'pi tayā sārdhaṃ ca bhūpate // NsP_63.82 //
analyzed: tatas sa devarājaḥ u pi tayā sārdham ca bhūpate

original: gacchann evāmbare bhūpa mandaraṃ prati bhūdharam /
analyzed: gacchan evā ambare bhūpa mandaram prati bhūdharam

original: tasya vai gacchamānasya vimānenārkavarcasā // NsP_63.83 //
analyzed: tasya vai gacchamānasya vimānena arka varcasā

original: darśanaṃ nāradasyāpi tasya jātaṃ tadāmbare /
analyzed: darśanam nāradasya api tasya jātam tadā ambare

original: taṃ vīkṣya nāradaṃ vīro lajjamāno 'pi vāsavaḥ // NsP_63.84 //
analyzed: tam vīkṣya nāradam vīraḥ lajjamānaḥ pi vāsavaḥ

original: namaskṛtya jagādoccaiḥ kva yāsyasi mahāmune /
analyzed: namaskṛtya jagāda uccais kva yāsyasi mahā mune

original: tataḥ kṛtāśīḥ sa munir avadat trideveśvaram // NsP_63.85 //
analyzed: tatas kṛta āśīḥ sa muniḥ avadat trideva īśvaram

original: gacchāmi mānase snātuṃ devarāja sukhī bhava /
analyzed: gacchāmi mānase snātum devarāja sukhī bhava

original: nāḍījaṅghe 'sti kuśalaṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahātmanām // NsP_63.86 //
analyzed: nāḍījaṅghe sti kuśalam rākṣasānām mahātmanām

original: vibhīṣaṇo 'pi te bhrātā sukhī tiṣṭhati sarvadā /
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ pi te bhrātā sukhī tiṣṭhati sarvadā

original: evam uktā ca muninā sā kṛṣṇavadanābhavat // NsP_63.87 //
analyzed: evam uktā ca muninā sā kṛṣṇa vadanā bhavat

original: vismito devarājo 'pi chalito duṣṭayānayā /
analyzed: vismitaḥ devarājaḥ pi chalitaḥ duṣṭayā anayā

original: nārado 'pi gataḥ snātuṃ kailāse mānasaṃ saraḥ // NsP_63.88 //
analyzed: nāradaḥ pi gataḥ snātum kailāse mānasam saraḥ

original: indras tāṃ hantukāmo 'pi āgacchan mandarācalam /
analyzed: indraḥ tām hantu kāmaḥ pi āgacchat mandara acalam

original: yatrāśramo 'sti vai nūnaṃ tṛṇabindor mahātmanaḥ // NsP_63.89 //
analyzed: vai nūnam tṛṇabindoḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: kṣaṇaṃ viśramya tatraiva dhṛtvā keśeṣu rākṣasīm /
analyzed: kṣaṇam viśramya tatra eva dhṛtvā keśeṣu rākṣasīm

original: hantum icchati deveśo nāḍījaṅghāṃ niśācarīm // NsP_63.90 //
analyzed: hantum icchati deveśaḥ nāḍījaṅghām niśācarīm

original: tāvat tatra samāyātas tṛṇabindur nijāśramāt /
analyzed: tāvat tatra samāyātaḥ tṛṇabinduḥ nija āśramāt

original: dhṛtā krandati sā rājann indreṇāpi niśācarī // NsP_63.91 //
analyzed: dhṛtā krandati sā rājan indreṇa api niśācarī

original: mā māṃ rakṣati puṇyātmā hanyamānāṃ ca sāṃpratam /
analyzed: mā mām rakṣati puṇya ātmā hanyamānām ca sāṃpratam

original: tadāgatya muniśreṣṭhas tṛṇabindur mahātapāḥ // NsP_63.92 //
analyzed: tat āgatya muni śreṣṭhaḥ tṛṇabinduḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: jagāda purataḥ sthitvā muñcemāṃ mahilāṃ vane /
analyzed: jagāda puratas sthitvā muñca imām mahilām vane

original: vajreṇa nihatā bhūyaḥ kopayuktena cetasā /
analyzed: vajreṇa nihatāḥ bhūyas kopa yuktena cetasā

analyzed: sa cukopa muni śreṣṭhaḥ prekṣamāṇaḥ muhur muhur

original: yad eṣā yuvatī duṣṭa nihatā me tapovane /
analyzed: yat eṣā yuvatī duṣṭa nihatā me tapaḥ vane

original: tatas tvaṃ mama śāpena niścayāt strī bhaviṣyasi // NsP_63.95 //
analyzed: tatas tvam mama śāpena niścayāt strī bhaviṣyasi

original: indra uvāca:
analyzed: indraḥ uvāca

original: eṣā nātha mahāduṣṭā rākṣasī nihatā mayā /
analyzed: eṣā nātha mahā duṣṭā rākṣasī nihatā mayā

original: ahaṃ svāmī surāṇāṃ ca śāpaṃ mā dehi me 'dhunā // NsP_63.96 //
analyzed: aham svāmī surāṇām ca śāpam mā dehi me dhunā

original: munir uvāca:
analyzed: muniḥ uvāca

analyzed: nūnam tapaḥ vane smākam duṣṭāḥ tiṣṭhanti sādhavaḥ

analyzed: mama atra tapasaḥ bhāvāt na nighnanti parasparam

original: ityukto hi tadā cendraḥ prāptaḥ strītvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ hi tadā ca indraḥ prāptaḥ strī tvam na saṃśayaḥ

original: jagāma tridivaṃ bhūpa hataśaktiparākramaḥ // NsP_63.98 //
analyzed: jagāma tridivam bhūpa hata śakti parākramaḥ

analyzed: na āsīnaḥ hi bhavati eva sarvadā deva saṃsadi

analyzed: devāḥ duḥkham samāpannāḥ dṛṣṭvā strī tvam gatam harim

analyzed: tatas deva gaṇāḥ sarve vāsavena samanvitāḥ

analyzed: jagmuḥ ca brahmasadanam tathā dīnā śacī tadā

original: devā ūcuś ca te sarve vāsavena samanvitāḥ // NsP_63.101 //
analyzed: devāḥ ūcuḥ ca te sarve vāsavena samanvitāḥ

analyzed: tṛṇabindoḥ muneḥ śāpāt yātaḥ strī tvam surādhipaḥ

analyzed: sa muniḥ kopavān brahman nā eva gacchati anugraham

analyzed: sva karmaṇā upayātaḥ sau strī tvam strī vadha kāraṇāt

analyzed: jahāra citrasenām ca su guptām dhanada aṅganām

analyzed: go kulam kṛṣṇa hīnam tu tathā indreṇa amarāvatī

analyzed: japaḥ kriyā tapaḥ dānam jñānam tīrtham ca vai prabho

analyzed: vaktum arhasi sarvajña mama sarva artha sādhakam

analyzed: āśrame prathame tiṣṭhan gurūṇām vaśagaḥ sadā

original: parityajya mahodāras tṛṇānīva yathāsukham // NsP_64.16 //
analyzed: parityajya mahā udāraḥ tṛṇāni iva yathāsukham

original: anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpam āyuṣyaṃ dravyasaṃcayam // NsP_64.17 //
analyzed: anityam yauvanam rūpam āyuṣyam dravya saṃcayam

original: purāṇoditamārgeṇa sarvatīrthāni vai mune // NsP_64.18 //
analyzed: purāṇa udita mārgeṇa sarva tīrthāni vai mune

original: gamiṣyāmi yathākālam iti niścitamānasaḥ /

original: gaṅgāṃ ca yamunāṃ caiva gomatīm atha gaṇḍakīm // NsP_64.19 //
analyzed: gaṅgām ca yamunām ca eva gomatīm atha gaṇḍakīm

analyzed: prayāgam narmadām ca eva mahā nadyaḥ nadān api

analyzed: kadācid prāptavān vīraḥ śālagrāmam tapodhanaḥ

analyzed: āsevyamānam ṛṣibhiḥ tattva vidbhiḥ tapodhanaiḥ

analyzed: bhūṣitam cakra nadyā ca cakra aṅkita śilā talam

analyzed: ramyam viviktam vistīrṇam sadā citta prasādakam

analyzed: kecid cakra aṅkitāḥ tasmin prāṇinaḥ puṇya darśanāḥ

original: puṇḍarīkaḥ prasannātmā tīrthāni samasevata /

original: snātvā devahrade tīrthe sarasvatyāṃ ca suvrataḥ // NsP_64.27 //
analyzed: snātvā devahrade tīrthe sarasvatyām ca suvrataḥ

original: jātismaryāṃ cakrakuṇḍe cakranadyāsṛteṣv api /
analyzed: jātismaryām cakrakuṇḍe cakranadyā sṛteṣu api

original: tathānyāny api tīrthāni tasminn eva cacāra saḥ // NsP_64.28 //
analyzed: tathā anyāni api tīrthāni tasmin eva cacāra saḥ

original: tataḥ kṣetraprabhāveṇa tīrthānāṃ caiva tejasā /
analyzed: tatas kṣetra prabhāveṇa tīrthānām ca eva tejasā

original: manaḥ prasādam agamat tasya tasmin mahātmanaḥ // NsP_64.29 //
analyzed: manaḥ prasādam agamat tasya tasmin mahātmanaḥ

original: so 'pi tīrthe viśuddhātmā dhyānayogaparāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ pi tīrthe viśuddha ātmā dhyāna yoga parāyaṇaḥ

original: tatraiva siddhim ākāṅkṣan samārādhya jagatpatim // NsP_64.30 //
analyzed: tatra eva siddhim ākāṅkṣan samārādhya jagatpatim

original: śāstroktena vidhānena bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ /
analyzed: śāstra uktena vidhānena bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ

original: uvāsa ciram ekākī nirdvandvaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ // NsP_64.31 //
analyzed: uvāsa ciram ekākī nirdvandvaḥ saṃyata indriyaḥ

original: śākamūlaphalāhāraḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ samadarśanaḥ /
analyzed: śāka mūla phala āhāraḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ sama darśanaḥ

original: yamaiś ca niyamaiś caiva tathā cāsanabandhanaiḥ // NsP_64.32 //
analyzed: yamaiḥ ca niyamaiḥ ca eva tathā ca āsana bandhanaiḥ

original: prāṇāyāmaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiś ca pratyāhāraiś ca saṃtataiḥ /
analyzed: prāṇāyāmaiḥ su tīkṣṇaiḥ ca pratyāhāraiḥ ca saṃtataiḥ

original: dhāraṇābhis tathā dhyānaiḥ samādhibhir atandritaḥ // NsP_64.33 //
analyzed: dhāraṇābhiḥ tathā dhyānaiḥ samādhibhiḥ atandritaḥ

original: yogābhyāsaṃ tadā samyak cakre vigatakalmaṣaḥ /
analyzed: yoga abhyāsam tadā samyak cakre vigata kalmaṣaḥ

original: ārādhya devadeveśaṃ tadgatenāntarātmanā // NsP_64.34 //
analyzed: ārādhya devadeveśam tad gatena antarātmanā

original: puṇḍarīko mahābhāgaḥ puruṣārthaviśāradaḥ /
analyzed: puṇḍarīkaḥ mahābhāgaḥ puruṣa artha viśāradaḥ

original: prasādaṃ param ākāṅkṣan viṣṇos tadgatamānasaḥ // NsP_64.35 //
analyzed: prasādam param ākāṅkṣan viṣṇoḥ tad gata mānasaḥ

original: tasya tasmin nivasataḥ śālagrāme mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tasya tasmin nivasataḥ śālagrāme mahātmanaḥ

original: puṇḍarīkasya rājendra kālo 'gacchan mahāṃs tataḥ // NsP_64.36 //
analyzed: puṇḍarīkasya rāja indra kālaḥ gacchan mahān tatas

original: mune kadācit taṃ deśaṃ nāradaḥ paramārthavit /
analyzed: mune kadācid tam deśam nāradaḥ parama artha vid

original: jagāma sumahātejāḥ sākṣādādityasaṃnibhaḥ // NsP_64.37 //
analyzed: jagāma su mahā tejāḥ sākṣāt āditya saṃnibhaḥ

original: taṃ draṣṭukāmo devarṣiḥ puṇḍarīkaṃ taponidhim /
analyzed: tam draṣṭu kāmaḥ devarṣiḥ puṇḍarīkam tapaḥ nidhim

original: viṣṇubhaktiparītātmā vaiṣṇavānāṃ hite rataḥ // NsP_64.38 //
analyzed: viṣṇu bhakti parīta ātmā vaiṣṇavānām hite rataḥ

original: sa dṛṣṭvā nāradaṃ prāptaṃ sarvatejaḥ prabhānvitam /
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā nāradam prāptam sarva tejaḥ prabhā anvitam

original: mahāmatiṃ mahāprājñaṃ sarvāgamaviśāradam // NsP_64.39 //
analyzed: mahāmatim mahā prājñam sarva āgama viśāradam

original: prāñjaliḥ praṇato bhūtvā prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā /
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ bhūtvā prahṛṣṭena antarātmanā

original: arghaṃ dattvā yathāyogyaṃ praṇāmam akarot tataḥ // NsP_64.40 //
analyzed: argham dattvā yathāyogyam praṇāmam akarot tatas

original: ko 'yam atyadbhutākāras tejasvī hṛdyaveṣadhṛk /
analyzed: kaḥ yam ati adbhuta ākāraḥ tejasvī hṛdya veṣa dhṛk

original: ātodyahastaḥ sumukho jaṭāmaṇḍalabhūṣaṇaḥ // NsP_64.41 //
analyzed: ātodya hastaḥ su mukhaḥ jaṭā maṇḍala bhūṣaṇaḥ

original: vivasvān atha vā vahnir indro varuṇa eva vā /
analyzed: vivasvān atha vā vahniḥ indraḥ varuṇaḥ eva vā

original: iti saṃcintayan vipraḥ papraccha paramadyutiḥ // NsP_64.42 //
analyzed: iti saṃcintayan vipraḥ papraccha parama dyutiḥ

original: puṇḍarīka uvāca:
analyzed: puṇḍarīkaḥ uvāca

original: ko bhavān iha saṃprāptaḥ kuto vā paramadyute /
analyzed: kaḥ bhavān iha saṃprāptaḥ kutas vā parama dyute

original: tvaddarśanaṃ hy apuṇyānāṃ prāyeṇa bhuvi durlabham // NsP_64.43 //
analyzed: tvad darśanam hi apuṇyānām prāyeṇa bhuvi durlabham

original: nārada uvāca:
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: nārado 'ham anuprāptas tvaddarśanakutūhalāt /
analyzed: nāradaḥ ham anuprāptaḥ tvad darśana kutūhalāt

original: puṇḍarīka harer bhaktas tvādṛśaḥ satataṃ dvija // NsP_64.44 //
analyzed: puṇḍarīka hareḥ bhaktaḥ tvādṛśaḥ satatam dvija

original: smṛtaḥ saṃbhāṣito vāpi pūjito vā dvijottama /
analyzed: smṛtaḥ saṃbhāṣitaḥ vā api pūjitaḥ vā dvijottama

original: punāti bhagavadbhaktaś cāṇḍālo 'pi yadṛcchayā // NsP_64.45 //
analyzed: punāti bhagavat bhaktaḥ cāṇḍālaḥ pi yadṛcchayā

original: dāso 'haṃ vāsudevasya devadevasya śārṅgiṇah /
analyzed: dāsaḥ ham vāsudevasya devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: ityukto nāradenāsau bhaktiparyākulātmanā // NsP_64.46 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ nāradena asau bhakti paryākula ātmanā

original: provāca madhuraṃ vipras taddarśanasuvismitaḥ // NsP_64.47ab //
analyzed: provāca madhuram vipraḥ tad darśana su vismitaḥ

original: puṇḍarīka uvāca:
analyzed: puṇḍarīkaḥ uvāca

original: dhanyo 'haṃ dehinām adya supūjyo 'haṃ surair api // NsP_64.47cd //
analyzed: dhanyaḥ ham dehinām adya su pūjyaḥ ham suraiḥ api

original: kṛtārthāḥ pitaro me 'dya saṃprātaṃ janmaṇaḥ phalam /
analyzed: kṛtārthāḥ pitaraḥ me saṃprātam janmaṇaḥ phalam

original: anugṛhṇīṣva devarṣe tvadbhaktasya viśeṣataḥ // NsP_64.48 //
analyzed: anugṛhṇīṣva devarṣe tvad bhaktasya viśeṣataḥ

original: kiṃ kiṃ karomy ahaṃ vidvan bhrāmyamāṇaḥ svakarmabhiḥ /
analyzed: kim kim karomi aham vidvan bhrāmyamāṇaḥ sva karmabhiḥ

original: kartavyaṃ paramaṃ guhyam upadeṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi // NsP_64.49 //
analyzed: kartavyam paramam guhyam upadeṣṭum tvam arhasi

original: tvaṃ gatiḥ saravalokānāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ viśeṣataḥ // NsP_64.50ab //
analyzed: tvam gatiḥ sarava lokānām vaiṣṇavānām viśeṣataḥ

original: nārada uvāca:
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: anekānīha śāstrāṇi karmāṇi ca tathā dvija // NsP_64.50cd //
analyzed: anekāni iha śāstrāṇi karmāṇi ca tathā dvija

original: dharmamārgāś ca bahavas tathaiva prāṇinaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: dharma mārgāḥ ca bahavaḥ tathā eva prāṇinaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: vailakṣaṇyaṃ ca jagatas tasmād eva dvijottama // NsP_64.51 //
analyzed: vailakṣaṇyam ca jagataḥ tasmāt eva dvijottama

original: avyaktāj jāyate sarvaṃ sarvātmakam idaṃ jagat /
analyzed: avyaktāt jāyate sarvam sarva ātmakam idam jagat

original: ity evaṃ prāhur apare tatraiva layam eva ca // NsP_64.52 //
analyzed: iti evam prāhuḥ apare tatra eva layam eva ca

original: ātmāno bahavo proktā nityāḥ sarvagatās tathā /
analyzed: ātmānaḥ proktāḥ nityāḥ sarva gatāḥ tathā

original: anyair matimatāṃ śreṣṭha tattvālokanatatparaiḥ // NsP_64.53 //
analyzed: anyaiḥ matimatām śreṣṭha tattva ālokana tatparaiḥ

original: evamādy anusaṃcintya yathāmati yathāśrutam /
analyzed: evamādi anusaṃcintya yathāmati yathāśrutam

original: vadanti ṛṣayaḥ sarve nānāmataviśāradāḥ // NsP_64.54 //
analyzed: vadanti ṛṣayaḥ sarve nānā mata viśāradāḥ

original: śṛṇuṣvāvahito brahman kathayāmi tavānagha /
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ brahman kathayāmi tava anagha

original: paramārtham idaṃ guhyaṃ ghorasaṃsāramocanam // NsP_64.55 //
analyzed: parama artham idam guhyam ghora saṃsāra mocanam

original: anāgatam atītaṃ ca viprakṛṣṭam atīva yat /
analyzed: anāgatam atītam ca viprakṛṣṭam atīva yat

original: na gṛhṇāti nṛṇāṃ dṛṣṭir vartamānārthaniścitā // NsP_64.56 //
analyzed: na gṛhṇāti nṛṇām dṛṣṭiḥ vartamāna artha niścitā

original: śṛṇuṣvāvahitaṃ tāta kathayāmi tavānagha /
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva avahitam tāta kathayāmi tava anagha

original: yat proktaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvaṃ pṛcchato mama suvrata // NsP_64.57 //
analyzed: yat proktam brahmaṇā pūrvam pṛcchataḥ mama suvrata

original: kadācid brahmalokasthaṃ padmayoniṃ pitāmaham /
analyzed: kadācid brahma loka stham padmayonim pitāmaham

original: praṇipatya yathānyāyaṃ pṛṣṭavān aham avyayam // NsP_64.58 //
analyzed: praṇipatya yathānyāyam pṛṣṭavān aham avyayam

original: nārada uvāca:
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: kiṃ taj jñānaṃ paraṃ deva kaś ca yogaḥ paras tathā /
analyzed: kim tat jñānam param deva kaḥ ca yogaḥ paraḥ tathā

original: etan me tattvataḥ sarvaṃ tvam ācakṣva pitāmaha // NsP_64.59 //
analyzed: etat me tattvataḥ sarvam tvam ācakṣva pitāmaha

original: brahmovāca:
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: yaḥ paraḥ prakṛteḥ proktaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ paraḥ prakṛteḥ proktaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ

original: sa eva sarvabhūtānāṃ nara ity abhidhīyate // NsP_64.60 //
analyzed: saḥ eva sarva bhūtānām naraḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: narāj jātāni tattvāni nārāṇīti tato viduḥ /
analyzed: narāt jātāni tattvāni nārāṇi iti tatas viduḥ

original: tāny eva cāyanaṃ tasya tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // NsP_64.61 //
analyzed: tāni eva ca ayanam tasya tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: nārāyaṇāj jagat sarvaṃ sargakāle prajāyate /
analyzed: nārāyaṇāt jagat sarvam sarga kāle prajāyate

original: tasminn eva punas tac ca pralaye saṃpralīyate // NsP_64.62 //
analyzed: tasmin eva punar tat ca pralaye saṃpralīyate

original: nārāyaṇaḥ paraṃ brahma tattvaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ param /
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ param brahma tattvam nārāyaṇaḥ param

original: nārāyaṇaḥ paraṃ jyotir ātmā nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ // NsP_64.63 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ param jyotiḥ ātmā nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ

original: parād api paraś cāsau tasmān nātiparaṃ mune /
analyzed: parāt api paraḥ ca asau tasmāt na atiparam mune

original: yac ca kiṃcij jagaty asmin dṛśyate śrūyate 'pi vā // NsP_64.64 //
analyzed: yat ca kiṃcid jagati asmin dṛśyate śrūyate vā

original: antar bahiś ca tat sarvaṃ vyāpya nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: antar bahis ca tat sarvam vyāpya nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ

original: evaṃ viditvā taṃ devāḥ sākāraṃ vyāharan muhuḥ // NsP_64.65 //
analyzed: evam viditvā tam devāḥ sa ākāram vyāharan muhur

original: namo nārāyaṇāyeti dhyātvā cānanyamānasāḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti dhyātvā ca an anya mānasāḥ

original: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kiṃ tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ // NsP_64.66 //
analyzed: kim tasya dānaiḥ kim tīrthaiḥ kim tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ

original: yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇam ananyadhīḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ nityam dhyāyate devam nārāyaṇam an anya dhīḥ

original: etaj jñānaṃ varaṃ nāto yogaś caiva paras tathā // NsP_64.67 //
analyzed: etat jñānam varam na atas yogaḥ ca eva paraḥ tathā

original: parasparaviruddhārthaiḥ kim anyaiḥ śāstravistaraiḥ /
analyzed: paraspara viruddha arthaiḥ kim anyaiḥ śāstra vistaraiḥ

original: bahavo 'pi yathā mārgā viśanty evaṃ mahat puram // NsP_64.68 //
analyzed: bahavaḥ pi yathā mārgāḥ viśanti evam mahat puram

original: tathā jñānāni sarvāṇi praviśanti tam īśvaram /
analyzed: tathā jñānāni sarvāṇi praviśanti tam īśvaram

original: sa hi sarvagato devaḥ sūkṣmo 'vyaktaḥ sanātanaḥ // NsP_64.69 //
analyzed: sa hi sarva gataḥ devaḥ sūkṣmaḥ vyaktaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: jagadādir anādyantaḥ svayaṃbhūr bhūtabhāvanaḥ /
analyzed: jagat ādiḥ anādi antaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: viṣṇur vibhur acintyātmā nityaḥ sadasadātmakaḥ // NsP_64.70 //
vāsudevojagadvāsaḥ purāṇaḥ kavir avyayaḥ /
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ jagat vāsaḥ purāṇaḥ kaviḥ avyayaḥ

original: yasmāt prāptaṃ sthitiṃ kṛtsnaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram // NsP_64.71 //
analyzed: yasmāt prāptam sthitim kṛtsnam trailokyam sa carācaram

original: tasmāt sa bhagavān devo viṣṇur ity abhidhīyate /
analyzed: tasmāt sa bhagavān devaḥ viṣṇuḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: yasmād vā sarvabhūtānāṃ tattvādyānāṃ yugakṣaye // NsP_64.72 //
analyzed: yasmāt vā sarva bhūtānām tattva ādyānām yuga kṣaye

original: tasmin nivāsaḥ saṃsarge vāsudevas tatas tu saḥ /
analyzed: tasmin nivāsaḥ saṃsarge vāsudevaḥ tatas tu saḥ

original: tam āhuḥ puruṣaṃ kecit kecid īśvaram avyayam // NsP_64.73 //
analyzed: tam āhuḥ puruṣam kecid kecid īśvaram avyayam

original: vijñānamātraṃ kecic ca kecid brahma paraṃ tathā /
analyzed: vijñāna mātram kecid ca kecid brahma param tathā

original: kecit kālam anādyantaṃ kecij jīvaṃ sanātanam // NsP_64.74 //
analyzed: kecid kālam anādi antam kecid jīvam sanātanam

original: kecic ca paramātmānaṃ kecic caivam anāmayam /
analyzed: kecid ca parama ātmānam kecid ca evam anāmayam

original: kecit kṣetrajñam ity āhuḥ kecit ṣaḍviṃśakaṃ tathā // NsP_64.75 //
analyzed: kecid kṣetrajñam iti āhuḥ kecid ṣaḍviṃśakam tathā

original: aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ kecic ca kecit padmarajoupamam /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha mātram kecid ca kecid padma rajaḥ upamam

original: ete cānye ca munibhiḥ saṃjñābhedāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ // NsP_64.76 //
analyzed: ete ca anye ca munibhiḥ saṃjñā bhedāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ

original: śāstreṣu kathitā viṣṇor lokavyāmohakārakāḥ /
analyzed: śāstreṣu kathitāḥ viṣṇoḥ loka vyāmoha kārakāḥ

original: ekaṃ yadi bhavec chāstraṃ jñānaṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ bhavet // NsP_64.77 //
analyzed: ekam yadi bhavet śāstram jñānam niḥsaṃśayam bhavet

original: bahutvād iha śātrāṇāṃ jñānatattvaṃ sudurlabham /
analyzed: bahu tvāt iha śātrāṇām jñāna tattvam su durlabham

original: āloḍya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ // NsP_64.78 //
analyzed: āloḍya sarva śāstrāṇi vicārya ca punar punar

original: idam ekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā /
analyzed: idam ekam su niṣpannam dhyeyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sadā

original: tyaktvā vyāmohakān sarvān tasmāc chāstrārthavistarān // NsP_64.79 //
analyzed: tyaktvā vyāmohakān sarvān tasmāt śāstra artha vistarān

original: ananyacetā dhyāyasva nārāyaṇam atandritaḥ /
analyzed: an anya cetāḥ dhyāyasva nārāyaṇam atandritaḥ

original: evaṃ jnātvā tu satataṃ devadevaṃ tam avyayam // NsP_64.80 //
analyzed: evam jnātvā tu satatam devadevam tam avyayam

original: kṣipraṃ yāsyasi tatraiva sāyujyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: kṣipram yāsyasi tatra eva sāyujyam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: śrutvedaṃ brahmaṇā proktaṃ jñānayogaṃ sudurlabham // NsP_64.81 //
analyzed: śrutvā idam brahmaṇā proktam jñāna yogam su durlabham

original: tato 'ham āsaṃ viprendra nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ham āsam vipra indra nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ

original: namo nārāyaṇāyeti ye vidur brahma śāśvatam // NsP_64.82 //
analyzed: namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti ye viduḥ brahma śāśvatam

original: antakāle japantas te yānti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
analyzed: antakāle japantaḥ te yānti viṣṇoḥ param padam

original: tasmān nārāyaṇas tāta paramātmā sanātanaḥ // NsP_64.83 //
analyzed: tasmāt nārāyaṇaḥ tāta paramātmā sanātanaḥ

original: ananyamanasā nityaṃ dhyeyas tattvavicintakaiḥ /
analyzed: an anya manasā nityam dhyeyaḥ tattva vicintakaiḥ

original: nārāyaṇo jagadvyāpī paramātmā sanātanaḥ // NsP_64.84 //
jagatāṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhāra- paripālanatatparaḥ /
analyzed: jagatām sṛṣṭi saṃhāra paripālana tatparaḥ

original: śravaṇāt paṭhanāc caiva nididhyāsanatatparaiḥ // NsP_64.85 //
analyzed: śravaṇāt paṭhanāt ca eva nididhyāsana tatparaiḥ

original: ārādhyaḥ sarvathā brahman puruṣeṇa hitaiṣiṇā /
analyzed: ārādhyaḥ sarvathā brahman puruṣeṇa hita eṣiṇā

original: niḥspṛhā nityasaṃtuṣṭā jñāninaḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ // NsP_64.86 //
analyzed: niḥspṛhāḥ nitya saṃtuṣṭāḥ jñāninaḥ saṃyata indriyāḥ

original: nirmamā nirahaṃkārā rāgadveṣavivarjitāḥ /
analyzed: nirmamāḥ nirahaṃkārāḥ rāga dveṣa vivarjitāḥ

original: apakṣapatitāḥ śāntāḥ sarvasaṃkalpavarjitāḥ // NsP_64.87 //
analyzed: apakṣa patitāḥ śāntāḥ sarva saṃkalpa varjitāḥ

original: dhyānayogaparā brahman te paśyanti jagatpatim /
analyzed: dhyāna yoga parāḥ brahman te paśyanti jagatpatim

original: tyaktatrayā mahātmāno vāsudevaṃ hariṃ gurum // NsP_64.88 //
analyzed: tyakta trayāḥ mahātmānaḥ vāsudevam harim gurum

original: kīrtayanti jagannāthaṃ te paśyanti jagatpatim /
analyzed: kīrtayanti jagannātham te paśyanti jagatpatim

analyzed: tasmāt tvam api vipra indra nārāyaṇa paraḥ bhava

original: tadanyaḥ ko mahodāraḥ prārthitaṃ dātum īśvaraḥ /

analyzed: helayā kīrtitaḥ yaḥ vai svam padam diśati dvija

analyzed: api kāryaḥ tvayā ca eva japaḥ svādhyāyaḥ eva ca

original: tam evoddiśya deveśaṃ kuru nityam atandritaḥ // NsP_64.91 //
analyzed: tam eva uddiśya deveśam kuru nityam atandritaḥ
