analyzed: kim tatra bahubhiḥ mantraiḥ kim tatra bahubhiḥ vrataiḥ

original: namo nārāyaṇāyeti mantraḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ // NsP_64.92 //
analyzed: namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti mantraḥ sarva artha sādhakaḥ

original: cīravāsā jaṭadhārī tridaṇḍī muṇḍa eva vā /
analyzed: cīra vāsāḥ jaṭa dhārī tridaṇḍī muṇḍaḥ eva vā

original: bhūṣito vā dvijaśreṣṭha na liṅgaṃ dharmakāraṇam // NsP_64.93 //
analyzed: bhūṣitaḥ vā dvijaśreṣṭha na liṅgam dharma kāraṇam

original: ye nṛsaṃśā durātmānaḥ pāpācāraratāḥ sadā /
analyzed: ye nṛ saṃśāḥ durātmānaḥ pāpa ācāra ratāḥ sadā

original: te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ narā nārāyaṇāśrayāḥ // NsP_64.94 //
analyzed: te pi yānti param sthānam narāḥ nārāyaṇa āśrayāḥ

original: janmāntarasahasreṣu yasya syād buddhir īdṛśī /
analyzed: janma antara sahasreṣu yasya syāt buddhiḥ īdṛśī

original: dāso 'ha.m vāsudevasya devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // NsP_64.95 //
analyzed: dāsaḥ ham vāsudevasya devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: prayāti viṣṇusālokyaṃ puruṣo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: prayāti viṣṇu sālokyam puruṣaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: kiṃ punas tatgataprāṇaḥ puruṣa saṃyatendriyaḥ // NsP_64.96 //
analyzed: kim punar tad gata prāṇaḥ puruṣa saṃyata indriyaḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: ity uktvā devadevarṣis tatraivāntaradhīyata /
analyzed: iti uktvā devadevarṣiḥ tatra eva antaradhīyata

analyzed: para upakāra nirataḥ trailokyasya eka bhūṣaṇaḥ

analyzed: puṇḍarīkaḥ pi dharma ātmā nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ

analyzed: namaḥ stu keśavāya iti punar punar udīrayan

analyzed: hṛd puṇḍarīke govindam pratiṣṭhāpya janārdanam

analyzed: uvāsa ciram ekākī puruṣa artha vicakṣaṇaḥ

analyzed: nidrā api tasya nā evā āsīt puruṣa artha virodhinī

analyzed: janma janmāntara ārūḍha saṃskāreṇa ca sa dvijaḥ

analyzed: avāpa paramām siddhim vaiṣṇavīm vīta kalmaṣaḥ

analyzed: siṃha vyāghrāḥ tathā anye mṛgāḥ prāṇi vihiṃsakāḥ

analyzed: virodham sahajam hitvā sametāḥ tasya saṃnidhau

analyzed: nivasanti dvijaśreṣṭha praśānta indriya vṛttayaḥ

analyzed: tatas kadācid bhagavān puṇḍarīkasya dhīmataḥ

analyzed: āruhya garuḍam śrīmān añjana acala saṃnibhaḥ

analyzed: meru śṛṅgam iva āruḍhaḥ kāla meghaḥ taḍit dyutiḥ

analyzed: papāta śirasā bhūmau sādhvasa avanataḥ dvijaḥ

analyzed: pipan iva hṛṣīkeśam nayanābhyām samākulaḥ

analyzed: jagāma mahatīm tṛptim puṇḍarīkaḥ tadā anaghaḥ

original: sūta uvāca:

original: sūta uvāca:

analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: tvadbhaktānāṃ hitārthāya tan me vada sureśvara // NsP_65.5 //

original: śrībhagavān uvāca:
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

analyzed: ṛṣabhe tu mahā viṣṇum dvārakāyām tu bhūpatim

original: śālagrāme tapovāsam acintyaṃ gandhamādane // NsP_65.10 //

analyzed: garuḍa dhvajam tu sakale govindam nāma sāyake

analyzed: kedāre mādhavam vindyāt vārāṇasyām tu keśavam

analyzed: puṣkare puṣkarākṣam tu dhṛṣṭadyumne jayadhvajam

analyzed: tṛṇabindu vane vīram aśokam sindhu sāgare

original: viśvāsayūpe viśvaīśaṃ narasiṃhaṃ mahāvane // NsP_65.14 //
analyzed: viśvāsa yūpe viśvaīśam narasiṃham mahā vane

original: puruṣottamaṃ daśapure kubjake vāmanaṃ viduḥ // NsP_65.15 //

original: devadāruvane guhyaṃ kāveryāṃ nāgaśāyinam // NsP_65.16 //
analyzed: devadāru vane guhyam kāveryām nāga śāyinam

original: prayāge yogamūrtiṃ ca payoṣṇyāṃ ca sudarśanam /

original: kumāratīrthe kaumāraṃ lohite hayaśīrṣakam // NsP_65.17 //
analyzed: kumāratīrthe kaumāram lohite hayaśīrṣakam

original: ujjayinyāṃ trivikramaṃ liṅgakūṭe caturbhujam /

original: hariharaṃ tu bhadrāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā pāpāt pramucyate // NsP_65.18 //
analyzed: hariharam tu bhadrāyām dṛṣṭvā pāpāt pramucyate

original: viśvarūpaṃ kurukṣetre maṇikuṇḍe halāyudham /
analyzed: viśvarūpam kurukṣetre maṇikuṇḍe halāyudham

original: lokanātham ayodhyāyāṃ kuṇḍine kuṇḍineśvaram // NsP_65.19 //
analyzed: loka nātham ayodhyāyām kuṇḍine kuṇḍineśvaram

original: bhāṇḍāre vāsudevaṃ tu cakratīrthe sudarśanam /
analyzed: bhāṇḍāre vāsudevam tu cakratīrthe sudarśanam

original: āḍhye viṣṇupadaṃ vidyāc *chūkare śūkaraṃ viduḥ // NsP_65.20 //
analyzed: āḍhye viṣṇu padam vidyāt śūkare śūkaram viduḥ

original: brahmeśaṃ mānase tīrthe daṇḍake śyāmalaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: brahmeśam mānase tīrthe daṇḍake śyāmalam viduḥ

original: trikūṭe nāgamokṣaṃ ca merupṛṣṭhe ca bhāskaram // NsP_65.21 //
analyzed: trikūṭe nāgamokṣam ca meru pṛṣṭhe ca bhāskaram

original: virajaṃ puṣpabhadrāyāṃ bālaṃ keralake viduḥ /
analyzed: virajam puṣpabhadrāyām bālam keralake viduḥ

original: yaśaskaraṃ vipāśāyāṃ māhiṣmatyāṃ hutāśanam // NsP_65.22 //
analyzed: yaśaskaram vipāśāyām māhiṣmatyām hutāśanam

original: kṣīrābdhau padmanābhaṃ tu vimale tu sanātanam /
analyzed: kṣīrābdhau padmanābham tu vimale tu sanātanam

original: śivanadyāṃ śivakaraṃ gayāyāṃ ca gadādharam // NsP_65.23 //
analyzed: śivanadyām śivakaram gayāyām ca gadādharam

original: sarvatra paramātmānaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate /
analyzed: sarvatra paramātmānam yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate

original: aṣṭaṣaṣṭiś ca nāmāni kathitāni mayā tava // NsP_65.24 //
analyzed: aṣṭaṣaṣṭiḥ ca nāmāni kathitāni mayā tava

original: kṣetrāṇi caiva guhyāni kathitāni viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: kṣetrāṇi ca eva guhyāni kathitāni viśeṣataḥ

original: etāni mama nāmāni rahasyāni prajāpate // NsP_65.25 //
analyzed: etāni mama nāmāni rahasyāni prajāpate

original: yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya śṛṇuyād vāpi nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya śṛṇuyāt vā api nityaśas

original: gavāṃ śatasahasrasya dattasya phalam āpnuyāt // NsP_65.26 //
analyzed: gavām śata sahasrasya dattasya phalam āpnuyāt

original: dine dine śucir bhūtvā nāmāny etāni yaḥ paṭhet /
analyzed: dine dine śuciḥ bhūtvā nāmāni etāni yaḥ paṭhet

original: duḥsvapnaṃ na bhavet tasya matprasādān na saṃśayaḥ // NsP_65.27 //
analyzed: duḥsvapnam na bhavet tasya mad prasādāt na saṃśayaḥ

original: aṣṭaṣaṣṭis tu nāmāni trikālaṃ yaḥ paṭhen naraḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭaṣaṣṭiḥ tu nāmāni tri kālam yaḥ paṭhet naraḥ

original: vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo mama loke sa modate // NsP_65.28 //
analyzed: vimuktaḥ sarva pāpebhyaḥ mama loke sa modate

original: draṣṭavyāni yathāśaktyā kṣetrāṇy etāni mānavaiḥ /
analyzed: draṣṭavyāni yathāśaktyā kṣetrāṇi etāni mānavaiḥ

original: vaiṣṇavais tu viśeṣeṇa teṣām muktiṃ dadāmy aham // NsP_65.29 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavaiḥ tu viśeṣeṇa teṣām muktim dadāmi aham

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: hariṃ samabhyarcya tadagrasaṃsthito hariṃ smaran viṣṇudine viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: harim samabhyarcya tad agra saṃsthitaḥ harim smaran viṣṇu dine viśeṣataḥ

original: imaṃ stavaṃ yaḥ paṭhate sa mānavaḥ prāpnoti viṣṇor amṛtātmakaṃ padam // NsP_65.30 //
analyzed: imam stavam yaḥ paṭhate sa mānavaḥ prāpnoti viṣṇoḥ amṛta ātmakam padam

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe ādye dharmārthamokṣadāyini viṣṇuvallabhe pañcaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 65 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe ādye dharma artha mokṣa dāyini viṣṇu vallabhe pañcaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: uktaḥ puṇyaḥ stavo brahman harer ebhis ca nāmabhiḥ /
analyzed: uktaḥ puṇyaḥ stavaḥ brahman hareḥ ebhiḥ ca nāmabhiḥ

original: punar anyāni nāmāni yāni tāni nibodha me // NsP_66.1 //
analyzed: punar anyāni nāmāni yāni tāni nibodha me

original: gaṅgā tu prathamaṃ puṇyā yamunā gomatī punaḥ /
analyzed: gaṅgā tu prathamam puṇyā yamunā gomatī punar

analyzed: sarayūḥ sarasvatī ca candrabhāgā carmaṇvatī

analyzed: kurukṣetram gayā ca eva puṣkarāṇi tathā arbudam

analyzed: narmadā ca mahā puṇyā tīrthāni etāni ca uttare

original: tāpī payoṣṇī puṇye dve tatsaṅgāt tīrtham uttamam /
analyzed: tāpī payoṣṇī puṇye dve tad saṅgāt tīrtham uttamam

original: tathā brahmagireś cāpi mekhalābhiḥ samanvitāḥ // NsP_66.4 //
analyzed: tathā brahmagireḥ ca api mekhalābhiḥ samanvitāḥ

original: virajaṃ ca tathā tīrthaṃ sarvapāpakṣayaṃkaram /
analyzed: virajam ca tathā tīrtham sarva pāpa kṣayaṃkaram

analyzed: godāvarī mahā puṇyā sarvatra caturānana

original: tuṅgabhadrā mahāpuṇyā yatrāhaṃ kamalodbhava /
analyzed: tuṅgabhadrā mahā puṇyā yatra aham kamalodbhava

original: hareṇa sārdhaṃ prītyā tu vasāmi munipūjitaḥ // NsP_66.6 //
analyzed: hareṇa sārdham prītyā tu vasāmi muni pūjitaḥ

original: dakṣiṇagaṅgā kṛṣṇā tu kāverī ca viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: dakṣiṇagaṅgā kṛṣṇā tu kāverī ca viśeṣataḥ

original: sahye tv āmalakagrāme sthito 'haṃ kamalodbhava // NsP_66.7 //
analyzed: sahye tu āmalaka grāme sthitaḥ ham kamalodbhava

original: devadevasya nāmnā tu tvayā brahman sadārcitaḥ /
analyzed: devadevasya nāmnā tu tvayā brahman sadā arcitaḥ

original: tatra tīrthāny anekāni sarvapāpaharāṇi vai /
analyzed: tatra tīrthāni anekāni sarva pāpa harāṇi vai

original: yeṣu snātvā ca pītvā ca pāpān mucyati mānavaḥ // NsP_66.8 //
analyzed: yeṣu snātvā ca pītvā ca pāpāt mucyati mānavaḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: ity evaṃ kathayitvā tu tīrthāni madhusūdanaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam kathayitvā tu tīrthāni madhusūdanaḥ

original: brahmaṇe gatavān brahman brahmāpi svapuraṃ gataḥ // NsP_66.9 //
analyzed: brahmaṇe gatavān brahman brahmā api sva puram gataḥ

original: bharadvāja uvāca:
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ uvāca

original: tasminn āmalakagrāme puṇyatīrthāni yāni vai /
analyzed: tasmin āmalaka grāme puṇya tīrthāni yāni vai

original: tāni me vada dharmajña vistareṇa yathārthataḥ // NsP_66.10 //
analyzed: tāni me vada dharma jña vistareṇa yathārthataḥ

original: kṣetrotpattiṃ ca māhātmyaṃ yātrāparvaṃ ca yatra tat /
analyzed: kṣetra utpattim ca māhātmyam yātrā parvam ca yatra tat

original: tatrāsau devadeveśaḥ pūjyate brahmaṇā svayam // NsP_66.11 //
analyzed: tatra asau devadeveśaḥ pūjyate brahmaṇā svayam

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi puṇyaṃ pāpapraṇāśanam /
analyzed: śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi puṇyam pāpa praṇāśanam

original: sahyāmalakatīrthasya utpattyādi mahāmune // NsP_66.12 //
analyzed: sahya āmalaka tīrthasya utpatti ādi mahā mune

original: purā sahyavanoddeśe tarur āmalako mahān /
analyzed: purā sahya vana uddeśe taruḥ āmalakaḥ mahān

original: āsīd brahman mahogro 'yaṃ nāmnāyaṃ cocyate budhaiḥ // NsP_66.13 //
analyzed: āsīt brahman mahā ugraḥ yam nāmnā ayam ca ucyate budhaiḥ

original: phalāni tasya vṛkṣasya mahānti surasāni ca /
analyzed: phalāni tasya vṛkṣasya mahānti su rasāni ca

original: darśanīyāni divyāni durlabhāni mahāmune // NsP_66.14 //
analyzed: darśanīyāni divyāni durlabhāni mahā mune

original: pareṣāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ tu pareṇa brahmaṇā purā /
analyzed: pareṣām brāhmaṇānām tu pareṇa brahmaṇā purā

analyzed: sa dṛṣṭaḥ tu mahā vṛkṣaḥ mahā phala samanvitaḥ

analyzed: kim etat iti vipra indra dhyāna dṛṣṭi paraḥ bhavat

original: dhyānena dṛṣṭavāṃs tatra punar āmalakaṃ tarum // NsP_66.16 //
analyzed: dhyānena dṛṣṭavān tatra punar āmalakam tarum

original: tasyopari tu deveśaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam /
analyzed: tasya upari tu deveśam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: utthāya ca punaḥ paśyet pratimām eva kevalām // NsP_66.17 //
analyzed: utthāya ca punar paśyet pratimām eva kevalām

original: tatpādaṃ bhūtale devaḥ praviveśa mahātaruḥ /
analyzed: tad pādam bhū tale devaḥ praviveśa mahā taruḥ

analyzed: tatas tu ārādhayāmasa devadeveśam avyayam

original: gandhapuṣpādibhir nityaṃ brahmā lokapitamahaḥ /
analyzed: gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ nityam brahmā

original: dvādaśabhiḥ saptabhis tu saṃkhyābhiḥ pujito hariḥ // NsP_66.19 //
analyzed: dvādaśabhiḥ saptabhiḥ tu saṃkhyābhiḥ pujitaḥ hariḥ

original: tasmin kṣetre muniśreṣṭha māhātmyaṃ tasya ko vadet /
analyzed: tasmin kṣetre muni śreṣṭha māhātmyam tasya kaḥ vadet

original: śrīsahyāmalakagrāme devadeveśam avyayam // NsP_66.20 //
analyzed: śrī sahya āmalaka grāme devadeveśam avyayam

original: ārādhya tīrthe saṃprāptā dvādaśa prati caturmukham /
analyzed: ārādhya tīrthe saṃprāptāḥ dvādaśa prati caturmukham

original: tasya pādatale tīrthaṃ niḥsṛtaṃ paścimāmukham // NsP_66.21 //
analyzed: tasya pāda tale tīrtham niḥsṛtam paścimā mukham

original: tac cakratīrtham abhavat puṇyaṃ pāpapraṇāśanam /
analyzed: tat cakratīrtham abhavat puṇyam pāpa praṇāśanam

original: cakratirthe naraḥ snātvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // NsP_66.22 //
analyzed: cakratirthe naraḥ snātvā sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: bahuvarṣasahasrāṇi brahmaloke mahīyate /
analyzed: bahu varṣa sahasrāṇi brahma loke mahīyate

original: śaṅkhatīrthe naraḥ snātvā vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet // NsP_66.23 //
analyzed: śaṅkhatīrthe naraḥ snātvā vājapeya phalam labhet

analyzed: tasya adrau patitā brahman tatra tīrthe śubham haret

original: nāmnā tatkuṇḍikātīrthaṃ śilāgṛhasamanvitam // NsP_66.25 //
analyzed: nāmnā tat kuṇḍikātīrtham śilāgṛha samanvitam

original: tattīrthe manujaḥ snātvā tadānīṃ siddhim āpnuyāt /
analyzed: tad tīrthe manujaḥ snātvā tadānīm siddhim āpnuyāt

original: trirātropoṣito bhūtvā yas tatra snāti mānavaḥ // NsP_66.26 //

original: sarvapāpavinirmukto brahmaloke mahīyate /
analyzed: sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ brahma loke mahīyate

original: kuṇḍikātīrthād uttare piṇḍasthānāc ca dakṣiṇe // NsP_66.27 //

original: ṛṇamocanatīrthaṃ hi tīrthānāṃ guhyam uttamam /
analyzed: ṛṇamocanatīrtham hi tīrthānām guhyam uttamam

analyzed: tri rātram uṣitaḥ yaḥ tu tatra snānam samācaret

original: ṛṇais tribhir asau brahman mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṇaiḥ tribhiḥ asau brahman mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

analyzed: śrāddham kṛtvā pitṛbhyaḥ ca piṇḍa sthāneṣu yaḥ

original: pitṝn uddiśya vidhivat piṇḍān nirvāpayiṣyati /
analyzed: pitṝn uddiśya vidhivat piṇḍān nirvāpayiṣyati

original: sutṛptāḥ pitaro yānti pitṛlokaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // NsP_66.30 //
analyzed: su tṛptāḥ pitaraḥ yānti pitṛ lokam na saṃśayaḥ

original: pañcarātroṣitasnāyī tīrthe vai pāpamocane /
analyzed: pañca rātra uṣita snāyī tīrthe vai pāpa mocane

original: sarvapāpakṣayaṃ prāpya viṣṇuloke sa modate // NsP_66.31 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa kṣayam prāpya viṣṇu loke sa modate

original: tatraiva mahatīṃ dhārāṃ śirasā yas tu dhārayet /
analyzed: tatra eva mahatīm dhārām śirasā yaḥ tu dhārayet

original: sarvakratuphalaṃ prāpya nākapṛṣṭhe mahīyate // NsP_66.32 //
analyzed: sarva kratu phalam prāpya nāka pṛṣṭhe mahīyate

original: dhanuḥpāte mahātīrthe bhaktyā yaḥ snānam ācaret /
analyzed: dhanuḥpāte mahā tīrthe bhaktyā yaḥ snānam ācaret

original: āyurbhogaphalaṃ prāpya svargaloke mahīyate // NsP_66.33 //
analyzed: āyuḥ bhoga phalam prāpya svarga loke mahīyate

original: śarabindau naraḥ snātvā śatakratupuraṃ vrajet /
analyzed: śarabindau naraḥ snātvā śatakratu puram vrajet

original: vārāhatīrthe viprendra sahye yaḥ snānam ācaret // NsP_66.34 //
analyzed: vārāhatīrthe vipra indra sahye yaḥ snānam ācaret

original: ahorātroṣito bhūtvā viṣṇuloke mahīyate /
analyzed: ahorātra uṣitaḥ bhūtvā viṣṇu loke mahīyate

original: ākāśagaṅgānāmnā ca sahyāgre tīrtham uttamam // NsP_66.35 //
analyzed: ākāśagaṅgā nāmnā ca sahya agre tīrtham uttamam

original: śilātalāt tato brahman nirgatā śvetamṛttikā /
analyzed: śilā talāt tatas brahman nirgatā śveta mṛttikā

original: tasyāṃ bhaktyā tu yaḥ snāti naro dvijavarottamam // NsP_66.36 //
analyzed: tasyām bhaktyā tu yaḥ snāti naraḥ dvijavara uttamam

original: sarvakratuphalaṃ prāpya viṣṇuloke mahīyate /
analyzed: sarva kratu phalam prāpya viṣṇu loke mahīyate

original: brahmann amalasahyādrer yadyadtoyavinirgamaḥ // NsP_66.37 //
analyzed: brahman amala sahya adreḥ yat yat toya vinirgamaḥ

original: tatra tīrthaṃ vijānīhi snātvā pāpāt pramucyate /
analyzed: tatra tīrtham vijānīhi snātvā pāpāt pramucyate

original: sahyādriṃ gatavān nityaṃ snātvā pāpāt pramucyate // NsP_66.38 //
analyzed: sahya adrim gatavān nityam snātvā pāpāt pramucyate

original: eteṣu tīrtheṣu naro dvijendra puṇyeṣu sahyādrisamudbhaveṣu /
analyzed: eteṣu tīrtheṣu naraḥ dvijendra puṇyeṣu sahya adri samudbhaveṣu

original: dattvā supuṣpāṇi hariṃ sa bhaktyā vihāya pāpaṃ praviśet sa viṣṇum // NsP_66.39 //
analyzed: dattvā su puṣpāṇi harim sa bhaktyā vihāya pāpam praviśet sa viṣṇum

original: sakṛt tīrthādritoyeṣu gaṅgāyāṃ tu punah punaḥ /
analyzed: sakṛt tīrtha adri toyeṣu gaṅgāyām tu punar punar

original: sarvatīrthamayī gaṅgā sarvadevamayo hariḥ // NsP_66.40 //
analyzed: sarva tīrtha mayī gaṅgā sarva deva mayaḥ hariḥ

original: sarvaśāstramayī gītā sarvadharmo dayāparaḥ /
analyzed: sarva śāstra mayī gītā sarva dharmaḥ dayā paraḥ

original: evaṃ te kathitaṃ vipra kṣetramāhātmyam uttamam // NsP_66.41 //
analyzed: evam te kathitam vipra kṣetra māhātmyam uttamam

original: śrīsahyāmalakagrāme tīrthe snātvā phalāni ca /
analyzed: śrī sahya āmalaka grāme tīrthe snātvā phalāni ca

original: tīrthānām api yat tīrthaṃ tat tīrthaṃ dvijasattama /
analyzed: tīrthānām api yat tīrtham tat tīrtham dvijasattama

original: devadevasya pādasya talād bhuvi niniḥsṛtam // NsP_66.42 //
analyzed: devadevasya pādasya talāt bhuvi niniḥsṛtam

original: ambhoyugaṃ turagamedhasahasratulyaṃ tac cakratīrtham iti vedavido vadanti /
analyzed: ambhaḥ yugam turagamedha sahasra tulyam tat cakratīrtham iti veda vidaḥ vadanti

original: snānāc ca tatra manujā na punar bhavanti pādau praṇamya śirasā madhusūdanasya // NsP_66.43 //
analyzed: snānāt ca tatra manujāḥ na punar bhavanti pādau praṇamya śirasā madhusūdanasya

original: gaṅgāprayāgagamanaimiṣapuṣkarāṇi puṇyāyutāni kurujāṅgalayāmunāni /
analyzed: gaṅgā prayāga gama naimiṣa puṣkarāṇi puṇya ayutāni kurujāṅgala yāmunāni

original: kālena tīrthasalilāni punanti pāpāt pādodakaṃ bhagavatas tu punāti sadyaḥ // NsP_66.44 //
analyzed: kālena tīrtha salilāni punanti pāpāt pāda udakam bhagavataḥ tu punāti sadyas

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapuraṇe tīrthapraśaṃsāyāṃ ṣaṭsaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 66 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapuraṇe tīrtha praśaṃsāyām ṣaṭsaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: tīrthāni kathitāny evaṃ bhaumāni dvijasattama /
analyzed: tīrthāni kathitāni evam bhaumāni dvijasattama

original: mānasāni hi tīrthāni phaladāni viśeṣataḥ // NsP_67.1 //
analyzed: mānasāni hi tīrthāni phala dāni viśeṣataḥ

original: manonirmalatā tīrthaṃ rāgādibhir anākulā /
analyzed: manaḥ nirmala tā tīrtham rāga ādibhiḥ an ākulā

original: satyaṃ tīrthaṃ dayā tīrthaṃ tīrtham indriyanigrahaḥ // NsP_67.2 //
analyzed: satyam tīrtham dayā tīrtham tīrtham indriya nigrahaḥ

original: guruśuśrūṣaṇaṃ tīrthaṃ mātṛśuśrūṣaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: guru śuśrūṣaṇam tīrtham mātṛ śuśrūṣaṇam tathā

original: svadharmācaraṇaṃ tīrthaṃ tīrtham agner upāsanam // NsP_67.3 //
analyzed: svadharma ācaraṇam tīrtham tīrtham agneḥ upāsanam

original: etāni puṇyatīrthāni vratāni śṛṇu me 'dhunā /
analyzed: etāni puṇya tīrthāni vratāni śṛṇu me dhunā

original: ekabhuktaṃ tathā naktam upavāsaṃ ca vai mune // NsP_67.4 //
analyzed: eka bhuktam tathā naktam upavāsam ca vai mune

original: pūrṇamāsyām amāvāsyām ekabhuktaṃ samācaret /
analyzed: pūrṇamāsyām amāvāsyām eka bhuktam samācaret

original: tatraikabhuktaṃ kurvāṇaḥ puṇyāṃ gatim avāpnuyāt // NsP_67.5 //
analyzed: tatra eka bhuktam kurvāṇaḥ puṇyām gatim avāpnuyāt

original: caturthyāṃ tu caturdaśyāṃ saptamyāṃ naktam ācaret /
analyzed: caturthyām tu caturdaśyām saptamyām naktam ācaret

original: aṣṭamyāṃ tu trayodaśyāṃ sa prāpnoty abhivāñchitam // NsP_67.6 //
analyzed: aṣṭamyām tu trayodaśyām sa prāpnoti abhivāñchitam

original: upavāso manuśreṣṭha ekādaśyāṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: upavāsaḥ manu śreṣṭhaḥ ekādaśyām vidhīyate

original: narasiṃhaṃ samabhyarcya sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // NsP_67.7 //
analyzed: narasiṃham samabhyarcya sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: hastayukte 'rkadivase sauranaktaṃ samācaret /
analyzed: hasta yukte rka divase saura naktam samācaret

original: snātvārkamadhye viṣṇuṃ ca dhyātvā rogāt pramucyate // NsP_67.8 //
analyzed: snātvā arka madhye viṣṇum ca dhyātvā rogāt pramucyate

original: ātmano dviguṇāṃ chāyāṃ yadā saṃtiṣṭhate raviḥ /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ dviguṇām chāyām yadā saṃtiṣṭhate raviḥ

original: sauranaktaṃ vijānīyān na naktaṃ niśi bhojanam // NsP_67.9 //
analyzed: saura naktam vijānīyāt na naktam niśi bhojanam

original: guruvāre trayodaśyām aparāhṇe jale tataḥ /
analyzed: guruvāre trayodaśyām aparāhṇe jale tatas

original: tarpayitvā pitṛn devān ṛṣīṃś ca tilatandulaiḥ // NsP_67.10 //
analyzed: tarpayitvā pitṛn devān ṛṣīn ca tila tandulaiḥ

original: narasiṃhaṃ samabhyarcya yaḥ karoty upavāsakam /
analyzed: narasiṃham samabhyarcya yaḥ karoti upavāsakam

original: sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇuloke mahīyate // NsP_67.11 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ viṣṇu loke mahīyate

original: yadāgastyodaye prāpte tadā saptasu rātriṣu /
analyzed: yadā agastya udaye prāpte tadā saptasu rātriṣu

original: arghyaṃ dadyāt samabhyarcya agastyāya mahāmune // NsP_67.12 //
analyzed: arghyam dadyāt samabhyarcya agastyāya mahā mune

original: śaṅkhe toyaṃ vinikṣipya sitapuṣpākṣatair yutam /
analyzed: śaṅkhe toyam vinikṣipya sita puṣpa akṣataiḥ yutam

original: mantreṇānena vai dadyāc *chitapuṣpādinārcite // NsP_67.13 //
analyzed: mantreṇa anena vai dadyāt śita puṣpa ādinā arcite

original: kāśapuṣpapratīkāśa agnimārutasaṃbhava /
analyzed: kāśa puṣpa pratīkāśa agni māruta saṃbhava

original: mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putra kumbhayone namo 'stu te // NsP_67.14 //
analyzed: mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putra kumbha yone namaḥ stu te

original: ātāpī bhakṣito yena vātāpī ca mahāsuraḥ /
analyzed: ātāpī bhakṣitaḥ yena vātāpī ca mahā asuraḥ

original: samudraḥ śoṣito yena so 'gastyaḥ prīyatāṃ mama // NsP_67.15 //
analyzed: samudraḥ śoṣitaḥ yena saḥ gastyaḥ prīyatām mama

original: evaṃ tu dadyād yo sarvam agastye vai diśaṃ prati /
analyzed: evam tu dadyāt sarvam agastye vai diśam prati

original: sarvapāpavinirmuktas tamas tarati dustaram // NsP_67.16 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ tamaḥ tarati dustaram

original: evaṃ te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ bharadvāja mahāmune /
analyzed: evam te kathitam sarvam bharadvāja mahā mune

original: purāṇaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ ca munīnāṃ saṃnidhau mayā // NsP_67.17 //
analyzed: purāṇam nārasiṃham ca munīnām saṃnidhau mayā

original: sargaś ca pratisargaś ca vaṃso manvantarāṇi ca /
analyzed: sargaḥ ca pratisargaḥ ca vaṃsaḥ manvantarāṇi ca

original: vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva sarvam eva prakīrtitam // NsP_67.18 //
analyzed: vaṃśānucaritam ca eva sarvam eva prakīrtitam

original: brahmaṇaiva purā proktaṃ marīcyādiṣu vai mune /
analyzed: brahmaṇā eva purā proktam marīci ādiṣu vai mune

original: tebhyaś ca bhṛguṇā proktaṃ mārkaṇḍeyāya vai tataḥ // NsP_67.19 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ ca bhṛguṇā proktam mārkaṇḍeyāya vai tatas

original: mārkaṇḍeyena vai proktaṃ rājño nāgakulasya ha /
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyena vai proktam rājñaḥ nāga kulasya ha

original: prasādān narasiṃhasya prāptaṃ vyāsena dhīmatā // NsP_67.20 //
analyzed: prasādāt narasiṃhasya prāptam vyāsena dhīmatā

original: tatprasādān mayā prāptaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam /
analyzed: tad prasādāt mayā prāptam sarva pāpa praṇāśanam

original: purāṇaṃ narasiṃhasya mayā ca kathitaṃ tava // NsP_67.21 //
analyzed: purāṇam narasiṃhasya mayā ca kathitam tava

original: munīnāṃ saṃnidhau puṇyaṃ svasti te 'stu vrajāmy aham /
analyzed: munīnām saṃnidhau puṇyam svasti te stu vrajāmi aham

original: yaḥ śṛṇoti śucir bhūtvā purāṇaṃ hy etad uttamam // NsP_67.22 //
analyzed: yaḥ śṛṇoti śuciḥ bhūtvā purāṇam hi etat uttamam

original: māghe māsi prayāge tu sa snānaphalam āpnuyāt /
analyzed: māghe māsi prayāge tu sa snāna phalam āpnuyāt

original: yo bhaktyā śrāvayed bhaktān nityaṃ naraharer idam // NsP_67.23 //
analyzed: yaḥ bhaktyā śrāvayet bhaktān nityam narahareḥ idam

original: sarvatīrthaphalaṃ prāpya viṣṇuloke mahīyate /
analyzed: sarva tīrtha phalam prāpya viṣṇu loke mahīyate

original: śrutvaivaṃ snātakaiḥ sārdhaṃ bharadvājo mahāmatiḥ // NsP_67.24 //
analyzed: śrutvā evam snātakaiḥ sārdham bharadvājaḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: sūtam abhyarcya tatraiva sthitavān munayo gatāḥ /
analyzed: sūtam abhyarcya tatra eva sthitavān munayaḥ gatāḥ

original: sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ nṛsiṃhātmakam // NsP_67.25 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa haram puṇyam purāṇam nṛsiṃha ātmakam

original: paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ nṛṇāṃ narasiṃho prasīdati /
analyzed: paṭhatām śṛṇvatām nṛṇām narasiṃho prasīdati

original: prasanne devadeveśe sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet // NsP_67.26 //
analyzed: prasanne devadeveśe sarva pāpa kṣayaḥ bhavet

original: prakṣīṇapāpabandhās te muktiṃ yānti narā iti // NsP_67.27 //
analyzed: prakṣīṇa pāpa bandhāḥ te muktim yānti narāḥ iti

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe mānasatīrthavrataṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // NarP 67 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe mānasatīrthavratam nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: sūta uvāca:
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: ity etat sarvam ākhyātaṃ purāṇaṃ nārasiṃhakam /
analyzed: iti etat sarvam ākhyātam purāṇam nārasiṃhakam

original: sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvaduḥkhanivāraṇam // NsP_68.1 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa haram puṇyam sarva duḥkha nivāraṇam

original: samastapuṇyaphaladaṃ sarvayajñaphalapradam /
ye paṭhanty api śṛṇvanti ślokaṃ ślokārdham eva vā // NsP_68.2 //
analyzed: ye paṭhanti api śṛṇvanti ślokam śloka ardham eva vā

original: na teṣāṃ pāpabandhas tu kadācid api jāyate /
analyzed: na teṣām pāpa bandhaḥ tu kadācid api jāyate

original: viṣṇvarpitam idaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ sarvakāmadam // NsP_68.3 //
analyzed: viṣṇu arpitam idam puṇyam purāṇam sarva kāma dam

original: bhaktyā ca vadatām etac *chṛṇvatāṃ ca phalaṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: bhaktyā ca vadatām etat śṛṇvatām ca phalam śṛṇu

original: śatajanmārjitaiḥ pāpaiḥ sadya eva vimocitāḥ // NsP_68.4 //
analyzed: śata janma arjitaiḥ pāpaiḥ sadyas eva vimocitāḥ

original: sahasrakulasaṃyuktāḥ prayānti paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: sahasra kula saṃyuktāḥ prayānti paramam padam

original: kiṃ tīrthair gopradānair vā tapobhir vā kim adhvaraiḥ // NsP_68.5 //
analyzed: kim tīrthaiḥ go pradānaiḥ vā tapobhiḥ vā kim adhvaraiḥ

original: ahanyahani govindaṃ tatparatvena śṛṇvatām /
analyzed: ahani ahani govindam tad para tvena śṛṇvatām

original: yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya yad asya ślokaviṃśatim // NsP_68.6 //
analyzed: yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya yat asya śloka viṃśatim

original: jyotiṣṭomaphalaṃ prāpya viṣṇuloke mahīyate /
analyzed: jyotiṣṭoma phalam prāpya viṣṇu loke mahīyate

original: etat pavitraṃ pūjyaṃ ca na vācyam akṛtātmanām // NsP_68.7 //
analyzed: etat pavitram pūjyam ca na vācyam akṛtātmanām

original: dvijānāṃ viṣṇubhaktānāṃ śrāvyam etan na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: dvijānām viṣṇu bhaktānām śrāvyam etat na saṃśayaḥ

original: etat purāṇaśravaṇam ihāmutra sukhapradam // NsP_68.8 //
analyzed: etat purāṇa śravaṇam iha amutra sukha pradam

original: vadatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadyaḥ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam /
analyzed: vadatām śṛṇvatām sadyas sarva pāpa praṇāśanam

original: bahunātra kim uktena bhūyo bhūyo munīśvarāḥ // NsP_68.9 //
analyzed: bahunā atra kim uktena bhūyas bhūyas muni īśvarāḥ

original: śraddhayāśraddhayā vāpi śrotavyam idam uttamam /
analyzed: śraddhayā aśraddhayā vā api śrotavyam idam uttamam

original: bhāradvājamukhāḥ sarve kṛtakṛtyā dvijottamāḥ // NsP_68.10 //
analyzed: bhāradvāja mukhāḥ sarve kṛtakṛtyāḥ dvijottamāḥ

original: sūtaṃ hṛṣṭāḥ prapūjyātha sarve svasvāśramaṃ yayuḥ // NsP_68.11 //
analyzed: sūtam hṛṣṭāḥ prapūjya atha sarve sva sva āśramam yayuḥ

original: // iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe sūtabharadvājādisaṃvāde sarvaduḥkhopaharaṃ śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇasya māhātmyaṃ samāptam // NarP 68 //
analyzed: iti śrī narasiṃhapurāṇe sūta bharadvāja ādi saṃvāde sarva duḥkha upaharam śrī narasiṃhapurāṇasya māhātmyam samāptam
